契约 杀死一名因多瑞尔祭司 省份： 晨风 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
To Gawayne,

I must admit, your letter has been the cause of some amusement at my court.
It is not that I do not share your vision of a world united under vampire rule, for this I certainly do, but that you think that you would be the one to bring about this new order shows your naivety.
Who are you, Gawayne? You are not of royal blood, and you are not of pure vampire blood. You have no claim and you have no authority.
[pagebreak]
The world will be ruled by vampires one day, this much I can foresee. But you will not be at the head of this kingdom of the night, and you would be lucky to play more than a footnote in its creation.
All that aside, Gawayne, at least you have a determination I can admire. Come to my court at Castle Volkihar with your clan and cattle, and kneel before me. Promise to join my ranks, and to give all that is yours to me, and I will make sure you have your place by my side.
In any other relation between us, I see no purpose.

Lord Harkon Volkihar
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
致加韦恩，

我必须承认，你的信在我的宫廷里闹出了不少笑柄。

并非我不认同你那让世界归于吸血鬼统治的愿景，恰恰相反，我对此深信不疑，但你竟认为自己能缔造这一新秩序，足见你的天真。

加韦恩，你算什么？你既无皇室血脉，也非纯血吸血鬼。你没有任何名分，亦无半点权柄。

[pagebreak]
终有一日，世界将由吸血鬼执掌，这一点我早有预见。但你绝不会成为这暗夜王国的主宰，若能在它的建立过程中留下区区一笔注脚，你就该谢天谢地了。

抛开这些不谈，加韦恩，你的那份决心倒还值得我称道。带着你的氏族与血畜来弗基哈尔城堡的宫廷吧，到我面前跪下。发誓效忠于我，将你所有的一切都奉献给我，我便会让你在我身边拥有一席之地。

倘若你不愿如此，那我们之间便再无任何交集。

—— 弗基哈尔的哈孔领主
</font>

string: 我想它的衰落是因为地处边塞。道路这么危险，我猜他们生意不会太好。

original:
[pagebreak]

History of the Inquisition Part 1 By Inquisitor Ahmad

[pagebreak]

efore time flowed as mortals now understand it, before history was a single thread, the world was chaos. In the Dawn Era, the world had no certainty and reality was mutable, shaped by the whims of gods and spirits. But when the Aedra sacrificed themselves to create Mundus, they sought to give it stabilit. A dream beyond dreams, to bind time into a single path. Yet this was no simple act. It required Akatosh, the Dragon God of Time, to fix reality in place as anchor. But even gods falter. Even eternity can break. Thus, the first great cataclysm of time occurred, the First Dragon Break. An event so catastrophic that it shattered the very laws of existence. Time ceased to function in a single, continuous flow. Instead, multiple realities overlapped. History diverged, folded upon itself, and rewrote its own past. Entire generations lived and died in one reality, only to awaken in another, unaware that they had been erased and rewritten. Some awoke to find their homes never existed, while others remembered wars that had never been fought, gods that had never risen, and lives they had never lived. For an immeasurable span, the world existed in madness. Each a fractured reality, where history had no certainty and where multiple versions of the same events played out simultaneously. It was said that even the mountains wept in confusion, unable to remember whether they had always stood or had only just risen from the earth. Finally, Akatosh re-forged the timeline, sealing time into a single flow once more. The world resumed its course, but there were those who remembered. These people would eventually go on to form the Inquisition, shaping their lives around the pursuit of truth, order and a desire to protect the world..
string:
[pagebreak]

审判庭史 第一卷 作者 审判官艾哈迈德

[pagebreak]

在时间尚非凡人如今理解的模样之前，在历史尚未凝成单一线索之际，世界本是一片混沌。 黎明纪元里，世间万物皆无定数，现实亦随神灵与精魂的一念之间流转变幻。而当创世神牺牲自身铸就梦达斯之时，他们便渴望为这片世界赋予稳定。这是一场超越幻梦的愿景，欲将时间束缚于唯一的轨迹之中。然此举绝非易事，它需要时间龙神阿卡托什亲自出手，以自身为锚，将现实牢牢固定。 可即便是神明，亦有失算之时；即便是永恒，亦有破碎之刻。 于是，时间的第一场大灾变降临了 —— 那便是第一次龙破。这场灾难惨烈至极，竟将存在的法则本身击得粉碎。时间不再以单一、连续的轨迹运行，无数现实彼此重叠。历史走向分歧，自我折叠，甚至重写了自身的过往。 整整几代人在一个现实中生老病死，转眼却在另一个现实中苏醒，全然不知自己早已被抹去、被改写。有人醒来后发现家园从未存在，有人则记得那些未曾打响的战争、未曾崛起的神明，以及那些从未度过的人生。 在一段漫长到无法计量的岁月里，世界陷入疯狂。每一处都是破碎的现实，历史失去了确定性，同一件事的无数版本在同一时刻上演。据说，就连群山也因困惑而呜咽，记不清自己是一直矗立于此，还是才刚从大地中升起。 最终，阿卡托什重铸了时间线，将时间再度封印于单一的洪流之中。世界重回正轨，却仍有一些人记得过往的混沌。这些人最终组建了审判庭，以追寻真相、维护秩序、守护世界为毕生信念，以此塑造自己的人生。

Never have I wished more for this existence to be a curse of Vaermina. A bad dream that I can wake up from.
string: 我多希望这一切只是瓦尔迷娜的诅咒，一场我能醒来的噩梦。

original: Who would have thought I'd have fallen for a thief. I'm sure my father would be devastated.

I once pitied the vampires. How they writhe in the dark, lost the tastes for food and all... But in truth, what are these to the pain they cause?
string: 我曾经同情过吸血鬼。他们在黑暗中挣扎，失去了品尝食物的能力…… 但事实上，这些与他们造成的痛苦相比，又算得了什么？

I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original: Want to go try out your new toy? Some guard gave me a mean look earlier. I like the idea of paying him a visit...
string: 想去试试你的新玩具吗？刚才有个守卫用凶狠的眼神看我，我想去 “拜访” 一下他……

original: Fafi thanks you for what you did. He's just not very good at showing it.
string: 法菲很感谢你所做的一切，只是他不擅长表达而已。

original: With it, so comes my fear. Gnawing at my heart and making me feel less.
string: 随之而来的还有我的恐惧。它啃噬着我的心，让我觉得自己很渺小。

original: Can your actions still be called pick-pocketing, if I don't have any pockets?
string: 要是我连口袋都没有，你的行为还能叫扒窃吗？

original: Odd spirits hide in the shadows here. Let's be careful.
string: 这里的阴影里藏着古怪的灵体，我们小心点。

original: Though I fear this victory will be short. The calm before the storm, as it were. Because the Thalmor... They'll be coming for the Empire.
string: 不过我担心这次胜利只是暂时的，这不过是暴风雨前的宁静。因为梭默…… 他们会向帝国发难的。

original: Not quite sure I understand his plan... Betray the only person who is strong enough to save you?... Okay. By all means.
string: 我不太明白他的计划…… 背叛唯一一个有能力救你的人？…… 行，随他便吧。

original: I know I asked you for a favor in letting me travel with you, but I don't deserve to be treated like this.
string: 我知道是我求你让我跟你旅行的，但我不该被这么对待。

original: I never thought there would be so much to see outside the Reach - and across such long distances. My feet hurt.
string: 我从没想过边塞之外有这么多可看的东西，还跑了这么远的路，我的脚都疼了。

original: We shall kill six innocents to celebrate this auspicious moment. No... twelve!
string: 我们要杀六个无辜者来庆祝这个吉时。不…… 十二个！

original: The Falmer reek of Chaurus piss and filth. They've lost even the most basic sense of hygiene.
string: 伐莫身上满是巢蚁的尿骚味和污秽，他们连最基本的卫生意识都丧失了。

original: An Elder Scroll possessed by an ancient vampire, long hidden to do her work in the dark. Why does it seem like I'm the only one who's unsettled?
string: 一本古老卷轴落在了古老吸血鬼手中，她一直将其隐藏，在黑暗中密谋。为什么只有我觉得这事不对劲？
天际契约 | 极高风险

original: Hmph. They may seem so, but beneath the exterior lies hidden strength. A true artisan sees potential, even in base materials.

string: 在哪个泰姆瑞尔，你觉得我不需要知道你结婚了！？

original: Only if we're going somewhere nice.
I've always respected destruction magic. It's the most primal form of power, stemming from the elements themselves.
string: 我一直很敬佩毁灭魔法，它是最原始的力量，源自元素本身。

original: So... When do you learn to use a lute? Does that come before we die a horrible death in a dangerous ruin, or after?
string: 所以…… 你什么时候学弹鲁特琴？是在我们惨死在危险遗迹之前，还是之后？

original: An apostle of the Clockwork City has disappeared on Solstheim. I am now in Nchardak Submerged Laboratory looking for him, but I am stuck in front of a big hole, with no way to go through. Maybe if I take control of the draining system, I could fill the hole with water and swim through?
string: 发条城的一位使徒在索瑟海姆失踪了。我如今身处钠查达克水下实验室，正在寻找他的踪迹，却被一个大坑挡住了去路，无路可通。或许我若能操控排水系统，就能往坑里注满水，然后游过去？

original: This place is serene. Makes one contemplate what befell the ancient Falmer, their glory and their fall...
string: 这地方好宁静。让人不禁思索古伐莫的遭遇，他们的荣光与衰落……

original: That should be evident. Unless it needs proving.
string: 这应该很明显了，除非需要证明一下。

original: Who are the Nightingales? The longer Karliah keeps that a secret, the more I'm tempted to... No, I'd rather not make a new enemy.
string: 夜莺到底是什么人？卡莉亚越把这事藏着掖着，我就越想…… 算了，我可不想树新敌。

original: Animals that live in cold regions are hardier than most. We should be careful.
string: 生活在寒冷地区的动物比大多数生物都强悍，我们得小心点。

original: If only saying it would make it so.
string: 要是说说就能实现就好了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
They call us bandits. As if we're little more than scavengers in the snow, gnawing on bones. Once, they called us barbarians, berserkers, wolves of the north. They feared us then, hated us, respected us. The free clans of Skyrim lived by the old ways. Strength above silver, honor above laws, pride above comfort.

We still have our numbers. There are more of us in the wilds than the jarls care to admit. We hold the passes, the forests, the high roads. But our blood runs thinner with every passing winter. The culture, the soul of the clans, that's what's dying.

We take in outsiders now. Orcs, imperials, even the odd dunmer. They fight well enough. Sometimes better than our own. And yet, they do not know the songs, the rites, the weight of the names carved on our stones.

The young ones... they would rather cut a merchant's purse than forge steel. They care more for easy spoils than for proving themselves worthy of Sovngarde. The old ways are being forgotten, replaced with the habits of sellswords and thieves.

The jarls will think they've won, that they've tamed the wild men. But they've beaten us not by force of arms, no, they've done it by letting the old ways rot inside us, until the free clans are clans in name only.

Still, I'll keep my fire burning. I'll keep my axe sharp. And when I fall, it will be under the open sky, with blood on my hands and the old songs in my throat. Let them call us what they will. We know who we are.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
他们管我们叫强盗。仿佛我们不过是雪地里啃食骨头的拾荒者罢了。曾几何时，他们称我们为蛮族、狂战士、北方之狼。那时的他们怕我们、恨我们，却也敬畏我们。天际的自由部族依循古老的法则生存：力量重于金银，荣誉高于律法，骄傲贵于安逸。

我们仍有不少族人，荒野中的我们比领主们愿意承认的要多得多。隘口、森林、要道，皆在我们掌控之中。可每过一个冬天，我们的血脉便愈发稀薄。真正消亡的，是部族的文化，是部族的灵魂。

如今我们接纳外来者了 —— 兽人、帝国人，甚至偶尔还有暗精灵。他们打仗还算勇猛，有时甚至比我们族里的人还要厉害。可他们不懂我们的歌谣，不晓我们的仪式，也不明白刻在石碑上的那些名字背后的分量。

年轻人…… 他们宁愿去割商人的钱袋，也不愿去锻造钢铁。比起证明自己配得上松加德，他们更贪图唾手可得的赃物。古老的传统被渐渐遗忘，取而代之的是佣兵与盗贼的陋习。

领主们会以为自己赢了，以为他们驯服了这些荒野之人。可他们并非靠武力击败我们，而是让古老的法则在我们心中腐朽，直到自由部族只剩虚名。

即便如此，我仍会让心中的火焰熊熊燃烧，仍会将战斧磨得锋利。当我倒下时，必是在开阔的天空下，双手染血，口中吟唱着古老的歌谣。随他们怎么称呼我们吧，我们深知自己是谁。
</font>

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">We've been watching you, Listener, and you certainly don't dissapoint. I think it's time we met face to face, you're going to want to hear what we have to say. We'll be waiting.</font>

<font face="$HandwrittenFont">我们一直在观察你，聆听者，而你果然没让我们失望。我想，是时候与你当面相见了，你一定会想听听我们要说的话。如今的晨星城实在有些太过拥挤，所以我们希望能在更隐秘的地方与你碰面。去独孤城的眨眼恶鼠酒馆后方找那口井吧，它会带你进入我们的小小…… 圣所。

我们会在此等候。</font>

I do not plan to retrieve that one, maybe I can send a foolhardy adventurer for it.
string: 晨星月十八日 我本想借此迷惑携带者的意志，可附魔过程中出了岔子。我能感知到那些背着背包者的心思，却无法操控他们。这场失败中唯一的慰藉，是那个买了死灵法师背包的蠢货，竟径直闯进了吸血鬼巢穴，被吃得一干二净。我没打算亲自去取回那只背包 —— 或许可以找个鲁莽的冒险者替我跑腿。

original: Better to risk it all and fight back while you're still strong than to buy time until you are weak, no?
string: 在还有实力的时候放手一搏，总好过苟延残喘直到虚弱不堪，不是吗？

original: Some peace to the ears, at last.
string: 终于能享受片刻的宁静了。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
Dragonborn,

Dark tidings have reached my hold.

Evil forces haunt the woods North West of Falkreath near the Dragon Burial site. Hunters looking for game first spotted what seemed to be a massive walking tree, almost as tall as pine trees and animals have been very hostile here lately in Falkreath; weve lost good hunters and some have gone missing.
I sent out a party of my own guards but none returned.

Desperate, I paid two sellswords to scout the area. They returned pale and shaking. Both spoke of a red figure; tall.. like a man, in black robes and radiating red like something foul. They said their chests burned with pain the moment it appeared. One swore it looked like a demon pulled straight from the Deadlands.

Compounding my troubles, Falkreath is already under pressure. Bandits test our roads. Vampires prowl the outskirts. I cannot spare more men. That is why I have turned to you.
I fear this may be the work of Dremora beings. If true, I ask you destroy these dark forces and send them back to Oblivion! The courier has some gold for you as payment.

Keep your steel close, and your eyes open.

- Jarl of Falkreath
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
龙裔亲启：

我国已传来不祥的消息。

佛克瑞斯西北部、龙冢附近的树林里，盘踞着一股邪恶势力。起初，外出打猎的猎人发现了一棵会走路的巨型古树，差不多和松树一般高，而且近来佛克瑞斯一带的野兽变得格外凶狠；我们损失了不少出色的猎人，还有些人就此失踪。

我派出了一队自家卫兵前去探查，却无一人归返。

走投无路之际，我雇了两名佣兵去侦查那片区域。他们回来时面色惨白、浑身发抖，都提到了一个红色的身影：身形高大，如同常人，身着黑袍，散发着令人憎恶的猩红气息。两人称，那身影一出现，他们的胸口就传来灼骨的疼痛。其中一人笃定，那东西就像是直接从湮灭荒原里钻出来的恶魔。

雪上加霜的是，佛克瑞斯本就处境艰难。盗匪在道路上滋扰生事，吸血鬼在城郊游荡窥探。我再也抽不出更多人手，这便是我向你求助的原因。

我担心这是魔人在作祟。若真是如此，还请你铲除这股黑暗势力，将它们打回湮灭领域！信使身上带着给你的酬金。

务必握紧兵刃，时刻保持警惕。

—— 佛克瑞斯领主

</font>

original: Leave the Bear's men in pieces! Make Coldharbour shudder at the trail of their blood you leave in your wake!
string: 把那只熊的手下撕成碎片！让冷港因你留下的血腥踪迹而颤抖！

string: 拜托，别让我染上什么要命的病

string: 恐怕我对幻术的了解不够，我教不了你什么新东西。

面纱束缚的高等精灵亡魂

string: 还有善良的龙？我想总归是有的吧。

string: 一把看似不起眼的武器，攻击时不会触发战斗。

original:
Contract Kill a Clan Mother Province: Elsweyr Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] At the heart of Khajiit society are the clan mothers who wield enormous influence over the Moon Sugar trade. Our client wishes to kill off the mother of a rival clan to increase the power of their own. Meet with the client and eliminate the Clan Mother. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名氏族母亲 省份： 艾斯维尔 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 在虎人社会的核心，宗族母亲掌握着对月亮糖贸易的巨大影响力。我们的雇主希望除掉敌对宗族的母亲，以提升自身宗族的势力。 与委托人接头，铲除氏族母亲. [pagebreak]

original: You're back! Exactly when the spirits told me you would, too.

string: 博瑟拉是唯一一个诺德人不敢招惹的边塞女人，他们需要她的药剂和仪式，这是理所当然的，我们可以信任她。

original: Solstheim also means "Sun's Home" in ancient Nord text - which is ironic, considering you barely see sunlight on this isle.
string: 在古诺德语中，索瑟海姆的意思是 “太阳之家”—— 这颇具讽刺意味，因为在这座岛上几乎看不到阳光。

string: 烈焰之墙
训练区（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: I arrived at the location shown on the map only to find Sildar dead, killed by a group of pirates. The chest containing the key has already been dug up and emptied. The contents, along with the key to Jolgeirr Barrow, are likely on their nearby ship. I should find a way to board the ship and locate the key.
string: 我按地图所示抵达目的地，却只发现希尔德已遇害，凶手是一群海盗。装着钥匙的箱子早已被挖出，里面空空如也。箱中物品，连同约基尔古坟的钥匙，很可能就在附近的海盗船上。我得想办法登上那艘船，找到钥匙。
好了，我们走吧。天际在等着我们。

original: Under the sun and moon, Outlander. Be well.
string: 外乡人，愿日月护佑你，安好顺遂。

original: That beacon is certainly interesting. I wonder what it's for... Whatever it is, let's get to it. Otherwise you're going to get shouted at again.
string: 这信标确实挺有意思的，我想知道它是干嘛用的…… 不管了，我们赶紧去办正事，不然你又要被吼了。
这片土地都起来反抗你了！

original: I think you need your wings to be clipped!
string: 我看你的翅膀该被剪剪了！

original: How can I serve you, my Listener?
string: 我能为你效劳吗，我的聆听者？

original: A rite of passage of sorts to become a gallant knight like my father.
string: 这算是一种成人礼，让我成为像父亲一样英勇的骑士。

original: Peer through the veil and gain sight in shadow and glimpse of life.
string: 穿透迷雾之纱，于暗影中视物，窥见生命微光。

original: Hmm... Okay. Let's hope this goes in our favor, then. What's the worst that can happen, after all?
string: 嗯…… 好吧。那希望这事能往好的方向发展。毕竟，最坏还能怎么样呢？

original: But mine, has ended, when the apostle died by our hands.
string: 但当使徒死于我们之手时，我的使命就结束了。

original: Give me a day. Such artistry cannot be rushed. Return tomorrow for your custom robe.
string: 给我一天时间。这般工艺可急不得，明天再来取你的定制长袍。

original: I found a note on the road next to some dead Vigilants of Stendarr. What appear to be their orders mentions a hidden sanctuary of Daedra worshippers that are planning to attack Markarth. I should stop them before they begin their assault on the city.
string: 我在路上发现了一张纸条，旁边躺着几个死去的斯坦达尔的警戒者。从看似是他们命令的内容来看，有一群魔族崇拜者藏在一处秘密圣所，正计划袭击马卡斯城。我得在他们发动进攻前阻止他们。

Contract Kill a Mercenary Province: High Rock Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] This sword-for-hire betrayed their employer after receiving a better offer, now the old employer wants to have them killed. Meet with the client and eliminate the Mercenary. [pagebreak]

original: You're my greatest friend. I hope this story never ends.
string: 你是我最好的朋友。真希望这个故事永远不会结束。

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

original: I'm not going to criticise you. There are plenty of people that Skyrim would be better off without. I just hope those are the people you target...
string: 我不会指责你的。天际确实有不少人，没了他们反而更好。我只希望你针对的是这些人……

original: It is time for Ulfric to deliver on his promises... Not that I'm certain of what they are. He wanted to liberate Skyrim, this we know but...
string: 现在是乌弗瑞克兑现承诺的时候了…… 虽然我不确定他的承诺是什么。我们只知道他想解放天际，但……

string: 落锤契约：杀死一位海盗船长（高风险）

string: 我倒是想帮你做这事，但她肯定会发现的。

string: 无论是谁偷走了尤根・风语者的号角，都与所有诺德人为敌了。

string: 兽人和边塞人都崇拜马拉卡斯，在逆境中求生，每隔几十年就会遭遇屠杀，我们简直就像表亲。

original: Oh, oh yes. I will wait patiently. If you can't find me, look for the biggest pile of books you can find...
string: 哦，好啊。我会耐心等的。要是你找不着我，就往最大的那堆书那儿看……

original: You're just as incredible. Moreso, even.
string: 你也一样了不起，甚至更甚。

original: Got some thinking to do, huh? No problem, I won't interrupt.
string: 要好好想想是吧？没问题，我不打扰你。

Blasted rain mixed with the cold... I'll be sick once this downpour stops.
string: 冰冷的雨水混在一起…… 这阵大雨停了，我怕是要生病。

string: 在冬堡学院寻找学生笔记

original:
Vampire Blood is a rare and powerful alchemical ingredient. The blood spoils easily when exposed to even the faintest light, making it difficult for alchemists to obtain. 
Be warned! Drinking Vampire Blood will infect you with the Vampire disease!
string:
吸血鬼之血是一种罕见且强大的炼金材料。即便暴露在最微弱的光线下，血液也极易变质，这使得炼金师们难以获取。
警告！饮用吸血鬼之血会让你染上吸血鬼疾病！

original: Do you think it's true? That you're Dragonborn?
string: 你觉得这是真的吗？你真的是龙裔？

original: My father worshipped Mara. Then my mother died. That put a stop to that!
string: 我父亲以前信奉玛拉，后来我母亲去世了，他就不信了！

original: What's the matter? The big strong Orc can't face an enemy by himself? Malacath must be so ashamed of his child.
string: 怎么了？高大强壮的兽人不敢独自面对敌人了？马拉卡斯肯定为他的孩子感到羞耻。

original: I'm fine thank you, are you alright?
Would the library be interested in buying them? (Sell books)
string: 图书馆有兴趣买下它们吗？（出售书籍）

string: 我要把你重新埋回土里！

original: Ocean Dragon is dead! Pick up your reward at the Winking Skeever.
string: 海洋之龙已死！在眨眼恶鼠酒馆领取奖励

original: It'll just be a job for me.
string: 对我来说这只是一份工作而已。

original: I thought the Cruel-Seas had abandoned sailing.
string: 我还以为 “狂海” 家族已经放弃航海了。
别再做你那股鱼腥味的蠢事了！

original: Step forward, and I�ll show you the meaning of regret.
string: 敢上前一步，我就让你知道后悔的滋味。

original: This cave... Apostle Renos would have loved it. It probably houses everything he needed for his research.
string: 这个洞穴…… 雷诺斯使徒一定会喜欢的。这里或许藏着他研究所需的一切。

original: The missing apostle was not in Nchardak. He has headed for Kagrumez to continue his research on mixing technologies from the Dwemer and the Clockwork City. Now, I should wait for the factotum to go back to the laboratory, before helping him again.
string: 失踪的使徒并不在钠查达克。他已前往卡古梅兹，继续研究融合锻莫与发条城的技术。现在，我得等构装体返回实验室后，再继续协助它。

original: They're good people. They did their best with me.
string: 他们都是好人，对我已经尽了全力。

original: (Khajiit) Khajiit will return with what has been discovered.
string: （虎人）虎人会把发现的东西带回来。

original: I'm a blacksmith. Well, I was... If you bring me the beast's pelt, I'll forge you some armor. The best you've ever seen. I've still got it in me.
string: 我是个铁匠。曾经是…… 如果你把那野兽的皮毛带来，我就为你打造一套盔甲，你见过的最好的那种。我还宝刀未老。

original: Like all organizations, the East Empire Company has its rats - like that Argonian thief.
string: 和所有组织一样，东帝国公司里也有内鬼 —— 就像那个亚龙人小偷。

original:
Contract Kill a Legate Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] Proving that merit is not the only way to advance one's career, an Imperial officer eager to climb the ranks has performed the Black Sacrament. He wishes us arrange an early retirement for his own Legate. Meet with the client and eliminate the Legate. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一位副官 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

string: 我很感激你的族人对发条城文化的兴趣，但我真不知道还有水族馆这种东西。

original: The Reachfolk have a long history of wars and alliances with the Orcs. Our relationship is as complex as it gets, I suppose.
string: 边塞人和兽人有着漫长的战争与结盟史，我想我们的关系就是这么复杂。

original: Oh great, we're back in Malacath's least favorite shithole. Let's not linger.
string: 哦，太好了，又回到马拉卡斯最讨厌的鬼地方了，我们别久留。

original: Black Marsh Contract: Kill a Tree Minder (Low-Risk)
string: 黑沼泽契约：杀死一位护树者（低风险）
雷诺斯使徒一定会感到骄傲的。

original: Conjure Ice Wraith
string: 召唤冰怨灵
任何地方…… 所有地方？我们去所有地方吧！

original:
Research Notes on Elemental Magic Reykja Frost-Born Withers Goldenspoon and Orminlur of Oradel with significant contribution from Yargul gra-Ragnast and Sherivah Sundered Adept class students at the College of Winterhold [pagebreak] Detailed within are our plans to catalogue and uncover three ancient books about Elemental Magic - each of the elements Fire, Frost and Storm. [pagebreak]

5th of I have had my very own quest to find the books of elemental magic since I was little - I see it as my magnum opus to complete, so I can understand my heritage. But here in the college it has dovetailed with the hopes and dreams of several of the other young students! Withers has a penchant for all things fire, Sherivah prefers illusion magic (although her crush on Drevis might play a part there), I channel frost spells easiest, Orminlur is unparalleled among us as a healer and Yargul only reluctantly studies anything but alteration. Sergius suggested we each make a unique outfit to complement our chosen path, as a good way to practice our enchanting skills. It was a great bonding experience and since then we have taken to calling our "gang" the Elementals. Now Urag has helped us to start the real test: to look for the scattered volumes of the books! My destiny is calling me.
string:
元素魔法研究笔记 霜生蕾克娅 威瑟斯・金匙 奥拉德尔的奥尔明卢尔 亦有亚古尔・格拉 - 拉格纳斯与谢里瓦・森德的重要贡献 冬堡学院进阶班学生 [pagebreak] 本文详细记录了我们的计划：整理并寻回三本关于元素魔法的古籍 —— 分别对应火焰、寒霜与风暴三系元素。 [pagebreak]

5日 自儿时起，我便立下追寻元素魔法典籍的目标 —— 我将此视作毕生要完成的杰作，唯有如此，方能读懂自身的血脉传承。而在学院中，这份心愿竟与其他几位年轻学子的梦想不谋而合！ 威瑟斯痴迷于一切与火焰相关的事物，谢里瓦偏爱幻术（不过她对德雷维斯的爱慕或许是其中缘由），我最擅长引导寒霜法术，奥尔明卢尔是我们之中医术无人能及的医者，亚古尔则对除变化系外的所有法术都提不起兴致，学习时满心不情愿。 瑟吉尔斯建议我们各自制作一套契合自身所选法术流派的独特服饰，以此锻炼附魔技艺。这成了一次绝佳的团队凝聚经历，自那以后，我们便将自己的 “小团体” 称作 “元素者”。如今，乌拉格已帮我们开启了真正的考验：寻找散落各地的典籍卷册！ 我的命运在召唤我……

original: I'm... speechless. This is truly a wonderful gift.
string: 我…… 无话可说。这真是份绝佳的礼物。

original: A Dunmer? Houseborn or Ashlander? It doesn't matter... What brings you to the Reach, Velothi?
string: 暗精灵？家族出身还是灰烬民？都无所谓…… 维洛斯的后裔，你到边塞来干什么？

original: Oh! Sorry for being in the way.
The Father of Torment is a troublemaker, "he-who-schemes-in-shadow".
string: 折磨之父是个麻烦制造者，是 “在阴影中搞阴谋的家伙”。

original: Ha! Best I can do is a spell to smoothen your ride. Dragonscales don't make comfortable saddles, I imagine.
string: 哈！我顶多能施个法术让你坐得舒服点。我猜龙鳞做鞍可不会太舒服。

original: As you touch the barrel, you feel the documents you gathered vanish.
string: 当你触碰到木桶时，手中收集的文件竟凭空消失了。

original: So, my question is - why the Empire?
string: 所以我的问题是 —— 为什么选帝国？
黑沼泽契约 | 中等风险

original: Come on, we need to get a move on.
Destruction spells last <mag>% less longer for <dur> seconds.
string: 毁灭系法术持续时间缩短<mag>%，效果持续<dur>秒

original: Is there anywhere in particular you would like to see?
string: 有没有什么地方是你特别想去看看的？

original: You're with the Stormcloaks? Those murderous bastards?! No. I won't help that monster brutalize the Reach. Not again!
string: 你加入风暴斗篷了？那群杀人不眨眼的混蛋？不。我不会帮那个魔头蹂躏边塞的。绝不！

original: What do you suggest we do?
The cooling systems have been restored, now all that's left is to power up the Tonal Focus using the power conduit near the forge.
string: 冷却系统已修复，现在只剩利用熔炉旁的能量管道为调谐聚焦器充能了。

original: Traps will be rife in a place like this. Not that I'm sure what they're protecting... The place is beyond repair.
string: 这种地方肯定到处是陷阱，虽然我都不知道它们在保护什么…… 这地方都烂得没法修了。

original: Yes, I meant everything I said.
string: 是，我说的每句话都是真心的。

original: By our honor. How could she?
string: 以荣誉之名。她怎么能这么做？

original: Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original: What were you doing with a goat? Never mind, I don't want to know.
string: 你拿着一只山羊干什么？算了，我不想知道。

original: I guess it's up to me to keep Karthwasten's story for this age. I hope it'll end up to be a good one...
string: 看来该由我来记录这个时代的西卡斯镇故事了，希望结局会是美好的。

original: That's nice to hear. Being with you, I've realised I'm much more of a lollygagger than I ever thought.
string: 听到你这么说真好。和你在一起后，我发现自己比想象中更爱闲逛。

original: I aim to understand their construction, their enchantments. To create something... unique.
string: 我想弄明白它们的构造和附魔方式，创造出独一无二的作品。

original: Watch out for their sharp sticks!
Does the air feel heavy here? And is that a lullaby I'm hearing? No, just me? Alright...
string: 你觉得这里的空气很沉重吗？我好像听到了摇篮曲？没有吗？只有我听到？好吧……

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade uncovered a shocking secret: Madanach, the Forsworn king, is alive and is a puppet of the Silver-Blood family of Markarth. He points the Forsworn at the Silver-Bloods enemies, stirring rebellion that hurts Tamriel's peace and endangers those in his way.

Next time you are in Markarth, I would appreciate if you confirmed the reports, and end both threats if you could, the Forsworn and Silver-Bloods both.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃揭露了一个令人震惊的秘密：弃誓者之王迈德纳奇尚在人世，且已成了马卡斯城银血家族的傀儡。他驱使弃誓者针对银血家族的仇敌发起攻击，煽动的叛乱不仅破坏了泰姆瑞尔的和平，更将所有挡路者置于险境。
待你下次前往马卡斯城，烦请核实这些情报；若有可能，还请将弃誓者与银血家族这两股威胁一并铲除。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Then we better deliver the result as befit the reward. And for Maro's sake, he had better give us enough gold for all this trouble.
string: 那我们可得拿出配得上这份报酬的成果。看在马罗的份上，他最好给我们足够的金子，弥补这些麻烦。

original: Another Nord mage. What a treat this is. Let's do what we can to help.
string: 又一个诺德法师，可真有意思。我们尽力帮帮他吧。

original: And? How many countless others have done the same? Hmm?
string: 那又怎样？有多少人做了同样的事？嗯？
高岩契约 | 极高风险

original: Yes? How can I be of help to you?
string: 怎么了？我能为你做些什么？

original: They call this "Kynesgrove"? Where are the Spriggans, the spirits, and the winds' songs? This ain't even a grove!
string: 他们叫这里 “凯娜之林”？树精、灵体、风的歌声在哪？这根本算不上林子！

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Necromancer (Medium-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位死灵法师（中等风险）

original: Serpent's Bluff? Is that a Nord name? This used to be Bear-Heart territory, and before that Rageclaw. Bear-tamers, both of them. Watch yourself.
string: 蛇崖？这是诺德人的名字吧？这里曾是熊心氏族的地盘，更早之前是怒爪氏族的，两个氏族都是驯熊者，你小心点。

original: I want to see my enemy's eyes when he dies, not his back.
string: 我想看着敌人死时的眼神，而不是他的背影。

original: To get to the point, I wanted to say thank you. You don't tell me how to behave or what to do. You don't try to protect me from danger.
string: 言归正传，我想谢谢你。你不会对我指手画脚，不会试图把我护在温室里。

original: Conjure Dremora Kynreeve
string: 召唤魔人士官

original: The staff of the Apostle Renos. Its energy seems to resonate inside the crystal. It could be used to open doors, but only if they are powered by crystals.
string: 这是使徒雷诺斯的法杖，其能量似乎会在水晶内部产生共鸣。它可用于开启大门，但仅限由水晶供能的门。

original: Spray fungal spores to reanimate up to <3> corpses to fight for you for permanently. The spores weaken you, lowering your health by <50> points while at least <1> corpse is reanimated.
string: 喷射真菌孢子，可复活最多 <3> 具尸体为你而战，且永久效命。孢子会对你造成虚弱效果，只要至少有 < 1 > 具尸体被复活，你的生命值就会降低 < 50 > 点

original: For many years, this one was master of the Corinthe Sanctuary. Until Alisanne in her foolishness cast me out.
string: 多年来，我一直是科林瑟圣所的主事人。直到爱丽珊妮因为她的愚蠢，把我驱逐了出去。

original: That won't be the last we see of that little man. I just hope the next time isn't looming over us one night...
string: 我们肯定还会再见到那个小个子，只希望下次别是某天夜里他突然出现在我们头顶……

original: I say we offer no mercy.
The Bear falls today! For the Reach!
string: 那只 “熊” 今日必倒！为了边塞！

original: Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original: Sorry, I don't know where I was going with that. I think it was going to end in a compliment of some kind.
string: 抱歉，我都不知道自己想说什么了。我想最后大概是想夸夸这儿吧。

original: He inherited the family business from his grandfather. He brought it back from the edge. I don't expect anyone else in the family could have done so.
string: 家族生意是他从祖父手里继承的，是他把家族从破产边缘拉了回来。我觉得家族里没人能做到他这一步。

original: I should tell you to piss off and that I don't believe you. I should walk away and never see you again.
string: 我本应该让你滚，说我不信你，然后转身走掉再也不见你。

original: Conjure Snowy Sabre Cat Thrall
string: 召唤雪地剑齿虎奴仆

original: They wield forbidden spells like toys. Power without morals is what makes them truly dangerous.
string: 他们把禁术当玩具耍。毫无道德的力量，才是他们真正可怕的地方。

original: My orders were for us to remain hidden until the Last Seed of the year 201 of the Fourth Era.
string: 我的指令是，一直隐匿到第四纪元 201 年的末种月，再行动身。

original: You have not claimed any sanctuaries yet.
string: 你目前尚未宣占任何圣所。

original: We have waited *so* long for this moment.
string: 我们为这一刻等待了太久。

original: Oh, that doesn't sound too bad actually. Not quite sure why kindly old monks would kidnap you, but I'm sure they had their reasons.
string: 哦，听起来好像也没那么糟。就是搞不懂和善的老僧侣们为什么要绑架你，不过他们肯定有自己的理由。

original: How many of these things did they make!?
string: 他们造了多少这玩意儿？！

original: Over the centuries, I have seen Speakers come and go, Listeners rise and fall, and yet I remain.
string: 几个世纪以来，我见证了一任任发言人更替，聆听者兴衰沉浮，而我始终屹立不倒。

original: Summons a Venomfang Skeever Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只毒牙恶鼠魔宠，持续<dur>秒

original: Elsweyr Contract: Kill an Anequina Warlord (Very High-Risk)
string: 艾斯维尔契约：杀死一位阿纳奎那军阀（极高风险）

original: Weapons do <mag>% more damage for <5> minutes.
Increases Frost Resistance by <50>% and Frost spell damage by <25>%.
string: 寒霜抗性提高<50>%，寒霜魔法伤害提高<25>%。

original: The apostle is gone. He went to Kagrumez.
string: 那位使徒已经走了，他去了卡古梅兹。

original: No true Reachfolk would treat a Vateshran like this. (Reachman)
string: 真正的边塞人绝不会这样对待一位瓦特什兰。（边塞人视角）

original: This was quite a secret from those Greybeards. What do you think of their dragon master?
string: 灰胡子们居然藏着这么大的秘密。你觉得他们的龙主人怎么样？
召唤狼人

original: Farm work certainly seems to be hard work. I'm not sure my back is strong enough for all the manual labour.
string: 农活看着就累，我的背恐怕撑不住这么多体力活。

original: Kait, I have a gift for you.
string: 凯特，我有件礼物要送给你。

original: I'm behaving the only way I know how.
string: 我只会以我熟悉的方式行事。

original: Keep an eye out for the guards. I'd bet my fortune that they're on the payroll of someone besides the Jarl.
string: 小心守卫，我敢用我的财产打赌，他们肯定收了除领主之外其他人的钱。

original: How would it look if our most prestigious clientele turned up dead after their contracts?
string: 要是我们最尊贵的客户在契约完成后都横遭不测，那成何体统？

original: I successfully delivered Aunt Gormli's forgery to her nephew, and sent him off to war.
string: 我成功把戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书交给了她的侄子，把他送去参军了。

original: You create twice as many potions and poisons.
string: 你炼制的药剂和毒药数量翻倍。

original: Summons an Iron Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把铁制誓约之刃，持续 8 小时
成员居所（从金库支出 2500 金币）

original: Top Half of the Staff of Mental Disturbance
string: 心智扰乱法杖的上半段

original: It's as if I barely know you anymore.
string: 我感觉我几乎不认识你了。

original: See through shadow and light and sense the pulse of your foes.
string: 穿透暗影与光明，感知敌人的生命脉动。

original: Being a factotum makes life easier. I do not feel hunger, or fatigue. I wonder how it feels.
string: 作为一台构装体，生活简单多了。我不会饿，也不会累。真想知道那是什么感觉。

original: It's not my business what he does with his time, or that huge house of his.
string: 他怎么打发时间，还有他那栋大房子，都跟我没关系。
天际契约 | 中等风险

original: I command you to accompany me.
string: 我命令你与我结伴同行。

original: The Shadefeather Clan has been at Hag Rock for as long as I can remember. Vicious, feuding hags and their playthings - now just squabbling Forsworn.
string: 影羽氏族在巫女岩盘踞了很久，我记事起就有她们。凶残好斗的女巫和她们的爪牙，如今不过是内讧的弃誓者罢了。

original: I'm planning to stay out of the Civil War for now.
string: 我打算暂时不参与内战。

original:
Contract Kill a Khajiit Monk Province: Elsweyr Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] Although they do not carry weapons, Khajiit Monks are never truly unarmed. Many of them are masters of the Whispering Fang style and practice martial arts as a form of spiritual exercise. It's anybody's guess why someone would perform a Black Sacrament on one of these monks, but that is not our concern. Meet with the client and eliminate the Khajiit Monk. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名虎人僧侣 省份： 艾斯维尔 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 尽管虎人僧侣从不携带武器，却并非真正意义上的手无寸铁。他们中不少人是“啸牙拳”武学的宗师，还将修习武术作为一种精神修行的方式。没人知道究竟是谁会对这样的僧侣举行黑暗祭礼，但这并非我们要操心的事。 与委托人接头，铲除虎人僧侣. [pagebreak]

original: In the old days, the Black Hand was the Dark Brotherhood's ruling council.
string: 在过去，黑手是黑暗兄弟会的统治议会。
聆听者居所（从金库支出 5000 金币）

original: Huh... Okay. You carry on then, my aloof friend.
string: 哈…… 好吧，那你继续吧，我高冷的朋友。

original: I have recived my orders from Sentinel. I must find out who has contacted the witch Anise.
string: 我接到了守望者的指令，必须查明是谁联络了女巫安尼斯。

original: You have spoken to me in that way a few times now and I just can't help but wonder...
string: 你已经跟我说过好几次了，我忍不住会想……

original: I would rather climb the 7000 steps than listen to Esbern lecture us about Alduin's Wall again.
string: 我宁愿再爬一次七千级台阶，也不想听艾斯本再给我们讲奥杜因之墙的事了。

original: I'll leave your body to the wolves!
string: 我要把你的尸体留给狼群！

original: You are not permitted in this current area!
If only I were more adept with flame spells.
string: 要是我更擅长火焰法术就好了。

original: I'd like to bet on the frost combatant.
I understand it must be... hard for you to adjust to the fact of your memory loss, but I'm ready to help you recover our past. If you want.
string: 我知道你失忆了，肯定很难接受，但如果你愿意，我随时准备帮你找回我们的过往。

original: Even without all the theft, Riften wouldn't be a pleasant place.
string: 就算没有那么多盗窃事件，裂谷城也算不上个宜人的地方。

original: At least the Daedra give their followers boons somehow. This "Void Father" you follow tasks you to kill and leaves you only emptiness.
string: 至少魔族还会给追随者一些恩惠。你追随的这个 “虚空之父” 只让你杀人，留给你的只有空虚。

original: We all like to tell ourselves what we want to believe.
string: 我们都喜欢骗自己去相信那些我们愿意相信的事。

original: Did you know it was Molag Bal down here?
string: 你知道下面的是莫拉格・巴尔吗？

original: As promised, a beautiful set of heavy armor made from that evil beast's hide. I hope it doesn't corrupt you, my friend.
string: 说话算话，这是用那只凶兽的皮毛做的精美重型盔甲。希望它不会侵蚀你，朋友。

original: The leader of the Deephowl Hollow vampire clan has discovered a sinister new form of necromancy. I've encountered one of his revenant creations and managed to destroy it. If this clan manages to create an army of revenants, they could become a serious threat to the people of Skyrim. The passage to the deepest parts of Deephowl Hollow is locked; I have to find the keys!
string: 深嚎山谷吸血鬼氏族的首领发现了一种邪恶的新型亡灵魔法。我遭遇了他创造的一具亡魂，并成功将其摧毁。倘若这个氏族造出一支亡魂大军，他们将成为天际民众的巨大威胁。通往深嚎山谷最深处的通道被锁住了，我必须找到钥匙！

original: But other times, the machines were afraid of their new bodies and went mad.
string: 但有时候，机器会对自己的新身体感到恐惧，最终陷入疯狂。

original: (sigh) At last... It's over. No more nightmares... He's gone. Thank you. I... I need some fresh air.
string: （叹气）终于…… 结束了，再也没有噩梦了…… 他死了。谢谢你。我…… 我需要点新鲜空气。

original: The world shines brighter when the sun graces it.
string: 阳光照耀时，世界都显得更明亮了。

original: The Jarl's palace is beautiful. My father would be jealous. It rivals our estate back home.
string: 领主的宫殿太美了，我父亲肯定会嫉妒，都能和我们家的领地媲美了。

original: Here, take this amplifier. It should make you more resistant to damage.
string: 拿着，这是增幅器。它能让你更抗打。

original: He found me after Alisanne's death, and made me an offer I could not refuse.
string: 爱丽珊妮死后，他找到了我，给了我一个无法拒绝的提议。

original: Choose a sanctuary family to command.
How deep do you think we are? Better yet, where below Skyrim are we? I have no idea.
string: 你觉得我们现在有多深了？更离谱的是，我们到了天际地下的什么地方？我完全没头绪。

original: Back to the mushrooms! I still want to know how to grow my own little town like this, it would make living in the Reach much more fun.
string: 又回到蘑菇堆里了！我还想知道怎么建一座这样的小村子，要是能成，在边塞生活就有趣多了。
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 低风险

original: An Imperial? What business do you have here? Here to claim this land for your crumbling legions?
string: 帝国人？你到这儿来干什么？来为你摇摇欲坠的军团占领这片土地吗？

original: When you said all those lovely things to me, I see now that was just to lure me in. Then once you had me, you stopped caring about me altogether.
string: 当初你对我说的那些甜言蜜语，我现在才明白，只是为了把我骗到手。一旦得到我，你就完全不在乎我了。

original: I hope you're enjoying my company as much as I'm enjoying yours.
string: 希望你和我相处时，能像我和你相处一样开心。

original: These cycles of death and rebirth are natural to the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 这种死亡与重生的循环，对黑暗兄弟会而言是再自然不过的事。

original: When I reconnected myself to the network, I have received confusing information about the City.
string: 当我重新连接网络时，收到了关于发条城的混乱信息。

original: All spells cost <15>% less to cast, and magicka regenerates <100>% faster.
string: 所有法术消耗减少<15>%，法力恢复速度加快<100>%。

original: Congratulations, Companion! Hircine will be proud of us!
string: 恭喜你，成为战友团一员！海尔辛会为我们骄傲的！

original: Negatives, nobody likes werewolves. So, I suppose you just need to balance those things and decide on your answer.
string: 坏处就是，没人喜欢狼人。所以，我想你得权衡一下再做决定。

original: This place is nice, but I have the most beautiful view in front of me.
string: 这地方很美，但我眼前有更美的风景。

original: All of us were willing to die that day. I just happened to survive.
string: 那天，我们所有人都做好了赴死的准备，只是我恰巧活了下来而已。

original: I hope that you are jesting. If you are not, I urge you to reconsider. You should fight for what you believe in, not just for the sake of fighting.
string: 希望你是在开玩笑。如果你不是，我劝你再考虑考虑。你应该为信仰而战，而不是为了战斗而战斗。

original: Besides, what's not to love about the shiny armor and people who adore you?
string: 再说了，闪亮的盔甲和崇拜你的人们，还有什么不招人喜欢的呢？

original: Search the ruins of Raldbthar for the next Lexicon stand
string: 探索拉德巴尔遗迹，寻找下一个方典基座

original: Spell Tome: Conjure 2 Wrathman + Frost Rune
string: 法术书: 召唤2个狂暴亡灵 + 寒霜符文

original: Listen - the Huntmaster gave us a sacred task, so let's go fulfill it. A reeker like Sinding should've died long ago, anyway.
string: 听着 —— 狩猎大师交给了我们一项神圣的任务，我们这就去完成它。像辛丁这样的蠢货，早就该死了。

original: I will oversee the Solitude Sanctuary. The others will take Markarth, Whiterun, and Windhelm.
string: 我会负责监督独孤城圣所的修复工作，其他人分别接手马卡斯、白漫和风舵城的圣所。

original: 7th of Evening Star, 4E 198 It has been an unusually rough winter this year. All of Solitude is buried in snow, and no one seems to care that we beggers have been left outside to freeze. The chill on the wind doesn't bother the local Nords as much, but for a Nibanese Imperial like me it might as well be a death sentence. Luckily I found shelter inside this abandoned well. All the guards warned me not to come down here, said it was cursed or something, but I haven't seen any curses. The air is warm, the water is clean, and the guards are too superstitious to come down and force me out. Honestly, I think they just wanted me to stay outside and die, but I'm not going to give them the satisfaction. My life is just getting started!
string: 第四纪元 198 年，夜星月 7 日 今年的冬天异常严酷。独孤城全境都被大雪掩埋，似乎没人在乎我们这些乞丐被丢在外面挨冻。寒风的刺骨对本地诺德人来说不算什么，但对我这样一个来自尼本的帝国人而言，这几乎等同于死刑。幸运的是，我在这口废弃的井里找到了容身之处。卫兵们都警告我别下来，说这里被诅咒了之类的，但我压根没见到什么诅咒。这里空气温暖，水质清澈，而卫兵们又迷信得不敢下来把我赶走。说实话，我觉得他们就是想让我冻死在外面，可我偏不让他们称心如意。我的人生才刚刚开始呢！

original: This place... I can hardly believe somewhere like this exists in Skyrim. If it weren't for the local... Wildlife... This would be a dream.
string: 这地方…… 我简直不敢相信天际有这样的地方，要是没有本地的 “野生动物”，这儿就是天堂了。

original: The Thieves Guild... I do not comprehend the need for its existence. Is collecting gold a hobby for men and mer?
string: 盗贼公会…… 我无法理解它存在的必要性。收集金币是人类和精灵的爱好吗？

original: Use your bow or crossbow! Set yourself as an arbalest, please.
string: 用弓或十字弓！请把自己设定为弩手。

original: What would this city be without me? A cold rock with ants as its champions, that's what.
string: 要是没有我，这座城市会变成什么样？不过是块冰冷的石头，由一群蚂蚁般的家伙守护着，仅此而已。

original: Aren't these mushroom houses quaint? Such a shame that they're inhabited by a bitter little man.
string: 这些蘑菇房子是不是很别致？可惜里面住着个脾气古怪的小老头。

original: Travel to Nchardak on the isle of Solstheim
string: 前往索瑟海姆岛的钠查达克

original: Can you tell me about the Reachfolk?
string: 你能跟我说说边塞人吗？

original: It seems his research has advanced. He seems to be trying to exchange personalities between two factotums.
string: 看来他的研究有了进展。他似乎在尝试在两个构装体之间交换人格。

original: Keep an eye out for traps. Oh, and if you see one, don't keep it to yourself, okay?
string: 小心陷阱，哦，要是看到了，别自己憋着，好吗？

original: Quick, find some water to hide in!
Oh. Sure, I guess. Who do you want to know about?
string: 哦。当然，行吧。你想了解谁？

original:
[pagebreak]<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
It's been a year since we came to Skyrim. At first, it was just me and my children, Jesper and Zossa. We were three vampires in hiding. But we had a vision...

We came here believing that the turmoil in Skyrim could be used to our advantage. A new age for vampires to step out of the shadows and lay claim to a part of this world for ourselves! A world so broken, it was waiting for us to claim a piece!
[pagebreak]
So we called out to our kin, silently and discreetly, and some of them came and answered. They were lost souls, too, and we gave them a home.
We settled our new clan here, on the edge of this frozen world. It's remote and hidden, and a perfect place to plan our next steps. Everything was starting to make sense. 
[pagebreak]
It was Zossa who first suggested reaching out to the Lords and their clans. Because only a united front of vampires could take the land of Skyrim to war. So I reached out to the mighty and the secretive, but they let me down, one by one...

Lord Harkon, practically my neighbor, shares my views but would have nothing to do with me. He insulted me to my face and called me weak and impure.
The Cronvangr and Quarra clans reacted much the same, while the wise and terrible Movarth did not even bother with any form of reply.
I've reached out to all the clans that I could find, but they all seem content staying quiet and doing their deeds in the shadows!
[pagebreak]
So is that it? Does the dream end before it has begun, just because my kin is too cowardly? A whole land for the taking, but none will act on this opportunity?
</Font>
string:
[pagebreak]<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
我们来到天际已经一年了。起初，只有我和我的孩子们 —— 杰斯珀与佐萨，三个东躲西藏的吸血鬼。但我们心中有一个愿景……

我们来到这里，是相信天际的动荡能为我们所用。这是吸血鬼走出阴影、在这世间为自己谋得一席之地的新时代！这个支离破碎的世界，正等着我们去分一杯羹！
[pagebreak]
于是，我们悄悄向同族发出了无声的召唤，一些人响应而来。他们也都是迷失的灵魂，而我们为他们提供了一个家。

我们在这片冰封世界的边缘，安顿了这个新的部族。这里偏僻又隐蔽，是规划下一步行动的绝佳之地。一切都开始步入正轨。
[pagebreak]
是佐萨最先提议联络各位领主及其部族的。因为只有吸血鬼结成统一战线，才能向天际的土地宣战。于是我向那些权势滔天又行踪诡秘的领主伸出了橄榄枝，可他们却一个个令我失望……

哈孔大君，几乎算是我的邻居，虽然与我理念相通，却不愿与我有任何往来。他当面羞辱我，骂我软弱又不纯。

克隆万格部族和夸拉部族的反应如出一辙，而睿智又可怖的莫瓦斯，甚至连一句回复都懒得给。

我联系了所有能找到的部族，可他们似乎都满足于在暗中蛰伏、行事！
[pagebreak]
难道就这样了吗？就因为同族太过怯懦，这个梦想还没开始就要结束？整片土地唾手可得，却没人愿意抓住这个机会？
</Font>

original: Sure thing! Where are we going?
The Dwemers were great architects. I understand apostle Renos' interest for their craft, but was it worth it getting expelled from the City?
string: 锻莫是伟大的建筑师。我理解雷诺斯使徒对他们工艺的兴趣，但为此被逐出城市，值得吗？

original: Summons a Chaurus Death Hound for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只巢蚁死亡猎犬，持续<dur>秒

original: We had better get out of this tomb before we get stuck in here forever. Oooh, spooky.
string: 我们最好赶紧离开这座坟墓，不然就要永远困在这儿了。哦，好可怕。

original: The more time I spend in Skyrim, the stranger it seems to get...
string: 我在天际待得越久，就觉得这儿越奇怪……

original: If that got more people like us to join them, who am I to say that wasn't a win!
string: 如果这能让更多像我们一样的人加入他们，那对我来说就是胜利！

original: We'll make sure to find someone... suitable... for our line of work.
string: 我们一定会为我们这行找个…… 合适的人来。
面纱束缚的高等精灵领袖

original: Ah. I'm... speechless, but such is the way of things, I suppose. Either way, I'm grateful that you found my mother's last gift. I won't forget it.
string: 啊。我…… 一时语塞，但或许世事本就如此吧。不管怎样，很感激你找回了母亲最后的礼物。我不会忘记的。

original: As Vateshran, I live for stories. You braved a Forsworn stronghold and lived... If there's any story worth telling, it's yours, for sure.
string: 作为瓦特什兰，我为故事而生。你勇闯弃誓者的要塞还活了下来…… 如果说有什么故事值得讲述，那一定是你的。

original: I'm really glad to have you with me.
string: 有你在身边，我真的很开心。

original: Back to her lone, lorn cottage...
string: 回到她那孤零零、冷清清的小屋去……

original: So, this Lexicon business... The right thing to do would be to help, of course. But delving into a dangerous ruin is not my idea of a good time.
string: 那么，关于这本典籍…… 当然，帮忙是应该的，但深入危险的遗迹可不是我心目中的乐事。

original: I always have time for you.
Please refrain from bumping into me.
Check notice board! Find out information.
So, I realised that I've been yammering on about myself, yet I haven't really asked you much about yourself.
string: 我发现自己一直喋喋不休说自己的事，却没怎么问过你。
瞧瞧我们，还手下留情了呢。

original: Wakey wakey, time to head out!
What do you think of Morthal?
Let's see if I have something useful in my bag.
string: 我看看包里有没有什么能用的。

original: Mage, warrior, thief. Well, I know which one I'd choose.
string: 法师、战士、盗贼，嗯，我知道我会选哪个。

original: A lonely inn beside a snowy road, huh? Sounds like the perfect setting for my favorite kind of story.
string: 一条积雪的路边，孤零零的酒馆，哈，这简直是我最爱写的故事场景。

original: I'm sorry, I need to stay loyal to my spouse.
string: 抱歉，我得对我的配偶忠诚。

original: Morrowind Contract: Kill a Sadras Noble (High-Risk)
string: 晨风契约：杀死一位萨德拉斯贵族（高风险）

original: The world is full of whispers and little spirits. I wish I could help others hear them, but since I can't - I just tell their stories.
string: 这个世界充满了低语和小小的灵体，我希望能帮其他人也听到它们，但既然做不到，我就讲述它们的故事。

original: Okay, fine. Murder is the answer. Go ahead.
string: 好吧，行，杀人就是答案，你动手吧。

original: I'm glad you didn't drown and die too.
The others... they just didn't see it the same way. The cowards. So I had no choice but to run.
string: 其他人…… 他们可不这么想。一群懦夫。所以我别无选择，只能逃走。

original: By the dead stones, she is LOUD. Yes, I could hear her too. She wasn't exactly using her inside-voice, you see...
string: 以死寂之石之名，她吵死了。对，我也听到了，她根本就没小声说话，你懂的……

original: Your first meeting with the Arch-Mage. I hope you aren't nervous, because I am. Well, just a little anyway.
string: 你第一次见大法师呢，希望你别紧张，反正我是有点紧张了。好吧，就一点点。
演说者居所（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: Conjure Giant Mudcrab
string: 召唤巨型泥沼蟹

original: So... It's done? Alduin is gone?
string: 这么说…… 结束了？奥杜因被消灭了？

original: Nope. Don't know you. Go away.

<font face="$HandwrittenFont">

Dragonborn,

Your actions have not gone unnoticed. The dark forces that once haunted the woods and shadowed the roads have been driven back by your hand.

Thanks to your bravery, hunters may once again roam the forests without fear, and the people of Falkreath can travel the roads knowing safety has been restored.

You have done more than slay monsters.. youve given this hold peace.

You have our gratitude.

- Jarl of Falkreath
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">

龙裔亲启：

你的功绩，我们有目共睹。那些曾盘踞林间、肆虐道路的黑暗势力，已被你亲手击退。

幸得你的英勇，猎人们得以重拾勇气，自在穿行于森林之中；佛克瑞斯的子民也能安心踏上旅途，只因安宁已重回这片土地。

你所做的，远不止斩杀魔物…… 你为我的领地带来了和平。

我们对你感激不尽。

—— 佛克瑞斯领主

original: So, you're a fully fledged member of the Companions. I've never been one for weapons. Maybe I'll learn something.
string: 这么说，你成了战友团的正式成员了。我从来都不擅长用武器，或许我能学点东西。

original: I'm sorry about what happened to you, Kait. Let's get you out of here.
string: 凯特，你的遭遇太让人难过了，我这就带你出去。

original: I never had the chance to visit Raven Rock, Apostle Renos told us to steer clear of the towns to avoid troubles.
string: 我从没机会去过鸦石镇，雷诺斯使徒让我们远离城镇，以免惹上麻烦。

original: Ach, what was that magic? It was like time looped, or cracked. Was that your work, or the old professor's?
string: 唉，那是什么魔法？感觉时间都循环了，或者裂开了。是你搞的，还是那个老教授？

original: Do you know why he still seemed to be suffering, even though he was a machine?
string: 他都变成机器了，为什么看起来还在承受痛苦？

original: No need to be so hostile, I am just a Factotum after all.
string: 没必要这么充满敌意，我毕竟只是个构装体。

original: Make sure the apprentice just dies
string: 务必让那名学徒彻底丧命

original: The last power is the Listener's Wrath. To use it, you will need to promote at least one family member to the rank of Silencer.
string: 最后一项能力是聆听者之怒。要使用它，你需要将至少一位家族成员晋升为沉默者。

original: You fight like a bristleback falling down a mountain!
string: 你这打法，跟鬃背野猪滚下山丘没两样！

original: You joined those vampires, huh? Well, I get it. The gifts of Molag Bal are difficult to refuse... But just steer clear of my neck.
string: 你加入那些吸血鬼了？好吧，我能理解，莫拉格・巴尔的馈赠确实难以拒绝…… 但别打我的脖子的主意。

original: But if he does ask questions, just don't say anything. You're a courier, for the pride of Talos. Just give it over and go! Now go!
string: 但如果他真的问起来，你什么都别说。为了塔洛斯的荣耀，你就是个送信的。把信给他就走！现在快去！

original: If you wish for additional armor sets you can purchase them from me.
string: 如果你想要其他盔甲套装，可以从我这里购买。

original: Azura is a dunmer spirit, right? Mysteries, fate, moons and the like? Seems more straightforward to me to worship the Queen of Shadows...
string: 阿祖拉是暗精灵的灵体，对吧？管着神秘、命运、月亮之类的？在我看来，崇拜影之女王要简单多了。

original: It's tragic how the Empire allowed Maven Black-Briar to become Jarl. I can only hope the General is plotting to uproot her.
string: 帝国竟让玛雯・黑荆棘当上了领主，真是可悲。我只希望将军在密谋把她赶下台。

original: We have brought you two powerful spell books, taken from the Night Mother's own crypt in Bravil before it was destroyed.
string: 我们为你带来了两本威力强大的法术书，它们是在布拉维尔的夜母墓穴被毁前，从那里取出来的。

original: You want to speak now? Are you certain?
string: 你现在要说话？你确定吗？

original: And I thought Delphine was paranoid.
string: 我还以为德尔菲娜已经够偏执了。

original: What do you think of Riverwood?

string: 或许我从来就没认识过你。

original: Now it is time for the Empire to unite with Skyrim and show Tamriel that it has Skyrim's best interests at heart.
string: 现在，是帝国和天际团结起来，向泰姆瑞尔展示它心系天际的时候了。

original: Excellent. I guess this means I owe you a favor in return.
string: 很好。这么说，我也该回你个人情了。

original: Can't say I've ever seen a staff like that before. Watch out for it's thorns.
string: 我从没见过这样的法杖，小心上面的刺。

original: Yes. I still remember the avalanche and snowstorms when we lost each other... They surely were doing all they could to turn us away.
string: 嗯，我还记得我们失散时的雪崩和暴风雪…… 它们肯定拼尽全力想把我们分开。

original: All enchantments made by vampires are 10% stronger.
string: 吸血鬼施加的所有附魔效果都会增强 10%。

original: It doesn't mean I feel any less for you. I just... The pomp and ceremony... That part of my life is behind me.
string: 这并不代表我对你的感情变少了，只是…… 那些繁文缛节…… 我人生的那部分已经过去了。

original: Vex seems like she could sass the tusks off a bristleboar. Don't let her push you around.
string: 薇珂丝那丫头嘴皮子厉害得能把野猪的獠牙都怼掉，别让她欺负你。

original:
[pagebreak]

Fall of the Snow Prince

[pagebreak]

An account of the Battle of the Moesring as transcribed by Lokheim, chronicler to the chieftain Ingjaldr White-Eye rom whence he came we did not know, but into the battle he rode, on a brilliant steed of pallid white. Elf we called him, for Elf he was, yet unlike any other of his kind we had ever seen before that day. His spear and armor bore the radiant and terrible glow of unknown magicka, and so adorned this unknown rider seemed more wight than warrior. What troubled, nay, frightened us most at that moment was the call that rose from the Elven ranks. It was not fear, not wonder, but an unabashed and unbridled joy, the kind of felicity felt by a damned man who has been granted a second chance at life. For at that time the Elves were as damned and near death as ever they had been during the great skirmishes of Solstheim. The Battle of the Moesring was to be the final stand between Nord and Elf on our fair island. Led by Ysgramor, we had driven the Elven scourge from Skyrim, and were intent on cleansing Solstheim of their kind as well. Our warriors, armed with the finest axes and swords Nord craftsmen could forge, cut great swaths through the enemy ranks. The slopes of the Moesring ran red with Elf blood. Why, then, would our foe rejoice? Could one rider bring such hope to an army so hopeless? To most of our kind, the meaning of the call was clear, but the words were but a litany of Elven chants and cries. There were some among us, however, the scholars and chroniclers, who knew well the words and shuddered at their significance. "The Snow Prince is come! Doom is at hand!" There was then a great calm that overcame the Elves that still stood. Through their mass the Snow Prince did ride, and as a longboat slices the icy waters of the Fjalding he parted the ranks of his kin. The magnificent white horse slowed to a gallop, then a trot, and the unknown Elf rider moved to the front of the line at a slow, almost ghostlike pace. A Nord warrior sees much in a life of bloodshed and battle, and is rarely surprised by anything armed combat may bring. But few among us that day could have imagined the awe and uncertainty of a raging battlefield that all at once went motionless and silent. Such is the effect the Snow Prince had on us all. For when the joyous cries of the Elves had ended, there remained a quiet known only in the solitude of slumber. It was then our combined host, Elf and Nord alike, were joined in a terrible understanding -- victory or defeat mattered little that day on the slopes of the Moesring Mountains. The one truth we all shared was that death would come to many that day, victor and vanquished alike. The glorious Snow Prince, an Elf unlike any other, did come that day to bring death to our kind. And death he so brought. Like a sudden, violent snow squall that rends travelers blind and threatens to tear loose the very foundations of the sturdiest hall, the Snow Prince did sweep into our numbers. Indeed the ice and snow did begin to swirl and churn about the Elf, as if called upon to serve his bidding. The spinning of that gleaming spear whistled a dirge to all those who would stand in the way of the Snow Prince, and our mightiest fell before him that day. Ulfgi Anvil-Hand, Strom the White, Freida Oaken-Wand, Heimdall the Frenzied. All lay dead at the foot of the Moesring Mountains. For the first time that day it seemed the tide of battle had actually turned. The Elves, spurred on by the deeds of the Snow Prince, rallied together for one last charge against our ranks. It was then, in a single instant, that the Battle of the Moesring came to a sudden and unexpected end. Finna, daughter of Jofrior, a lass of only twelve years and squire to her mother, watched as the Snow Prince cut down her only parent. In her rage and sorrow, Finna picked up Jofrior's sword and threw it savagely at her mother's killer. When the Elf's gleaming spear stopped its deadly dance, the battlefield fell silent, and all eyes turned to the Snow Prince. No one that day was more surprised than the Elf himself at the sight that greeted them all. For upon his great steed the Snow Prince still sat, the sword of Jofrior buried deeply in his breast. And then, he fell, from his horse, from the battle, from life. The Snow Prince lay dead, slain by a child. With their savior defeated, the spirit of the remaining Elven warriors soon shattered. Many fled, and those that remained on the battlefield were soon cut down by our broad Nord axes. When the day was done, all that remained was the carnage of the battlefield. And from that battlefield came a dim reminder of valor and skill, for the brilliant armor and spear of the Snow Prince still shined. Even in death, this mighty and unknown Elf filled us with awe. It is common practice to burn the corpses of our fallen foes. This is as much a necessity as it is custom, for death brings with it disease and dread. Our chieftains wished to cleanse Solstheim of the Elven horde, in death as well as life. It was decided, however, that such was not to be the fate of the Snow Prince. One so mighty in war yet so loved by his kin deserved better. Even in death, even if an enemy of our people. And so we brought the body of the Snow Prince, wrapped in fine silks, to a freshly dug barrow. The gleaming armor and spear were presented on a pedestal of honor, and the tomb was arrayed with treasures worthy of royalty. All of the mighty chieftains agreed with this course, that the Elf should be so honored. His body would be preserved in the barrow for as long as the earth chose, but would not be offered the protection of our Stalhrim, which was reserved for Nord dead alone. So ends this account of the Battle of the Moesring, and the fall of the magnificent Elven Snow Prince. May our gods honor him in death, and may we never meet his kind again in life.
string:
[pagebreak]

　 　雪王子的陨落 　 　

　 [pagebreak]

本文是由“白眼”英格拉德酋长的史官，洛克海姆所翻译的侍女环峰之战的记录 他从哪里来，我们一无所知，但他骑着苍白色的坐骑进入战场。我们称他精灵，因为他确是精灵，但他不像我们在那天之前所见过的任何精灵。他的长矛和护甲光芒四射，闪耀着可怕的未知魔法，这样的打扮使这名骑手看起来比一般的战士更强。 　最使我们忧虑，甚至恐惧的是从精灵阵地中传来的吼叫。它不是恐惧，不是彷徨，而是一种不加掩饰的放纵欢乐。一种注将死去的人得到第二次生命时感到的庆幸，因为那时精灵失败的命运已定，就像在索瑟海姆上的其他战争一样。侍女环峰之战将是诺德与精灵在这片土地上的生死决战。在伊斯格拉谟领导下，我们将精灵赶出了天际，同时我们将尽全力歼灭索瑟海姆上的一切精灵。我们的战士装备着诺德铁匠所能锻造的最好的手斧和剑，在敌阵中杀出一条血路。精灵的鲜血洒遍侍女环峰。那么，为什么我们的敌人会如此的欢乐？一个骑手可能给一支绝望的军队带来如此巨大的希望吗？ 　对于大多数我们的族人来说，这吼叫的意思很明显，它们不过是精灵的哭喊和祷告。但我们中有一些学者和史官非常了解这些信号，并为它所震颤。 　“雪王子现身了！厄运就在眼前！” 　随后精灵转为镇静，肃静地站立着。雪王子果真从他们中间骑马而过，像费雅丁湖冰冷的水中乘风破浪的船一样，他脱离了族人的阵地。雪白的战马放慢了速度，由飞奔变为疾行，随后，这个陌生的精灵骑手以缓慢、幽灵般的步伐来到伫列前部。 　诺德战士一生经历过的战争和杀戮太多了，极少能有任何武装战争使他们感到惊讶。但那一天我们中极少有人能想象到一个瞬间由激烈变为静止和沉寂的战场所能带来的畏惧和彷徨。这就是雪王子给我们的震撼。当精灵欢快的叫喊结束，留下的只有在孤独的沉睡中才能感到的寂静。随后两军开始交锋，那天，在侍女环峰山丘上，不论诺德与精灵，胜负已经无足轻重了。我们所共有的就是即将降临的死亡，不论征服与被征服。那天，雪王子，一个与众不同的精灵，的确给我们带来了死亡。 　一瞬间，猛烈的大雪让人睁不开双眼，几乎可以松动最坚固建筑的地基，雪王子扫过我们的阵地。冰雪果真在精灵周围旋转、翻腾，就像是被召唤来为他助战。那支闪光的长矛旋转着，为所有阻挡雪王子的人奏响了哀乐。那天，我们最强壮的勇士倒在了他的面前。砧手沃夫吉、白流、木仗弗雷达，都在侍女环峰的山麓下永久地长眠了。 　一开始，似乎战局发生了逆转。被雪王子鼓舞的精灵集结起来准备对我们发出最后一击。后来，就在一瞬间，侍女环峰之战意想不到地结束了。 　芬达，约弗瑞尔的女儿，一个仅有十二岁的女孩，在母亲身旁，亲眼目睹了雪王子杀死了她唯一的亲人。在愤怒与悲痛中，芬达拾起约弗瑞尔的剑，猛地扔向杀死母亲的凶手。当那光芒四射的长矛停止了它的死亡之舞，战场陷入了沉寂，所有人的目光都落在雪王子身上。那天，没有人比雪王子更惊讶于眼前的景象。雪王子在高大的坐骑上一动不动，约弗瑞尔的剑深深地插入他的胸口。随后，他倒下了，跌落战马，跌出战场，失去了生命。雪王子死了，被一个小孩杀死了。 　看到他们的救世主倒下，精灵战士很快丧失了斗志。许多人逃跑了，剩余的也很快死在了诺德人的阔斧之下。战场上只剩余一点微弱的勇猛与技艺，雪王子的矛和护甲依旧银光闪闪。雪王子让我们心中充满畏惧，即使他已经死了。 　烧掉死去敌人的尸体是我们的习俗，这也是必须的，因为死尸会带来疾病和恐惧。我们的首长希望清除索瑟海姆上的一切精灵，不论活的还是死的。但是，我们决定，雪王子的命运将不会如此。一个深受他的族人爱戴，在战场上如此勇猛的精灵理应得到更好的待遇，即便他已经死了，即便他是我们的敌人。 　我们用上等丝绸包裹着雪王子的尸体，把他放入了新挖的墓冢。那闪闪发光的矛和护甲被放在代表荣誉的台座上，整个坟墓用王室的珠宝装饰着。所有的首长都同意这种做法，这个精灵应当被授以如此荣誉。他的尸体会永远在此保存，但他不会受到魔冰的保护，只有死去的诺德人才能享受它。 　关于侍女环峰之战以及伟大的精灵雪王子的纪录到此结束。愿我们的神明保佑他的灵魂，愿我们在有生之年再也不要遇见他的族人。 [pagebreak] 译校者注： 一、“侍女环峰”（Moesring），乃索瑟海姆（Solstheim）北面一山峰，国外知名Lore探讨社群“帝国图书馆”上有贴认为，Moesring=Maiden's Ring，故重新定为“侍女环峰”。侍女环峰战役发生之时，远早于巨龙战争开始的年代，故而当时索瑟海姆与天际是相连的。 二、“索瑟海姆”中的“海姆（heim）”，源自原始日耳曼语中的“*haimaz”一词，意为“家”，现在在德语中是一个及其常见的城镇名后缀，如“霍芬海姆（Hoffenheim）”、“安纳海姆（Anaheim）”等，汉语中通译为“海姆”。 三、“魔冰”即为Stalhrim，Stal=Steel，Hrim=Frost，而且在本作DLC《龙裔》中，亦提及此物乃“Enchanted Ice”，故而综合确定为“魔冰”。

original: Alright, I will return to the laboratory.
You're joining the Stormcloaks? Those murderous bastards?! No. I won't help that monster brutalize the Reach. Not again!
string: 你要加入风暴斗篷？那群杀人不眨眼的混蛋？不。我不会帮那个魔头蹂躏边塞的。绝不！

original: You're right, myself included. However, I'll be happy to watch you hone your skills.
string: 你说得对，我也包括在内。不过我很乐意看你磨练技艺。

original: I have recived an offer to join Stendarr's Blade, a mysterious group dedicated to protecting Tamriel from the shadows. An agent named Sentinel has filled the dead-drop barrel in Whiterun with more missions and my payment for the last job.
string: 我收到了加入圣神之锋的邀请，这是个致力于在暗影中守护泰姆瑞尔的神秘组织。一位名叫守望者的密探已在白漫城的情报交接点木桶内，为我留下了后续任务与上一次任务的报酬。

original: Because we were few among those mountains, very few. Scattered amongst the villages. Hidden. Waiting.
string: 因为我们在那些山里人很少，真的很少。分散在各个村庄，隐蔽起来，静静等待。

original: It's time, I can return for my reward
string: 时机到了，我可以回去领报酬了

original: I'd rather not be a Nightingale.
From there it was but a line of targets. A flanking maneuver nothing more than a whistle-ax thrown wide.
string: 这样一来，敌人就成了排成线的靶子，侧翼迂回不过是扔出战斧般简单。

original: I'm going to refuse to engage with you if we don't get out of here soon.
string: 要是再不从这儿出去，我就不理你了。

original: Are you prepared to be with me? Forge a new bond as... beloved?
string: 你准备好和我在一起了吗？缔结新的羁绊，成为…… 爱人？

original: You and my father would get along wonderfully. Thank you for your wisdom and advice.
string: 你和我父亲肯定很合得来，谢谢你的智慧和建议。

original: Summons a Silver Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把白银誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: Suffice to say, I've had my happiest time with you yet. Let's see if this adventure in Skyrim proves any different, hmm?
string: 简单说吧，和你在一起的时光是我最快乐的。不知道这次天际的冒险会不会不一样呢？

original: Conjure Dremora Markynaz Thrall
string: 召唤魔人领爵奴仆

original: Strike those Stormcloak dogs from the walls! Give no quarter! Hunt like Hircine's hounds nip your heels!
string: 把那些风暴斗篷的狗东西从城墙上打下去！一个都别放过！像被海尔辛的猎犬追着似的狠命猎杀！

original: You're right, but that would hardly be a fair fight. I'd wipe the floor with the lot of them.
string: 你说得对，但那根本算不上一场公平的战斗，我能把他们全都打得落花流水。
召唤巢蚁

original: I'll take a look in Cidhna Mine. There are planety of people down there who'd kill for a chance to escape.
string: 我去希讷矿坑看看。下面有的是人愿意为了逃脱而出手杀人。

original: Please watch my back in here. I don't want the dead getting the upper hand.
string: 在这里替我守着后背，我可不想被亡灵占了上风。

original:
[pagebreak]

Covenant of the Oathblades Volume III: The Burden of Victory authored by Iskandar the Chronicler

[pagebreak]

pon returning to the Imperial City, the victorious Oathblades were met with a truly unfortunate fate. Despite completing their objective with impecible percision, their presence appeared to weaken the morale of Tiber's soliders, who were offended by their inhumane natures. Against his better judgement, Tiber Septim disbanded the Oathblades, and chose to banish them to a distant realm of Oblivion at the request of his generals. Yet, Tiber, wise in his ways, ordered that their summoning rituals be recorded, should the need arise to conjure them once more. Today, all texts on their return remain sealed, under lock and key.
string:
[pagebreak]

誓约之刃盟约 第三卷: 胜利之重 作者 史官伊斯坎达尔

[pagebreak]

凯旋的誓约之刃返回帝都后，迎来的却是无比不幸的命运。 尽管他们以极致精准的手段完成了使命，其存在却似乎挫伤了泰伯麾下士兵的士气 —— 士兵们对他们非人的特质感到反感。 泰伯・赛普汀虽心有不愿，仍在将领们的请求下解散了誓约之刃，并将他们放逐至湮灭领域的偏远之地。 但贤明的泰伯下令记录下召唤他们的仪式，以备他日再度召唤之需。时至今日，所有关于他们回归的文献仍被严加封存，锁于密库之中。

original: What do you think of Markarth?
You fight for a lost cause, Forsworn.
string: 你们为一个注定失败的目标而战，弃誓者。

original: But now I've grown up, and I am so close to becoming whom I've dreamt to be - and yet all I feel is this... disconnectedness.
string: 但现在我长大了，离梦想中的自己如此之近 —— 可我心里却只有一种…… 疏离感。

original: The Companions are werewolves in case you missed that. What will you do if they want to turn you into one?
string: 战友团都是狼人，你该不会没发现吧。要是他们想把你也变成狼人，你会怎么做？

original: I need you to do something.
Stealing a goat? Not the dumbest thing I've done while drunk. That was trying to sled down the Lost Valley. I was seeing stars for a week.
string: 偷山羊？这还不是我喝醉后干过最蠢的事，最蠢的是试着从失落谷滑下去，我晕了一个星期。

original: What has become of you? One slight, and you vow to tear the Empire apart?
string: 你到底怎么了？就因为一点委屈，就要拆了帝国？

original: Kodlak is a wise, seasoned warrior. If he sees the error of the Hircine cultists' way, maybe it's worth reconsidering the werewolf curse you bear.
string: 克拉科是位睿智老练的战士。如果他能看清海尔辛信徒的错误，或许你也该重新考虑身上的狼人诅咒。
紧急通知：希比利·斯丹特

original: Well now, that's very noble. Perhaps it's something I should've guessed.
string: 哇，这可真高尚，或许我早该猜到的。

original: "Use it how you will. But read the book through, For you never know what the magic will do."
string: “随心使用吧。但请通读全书，因为你永远不知道，魔法会带来怎样的变数。”

original: I'm not interested in whatever you have to say.
string: 我对你要说的话没兴趣。

original: I thought you were a hero, but you know what? At this point, I'm only here to see how your story ends...
string: 我还以为你是个英雄，不过你知道吗？事到如今，我留下来只是想看看你的故事结局如何……

original: What do you do in here?

In Deephowl Hollow, I discovered a vicious vampire clan that had created an army of undead creatures called revenant. The clan and their leader, Gawayne, have been dealt with, and all of their creations have been destroyed. A full army of revenants would have become a serious threat to the people of Skyrim, so I can only hope that the knowledge of his vile magic has died with Gawayne and his clan.
string: 我在深嚎山谷发现了一个凶残的吸血鬼氏族，他们培育出了一支名为亡魂的不死生物大军。该氏族及其首领加韦恩均已被我铲除，他们的造物也尽数销毁。若这支亡魂大军成型，必将成为天际民众的心头大患。只愿这邪恶魔法的奥秘，能随加韦恩与他的氏族一同覆灭。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Acanthus's note to the Forsworn Matriarch is eye-opening. The Thalmor might not be the real villian behind this, another hand could be pulling the strings, which worries me. But betraying his own to the Forsworn gives his words weight.

For your sharp work in Deepwood Redoubt, take Watcher's Pulse, a silver circlet I once pried from a Ayleid Lich's brow during a purge in Cyrodiil. Crouch unmoving, and it reveals nearby lives as faint, pulsing glimmers, close enough to feel their breath, perfect for threading through Forsworn lairs or Thalmor traps unnoticed. It guided me through more than one close call; now it sharpens your vigil.

I'll decode the book from him. If you can figure out who and where first, take them out and clear Skyrim of this.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

阿坎萨斯写给弃誓者女族长的字条，着实令人大开眼界。梭默或许并非此事背后真正的黑手，似有另一股势力在暗中操纵，这让我忧心不已。但他不惜背叛同族向弃誓者透露内情，反倒让他的言辞多了几分可信度。

为嘉奖你在深木据点的出色表现，我将 “守望者之息” 赠予你 —— 这顶白银环饰，是我当年在赛瑞迪尔的清剿行动中，从一位艾莱迪巫妖的额间取来的。只需静蹲不动，它便会将附近的生命化作微弱跳动的光晕映现出来，近得仿佛能感受到对方的呼吸，无论是穿行于弃誓者的巢穴，还是躲过梭默的陷阱，都能做到不被察觉。它曾助我数次死里逃生，如今，就让它为你的警戒再添一份锐度。

我会着手破译他留下的那本书。若你能先查明幕后之人的身份与行踪，便先将其铲除，让天际省摆脱这场祸乱。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: We can't afford that, Listener. Not enough gold.
string: 我们负担不起，聆听者。金子不够。

original: Married to my childhood sweetheart. I must be the luckiest girl in the world!
string: 嫁给了我青梅竹马的恋人，我一定是世界上最幸福的女孩！

original: The spirits are silent here. As if there's nothing but Death in this place. It's... unsettling.
string: 这里的灵体一片沉寂，仿佛这地方只有死亡。这感觉…… 让人不安。

original:
Contract Kill an Ashlander Province: Morrowind Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] The nomads of Vvardenfell's ashen waste are easily offended by outsiders who do not understand their customs and clan laws. This client wishes to eliminate the Ashlander who tried to kill them. Meet with the client and eliminate the Ashlander. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名灰烬人 省份： 晨风 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 因多瑞尔祭司 —— 在丹莫之中，仍有像这位雇主这般狂热的信徒，始终坚守着古老的审判席信仰。在他们眼中，因多瑞尔家族转投新神殿的举动，无疑是亵渎神明的背叛行径。 与委托人接头，铲除灰烬人. [pagebreak]

original: In my estate, I was always being watched. My father had little time to raise me, so he employed the Altmer brothers to do it instead.
string: 在我的家族领地里，我总是被监视着。我父亲没什么时间抚养我，所以他雇了一对高精灵兄弟来照顾我。
将哈士奇乌尔夫传送至身边

original: Really? You've done it? My soul and sword, this is wonderful!
string: 真的吗？你办成了？我的天，这可太好了！
成员居所（从金库支出 2500 金币）

original: Fortunately, they barely share an ounce of intelligence between them, so my father has little to fear.
string: 幸好他们一个个都没什么脑子，所以父亲没什么好担心的。

original: I can't believe we're doing this.
string: 真不敢相信我们居然在做这种事。

original: I think the Empire can restore the peace.
string: 我认为帝国能恢复和平。

original: What do you need me to carry?
It certainly lives up to my expectations. Magnificent architecture. Weathered by time, yet so modern.
string: 这儿果然没让我失望，建筑太宏伟了。历经岁月洗礼，却又透着现代感。

original: I have found what happened to all five missing students, and have located the volumes of Elemental Magic. I should return to Urag and give him the news.
string: 我查明了五名失踪学生的全部遭遇，也找到了全套的元素魔法卷册。我该回到乌拉格身边，把消息告诉他。

original: Great, thank you for your input.
Greetings, Outlander. You must be feeling a bit out of your element here.
string: 你好，外乡人。你在这里肯定有点格格不入吧。

original: She was killed defending the Night Mother's old crypt in Bravil. Garnag tells me it was quite the battle.
string: 她在保卫布拉维尔的夜母旧墓穴时殒命。加纳格告诉我，那是一场惨烈的战斗。

original: By great adventurers like us, no less.
string: 而且是由我们这样的伟大冒险家来驱散。

original: I only did my duty, Listener. Every member of the Dark Brotherood should be ready to die for our Unholy Matron.
string: 我只是尽了我的本分，聆听者。黑暗兄弟会的每一位成员都应随时准备为我们的邪恶之母献身。

original: I'll send you to the Old Gods!
I'm struggling to make sense of all this. Let's just get back to your rude and abrupt boss and let him work it out.
string: 我实在搞不懂这些事，我们还是回去找你那粗鲁又急躁的老板，让他自己琢磨吧。

original: Markarth actually means "Above the Karth". It's supposed to be ruled by an Ard, or King, who watches over the Reach. Not some lowly Jarl...
string: 马卡斯的意思其实是 “卡尔特河之上”，这座城本该由一位守护边塞的阿尔德（国王）统治，而不是什么卑微的领主……

original: You'd orchestrate a peace talk? Why, so that Ulfric's rebellion could backstab the Legion when you're off fighting Alduin?
string: 你要组织和谈？怎么，想趁你去对抗奥杜因时，让乌弗瑞克的叛军从背后偷袭军团？

original: The mead hall of the Companions. I fear I am lacking in the required skill to be here. Weapons were never my speciality.
string: 战友团的蜜酒大厅，我恐怕没资格待在这儿，武器从来不是我的专长。

original: Harkon's dead... By the spirits. It's over. An eternity in the Schemer's clutches seems a fitting end for a man as vile as that bloodsucker.
string: 哈康死了…… 天啊，一切都结束了。那个吸血鬼恶棍，在阴谋家的掌控下度过永恒，真是罪有应得。

original: Someone got kidnapped? Well, it's a Companion's calling to save the damsels. We should get moving before they make it worse.
string: 有人被绑架了？拯救落难少女本就是战友团的使命，我们得赶紧行动，免得情况更糟。

original: It was not entirely her fault, J'Faar admits this, but the Dark Brotherhood fell far under her watch.
string: 杰法尔承认，这也不全是她的错，但黑暗兄弟会在她的监管下确实衰落得厉害。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>
Stay out of the old tower. Ever since the siege, monsters keep showing up.

Cpt Forinth
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>
别靠近那座旧塔。自从围城战之后，魔物就总在那里现身。

福林思队长
</font>

original: The Lover Stone? Let me guess, there's a Fighter Stone somewhere too?
string: 恋人之石？我猜猜，是不是还有个战士之石？

original: I will carve you up and offer your heart to Hircine!
string: 我要把你碎尸万段，把你的心脏献给海尔辛！

original: For all the time we spend in these ruins, you must love it in here.
string: 我们在这些遗迹里待了这么久，你肯定很喜欢这儿吧。

original: We're going to destroy the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 我们要摧毁黑暗兄弟会。

original: A blackened edge that saps <mag> points of stamina from all it strikes.
string: 锋刃浸染黑暗，击中目标时抽取<mag>点耐力

original: How did you avoid the Orb's notice?
string: 你是怎么避开宝珠感知的？

original: Go find my nephew and deliver that summons.
string: 去找我外甥，把那封征召令交给他。

original: You're a fool to fight us.
string: 跟我们作对，你真是个傻瓜。

original: A pity you won't be alive to learn from this mistake!
string: 可惜你没机会从这个错误中吸取教训了！

original: A plan? Well, I can't wait to see where this goes...
string: 计划？那我倒要看看你想怎么折腾……

original: You saved Miraak even after everything he's inflicted on the Skaal and Solstheim. Such a pity, redemption is too rich for him.
string: 即便米拉拉克对斯卡尔人和索瑟海姆犯下了种种罪行，你还是救了他。真可惜，他根本不配得到救赎。

original: Nothing could regulate my emotions, but maybe bashing you will!
string: 没有什么能调节我的情绪，但也许揍你一顿会有用！

original: It won't be any different this time. The Jarl may control Markarth for now, and the Silver-Bloods may own it... But we will endure and triumph.
string: 这次也一样。领主或许暂时掌控着马卡斯，银血家族或许霸占着这里…… 但我们终将坚持下去，取得胜利。

original: Spell Tome: Conjure Storm Atronach + Wrathman + Frost Rune
string: 法术书: 召唤风暴元素 + 狂暴亡灵 + 寒霜符文

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

My Dear Anise,

Our paths have crossed for a long time, old friend, under Skyrim's hidden night sky. Something important is coming up, and I need your magic to help with a plan. Go to the darkness of Brittleshin Pass, where Valthar is gathering souls for a secret project. His goals match those old whispers we shared right here in this cabin. Give him your skills, and keep everything hidden.

Sybille

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

亲爱的安尼斯：

老友啊，在天际那片隐秘的夜空下，你我相交已然日久。眼下有要事将至，我需要借你的魔法助力一项计划。前往断胫山隘的暗影之地吧，瓦塔尔正在那里为某个秘密计划收集灵魂。他的目标，正与我们曾在这小木屋中低声谈及的那些古老传闻不谋而合。将你的本领助他一臂之力，切记守好所有秘密。

希比利

</font>

original: A spray of swarming insects that does <mag> points Poison damage per second.
string: 喷出一大群虫群，每秒造成<mag>点毒性伤害

original: The apostle Renos had transferred his soul into a factotum body, and went mad. I should tell the factotum that the armored factotum was his apostle.
string: 雷诺斯使徒将自己的灵魂转移到了一台构装体的躯体里，然后变得疯癫了。我得告诉构装体，那台身披盔甲的构装体就是它的主人。

original: I was wrong about you. You've damned my people to centuries of slavery to the Nords! Spirits spit on you, you murderer.
string: 我看错你了。你让我的族人注定要被诺德人奴役几个世纪！灵体唾弃你，你这个杀人犯。

original: Skyrim needs the Empire. We're stronger together.
string: 天际需要帝国，团结才会更强大。

original: Well, we said we'd travel together when I've come of age. You know, I've always longed to explore the world and help those in need.
string: 我们说过，等我成年了就一起去旅行。你知道的，我一直渴望探索世界，帮助有需要的人。

original: Always good to come out on the winning side.
string: 站在胜利者那边的感觉真不错。

original: It is a large family. Larger than most in Tamriel. Given the high level of security imposed on us, it seems we find great difficulty in dying.
string: 我们是个大家族，比泰姆瑞尔的大多数家族都要庞大。加上家里安保级别高得离谱，我们家的人似乎连死都成了难事。

original: Maybe I won't witness the closing of this chapter, but it doesn't matter - you're going to come back, then tell me all about it.
string: 或许我无缘见证这一章的落幕，但没关系 —— 你一定会回来，然后把一切都告诉我。

original: Resist 10% of Magic and Regenerate Magicka 15% faster for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，魔法抗性提升 10%，法力值恢复速度加快 15%。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
Yamarz only paid me a fifth up front but he seemed eager to keep this secret. I do not think he will give me trouble when I demand the rest of my pay if the retrieval goes as planned, he seemed a coward to me.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
亚玛兹只预付了五分之一的酬劳，却对这件事遮遮掩掩，显得格外急切。只要这次取回任务按计划进行，我觉得我去讨要剩余报酬时，他应该不敢找我麻烦 —— 在我看来，他就是个懦夫。
</font>

original: If you see a Falmer, kill it. I'm not going to end up a meal for some deranged elf...
string: 看到伐莫就杀了它，我可不想变成这些疯狂精灵的盘中餐……

original: Cyrodiil Contract: Kill a College of Whispers Mage (High-Risk)
string: 赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位低语学院法师（高风险）

original: A little damp for my liking.
string: 这地方对我来说有点太潮了。

original: Why do vampires always live in places like this? Just because they live forever doesn't mean they should forgo finery.
string: 吸血鬼为什么总喜欢住在这种地方？就算永生，也不该放弃精致的生活吧。

original: Once per day, mark one or more eligible targets for a synchronized assassination by your Silencers.
string: 每日一次，可为一名或多名符合条件的目标标记，让你的沉默者们发起同步刺杀

string: 你可算来了！我到处找你呢，怎么这么久？

string: 伐莫在地表肆虐，又统治着地下深处。你要知道，这些生物能让战士夜夜惊魂。

string: 由于他失踪了，我修改了程序，开始与陌生人以物换金。

string: 当蕾拉娜作为你的随从时，所有技能的提升速度加快 5%，耐力的恢复速度加快 20%。

string: 唉，那个臭精灵安卡诺终于死了。这么多人因为这些法师的野心丧命…… 要是他们没去碰萨瑟尔城的那东西就好了。

original: The Apprentice Stone? Apprentice to who? Not you, I hope.

string: 艾斯维尔契约：杀死一位佩利廷贵族（高风险）

string: 就像它推动你成为了今天的自己一样？

So, what's next I wonder? Let's pay the Psijic Order a visit. You'll be leading them in no time, I'm sure.

Without the Empire, it'd just be warlords killing each other for power. Not unlike what the Stormcloaks are doing.

string: 是一只巨兽夺走了他们的性命…… 我想要复仇，但我已经不再年轻了。我…… 我不想死。

original: Naarifin's Orb, as all would come to know it.
string: 也就是后来人人皆知的，纳尔芬之球。

string: 我找到了雷娅和谢里瓦前去寻找元素魔法・寒霜卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚她们遭遇了什么。

original: You're my one and only. I hope our story never ends.
string: 你是我的唯一。愿我们的故事永远没有终章。

string: 这座堡垒真壮观！怎么会被废弃这么久？

If you'd like I can add a unique dye as well. The knowledge I gain from studying the second set will be invaluable for my craft.
string: 如果你愿意，我还能添加一种独特的染料。研究第二套长袍所获得的知识，对我的工艺来说价值连城。

original: That's called being fearless, J'Faar. You should try it some time.

string: 伟大的诺德英雄曾走过风舵城的城墙。我好奇谁能被称作发条城的英雄？

original: I am in pain, yet nothing hurts, I am in agony!
string: 我很痛苦，却又感觉不到伤痛，我深陷煎熬！

original: It never came up!? It never came up because you didn't want it to come up.
string: 从没提过！？是你不想提才从没提过吧。

original:
[pagebreak]

Property of Valin Selvani

[pagebreak] 4E 201 2nd of Sun's Height, Middas As I write this, I am on a ship headed towards the isle of Solstheim, being led by a potentially foolish notion of locating a specific Dwemer ruin there. It has been a long and treacherous journey to Skyrim from Deshaan, but I believe it will be well worth it in the end. I have in my possesion ancient Dwemer schematics which I purchased off a fellow back home. He was an odd looking individual, covered his face the whole time, and likely was a thief peddling stolen goods. The parchment is in remarkable shape for something so old, I do wonder where he came about this? He didn't even ask much for the schematic either, I got it for quite the steal! He told me little of its origin, save that it belongs to the ruins of Kagrumez on Solstheim. I've spent a good portion of my life studying the Dwemer and their inventions, the designs depicted here seem to resemble armor and weaponry. I'll need to stow this away for now and study it some more after I've had some good rest. [pagebreak] 4E 201 10th of Sun's Height, Turdas I've taken more time to decipher these schematics, and they are indeed showing the method of creating a truly unique style of Dwemer weapons and armor. Traditional Dwemeri crafting uses an unknown alloy in nearly all of their metalwork. This style however, calls for the use some strange new metal and soul gems! What could have possibly made the Dwemer decide to use this combination of materials? [pagebreak] 4E 201 21st of Sun's Height, Morndas I arrived at Raven Rock several days ago and have remained here at my tavern room, attempting to decipher the last of these schematics. From what I can gather, no ordinary forge has the ability to make this equipment. The Dwemer used tonal frequencies in the creation of the gear in order to imbue it with special properties. Sketches and other cryptic ciphers in the ancient Dwemer alphabet show that I will need a special Lexicon to activate something called the Tonal Forge. The man who sold me this seemed to believe I'd find what I need at Kagrumez. I will leave here at first light and begin my delve into the ancient ruins. [pagebreak] 4E 201 26th of Sun's Height, Loredas The Lexicon is the key, it's so obvious to me now. The vision, the inscriptions, it all makes perfect sense. Mzulft Raldbthar Nchuand-Zel The Lexicon holds the pathway, the Lexicon is the key
string:
[pagebreak]

瓦林・塞尔瓦尼之物

[pagebreak] 第四纪元 201 年 日高月 2 日，星期三 执笔之时，我正乘舟前往索瑟海姆岛，心中怀着一个或许有些荒唐的念头 —— 去那里找寻一处特定的锻莫遗迹。从迪莎安到天际，这段旅途漫长又凶险，但我坚信，最终一切都将是值得的。我身上带着一份古老的锻莫图纸，是从家乡一个人手里买来的。那人长相古怪，全程遮着脸，多半是个兜售赃物的窃贼。 这份如此古老的羊皮纸，品相却完好得惊人，我实在好奇他是从何处得来的？况且他开价也不高，我几乎是捡了个大便宜！他对图纸的来历只字未提，只说它属于索瑟海姆的卡谷梅兹遗迹。 我大半辈子都在研究锻莫及其造物，图纸上描绘的设计，看起来像是盔甲与武器的样式。眼下我得先把它收妥，等好好休息过后，再细细钻研。 [pagebreak] 第四纪元 201 年 日高月 10 日，星期四 我花了更多时间解读这些图纸，发现它们记录的果然是一种独一无二的锻莫武器与盔甲的打造方法。传统的锻莫工艺中，几乎所有金属制品都会用到一种未知合金。但这种新样式，却要求使用某种奇异的新金属与灵魂石！ 究竟是什么原因，让锻莫决定将这些材料组合使用？ [pagebreak] 第四纪元 201 年 日高月 21 日，星期一 数日前我抵达了鸦石镇，一直待在酒馆的房间里，试图解读完图纸的最后部分。据我所知，普通的熔炉根本打造不出这些装备。锻莫在制造这些器具时，运用了调谐频率，为其赋予特殊的属性。 古老的锻莫字母写成的草图与晦涩密码显示，我需要一本特殊的方典，来激活一个名为调谐熔炉的装置。卖给我图纸的人似乎坚信，我能在卡谷梅兹找到所需之物。我将于破晓时分动身，开始探索这座古老的遗迹。 [pagebreak] 第四纪元 201 年 日高月 26 日，星期六 方典就是钥匙，我现在终于想明白了。那幻象、那些铭文，一切都豁然开朗。 树皮遗址 拉德巴尔 楚安德-泽尔 方典铺就通路，方典即是钥匙
黑暗兄弟会已宣告破产！

string: 我在索瑟海姆的一座实验室里遇到了一名构装体。它的主人是位使徒，在外出寻找自动人偶部件时离奇失踪了。机器人让我读一读它主人留下的铭牌，或许读完后我就能知晓这位使徒的下落。

string: 杀死恶魔石像鬼或向出口逃跑！

original: [pagebreak] Well well, it looks like our dark lady has finally made her choice. I must say, you're not quite what we expected. I always thought it would be Cicero, but mother does love suprsies, doesn't she? I thoroughly enjoyed Vittoria's wedding. The food was not up to my standards, far too much seasoning, but the ceremony? Oh, Sithis, what a twist! Bravo, she hardly saw it coming. [pagebreak] We look forward to meeting you when this is all over. Finish the job, we'll be watching.
string: [pagebreak] 哟呵，看来我们的黑暗女士终于做出了抉择。不得不说，你和我们预想的完全不一样。我一直以为会是西塞罗，可夜母总爱制造惊喜，不是吗？维多利亚的那场婚礼我看得可尽兴了。宴席的水准实在配不上我的要求，调料放得也太多了，但那场仪式？哦，西帝斯啊，这反转简直绝了！干得漂亮，她到死都没反应过来。 [pagebreak] 等这一切尘埃落定，我们期待与你相见。完成你的使命吧，我们会一直关注着。

original: You're sweet, thank you. I'm not sure I'll ever be one for lugging a sword around, but I'll try to pick up some tips from you.
string: 你真好，谢谢。我不确定我会不会整天扛着剑，但我会试着从你这儿学点技巧。
