original: Journal of Sildar Neramo I've decided to keep this journal to document my journey and what I discover along the way. As an archaeologist, it has always been my dream to uncover something no one else has ever imagined in their wildest fantasies! Well, my time has come. Many are familiar with the Snow Prince, a mysterious figure from the early history of Skyrim. Once a great Snow Elf warrior, felled during the battle of Moesring Pass on Solstheim. Upon his death, and the subsequent destruction of the Falmer race as they were known, his remains were interred in a freshly dug barrow on Solstheim called Jolgeirr Barrow. Much has happened to the small island since those days, at one point Jolgeirr Barrow had been plundered during the late Third Era, leaving nothing behind but the architecture itself for someone like myself to study. This was disheartening for myself and many others who had wished for a chance to study the Snow Prince's remains and equipment up close, to better understand the craftsmanship of this enigmatic race of Mer. Within the last several years, someone had revisited Jolgeirr Barrow. Rumors state that this individual had returned the ancient relics of the prince after they had been plundered back in the Third Era. Whoever it was that came here left quite the lock on this door! I've begun investigating who created this lock. Asking around the local town of Raven Rock yielded little of note, until I stumbled upon a merchant with quite the tale for me. They showed me this map, claiming it holds all the answers I seek. Their sources say whoever made that lock on Jolgeirr Barrow buried away the key in the hopes no one would ever unseal that tomb. It's a treacherous journey to this dig site, the merchant warned me of werebeasts which roam the island and all manner of other creatures stalking the hills. I had the gold to spare and couldn't possibly turn down such a story, even if it proves pointless in the end.
string: 西达尔・内拉莫的日记 我决定写下这本日记，记录我的旅途，以及沿途的种种发现。身为一名考古学家，我的毕生梦想便是发掘出那些最荒诞的幻想中都未曾出现过的事物！如今，属于我的时刻终于到来。雪王子的名号为人熟知，他是天际早期历史中一位神秘的人物。这位伟大的雪精灵战士，殒命于索瑟海姆的莫斯灵隘口之战。他死后，雪精灵一族也随之走向覆灭，其遗骸被安葬在索瑟海姆一处新掘的古墓中，那便是约基尔古坟。 自那时起，这座小岛历经了诸多变迁。第三纪元末期，约尔盖尔古墓曾遭洗劫，除了建筑本身可供我这样的人研究外，其余皆被洗掠一空。这让我，以及许多渴望近距离研究雪王子遗骸与装备、以求更深入了解这支神秘精灵种族工艺水平的人，都倍感沮丧。 就在近几年，有人重访了约基尔古坟。坊间传言，此人将第三纪元被盗走的雪王子圣物归回了古坟之中。而这位前来归还圣物的人，还在墓门上留下了一道极为复杂的锁！ 我已着手调查这把锁的打造者。在鸦石镇四处打听后，我几乎一无所获，直到偶然遇见一位商人，他给我讲了一段离奇的故事。他还拿出了这张地图，称其上藏着我追寻的所有答案。据他的消息来源所说，打造约基尔古坟那把锁的人，将钥匙深埋了起来，希望永远无人能开启那座古墓。前往发掘地点的旅途危机四伏，商人提醒我，岛上有兽人出没，山间还潜藏着形形色色的怪物。 我手头尚有余钱，即便最终证明这一切都是徒劳，我也绝无可能拒绝这样一段奇遇。

original: Ahhh, here you are. Right on time.

original: Have you heard about the legend of the Pale Lady? I would like to write a new one: the legend of the Golden Automaton.
string: 你听过苍白女士的传说吗？我想写一个新的传说：黄金自动机械的传说。

original: That orb is wrong. The spirits are drawn to it, then warped into nothing but raw magicka! I think we should get as far away from it as possible.

请只让我做些轻松的活儿。

original: I found the corpse of Valin, who was slain in an attempt to decipher a Lexicon. His journal mentioned inscribing the Lexicon at three different Dwemer ruins in Skyrim. Perhaps if I take the Lexicon to these Dwemer ruins, I can uncover the secrets of what Valin was after. I should begin by travelling to Mzulft, first of the three ruins. From there I will need to find a way to inscribe the Lexicon.
string: 我找到了瓦林的尸体，他在尝试解读方典时惨遭杀害。他的日记里提到，要在天际的三处锻莫废墟中为方典刻上符文。或许我把方典带到这些锻莫废墟，就能揭开瓦林所追寻的秘密。我该先前往三座废墟中的第一座 —— 树皮遗址，然后想办法为方典刻上符文。

string: 说实话，我一直不理解我的族人对死亡的执念。他们都死了，我们该往前走了。

original: I've heard things about the Black-Briars, Maven in particular. My father is not terribly fond of her. He claims she's a despicable woman. What joy.

original: How about we just carry on as we were and we see where things go. My love.

original: Sera. It is good to see a friendly face in this frozen wasteland. Three blessings to you, Outlander.

original: The night sky is truly stunning.

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='26'>
PIRATES
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
To all loyal citizens and passing travelers,

It has come to our attention that a fleet of pirates has begun operating along the western coast of Skyrim, with sightings reported near Orphans Tear.

These raiders are cunning and well-armed, posing as merchants or fishermen. Caravans and supply ships have gone missing, and some coastal villages report plundered homes and missing kin.

By order of Solitudes command, a campaign is being organized to drive these pirates from our shores. Scouts have already been deployed, and a war band is being assembled from among our own soldiers, shield-brothers, and any proven blades willing to aid the cause.

If you can wield steel and stomach blood, report to Castle Dour. Ask for the Guard-Captain or his second. All who aid in the cleansing of these waters will be paid in coin and honor.

Solitude stands strong.

-- Captain of the Solitude Guard
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='26'>
海盗
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
致所有忠心的子民与过往的旅人：

我们已获悉，一支海盗舰队现身天际西海岸活动，有目击者称其在孤儿之泪附近出没。

这群劫掠者狡诈多端、武装精良，常伪装成商人或渔民行事。商队与补给船接连失踪，部分沿海村落更是遭逢洗劫，居民亦有失联。

奉独孤城指令，我方正组织一场清剿行动，誓将这群海盗驱逐出海岸。斥候已先行派出，战团也在集结之中 —— 成员包括我城士兵、结义战友，以及所有愿为正义出手的勇士。

若你能挥剑作战、不惧血光，便前往阴郁堡报到，向卫队长或其副手请缨。凡参与肃清海域者，皆可获赏金与荣耀加身。

独孤城永不屈服。
—— 独孤城卫队长
</font>

original: Alright, I know you're most likely stronger than me, but I'm here to rescue you anytime should you need me to!
string: 好吧，我知道你可能比我厉害，但只要你需要，我随时都能来救你！

original: Do not believe what others may say. Khajiit has served the Night Mother with loyalty for all his life.

original: Ugh, magic. Fine, if you insist.

original: Seal a forgery? Are you thinking clearly, stranger?

original: I'm regretting not mastering any fire spells!
string: 真后悔没把火焰法术练精通！

original: I knew I didn't want to travel Skyrim alone, but I was expecting I would have to settle for someone who I could just tolerate.
string: 我知道自己不想独自游历天际，本以为只能找个勉强能忍受的人同行。

original: I've seen children who swung better.
string: 我见过比你挥剑更利索的小孩。

string: 他们手上有乌弗瑞克亲自授予的戒指，这些戒指就是能给我的征召令盖章的印信。

original: Especially not after what they did to my pa. They abducted and tortured him for nothing but spite.
string: 尤其是在他们对我父亲做了那些事之后。他们毫无理由地绑架并折磨他，只是出于恶意。

original: No one will dare to help them. They are abandoned, obliged to fend for themselves all alone.
string: 没人敢帮助他们。他们被抛弃了，不得不独自谋生。

original: I've been trained by the greatest wizards in Tamriel! You don't stand a chance!
string: 泰姆瑞尔最厉害的法师教过我本事！你根本没胜算！

original: Hmm, I suppose it will be beneficial to have a werewolf for a protector. Just... Don't turn on me, please. That would not be enjoyable.
string: 嗯，我想有个狼人当保护者应该挺有用的。只是…… 别把矛头对准我，拜托，那可不好玩。

original: I lost to Nibenese crooks with loaded die and refused to pay, so I had to hide.
string: 我输给了出老千的尼本根骗子，还拒绝付钱，所以只能藏起来。

original: I won't be your dinner, bear!
string: 我才不要当你的晚餐呢，熊！

original: All this knowledge in one place. Knowing so much would probably fry all my circuits.
string: 这么多知识汇集一处。知晓这么多东西，恐怕会烧坏我所有的电路。

original: Ow! Does it really need to be this way!?

string: 阿旺晨泽尔·阿尼蒙柯特利

string: 我没想到你居然落魄到这种地步，你怎么穿成这样？

Codex of Oathblades Volume I: A Comprehensive Record authored by Iskandar the Chronicler

Of all the tasks I've been assigned by the Order, none has intruiged me more than creating this codex. These Oathblades have always always bewildered me. 誓约之刃法典 第一卷： 全录纪要 著者 史官伊斯坎达尔

[pagebreak]

在教团指派给我的所有任务中，编写这部法典是最让我着迷的一项。 这些誓约之刃始终令我困惑：是什么驱使这些战士献出自己的凡俗灵魂？他们是真心信仰自身的事业，还是被帝王之手逼迫臣服？ [pagebreak] 1.琥珀誓约之刃伤害：25 点 混沌伤害：20 点 2.古诺德誓约之刃伤害：17 点 火焰伤害：20 点 3.血吟誓约之刃伤害：21 点 流血伤害：20 点 4.魔族誓约之刃伤害：24 点 吸血：20 点生命值 [pagebreak] 5.黑暗誓约之刃伤害：20 点 混沌伤害：20 点 6.龙骨誓约之刃伤害：25 点 闪电伤害：20 点 7.矮人誓约之刃伤害：19 点 闪电伤害：20 点 8.黑檀誓约之刃伤害：22 点 吸血：20 点生命值 [pagebreak] 9.精灵誓约之刃伤害：20 点 吸魔：20 点法力值 10.玻璃誓约之刃伤害：21 点 吸耐：20 点耐力值 11.黄金誓约之刃伤害：21 点 混沌伤害：20 点 12.铁制誓约之刃伤害：15 点 火焰伤害：20 点 [pagebreak] 13.疯狂誓约之刃伤害：25 点 混沌伤害：20 点 14.梅法拉的誓约之刃伤害：25 点 附带小幅麻痹概率 15.诺德英雄誓约之刃伤害：20 点 闪电伤害：20 点 16.诺德誓约之刃伤害：20 点 冰霜伤害：20 点 [pagebreak] 17.兽人誓约之刃伤害：18 点 吸耐：20 点耐力值 18.白银誓约之刃伤害：17 点 阳光伤害：20 点 19.魔冰誓约之刃伤害：23 点 冰霜伤害：20 点 20.钢制誓约之刃伤害：17 点 火焰伤害：20 点

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>

To First Emissary Elenwen,

Our unyielding pursuit of dominion demands eternal vigilance, for even in victory's glow, shadows stir against us. I compile this dossier on a persistent enigma: a clandestine order dubbed "Stendarr's Blade." Born from the embers of the Great War, this veiled fellowship traces its origins to the shattered remnants of the Blades, the Empire's once-mighty guardians, dragon hunters, and spies who served as the Emperor's hidden fist. The White-Gold Concordat of 4E 175 sealed their fate; our agents, empowered by the treaty's clauses, initiated a systematic purge, eradicating their strongholds like Cloud Ruler Temple in Cyrodiil and scattering their agents across Tamriel. By 4E 177, we believed them extinct, their knowledge of ancient lore and anti-Dominion sentiments buried with them.

Yet, intelligence suggests a rebirth in secrecy. Survivors, perhaps a dozen at first, hardened veterans from the war's frontlines, gathered in hidden enclaves, such as forgotten caverns in the Jerall Mountains. Disillusioned by the Empire's capitulation and our relentless hunts, they renounced their old identity to evade another massacre. Invoking Stendarr, god of mercy and righteous might, they reformed as a shadowed brotherhood, pledged to justice for the vulnerable and equilibrium in Tamriel's turmoil. No longer bound to emperors or dragons, they operate unbound by crowns, striking discreetly against threats to the meek: tyrants, cultists, and schemers like ourselves. Their creed, intercepted from a fallen courier, echoes: "In shadows, we serve", a mantra of subtlety over spectacle, mercy tempered by the blade.

Over the decades, their numbers have grown modestly, recruiting from the dispossessed, wayward warriors, cunning thieves with lingering honor, and mages weary of isolation. By 4E 201, estimates place them at 50 to 100 agents, decentralized across provinces, connected by enchanted dead drops and veiled couriers. Their operations are insidious: sabotaging our Talos hunts without overt confrontation, smuggling heretics through hidden routes, and purging Daedric influences that could destabilize our influence. Notable incidents include the dissolution of a Forsworn alliance in Markarth during the 190s, attributed to their interference, and the vanishing of key informants in Windhelm, leaving no trace but whispers of "Stendarr's mercy." They evade our grasp through ironclad secrecy; agents choose missions freely, emphasizing guile over force, and their leadership, a figure known only as "Sentinel", coordinates from unseen lairs, adapting missives to each recruit's nature.

Lirael's reports dismiss them as fragmented ghosts, yet her growing erraticism raises suspicions; perhaps she underestimates their reach, or worse, conceals ties. We must intensify interrogations and infiltrate their networks; a single exposed thread could unravel their veil. Until then, watch the shadows, Emissary, they weave against our eternal dominion.

Agent Voryn

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>

致首席特使爱琳温：

吾辈对统治权的执着追求，要求我们时刻保持警惕 —— 即便身处胜利的荣光之中，仍有暗影在暗中与我们为敌。现将一份关于某个顽固谜团的卷宗呈予阁下：一个被称作 “斯坦达尔之刃” 的秘密组织。这一隐秘团体诞生于大战的余烬之中，其源头可追溯至刀锋战士的残部；刀锋战士曾是帝国的强大守护者、猎龙者与密探，亦是皇帝暗藏于幕后的铁拳。第四纪元 175 年的《白金条约》注定了他们的覆灭；凭借条约条款赋予的权力，我方特工发起了系统性的清洗行动，铲除了他们在赛瑞迪尔的云顶神殿等据点，将其成员驱散至泰姆瑞尔各地。到了第四纪元 177 年，我们曾以为他们已彻底消亡，那些古老的学识与反督统的思想，也随他们一同被埋葬。

然而，情报显示他们已秘密重生。幸存者最初约有十二人，皆是历经前线战火的老兵，他们聚集在隐秘的据点之中，比如杰拉尔山脉那些被遗忘的洞穴。因对帝国的投降以及我方持续的追捕深感幻灭，他们抛弃了旧身份，以躲避又一场屠杀。他们以慈悲与正义之神斯坦达尔的名义，改组为一个暗影兄弟会，立誓为弱者伸张正义，在泰姆瑞尔的动荡中维系平衡。如今的他们不再效忠于帝王或巨龙，不受王权束缚，悄然打击着一切威胁弱者的势力：暴君、邪教徒，以及如我们一般的阴谋家。从一名阵亡信使身上截获的其信条写道：“我们于暗影中效命”，这一口号彰显了他们重谋略轻张扬、以利刃诠释慈悲的行事准则。

数十年来，其规模略有扩张，招募对象包括流离失所者、迷途的战士、尚存良知的狡黠盗贼，以及厌倦了孤寂的法师。至第四纪元 201 年，据估计其特工人数已达五十至一百人，分散在各省份，通过附魔的秘密交接点与隐秘信使保持联系。他们的行动阴险诡谲：在不发生正面冲突的情况下破坏我方对塔洛斯信徒的搜捕，通过秘密路线偷运异端分子，清除那些可能动摇我方势力的魔族影响。值得注意的事件包括：第四纪元 190 年代，马卡斯城的弃誓者同盟瓦解，经查是他们从中作梗；风舵城的关键线人凭空消失，只留下关于 “斯坦达尔的慈悲” 的传闻，无任何踪迹可循。他们凭借严苛的保密制度躲避我方追查：特工可自由选择任务，崇尚智取而非力敌；其领袖仅以 “哨兵” 为代号，在不为人知的巢穴中进行协调，会根据每位招募者的特质调整指令。

莉瑞尔的报告将他们视作一盘散沙的幽灵，然而她日益乖张的行为令人生疑 —— 或许她低估了对方的势力，更糟的是，她可能隐瞒了与他们的关联。我们必须加强审讯力度，潜入其网络；只要找到一丝突破口，便有望揭开他们的伪装。在那之前，还请特使阁下留意暗影，他们正编织着阻碍吾辈永恒统治的罗网。

特工沃林

</font>

string: 失踪的使徒留下文字说要去卡古梅兹。我应当前往那里，弄清楚发生了什么事。

original: And I have a burning answer.
string: 而我有个迫切的答案要揭晓。
我爱你，无论你去哪，我都跟着。

original: Thank you for being here with me.
Conjure Snowy Sabre Cat
string: 召唤雪地剑齿虎

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Winnowing
Walk on the surface of water.

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
They came close tonight. Not hunters as I feared, but bandits... or some other carrion breed... but too close all the same.

Their boots disturbed the stone above, and my old wounds began to ache. I have started to shape the earth to my will, digging narrow passages, collapsing others, and leaving only one way forward with traps at every step. If the hunters come again they will not find me easily cornered. 
[pagebreak]
I think often of Dhaunayne's calm in the face of danger, her poise, her regality. I have none of it. The darkness I find myself in is deeper than Sheogorad's ruins. It suits me.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
今夜他们离得很近。并非我担心的猎人，而是强盗…… 或是其他逐腐而生的家伙…… 但终归是太近了。

他们的靴子踏在上方的石地上，震得我旧伤阵阵作痛。我已开始按自己的意志改造这片土地，挖掘狭窄的通道，让另一些通道坍塌，只留下一条通路，且每一步都设下陷阱。若猎人再度寻来，绝不可能轻易将我逼入绝境。
[pagebreak]
我时常想起道娜因面对危险时的镇定，她的从容，她的威严。这些我一点都没有。我身处的黑暗，比希奥戈拉德的废墟还要幽深。倒也合我心意。
</font>

original: Allows you to bypass apprentice or lower locks.
string: 可直接跳过学徒级及更低等级的锁具

original: I don't see the point in peace talks with the Stormcloaks. Their ideals are built on war; a treaty won't change that.
string: 我觉得和风暴斗篷和谈毫无意义。他们的理念建立在战争之上，一份条约改变不了什么。

original: I held my tongue for as long as I could, but one day she said something horrid, and I just couldn't look the other way...
string: 我忍了很久，但有一天她说了些混账话，我实在是忍无可忍……

original: You know the problem with archers, Listener? They don't understand. it's not about the kill, it's about the struggle.
string: 你知道弓箭手的问题出在哪吗，聆听者？他们根本不懂。暗杀的关键不在于杀戮本身，而在于那份挣扎的过程。

original: Maybe it'll look more appealing with fewer legs!
string: 要是少几条腿，说不定会好看点！

original: Enough! Guards! Rid me of this nuisance at once!
string: 够了！卫兵！立刻把这个烦人的家伙赶走！

original: It's not often you hear of positive dealings with Daedra. Taking it to the Altmer would likely be far safer.
string: 跟魔族打交道还能有好结果的，可不多见。把它交给高精灵，说不定要安全得多。

original: It's freezing in temperature, yet I feel there is a warmth to Dawnstar. I can understand those who settle here.
string: 这儿气温极低，但我感觉晨星城有种暖意。我能理解为什么有人愿意在这儿定居。

original:
Contract Kill a Vampire Province: High Rock Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] This vampire has been terrorizing a peaceful hamlet and the peasants are tired of waiting for a knight in shining armor, so they'll settle for an assassin in dark leather instead. Meet with the client and eliminate the Vampire. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名吸血鬼 省份： 落锤 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

original: Enough! Enough! This is senseless. And cruel. It's too much.
string: 够了！够了！这根本毫无意义，还这么残忍，太过分了。

original: Thanks again for saving me. I'll seek refuge at Old Hroldan - innkeeper there is a friend of mine. Swing by if you want to hear a story or two, eh?
string: 再次谢谢你救了我，我会去老赫洛丹找庇护，那里的酒馆老板是我的朋友。要是想听故事，就过来坐坐，好吗？
天际契约：杀死一位军团士兵（中等风险）

original: As you wish. You'd best be back for me soon.
string: 随你便。你最好赶紧回来找我。

original: In fact, I'd say you've got more experience than most thieves you'll find in Tamriel. After all, how many of them can claim to be Nightingales?
string: 事实上，我敢说你比泰姆瑞尔大多数小偷都有经验。毕竟，有多少小偷能自称是夜莺呢？

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="22">
PIRATES BEWARE!

<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
To any able warrior,
DAWNSTAR calls for aid!

Pirates have landed.. They raided Riften weeks ago; and now us here at Dawnstar. Bastards came through acting as Mercenaries; only to silently murder a few of our guards in the middle of the night.
Even stole food and supplies/weapons.

Riften clamied the pirates couldnt take much from them but that they did manage to steal one of their flags.
These men are dangerous and decieving. 

We sent scouts after them, but as if by some cursed magic, a mist storm swept in, blinding my men. One of my informants has warned me of pirates stirring along Skyrims coast flying Riftens flag, must be them.

The Captain of the Guard there is said to be mustering a response.

Make your way to Solitude if youre willing to assist! You will be handsomely compensated.

- Jarl of Dawnstar
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="22">
海盗当心！

<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
致所有勇武的战士：

晨星城亟待援手！

海盗已然登陆…… 数周前，他们洗劫了裂谷城，如今又将魔爪伸向了我们晨星城。这群混蛋伪装成佣兵混进城来，却在深夜暗中杀害了我们数名守卫，
甚至偷走了粮食、补给与武器。

裂谷城方面称，海盗并未从他们那里夺走太多东西，唯独一面城旗遭窃。

这群人阴险狡诈，穷凶极恶。

我们曾派斥候追踪他们，可仿佛受了诅咒魔法的驱使，一场浓雾风暴骤然袭来，让我的手下陷入了失明的境地。有密探向我预警，天际海岸一带出现了打着裂谷城旗帜活动的海盗，定然是这群恶徒无疑。

据说裂谷城的卫队长正集结人手，准备反击。

若你愿意伸出援手，便前往独孤城汇合吧！事成之后，定有重谢。

—— 晨星城领主
</font>

original: Tell me more about your father.
string: 再跟我讲讲你父亲的事。

original: What does it mean to become a Tarnished?
string: 成为 “黯痕者” 意味着什么？

original: I can't see why you'd ally with Hermaeus Mora to fight Miraak. It feels like fighting fire with lava.
string: 我不明白你为什么要和赫麦尤斯・莫拉结盟对抗米拉拉克。这感觉就像是以火攻火，只会更糟。

original: Hey, keep the shopkeep chatty. I'm gonna do some "browsing".
string: 嘿，跟老板多唠唠嗑，我去 “逛逛”。

original: Are you planning to test your steel? It's probably best if I don't get involved.
string: 你打算去比试身手？我还是别掺和了比较好。
力量书：诺德英雄誓约之刃

original: Do you really want to do this!?
My father gave it to her at the wellspring of the Karth. It was a simple trinket... yet it carried their love until I was born.
string: 父亲在卡尔特的泉源边把它送给了母亲。那只是个简单的小饰品…… 却承载着他们的爱，直到我出生。
召唤狗狗

original: Windhelm is a good example. Without the Dunmer, who would work the farms? Without the Argonians, who would work the docks?
string: 风舵城就是个很好的例子。没有暗精灵，谁来种地？没有亚龙人，谁来管码头？

original: Good luck with that forgery then.
string: 那祝你伪造文件顺利吧。

original: Glass armor doesn't sound particularly safe. If it shatters, say goodbye to your eyes.
string: 玻璃甲听着就不太安全，要是碎了，你的眼睛可就不保了。

original: I challenge you to a duel!

string: 赛瑞迪尔契约 | 低风险

original: Sitting by a forge is as well as sitting by a fire. Especially here in Windhelm.
string: 坐在锻造炉边，就跟坐在火炉边一样暖和，尤其是在风舵城这种地方。

original: Nevertheless, it's spacious and has all the necessities. I am grateful to be here.
string: 尽管如此，这儿很宽敞，必需品也一应俱全，能在这儿我很感激。

original: I promise to take excellent care of all your precious belongings.
string: 我保证会好好照看你所有宝贝东西的。

original: Return the sealed forgery to Aunt Gormli
string: 将密封的伪造文件归还给戈姆莉姨妈

original: Or Sotha Tum, a mix between Sotha Sil and Factotum, a little wordplay of some sort.
string: 或者索萨・图姆，是索萨・希尔和构装体的组合，算是一种文字游戏。

original: What kind of an Initiate do you want me to go out and look for?
string: 你想让我找什么样的新手？
法术书: 召唤剑齿虎

original: He wrote about being ill. About getting a new body to continue his research.
string: 他写下了自己病重的事，还有为了继续研究要换一副新身体的想法。

original: By using magical, or physical violence.
string: 可以通过魔法或物理攻击的方式。

original: I have found the Master Alchemist's backpack.
string: 我找到了炼金大师的背包。

original: Has a small chance to stagger the target.
Charming. Though better to cut right to the point I suppose...
string: 挺有意思的。不过我想，还是开门见山比较好……

original: I need more time to think.
Have you seen a young, one-eyed Breton wizard with a fancy ring staying here?
string: 你见过一个年轻的、独眼的布莱顿法师吗？他戴着一枚华丽的戒指，就住在这儿。

original: Find the journals that the students have left behind.
string: 找到学生们留下的日记。

original: This vale... So the stories are true! My kin refused to believe in this place, but somehow, I always knew it's real. Thank you, for bringing me here.
string: 这片山谷…… 原来传说都是真的！我的族人都不信有这个地方，但我一直知道它存在。谢谢你带我来这里。

original: With Miraak defeated, perhaps Solstheim can finally find peace. But knowing the Dunmer great clans' penchant for backstabbing, I doubt it.
string: 米拉拉克已被击败，索瑟海姆或许终于能迎来和平了。但以丹莫大家族背信弃义的性子，我对此深表怀疑。

original: If you need any help, let me know.
Vampiric Steel War Axe of Harrowing
The weather today is so nice. I love feeling the wind in my hair, and the sun on my freckles!
string: 今天天气真好，我喜欢风吹过头发的感觉，还有阳光洒在雀斑上的温暖！

original: Your presence is unauthorized! Please depart.
string: 你的出现未获授权！请离开。

original: But not any mother can talk to ghosts and cast deadly spells. You know... I'm trying to be a great woman like her. Do you think I've managed to?
string: 可不是每个母亲都能和鬼魂对话、施展致命法术的。你知道吗…… 我想成为像她一样伟大的女人。你觉得我做到了吗？

original: Give the "Amplifier: Lightning Touch" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：闪电之触” 交给构装体

original: Some stories say it cannot be stopped. Others say Hircine will descend to stem the tide. A few say it will be Peryite who turns back the Darkness.
string: 有些故事说这无法阻止，有些说海尔辛会降临力挽狂澜，还有少数说，是佩里廷将黑暗击退。

original: I'm just jesting. I'm glad you're okay.
string: 我开玩笑的，你没事就好。

original: Reported to Riften, we did. And from there, marched straight south. To the Valus. Our orders being to guard against a possible third front.
string: 我们奉命前往裂谷城，然后从那里径直南下，到瓦卢斯山脉。我们的任务是防范可能出现的第三条战线。

original: I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。
阿雷尼乌斯・瓦利西亚

original: You're not going to let any of them bite me, right?
string: 你不会让它们中任何一个咬到我的，对吧？

original: Come back so we can finish this!
I found some students' notes about ancient magic tomes they ventured to locate. They might be in danger, and there might be treasures to find. I should talk to Urag the Librarian.
string: 我发现了一些学生的笔记，里面写着他们冒险去寻找古老的魔法书。他们可能身处险境，而且说不定还有宝藏可寻。我该去和图书管理员乌拉格谈谈。

original: Good thing my time with you has hardened me. Sounds lovely, I'll go there in future.
string: 幸好和你在一起的日子让我变得坚强了。听起来不错，我以后就去那儿。

original: Here, take this amplifier. It should grant you the "lightning touch".
string: 拿着，这是增幅器。它能赋予你 “闪电之触” 的能力。

original: I won't be bested by a ball with arms!
string: 我才不会输给一个长着手的球！

original: No. I fought with some Nord heroes.
string: 没有，我是和一些诺德英雄并肩作战的。

original: I found someone to seal your forgery.
string: 我找到人帮你封印伪造文件了。

original: Not a problem Listener. You know, J'Faar has a keen eye for talent.
string: 没问题，聆听者。要知道，杰法尔看人很准的。

original: Tell the Emperor we're coming for him!
string: 告诉皇帝，我们来找他了！

original: You mean, all this time I've tried to hide my feelings... I could've just told you?
string: 你的意思是，这么久以来我一直隐藏自己的感情…… 其实我本可以直接告诉你的？

original: We really should consider burning our dead.
string: 我们真该考虑火葬死者。

original: That being said, I have never added "reading" to my set of skills, since it was never required of me before.
string: 话虽如此，我从未给自己添加过 “阅读” 技能，因为以前从没这个必要。

original: Is my hair too frizzy? Should I knot it up like I see the Nord women doing? No, right?
string: 我的头发是不是太蓬了？我该不该像诺德女人那样把它扎起来？还是不要了，对吧？

original: Dear me. What tender strokes of Mara are finally rousing  my stars?
string: 天呐。玛拉的温柔眷顾，终于要点亮我的星辰了吗？

original: We ought to do that again sometime.
string: 我们改天再这么干一场。

original: Look... I initially had a fear that us being... Romantic together would ruin our relationship. But I can't deny the way that I feel about you.
string: 听着…… 一开始我担心，我们要是发展成…… 恋人，会毁掉我们的关系。但我无法否认对你的感觉。
黑暗潮汐：神秘矮人遗迹

original: It wasn't how a Nord was trained to fight, and that made us all the more effective. It was then the Lone Legion earned its name and glory.
string: 这并非诺德人受训的战斗方式，也正因如此，我们的行动才更有效。也就是在那时，“孤独军团” 赢得了名号与荣耀。

original: I don't know you.  It's true.
Turns the wielder invisible for 20 seconds on a kill.
string: 击杀目标后，持有者获得 20 秒隐身效果

original: You've terrorized the realm long enough.
string: 你在这片土地上肆虐够久了。

original: Now you've killed the Emperor, and saved the Dark Brotherhood from treachery and destruction. Just as the Night Mother planned.
string: 如今你手刃了皇帝，将黑暗兄弟会从背叛与毁灭的边缘拉了回来。一切都如夜母所计划的那般。

original: I'm sure your fellow guild mates would appreciate that greatly. Just keep an eye out for any like Mercer who may want to squash your success.
string: 我相信你的公会同伴们会非常感激的。只是要留意那些像墨瑟一样想破坏你成功的人。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade has spotted a serious threat: <Alias=Bounty> hiding in <Alias=Hold>. Their work endangers Tamriel's balance. Get into their hideout and end it quietly. Your reward goes to the dead drop on success.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃已发现一桩严重威胁：<Alias=Bounty>正潜藏于<Alias=Hold>一带。其行径已危及泰姆瑞尔的平衡。潜入其藏身处，暗中终结这一威胁。任务成功后，报酬会送至秘密交接点。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade needs information from <Alias=Location>. Papers inside might reveal secrets about our enemies. Sneak in quiet, take the documents, and drop them at the nearest dead drop for your pay. Follow your instincts, but watch for guards.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃需要获取 <Alias=Location> 的相关情报，其内的文件或许能揭露我们敌人的秘密。悄悄潜入其中，取走文件后将其送至最近的秘密交接点，即可领取报酬。跟着你的直觉行动，但务必提防守卫。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: You look as beautiful as ever.

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade reveres your unbreakable resolve. You breached Castle Volkihar's icy gates, navigated their blood-soaked intrigues, and pierced the veil of their sun-eclipsing prophecy, a doomsday scheme that would have plunged Tamriel into perpetual night, empowering vampires to enslave the living and unravel every fragile peace we fight for. By thwarting it utterly, whether through Dawnguard steel or shadowed guile, you spared the world from frozen apocalypse, turning the tide against the undead plague.

You held firm where others would falter, protect Tamriel onward, legend of the dawn.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑为你钢铁般的意志深感敬服。你攻破了弗基哈尔城堡冰封的大门，在其浸满鲜血的阴谋旋涡中周旋，更戳穿了他们那遮天蔽日的日食预言 —— 这一末日计划本会将泰姆瑞尔拖入永恒长夜，让吸血鬼得以奴役生者，将我们竭力守护的脆弱和平尽数撕碎。你以黎明守卫的钢刃也好，凭潜行匿迹的智谋也罢，彻底挫败了这一阴谋，让世界免遭冰封末日的浩劫，更逆转了这场不死瘟疫带来的颓势。
他人动摇之时，你却坚守本心。继续守护泰姆瑞尔吧，破晓的传奇。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: You're an agent of Nocturnal? I am wary of this deadric prince. She once tried to invade the Clockwork City. But I will not stand in your way.
string: 你是诺克图娜尔的使者？我对这位迪德拉亲王心存戒备。她曾试图入侵发条城。但我不会阻拦你。

original: Are you sure you're hearing the right dead woman's voice in your head, and it's not Sheogorath playing some kind of trick on you?
string: 你确定你脑子里听到的是那位亡者女士的声音，而不是谢尔格拉在跟你耍什么把戏？

original: Exquisite. The weaving, the latent energies... a true masterwork to study.
string: 太精美了。这编织手法，这潜藏的能量…… 真是值得研究的杰作。

original: With the crown's power, bring your dreams to life.
string: 借助王冠的力量，让你的梦想化为现实。

original: I am flattered, Millie... But I cannot return the feelings.
string: 我很荣幸，米莉…… 但我无法回应这份感情。

original: I thought we were trying to be quiet.
string: 我还以为我们要保持安静呢。

original: And he's actually gone for good. I guess you proved brutal enough that he didn't need to stick around. Impressive, no? Or worrisome, maybe?
string: 他这次是真的彻底走了，看来你够狠，让他觉得没必要留下来了。挺厉害的，对吧？或者说，有点吓人？

original: I found Osvilda's ring in the pocket of an Argonian. I need to return it to her so she can seal Aunt Gormli's forgery.
string: 我在一个亚龙人兜里发现了奥斯维尔达的戒指。我得把戒指还给她，这样她才能给戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书盖章。

original: Now you really are the Last Dragonborn. I'm glad I don't have to rewrite anything! From now on, let's avoid going anywhere I can't follow, okay?
string: 现在你才是真正的末代龙裔，幸好我不用改写故事了！从现在起，别去那些我没法跟去的地方，好吗？

original: Summon Stalhrim Oathblade
string: 召唤魔冰誓约之刃

original: Every act in my family is motivated by greed and lust for power. It becomes rather tedious after sometime.
string: 我们家的每一个举动，都是受贪婪和权力欲驱使的，时间久了，真的很乏味。

original: Collect the two staff pieces then repair and restore the staff
string: 收集两个法杖碎片，然后修复并复原法杖

original: I have got the two staff pieces, put them back together and restored the staff, I now have to just take it.
string: 我找到了法杖的两个碎片，将它们重新拼接起来，修复好了法杖。现在我只需要把它拿走就行。

original: I knew you'd miss me. I'm ready when you are.
string: 我就知道你会想我。我随时可以出发。

original: It looks like a paralysis enchanted dagger might fit this slot.
string: 这柄麻痹附魔的匕首，看样子应该能适配这个插槽。

original: I suspect some can be found at Broken-Tusk Mine
string: 我猜断牙矿场能找到一些。

original: Ugh, a swamp. You take me to such nice places.
string: 呃，一片沼泽，你总带我来这种 “好地方”。

original: A long arc of lighting that does <mag> points of shock damage to Health and Magicka per second.
string: 一道长闪电弧，每秒对生命与法力造成<mag>点闪电伤害

original: Bleeds target <4> points. Frost damage health/stamina <24> points. Chance to disarm.
string: 使目标流血，造成 4 点持续伤害，24 点寒霜伤害（同时削减生命值和耐力值），有几率缴械目标。

original: I have found the cave where Orminlur and Yargul went to search for the Storm tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to them.
string: 我找到了奥敏卢尔和亚古尔前去寻找元素魔法・风暴卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚他们遭遇了什么。

original: Back to the great task of waiting.
string: 又要回到无尽的等待中了。

original: You must be far from home.
Summon Golden Oathblade
string: 召唤黄金誓约之刃

original: I'm glad to be of service to Nocturnal.
string: 能为诺克图娜尔效劳，我很荣幸。

original: My bad, allow me to move.
Oh, you'll have to be more specific than that, Listener.
string: 哦，你得说得再具体点才行，聆听者。

original: I've been sent by a friend to ask a favor.
string: 我受朋友所托，来求你帮个忙。

original: Conjure Werebear Thrall
string: 召唤熊人奴仆

original: You shall be my personal Silencer.
string: 你将成为我的专属沉默者。

original: Do we *have* to? Mages have it too easy, they just light everything on fire.
string: 我们非得选法师吗？法师的路也太轻松了，只会把一切都烧个精光。

original: Your size nor your steam intimidate me!
string: 你的体型和蒸汽吓不到我！

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Leeching
J'Faar argued we should hunt our enemies down, and kill them in their beds, but Alisanne preferred caution.
string: 杰法尔主张主动追杀敌人，在他们的卧榻之侧取其性命，但爱丽珊妮却选择谨小慎微。

original: You've proven yourself a skilled fighter, recognized by an ancient band of warriors. Aren't you a source of pride for me?
string: 你证明了自己是技艺高超的战士，还得到了古老战士团体的认可。你真是我的骄傲！

original: Come on then, show me what you've got.
string: 来吧，让我看看你都找到了些什么。

original:
Contract Kill a Knight Province: High Rock Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] This tenacious breton knight has been questing after an artifact that our client does not want to be found. Meet with the client and eliminate the Knight. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名骑士 省份： 落锤 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 这名坚韧的布莱顿骑士一直执着于追寻一件神器，而这件神器正是我们的雇主不愿让人发现的。 与委托人接头，铲除骑士. [pagebreak]

original: Conjurations spells last <mag>% less longer for <dur> seconds.
string: 召唤系法术持续时间缩短<mag>%，效果持续<dur>秒

original: I found the corpse of a vampire hunter in Deephowl Hollow, captured and killed by a vicious vampire clan. Their leader seems to have discovered a vile new form of corpse magic. I should look around and learn more about the horrible things that are happening here. In a note, the hunter also mentions a device he fabricated to extract Vampire Blood; a rare alchemical ingredient. I should try to locate this device.
string: 我在深嚎山谷发现了一名吸血鬼猎人的尸体，他遭一个凶残的吸血鬼氏族捕获杀害。这个氏族的首领似乎掌握了一种邪恶的新型尸体魔法。我该四处探查，更多地了解这里发生的恐怖事件。猎人的纸条里还提到，他制作了一个提取吸血鬼血液的装置 —— 一种稀有的炼金材料。我得设法找到这个装置。

original: Vaermina. My people know of her, and we fear her dreams. There is always a kernel of truth to her visions.
string: 瓦尔迷娜，我的族人都知道她，我们害怕她的梦境。她的幻象里总有一丝真实。

original: To write my own Great Song like the Vateshrans of old, of course. I'm already working on it - it's about you, y'know...
string: 当然是写一首像古代瓦特什兰那样的伟大歌谣啦。我已经开始写了 —— 告诉你哦，写的就是你……

original: That was certainly something. Come, let's find someone to stick with this dagger - an artifact like this ain't meant for the display case.
string: 刚才那场面可真够震撼的。来吧，找个人试试这把匕首 —— 这样的神器可不该被摆在展示柜里。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

A high-level source, whose name must remain buried even from you, has laid a burden upon Stendarr's Blade that no Vigilant or Blade of old could bear. The Dark Brotherhood's ragged remnants in Skyrim are about to receive a contract unlike any seen in centuries. It must be fulfilled, no matter the cost. The survival of the Empire itself hinges on that single, silent blade. I cannot reveal who entrusted us with this charge, only that their authority and will is absolute.

You must infiltrate the Dark Brotherhood. Earn their trust. Raise them from ruin. Guide their hand until the deed is done. When the contract is complete, the Brotherhood's purpose ends. Burn their shrines, silence their Night Mother, and scatter their ashes. Mercy in shadows demands it.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

有一位高层线人 —— 其名即便是对你也必须永远尘封 —— 向斯坦达尔之刃交付了一项重任，这份重担是过往的任何守誓者或刀锋战士都未曾背负过的。天际境内黑暗兄弟会的残部，即将接到一份数世纪以来前所未有的契约。无论付出何种代价，这份契约都必须得以履行，帝国的存续与否，便系于这柄无声的利刃之上。我无法透露将这一使命托付给我们的人是谁，只能告诉你，其权柄与意志不容置喙。

你必须潜入黑暗兄弟会，赢取他们的信任，将他们从覆灭的边缘扶起，引导他们的行动直至任务完成。待契约履行完毕，兄弟会的存在便失去了意义。届时，焚毁他们的圣坛，让夜母归于沉寂，将其残余势力彻底驱散。暗影中的慈悲，正要求我们如此行事。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: The Night Mother has been planning this day all along. We are all pawns in her great game, and you were the final piece.
string: 夜母早已策划好了这一天。我们都是她这场伟大棋局中的棋子，而你是最后那枚关键的棋子。

original: Can I carry something for you?

string: 恐惧会一直推着你前进。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Leeching

- Treasury -

Current Balance: <Global=MOD_Global_TreasuryTotal> Gold
-
Total Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepTotal> Gold
Projected Balance: <Global=MOD_Global_TreasuryProjected> Gold
-
Solvency Time: <Global=MOD_Global_TreasurySolvencyTime> Day(s)
string:
- 金库 -

当前余额：<Global=MOD_Global_TreasuryTotal> 

金币-总维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepTotal> 

金币预计余额：<Global=MOD_Global_TreasuryProjected> 

金币-偿付能力剩余时间：<Global=MOD_Global_TreasurySolvencyTime>天

original: Why would anyone but thieves and scoundrels live here? It's a den of chaos.
string: 除了小偷和无赖，谁会住在这里？这就是个混乱的窝点。

original: Though I agree. The Empire is on it's back foot, but it needs Skyrim's support to bring it back to full strength. The Thalmor know this.
string: 不过我同意你的看法。帝国现在处境艰难，但需要天际的支持才能恢复元气。梭默也明白这一点。

original: Here, take this amplifier. It should make you efficient with crossbows and bows.
string: 拿着，这是增幅器。它能让你更擅长使用十字弓和弓箭。

original: Your magic doesn't compare to mine!
string: 你的魔法根本比不上我的！

original: Actually, perhaps I had better introduce myself before I start requesting your help. I'm Laylana of Clan Valtara.
string: 其实，在请你帮忙之前，我最好还是先自我介绍一下。我是瓦尔塔拉氏族的莱拉娜。

original: Your undead servants won't save you!
string: 你的不死奴仆救不了你！

original: Sera. It is good to see a friendly face in this frozen wasteland. Three blessings to you, Outlander.
string: 大人。在这片冰封的荒原里见到一张友善的面孔，真是太好了。愿三神赐福于你，外乡人。

original: Interesting. Are you going to join them?
string: 有意思。你打算加入他们？

original:
Contract Kill a Redoran Guard Province: Morrowind Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] House Redoran has long been the martial arm of Morrowind, but there are some ambitious minor houses who wish to take their place by chipping away at Redoran power one soldier at a time. Meet with the client and eliminate the Redoran Guard. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名瑞多然守卫 省份： 晨风 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 瑞多然家族长久以来都是晨风当之无愧的军事支柱，以丹莫世袭守护者的名号镇守着这片土地的西疆与海岸。然而在这份荣光之下，野心勃勃的次要家族早已暗流涌动 —— 他们深知无法与瑞多然的大军正面对抗，便选择以蚕食之策步步紧逼，誓要将这颗军事巨头拖下王座。 与委托人接头，铲除瑞多然守卫. [pagebreak]

original: If you don't mind me asking, Listener, what ever became of our dear friend Motierre at the end of it all?
string: 恕我冒昧，聆听者，我们亲爱的朋友莫蒂埃最后结局如何？

original: It was the night Ulfric took Markarth. With the Nords at our gates, my parents only had time to grab myself and what we needed to survive.
string: 那是乌弗瑞克攻占马卡斯的那晚。诺德人兵临城下，父母只来得及带上我和生存必需的东西。

original: After that, those of us who survived made our way to Cyrodiil, and joined the few sanctuaries we had left.
string: 在那之后，我们这些幸存者前往赛瑞迪尔，加入了我们仅剩的几座圣所。

original: The missing apostle has written about going to Kagrumez. We have encountered a hostile factotum wearing a Dwemer armor. We should take it down before it tries to kill us.
string: 失踪的使徒留下文字说要去卡古梅兹。我们遇上了一个身披锻莫盔甲、充满敌意的构装体。得在它下杀手前，先把它解决掉。

original: Looks like you're having fun. Though frankly, you could be a little quieter. Glad to see they've not killed you yet.
string: 看来你玩得挺开心嘛。不过说实话，你可以小声点。还好他们还没把你杀了。

original: Yes go. Off with you. I can't have a snake in my own home.
string: 对，走。赶紧离开。我可容不得家里有个阴险小人。

original: He was quickly dismissed by his fellow acolytes, who were worried that his experiments would create atrocities.
string: 他很快就被其他信徒排斥了，他们担心他的实验会制造出可怕的东西。

original: Creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat for <dur> seconds.
string: 最高等级<mag>的生物和人逃离战斗<dur>秒。

original: I don't want to tire you out. Ask me again tomorrow.
string: 我不想把你累坏了，明天再问我吧。

original: Well, no one can say we aren't putting the work in.
string: 哼，没人能说我们没尽心尽力。

original: I've received a strange letter from a courier, I should read it and find out who it's from.
string: 我从信使那里收到了一封奇怪的信，我该读读看，弄清楚寄信人是谁。

original: We can't travel together right now.
string: 我们现在还不能一起旅行。

original:
Contract Kill a Lukiul Province: Black Marsh Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] Argonians raised in provinces outside of Black Marsh are often treated with hostility and suspicion when returning to their ancestral homeland by the nativist and xenophobic An-Xileel. They refer to them as "Lukiul" meaning the "Assimilated." Our client is a radical An-Xileel who wishes to see one of these poor Lukiul killed for refusing to abandon their foreign customs. Meet with the client and eliminate the Lukiul. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一位归化者 省份： 黑沼泽 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 在黑沼泽以外省份长大的亚龙人，回到先祖的故土时，往往会遭到奉行本土主义且排外的安-兹利尔组织的敌视与猜忌。该组织将这些亚龙人称作 “卢基尔”，意为 “归化者”。我们的雇主是一名激进的安 - 希列尔成员，他想要除掉一名拒绝抛弃外来习俗的可怜 “同化者”。 与委托人接头，铲除归化者. [pagebreak]

original: Slows undead enemies down and burns them for <mag> points for <dur> seconds.
string: 减缓不死生物敌人的速度，并对其造成灼烧伤害，每秒<mag>点，持续<dur>秒

original: Find the journal of Drelas the Enchanter
string: 找到附魔师德雷拉斯的日记

original: You do not have enough coins to place a stake.
string: 你没有足够的金币下注。

original: Ugh, the smell of mammoth cheese. You take me to such lovely places...
string: 呃，这猛犸奶酪的味道，你总带我来这种 “好地方”……

original: Aw, but things didn't work out so well for poor Astrid, did they?
string: 哎呀，不过可怜的艾斯特丽德下场可不怎么样，对吧？

original:
Contract Kill a Spell Knight Province: High Rock Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] From Shornhelm to Skyrim, this brave knight of the Crypt of Hearts has quested against a litany of wicked foes. One of these enemies has turned to the Black Sacrament to succeed where they could not and fell the mighty hero at last. Meet with the client and eliminate the Spell Knight. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名咒术骑士 省份： 落锤 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 这位高阶宫廷法师一直在涉足亡灵术这门黑暗技艺，但其效忠的领主却对此置之不理。于是，一名廷臣决定亲自出手 —— 举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除咒术骑士. [pagebreak]

original: Ah, so you're not their greatest supporter. I can understand that. I think it's difficult not to assess their behaviour as you grow older.
string: 啊，所以你不太支持他们。我能理解，人长大了，难免会审视父母的行为。

original: A honey estate and now a meadery? The guild must have a real hatred for drinking.
string: 先是蜂蜜庄园，现在又是蜜酒厂？公会怕是跟酒有仇吧。

original: Oh, that was rough. I could use a drink.
string: 哦，这仗打得够猛的。我得喝一杯。

original: The affairs of hags... And they wonder why Nords tend not to trust magic users.
string: 老巫婆的那些勾当…… 难怪诺德人都不太信任会魔法的人。

original: An amplifier? Great, I will install it during my next maintenance.
string: 增幅器？太好了，我会在下次维护时装上它。

original: Oh... Really? Um, that's sweet. I can't say I haven't thought about it myself.
string: 哦…… 真的吗？嗯，你真好。说实话，我自己也想过这件事。

original: I think this will be good for me.
string: 我觉得这对我会有好处。
前往钠查达克水下实验室

original: Just like before, give me a day and you may return for your custom robes tomorrow.
string: 和之前一样，给我一天时间，你明天就能来取定制长袍了。

original: Now, let's make sure it's all worth it and give Mercer the end he deserves.
string: 现在，我们要让这一切都值得，给墨瑟一个他应得的结局。

original: I know he went out to Dwemer ruins to fetch some Dwemer scraps, to fix the machines and to continue his research.
string: 我知道他去了锻莫遗迹，想找些锻莫碎片来修理机器，继续他的研究。

original: Honestly, I'm just keeping you for sentimental value. (Remove romance option)
string: 说实话，我留着你只是念旧罢了。（取消浪漫选项）

original: I'll find us someone who knows how to handle themselves.
string: 我会给我们找个身手不凡的人来。

original: Go with grace, Sera. May the ancestors watch over your path.
string: 愿你一路顺遂，大人。愿先祖守护你的前路。

original: Yes, I want to be more than just friends.
string: 是，我想和你不只是朋友。

original: Flames would come in handy right now!
There's so much work here now that Gormli is gone. So much...
string: 戈尔米走了之后，这儿的活一下子多了好多，好多啊……

original: Is that an amplifier? Thank you.
My mother used to tell stories about Blackreach. None of them ended well...
string: 我母亲以前讲过黑降的故事，没有一个结局是好的……

original: Really? Help out dear, droll Gormli? Why I haven't had this much luck since Bittsen fell down a well!
string: 真的吗？愿意帮我这乏味的戈尔米一把？自打比森掉进井里之后，我就没这么走运过！

original: You say that, but I somehow question its truth.
string: 你嘴上这么说，但我对你的话深表怀疑。

original: He bleeds. The End-Dragon bleeds. We can hunt him!
string: 他流血了，末日之龙居然流血了！我们能猎杀他！

original: Oh, so you enjoy being split in two!?
string: 哦，你很享受被劈成两半的滋味？！

original: I still remember my family's smiles. I wonder if Serana remembers hers... Thousands of years have passed, and time can sever many bonds.
string: 我还记得家人的笑容，不知道瑟拉娜还记不记得…… 几千年过去了，时间能斩断许多羁绊。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Captain,

The mage broke under my tools tonight, spilling secrets through his screams before death took him. Among his ramblings, one truth stood out: Anise, that old crone in the cabin west of Riverwood, is no mere hermit. He swore she's a witch, weaving dark spells in her cellar, hidden from Skyrim's eyes. Said she's gathering others like her, plotting something foul that could stir trouble for the Empire's hold here. I pressed him for more, but his heart gave out, weak fool.

You should send someone to check her cabin. If she's brewing chaos, we need to know what and who's with her. She's clever, so they'll need a sharp eye and a quiet step to catch her unawares.

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

致队长：

那名法师今晚在我的刑具下撑不住了，临死前的尖叫中吐露了不少秘密。他语无伦次的供词里，有一件事千真万确：河木镇以西小木屋中的老妪安尼斯，绝非普通的隐士。他发誓说安尼斯是个女巫，在自家地窖里暗施黑魔法，瞒过了天际所有人的眼睛。还说她正召集同党，策划着恶毒的阴谋，恐将动摇帝国在此地的统治。我逼他吐露更多细节，可他的心脏却停跳了，真是个懦弱的蠢货。

您应当派人去搜查她的木屋。若她真在酝酿祸乱，我们必须查清她的图谋，以及她的同伙都是些什么人。这老妇十分狡猾，前去调查的人得眼明手快、行动隐秘，才能打她个措手不及。

</font>

original: There isn't a soul in Windhelm who wouldn't respect the authority of its contents now.
string: 现在风舵城里，没人敢不把这信里的内容当回事。

original: Those Thalmor invaded our homeland and had the audacity to set up embassies. It's a shame I couldn't tear it down with you.
string: 那些梭默入侵我们的家园，还竟敢设立大使馆。真可惜我没能和你一起把它拆了。

original: The Elder Scroll is no parchment or vellum. The mere act of opening it requires a price eternal... Be careful, please. I won't lose you to it.
string: 古老卷轴不是普通的羊皮纸或牛皮纸，光是打开它就要付出永恒的代价…… 求求你小心点，我不想就这么失去你。
在断胫山隘找到瓦塔尔

original: I have found the Master Necromancer's backpack.
string: 我找到了亡灵巫师大师的背包。

original: Aside from this dragonslaying business, that is.
He kept the Empire together when all the forces in this world would have it broken!
string: 当整个世界都想分裂帝国时，是他让帝国保持完整！

original: As museums go, this is pretty pathetic.
string: 要说博物馆的话，这地方也太寒酸了。

original: However, Dwemer technology is considered "filthy" and "not on par" with Sotha Sil's automatons.
string: 然而，锻莫技术被认为 “粗劣” 且 “比不上” 索萨・希尔的自动机械。

original: Hmm... I can understand the perspective, but one could argue that their campaign here tells a different story.
string: 嗯…… 我能理解这种观点，但有人会说，他们在这儿的行动说明了另一个问题。

original: It is nothing personal. I am a Factotum, I cannot feel resentment.
string: 这并非私人恩怨。我是一台构装体，无法产生怨恨情绪。
秘闻 - 威瑟斯的日记 2

original: That might just be the easiest work we've ever done for something so valuable, getting a shard of a Daedric artifact from a simple miller...
string: 从一个普通磨坊主手里拿到魔族神器的碎片，这可能是我们为了这么贵重的东西做过的最轻松的活了……

original: We may go down in history as heroes yet.
string: 我们或许会以英雄之名载入史册。

original: Oh, good, I was worried you weren't coming back!
string: 哦，太好了，我还担心你不回来了呢！
高岩契约 | 极高风险
夏暮岛契约 | 低风险
审判官塔楼地下室钥匙

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Mistress Sybille

Your disguise as Lirael is a masterpiece that would impress Molag Bal. Wearing that dead Thalmor's face to bend the Dominion to you? You twist their pride into your weapon, elven fools blind to their "leader's" whispers.

Your doubles fool them, your hand turns their knives to clear your path in Solitude. Hags and necromancers gather under your hidden flag, sowing trouble as you rule from the palace shadows. How long have you held power there, unseen queen?
But this killer thins our lines. Guard your mirrors; their blade cuts close. If Lirael falls, I trust your deeper disguise holds your throne. My coven waits, send word, we'll bleed for your night.

In Blood and Shadows,
Volkrov

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

致西比尔女士：

你化身莉瑞尔的伪装堪称杰作，就连莫拉格・巴尔见了恐怕也会为之赞叹。顶着那名死去梭默的脸，竟能让先祖神洲对你言听计从？你将他们的傲慢化作自己的武器，这些精灵蠢货对其 “领袖” 的低语竟毫无察觉。

你的替身骗过了所有人，你暗中操纵他们的刀斧，为自己在独孤城扫清了前路。女巫与死灵法师皆集结在你隐秘的旗帜下，而你于宫殿的暗影中掌权，让祸乱悄然滋生。你在那里掌权已有多久了，这位不为人知的女王？

但那名杀手正在不断削减我们的势力。守好你的幻化之镜吧，其利刃已步步逼近。若莉瑞尔的身份败露，我相信你更深层的伪装足以保住你的权位。我的女巫集会已整装待发，只需你一声令下，我们便会为你的暗夜大业浴血奋战。

以鲜血与暗影之名，
沃尔克罗夫

</font>

original: I want to spend my life with you. I care about you more than anything. (Romance)
string: 我想和你共度一生，我在乎你胜过一切。（发展浪漫关系）

original: I hope you have my back in here. I don't want to be snatched away. I'm not sure my father would pay the ransom.
string: 希望你在这儿掩护我，我可不想被抓走，我不确定父亲会不会付赎金。

original: Ah yes, this must all just be superstitious nonsense.
string: 啊，没错，这些肯定都是迷信的废话。

original: Deliver the infomation to a dead-drop
string: 将情报送到秘密投放点

original: Find out what is happening in Deephowl Hollow
string: 查明深嚎山谷发生了什么

original: I don't see any other explanation.
A fair trade. You risk your neck; I apply my unique skill. I will craft for you a version of dragon cultist robes, tailored to your liking.
string: 公平交易。你豁出性命，我施展绝技。我会为你打造一件拜龙教长袍，按你的喜好定制。

original: Fine. If you wouldn't hear reason, what use is it to sing to a cow?
string: 行吧。既然你不听劝，那对牛弹琴又有什么用？

original: Just another set of cultist robes, right?
string: 只是又一套教团长袍罢了，对吧？
我想或许不是这样。但是……

original: Hmm, I suppose not. Unless you're secretly a coward and I don't know it. But I think that's unlikely.
string: 嗯，应该不会吧。除非你其实是个胆小鬼，只是我没发现而已。不过我觉得这不可能。

original: What can I do to help?
Hello. You are a different type of clientele in this bar, I suppose.
string: 你好。我猜你在这酒馆里，算是与众不同的客人。

original: Dragon cult ruins are so fascinating. Often useful, too - what with the treasures, lost lore, and dragon bones...
string: 拜龙教遗迹太迷人了，而且往往很有用 —— 有宝藏、失传的知识，还有龙骨……
宝箱钥匙 - 海盗船长 1 号

original: Yes. I wager that is a positive thing. I simply mean that a great deal of my family are quite well aged. I am the youngest, but suffer many cousins.
string: 没错。我敢说这也算是件好事。我只是想说，我们家的长辈大多都年事已高。我是家里最小的，表亲却多得很。

original: I can hardly believe it. The friend I've known all my life is a Dragonborn, just like Talos himself!
string: 我简直不敢相信。我相识一生的朋友，竟然是龙裔，就像塔洛斯本人一样！

original: It's the right thing to do.
I think the Emperor's death will make for a better future.
string: 我认为皇帝的死会带来更美好的未来。

original: That�s what I was hoping you�d say.
The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Wary Citizens
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：市民警惕

original: What is the subject of his research?

<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
Gawayne, 

While the Cronvangr are certainly open to alliances with other clans, so long as said other clans respect our position as the rightful rulers of the Old Holds, we must reject your proposal. Your way of speech suggests you are still young by the standards of our kind, and thus, the second Gray Host may be nothing but ancient history to you, but many of us lived through that time, and we remember the aftermath of Rada al-Saran's failure: the mortals of Skyrim rallied together in a campaign of extermination and nearly wiped out our kind. Vampires are meant to hide in the shadows like spiders, not to openly conquer the mortals as an army. All who have tried in the past have failed, and you will be no different.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
加韦恩：

克隆万格部族固然愿意与其他部族结盟，但前提是这些部族承认我们作为旧领地合法统治者的地位。基于此，我们不得不拒绝你的提议。从你的言辞中能看出，以我们族类的标准来看，你尚且年轻，或许第二次灰影军团对你而言不过是段远古历史，但我们当中不少人亲历过那个时代，也铭记着拉达·萨兰失败后的惨状：天际的凡人联合起来展开了一场灭绝之战，险些将我们族类彻底铲除。吸血鬼本就该如蜘蛛般潜伏于阴影之中，而非以军队的形式公然征服凡人。古往今来，所有试图这么做的人都以失败告终，你也绝不会例外。
</font>

original: Don't worry, I'm taking good care of our home.
string: 别担心，我把我们的家照顾得很好。

original: I'll report back with my findings.
string: 我会把调查结果汇报给你。

original: Thank the Gods I have Nord blood in me, otherwise I'd be freezing to death.
string: 谢天谢地我身上流着诺德人的血，不然早就冻僵了。

original: With Madanach free, maybe we'll finally stop killing each other and reclaim our homeland together. Wishful thinking, I know - but a girl can dream.
string: 既然迈德纳奇重获自由，或许我们终于能停止内斗，一起夺回故乡了。我知道这可能是痴心妄想，但女孩总是可以做梦的。

original: I don't think the Companions has room for magic users.
string: 我觉得战友团可容不下魔法使用者。

original: With satisfaction now, and endless knowing, we scythed our way from Cheydinhal clear up to the Imperial walls.
string: 我们心中满是快意，带着必胜的信念，从香丁赫尔一路杀回帝国的城墙下。

original: All this grandeur, now tarnished by the Stormcloaks. Are you proud of that?
string: 曾经的宏伟，如今被风暴斗篷玷污。你为此感到骄傲吗？

original: Ugh... I thought better of you.
string: 呃…… 我对你太失望了。

original: A gigantic metallic city in an enclosed space... It reminds me of the Clockwork City...
string: 一座巨大的金属城市藏在封闭空间里…… 这让我想起了发条城……

original: Don't let them near your neck!
string: 别让他们靠近你的脖子！
让虚空吞噬你，风暴斗篷的杂碎！

original:
Contract Kill a Murderer Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] This client wants justice for their family member's murder. So they've contracted us, a guild of remorseless killers, to hunt down the remorseless killer and kill them. The irony is to die for. Meet with the client and eliminate the Murderer. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名杀人犯 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 这位雇主为家人被谋杀一事寻求正义，于是委托了我们 —— 一个冷酷无情的杀手公会，去追拿那名冷血凶手并将其处决。这其中的讽刺意味简直令人拍案叫绝。 与委托人接头，铲除杀人犯. [pagebreak]

original: What a lovely staircase. It'd be an awful shame if we had to climb it. Okay, fine. I'm sure the views are worth it.
string: 这楼梯可真 “好看”，要是非得爬上去就太可惜了。好吧，行，我相信上面的风景值得一看。

original: Now, I must ask... Why the Stormcloaks?
string: 现在，我得问问…… 为什么选风暴斗篷？

original: I don't feel comfortable here. The architecture doesn't make up for the ignorance of the people.
string: 我在这儿感觉很不自在，再美的建筑也弥补不了人们的愚昧。
沉默者居所（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: Summerset Isles Contract: Kill a Thalmor Spy (Medium-Risk)
string: 夏暮岛契约：杀死一位梭默间谍（中等风险）
威木省契约：杀死一位绿语者（高风险）

original: Let's find this star then. I don't know much of Azura, but Sindan always said the Daedra cannot be trusted.
string: 那我们去找这块星石吧。我对阿祖拉了解不多，但辛丹总说魔族不可信。

original: Triggered by nearby enemies, the rune explodes for <mag> points of fire damage.
string: 敌人靠近时触发，符文将会爆发，并造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: Anywhere and everywhere. I would relish the opportunity to witness scenic views and magnificent architecture. Whenever you recommend.
string: 无论何处都好，我很乐意去看看美景和宏伟的建筑，你推荐就行。
准备好后即可开始交易。

original: Ulfric... He and his lot murdered so many of my kin. I never got to meet my grandparents because of him! Let's leave before I do something rash.
string: 乌弗瑞克…… 他和他的人杀了我好多族人，我连祖父母都没见过，都是因为他！我们赶紧走，不然我怕我做出冲动的事。

original: The Telvanni are not known for generosity. We'd best prepare for whatever absurd demands Neloth may make.
string: 特尔瓦尼家族从不以慷慨闻名。我们最好做好准备，应对内洛思提出的各种荒唐要求。

original: A nice view, to be sure, but also awfully out in the open. We found these Forsworn easily enough, yet the Nord soldiers somehow didn't?
string: 景色确实不错，但也太暴露了，我们轻易就找到了这些弃誓者，诺德士兵怎么就没发现？

original: Summons a Fire Wyrm for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指定的位置召唤一个火焰巨龙，持续<dur>秒。

original: I have infiltrated the sanctuary, however I found a gate blocking the way, I should find a way to open it.
string: 我潜入了那座圣所，却发现一道大门挡住了去路。我得想办法打开这扇门。
召唤泥沼蟹

original: You didn't answer me... You a hunter?
string: 你没回答我…… 你是猎人吗？

original: The Thieves Guild has struggled because of Mercer Frey's betrayal, and it will all end with him.
string: 盗贼公会因墨瑟・弗雷的背叛而陷入困境，而这一切终将因他而结束。

original: Just don't let it change you too much. I'm just getting to like this version of you.
string: 别让这事改变你太多，我才刚喜欢上这样的你。

original:
Contract Kill an Abusive Spouse Province: High Rock Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] After years of living in fear, this client has finally had enough and performed the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Abusive Spouse. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名施暴配偶 省份： 落锤 难度： 高风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 这位乖戾的游吟诗人，总在当地酒馆里用满是诽谤的旋律诋毁王国的贵族男女。终于有位贵族忍无可忍，决意举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除施暴配偶. [pagebreak]

original: No disrespect to your fellow students, but I'm not sure they could complete this task...
string: 无意冒犯你的同学，但我不确定他们能完成这个任务……

original: Seeing these tunnels where the mages practiced dark magic in secret - it seems more likely that they might've had something to do with the Collapse.
string: 看到这些法师偷偷练习黑魔法的隧道，我越来越觉得大崩塌可能跟他们脱不了干系。

original: The city of stone and secrets. My father always said nothing good ever came out of Markarth. Not hard to see why.
string: 石与秘密之城，我父亲总说马卡斯从来不会有什么好事，现在看来果然如此。

original: Few better things than ridding Skyrim of strife and restoring the rule of law.
string: 没什么比终结天际的纷争、恢复法治更棒的了。

original: Oh, if only I could seal that summons...
string: 唉，要是我能把这封征召令封上印就好了……

original: Ah. Well, then. Let me know if you need anything.
string: 好吧。那要是有什么需要，尽管说。

original: Under the sun and sky, outlander. You look like you could use a new set of robes.
string: 在外奔波的人啊，看你样子，该换身新长袍了。

original: The spirits here are weeping. So many Reachfolk lost to the Nords, then to their own kinsmen... It's tragic.
string: 这里的灵体在哭泣，太多边塞人死于诺德人之手，又死于自相残杀…… 太可悲了。

original: You've broken my heart. Please, I never want to see you again.
string: 你伤透了我的心，求你了，我再也不想见到你。

original: Where to next? We still have a lot of Tamriel to explore.
string: 下一站去哪儿？泰姆瑞尔还有好多地方等着我们探索呢。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Evoking
For ages we've helped our people persist. My mother trained me in our forebears' ways, and I am honored to be counted among their number.
string: 千百年来，我们一直帮助族人存续。母亲将先祖的智慧传授给我，我很荣幸能成为传承者之一。

original: The Dark Brotherhood? I'm not sure I know what that is. It doesn't sound pleasant.
string: 黑暗兄弟会？我都不知道那是什么东西。听着就不是什么好路数。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
It is not enough. The ruin is deep enough for the dark to be pitch. Yet still I taste their pursuit. Looking. Searching. It never ends!

I have broken open the barrow floor and found older corridors. I will go lower, always lower, until no sound from the surface can reach me. I drink only from those who wander foolishly into my maze. I have not seen the moons in... years? Decades? I think of Ashmelech less now, for the memory burns me.
[pagebreak]
If Dhaunayne lives, she will not know me. Nor would I know her. The deep earth is my only kin now. It shall hide me forever.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
这还不够。这处废墟虽深，黑暗浓如墨汁，可我仍能嗅到他们追踪的气息。窥探、搜寻，永无止境！
我砸开了古墓的地面，发现了更古老的廊道。我要往更深处去，一直往下，直到地表的任何声响都传不到我耳中。我只饮那些愚蠢闯入我迷宫之人的血。我已许久…… 数年？数十年？没见过双月了。如今我很少想起阿什梅莱克，只因回忆灼心。
[pagebreak]
若道娜因还活着，她定认不出我，我也同样认不出她。这幽深的地底，是我如今唯一的亲人。它会将我永远藏匿。
</font>

original: My days as an apostle of the Clockwork City are now long gone. I still wish to return there eventually, but my research in Vvardenfell and Solstheim has been too successful to stop now. I decided journaling my findings, as a proof of work, as a proof of my achievements out of the city, as a way to get them to accept me back as one of their apostles. They thought an exile would end me, but it is just the start of my real journey!
string:
我身为发条城使徒的岁月，早已是过眼云烟。

我仍期盼终有一日能重返故土，但我在瓦登费尔与索瑟海姆的研究进展斐然，实在无法中途停歇。于是我决定将研究成果记录成册 —— 既是工作的实证，也是我离城之后仍有建树的证明，更希望借此让他们重新接纳我，再度成为使徒中的一员。

他们以为一场放逐便能将我摧垮，殊不知，这不过是我真正旅程的开端！

original: I collected the Dwemer schematics from Valin's bag. I should travel to Kagrumez and see if I can locate any trace of Valin or the Lexicon mentioned in his notes.
string: 我从瓦林的包里找到了锻莫设计图纸。我应该前往卡古梅兹，看看能否找到瓦林的踪迹，或是他笔记中提到的方典（词典）。

original: I knew it would take some convincing, but I didn't think this would result in a peace council. You better sharpen that silver tongue.
string: 我就知道得费些口舌，但没想到会搞出个和平会议。你最好把你的巧舌磨利点。

original:
Contract Kill a Stormblade Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] The mightiest Stormcloak soldiers are honored with the title of Stormblade, they are the vanguards of the Stormcloak rebellion, and our client wishes to see this one killed. Meet with the client and eliminate the Stormblade. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名风暴之刃 省份： 天际 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 风暴斗篷军中最骁勇善战的士兵会被授予风暴之刃的称号，他们是风暴斗篷叛乱的先锋主力，而我们的雇主决意要取其中一人的性命。 与委托人接头，铲除风暴之刃. [pagebreak]

original: Hircine's hairy paws, what a sight!
string: 海尔辛的毛爪子啊，这景象太壮观了！

original: A quiet night - I find comfort in it.
string: 宁静的夜晚 —— 我在其中找到了慰藉。

original: Lead the way. I am right behind you.
Well now, you're vile aren't you!?
Triggered by nearby enemies, the rune explodes for <mag> points of fire damage.
string: 敌人靠近时触发，符文将会爆发，并造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: Don't play the fool with me. This writing is by your hand. Down to the letter.
string: 别跟我装傻。这字迹明明就是你写的，一笔一划都分毫不差。

original: I have found a note in the Solitude sewers... A problem though is that I could barely make out what it said as it was very damp and the writing faded. All I could read was something about a secret switch between the tavern and somewhere else. I'll have to look for that switch.
string: 我在独孤城的下水道里发现了一张纸条…… 可麻烦的是，纸条受潮严重，字迹都模糊了，我几乎看不清内容。只能勉强辨认出，上面提到了酒馆和另一处地方之间有个秘密开关。我得去找找这个开关。

original: Resist 10% of Magic and Regenerate Magicka 15% faster for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，魔法抗性提升 10%，法力值恢复速度加快 15%。

original: Betrayal, she called it, but it is I who was betrayed!
string: 她说这是背叛，但真正被背叛的人是我！

original: Ooh, a cave. I wonder what loot we'll find in there... And what we'll have to hunt in order to take it.
string: 哦，一个洞穴，不知道里面能找到什么宝藏…… 还有我们得猎杀什么才能拿到这些宝藏。

original: Yes, I suppose I've adequately spilled my guts enough for one day.
string: 好了，我想今天的心里话已经说得够多了。

original: You must wait 24 hours before Listener's Wrath can be used again.
string: 聆听者之怒需等待 24 小时后才能再次使用。

original: Anyway, that's enough chatter. As my pa used to say - "glory fleets if we stand in inaction."
string: 好了，废话少说。我爹常说 ——“坐而不动，荣耀即逝”。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Fultheim, Steadfast Brother,

Old memories weigh heavy, but your quiet watch here honors our fire-forged oath. I oversee our scattered family, Blades reborn in Stendarr's name to escape the slaughter. Your blade rests, but eyes stay keen.

A new agent walks Skyrim's roads, their careful steps might heal our breaks. If they seek advice, give it shadowed; trust earns slow. Don't let mead blunt your aim; mercy calls us to shield the weak. Hold steady, friend.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

致忠贞的兄弟弗瑟姆：

往昔的记忆沉甸甸地萦绕心头，但你在此地的默默守望，无愧于我们以烈火铸就的誓言。如今我统领着我们离散的族人，刀锋战士以斯坦达尔之名重获新生，只为逃离那场屠杀。你的利刃虽暂归鞘，目光却依旧锐利。

一名新的特工正行走于天际的道路上，其谨慎的行动，或许能弥补我们的裂痕。若此人前来求教，便在暗中指点一二吧；信任的建立，向来需要时间。莫让蜜酒消磨了你的准头，慈悲召唤着我们去守护弱者。坚守住，朋友。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Surely we can have this conversation standing up?
Let's hope this sacrifice was worthy of Namira. I'll make a few offerings of my own tonight. Congratulations... Champion of Namira.
string: 希望这份祭品能让娜米拉满意。我今晚也会亲自献上几份祭品。恭喜你…… 娜米拉的勇士。
去死吧，鸟…… 女人…… 鬼东西！

original: You weren't given much choice, it seems. How are you feeling about everything that just happened?
string: 看起来你没什么选择。你对刚才发生的一切感觉如何？

original: Recruitment Complete: The Speaker of the Whiterun Sanctuary has returned with a new Initiate.
string: 招募完成：白漫城圣所的传声者带回了一名新学徒。

original: If you could get it back, that'd be favor enough to grant yours, I'd say.
string: 如果你能把它找回来，那我就欠你个人情，帮你这个忙也无妨。

original: This is so humiliating. What am I supposed to do now?
string: 这太丢人了，我现在该怎么办？

original: I wonder what this evening will bring us.
string: 不知道今晚又会有什么际遇。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Battleaxe of Harrowing
Oh... I understand. That was my fear too. Okay, just pretend I didn't say anything.
string: 哦…… 我懂了，我也有过这样的担心。好吧，就当我什么都没说。

original: Millie, can you tell me more about our childhood?
string: 米莉，能跟我多说说我们的童年吗？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Honourable Matriarch,

Lirael is dead. She has been since she reached Skyrim's shores. I knew her in Alinor; she wasn't like this. The fake uses illusions, deals with foul powers, not like her at all. Someone impersonates her, fooling us all.

She vanished recently after an assassination where her double died. She raged about decades wasted, but she hasn't even been in this blasted province for that long. She said she'd hide with an old friend till the killer was caught, messages to be sent to her via Lord Volkrov. Trusting that vampire more than us damns her more than anything else.

I suspect I know who it is, I am checking a lead at Fort Neugrad to confirm it. Here's my cipher as good faith. When I return, we must end the imposter for good.

Acanthus

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

致尊敬的女族长，

莉瑞尔已死。她早在踏上天际省的土地时，便已殒命。我在艾利诺曾与她相识，她绝非如今这般模样。这个冒牌货擅用幻术，还与邪恶势力勾结，和真正的她判若两人。有人冒充她的身份，将我们所有人都蒙在鼓里。

近来，一场刺杀行动中她的替身殒命，之后这个冒牌货便销声匿迹了。她还怒斥数十年的时光被白白浪费，可她根本就没在这该死的省份待过那么久。她声称要躲到一位老友处，直至刺杀者落网，还说所有消息都要通过沃尔克罗夫勋爵转达给她。她对那吸血鬼的信任，远比任何事都更让她万劫不复。

我心中已对冒充者的身份有了猜测，眼下正前往纽格拉德要塞追查一条线索，以证实我的判断。附上我的密码本，以示诚意。待我归来，我们必须彻底终结这个冒牌货的行径。

阿坎萨斯

</font>

original: Too much, my friend... Every last bit of detail. The Divines have blessed me with a good memory after all.
string: 太多了，朋友…… 每一个细节都记得。毕竟众神赐予了我好记性。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
Dear Maxima,

We regret to inform you that while we respect your desire to celebrate Imperial history, we have decided to decline your request to create copies of the original Oathblade texts at this time.

Thank you for understanding.

Iskandar the Chronicler
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
致马克西芒：

兹谨告知，尽管我们尊重你弘扬帝国历史的心意，但目前仍决定驳回你复制誓约之刃原始典籍的请求。

望你理解。

史官伊斯坎达尔
</font>

original: What would you say your skills are?
string: 你觉得自己擅长什么技能？

original: This traveling business is certainly dangerous.
The Wolf-Dance! Hircine's hunt is upon us!
string: 狼之舞！海尔辛的狩猎开始了！

original: These wooden floors have seen enough.
string: 这些木地板已经承受太多了。

original: Cowards and curses! That's all magicka is for! Give me an axe over a spell tome anyday!
string: 懦夫的把戏，恶毒的诅咒！魔法也就这点用处！比起法术书，我宁愿拿把斧头！

original: Smell that? Vampires about, look sharp.
string: 闻到了吗？有吸血鬼，小心点。

original: Two-Handed? Now that sounds delightful, I bet the blood gets everywhere. Hehehe.
string: 双手武器？听着就带劲，我打赌到时候血会溅得到处都是。嘿嘿嘿。

original: You let your Listener die, I hope you'll do a better job from now on.
string: 你让你的聆听者死了，希望你今后能做得更好。

original: Increases your Magicka by <10>, then double the bonus for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped
string: 你的法力值增加 10 点，每多装备一件雪王子盔甲，该加成便会翻倍。

original: I'd like to improve the sanctuary.
Ooooh I'd love to find us a new family member Listener. I know how to spot people with an appetite for our... unique line of work.
string: 哦，我超想为我们找个新家人的，聆听者。我知道怎么找出那些对我们…… 特殊行当有兴趣的人。

original: In my apostle's case, he was "too much to handle" for his fellow apostles, so he became a Tarnished.
string: 至于我的使徒，他对其他使徒来说 “太难管教”，所以成了一名 “黯痕者”

original: Conjure Potent Ice Wraith Draugr Ally
string: 召唤强化冰怨灵尸鬼盟友

original:
- Azala's Prayer added for 7 days - 
 - Fotified Marksman, Stealth and Stamina Regeneration -
string: “- 获得阿扎拉的祷言，持续 7 天 -

original: I, uh... I don't travel well by sea. Okay, fine. I'll come. But don't expect me to keep my food down.
string: 我…… 我坐船会晕。好吧，行，我跟你去。但别指望我不会吐。

original: Dark Tides: Letter From the Jarl - Falkreath
string: 黑暗潮汐：领主的来信 - 佛克瑞斯

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade found a threat on Solstheim: Morag Tong assassins in Raven Rock plan to kill Councilor Morvayn, stirring chaos that hurts the island's people and Tamriel's peace. Should you find yourself on Solstheim, approach the council in Raven Rock, uncover their plot, and stop the killing quietly if you can.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑已察觉索瑟海姆存在威胁 —— 鸦石镇有魔拉格堂刺客图谋刺杀莫尔凡议员。此举意在挑起混乱，不仅会残害岛上民众，更将危及泰姆瑞尔的和平。若你前往索瑟海姆，可设法接触鸦石镇议会，揭露刺客的阴谋；若有可能，便不动声色地阻止这场杀戮。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: A sad farewell for an honorable man. A shame he cannot rest as he wishes.
string: 一位可敬的人就此逝去，真可惜他不能如愿安息。

original:
- Bankruptcy -

The Dark Brotherhood has gone bankrupt!

You will not be able to recruit initiates, purchase sanctuary upgrades, assign contracts, or use your Listener powers while the guild's treasury is bankrupt. To get out of bankruptcy simply add funds to the treasury yourself by interacting with your guild ledger.

If you're struggling to deal with expenses, try banishing some of your members to reduce upkeep.
string:
- 破产 -
黑暗兄弟会已宣告破产！
在公会金库处于破产状态期间，你将无法招募新入门者、购买圣所升级、分配契约任务，也不能使用聆听者的特殊能力。若要摆脱破产困境，只需通过与公会账簿互动，自行向国库注入资金即可。
如果你难以承担各项开支，可尝试驱逐部分成员以降低维护成本。

original: Two-Handed, ugh. Well they're not very stealthy, but I suppose they reach their target all the same.
string: 双手武器，呃。这玩意儿可不怎么适合潜行，不过我想照样能击中目标就是了。

original: Would you like to move in with me?
string: 你愿意搬来和我一起住吗？

original: I've been around for a long time, mind you. I joined the Dark Brotherhood at the turn of the Fourth Era, just as the Oblivion Crisis had ended.
string: 说起来，我活了很久了。第四纪元初，湮灭危机刚结束，我就加入了黑暗兄弟会。

original: Why, she's standing right before me... The princess in distress.
string: 哎呀，受难的公主就站在我面前呢……

original: My kinswoman died. Things won't be the same without her.
string: 我的同族姐姐去世了。没有她，一切都不一样了。

original: Ask the innkeepers of Skyrim about the missing apprentice
string: 向天际的酒馆老板打听失踪学徒的消息

original: I'd say this is quite befitting of you, given the person that I've gotten to know. I'm sure Riften will be delighted to have you running rampant.
string: 要我说，以我对你的了解，这倒挺适合你的。我相信裂谷城会很乐意看到你在这儿横行霸道。

original: A bounty was placed on <Alias=Wizard>'s apprentice, who fled with a ring of dangerous power. I learned from <Alias=RandomInnKeeper> that he had indeed rented a room - and there I found his journal. The writings reveal he discovered the ring's power and intended to use it for revenge against a bandit chief. If I wish to recover the ring, I should track down this bandit leader.
string: 有人悬赏捉拿 <Alias=Wizard> 的学徒，此人盗取一枚蕴含凶险力量的戒指后潜逃。我从 < Alias=RandomInnKeeper > 口中得知，那学徒确实在这儿租过房间 —— 我还在房里找到了他的日记。日记里写着，他发现了戒指的力量，打算用它向一名强盗首领复仇。要是我想拿回戒指，就得去追查这个强盗头子的踪迹。

original: Thank you for the amplifier. It will be very useful.
string: 谢谢你的增幅器，它会非常有用。

original: One day, if I return to the Clockwork City, I hope you will still be by my side. I do want to show you where I used to work.
string: 如果有一天我回到发条城，希望你还能在我身边。我想带你看看我曾经工作的地方。

original: Drinking contest, hmm? Well, I guess I'll just be over here, competing with myself...
string: 拼酒大赛？好吧，那我就在这儿跟自己比……

original: So you're still in the business of sailing?
string: 这么说你还在做航海生意？
哦，这听起来可太不妙了……

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
D,

As discussed, I have heard from a reliable source that Laylana has made her way to Skyrim. I am informed that she has been spotted along the road to Riverwood from Whiterun.

Bring her to me and you will be well rewarded for your efforts. You know I am a good friend to those that serve me well.

Should our information reveal itself to be false, destroy the one who provided it to us.

- V
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
D，

如我们此前商议，我从可靠渠道获悉，莱拉娜已现身天际省。消息称，有人在白漫城通往河木镇的路上见过她的踪迹。

将她带来见我，你的付出定能得到丰厚回报。你该清楚，对我忠心效力之人，我向来待之不薄。

若最终证实消息有误，便去解决那个提供情报的人。

——V
</font>
天际契约：杀死一位小偷（低风险）

original: Summons a Dragonbone Oathkeeper for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把龙骨誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: Yeah, when we got separated near Skyrim's border, then the Legionnaire got me.
string: 是啊，我们在天际边境走散后，帝国军团的人就抓住了我。

original: He wanted so desperately to create the perfect machine that he became one.
string: 他如此迫切地想要创造完美的机器，最终自己却变成了机器。

original: What is this place? Are these actually buildings? It's so different than everything I've seen!
string: 这是什么地方？这些真的是建筑吗？和我见过的一切都不一样！

original: How'd the letter fare for your friend?
string: 你朋友的那封信结果怎么样了？

original: Will do. I have plenty of them, after all.
string: 会的。毕竟我点子多着呢。

original: I hope Esbern proves less manipulative than Delphine. He better be honest with us.
string: 希望艾斯本不像德尔菲娜那么工于心计。他最好对我们说实话。

original: Get away from us and return to your master!
string: 离我们远点，回到你主人身边去！

original: Clan Valtara is a prominent Nord family hailing from the Imperial province. Our wealth stems from property and security.
string: 瓦尔塔拉氏族是源自帝国省的显赫诺德家族，财富靠的是地产和安保生意。

original: It reminds me of my previous life. My room had an interior just like this one. Obviously you have good taste.
string: 这让我想起了我以前的生活，我的房间内饰和这个简直一模一样。显然你品味不错。

original: Some thievery and mischief, we can easily escape from... But to become a hired murderer? The only way out is death!
string: 小偷小摸、搞点恶作剧，我们还能轻易脱身…… 但成为职业杀手？最终只有死路一条！

original: Has that cousin of mine been drowning his landlegs at the Candlehearth again? Torsten can be such a drag on the sails.
string: 我那表亲是不是又在烛炉堂喝得烂醉如泥了？托尔斯滕这人，真是个累赘。

original: So, you've made your decision then?
string: 这么说，你已经做决定了？

original: Ach, as much as I'm keen to spill some blood, this city has been kind to us so far... Perhaps just pick the wizard's pocket?
string: 唉，虽然我很想流血厮杀，但这座城市到目前为止对我们还不错…… 或许就偷那个巫师的钱包算了？

original: You think we're afraid of you!?
I've heard tell of robes with true power woven into their very threads... dragon cultist robes.
string: 我听说有种长袍，力量就编织在丝线里…… 那就是拜龙教长袍。

original: Causes <mag> points of poison damage for <dur> seconds.
string: 造成<mag>点毒素伤害，持续<dur>秒。

original: Take the Crown of Dream Weaving
<Standing> Power Attacks that strike an <Undead> enemy cause a <Sunlight> explosion.
string: <站立>状态下的重击击中<不死族>敌人时，会引发<日光>爆炸。

original: Sybille Stendor is dead. Skyrim is safe from her schemes. I should search her body.
string: 希比利·斯丹特已死，天际省总算摆脱了她的阴谋诡计。我应当搜查她的尸体。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade has found troubling news about <Alias=Bounty> in <Alias=Hold>. Their actions threaten Tamriel's delicate balance. We need you to remove this danger quietly. Your reward will be in the dead drop when it's done.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃已查到<Alias=Bounty>在<Alias=Hold>的异动，其行为正威胁着泰姆瑞尔脆弱的平衡。我们需要你暗中清除这一威胁。任务完成后，报酬会放在秘密交接点。
我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: If by "right" you mean pitting Nords against Nords and burning down entire villages.
string: 如果你说的 “正义” 是让诺德人自相残杀，烧毁整个村庄的话。

original: Well, if you want my advice, trusting a Daedra is risky business. The Altmer seems to be of good intentions and who knows what Azura wants with it.
string: 要是你想听我的建议，相信魔族可是件冒险的事。那高精灵看起来是真心想帮忙，谁知道阿祖拉想拿这颗星干什么。

original: That got the blood pumping. Take me to the next fight!
string: 打得热血沸腾，带我去打下一场！

original: My father is... Protective to say the least.
string: 这么说吧，我父亲对我保护欲过剩。
鸟身女妖？太不可思议了。
高岩契约 | 中等风险

original: Interesting. It's always a joy when these things go as planned.
string: 有意思。这些事能按计划进行，总是让人开心。

original: Come on then, we have a key to return. I'm sure Nocturnal will be ever so grateful.
string: 走吧，我们还有把钥匙要还呢。我相信诺克图娜尔会非常感激的。

original: Are you upset that I saved you?
string: 我救了你，你反而不高兴？

original: Look at that boy! He's worse than an old boot! At least an old boot is good for something! That Fafi of yours doesn't do any good for anyone!
string: 看看那孩子！他比只破靴子还没用！至少破靴子还有点用处！你那法菲对谁都没半点好处！

original: Summons a Dwarven Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把矮人誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: Forgive me Listener, but there is not enough gold in the treasury for that.
string: 请原谅我，聆听者，金库的金子不够支撑这件事。

original: Contract Failed: A member of the Solitude Sanctuary has been killed.
string: 契约失败：独孤城圣所的一名成员已殒命。

original: We tied the Night Mother's coffin to a horse, and tried to fight our way out of the city.
string: 我们把夜母的棺材绑在马上，试图杀出城去。
那个叛徒差一点就得手了。

original: Ugh... Let's just plant that thing and get out of here before I chuck up my insides everywhere.
string: 呃…… 我们赶紧把那东西种下，趁我还没吐出来，赶紧离开这儿。

original:
Contract Kill the [Target] Province: [Province] Difficulty: [Risk Level] Reward: [Amount] Gold Time: [Time] Hours

[pagebreak] [Contract description] Meet with the client and eliminate the [Target]. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名[Target] 省份： [Province] 难度： [Risk Level] 报酬: [Amount]金币 时限:[Time] 小时

[pagebreak] [Contract description] 与委托人接头，铲除[Target]. [pagebreak]

original: The Spirit Queen is the goddess of the infinite world beyond death.
string: 灵体女王是死亡之外无垠世界的女神。

original: Thankfully, no one can walk this back to me. So scat you! Get off this farm! I don't know you!
string: 幸好没人能把这事扯到我头上。所以你赶紧滚！离开我的农场！我根本不认识你！

original: Your Wards absorb <40>% of the magicka from incoming spells.
string: 你的防护结界能吸收来袭法术中 40% 的法力值。

original: Summons a Werewolf for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指定的地方召唤一只狼人，持续<dur>秒。

original: You need to reunite the staff pieces to use this
string: 你需要将法杖碎片拼接完整才能使用它。

original: Yes, perhaps it's best we take some time away from each other. I'll be around Riverwood.
string: 也好，或许我们分开一段时间会更好。我就在河木镇附近待着。

original: I... I'm sorry about the Sanctuary. I know they were a kind of family. Having lost mine to the Forsworn... I understand exactly how you may feel.
string: 我…… 我为圣所的事感到抱歉。我知道他们对你而言就像家人一样。我的家人都被弃誓者害死了，所以我完全明白你的感受。

original: She thought the Night Mother and the Tenets were a thing of the past, and that *she* was the future.
string: 她觉得夜母和十诫都已是过眼云烟，而她才是未来的希望。

original: I hope this tablet was worth all the effort. I'm sure the wizard will be ever so grateful.
string: 希望这块石板值得我们这么费力，我相信那巫师会非常感激的。

original: It must be tiring doing all that traveling.
As long as you stay the person that I'm so fond of, I suppose I can allow this.
string: 只要你还是我喜欢的那个人，我想我可以接受这件事。

original: Well, that was productive. Nothing like Nord Jarls carving up lands without a care for their inhabitants' opinions...
string: 好吧，这事办得还算有成果。诺德领主们瓜分土地的时候，从来不管当地人的意见，真是一贯如此……

original: I need to trade some things with you.
The spirits here are holding their breaths for something. Careful. We aren't the only things that breathe down here.
string: 这里的灵体都在屏息等待着什么，小心点，这下面可不是只有我们会呼吸。

original: What, how did you... who are you?
string: 什么，你怎么…… 你是谁？

original: (Arch-Mage) They all died. For the reputation of the college, we should keep this between us.
string: （首席法师）他们都死了。为了学院的声誉，这件事我们要保密。

original: Nothing like a good fight to lift the spirits.
string: 没什么比一场酣战更能振奋精神的了。

original: Whatever. I only care about the reward.
Give the "Amplifier: Damage Resist" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：伤害抗性” 交给构装体

original: You care so little for the lives of others that you will do anything to spill blood?
string: 你就这么不在乎别人的生命，为了流血不惜一切？

original: Don't you know I could have you locked up just for asking that question?
string: 你不知道就凭你问这个问题，我就能把你关起来吗？

original: What a lovely cave you've taken me to. Thank you ever so much, my protector.
string: 你带我来的这山洞可真 “漂亮” 啊。太谢谢你了，我的保护者。

original: If you wish for additional armor sets, return with an additional set of cultist or Miraak robes and 5 heart stones.
string: 如果你想要其他盔甲套装，再带一套龙祭司或米拉克的长袍和五颗心石来就行。

original: Here's a letter from the Jarl's steward. Looks like official business.
string: 这是领主管家寄来的信，看着像是公务相关。

original: Resist 15 points of Fire, Frost, and Shock damage for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，就获得 15 点火焰、寒霜和闪电伤害抗性。

original: You've made a terrible enemy, Thalmor!
string: 你树了个可怕的敌人，梭默！

original: That gutless moosehide! Curse his cowardice!
string: 那个没种的窝囊废！诅咒他的胆小鬼本性！

original: Brave of you to hold onto that ring. I hope that it doesn't affect you the same way it did the child killer.
string: 你还留着那枚戒指，胆子可真大。希望它不会像影响那个杀童犯一样影响你。

original: You can't seem to read most of the note. Very little can still be read
string: 你似乎大多数字迹都看不清了，只能勉强辨认出寥寥数语。

original:
Contract Kill an Old Man Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 12 Hours

[pagebreak] What this old man did to deserve to have the Black Sacrament performed on him is not our concern, a contract is a contract. Meet with the client and eliminate the Old Man. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名老人 省份： 天际 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:12 小时

[pagebreak] 这名老者究竟因何招致黑暗祭礼的索命契约，并非我们该关心的事 —— 契约既立，便须执行。 与委托人接头，铲除老人. [pagebreak]

Contract Kill a Tribunal Heretic Province: Morrowind Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] The religious unity of Morrowind is of the utmost importance to House Indoril. Some of them will use extreme measures to protect the New Temple and crush heretical beliefs, such as performing the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Tribunal Heretic. [pagebreak]

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">First Day at Sea, Last Seed

This voyage has begun with more dead to ferry home than I expected.

Fortunately, our cargo holds more than just corpses this trip. Quite a few jewels and valuables were requested to be shipped out. Perhaps the nobles think the traitors will march on Solitude. 

We'll need to anchor soon and sweep the ship for stowaways. Last voyage had one pesky Nord we didn't discover until the following Sundas. I'll have to remember to get one of the men to clean out the cells just in case.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">末种月，航海首日

这场航行刚启程，要运回家的亡者就比我预想的多。

所幸这次货舱里不只有尸体，还有不少珠宝与贵重物品要运出。或许贵族们觉得那些叛贼会进军独孤城吧。

我们很快就得抛锚，彻底搜查船只，看看有没有偷渡者。上一趟航行就藏着个难缠的诺德人，直到下一个礼拜天才发现。我得记着让手下人把囚室清理干净，以防万一。
</font>

string: 我很快就回来，我的聆听者。
