original: What do you think was in that poison? I hope it was Giant's Toe. And Blisterwort. Maybe Skeever Tail to add to the irony...
string: 你觉得那毒药里放了什么？希望有巨人脚趾，还有水泡根，或许再加点老鼠尾巴，更添讽刺意味……

original: I'd be happy to teach you a thing or two.

184
Tamra gave me this journal. She says it will be good for me to put my thoughts to paper. I haven't seen her since then.. I hope she's okay. 185
I miss my friend. The last time I saw her, Tamra told me I was born into the Inquisitors Order, an ancient and secretive faction that prided itself on maintaining the truth of reality.. That my parents, both senior Inquisitors long dead by now, had high hopes for their only child. 185
My earliest memories are filled with rigorous training. By the time I was six, I could hold a blade as well as any of the adults here. By eight, I was learning the languages of forgotten realms.. tongues of monsters and men.. taught by grim faced scholars who saw potential in me. But I didnt share their enthusiasm. Beneath it all, I always harbored doubts, questions that gnawed at me in the quiet hours.
Why was the world so steeped in darkness?
Why did the Order seem to burn through peoples lives in its quest?
Are we all just tools? 186
I'm 14 today. I will be a full fledged Inquisitor soon. The moment many have waited for. 188
Another mission. Another death.. Is the reality of this world that everything we love will eventually fade? Y 190
Some day. Happiness. 194
I recieved my newest orders recently. I'm to be sent to Skyrim and start work on repairing one of the old outposts. Havent heard much more, hopefully this assignment wont take too long.
Lt. Eric didnt provide much information, but at least it should be quiet for the most part. 194
The outpost is pretty well hidden. I'm told ther'es a veil that keeps the island hidden from prying eyes, a spell cast by the Inquisitors of old.
Apparently there's magic here, deep magic, permeating the ground and the air. It keeps things nourished and protects the island. What strange things this world holds. 194
There's not much to do around here. I mostly tend to the small vegetable patch and clean the weapons and armor.
Sometimes at night I feel like I'm not alone, but I think that the island is so quiet it plays tricks on me. 194
I peeked into the tower basement, it seems the same magic that keeps the island alive.. also keeps the monsters alive? 194
Sometimes I wonder if this is all worth it.. 194
For the past few nights I've felt a prescence watching me. I've brought several weapons into the house.. just in case.
string:
184
塔姆拉给了我这本日记。她说把心思写下来对我有好处。那之后我就没再见过她…… 希望她一切安好。 185
我想念我的朋友。最后一次见塔姆拉时，她告诉我，我生来就属于 “审判者教团”—— 一个古老而隐秘的组织，以守护现实真相为傲…… 我的父母都是高阶审判者，早已过世，他们对独生女寄予了厚望。 185
我最早的记忆全是严苛的训练。六岁时，我握剑的水准已不输这里任何一个成年人；八岁时，我开始学习失落国度的语言 —— 无论是魔物还是人类的语言 —— 由一群面容严肃的学者授课，他们说我很有潜力。但我没有他们那样的热忱。在这一切之下，我心中始终藏着疑虑，那些问题在寂静的时刻啃噬着我。
为何这世界深陷黑暗之中？
为何教团在追寻目标的过程中，总要牺牲那么多人的性命？
我们难道都只是工具吗？ 186
今天我 14 岁了。很快我就能成为一名正式的审判者。这是许多人翘首以盼的时刻。 188
又一次任务，又一条人命逝去…… 这世界的真相，难道就是我们珍爱的一切终将消逝吗？ Y 190
总有一天，会迎来幸福的。 194
最近我收到了新的指令，要被派往天际，负责修复一座旧前哨站。具体情况不太清楚，希望这次任务不会耗时太久。
埃里克中尉没提供太多信息，但至少这里大概率会很清静。 194
这座前哨站藏得很隐蔽。有人告诉我，有一层障幕将这座岛屿与窥探的目光隔绝开来，那是古代审判者施加的法术。
显然这里蕴藏着魔法，是深入骨髓的古老魔法，渗透在土壤与空气之中。它滋养万物，也守护着岛屿。这世界竟有如此奇特之物。 194
这里没什么事可做。我大多时候就是打理小菜园，擦拭武器和盔甲。
有时到了晚上，我总觉得身边不止自己一个人，但想来是这岛屿太过寂静，让我产生了错觉。 194
我偷偷看了看塔楼地下室 —— 看来维系岛屿生机的魔法…… 同时也在维系魔物的生命？ 194
有时我会想，所做的这一切真的值得吗…… 194
过去这几晚，我总感觉有什么东西在盯着我。我拿了好几件武器进屋…… 以防万一。

original:
[pagebreak]

History of the Inquisition Part 3 By Inquisitor Ahmad

[pagebreak]

ith their oaths sworn and their purpose clear, the Inquisitors began their eternal march in the pursuit of the machinations of this world. Their battles would never be known to those outside the order.. Their victories would never be sung. But from the shadows of Tamriel, they would manipulate events, silence those who tampered with time, and eliminate threats before they could unravel the fabric of reality. Dragons being the foremost threat during the Dragon Wars, the Inquisition set forth plans of their own. They infiltrated the Dragon Cults, poisoning their hierarchies with paranoia and self destruction, sowing the seeds of destruction and chaos. Sending out teams interacting with merchants and excavators, they managed to obtain and hide powerful artifacts, ensuring they could not be used. Several members even worked in secret to empower members with the Draconic Tongue itself, bolstering their abilities, and taking power from Dragons, for mortal-kind. Years passed, and again the Inquisition shaped the world. When the Ayleids of Cyrodiil ruled from their White Gold Towers, they did so with magic tied to the stars and the Aedra themselves. To the outside world, they were merely witch kings, cruel and powerful. But the Inquisition saw a greater danger. The Ayleids were experimenting with divine forces in ways that threatened the stability of reality itself. It is whispered that they aided the Alessian Rebellion from the shadows, ensuring that the Empire would rise and prevent any further Ayleid experiments on the fabric of time. Who truly knows. Even as an Inquisitor myself, answers are not forthcoming from those who may know a fragment of the truth. Truth is power, after all.
string:
[pagebreak]

审判庭史 第三卷 作者 审判官艾哈迈德

[pagebreak]

誓言既立，目标已明，审判官们踏上了追寻世间阴谋的永恒征程。 他们的战斗，从未为教团之外的人所知；他们的胜利，也从未被人歌颂。但从泰姆瑞尔的暗影之中，他们操纵事态走向，让那些篡改时间之人永远噤声，在威胁尚未撕裂现实的织锦前便将其铲除。 巨龙战争期间，巨龙是头号威胁，审判庭也为此制定了专属计划。他们潜入龙教内部，用偏执与自我毁灭的念头侵蚀其等级体系，埋下毁灭与混乱的种子。 他们派遣小队与商人和挖掘者接触，设法获取并藏匿强大的神器，确保这些器物无法被滥用。数位成员甚至暗中行动，赋予部分人龙语的力量，以此增强己方能力，从巨龙手中为凡人夺取力量。 岁月流转，审判庭再度塑造了世界的走向。当赛瑞迪尔的亚历德人踞于白金塔发号施令时，他们凭借的是与星辰及创世神相连的魔法。 在外界眼中，亚历德人不过是残暴而强大的巫王。但审判庭却窥见了更深重的危机：亚历德人对神圣力量的实验方式，正威胁着现实本身的稳定。有传言称，审判庭曾于暗影中协助阿莱西亚叛乱，助力帝国崛起，以阻止亚历德人继续对时间的织锦展开实验。真相究竟如何，无人知晓。即便我身为审判官，那些或许知晓一星半点真相的人，也从未给出过答案。毕竟，真相即是力量。

string: 记住，我，魔偶，会永远陪在你身边。

string: 我踩过的石头都比这一下疼！
天际契约：杀死一位农夫（低风险）

original: You won't even bother talking to me.
string: 你甚至都懒得跟我说话了。

original: This fortified city does not inspire trust. I do not want to remain here.
string: 这座设防的城市让人难以信任。我不想待在这里。

original: Oh... Right... I'm sorry I said anything then. I just wanted you to know how I felt.
string: 哦…… 好吧…… 那抱歉我多嘴了。我只是想让你知道我的感受。

original: An Altmer solider is just, well, taller.
string: 高精灵士兵嘛，不过是个子更高点罢了。

original: You've always despised my boy, Gormli. You've always said so. You say he's just a miserable, skeeving little...
string: 戈尔米，你一直就看不起我的孩子，你总这么说。你说他就是个窝囊、猥琐的小……

original: I have to go further into the cavern and see what I can find.
string: 我得继续往洞穴深处走，看看能发现些什么。

original: Yes, he is a dragon after all. Best to keep your distance for now.
string: 是啊，他毕竟是条龙。目前最好还是离他远点。

original: If only my Forsworn cousins weren't so senseless. Aim that rage at the Silver-Bloods and their ilk, not at each other, and definitely not at us!
string: 要是我的弃誓者表亲们能别这么蠢就好了，把怒火对准银血家族之流，别自相残杀，更别冲着我们来！

original: At least the girl is safe. Now I guess we have to deliver her to those prissy priestesses...
string: 至少那女孩安全了，现在我们得把她送到那些矫情的女祭司手里……

original: Are you sure this is what you want? The people of this city despise them for a reason.
string: 你确定这是你想要的吗？这座城市的人讨厌他们是有原因的。

original: You've done me a good service, my friend. Now it's my time to pay you back. I always pay my debts.
string: 你帮了我大忙，朋友。现在该我回报你了，我从不欠人情。

original: Look at you, dragonslayer. That armor looks heavy though. I hope it doesn't slow us down when we inevitably need to flee from dragon fire.
string: 瞧瞧你，屠龙者。不过这盔甲看着挺沉的，希望等我们不可避免地要躲避龙焰时，它不会拖我们后腿。

original: Leaving so soon? Fine, I'll remain here.
string: 这么快就要走？行吧，那我就在这儿等着。

original: Let me just prepare my magic...

string: 艾斯维尔契约 | 中等风险

original: Damn thieves just always have to make our lives a misery to figure out their plans... Ah, no offense.
string: 该死的盗贼，为了搞清楚他们的计划，总把我们的生活搞得一团糟…… 啊，无意冒犯。

original: If things are going to work between us, I hope you'll consider being a little kinder.
string: 如果我们还想继续同行，希望你能学着友善一点。

original: I wasn't suggesting otherwise, but this shouldn't be what pleases you.
string: 我不是那个意思，但你不该以此为乐。

original: I revealed Aunt Gormli's plot to her sister, and started a feud between them.
string: 我把戈姆莉姑妈的阴谋告诉了她的妹妹，让她们姐妹反目成仇了。

original: You treat me as an equal. As a capable human being. I'm very grateful to you.
string: 你把我当作平等的人，一个有能力的人。我非常感激你。

original: So many spirits linger in the water here. Sky, stone, wilds... and troll blood. Gods, that's a lot of troll blood!
string: 这里的水里萦绕着许多灵体，天空、石头、荒野的灵…… 还有巨魔的血，天啊，好多巨魔血！

original: Gold has no allegiances and neither do I. I'll do business with anyone with wares.
string: 金子没有立场，我也一样。只要有货，谁的生意我都做。

original: Find the dead drop in Whiterun, in a barrel behind the Bannered Mare
string: 在白漫城的战旗母马旅店后方的木桶里找到秘密投放点

original: Another name for the forgotten. Goodbye.
string: 又一个被遗忘的名字。永别了。

original: That's putting a belch to music. I could've hired a cold kettle to deliver that letter and things would've turned out better than what you did.
string: 你这办的叫什么事，简直是弄巧成拙。我就算雇个冷冰冰的水壶去送那封信，结果也比你办的好。

original: Forgive me Listener, but this one has strong feelings about old Listener's many mistakes.
string: 请原谅我，聆听者，但我对上一任聆听者犯下的种种错误，实在是耿耿于怀。
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 极高风险

original: You need not fear for me. I have been trained by some of the finest Altmer wizards in this part of Tamriel. Danger should be afraid of us.
string: 你不必为我担心。泰姆瑞尔这片区域最顶尖的高精灵法师都教过我本事。危险该怕的是我们才对。

original: Summon Silver Oathblade
string: 召唤白银誓约之刃

original: I found the corpse of a vampire hunter in Deephowl Hollow. He was captured and killed by a vicious vampire clan. Something strange is going on here; I should look around for clues.
string: 我在深嚎山谷发现了那名吸血鬼猎人的尸体，他被一个凶残的吸血鬼氏族抓住并杀害了。这里肯定有蹊跷，我该四处找找线索。

original: They got me with the Stormcloaks.
string: 我因为和风暴斗篷扯上关系被抓了。

original: The Listener would write down the contracts dictated by the Night Mother herself, and pass them to the Speakers.
string: 聆听者会记录下夜母亲口下达的契约，再将其传达给各位发言人。

original: With the Black Hand at your side, you could return the Dark Brotherhood to its former glory.
string: 有黑手在你身旁辅佐，你能让黑暗兄弟会重焕昔日荣光。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Your dark deeds have brought you to our notice. We are a secret band that wants no fame, only revenge for the oppressed and some stability in Tamriel's chaos. You have potential, and your deadly skill could serve a better purpose, with rewards that match your skill.

West of Riverwood hides Anise, an old woman covering up her magic. Her new group of followers threatens to upset the power balances in Skyrim, including yours. Uncover her secrets and leave them in the barrel behind Whiterun's Bannered Mare. It's enchanted so only you can see it. Show us what you can do, and more chances will come.

In Shadows, We Serve.

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

你的卑劣行径已引起我们的注意。我们是一支隐于暗处的团体，不求声名，只为替受压迫者复仇，为泰姆瑞尔的混沌带来些许安稳。你身怀潜力，你那致命的技艺本可成就更有意义的事业，且能获得与你的本领相匹配的回报。

河木镇以西藏着一位名叫安尼斯的老妪，她正用伪装掩盖自己的魔法能力。她新招揽的一众追随者已对天际的势力平衡构成威胁 —— 自然也包括你们的势力。查清她的秘密，再将其藏到白漫城战旗母马旅店后方的木桶里。那木桶附有魔法，唯有你能看见。拿出真本事让我们瞧瞧，更多机遇自会降临。

我们于暗影中效命。

</font>

original: Then seek out an Imperial Councilor named Amaund Motierre, and give him our... encouragement.
string: 随后找到一位名叫阿蒙·莫蒂耶的帝国顾问，给予他我们的……“鼓励”。

original: Yet I seek a... more potent template. Robes worn by Miraak or his inner circle, for instance.
string: 但我想要一个…… 更强大的范本。比如米拉克或他核心圈子成员穿的长袍。

original: I found these student notes on Elemental Magic.
string: 我找到了这些学生的元素魔法笔记。

original: We'll talk once we're off the ship. Please?
string: 等下了船我们再聊，好吗？

original: Good. I should hope so. Now, I don't think it's in your nature to retire, so... What's next?
string: 那就好。我也希望如此。依我看，你可不是那种会安于退休的人，所以…… 接下来干什么？

original: I'm not one for singing and I don't know my way around any instruments. However, I'm happy to see the college nonetheless.
string: 我不擅长唱歌，也不懂任何乐器，不过能看到这所学院，我还是很开心。

original: By giving them new abilities, but also making them stronger, more robust, more resistant to rust, to water and to malfunctions.
string: 赋予它们新的能力，同时让它们更坚固、更耐用，更能抵抗锈蚀、水蚀和故障。

original: Problem? Did you say problem? Because I've got a problem. My gutless moosehide of a nephew. Now, there's a problem.
string: 麻烦？你说麻烦？我才真有麻烦呢。我那没种的外甥，简直就是块窝囊废。这才是真正的麻烦。
我们去找点更刺激的事做吧！

original:
Here are each Amplifiers I have managed to get working for my factotums:
- Damage Resist: makes them more resistants to damage
- Magic Resist: makes them more resistant to magic
- Deadly Bows: makes them more proficient and deadly with bows
- Deadly Swords: makes them more proficient and deadly with swords
- Light Feet: makes them more nimble and they won't trigger traps anymore
- Improved Destruction: makes them more proficient and deadly with destruction magic
- Lightning Arrows: allows them to channel electricity while using bows
- Lightning Touch: allows them to channel electricity while using swords
string:
以下是我为构装侍从成功调试出的各类增幅器及其效果：

- 伤害抗性：
提升其伤害抵御能力
- 魔法抗性：
提升其魔法抵御能力
- 致命弓箭：
让其更精通弓箭技艺，箭术杀伤力更强
- 致命剑术：
让其更精通剑术，剑击杀伤力更强
- 轻盈步伐：
使其动作更为敏捷，且不再触发陷阱
- 毁灭强化：
提升其毁灭系魔法的精通度与杀伤力
- 闪电箭矢：
使其在使用弓箭时能引导雷电之力
- 闪电之触：
使其在使用剑时能引导雷电之力

original: It's not the blood drinking I'd have a problem with, it's just that I enjoy feeling the sun on my skin.
string: 我不是介意喝血，只是喜欢阳光照在皮肤上的感觉。

original: The leader of the Deephowl Hollow vampire clan has discovered a sinister new form of necromancy. I've discovered their leader, Gawayne, dead in his own quarters as his revenant creations have revolted against him and his clan. There's only one thing left to do: destroy the last of the revenants.
string: 深嚎山谷吸血鬼氏族的首领发现了一种邪恶的新型亡灵魔法。我发现他们的首领加韦恩死在了自己的住处，他创造的亡魂反叛了他和整个氏族。如今只剩最后一件事要做：消灭残余的亡魂。

original: Why, we helped him plan the entire thing. Locations, dates, the list of targets, all of it.
string: 哼，整个计划都是我们帮他策划的。地点、日期、目标名单，无一不是。

original: Don't keep me waiting too long; inspiration, like ash, can drift away.
string: 别让我等太久，灵感就像灰烬，转瞬即逝。

original: We can take down this overgrown lizard!
string: 我们能打倒这只大蜥蜴！

original: Summons an Ebony Oathbladefor <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把黑檀誓约之刃，持续 8 小时
法术书: 召唤不安尸鬼

original: I feel it would be best if we kept our focus.
string: 我觉得我们还是专心点好。

original: I did notice that. I... Look, you're wonderful. I just don't think I'm looking for that kind of friendship right now.
string: 我确实注意到了。我…… 听着，你很好，只是我现在还不想发展那种关系。

original: Resist 10% of Magic and Regenerate Magicka 15% faster for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，魔法抗性提升 10%，法力值恢复速度加快 15%。

original: Was this meant to be a joke?
An excellent choice, the archer is most wise.
string: 选得好，弓箭手向来是明智之选。

original: Kill the Ghost Undead Pirate Captain
string: 杀死幽灵不死海盗船长

original: That Dunmer was lucky you weren't hurt. If anything happened to you, the Thieves Guild would be the least of her problems.
string: 那个丹莫很幸运，你没受伤。要是你出了什么事，盗贼公会对她来说都算轻的。

original: I didn't mean anything by it. Sorry for any confusion.
string: 我没别的意思，抱歉造成了误会。

original: Staff of the Armored Frost Troll
I knew it! Karliah's an agent of Nocturnal! Oh, Mother of Crows, what mysteries have we wandered into this time?
string: 我就知道！卡莉亚是诺克图娜尔的使者！哦，渡鸦之母，这次我们又卷入了什么谜团？

original: Approach him calm and normal. Give him the summons. And then leave! That's it!
string: 淡定自然地走过去，把征召令给他，然后就走！就这么简单！

original: He went out and explored Vvardenfell and Solstheim, but we don't have enough resources here to maintain our systems properly.
string: 他出去探索了瓦登费尔和索瑟海姆，但我们这里的资源不足以正常维护系统。

original: Well, this settles it. You can burn me when I'm gone. Just scatter me under a tree or something. I don't care, I'll be dead.
string: 得了，就这么定了，我死了以后把我烧了，随便把骨灰撒在树下就行，我无所谓，反正都死了。

original: Off to fetch some dusty Nord relic so that the Bear doesn't get it? Don't see the point, but I'll do anything to piss off Ulfric Stormcloak.
string: 要去拿些满是灰尘的诺德遗物，免得被那个 “熊” 抢了？我觉得没意义，不过只要能气到乌弗瑞克・风暴斗篷，我什么都愿意做。

original: The Demonic Gragoyle is dead! Arisen Elves rushed in to help kill the Demon; they mustve come from another realm. I believe the blood sacrifice I had to do, is what summoned the Demonic creature as it was also my only way of escape. I need to leave this place. Maybe the Oblivion Portal will close now.
string: 魔像石像鬼已被消灭！苏醒的精灵赶来帮忙斩杀了这只恶魔，他们肯定是从其他领域来的。我想，我之前被迫进行的血祭，正是召唤出这只恶魔的原因，而那也是我唯一的逃生之路。我得离开这个地方，或许湮灭之门现在会自行关闭了。

original: Never heard of these Redguard warriors before. Not sure I feel comfortable handing over a potentially innocent woman to a group of mercenaries.
string: 我从没听过这些红卫战士，把一个可能无辜的女人交给一群佣兵，我总觉得不太放心。

original: Not having your back? What do you want me to do? I'm a heavy sleeper! Whatever, you're fine now. Let's just get a move on.
string: 没给你撑腰？你想让我怎么样？我睡觉本来就沉！不管了，你现在没事就好。我们赶紧走。

original: A note in Anise's Cabin pointed me to Brittleshin Pass nearby, where someone named Valthar is trying to recruit the inhabitants into a scheme.
string: 安尼斯小屋中的一张纸条指引我前往附近的断胫山隘，一个名叫瓦塔尔的人正在那里拉拢当地居民参与某个阴谋。

original: A blacksmith named Talsric asked me to hunt and kill a great beast. Talsric says that this beast killed his wife and child. If I bring back the beast's pelt, Talsric has said he will make me some unique armor. Now that the beast is dead, I should retrieve the pelt.
string: 一个名叫塔斯里克的铁匠让我去猎杀一头巨兽。他说这头巨兽害死了他的妻子和孩子。如果我能带回巨兽的皮毛，塔斯里克就会为我打造一套独特的盔甲。现在巨兽已经死了，我该去取回它的皮毛。

original: Good luck taking Markarth when you're dead!
string: 都死到临头了，还想拿下马卡斯城？

original: ensnaring the soul of those who fall within <dur> seconds.
string: 并在<dur>秒内禁锢倒下者的灵魂

original:
- <Alias=HelperUnitRank> <Alias=HelperUnitName> (<Alias=HelperUnitClass>) -

Contracts Completed: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitContractsCompleted>
(<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitContractsRequired> more until next promotion)
-
Health: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealth>/<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealthCap>
Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitUpkeep> Gold
-
Bonus Damage: +<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitDamage>%%
Bonus Rewards: +<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitRewards>%%
-
Attribute Points: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitAttributePoints>
string:
- <Alias=HelperUnitRank> <Alias=HelperUnitName>（<Alias=HelperUnitClass>）

-已完成契约数：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitContractsCompleted>

（距离下次晋升还需完成 < Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitContractsRequired > 个契约）

-生命值：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealth>/<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealthCap>

维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitUpkeep> 

金币-伤害加成：+<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitDamage>%

奖励加成：+<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitRewards>%

-属性点数：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitAttributePoints>
加韦恩的日记 - 第一部分

original: But the end of the Dark Brotherhood will send a clear message to Skyrim. That the shadows can indeed be repelled.
string: 但黑暗兄弟会的终结会向天际传递一个明确的信号：阴影终究是可以驱散的。

original: Bottom Half of the Staff of Mental Disturbance
string: 心智扰乱法杖的下半段

original: Well now, don't you look silly.
string: 嗯，你现在看起来可真傻。

original: Dirge of Silence
string: 寂静哀歌

original: Wow... The trees here are beautiful. And look at those waterfalls!
string: 哇…… 这儿的树太美了，还有那些瀑布！

original: Killing a madman, such an easy task. They're known for being predictable, after all!
string: 杀个疯子，太容易了。毕竟疯子的行为都很容易预测！

original: That's all I needed from you.
string: 这就是我想从你这里得到的全部。

original: Target takes <mag> damage per second for <dur> seconds.
string: 目标每秒受到<mag>点伤害，持续<dur>秒。

original: Find me there in a few days.
Ach. I guess the staff had to be destroyed, somehow. But if that merely released its power and I start having nightmares, I'm blaming you!
string: 唉，看来这法杖终究还是要被毁了。但如果只是释放了它的力量，然后我开始做噩梦，我就怪你！
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 高风险

original: The stars... They're telling us stories, if you'd look closely.
string: 星星…… 只要你仔细看，它们都在诉说着故事。

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Vampire Lord (Very High-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位吸血鬼领主（极高风险）

original: Come on, you. Let's rest up and then head to our next adventure. Together.
string: 来吧，我们先歇会儿，然后一起去开启下一场冒险。

original: Are you truly being inducted into the Bards College without having to play a single instrument? What is wrong with Skyrim?
string: 你居然没弹过一件乐器就能被吟游诗人学院接纳？天际到底怎么了？

original: You're milking a dead horse for the Thieves Guild. The people in Riften can barely scrape by.
string: 你这是在为盗贼公会敲榨那些早已一贫如洗的人，裂谷城的百姓都快活不下去了。

original: Door Reads: Sealed Behind Our Stone Are Echoes of the Ancients
string: 门上刻字：石后封存着古者的回响

original: In our youth, bandits often came to plunder, but we never made easy prey.
string: 年轻时，强盗常来劫掠，但我们可不会轻易任人宰割。

original: Aww, just when I was getting excited.
Apostle Renos would have loved this place. He would have found the answers to all of his interrogations.
string: 雷诺斯使徒一定会喜欢这个地方。他能在这里找到所有问题的答案。

original: Apostle Renos was once a revered apostle of the Clockwork City.
string: 雷诺斯使徒曾是发条城备受尊敬的使徒。

original: Restore <mag> Stamina every second for <dur> seconds.
string: 每秒钟恢复<mag>点耐力，持续<dur>秒

original: Oh, but that's where you're wrong. I don't want our adventures to be cut short by some egotistical maniac.
string: 哦，可你错了。我可不想我们的冒险被某个自负的疯子打断。

original: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate this altercation?
string: 从 1 到 10 分，你会给这场冲突打几分？

original: What's the point in being the Jarl if you can't even have a properly heated longhouse? It's freezing in here.
string: 当个领主连个暖和点的长屋都没有，那还有什么意思？这儿冻死人了。
法术书: 召唤巨型泥沼蟹

original: You're a Thane now. Congratulations! You'd better not replace me with your new housecarl.
string: 你现在是领主了，恭喜！你可别用你的新管家把我换掉。

original: Let's get that locket back where it belongs. I'm sure they will be grateful for all this effort.
string: 把那吊坠放回原处吧，我相信他们会感激我们的付出的。

original: What an awful story. Don't mistake me, I don't care for children, but how could someone do that to a child?
string: 真是个可怕的故事。别误会，我并不喜欢小孩，但怎么会有人对孩子做出这种事？

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Battleaxe of Leeching

The Windhelm Sanctuary is now active.

You can now hire recruits, assign contracts, and purchase improvements for this location.
string:
风舵城圣所现已启用。

你如今可在此招募人手、分配契约，并为该地点购置各类升级设施。

original: Summon Glass Oathblade
string: 召唤玻璃誓约之刃

original: I learned a few things about smithing in the war. Not enough to make a living by, but enough to know its value as a trade.
string: 我在战争中学了点锻造的手艺，虽然不足以以此谋生，但也足够让我明白这门手艺的价值。

original: We're going to... Kill a dragon? Seriously? Is it too late to sit this one out? Fine, I'll come along.
string: 我们要去…… 屠龙？认真的吗？现在退出还来得及吗？好吧，我跟你去。

original: I think I did quite well, if I do say so myself.
string: 恕我直言，我表现得相当不错。
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 中等风险
黑暗潮汐：海洋之龙悬赏

original: Reopening Raven Rock's mine has worked wonders for the town. Maybe it will rival a Skyrim city one day.
string: 重开鸦石镇的矿井让这座城镇焕然一新。或许有一天，它能和天际的城市比肩。

original: If you need anything, anything at all, ask my mother.
string: 如果你需要什么，不管是什么，尽管跟我母亲说。

original: What a nice view. You can see the Reach from here... It's as beautiful as I remember.
string: 景色真美，从这里能看到边塞…… 和我记忆中的一样美。

original: So I am needed. That's relieving!
string: 这么说我还是被需要的。那就放心了！

original: It gives, but it also takes its due tenfold. One moment, it tempts us with salvation; the next, all the world turns dark because of it.
string: 它给予我们一切，却也会十倍地索回代价。前一刻，它用救赎诱惑我们；下一刻，整个世界便因它陷入黑暗。

original: I doubt Delphine will be preparing an invitation for us both, being the ice queen that she is.
string: 我怀疑德尔菲娜不会给我们俩准备邀请函，她就是个冰女王。

original: We threw off our caution like old rags and joined ranks with his retreat, aiding him to Bruma.
string: 我们抛开谨慎，像扔掉破布一样，加入他的撤退队伍，护送他前往布鲁玛。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
The veil grows thin where the whispers rise. I tried to turn away, but the rhythm dragged me forward. If you find me, know I was already lost.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
低语翻涌之处，帷幕渐薄。我曾试图抽身，可那韵律却将我裹挟向前。若你寻到我，便知我早已迷失其中。
</font>

original: How many sons and daughters have left hearth-sides and farmsteads, never knowing if they were to return? How many, I ask you?
string: 有多少儿女离开家园和农场，再也不知道自己能否归来？我问你，有多少？

original: It's time for us to part ways.
Listen... I'm not sure if you and I are just going through a... rough patch, but I don't feel we're connecting like we used to.
string: 听我说…… 我不知道我们是不是只是经历了一段…… 艰难的时期，但我感觉我们不像以前那样合拍了。
锻造区（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: You shouldn't need me to tell you that this is abhorrent.
string: 你应该不用我告诉你这有多可恶吧。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Consuming
Maybe it's just in your nature to be adventurous. Sometimes there is no reasoning, things just are as they are.
string: 也许冒险就是你的天性，有时候事情本就如此，没有理由。

original: Find the vampire hunter in Deephowl Hollow
string: 在深嚎山谷找到吸血鬼猎人

original: And I don't think they will accept surrender this time.
string: 而且我想这次他们不会接受投降。

original: Do you get these goods from somewhere else?
string: 这些货物你是从别处弄来的吗？

original: I have defeated Antovahl Stormcaller and uncovered his power!
string: 我击败了安托瓦尔・唤雷者，还掌握了他的力量！

original: Now this is what I call a library. I wish I had one like this at home.
string: 这才叫图书馆嘛，真希望我家里也有这么一个。
你看见他们在哪儿了吗？

original: I'm leaving. I wish your next companion the best of luck because it will take a special type of person to put up with your malicious intentions.
string: 我要走了。祝你下一个同伴好运吧，毕竟得是个特别的人，才能忍受你的恶意。

original: You wanted to talk? Go ahead.
Of course I remember you. You're my childhood friend.
string: 我当然记得你，你是我儿时的朋友。

original: The Forsworn here bring nothing but fear. Markarth's people deserve better.
string: 这里的弃誓者只会带来恐惧。马卡斯的人民值得更好的生活。

original: That's a respectable amount, wouldn't you say?
string: 这数目够体面了，你觉得呢？

original: Find the dead-drop in Solitude, beside the entrance to the Catacombs
string: 在独孤城地下墓穴入口旁找到秘密投放点

original: Summon Orcish Oathblade
string: 召唤兽人誓约之刃

original: Oops, looks like the Nord came out on top.
It doesn't seem like I'll be able to do that, sorry.
string: 恐怕我做不到这件事，抱歉。

original: Then for all our sake, I hope you see the weight you carry soon enough.
string: 那么为了我们所有人，我希望你早日明白自己肩负的重担。

original: Welcome in Apostle Renos' Laboratory. This is where magic becomes machines, and machines become even more.
string: 欢迎来到雷诺斯使徒的实验室。在这里，魔法化为机械，机械又能突破更多可能。

original: An apostle of the Clockwork City has disappeared on Solstheim. I am now in Nchardak Submerged Laboratory looking for him. Where could he be?
string: 发条城的一位使徒在索瑟海姆失踪了。我如今身处钠查达克水下实验室，正在寻找他的踪迹。他会在哪里呢？

original: I could have never guessed that the person who happened by would be so right for me. No one has ever cared for me in the way that you do.
string: 我从未想过，出现的这个人会这么适合我。从来没有人像你这样关心我。

original: I have never been to this part of the Clockwork City in the past. It's so far away from where I used to work.
string: 我以前从没去过发条城的这个区域。这里离我曾经工作的地方太远了。
秘闻 - 谢里瓦的日记 1

original: Spell Tome: Conjure Dremora Markynaz Thrall
string: 法术书: 召唤魔人领爵奴仆

original: Plenty of ingredients to be found in the marsh, I'm sure. nirnroot thrives near water and I can see deathbells from here.
string: 沼泽里肯定能找到不少材料，奈恩根在水边长得好，我从这儿都能看到死亡钟花。

original: You'll have no blood from me, bloodsucker.
The Empire is declining. Better that it is replaced by a strong leader.
string: 帝国正在衰落，最好由一个强有力的领袖来取代它。

original: All this - brothers killing brothers, dragons coming back - sounds awfully like our own prophecy. Could we have... gotten it from Alduin's Wall?
string: 这一切 —— 兄弟相残，巨龙归来 —— 听着跟我们边塞的预言太像了。会不会…… 是我们从奥杜因之墙那儿得来的？

original: Covenant of the Oathblades Vol. III
Always nice to have an easy challenge for a change!
string: 偶尔来场轻松的挑战也不错！

original: If you need anything else, just ask.
string: 需要什么别的东西的话，尽管开口。

original: The wellspring of the Karth flows forth from the Lost Valley, where my clan used to roost. Now the Hags have made it a site to raise new briarhearts.
string: 卡尔特河的源头从失落谷流出，那里曾是我的氏族栖息之地，如今女巫们把它变成了培育荆棘之心的场所。

original: We're bankrupt, Listener. You need to deposit some gold into the Treasury.
string: 我们破产了，聆听者。你得往金库里存些金子。

original: They're a group of kindly old monks.
string: 他们是一群和善的老僧侣。

original: As our numbers dwindled, she abandoned whole sanctuaries, and withdrew from entire provinces until there was no where left to run.
string: 随着我们的人数不断减少，她舍弃了一座又一座圣所，从一个又一个行省撤离，直到我们无处可逃。

original:
Contract Kill a Monk Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] Monks are usually unarmed, making them easy targets. They sequester themselves away from the world to avoid trouble and pursue spiritual growth, but sometimes trouble still manages to find them. This monk has made an enemy who wishes to see them dead. Meet with the client and eliminate the Monk. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名僧侣 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 僧侣通常手无寸铁，这让他们成了易下手的目标。他们隐世独居，只为远离纷扰、追求精神境界的提升，但有时麻烦依旧会找上门来。这名僧侣树了敌，而对方一心想要置他于死地。 与委托人接头，铲除僧侣. [pagebreak]

original: Better this than a real spider!
Fires faster than a standard bow.
I'll see what I can find, my Listener.
string: 我会尽力找找看的，我的聆听者。

original: Creates an Ice storm which paralyzes targets within its radius, dealing damage over time.
string: 制造一场冰暴，使范围内的目标陷入麻痹状态，并造成持续伤害。

original: I delivered the encoded book to Sentinel. Hopefully he will be able to decipher it.
string: 我已将加密书籍交给了守望者，但愿他能成功破解其中的奥秘。

original: This Sinding had the looks of a killer... and a cowardly one at that. His existence is an affront to Lord Hircine.
string: 那个辛丁看着就像个杀手…… 而且还是个懦夫。他的存在是对海尔辛大人的侮辱。

original: I've opened all the steam valves, next I should find the levers controlling the intake systems.
string: 我已经打开了所有蒸汽阀门，接下来要找到控制进气系统的操纵杆。

original: More free soul gems from these robots.
string: 又能从这些机器人身上拿到免费的灵魂石了。

original: I can picture this being the ideal spot for a murderer. Very homely indeed. Shall I wait outside?
string: 我能想象这地方是凶手的理想藏身之处，可真 “温馨”。我在外面等？

original: Conjure 2 Wrathman + Frost Rune
string: 召唤2个狂暴亡灵 + 寒霜符文

original: This won�t end in your favor.
string: 这场战斗不会如你所愿。

original: Look at this library... I could spend the rest of my life here reading, and still not finish every book.
string: 看看这个图书馆…… 我就算用一辈子来读，也读不完所有的书。

original: You're verging on knowing everything about me. I should keep at least a few secrets.
string: 你快把我摸得一清二楚了，我好歹也该留几个秘密

original: Resist fire, frost and shock damage spells 5% better.
string: 对火焰、寒霜和闪电伤害类法术的抗性提升 5%。

original: I have found the cave where Withers went to search for the Fire tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to her.
string: 我找到了威瑟斯前去寻找元素魔法・火焰卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚她遭遇了什么。
为什么不直接用晨星城的圣所？

original: Absorb <mag> Health per second from the target for <dur> seconds. If target dies while being drained, an invulnerable shade is summoned for 30 seconds.
string: 每秒从目标身上吸取<mag>点生命，持续<dur>秒。若目标在被吸取时死亡，将召唤一个无敌的暗影，持续 30 秒

original: I'm not sure it's wise to meddle in the Dunmer clans' affairs. Murder and betrayal make for their daily life, but it's a bit too exciting for me.
string: 我觉得插手丹莫家族的事务并不明智。谋杀与背叛是他们的日常，但对我来说，这实在太刺激了。

original: My sister and I work the farm now...and my son Fafi. He helps in his own way.
string: 现在我和姐姐打理农场…… 还有我儿子法菲，他也以自己的方式帮忙。

original: Jorrvaskr, is it? I like it here. Between the scent of mead, smoke, I can smell... wolves? Well, I always love me some pups.
string: 战友团的据点勇士之家，是吧？我喜欢这儿。空气中弥漫着蜜酒和烟火的味道，我还闻到了…… 狼的气息？嗯，我一直都喜欢小狼崽。

original: How am I holding up according to your estimation?
string: 你觉得我目前表现怎么样？

original: I hate it when you leave, but I love to watch you walk away.
string: 我讨厌你离开，但又喜欢看你转身离开的样子。
欢迎来到雷诺斯的实验室。

original: Each flower out here has its use, be it to heal or to kill... But I suppose you already knew that, didn't you?
string: 这里的每一朵花都有用处，要么治病，要么致命…… 不过我猜你早就知道了，对吧？
瓦尔库尔・比约恩 - 诺德海盗船长

original: What was that? This factotum was... wild. This is unusual.
string: 那是什么？这个构装体…… 失控了。这很不寻常。

original: It's hard being right all the time, you know. I knew Mercer couldn't be trusted.
string: 要知道，一直都对可太难了。我就知道墨瑟信不过。

original: How did you know about Amaund Motierre?
string: 你是怎么知道阿蒙·莫蒂耶的？

original: I need you to do something for me.
Honed Vampiric Steel Battleaxe of Consuming
I think not. I'll be on my way.
I can appreciate a consistent approach, but Falkreath takes it a little far with the death theming.
string: 风格统一固然好，但佛克瑞斯把死亡主题搞得也太过了。

original: Of course, I think I have space in my pack...
string: 当然，我包里应该还有地方……

original: I'm sure the rotting corpse will do wonders for this place's atmosphere.
string: 这腐烂的尸体肯定能给这地方的氛围 “增光添彩”。

original: Burns for <mag> points of fiery torment.
Why, High Rock of course. I'm a Breton after all.
string: 当然是高岩啦。我好歹也是个布莱顿人。

original: A rest sounds good right now doesn't it?
string: 现在歇会儿挺好的，对吧？

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Devouring
If you speak to Urag, buy me a book. Or three. Something fun.
string: 你要是跟乌拉格说话，帮我买本书，或者三本，要有趣点的。

original: A bounty has been issued for <Alias=Wizard>'s apprentice, who has fled after stealing a ring of dangerous power. The thief escaped in haste, and it is believed he sought refuge in one of Skyrim's inns. I should ask around - perhaps an innkeeper has seen a suspicious Breton wizard wearing an unusual ring.
string: 有人悬赏捉拿 <Alias=Wizard> 的学徒，此人盗取一枚蕴含凶险力量的戒指后潜逃。窃贼仓皇出逃，据信已躲进天际的某家酒馆。我该四处打听打听 —— 或许某位酒馆老板见过一个形迹可疑的布莱顿巫师，他手上戴着一枚样式奇特的戒指。

original: <Standing> Power Attacks that strike an enemy cause a <Fire> explosion.
string: 站立状态下的重击击中敌人时，会引发<火焰>爆炸。

original: I'm glad that's over. Let's get back to the mead hall.
string: 真高兴这事儿结束了，我们回蜜酒厅吧。

original: Did you do that on purpose!?
Good. Let's get back to living life, huh?
string: 好啊。那我们继续好好生活，好吗？

original: These students have been gone for weeks, I volunteer to find them.
string: 这些学生已经失踪好几周了，我自愿去找他们。

original: Deliver the infomation to a dead-drop
string: 将情报送到秘密投放点

original: Just a reminder that I am a mage. We have terribly weak backs.
string: 提醒你一下，我可是个法师。我们法师的背都娇贵得很。

original: That armor you're wearing? Best thing you've ever put on. Thieves or not, the Nightingales certainly have a good taste for fashion...
string: 你穿的这套盔甲？是你穿过最棒的东西了。不管是不是盗贼，夜莺的审美确实不错……

original: Hah! So you took his money, his contract, *and* his life.
string: 哈！这么说你拿了他的钱，接了他的契约，还取了他的性命。

original: You have to ask? You saved my life, took me along for an adventure of a lifetime, and gave me a story the Clans will hear for the rest of this age.
string: 这还用问？你救了我的命，带我踏上了这场毕生难忘的冒险，还让我拥有了一段能被各族传颂千古的故事。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Consuming
I've legitamized Aunt Gormli's forgery with a credible seal. I need to return it to her so she can continue with her plan.
string: 我用可靠的印章让戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书变得合法了。现在我得把文书还给她，让她继续推进计划。

original: He's as gone as I can make him.
string: 我已经把他处理得干干净净了。

original: Caster is invisible for <dur> seconds. Activating an object or attacking will break the spell.
string: 施法者隐身，持续 <dur> 秒。期间与物体交互或攻击都将消除法术效果。

original: My father feared that I would be similar to my cousins. It's why he instilled in me the importance of reading literature.
string: 父亲怕我变得和表兄弟们一样，所以他一直强调让我多读典籍。

original: Is it too late to back out? Fine, I know that's a silly question.
string: 现在退出还来得及吗？好吧，我知道这问题很蠢。

original: The Soul of <Alias=Victim> is now bound to your ring.
string: <Alias=Victim>的灵魂现已被束缚在你的戒指中。

original: And I'm happy to have you as one.
string: 我也很高兴有你这个朋友。

original: Excuse me for my... surprise. I am eagerly awaiting for my apostle's return.
string: 请原谅我的…… 惊讶。我一直在热切等待使徒归来。

original: The Mythic Dawn were instrumental in making that a reality. I don't care what Silus says. Do not help him.
string: 神话黎明组织就是酿成这场灾难的罪魁祸首。不管赛勒斯怎么说，你都别帮他。

original: They say that after the Red Eagle fell, he was carried by a procession of his kin up this very path...
string: 据说红鹰陨落之后，他的族人抬着他走过的就是这条路……

original: Sentinel has broken Acanthus's cipher. Sybille Stendor is alive and was impersonating Lirael all along. I should go to Shriekwind Bastion, kill Volkrov, Sybille's trusted friend, and find any information to point towards her hiding place.
string: 守望者破解了阿坎瑟斯的密码。希比利·斯丹特其实还活着，一直以来都是她在假扮莉瑞尔。我应前往啸风棱堡，除掉希比利的心腹沃尔克罗夫，并寻找能指明她藏身之处的线索。

original: I've cared about you more than anything long before we began our journey.
string: 在我们开始这段旅程之前，我就把你看得比什么都重要。

original: The murder cult itself? It's ominous to say the least. Your soul... is branded by Sithis himself.
string: 那个杀人邪教本身？至少可以说是不祥之兆。你的灵魂…… 已经被西斯蒂斯亲自打上了烙印。

original: It looks like a frost enchanted dagger might fit this slot.
string: 这柄寒霜附魔的匕首，看样子应当能适配这个插槽。

original: I'm like you now, traveler! Taking the first steps of a momentous journey!
string: 旅人，我现在和你一样了！正迈出这重大旅程的第一步！

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade has intercepted chilling omens: the vampires of Castle Volkihar, long sequestered on their fog-shrouded isle, have awakened under a prophecy that drives them to eclipse the sun itself. This isn't a metaphor, their ritual literally aims to shroud Tamriel in eternal night, freezing the land in undeath where mortals wither and their kind reigns supreme. Centuries of isolation hid their growing power, but now they stir, siphoning souls from coastal villages, their thralls infiltrating holds unnoticed. Failure here dooms us all: crops fail in endless dark, and Daedric lords like Molag Bal laughing as balance crumbles into vampiric dominion.

You must infiltrate their ancient fortress. Gain entry through deception, earn their trust with offerings of blood or relics. Seek the Dawnguard first for a prize to sway them. Uncover the prophecy's heart in their elder scrolls and crypts, then shatter it at any cost. Their court is a nest of betrayal: watch for ideologues, temptresses weaving illusions, and guards who sense warm blood. The price may test your soul, feeding on the innocent, oaths to the night, but remember, mercy's blade cuts deepest from within. Eternal darkness looms; only you can bring dawn.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>,

斯坦达尔之剑截获了让人毛骨悚然的坏消息：弗基哈尔城堡的吸血鬼们，一直躲在雾气腾腾的岛上不出来，如今因为一个预言醒了过来，竟想把太阳彻底遮住。这可不是打比方，他们搞的仪式是真要把泰姆瑞尔罩在永远的黑夜里，让整片土地都被不死力量冻住，人类慢慢衰败，而他们却能称王称霸。几百年来他们躲起来偷偷壮大势力，现在终于开始行动了，从海边村子里吸灵魂，手下还神不知鬼不觉地混进了各个领地。这事要是办砸了，我们全得玩完：没日没夜的黑暗里庄稼长不出来，莫拉格・巴尔这类魔神还会在一旁偷笑，看着世界平衡被打破，最后变成吸血鬼的天下。

你得潜入他们那座古老的堡垒。靠骗术混进去，再用献血或者奉上圣物的法子博取他们的信任。先去找黎明守卫，弄件能拉拢他们的宝贝。到他们的上古卷轴和墓穴里查明预言的核心，再不惜一切代价毁掉它。他们的据点就是个背叛窝：得防着那些死脑筋的狂热分子、耍幻术的妖女，还有能闻出活人气味的守卫。代价可能会是拷问你的灵魂 —— 吸食无辜者的血、向黑夜宣誓，但记住，从内部下手的 “仁慈之刃” 才最致命。永恒黑夜步步紧逼，唯有你能带来黎明。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: From now on, J'Faar will serve his Listener without question.
string: 从今往后，杰法尔会毫无异议地侍奉他的聆听者。

original: I've retrieved the key to Jolgeirr Barrow. I should return there and see what lies within.
string: 我取回了约基尔古坟的钥匙，现在该返回那里，一探陵墓深处的究竟。
晨风契约：杀死一位灰烬民（低风险）

original: I have defeated Antovahl Stormcaller and uncovered his power!
string: 我击败了安托瓦尔・唤雷者，还掌握了他的力量！

original: Summons a Draugr for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 施法者指向任意位置，召唤一只尸鬼，持续<dur>秒。

original: I don't want anything to do with you. Please leave me be.
string: 我不想再跟你有任何瓜葛，请别再来烦我。

original: The Nords of Falkreath are rumored to know how to tame Sabre Cats. Would learning how to tame animals be helpful?
string: 有传言说佛克瑞斯的诺德人懂得驯服剑齿虎。学习驯兽会有用吗？

original: Indeed. I need to ask you something.
Of course, let us continue onwards.
I don't feel contradictions in my protocols. My role as a protector of Renos R'en had ended when he was expelled from the city.
string: 我的程序中没有出现冲突。我作为雷诺斯・雷恩守护者的职责，在他被逐出城市时就已终结。

original: I still think of our childhood at times, Millie.
string: 我有时还会想起我们的童年，米莉。

original: Have you heard of the great Brunwolf Free-Winter?
string: 你听说过伟大的布伦武夫·逸冬吗？

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
By order of the Jarl, word is to be spread across the hold.

The wizard Viltrulf has reported that his apprentice, Irandir, fled in haste after stealing a ring of dangerous power. Irandir is a young one-eyed Breton, known to wear a monk's robe. Viltrulf does not seek his harm, but fears for both the boy's safety and the peril the ring may bring if left unchecked.

Those willing to aid in this matter should speak with the innkeepers of Skyrim - it is believed Irandir may have sought shelter at one of their establishments during his flight.

Any adventurer who locates Irandir and recovers the ring is instructed to return the artifact directly to Viltrulf, who may be found at the Temple of the Eight Divines in Solitude, where he will see the finder rewarded.
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
奉领主之命，此令需传遍整个领郡。

巫师维楚尔夫呈报，其学徒伊兰迪尔盗取一枚蕴藏凶险力量的戒指后仓皇出逃。伊兰迪尔是名独眼的年轻布莱顿人，惯常身着僧侣长袍。维楚尔夫无意伤他，却忧心这孩子的安危，更担心戒指若任其流散，恐将酿成大祸。

有意协助此事者，可向天际省的旅店老板打听消息 —— 据信伊兰迪尔逃亡途中，或许曾在某家旅店寻得容身之处。

凡找到伊兰迪尔并寻回戒指的冒险者，需将这件圣物直接交还维楚尔夫。他现居于独孤城的八圣灵神殿，届时会对寻回者论功行赏。

original: That was... Intense. A pity that he flew away before we had truly gotten started. We need to finish the job. Are you okay?
string: 刚才那场面…… 太激烈了。可惜我们还没真正开打，他就飞跑了。这事儿必须了结。你没事吧？

original: Discovered a patrol of Whiterun guards slaughtered by orcs and giant wolves.
string: 发现一队白漫守卫被兽人和巨狼屠杀了。

original: Then you were told wrong. Very wrong. Ebony is the art of a distant land.
string: 那你是被人骗了，骗得很惨。黑檀锻造术是遥远之地的技艺。

original: The entire sanctuary was wiped out. Purged in an attempt to root out a traitor that was killing off members of the Black Hand.
string: 整座圣所被血洗一空。这场清洗本是为了揪出那个暗杀黑手成员的叛徒。

original: Return to Nelosi tomorrow for your new <Alias=NameHolderForRobe00>
string: 次日返回内洛西处领取新的 <Alias=NameHolderForRobe00>

original: This is what you get for being so self righteous!
Are you buying the drinks, or will I have to steal them?
The spirits here speak of a coven called the Icereach. They attacked this place in ages past. Doesn't sound like many of them survived.
string: 这里的灵体提到了一个叫冰原的女巫会，她们在很久以前袭击过这里，看来没多少人活下来。

original: What else did he want? To restore the worship of Talos? Surely that isn't all.
string: 他还想要什么？恢复对塔洛斯的崇拜？肯定不止这些。

original: I find war distasteful, yet I understand that this may very well be a necessity. I will do what I can to support you across this campaign.
string: 我讨厌战争，但我明白这可能是必要的。在这场战役中，我会尽我所能支持你。

original: The stories of the Reach say that creatures like you are Peryite's gift, a grain stolen from Aka's hourglass, whetted with the blood of Lorkh.
string: 边塞的故事里说，像你这样的存在是佩里廷的馈赠，是从阿卡的沙漏里偷来的沙粒，用洛库的鲜血磨砺而成。
图书馆（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original:
Contract Kill a Stalker Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 12 Hours

[pagebreak] This client is "pretty sure" that their neighbor is stalking them and has performed the Black Sacrament "just to be safe." Whether the purported stalker is truly guilty or not is unimportant to us. Meet with the client and eliminate the Stalker. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名潜行者 省份： 天际 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:12 小时

[pagebreak] 这位雇主相当确定自己正被邻居跟踪，为了以防万一，便举行了这场黑暗祭礼。至于那位所谓的跟踪者究竟是否有罪，对我们而言根本无关紧要。 与委托人接头，铲除潜行者. [pagebreak]

original: And how do you expect to pay for that, hm?
string: 那你打算怎么付钱呢，嗯？

original: This place would benefit from an additional candle or two. Even vampires should be able to see where they're going.
string: 这地方该多放几根蜡烛，就算是吸血鬼，也得看得见路吧。

original: It's a pity I never knew her. My tutors spoke of her in high regard. It seems she was the opposite of the person that my father is now.
string: 真可惜我从没见过她，我的导师们对她评价很高，她似乎和现在的父亲完全不一样。

original: That all sounds good to me. Where to first?
string: 听起来都不错，我们先去哪？

original: So I joined him, and became the third member of his new Black Hand.
string: 于是我加入了他，成为了他新黑手的第三名成员。

original: If there's one place in all of Tamriel I don't want to be, it's here.
string: 泰姆瑞尔里我最不想来的地方就是这儿了。

original: Hmm? What can I do for you?
Elegy of the Lost
string: 亡者挽歌

original: I don't know. Maybe I'll decide later.
string: 我不知道，也许我稍后再决定。

original: If I had to choose anywhere in Skyrim to settle down, Riverwood would be high on the list. It's so peaceful, yet not without a little bustle.
string: 如果要我在天际选个地方定居，河木镇肯定名列前茅。这儿很宁静，又不至于太过冷清。
瓦尔塔拉的智慧效果已移除。

original: And if we're lucky, hopefully that means he's gone forever. At least for the next 80 years, anyway. Selfishly, that's all I need.
string: 要是运气好，希望他永远都回不来了。至少未来八十年别出现，就我个人而言，这样就够了。

original: Somewhere loud? I need a distraction from all my aches. I'd appreciate a tavern where there are free fistfights to watch - or maybe start.
string: 找个热闹点的地方？我需要找点乐子分散注意力，忘掉身上的伤痛。要是有酒馆能看免费的拳赛 —— 或者自己上去打一场，那就太好了。

original: That thinblood has no control over his power, and wouldn't learn it fairly either. He's a coward and a murderer. Any mercy for him is a waste.
string: 那个软蛋控制不住自己的力量，也不愿正正当当地去学。他就是个懦夫，个杀人犯。对他心慈手软根本就是浪费。
在我听来就是无稽之谈。

original: I'm not sure. What do you think?
Like the time we fooled the town elder into drinking a dozen tankards of strong spirit? He had lost his taste ages ago, and took it for water!
string: 就像那次我们骗镇长喝下十几杯烈酒？他早就味觉失灵了，还以为那是水呢！

original: Movement speed is increased by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.
string: 移动速度提升<mag>%，效果持续<dur>秒

original: We own property across the civilised parts of Tamriel and provide security services for wealthy individuals. From mercenaries to quality locks.
string: 泰姆瑞尔的文明地区到处都有我们的地产，我们还为富豪们提供安保服务，从雇佣佣兵到打造高级锁具，样样都做。

original: I need to trade some things with you.
I am prepared to accept all goods and gold.
string: 我已准备好接收所有货物和金币。

original: Your spells do 15% more damage. Grants the spell Ice Lance to the wearer.
string: 你的法术伤害提升 15%，并赋予穿戴者 “冰矛” 法术。

original: Ach... Foolish Imperial. Should've left well enough alone. C'mon - we'd best not keep the spirit below waiting.
string: 唉…… 愚蠢的帝国人，本该见好就收的。来吧，我们最好别让下面的灵体等太久。

original: Ah, things couldn't be more... perfect.
string: 啊，这一切简直…… 太完美了。

original: If it's from that tiresome Commander you can tell him I've already...what's this?
string: 如果是那个烦人的指挥官派你来的，你可以告诉他我已经…… 这是什么？

original: I'll be here if you change your mind.
string: 如果你改变主意来这里找我。

original: This place is nice, but I would've been more than fine with a campfire and a tent.
string: 这地方是不错，但有篝火和帐篷我就很满足了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
Dear Maxima,

Your quest is to find and eliminate the Altmer known as "Solendar the Exile". He's fled Cyrodiil, and our scouts report he's headed for the Serpent Standing Stone on Skyrim's northeast coast.

Remember your oath, Maxima.

Iskandar the Chronicler
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
致马克西芒：

你的任务是找到并铲除名为 “放逐者索伦达尔” 的高精灵。他已逃离赛瑞迪尔，我方斥候报告称，他正前往天际东北海岸的巨蛇立石。

谨记你的誓言，马克西芒。

史官伊斯坎达尔 敬上
</font>

original: I don't own much, but what I have can always be yours if you just ask.
string: 我拥有的东西不多，但只要你开口，我的一切都可以是你的。

original: Who brought you back from the dead?
string: 是谁把你从死里弄回来的？

original: I like your armor. Traveling light is smart.
string: 我喜欢你的盔甲，轻装上阵很明智。

original: He just froze time around us again, didn't he?...
string: 他又把我们周围的时间冻结了，对吧？……

original: Wake up love, it's a new day dawning!
string: 醒醒，亲爱的，新的一天开始了！

original: Cities that will burn in the wars to follow the Emperor's death.
string: 皇帝死后，战争四起，一座座城市将在战火中燃烧。

original: Summons a Dremora Caitiff for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一名魔人前锋，持续<dur>秒

original: Restores <mag> points of health for <dur> seconds.
string: 持续<dur>秒，每秒恢复<mag>点生命值

original: Excellent. I hope I can help jog your memory somehow... Be a shame if you forget all about me.
string: 太好了，希望我能帮你唤起记忆…… 如果你把我全忘了，那就太可惜了。

original: We are beholding the tomb of a great hero... And here, we will redeem the soul of another.
string: 我们正站在一位伟大英雄的墓前…… 而在这里，我们将救赎另一个灵魂。
落锤契约 | 中等风险

original: Aww, are you expecting a kiss in return? I suppose I can oblige...
string: 哎呀，你是不是想让我回吻你一下？那我就勉为其难吧……
法术书: 召唤火焰巨龙

original: Under the sun and sky, outlander. You look like you could use a new set of robes.
string: 在外奔波的人啊，看你样子，该换身新长袍了。

original: Recruitment Started: The Speaker of the Solitude Sanctuary has departed.
string: 招募启动：独孤城圣所的传声者已出发招募新人。

original: Tell me more about this beast.
string: 告诉我更多关于这只野兽的事。

original: Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original: Nevertheless, congratulations. If it had to be anyone, I'm glad it's you. Well, actually - Tolfdir is the most qualified for the job. But never mind.
string: 尽管如此，还是恭喜你。如果一定要选一个人，我很高兴是你。不过说实话 —— 托尔夫迪尔才是最适合这个职位的，不过无所谓了。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Winnowing
Joining the Thalmor, are we? Not sure I like the armor.
string: 你要加入梭默？我可不太喜欢这盔甲。

original: So what is it - professionalism? Greed? Or just you lust for kill?
string: 你到底是为了什么 —— 职业操守？贪婪？还是单纯的嗜杀？

original: The Thalmor thrive on chaos, and the disasters at Winterhold prove it.
string: 梭默靠混乱坐大，冬堡的灾难就是最好的证明。
聆听者居所（从金库支出 5000 金币）

original: You know, I wouldn't trade this adventure for anything. But...
string: 你知道吗，我愿意用一切来换这段冒险。但是……

original: So you've become a Nightingale in exchange for... What, exactly? This doesn't sound like a fair deal.
string: 所以你成了夜莺，换来的却是…… 到底是什么来着？这交易听着可不公平。

original: Aww. Do you think the spirit dog will let me pet him? He's so lovely!
string: 哇，你觉得这只灵犬会让我摸它吗？它好可爱！

original: Ugh... This place reeks of Falmer. You Nightingales are lucky to have those masks on.
string: 呃…… 这地方一股伐莫味儿，你们夜莺戴着面具可真幸运。

original: As a favor to the Emperor.
So, who do you think you will take the star to? I have to say, I'm not optimistic about our chances with Azura.
string: 那么，你打算把这颗星交给谁？说实话，我觉得我们跟阿祖拉打交道，胜算不大。

original: As mining villages go, it's quite lovely. Though the wastes surrounding it are quite bleak.
string: 就采矿村而言，这儿挺不错的。不过周围的荒地可太荒凉了。

original: Good idea Listener, we could use more amenities down here. What part of the sanctuary do you want to improve?
string: 好主意，聆听者，我们这地下确实该添些便利设施了。你想修缮圣所的哪个部分？

original: Without my sister's help, I don't think Fafi and I would be able to stay at Hollyfrost.
string: 要是没有姐姐帮忙，我和法菲恐怕根本守不住冬青霜农场。

original: This changes everything! United under one king, the Reachfolk will stop killing each other, and our blades will all point at Markarth's tyrants!
string: 这改变了一切！在同一个国王的统领下，边塞人将停止自相残杀，我们的刀刃将一同指向马卡斯的暴君！

original: I see they're fond of mounting skulls. You can't criticise them for a lack of creativity.
string: 看来他们喜欢把骷髅挂起来，你不能说他们缺乏创意。

original: You know, the abduction, the danger and all. And he won't even send us any backup!
string: 你想想，绑架、各种危险，他却连个后援都不给我们派！

original: Wait, is it true? Madanach - the King of the Reachfolk - he lives?
string: 等等，这是真的吗？迈德纳奇 —— 边塞人的王 —— 他还活着？

original: I read a note mentioning huskies were up for adoption near Dawnstar. I should look into adopting one myself.
string: 我看到一张纸条，上面说晨星城附近有哈士奇可以领养。我也该去看看，领养一只。

original: What can I do for you?

Contract Kill a Sailor Province: Hammerfell Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] This sailor made an unfortunate enemy on one of their many travels and now they want them dead. Meet with the client and eliminate the Sailor. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名水手 省份： 落锤 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 这名水手在多次航行中的某次旅程里不幸树敌，而如今对方一心想要置他于死地。 与委托人接头，铲除水手. [pagebreak]

original: Elsweyr Contract: Kill a Senche-raht (Very High-Risk)
string: 艾斯维尔契约：杀死一位森切-拉特（极高风险）

original: Don't worry, I'll do the right thing.
string: 别担心，我会做正确的事。

original: How can this be happening?... He's bringing dragons back from the dead...
string: 这怎么可能…… 他居然把龙从死里复活了……

original: Interesting thought. I suppose it would be helpful to have a werewolf as my protector. Just... Don't turn on me, okay?
string: 这想法挺有意思的。我想有个狼人当我的保护者应该挺有用的。只是…… 别把矛头对准我，好吗？

original: Alright, I'll see what I can find.
string: 好吧，我会尽力找找看的。

original: I'll be here whenever you need me.
string: 你需要我的时候，我一直都在。

original: 3rd of Evening Star, 4E 201 Why hasn't that nuisance made her move yet? Is she trying to play tricks on me? Is she preparing a full scale attack on my fort? No matter. If she makes a move, I will retaliate with haste! Thoron sent me here because there was something in this cavern, but Druq'aira must have followed me in here! I will not allow her to interfere with my plans. She has a fort opposite of mine in this cavern and we have mostly kept to ourselves. It is quiet, too quiet.
string: 第四纪元201年，夜星月三日 那烦人的家伙怎么还没动手？她是想耍什么花样吗？还是在筹备对我的堡垒发动全面进攻？无所谓了。只要她敢有动作，我定会立刻反击！索伦派我来这洞穴，是因为这里藏着某样东西，可德鲁凯拉肯定跟着我进来了！我绝不会让她搅了我的计划。她在洞穴里我的堡垒对面也建了一座据点，迄今为止我们大多时候都各不相干。周遭一片安静，可这安静，实在太不对劲了。

original: If you've got something to say, say it.
I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
I'll be waiting for you to get back, I promise. Now, go. And... Good luck.
string: 我会等你回来的，我保证。现在，去吧。还有…… 祝你好运。

original: How can I be of service, my Listener?
string: 我能为你效劳吗，我的聆听者？
终于，漫长的等待结束了。

original: Cyrodiil Contract: Kill an Imperial Legion Forrester (Medium-Risk)
string: 赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位帝国军团护林员（中等风险）

original: I don't like the way these vampires are looking at me. If one of them so much as touches me, I'll start throwing my spells.
string: 我讨厌这些吸血鬼看我的眼神，要是有一个敢碰我，我就开始甩法术了。

original: How can I be of service, my Listener?
string: 我能为你效劳吗，我的聆听者？

original: But for whatever reason, I do believe you. Does that make me simple? Probably.
string: 但不知为何，我信你了。这是不是说明我很傻？可能吧。

original: As his only daughter, he has been more than precautionary when it comes to my safety. I have done all I can to prove myself as capable on my own.
string: 作为他唯一的女儿，在我的安全问题上，他谨慎得过分。我已经竭尽所能证明自己有独自生活的能力。

original: I'd like to use it to seal a forgery.
string: 我想用它来封印一份伪造文件。

original: These bandits have a reputation, and for what? They go down just as easily as the other scum we encounter.
string: 这些土匪名声在外，可又怎样？还不是和我们遇到的其他渣滓一样不堪一击。

original: Others still retreated to the Valus, those rafters of the valley wide, making a home of the place that had taught them how to hide.
string: 还有些人退到了瓦卢斯山脉，在那片广阔山谷的林地里，把这个教会他们如何隐藏的地方当成了家。

original: We should go. What will you do now?
string: 我们该走了，你现在打算做什么？

original: You think I'm stupid? Don't lie to me again. I don't like it.
string: 你觉得我傻吗？别再跟我撒谎了。我不喜欢被骗。

original: Nice armor, Companion. I almost mistook you for Ysgramor.
string: 盔甲不错嘛，战友团的人。我差点把你当成伊斯格拉谟了。

original: The Arch Mage of Winterhold. Who else?
string: 冬堡的首席法师，还能有谁？

original: I must say, I am a little insulted the Night Mother has never chosen me. But we all have our role to play, and this is mine.
string: 说实话，夜母从没选过我，我心里还有点小委屈呢。但我们都有自己的使命，这就是我的命。

original: Thank you. Yes, that's enough sentimental business for one day.
string: 谢谢。好了，今天的感性时刻到此为止。

original: Erikur seems like a sleazy little man. And I'm not just saying that because he's forcing us to board a ship. The sea has never been my ally... Ugh.
string: 埃里克厄尔看着就像个卑鄙小人，我可不光是因为他逼我们坐船才这么说。大海从来都不是我的朋友…… 呃。

original: Well met sera. Tell me, what do you think of my robes?
string: 幸会，大人。说说看，你觉得我的长袍怎么样？

original: An Argonian? You're a long way from Black Marsh, friend. What brings you to the Reach, Hist-child?
string: 亚龙人？朋友，你离黑沼泽可太远了。希斯特之子，你到边塞来干什么？

original: Ha! Jealousy? The only thing I'm jealous of is the delusion you've developed. Surely you must realise how absurd this is.
string: 哈！嫉妒？我唯一嫉妒的是你那套妄想。你肯定意识到这有多荒谬了吧。

original: Well, seeing as you know my name, quite as like you know my legion then, too. Any soldier from the east was ordered to it.
string: 好吧，既然你知道我的名字，那你多半也知道我所属的军团了。东部的所有士兵都接到了命令。

original: Ignorantly, at first. Moving how our numbers forced us. Spread thin.
string: 一开始，我们打得很盲目，只能跟着人数优势硬冲，兵力也分散得厉害。

original: Can you train me in illusion?
string: 你能教我幻术系魔法吗？

original: Why does everything have to be so difficult? Damn that wizard and damn his research.
string: 为什么什么事都这么麻烦？该死的巫师，还有他那该死的研究。
献祭鲜血 - 地狱血杯

original: I've always wanted to write my own Great Song, like the Vateshrans of old. Someday, maybe!
string: 我一直想写一首属于自己的伟大歌谣，就像古代的瓦特什兰那样。说不定有一天就能写成呢！

original: Can you really call that armor!?
We're letting a Dagon cultist go without getting anything worthwhile? After running all around Skyrim for those pieces? Ugh, what a waste of time.
string: 我们就让一个达贡信徒走了，还没拿到任何有价值的东西？在天际跑了这么久找那些碎片，呃，真是浪费时间。
召唤野猪

original: I foolishly mispoke when delivering Aunt Gormli's forgery and was unable to deliver it to her nephew.
string: 我在送戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书时，笨嘴拙舌说错了话，没能把文书交到她侄子手里。

original: The ground suits you better than the battlefield.
string: 你还是躺在地上比待在战场上合适。

original: Ah, there you are. Have I got a treat for you...
I agree. And I would do that again if I went back in time.
string: 我同意。如果时光倒流，我还会这么做。

original: The Bards College is a beacon of culture. Maybe one day, I'll be refined just by wandering its halls.
string: 吟游诗人学院是文化的灯塔。或许有一天，我只要在它的大厅里走走，就能变得优雅起来。

original:
Contract Kill a Dibella Worshipper Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 12 Hours

[pagebreak] This devotee of Dibella has taken her devotion a little too far by bedding married men. Now one of the scandalized wives has performed the Black Sacrament to have her killed. Meet with the client and eliminate the Dibella Worshipper. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名迪贝拉信徒 省份： 天际 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:12 小时

[pagebreak] 这位迪贝拉信徒对女神的虔诚信仰已然走偏 —— 她与多名有妇之夫有染，丑闻缠身。一名不堪其辱的妻子忍无可忍，举行了黑暗祭礼，誓要取她性命。 与委托人接头，铲除迪贝拉信徒. [pagebreak]

original: Restore <mag> Health every second for <dur> seconds.
string: 每秒钟恢复<mag>点生命，持续<dur>秒

original: Wow, you really can't trust anyone out here, can you?
string: 哇，看来在这儿真的不能相信任何人，对吧？

original: Yes... Hircine and the spirits, they all fought with me.
string: 有…… 赫希恩和众灵都与我并肩作战。

original: I have the two sets of dragon cultist robes you wanted.
string: 我拿到你要的两套拜龙教长袍了。

original: They knew of my intention to one day leave the estate and so they prepared me for that eventuality. I will forever be grateful.
string: 他们知道我总有一天要离开家族领地，所以提前为我做好了准备。我会永远感激他们。

original: I need to trade some things with you.
That man is up to something, I can tell you that for certain. As for this Augur... I'm sure someone around the college will know something.
string: 那个人肯定在搞什么鬼，我跟你说。至于那个预言者…… 我相信学院里有人会知道些什么。

original: It consisted of four Speakers and one Listener, representing four fingers and a thumb.
string: 它由四位发言人和一位聆听者组成，分别代表着四根手指与一根拇指。
哇哈哈哈！现在，好戏开场了。

original: So this is Winterhold... It may not look like much now, but I have read that this was a prominent city back in the day.
string: 这就是冬堡啊…… 现在看着虽不起眼，但我读过记载，它曾是座繁华的城市。

original: A somewhat embarrassing display for them.
string: 他们这表现可够丢人的。

original: The Glenmoril Coven are gone. Ages of knowledge with them. I hope this was worth it... But I don't know.
string: 格伦摩利女巫会覆灭了，数代的知识也随之消失。希望这一切都是值得的…… 但我不确定。

original: I'm glad you're happy. Let's move on to something else.
string: 你开心就好。我们聊点别的吧。

original: Come closer so I can slash you!
Recruitment Complete: The Speaker of the Solitude Sanctuary has returned with a new Initiate.
string: 招募完成：独孤城圣所的传声者带回了一名新学徒。

original: I don't know why I bother sometimes.
string: 我都不知道为什么有的时候我会那么烦恼。

original: I think Sinding deserves to live.
A Literary Chest With A Literary Look

Contract Kill a Necromancer Province: High Rock Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] This high ranking court mage has been dabbling in the dark arts of necromancy, but their lord refuses to do anything about it. One courtier has taken matters into their own hands by performing the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Necromancer. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名死灵法师 省份： 落锤 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 这位高阶宫廷法师一直在涉足亡灵术这门黑暗技艺，但其效忠的领主却对此置之不理。于是，一名廷臣决定亲自出手 —— 举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除死灵法师. [pagebreak]

original: And this is why I don't like swimming!
string: 这就是我不喜欢游泳的原因！

original: Don't talk like that. All you've been through and you think this is going to be the end of you? I don't think so.
string: 别这么说。你经历了那么多事，难道觉得这次会是你的末日？我才不信呢。

original: Double sneak attack damage with one-handed weapons if the target is sleeping.
string: 若目标处于睡眠状态，单手武器潜行攻击伤害翻倍

original: Ugh, you'll be a lot friendlier when you're dead!
string: 呃，你死了之后肯定会友善得多！

original: I have found a massive moss covered cavern under Solitude. This place looks very strange and not like any other cave I've seen.
string: 我在独孤城地下发现了一个巨大的、布满苔藓的洞穴。这地方看起来十分诡异，和我见过的其他洞穴都不一样。

original: I've got your back if you've got mine.
string: 你护我周全，我也会为你撑腰。

original: It's ferocious. Just... Keep on your guard... It hunts unlike anything I've ever seen before.
string: 它异常凶猛。只是…… 务必保持警惕…… 它的捕猎方式，我从未见过。

original: Raises the user's Smithing abilities by <mag> points.
I have found the cave where Reykja and Sherivah went to search for the Frost tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to them.
string: 我找到了雷娅和谢里瓦前去寻找元素魔法・寒霜卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚她们遭遇了什么。

original: The leader of the Deephowl Hollow vampire clan has discovered a sinister new form of necromancy. I've encountered one of his revenant creations and managed to destroy it. If this clan manages to create an army of revenants, they could become a serious threat to the people of Skyrim. I've found a key that is part of a set of two. Likely, I need both to progress to the deepest parts of Deephowl Hollow. I have to find the other key!
string: 深嚎山谷吸血鬼氏族的首领发现了一种邪恶的新型亡灵魔法。我遭遇了他创造的一具亡魂，并成功将其摧毁。倘若这个氏族造出一支亡魂大军，他们将成为天际民众的巨大威胁。我找到了两把配套钥匙中的一把，看来要进入深嚎山谷最深处，我大概率需要集齐两把钥匙。我必须找到另一把！

original:
Contract Kill an East Empire Merchant Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] An independent merchant who was driven out of business by the East Empire Company is looking to settle the score with the East Empire Merchant who undercut his prices. Meet with the client and eliminate the East Empire Merchant. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名东帝国商人 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 一名被东帝国公司逼得破产的独立商人，打算找那个通过降价打压他的东帝国商人算账。 与委托人接头，铲除东帝国商人. [pagebreak]

original: Then I'll just have our town blacksmith craft an armor for me. He'd never say no to Millie.
string: 那我就让镇上的铁匠给我打造一套盔甲。他从来不会拒绝米莉的。

original: You'd frame someone for a crime he didn't commit? We've done our fair share of mischief ourselves, but this is going too far.
string: 你要诬陷一个人犯下他没做过的罪？我们自己干的恶作剧也不少，但这也太过分了。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">

Must remember to save the hearts for the children.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">

务必记得把这些心脏留出来，给孩子们备用。
</font>

original: Have you reconsidered my proposal regarding dragon cultist robes?
string: 你重新考虑我关于拜龙教长袍的提议了吗？

original: Don't waste my time, outlander. Bring me the required materials. Goodbye.
string: 别浪费我的时间，外乡人。把需要的材料拿来再说。再见。

original: A way to redeem myself in the eyes of the Night Mother by joining his new Black Hand.
string: 加入他的新黑手，以此在夜母面前赎罪。

original: Your Nerevarine blood gives you insane speeds never before seen by mortals.
string: 你体内的尼瑞瓦因之血，赋予了你凡人从未有过的惊人速度。

original: But it is apparent that our only chance to withstand the Thalmor is a united Empire.
string: 但很明显，我们对抗梭默的唯一机会就是统一的帝国。

original: Muiri should've killed her man by her own hands. Having someone else steal the satisfaction? Where's the joy in that?
string: 穆里本该亲手杀了她的男人，让别人抢走这份快意？那还有什么乐趣可言？

original:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="24">
NEW ALE INSIDE!! - Twice Strong

<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="18">
Come inside the Winking Skeever and try a new Twice Strong Ale! 

Step inside and raise a mug on the house!
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="24">
新品麦酒开售！—— 双倍劲爽

<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="18">
进店来眨眼恶鼠酒馆，尝尝新品双倍劲爽麦酒！

进店就送一杯，店家请客！
</font>
有需要我效劳的吗，首席法师？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
   Day 34 - First Raid
Riften was a damned waste of time.

Guards on every bloody corner walls high and tight and their damned archers dont miss. We barely got ashore before half the crew was ducking bolts. We couldnt sail away with gold but did take their banner. Tore it right off the hall myself. Figured if we couldnt loot em wed humiliate em.

Dawnstar made up for it. Port was half asleep when we hit it and the guards werent much better. Fires lit fast and we left with crates full of steel smoked fish some good rum and coin. One of the crew broguht me the Jarls favorite tankard poor bastard. Its mine now.

Carved one of their watchmen clean through with Glory Deveney too. That swords earned its name twice over ever since me ship went down last summers raid.

Day 43 - 2nd Raid
Weve come west hugging the coast near Solitude.

A proper raids in order but something strange stirred this shore. As we made landfall the ice on the cliffside split with a sound like the world cracking in half. Rock fell frost broke and there it was.. a Cavern hidden beneath the cliffs.

No one knows what caused it. Earthquake maybe? Or something woke up. Doesnt matter. Ive sent men inside to see whats buried down there. If theres treasure well have it. If theres something worse� well.. better they find it first.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
第 34 日 —— 首次劫掠

裂谷城这趟简直是白费功夫。

该死的守卫守在每个角落，城墙又高又牢，他们的弓箭手更是箭无虚发。我们刚上岸，半数船员就忙着躲箭雨。虽说没抢到金子，却夺了他们的城旗 —— 那面旗还是我亲手从议事厅扯下来的。既然没法洗劫，那就好好羞辱他们一番。

晨星城的行动总算弥补了损失。我们动手时，港口的人还半梦半醒，守卫也好不到哪去。火借风势烧得飞快，我们带着满箱的铁器、熏鱼、上好的朗姆酒和钱币扬长而去。船员里还有人给我捎来了领主最心爱的大酒杯，那倒霉蛋，这宝贝现在归我了。

我还用荣耀德文尼把他们一个守卫劈成了两半。自从去年夏天劫掠时我的船沉了，这把剑早就两次配得上它的名字了。

第 43 日 —— 二次劫掠

我们一路向西，沿着独孤城附近的海岸航行。

本打算好好干一场，可这片海岸却冒出了怪事。我们刚登陆，崖壁上的冰面就轰然裂开，那声响仿佛天崩地裂。岩石坠落，坚冰破碎，然后 —— 一个藏在悬崖下的洞穴就这么露了出来。

没人知道究竟是怎么回事，或许是地震？又或者是什么东西醒了过来。不过这不重要，我已经派人进去探查，看看下面藏着什么。若是有宝藏，那自然归我们；若是有更可怕的东西…… 哼，那就让他们先去探探路吧。
</font>

original: I won't be your dinner, troll!
string: 我才不要当你的晚餐呢，巨魔！

original: I'm leaving. I wish your next lover the best of luck because it will take a special type of person to put up with your malicious intentions.
string: 我要走了。祝你下一个爱人好运吧，毕竟得是个特别的人，才能忍受你的恶意。

original:
Contract Kill a Bosmer Ranger Province: Valenwood Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] An overzealous Bosmer Ranger has killed a Khajiit logger attempting to harvest wood from the edge of the Valenwood forest, creating an outrage in Elsweyr. One Khajiit has taken matters into their own paws by performing the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Bosmer Ranger. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名木精灵游侠 省份： 威木 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 一名狂热过头的木精灵游侠，杀死了一名试图在威木森林边缘伐木的虎人樵夫，这一行为在艾斯维尔激起了公愤。一位虎人遂亲自出手，举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除木精灵游侠. [pagebreak]
有人想要烧焦的恶鼠皮吗？！

original: "Hail Hircine, Lord of the Hunt, Master of Wood and Hill. All things that live must chase or flee, in death alone fall still."
string: “向海尔辛致敬，狩猎之主，森林与山丘的掌控者。万物非追即逃，唯有死亡方得静止。”

original: It'll take time for the Forsworn tribes to come around, but you've helped start a bright chapter for the Reachfolk. I am... grateful beyond words.
string: 弃誓者各部落归心还需要时间，但你为边塞人开启了崭新的篇章。我…… 感激不尽。

original: A mer, Mecinar, would have taken control of it, releasing abominations all over my town.
string: 一个叫梅西纳尔的精灵掌控了发条城，还在我的城镇里释放了各种畸形怪物。

original: I wonder how many more monsters we'll hunt today? We'll make Hircine proud, no doubt.
string: 不知道今天还要猎杀多少怪物？肯定能让海尔辛骄傲的。

original: Sheathe those claws if you please!
You do not have enough gold.
No wonder my father didn't want me to learn magic. He must've thought I'd end up in a place like this.
string: 难怪父亲不想让我学魔法，他肯定怕我最后落到这种地方。

original: I've never heard of this Molag, but I'm not sure he's the kind of individual we should be working for. He did trap you, after all.
string: 我从没听过这个莫拉格，但我不确定他是我们该合作的人，毕竟他把你困住了。

original: Make him repay the Reachfolk for what he's taken from us.
string: 让他为从我们这里夺走的一切，向边塞人赎罪。

original: Eyes of the Veil
string: 面纱之眼

original: Imagine the riches inside these walls. Not that we care for such things, of course.
string: 想想这墙里藏着多少珍宝。当然了，我们可不是贪图这些东西的人。

original: Conjure Chaurus Hunter
string: 召唤巢蚁猎人

original: Release the locked intake systems using the Intake Levers
string: 使用进气杠杆打开锁定的进气系统

original: Oh gods. Whatever they did to you, I hope it's not permanent...
string: 天啊。不管他们对你做了什么，希望不会是永久性的……

original: Why would he want to put one's mind into an other's body. We will figure it out in Kagrumez, won't we?
string: 他为什么要把一个人的意识放进另一个的身体里呢？我们到卡古梅兹就能弄清楚了，对吧？

original: That's what I was hoping to hear. Lead the way...
string: 我就想听你这么说。带路吧……

original: Why do we always find ourselves skulking around in the dark?
string: 我们怎么总在暗处鬼鬼祟祟的？

original: What did werewolves ever do to you!?
string: 狼人到底哪里得罪你了？！

original: (Khajiit) If only they had more summers to learn about the world.
string: （虎人）要是他们能有更多时光去了解这个世界就好了。

original:
About Amplifiers:
I have managed to figure out a way to combine dwemer scraps and soulgems into amplifiers. These magical enhancements can then be used as a way to strengthen my factotums, to enhance their abilities. However, creating them does require knowledge on how to melt and bend dwemer metal.
string: 关于增幅器：我已成功研制出一种方法，能将锻莫碎片与灵魂石合成为增幅器。这些魔法强化装置可用于强化我的构装侍从，提升其各项能力。不过，制作增幅器需要掌握锻莫金属的熔炼与塑形技艺。

original: Save us the effort and fall down and die!
string: 省点力气，直接倒下等死吧！

original: Let me know if you need anything else.
string: 如果你有任何需要请让我知道。

original: This... This is it! My mother's ring - it looks exactly the way I remembered it. Oh, you're such a doll, my sweet.
string: 这…… 这就是它！我母亲的戒指 —— 跟我记忆里的一模一样。哦，你真是个贴心人，我的宝贝。

original:
Contract Kill a Greenspeaker Province: Valenwood Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] For reasons known only to them, this client wants us to kill a Greenspeaker, one of Valenwood's powerful mages who are said to use nature magic to fashion tools, furniture, and even entire cities out of wood without violating the Green Pact Meet with the client and eliminate the Greenspeaker. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名绿语者 省份： 威木 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 这位雇主的动机我们无从知晓，其只要求我们猎杀一名绿语者 —— 威木的强大法师之一，据说这些法师能运用自然魔法，以木材打造工具、家具乃至整座城市，却不会违背绿色契约。 与委托人接头，铲除绿语者. [pagebreak]

original: It wasn't your decision, you should have followed orders.

The victory is in no small part to you, of course. Congratulations. I hope you receive the accolades you deserve.

original: Oh yes, you're right. I should've tamed my own dragon and travelled along side your one.
string: 哦对，你说得对。我当初也该驯服一条龙，跟你的龙并肩作战才是。

original: Wise and learned professor, couldn't drag himself from his studies to get the tools for his endeavor. How typically scholarly.

original: Idiots. They built a mine above a crypt! If I were there, I would've heard the spirits' cries and warned them away.

original: Attacking a poor defenceless woman!? I'm pulling your leg.
string: 攻击一个手无寸铁的可怜女人？逗你玩呢。

original: I... indeed, I also found myself caring about you in such strange ways... When you're hurt, my breaths skip; when you smile, my heart warms...
string: 我…… 其实，我也发现自己对你产生了这种奇妙的感情…… 你受伤时，我会屏住呼吸；你微笑时，我的心会变得温暖……
成员居所（从金库支出 2500 金币）

original: I'll grant you the peace denied by your curse.
string: 我会赐予你被诅咒剥夺的平静。

original: An apostle of the Clockwork City has disappeared on Solstheim. I am now in Nchardak Submerged Laboratory looking for him. Where could he be?
string: 发条城的一位使徒在索瑟海姆失踪了。我如今身处钠查达克水下实验室，正在寻找他的踪迹。他会在哪里呢？

original:
[pagebreak]

Journal of the Bloodtide

[pagebreak] We are bound by the rhythm. Not the weak beat of mortal hearts, but the deeper current that runs beneath the world. Few can hear it. Fewer still can follow. The rhythm is the pulse of the Bloodtide, a call older than the Divines, older than the night itself. Each whisper carries its echo. In silence, it guides us. In shadow, it shelters us. To those outside, it is madness. To us, it is truth. The Bloodtide does not hunger as mortals know hunger. We drink not only of blood, but of that ancient current, flowing unseen. Listen long enough, and you will hear it too. Step too close, and the veil will part. But know this, once the rhythm takes hold, you are already lost.
string:
[pagebreak]

血潮日志

[pagebreak] 我们为这韵律所缚 —— 并非凡人心口那微弱搏动，而是流淌于世界之下的幽邃暗流。能听闻此声者寥寥，循声而行者更是屈指可数。 这韵律便是 “血潮” 的脉动，一声比诸神更古老、比黑夜更悠久的召唤。每一句低语都携着它的回响，于寂静中指引我们，在暗影里庇护我们。 在外人眼中，这是癫狂；于我们而言，这是真理。“血潮” 之欲，绝非凡人所理解的饥渴。我们饮下的不只是鲜血，更是那股无形流淌的远古暗流。 若你静听良久，终会听见它的召唤；若你靠得太近，帷幕便会裂开。但你要知晓，一旦这韵律将你攫住，你便早已迷失其中。

original: Is this what passes for fighting outside the Reach? You should be embarassed!
string: 这就是边塞之外的人所谓的战斗？你都该感到羞耻！

original: And now we'll restore hope. No longer do they need to watch their backs at every moment.
string: 而现在，我们将重燃希望。人们再也不用时刻提心吊胆了。

original: It is impressive, isn't it? Ulfric Stormcloak gave my father this ring. To what use would it be put?
string: 这东西很了不起，对吧？乌弗瑞克・风暴斗篷把这枚戒指赐给了我父亲。它能派上什么用场呢？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade applauds your cunning in securing the Thalmor's dossier on Ulfric Stormcloak, a damning glimpse into their shadowed schemes. The revelations within chill the blood: Ulfric, Jarl of Windhelm and firebrand of the Stormcloak rebellion, was once their pawn, broken under interrogation during the Great War and molded into an unwitting asset by First Emissary Elenwen. They fed him lies, letting him believe his betrayal handed them the Imperial City, only to release him as a tool for their chaos. His defiance in the Markarth Incident, while a boon to their fracturing of Skyrim, turned him uncooperative, yet the Thalmor still see him as a lever to pry Tamriel apart. He is their enemy, yet one they wield to keep the civil war's flames stoked, ensuring neither Empire nor Stormcloaks claim victory.

This delicate balance threatens the innocent we are sworn to protect. Ulfric's past, his capture, his manipulation, his roaring defiance, makes him a blade that cuts both ways. The Thalmor's hands-off approach, save for their meddling at Helgen to preserve him, reveals their true aim: a prolonged war that bleeds Skyrim dry, leaving it ripe for their dominion. We cannot allow this stalemate to fester, nor can we let either side fall too swiftly into Thalmor traps.

I suggest you intervene directly, but of course, your path is yours to choose. Join the Stormcloaks in Windhelm, and sway Ulfric's rebellion to purge its reckless fury, guiding it toward justice rather than vengeance. Or enlist with the Imperial Legion in Solitude, bolstering their ranks to forge a unified front against elven machinations. Whichever banner you raise, uncover the depths of Ulfric's ties to the Thalmor's schemes, past and present, and ensure his fire does not burn Tamriel to ashes.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃为你智取梭默关于乌弗瑞克・风暴斗篷的档案的智谋喝彩，这份档案让我们得以窥见他们阴毒的阴谋，其内容令人不寒而栗：风舵城领主、风暴斗篷叛乱的煽动者乌弗瑞克，曾是他们的傀儡。他在大战期间的审讯中崩溃，被首席特使爱琳温塑造成了一枚不自知的棋子。梭默向他灌输谎言，让他以为是自己的背叛将帝都拱手相让，随后又将他释放，使其成为制造混乱的工具。他在马卡斯城事件中的反抗虽为梭默分裂天际的图谋提供了助力，却也让他变得不再受控制，但梭默仍将他视作瓦解泰姆瑞尔的杠杆。乌弗瑞克虽是他们的敌人，却被他们用来不断煽起内战的火焰，确保帝国与风暴斗篷双方都无法取胜。

这份微妙的平衡，正威胁着我们誓死守护的无辜之人。乌弗瑞克的过往、被俘经历、被操控的遭遇，以及他激烈的反抗，都让他成了一把双刃剑。梭默除了在圣地镇暗中干预以保全他之外，始终采取放任态度，这暴露了他们真正的目的：让战争长期持续，耗尽天际的元气，使其沦为他们统治的囊中之物。我们绝不能任由这种僵局持续恶化，也不能让任何一方过快落入梭默的陷阱。

我建议你直接介入此事，当然，最终的选择仍在你手中。你可以前往风舵城加入风暴斗篷，扭转乌弗瑞克叛乱中失控的怒火，引导其走向正义而非复仇；也可以去独孤城加入帝国军团，壮大其力量，组建对抗精灵阴谋的统一战线。无论你选择效忠于哪一方，都要查清乌弗瑞克与梭默阴谋的深层关联 —— 无论过去还是现在，并确保他的怒火不会将泰姆瑞尔焚烧殆尽。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Not even a scratch on my armor.

string: 很好。因为我可不想今天就停笔不写你的故事。

original: (Khajiit) This one found some student scribbles.

string: 我进入了调谐熔炉，这是一处位于未知地点的古老锻莫建筑。眼下熔炉似乎只有部分区域在运作，我得去调查这个房间，看看有没有办法重新点燃熔炉。

string: 好处嘛，我肯定你的力量和速度都会提升，说不定还会在一些有趣的地方长毛。

original: You're a proper soldier now. What does that make me? An associate soldier, I suppose?
string: 你现在是个正式的士兵了。那我算什么？准士兵？

original:
Contract Kill a Senche-raht Province: Elsweyr Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 72 Hours

[pagebreak] This Senche-raht devoured their former rider after the rider claimed to be its owner rather than an equal. Now one of the rider's bereaved cubs has performed the Black Sacrament, they want us to kill the headstrong battlecat as an act of revenge. Meet with the client and eliminate the Senche-raht. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名森切-拉特 省份： 艾斯维尔 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:72 小时

[pagebreak] 这头森切-拉特（战争之猫）之所以吞噬了前骑手，只因那骑手竟宣称自己是它的 “主人”，而非平等的伙伴。如今，骑手痛失亲长的幼崽已举行了黑暗祭礼 —— 为了复仇，他们要我们除掉这头桀骜不驯的战猫。 与委托人接头，铲除森切-拉特. [pagebreak]

original: Kait. We make a good team, don't you think?
string: 凯特，我们搭档得挺默契的，对吧？

original: It's good to see that not all of Skyrim is cold and miserable. I was starting to get worried.
string: 真高兴看到天际不全是又冷又压抑的地方，我都开始担心了。

original: You're my anchor. The source of my strength.
string: 你是我的精神支柱，是我力量的源泉。

original: Ah yes, your many houses. Where shall we go?
string: 啊，对，你有好多房子呢。我们去哪儿？

original: Scorching, I hope. Now, you know that I have been kept from the outside world for most of my life. This is my opportunity to see all that I can.
string: 希望是个劲爆的问题。你知道的，我大半辈子都被关在外面的世界之外，这是我见识一切的机会。

original: No idea, I just chose at random.
string: 不知道，我只是随便选的。

original: You might have to use more than just your eyes to, uh, find my ring.
string: 你找我的戒指，恐怕不能只靠眼睛看，呃，得多动动脑子。

original: When Laylana is your companion, all skills increase 5% faster and prices are 10% better.
string: 当蕾拉娜作为你的随从时，所有技能的提升速度加快 5%，交易价格也会优惠 10%。

original: I didn't think you needed to know.
He is in great danger. I'll need to search the room he rented.
string: 他处境极其危险。我得去搜搜他租的房间。

original: At first, I think they begrudged it. But after some time, they began to care for me as if I were one of their own. They taught me all I know.
string: 一开始，我想他们是不情愿的。但过了一段时间，他们开始像对待自己人一样关心我，教会了我所有我知道的东西。

original: Huh, inspiring. Just remember to learn from Mercer's mistakes.
string: 哈，真鼓舞人心。记住要从墨瑟的错误中吸取教训。

original: The Staff of Mental Disturbance is a powerful artifact from the Shivering Isles said to make anyone affected by it go temporarily mad by harming them with what seems like an electric shock. The staff was thought to have been long forgotten, until now.
string: 精神扰乱法杖是战栗孤岛的一件强力神器，据说它能通过释放类似电击的攻击伤害目标，令受影响者暂时陷入疯狂。这根法杖曾被认为早已被遗忘，直到如今重见天日。

original: You didn't tell me you were married.
That's quite enough of the Thalmor for one day. Let's get back to Delphine.
string: 一天之内见够梭默了，我们回去找德尔菲娜吧。

original: How did you become a Speaker?
string: 你是怎么成为演说者的？

original: A feud? A grudge? The Companions always like to solve trouble. No matter, let's handle this.
string: 世仇？积怨？战友团就喜欢解决麻烦，没关系，我们来处理。

original: Thank the spirits I found you! I was worried when I noticed you gone. But wait, is that... mischief in your eyes? What happened while you were gone?
string: 谢天谢地找到你了！发现你不见的时候我可担心了。等等，你眼里那是…… 恶作剧的光芒？你不在的时候发生什么了？

original: I do not know. Something... weird... is happening.
string: 我不知道。有什么…… 奇怪的…… 事情正在发生。

original: Obtaining a unspoiled portion of Vampiric Blood is extremely difficult and can only be attempted with a special device. The Dwemer were the first to create such extraction devices, and since then, many have tried to replicate their design.
string: 获取一份未变质的吸血鬼之血极其困难，只能借助特殊装置尝试提取。锻莫是最早发明此类提取装置的种族，自那以后，许多人都试图复刻他们的设计。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Harvesting
My time! It has come! I must speak with Captain Gjalund at once!
string: 我的时机到了！终于来了！我必须立刻去见贾伦德船长！

original: The fight is over. Are you hurt?
string: 战斗结束了。你受伤了吗？

original: Cyrodiil. For most of my life I was part of the Cheydinhal Sanctuary.
string: 赛瑞迪尔。我大半辈子都隶属于香丁赫尔圣所。

original: Uh... This is a deception, right? You're not actually marrying them?
string: 呃…… 这是骗人的吧？你不会真的要和他们结婚吧？

original: Ugh, you sound like my father. Let's move on and forget I said anything.
string: 呃，你说话跟我父亲一样。我们赶紧走，就当我什么都没说。

original: Keep clear, wanderer. Pressing matters only.
string: 离远点，流浪者。除非有要紧事，否则别来烦我。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><u>Day 13</u>
Yet again I have acquired more black souls, and yet again the blade refuses to manifest itself in the forge.

The ritual was precise, flawless. The incantation was spoken in the true tongue. The soul bindings were sealed with my own blood and the blood of these fools. 

Still, the blade eludes me. 

It cannot be a mistake of mine. No. It is this wretched vessel, this rotting carcass of a ship, unworthy of housing my ambition. It bends, cracks, and groans beneath the weight of true power.

Some lesser force intervenes perhaps. A presence that skitters in the corner of my sight. It dares to whisper when I sleep.

Let it come. Let whatever specter haunts this husk of wood and rust see what power truly looks like. I did not cleave the throat of the high priest only to be undone by creaking shadows and sea rot.

The next attempt will succeed. There are always more souls.

I will silence the whispers.
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><u>13日</u>
我又搜集到了更多黑暗灵魂，可那柄利刃依旧不肯在锻炉中显形。
