仪式精准无误，完美无缺。咒语是以古老真语念诵的，灵魂绑定更是以我自身的鲜血 —— 还有这些蠢货的血 —— 封缄。

即便如此，那柄剑还是避着我。

这绝不可能是我的错。绝不！问题定然出在这该死的载体上，这船骸早已腐朽，根本不配承载我的野心。在真正的力量面前，它只会弯折、开裂，发出苟延残喘的呻吟。
或许是某种卑劣的力量在从中作梗。有个影子总在我视野边缘游窜，竟敢在我沉睡时窃窃私语。

尽管来好了。管它是什么幽魂在这堆朽木与铁锈间作祟，都让它见识见识真正的力量！我连大祭司的喉咙都敢割裂，岂会被些吱呀作响的阴影和海腐之气打垮。

下一次尝试必将成功。灵魂从来都不缺。

我会让那些低语彻底噤声。

original: I have told Urag the sad conclusion for the missing students and he rewarded me for my efforts.
string: 我把失踪学生的悲惨结局告诉了乌拉格，他为我的付出给予了奖励。

original: I'd say I know you pretty well and I'm just a little surprised that this is your course of action.
string: 我自认为很了解你，所以有点惊讶你会这么做。

original: I shall now continue as Clocky the Factotum.
string: 从现在起，我就是时钟型构装体了。

original: You shall be Silencer to Speaker Drusilla.
string: 你将担任演说者德鲁西拉的沉默者。

original: They don't know who they�re up against.
string: 他们根本不知道自己在和谁作对。

original: I'm certain there will be some more shambling corpses around the corner.
string: 我敢肯定拐角处还有更多摇摇晃晃的尸体。

original: I did try. But my environment and my tutors didn't lend themselves to physical weapons. In truth, wielding a weapon would have been trial and error.
string: 我试过，但我的生活环境和导师都不教我使用实体武器。说实话，用武器对我来说就是不断试错。

original: If we're going to be out so late, at least it's a clear night.
string: 就算要待到这么晚，至少今晚天朗气清。

original: Can't say I'm surprised. I just hope the beast doesn't claim anyone else...
string: 我并不意外。只希望那野兽别再害其他人了……

original: This one felt he had to take a stand. We could not keep running forever.
string: 我觉得我必须表明立场。我们不能一直逃避下去。

original: Do you hear that? No, just me? Alright then.
string: 你听到了吗？没有？只有我听到？那好吧。

original: Oh dear, this doesn't look good!

string: 聆听者居所（从金库支出 5000 金币）

original: Hehehehe. First time he made me laugh. Why don't we put his clown suit on the next Stormcloak we kill.
string: 嘿嘿嘿。这是他第一次逗笑我。不如我们把他那身小丑服扒下来，给下一个杀的风暴斗篷士兵穿上。

original: Whiterun is Skyrim's center of commerce. Adventurers and merchants alike all want to try their luck here.
string: 白漫是天际的商业中心。冒险者和商人都想来这里碰碰运气。

original: My nephew won't be hard to find. All he does is sit.
string: 找我外甥不难，他整天就知道坐着。

original: I've legitamized Aunt Gormli's forgery with a credible seal. I need to return it to her so she can continue with her plan.
string: 我用可靠的印章让戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书变得合法了。现在我得把文书还给她，让她继续推进计划。

original: This has already been the adventure of a lifetime, so right now you're holding up pretty well in my opinion.
string: 这已经是一生难求的冒险了，所以在我看来，你目前表现得相当不错。
科洛维亚毛皮头盔（红色）

original: I am glad to be part of your adventures.
string: 很高兴能参与你的冒险。

original: Here, take this amplifier. It'll make you more proficient in destruction magic.
string: 拿着，这是增幅器。它会让你更精通毁灭系魔法。

original: I'm feeling less optimistic about this by the second...
string: 我对这事的乐观情绪一秒秒在消失……

original: Ominous? I was going for terrifying! For impending doom! Ah well, I guess that one still needs work...
string: 阴森？我本来想营造恐怖的氛围！渲染末日将至的感觉！唉，看来这段还得再琢磨琢磨……
黑沼泽契约 | 低风险
宴会厅（从金库支出 2500 金币）

original: The truth is... when I tried to imagine a life without you, there's nothing but a blank fog in my head.
string: 事实上…… 当我试着想象没有你的生活，脑海里只有一片模糊的迷雾。

original: Peasants or Emperors... No man is safe from Sithis.
string: 无论是平民还是皇帝…… 没有人能逃过西帝斯的掌心。

original: No targets were marked for assassination.
Any Reachman magic you can use to improve my chances?
string: 你有没有边塞人的魔法能帮我提高胜算？

original: Forgive me, it was many years ago. Times were different than they are now.
string: 请原谅我，那都是很多年前的事了。时过境迁，今非昔比。

original: Now that the Dark Brotherhood is expanding again, I am no longer expected to carry out assassinations on my own. As Listener, my duty is to hear the words of the Unholy Matron and turn her dictations into contracts for my lesser brothers and sisters to perform.
string: 黑暗兄弟会再度扩张，我不必再独自执行暗杀任务了。作为聆听者，我的职责是聆听圣母的话语，并将她的指示转化为契约，交由兄弟会的晚辈们去执行。

original: Give me a day. Such artistry cannot be rushed. Return tomorrow for your custom robe.
string: 给我一天时间。这般工艺可急不得，明天再来取你的定制长袍。

original: Luckily for you, I enjoy doing things.
string: 你很幸运，我很喜欢做这些事。

original: Well, that cell didn't seem to do much good, did it? Let's find Hircine and put this business to bed.
string: 看来那牢房也没起什么作用，对吧？我们去找赫希恩，把这事了结了。

original: Giants don't like it when we get too close, so watch your step... Unless you've got a craving for some mammoth cheese?
string: 巨人不喜欢我们靠得太近，所以走路小心点…… 除非你想吃猛犸奶酪？

original: Staff of the Giant Frostbite Spider
Reflecting... There is no way to go through. Maybe if we try controlling the draining system?
string: 思考中…… 无法通过。或许我们可以试试控制排水系统？

original: I overdid my delivery of Aunt Gormli's forgery and was unable to deliver it to her nephew.
string: 我在送戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书时做得太过火，没能把文书交到她侄子手里。

original: To every machine, a purpose. We must all serve our purpose.
string: 每台机器都有使命。我们都必须各司其职。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
Lord Gawayne suggested that we bring in more Septims for our mission, and his idea was to start fishing so we could trade the catch with local merchants. 
Of course, I thought the idea was preposterous! Vampires don't engage in trade and barter, but our Lord was set on the idea, so we started taking boats in shifts. 
That's when I discovered that I have quite a knack for fishing! I'd even say that over time, I started to enjoy it. I find it quite relaxing. Maybe we all have to be more open to ideas outside of our comfort zone?


Lately, I've been taking the boat out on my own, outside of my assigned shift. Last night I almost went as far as Castle Volkihar. I have my mind set on catching a Vampire Fish! No luck so far, but one of these days I hope to reel one in!
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
加韦恩大人提议我们为任务多攒些赛普汀，他的主意是去捕鱼，然后把渔获卖给当地商人。

我当然觉得这主意荒唐透顶！吸血鬼哪会做什么买卖交易，可大人执意如此，我们只好轮班驾船出海。也正是这时，我发现自己居然超有钓鱼天赋！甚至可以说，久而久之我还爱上了钓鱼，感觉这事儿特别放松。或许我们都该更敞开心扉，尝试些舒适区之外的事？

近来，我总在轮班之外独自驾船出去。昨晚我差点就划到弗基哈尔城堡了，我铁了心要钓上一条食人鱼！虽说至今还没如愿，但我相信总有一天能把它钓上来！
</font>

original: There is nothing here for me now, my friend. I shall join my brother in Karthwasten. It would be a pleasure to see you there sometime.
string: 这里已经没什么可留恋的了，朋友。我要去西卡斯镇找我兄弟。如果你哪天来那里，我会很开心的。

original:
Here's the sum we agreed upon. I trust that you will make <Alias=Player> pay for killing my dear <Alias=Victim>. Return to me with proof of the deed.

If you run afoul of the law, I will pay your bounty.

--<Alias=Relative>
string:
这是我们商量的结果。我相信你会让<Alias=Player>为杀死我亲爱的<Alias=Victim>付出代价的。带着完成的证明回来找我。
　如果你触犯了法律，我会偿付你赏金的。
　—<Alias=Relative>

original: It's about time Mother picked a Listener with brains. She usually only cares about the ears.
string: 夜母总算选了个有脑子的聆听者。她以往只看重耳朵好不好使。

original: When one is not able to prove their worth to the apostles of the Clockwork City, they are not able to join them.
string: 若有人无法向发条城的使徒证明自己的价值，就无法加入他们。

original: I don't want any part of this and you shouldn't either.
string: 我不想掺和这事，你也不该。

original: Loot Dragon Cultist Robes & 5 Heartstones from Cultist
string: 从教团成员身上掠夺拜龙教长袍和 5 块心石

original: You may not be a complete stranger to me, but you still count as a potential buyer.
string: 你对我而言或许不算完全的陌生人，但你依然是潜在的买家。

original: With the Emperor dead, Cyrodiil will spiral into chaos. Riots, coups, death... I hope your conscience can bear it.
string: 皇帝一死，赛瑞迪尔将陷入混乱。暴乱、政变、死亡…… 希望你的良心能承受这一切。

original: Are you planning to start some trouble?
I shall now continue as Sotha Tum the Factotum.
string: 从现在起，我就是索萨・图姆型构装体了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

A source in the Thalmor embassy learned <Alias=Boss> worships Talos. The proof has to disappear before they investigate. Taking it will save <Alias=Boss> from a horrible end and make the Thalmor look foolish with yet another wrong lead. Break into the place and grab the evidence quickly.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

我们在梭默大使馆的线人获悉，<Alias=Boss>暗中崇拜塔洛斯。相关证据必须在他们展开调查前彻底销毁。取走这些证据，既能让<Alias=Boss> 免遭惨祸，又能让梭默因又一条错误线索而颜面尽失。立刻潜入目标地点，夺取证据。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: The Reachmen were conquered by people other than the Nords?
string: 边塞人除了被诺德人征服过，还被其他种族征服过？

original: Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original: Is it supposed to hurt so much?
string: 难道注定要这么痛苦吗？

original: Make your way to the Cavern of the Stormcaller.
These fabricants are very interesting. A mixture of humanoid flesh and mechanical wiring. Nothing like me, a fully synthetic factotum.
string: 这些构装体很有意思。是类人血肉和机械线路的混合体。和我这个纯人造的构装体完全不同。

original: Summons a Werebear for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只熊人，持续<dur>秒

original: The chaos to follow will allow me to rise.
string: 随之而来的混乱会让我崛起。

original: You are no longer commanding the Windhelm family.
string: 你已不再执掌风舵城家族。

original: I never knew him much, and that's good enough for me.
string: 我对他了解不多，这样就够了。

original: Resist 15 points of Fire, Frost, and Shock damage for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，就获得 15 点火焰、寒霜和闪电伤害抗性。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade thanks you for your skill. You are now offered a place with us, as a quiet protector of Tamriel's justice and balance. We are a shadow group sworn to guard the land from anyone who would break its peace, whether tyrants, cult leaders, or schemers like the Thalmor. We answer to no king or flag. We use any weapon, trick, or secret to get the job done. As our agent, you could pick your missions freely, take as many or as few as you want, with no strings attached.

To the Blade, I am Sentinel. I watch Skyrim for dangers to its people. The enchanted barrel you used now holds jobs to stop those threats, plus your payment for the last one. Do them, and more gold is yours. Only pick ones you know you can finish clean. Stay hidden; our enemies are close.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃为你的精湛技艺向你致谢。如今，我们向你敞开大门，邀你成为泰姆瑞尔正义与平衡的隐秘守护者。我们是一支立誓守护这片土地的暗影组织，誓要对抗所有破坏和平之徒 —— 无论其是暴君、教派领袖，还是像梭默那般的阴谋家。我们不效忠于任何国王，也不屈从于任何旗帜。为达成目标，我们可动用任何武器、施展任何诡计、利用任何秘密。成为我们的特工后，你可自由挑选任务，接取多寡全凭心意，无任何附加条件束缚。


剑刃在上，我是哨兵。我为天际的民众守望四方，警惕一切潜在威胁。你此前用过的那只附魔木桶中，如今已存放着用以阻止这些威胁的任务，还有你上一次任务的报酬。完成这些任务，更多赏金便归你所有。只选那些你有把握干净完成的任务去做。务必隐匿行迹，我们的敌人近在咫尺。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵


</font>

original: Oh my goodness, you are impertinent aren't you. It's a good thing I like people who speak plainly.
string: 哦我的天，你还真无礼啊。不过还好我就喜欢说话直来直去的人。

original: Skyrim Contract: Kill a Thalmor Justicar (High-Risk)
string: 天际契约：杀死一位梭默审判官（高风险）
梦境中…… 熟悉的气味。布满皱纹的手。

original: Sybille is dead. Her silent reign over Solitude is over.
string: 希比利已死，她在独孤城的隐秘统治就此终结。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>
I cant keep their secrets any more. Someone else can stand watch for eternity.

R
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>
我再也无法替他们保守秘密了。就让别人来永守这份警戒吧。

R
</font>

original: This isn't going to be easy... If only that wizard could just give us his research notes. We don't want things to be boring though, do we?
string: 这事儿可不简单…… 要是那巫师能直接把研究笔记给我们就好了。不过那样就没意思了，对吧？

original: I'm sure Dibella appreciates you cleaning your mess. Now, where to next?
string: 我相信迪贝拉会感激你收拾烂摊子的。现在，下一站去哪儿？

original: Let's tread carefully whenever we're at dragon lairs - we wouldn't want to spook the dragon and lose our advantage.
string: 每次到龙巢都要小心行事 —— 可别惊动了龙，丢了我们的优势。

original: Fortify Magicka 10, then double the amount for each additional piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 法力值增加 10 点，每多装备一件雪王子盔甲，该加成便会翻倍。

original: The court wizard was a little highly strung, don't you think? Very inspiring. I'm thrilled to be working for him.
string: 宫廷法师是不是有点太紧张了？可真 “鼓舞人心”，我可太乐意给他干活了。

original: How can it be that nobody knows what happened to the Dwarves? Surely it's documented somewhere. Perhaps this place has answers.
string: 怎么会没人知道矮人遭遇了什么？肯定有文献记载的，或许这地方能找到答案。

original: What can I do for you?
Take care with those runes, who knows what will happen if you get it wrong.
string: 这些符文可得小心点，要是刻错了，谁知道会发生什么。

original: Sure, it has its flaws. The ever flighting taxes and the East Empire Company's oligarchs owning everything, for instance-
string: 当然，帝国也有缺点。比如不断上涨的赋税，还有东帝国公司的寡头垄断一切 ——

original: Give the "Amplifier: Magic Resist" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：魔法抗性” 交给构装体

original: Is that an amplifier? Thank you.
You shall be Silencer to Speaker Garnag.
string: 你将担任演说者加尔纳格的沉默者。

original: This village is a bit cold, but the way it smells, the genuine smiles, and the spirits' hum in the air... It almost feels like home to me.
string: 这个村庄虽然有点冷，但这里的气息、真诚的笑容，还有空气中灵体的嗡鸣…… 几乎让我感觉像家一样。

original: You... If you could slay the beast for me, I'd be grateful. My wife and son would be too. I'd reward you for your effort.
string: 你…… 如果你能为我杀了那只野兽，我会感激不尽。我的妻子和儿子也会的。我会报答你的。

original: Summon Daedric Oathblade
string: 召唤魔族誓约之刃
克隆万格氏族的拒绝信

original: Wow... Look at the landscape from here. The ruined tower and it's residents aside, this is a remarkable place.
string: 哇…… 从这儿看风景，抛开那座破败的塔楼和里面的东西，这儿简直绝了。

original: As a girl, I often wondered how Whiterun got its name. I imagined white horses running on the tundra, hence "Whiterun."
string: 小时候，我常常好奇白漫这个名字的由来。我想象着白色的骏马在苔原上奔跑，所以才有了 “白漫”。

original: That's a high bar to pass, but I'm sure you will manage.
string: 这目标虽然艰巨，但我相信你一定能做到。

original: And here I was thinking we were in this together.
string: 我还以为我们是一伙的呢。

original: I'm thinking about gravesinging - an ancient Reachfolk art similar to necromancy. It's difficult though, so don't expect me to talk to any corpse.
string: 我在琢磨唱坟术 —— 一种古老的边塞技艺，有点像死灵术，不过很难学，所以别指望我能跟尸体说话。

original: You do not deserve to live.

string: 调查佛克瑞斯附近的树林

original: Good blood is like good soup, traveler. Thick and hot.
string: 旅人啊，纯正的血脉就像美味的汤，醇厚又滚烫。

original: As you can see, I'm still here.
Summon Iron Oathblade
string: 召唤铁制誓约之刃

original: I don't know what awaits you in Nocturnal's domain, but don't let her power threaten you. May the divines protect you when you meet her.
string: 我不知道你在诺克图娜尔的领域会遇到什么，但别让她的力量威胁到你。愿众神在你面见她时护佑你。
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 中等风险

original: Leave the Oblivion Realm/Shut the Gates
string: 离开湮灭领域 / 关闭大门

original: The console lies dormant. You're carrying a Dynamo Core that looks like it could fit into the empty socket at its center. Do you wish to insert it?
string: 控制台处于休眠状态。你身上携带的发电机核心看起来正好能嵌入它中央的空插槽里。你是否要将其插入？

original: Which reminds me. I've already met with Nazir and taken the liberty of having her coffin brought to Solitude.
string: 说到这个，我已经见过纳齐尔了，还自作主张把夜母的棺材搬到了独孤城。

original: Thousands of years wandering these halls, and you get shutdown today.
string: 在这些大厅里游荡了数千年，今天终于要停机了。

original:
- Markarth Family -

Markarth Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsMarkarth>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapMarkarth>
Markarth Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepMarkarth> Gold
string:
- 马卡斯城家族 -

马卡斯城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsMarkarth>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapMarkarth>

马卡斯城维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepMarkarth> 金币

original: It's time for Kodlak's funeral, it seems. The spirits here... they're in mourning.
string: 看来是时候为克拉科举行葬礼了。这里的灵体…… 都在哀悼。

original: Anyway, we should continue onwards. We have plenty to do after all.
string: 好了，我们该继续赶路了，毕竟还有很多事要做。

original: I... I'm not exactly experienced when it comes to this sort of thing. As you know, I rarely left the estate walls. I've never had romantic interest.
string: 我…… 我在这方面没什么经验。你知道的，我几乎没离开过领地，从没谈过恋爱。

original: So, you've joined the war, which means that I have also joined the war. Involuntarily, might I add. But I will support you as always.
string: 这么说，你加入了战争，那意味着我也加入了。声明一下，是被迫的。但我会像往常一样支持你。

original: When the Dark Brotherhood fell apart, we all looked to her to lead us, but she and I had some... differences of opinion.
string: 当黑暗兄弟会分崩离析时，我们都指望她带领我们，但我和她之间有些…… 意见分歧。
科洛维亚毛皮头盔（白色）

original: Summons a Bear Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一头熊魔宠，持续<dur>秒
法术书: 召唤泥沼蟹
把戒指归还给奥斯维尔达

original: That really doesn't seem like the kind of thing we should be doing.
string: 这事儿我们真的不该做。

original: By carving the Empire, forcing a chasm between Imperials and Nords? Mean to say that makes Skyrim stronger?
string: 靠分裂帝国，在帝国人和诺德人之间制造隔阂？你是说这样能让天际变得更强大？

original: Perhaps I'll train you if you ask nicely enough!
string: 你要是好好求我，我或许会教你几招！
召唤梅法拉的誓约之刃

original: Oh I'd love to, Listener, there isn't anything else we need. You've already bought it all!
string: 哦，我倒是想接着弄，可聆听者，我们真的什么都不缺了。你早就把所有东西都买好了！

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
The woods hide me well, though their roots thirst for the blood I spill. I have gathered what he asked. Hearts, bones, and the screaming ones who will not see another dawn. His seal grows stronger with each life taken. Soon, the tunnel below will open, and the Blood Lord will rise to claim this land.
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
森林将我完美隐匿，其根须却渴求着我洒下的鲜血。我已集齐他所要之物：心脏、骸骨，还有那些惨叫着迎来末日的灵魂。每夺走一条性命，他的封印便会坚固一分。用不了多久，下方的秘道就会开启，鲜血领主将苏醒归来，执掌这片土地。

original: Tell Aunt Gormli the good news
string: 告诉戈姆莉姨妈这个好消息

original: The Huntmaster is the greatest of our spirits. He took up the mantle of Lorkh, and protected us when few would.
string: 狩猎大师是我们最伟大的灵体。他继承了洛库的衣钵，在无人庇护我们之时守护着我们。

original: There will always be other villains.
string: 世上总会有其他恶棍的。

original: I smell a curse in this old blade. Hag weapons always bear the marks of Reach magic, and I can feel the spirits recoil in that one's presence...
string: 我从这把旧斧头里闻到了诅咒的味道，女巫的武器总会带着边塞魔法的印记，我能感觉到灵体在它面前退缩……

original:
Contract Kill a Non-Pact Bosmer Province: Valenwood Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] Not all Bosmer honor the Green Pact, which forbids the eating of plants and commands the Wood Elves to be exclusively carnivorous. Some are so offended by their "salad-eater" kin that they will even turn to violence, such as our client. Meet with the client and eliminate the Non-Pact Bosmer. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名非协约木精灵 省份： 威木 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 并非所有木精灵都恪守绿色契约 —— 这份契约禁止食用植物，勒令木精灵只能以肉食为食。部分木精灵对这些食素的同族憎恶至极，甚至会诉诸暴力，我们的雇主便是如此。 与委托人接头，铲除非协约木精灵. [pagebreak]

original: Can we meet one? I'm very curious about its train of thought.
string: 我们能见到一只吗？我对它的思维方式非常好奇。

original: What began as a typical delve into an ancient Nordic crypt has taken a strange turn. Behind the crumbling stonework and burial chambers, Ive uncovered a sealed passage; unmistakably Dwarven in origin. This place was buried deep for a reason. If theres something still active down here.. best tread carefully.
string: 原本只是一次寻常的古诺德墓穴探索，却出现了诡异的转折。在摇摇欲坠的石墙与墓室背后，我发现了一条被封死的通道，这明显是矮人的建筑风格。这地方被深埋地下，定有缘由。如果下面还有什么东西在运作…… 那我最好小心行事。

original: That dragon doesn't have enough space for the both of us, so I have no choice but to stay here.
string: 那龙身上可没地方载我们俩，所以我只能留在这儿了。

original: A little lost vampire, locked up in an ancient crypt, who knows nothing about our world? Hoho, that just might make for a better story than yours...
string: 一个迷路的小吸血鬼，被关在古老的地穴里，对我们的世界一无所知？呵呵，这故事说不定比你的还精彩……

original: Everything became a blur after that. I don't know how me and the horse made it all the way back to Cheydinhal alive, but somehow we got there.
string: 从那以后，一切都变得模糊了。我不知道我和那匹马是怎么活着回到香丁赫尔的，但我们终究是回去了。
天际契约 | 极高风险

original: I leave the kettle on the boil for Fafi. For when he comes home.
string: 我一直给法菲温着水壶，等他回家。

original: The Pirates apparently found a Cavern toward the deeper end of the sea, on the other island across. Theyre raiding this entire area it seems. I should investigate.
string: 显然，海盗在海的深处、对面另一座岛屿上发现了一处洞穴。他们似乎在洗劫这整片区域，我得去调查一下。

original: Capturing or eliminating anything that fled the Emperor's return.
string: 截杀所有在皇帝归城时逃窜的敌人。

original: This is about as far away from my estate as you can get.
string: 这儿跟我的家族领地简直是天差地别。

original: I could see myself staying here for a long time.
string: 我感觉自己能在这儿待很久。

original: This place is undeniably dangerous, but there is something quite beautiful about it. Look at how the snow brushes the cold rocky mountain.
string: 这地方固然危险，却有种别样的美。你看雪花轻抚冰冷的岩石山峰，多动人。

original: I've said it before, I'll say it again. I do not trust Mercer.
string: 我以前说过，现在还要再说一遍，我不信任墨瑟。

original: Conjure Armored Husky
string: 召唤武装哈士奇

original: I promise, I'll place myself above the scroll's knowledge.
string: 我保证，我不会被卷轴的知识所左右。

original: There were some old Reach tales about how the aurora came to be. I'll have to remember it somehow...
string: 边塞有些古老的传说，讲的是极光的由来，我得想办法记下来……

original: Probably best if we run away!
You can't blame yourself. It's not your fault she passed.
string: 你不能怪自己，她的离世不是你的错。

original: We really shouldn't be losing our enemies...
string: 我们真不该让敌人跑了……

original: Give the "Amplifier: Improved Destruction" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：强化毁灭” 交给构装体

original: This place is interesting. Deadly, but interesting.
string: 这地方挺有意思的，虽然危险，但很有趣。

original: Vampiric Steel War Axe of Harvesting
I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original: I hope the fragment is worth all this trouble. I just know the crypt is going to be crawling with the undead.
string: 希望这块碎片值得我们这么折腾，我敢肯定地穴里肯定满是不死生物。

original: Go find my nephew and deliver that summons.
string: 去找我外甥，把那封征召令交给他。

original: I like that big oaf Gunmar. For a Nord, he's sure to make a reliable hunstman!
string: 我喜欢冈玛那个大块头，作为诺德人，他肯定能成为可靠的猎手！
双手武器新入教者（从金库支出 750 金币）

original: How do I look? Not too many scorch marks, I hope.
string: 我看起来怎么样？希望没留下太多焦痕。

original: I couldn't have done this without you.
string: 没有你，我不可能做到这些。

original: Maybe this tribe can get finally their shit together. Like father, like children, hmm?
string: 或许这个部落终于能振作起来了，有其父必有其子，不是吗？

original: Probably a smart idea making nice with a spirit like Azura. I don't know how much power she has, and I'm not sure I'd like to.
string: 跟阿祖拉这样的灵体搞好关系或许是个明智的选择，我不知道她有多大能耐，也不想知道。

original: I think that went surprisingly well, all things considered. Let's see if we can catch up to Mercer and end the life of that miserable wretch.
string: 总的来说，这事儿进展得意外地顺利。我们去追上墨瑟，了结那个卑鄙小人的性命吧。

original: Death suits Mercer, don't you think?
string: 墨瑟还挺适合死亡的，你觉得呢？

original: To express my gratitude, I would like to offer you my help, on any endeavor of yours.
string: 为了表达谢意，我愿意为你提供帮助，无论你要做什么。

original: Summerset Isles Contract: Kill a Thalmor Leader (Very High-Risk)
string: 夏暮岛契约：杀死一位梭默领袖（极高风险）

original: As soon as I was old enough to hold a spelltome, I demanded they teach me their ways. They did so begrudgingly.
string: 我刚到能拿动魔法书的年纪，就缠着他们教我魔法。他们虽然不情愿，但还是教了。

original: Summons a Dremora Markynaz for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一名魔人领爵，持续<dur>秒

original: Ah, archers are perfect for stealth. Their targets are dead before they even know what hit them.
string: 啊，弓箭手太适合潜行暗杀了。目标还没反应过来就已经一命呜呼了。

original: Your help would be very appreciated.
Problem is, my summons needs a seal to look real. Otherwise my nephew will see straight through it, and it'll be as useless as he is.
string: 问题是，这征召令得盖个章才像真的。不然我那外甥一眼就能看穿，这东西也就跟他一样没用了。

original: Come on, let's get this over with.
string: 来吧，赶紧把这事儿了结了。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">

Leontius, 

I don't like the sound of your report. The Forsworn dragging one of their own towards the Sundered Towers - that could only mean another of their wretched rituals. 

Increased activity in that region always spells trouble. I can spare a few extra 
patrols along the Old Hroldan Road, but not much else. 

Whatever you do, stay away from Red Eagle's Summit. Whatever they're doing, it's none of your concern. As always, your parents send their regards.

Stay Safe,
Legate Admand
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">

莱昂提乌斯，

你的报告听来令人不安。弃誓者将其同类拖向破碎塔 —— 这只能说明他们又要举行那令人作呕的仪式了。

那片区域的异动向来意味着麻烦将至。我可以额外增派几支巡逻队沿古赫洛登巡查，但除此之外便无更多余力了。

无论如何，离红鹰山峰远些。他们在搞什么鬼，与你无关。如常，你父母托我向你问好。

保重。
副官阿德曼德

original: What a waste of a warehouse.
I don't remember him, but I guess I didn't know him well either.
string: 我不记得他了，但我想我也不太了解他。

original: I'll gladly share my knowledge with you.
string: 我很乐意与你分享我的知识。

original: Oh of course, where are my manners? Forgive an old vampire, Listener. I do get so ahead of myself sometimes.
string: 哦，失礼了，我的礼数都去哪了？请原谅一个老吸血鬼，聆听者。我有时候确实会过于心急。

original: Feel free to share your thoughts again.
string: 随时再和我说说你的想法。
看你这么客气的份上，就答应你。

original: Good thing I have some big pockets.
Though I must say, our floors are much less shiny.
string: 不过我得承认，我们家的地板可没这么亮堂。

original: Kodlak wants us to attack the Glenmoril Coven - our sacred sages - all so he can get to his stuffy Nord afterlife? I almost pity his cowardice.
string: 克拉科要我们去攻打格伦摩利女巫会 —— 我们神圣的贤者们，就只为了他能进入那沉闷的诺德英灵殿？我都快同情他的懦弱了。

original: But you and I... I feel we are meant to travel together. I'm having a wonderful time with you so far.
string: 但我和你…… 我觉得我们注定要一起旅行。到目前为止，和你在一起的时光太美好了。

original: A very simple city, yet at the center of all of Skyrim. My analysis show that opening a shop in this town could lead to a very prosperous enterprise.
string: 一座十分简朴的城市，却地处天际的中心。我的分析显示，在这座城镇开一家商店，或许能成就一桩非常兴旺的生意。

original: An Imperial spy? Where were they when the Stormcloaks took our city and massacred my kin? They only care now because the Silver-Bloods back Ulfric!
string: 帝国间谍？风暴斗篷攻占我们的城市、屠杀我的族人的时候，他们在哪？现在才关心，不过是因为银血家族支持乌弗瑞克罢了！

original: Summons an Elven Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把精灵誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: Alright. I'll wait for you at the usual place then.
string: 好吧，那我在老地方等你。

original: I suppose it was inevitable that we would encounter at least one shambling corpse!
string: 碰到一具摇摇晃晃的尸体，也是在所难免的！

original: Multiple threats detected. Time to show off my fighting skills.
string: 检测到多个威胁。是时候展示我的战斗技巧了。

original: I adore this city. Its culture, its people, and its cuisine.
string: 我喜欢这座城市。喜欢它的文化、它的人民，还有它的美食。

original: Dwemer metal shares some similarities to the metal used for the factotums. I am not a Dwemer automaton, but we are not so different.
string: 锻莫金属和制造构装体的金属有一些相似之处。我不是锻莫自动机械，但我们也并非全然不同。

original: Who was that other dragon? The spirits here are just... gone. They went with him, like he... like he devoured them...
string: 另一条龙是谁？这里的灵体…… 都消失了，跟着他走了，好像他…… 好像他把它们吞噬了……

original: Withers Goldenspoon's journal Day 1 These ice tunnels look to have been carved by a living thing burrowing through them. I expect to stumble into some giant ice worm at any moment. There are many icicles, at some time the air was warmer. It is very empty and lonely. There were at least two expeditions here before me, one a very, very long time ago. They both left writings about these caves, and they both warn of frost trolls in the east tunnels. I shall stay clear. I have placed torches at regular intervals in the lower tunnels so I can light them to keep track of where I have been. It is a maze down there.
string: 威瑟斯・金匙的日记 第一日 这些冰隧道看着像是有活物一路掘穿而成的。我总觉得随时可能撞见某种巨型冰虫。隧道里满是冰锥，想来曾有段时间这里的空气要更温暖些。四下里空旷得很，只剩孤寂相伴。 在我之前，至少有两批探险队来过这里，其中一批的足迹更是要追溯到很久很久以前。他们都在洞穴里留下了文字记录，还都警告说东隧道里有寒霜巨魔。我得绕着走。 我已在下层隧道里每隔一段距离就放了火把，点亮它们便能记录自己的行踪。那下面简直是座迷宫。

original:
Contract Kill a Vampire Lord Province: High Rock Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] This ancient vampire lord has bested every knight, champion, and hero sent to vanquish them, so our desperate client has decided to try something different by performing the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Vampire Lord. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名吸血鬼领主 省份： 落锤 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 这位古老的吸血鬼领主，击败了所有被派去讨伐他的骑士、勇士与英雄。走投无路的雇主于是决定另辟蹊径，举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除吸血鬼领主. [pagebreak]

original: J'Faar is good at hiding, but Ald�ric is good at finding.
string: 杰法尔很擅长躲藏，但奥德里克更擅长找人。

original:
Contract Kill a Scholar Province: Summerset Isles Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] This aldmeri scholar has been making significant advancements in their field of research. Certain concerned members of the Imperial Synod would like to see this research destroyed before it can be used against them in the next Great War. Meet with the client and eliminate the Scholar. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名学者 省份： 夏暮岛 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 这位先祖神州的学者在其研究领域取得了重大进展。帝国圣会中部分忧心忡忡的成员，决意要在这些研究成果于下一场大战中被用来对抗他们之前，将其彻底摧毁。 与委托人接头，铲除学者. [pagebreak]

original: What kind of Initiate do you desire?

string: 火焰法术造成的伤害提升10%。

original: I hate domestic life. Take me with you.
string: 我讨厌居家生活，带我一起走吧。

original: The aurora swirls as if the gods are playing an unseen instrument, its beauty beyond mortal comprehension.
string: 极光翻涌，仿佛众神在弹奏无形的乐器，其美远超凡人的理解。

original: Ustengrav's trial, really? What will that prove that your shouting hasn't already? They won't even come to evaluate your trial! What a waste of time.
string: 真要去乌斯滕格拉夫接受试炼？你的龙吼难道还不足以证明一切吗？他们甚至都不会来评估这场试炼！纯粹是浪费时间。
把天际省的每个人都榨干。

original: Saarthal, huh? The stories said it was the site of a slaughter. Think there'll be anything to hunt besides dusty Nord bones and cruddy enchantments?
string: 萨瑟尔城？传说这里是一场大屠杀的发生地。除了满是灰尘的诺德骨头和蹩脚的附魔，你觉得这儿还有什么可猎的？

original: Well, Savos certainly seems to be a relaxed fellow.
string: 萨沃斯看起来倒是个挺随性的人。

original: You're alive! Thank the spirits. I was about to charge down into the mines myself!
string: 你还活着！感谢灵体。我刚才都准备冲进矿坑了！

original: You're a pile of steel after all.
I think we got out of that lightly scathed all things considered.
string: 总的来说，我们只是受了点轻伤，算走运了。

original: Now, if this armor is dwarven make, why is it not... You know... Dwarven size...
string: 话说回来，如果这盔甲是矮人造的，那为什么不是…… 你懂的…… 矮人尺寸的……

original: I'm always happy to experience the comforts of an inn.
string: 能享受酒馆的舒适，我总是很开心。

original: And just like that, it's morning already.
I have found the cave where Orminlur and Yargul went to search for the Storm tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to them.
string: 我找到了奥敏卢尔和亚古尔前去寻找元素魔法・风暴卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚他们遭遇了什么。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Devouring
Who said politics had to be difficult? Seems pretty easy when you can just kill whatever stands in your way. Maybe you'll fit in with the Volkihar!
string: 谁说政治一定很复杂？只要把挡路的都杀了，就简单多了。说不定你能融入弗基哈尔家族呢！

original: You know I'm always happy to talk with you.
string: 你知道的，我永远都乐意和你聊天。

original: Sacrificing an Imperial Priest to the Spirit Queen, huh? Nothing of value is lost, I suppose.
string: 把一个帝国牧师献祭给灵体女王？我想也没什么损失。

original: We deserve a good rest after this!
string: 这事结束后，我们真该好好歇歇！

original: Oh... Now this could end very poorly.
Pray to your gods for mercy! You need it!
string: 向你的神明祈求宽恕吧！你需要的！

original: Mercer has a mansion but sleeps in the Ratway. I suppose the stench and the grime suit him.
string: 墨瑟有座豪宅，却睡在鼠道里。我看这污秽和恶臭倒挺适合他的。

original: There are four of us, so we can divide our attention, and let each Speaker focus on restoring a different sanctuary.
string: 我们有四个人，可以分头行动，让每位发言人负责修复一座不同的圣所。

original: You shall not spread your hate, Falmer.
Conjure Snow Bear
string: 召唤雪熊

original: Don't tell me you're actually going to help this sick individual? You should put her down whilst you have the chance.
string: 别告诉我你真的要帮这个变态？你该趁现在有机会杀了她。
法术书: 召唤狼人奴仆

original: Recruitment Started: The Speaker of the Markarth Sanctuary has departed.
string: 招募启动：马卡斯城圣所的传声者已出发招募新人。

original: Not much. Still processing the data obtained from our latest discoveries.
string: 没什么。还在处理我们最新发现的数据。

original: What are you going to do then?
What kind of Initiate do you want?
Armor rating is increased by <mag> points for <5> minutes
How do you know about the Dragonborn?
Well, why shouldn't you spend your time doing what you enjoy.
string: 嗯，你当然可以做自己喜欢的事。
训练区（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: This one is most sorry, Listener, but there is nothing left to improve. You already bought everything we need.
string: 聆听者，我深感抱歉，实在没有可再修缮的地方了。你已经购置了我们所需的一切。

original: Go and get a real job!
A snake? Me? Your own dear Gormli?
string: 阴险小人？我？你亲爱的戈尔米？

original: No favors today, wanderer. Larger matters loom. Off with you.
string: 今天不帮任何人忙，流浪者。有更重要的事等着我。赶紧走。

original: Ah. Fair, I suppose. The Empire does have the best artisans on this land.
string: 啊，也对。帝国确实有这片土地上最优秀的工匠。

original: So now we're slaying witches?... Perfect.
string: 现在我们还要去杀女巫？…… 太棒了。
瓦尔科尔・碎骨者 - 尸鬼

original: Good, I�ll be waiting right here.
Brother Rasha tried to claim that the Night Mother had spoken to him.
string: 拉沙兄弟声称夜母对他显灵了。

original: Oh spirits, please blow the bees away! We only want to spill mercenary blood while here...
string: 哦，灵体啊，求你把蜜蜂吹走吧！我们来这儿只是想杀些佣兵而已……

original: Shor's Stone, huh? That's the Nordic name for Lorkh. But what does he have to do with stone?
string: 舒尔之石？这是洛库的诺德名字，可他跟石头有什么关系？
失落之城 瓦尔基格

original: I think we had better get out of the cave before we start lollygagging.
string: 我觉得我们还是别在这儿磨磨蹭蹭的，赶紧出山洞吧。

original: Well they look awfully silly now, don't they.
string: 他们现在看起来可真傻，对吧。

original: So... That was interesting wasn't it. Not only did we kill a dragon but you... You're Dragonborn.
string: 所以…… 刚才那事挺有意思的，对吧？我们不仅杀了一条龙，你还…… 你是龙裔。

original: Okay. I'll come with you. But we need to make sure we stay on the same page.
string: 行，我跟你一起去。不过我们得保持步调一致。

original: The Doomfang Clan used to make their camps here and inside the ruins of Bthardamz. They fought to the last man when the Nords returned.
string: 末日之牙氏族曾在这里和巴萨达姆兹遗迹扎营，诺德人卷土重来时，他们战斗到了最后一人。

original: It was our last holdout in all of High Rock, and we were quite... effective.
string: 那是我们在高岩境内最后的据点，而且我们的行事效率…… 相当惊人。

original: The missing apostle has written about going to Kagrumez. I should explore the area and see if I can find anything about his whereabouts. His staff seems to react to some crystals, which open doors; I should keep this information in mind.
string: 失踪的使徒留下文字说要去卡古梅兹。我应当去那片区域探查一番，看看能否找到关于他下落的线索。他的法杖似乎能对某些水晶产生反应，这些水晶还能开启大门，我得把这个线索记在心里。

original: However, he found out that studying fabricants would bring him nowhere: he had already tinkered with every mechanical being he could find in the City
string: 然而，他发现研究构装体毫无进展：他已经研究遍了城市里能找到的所有机械造物。

original: They took you for an upstart rogue like those Stormcloaks?
string: 他们把你当成了风暴斗篷那样的狂妄之徒？

original: You don't stand a chance, vampire!
I know the giants' toes are useful for strength potions... But the thought of giant toe juice? Yuck.
string: 我知道巨人脚趾对力量药水很有用…… 但一想到巨人脚趾汁，就觉得恶心。

original: You're going to strike at the Emperor, aren't you? I only ask that you do it swiftly, and spare him any pain.
string: 你要去刺杀皇帝，是吗？我只求你下手快些，别让他承受痛苦。

original: What's left of the old Hillhunter Dhun... The Nords didn't kill them, you know. When the Forsworn emerged, their blades first drew Hillhunter blood.
string: 这是古老的猎山者堡垒仅存的部分…… 诺德人没杀光他们，你知道吗？弃誓者崛起时，最先流的就是猎山者的血。

original: I didn't *mean* to put my blade *all* the way through her hand Listener, honest. But someone had to put that attention seeking vixen in her place.
string: 我真的没打算把刀整个刺穿她的手，聆听者，我发誓。但总得有人治治这个爱出风头的狐狸精。

original: As you wish, Listener. What part of the sanctuary do you want to improve?
string: 如你所愿，聆听者。你想修缮圣所的哪个部分？

original: Ah, but if that's what you want. I'll see what I can find, Listener.
string: 啊，不过如果你执意如此，我会尽力找找看的，聆听者。

original: You're a vicious one, aren't you!?
Fires a Frost Spectral Arrow dealing <50> points of Frost Dmg. Slows target. Chance to stagger foes.
string: 释放一支寒霜幻影箭，造成 <50> 点寒霜伤害。使目标减速，并有几率震退敌人。

original: Can they just admit that I'm better than them?
string: 他们就不能承认我比他们厉害吗？

original: You'll have to try harder to kill me!
string: 想杀我？你可得再使点劲！

original: Good... I was hoping you would.
string: 太好了…… 我就希望你会这么说。

original: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate our friendship?... Nevermind, judging by your facial expressions, I can guess that you would rate it a 10.
string: 从 1 到 10 分，你会给我们的友谊打几分？…… 当我没说，从你的面部表情来看，我猜你会打 10 分。

original: It makes sense that a Hag kept the pommel, but our worship of Dagon had all but disappeared by the Third Era. Maybe the Oblivion Crisis revived it?
string: 女巫藏着剑柄说得通，但我们对达贡的崇拜在第三纪元就几乎消失了，或许湮灭危机让它死灰复燃了？

original: I've seen a lot of crows in the sky today. An omen. Let's try something crazy and see if the Queen of Shadows is with us!
string: 今天天上的渡鸦特别多，是个预兆。我们做点疯狂的事，看看影之女王是否站在我们这边！

original: You seem awfully calm about this!
I managed to open the gate and now I can go in deeper.
string: 我成功打开了大门，现在可以往里面深入了。

original: I hear Oblivion is lovely this time of year. You ought to go back there!
string: 听说湮灭之地这时候景色不错，你该回去了！
锻造区（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: Lowers armor rating by <mag> points for <dur> seconds.
This part of the Brass Forest is far more dangerous than what I remember. Be careful.
string: 黄铜森林的这片区域比我记忆中危险多了。小心点。

original: The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Public Panic
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：公众恐慌

original: (Orc) Yargul had a good death, she died fighting.
string: （兽人）亚古尔死得其所，她是战死的。

original: Shall we exchange items for gold?
string: 我们用物品换金币如何？
听起来和普通母亲没两样。

original: Here, take this amplifier. It should make you more proficient with swords.
string: 拿着，这是增幅器。它能让你更精通剑术。

original: If I had to guess, I'd say that shouting was for you.
string: 要是让我猜，那声龙吼是为你而发的。

original: Return to Nelosi tomorrow for your new <Alias=NameHolderForRobe03>
string: 次日返回内洛西处领取新的 <Alias=NameHolderForRobe03>

original: What a pleasant lady. I hope to never see her again.
string: 真是位 “亲切” 的女士，希望再也别见到她。

original: The way the outside shines through like a skylight... Beautiful.
string: 外面的光像天窗一样透进来…… 美极了。

original: My mother was... the best. She was kind, and smart, and dangerous. She taught me everything I know, and made me the woman I am. I miss her.
string: 我的母亲…… 是最好的人。她善良、聪慧，又无比强悍。她教会了我所有事，造就了如今的我。我好想她。

original: The surrounding forest is beautiful, don't you think?
string: 周围的森林很美，你觉得呢？

original: I have found the Master Dungeon Dweller's backpack.
string: 我找到了地下城探索大师的背包。

original: Ivarstead would be a pleasant place to live in, if not for the bears that roam in the countryside.
string: 要不是乡下有熊出没，伊瓦施泰德会是个宜居的好地方。

original: Find the Frost volume of Elemental Magic
string: 找到元素魔法的寒霜卷册

original: I hate to think that my people drove the Falmer to this dreadful state. Ysgramor was a hero, sure... but he was not without his sins.
string: 一想到是我的族人把伐莫逼到这般惨状，我就心里不是滋味。伊思格拉莫固然是英雄…… 但他也并非毫无过错。

original: Skyrim Contract: Kill an Old Man (Low-Risk)
string: 天际契约：杀死一位老者（低风险）

original: I think the Stormcloaks have the right idea.
string: 我觉得风暴斗篷的想法是对的。

original: I may not have emotions, but being in the Clockwork City still makes me "feel" at ease.
string: 虽然我没有情感，但身处发条城，依然让我感到 “安心”。

original: The Twilight Sepulcher... where the Karth trickles into the forests, beneath the mountains I once called home. And here I thought it was just an old Nord tomb.
string: 黄昏坟墓…… 卡斯河就是从这里淌进森林，流入我曾称之为故乡的山脉之下。我还以为这只是座古老的诺德古墓呢。

original: Whichever side wins this Civil War, they'll still have the Thalmor to contend with.
string: 不管这场内战哪一方赢，他们都得面对梭默。

original: Using my seal to legitamize a forgery. I call that treason.
string: 用我的印章给伪造的文件合法化，这在我看来就是叛国。
我们会让家人感到骄傲的。

original: Right. Just don't get into too much trouble without me.
string: 好。别趁我不在，惹太多麻烦。

original: I'll stay, but only because I wanted to finish that book.
string: 我留下，不过只是因为我想把那本书看完。

original: Praise the Nines! He's gone! Off to earn his place atop the totems of Shor!
string: 赞美九圣灵！他走了！去为自己挣得在舒尔图腾上的一席之地吧！

original: Such a thing never came to pass, we all know that. But for many weeks it was a piercing possibility that kept our attention just as sharp.
string: 当然，那事最终没发生，这我们都知道。但好几个星期里，这种可能性都像针一样悬着，让我们时刻保持警惕。

original: I have volunteered to find out more about the missing students. Urag has told me the locations of the books the students went to seek.
string: 我主动请缨去调查失踪学生的更多情况。乌拉格告诉了我那些学生前去寻找的书籍所在的位置。

original: They WERE arresting me for no reason. Blasted soldiers.
string: 他们根本是无故逮捕我，该死的士兵。

original: Kendir Strong-Heart. It's an honor, sir.
string: 肯迪尔・强心，很荣幸见到您，先生。
当我没说。我肯定是记错了。

original: The Emperor is weak and allowed the Empire's decline.
string: 皇帝太软弱了，任由帝国衰落。

original: The city is freezing! And here I thought I had seen the worst of it in Bruma.
string: 这城市冷死了！我还以为在布鲁玛已经见识过最冷的天气了。

original: Do you feel welcome here? I'm not sure I do.
string: 你在这儿感觉受欢迎吗？我可没这感觉。

original: You have an interesting definition of the word. I suppose I'll have to support you.
string: 你对这个词的定义还挺特别的。我想我只能支持你了。

original: The land, the air... It's all wrong here. All the spirits - they're whispering the same name, over and over...
string: 这片土地，这空气…… 都透着诡异。所有的灵体，都在反复低语着同一个名字……

original: Yes. I have always loved you. Since I first knew what love was.
string: 是的，我一直爱着你，从我第一次明白爱的含义开始。

original: I leave it up to you to find out where he went by reading them.
string: 就靠你读这些牌匾，找出他的去向了。

original: Conjure Dremora Markynaz
string: 召唤魔人领爵

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>
194

Riona, you have been assigned to region of Skyrim for the time being. Collect your gear and report to the outpost. There have been rumors of the darkness stirring.

M
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>
194

莉奥娜，你暂时被派往天际地区执行任务。领取装备后，即刻向前哨站报到。已有传言称，黑暗势力正在蠢蠢欲动。

M
</font>

original:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="18">
By the Eight, Ive had enough of these so called; mercenaries.. docking in our city. They reek of salt, cheap mead, and lies and if theyre not pirates, then Im the High King of Skyrim.

They showed up just yesterday, swaggering through the docks like they own the place. Now the Winking Skeevers packed to the walls with loudmouthed sailors, half of them already brawling or flashing steel over spilled drinks and imagined slights.

Weve doubled patrols near the port and issued warnings, but Ill say this plainly; one more incident and Im tossing the lot of them in the dungeons until the tide turns.

Solitudes no haven for raiders. Not on my watch.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="18">
以八圣灵之名，我受够了这群所谓的 “佣兵”…… 在我们城里停靠歇脚。他们浑身散发着海水盐腥、廉价蜜酒的臭味，满口谎言。要说他们不是海盗，那我就是天际的至高王。

这帮家伙昨天才露面，大摇大摆地走过码头，简直把这儿当成了自己的地盘。如今 “眨眼鼠” 酒馆里挤满了吵吵嚷嚷的水手，一半人已经因为酒水洒漏、无端猜忌大打出手，甚至拔刀相向。

我们已经加倍了港口附近的巡逻，也发出了警告，但我把话挑明了：再出一次乱子，我就把他们全扔进大牢，关到潮起潮落为止。

独孤城不是劫掠者的庇护所，有我在，绝不可能。
</font>
明天回到内洛西・乌拉鲁身边

original: I wish I could take you with me.
Let's take that Ancano fool down!
string: 去收拾安卡诺那个蠢货！

original: With respect, Listener, the Dark Brotherhood does not do "favors" for its victims.
string: 恕我直言，聆听者，黑暗兄弟会可不会为受害者 “行方便”。

original: Uunngh, my head. I have a newfound respect for your drinking talents. How'd we end up here? And why are the spirits so... fuzzy?
string: 呃，头好疼。我对你的酒量真是刮目相看。我们怎么跑到这儿来了？为什么灵体的声音都这么…… 模糊？

original: One set for my workshop, then. And as for your payment...
string: 一套放进我的工坊，至于给你的报酬……

original: There is no place on Tamriel that I would rather not be than the Thalmor Embassy. Still, it will be good to give them a black eye.
string: 泰姆瑞尔里我最不想来的地方就是梭默大使馆了。不过，能给他们点颜色看看也不错。

original: The fact that there are people who prefer to live in the sewers tells you all you need to know about Riften.
string: 居然有人宁愿住在下水道里，这就足以说明裂谷城是什么德性了。

original: Thank you. That means a lot to me. I wouldn't rather be anywhere else.
string: 谢谢。这对我意义重大。我哪儿也不想去，就想待在这儿。

original: This Karliah... What do you make of her? I haven't quite made up my mind yet. She seems honest enough. For a thief. No offence.
string: 这个卡利亚…… 你觉得她怎么样？我还没拿定主意。她看起来还算诚实，至少对一个小偷来说是这样。无意冒犯。

original: It's awful, how most of the Reachfolk here are forced to live in the Warrens, away from the sky.
string: 太糟糕了，这里的边塞人大多被迫住在贫民窟，连天空都见不到。

original: Has this become a city of pestering ants? Question me again and you'll have your answer!
string: 这城市是成了烦人的蚂蚁窝吗？再敢问我问题，你就等着瞧！

original: I'll take care of it right away, Listener.
I never had a friend like you back with my clan. I'm not sure I'll ever have another. Which means no dying on me, ok?
string: 在我的氏族里，我从未有过像你这样的朋友。我不确定这辈子还能不能再有了。所以不许在我面前死掉，好吗？

original: You're done leeching on the innocent.
string: 你再也不能吸无辜者的血了。

original: Ooh, that's my favorite subject! What do you want to know, Listener?
string: 哦，这可是我最爱的话题！你想知道什么，聆听者？

original: Whatever you intend to do to the Empire, I see you're set on your path. I will follow you... But expect nothing more of me.
string: 无论你打算对帝国做什么，我看你已经下定决心了。我会跟着你…… 但别指望我再多做什么。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade honors your unmatched skill. Ending Sybille Stendor's great lie broke her control over Skyrim. Her Lirael mask, her pull on Solitude, her Thalmor puppets, all gone under your blade, saving Tamriel's balance. Innocents breathe easier, no longer her game pieces.

Your win at Anise's cabin hit her hidden heart. Thalmor plans stumble without her strings. As thanks for this deed, I pass to you Froststring, my own bow, pried from a draugr's frozen grip years ago on a job through Skyrim's barrows. Its ancient Nordic string bites with frost on every shot, and when it fells a foe, you are turned invisible for a short time. Wield it well; it has served me true, and now it honors you. 

Keep guarding Tamriel sharp and steady; your name grows in the dark.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃为你绝伦的技艺致以敬意。你戳穿了希比利·斯丹特的弥天大谎，终结了她对天际的掌控。她的莉瑞尔面具、对独孤城的操控、那些梭默傀儡，皆毁于你的利刃之下，泰姆瑞尔的平衡也因此得以保全。无辜之人终于能安心度日，不再沦为她的棋子。

你在安尼斯木屋的胜利，击中了她隐秘的核心。没了她的暗中操纵，梭默的计划已然步履维艰。为酬谢此功，我将自己的霜弦弓赠予你 —— 这把弓是多年前我在天际的古墓执行任务时，从一具尸鬼冻僵的手中夺来的。它那古老的诺德弓弦，每一次射击都会裹挟着冰霜之力，而当它放倒敌人时，你还会短暂进入隐形状态。好好运用它吧，它曾忠实地伴我左右，如今也将为你增光。

请继续坚定而敏锐地守护泰姆瑞尔，你的名号已在暗影中传扬。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: I have heard stories of one of Hircine's Great Hunts that happened on this island. Do you think we'll find anything the hunters left behind?
string: 我听过海尔辛在这座岛上举行伟大狩猎的故事，你觉得我们能找到猎人留下的东西吗？

original: I'm going to use it to take you off into the sunset.
string: 我要带着它，带你奔向落日余晖。

original: What an experience this has been so far. I don't know about you, but I'm about ready to knock Sam's head off.
string: 到目前为止可真是段难忘的经历。我不知道你怎么想，我已经准备好把山姆的头拧下来了。

original: A shield steeped in blood-oaths. Its bearer draws strength and vigor from unseen veins, regenerating health and stamina <mag>% faster.
string: 这面盾牌浸染血誓之力，持有者可从无形之脉中汲取力量与活力，生命和耐力恢复速度提升<mag>%

original: I have taken the restored staff to its former glory and now I can use it as I see fit.
string: 我将修复后的法杖恢复了往日的荣光，如今可以随心所欲地使用它了。

original: Why don't you demonstrate how that would be possible and then I'll give it my greatest try.
string: 不如你先示范一下怎么做，我再尽力试试。

original: Never trust a man who speaks to his subordinates like Mercer does. My father is many things, but disrespectful to his employees is not one of them.
string: 千万别信像墨瑟那样对下属说话的人。我父亲虽然毛病不少，但绝不会不尊重员工。

original: I don't want foreigners walking on Skyrim's soil as if they own it.
string: 我不希望外国人在天际的土地上作威作福。

original: We do. Trust me, I'm right behind you. We won't stand for what he has done.
string: 我们当然要。相信我，我就在你身后。我们绝不会容忍他的所作所为。

original: What in Mundus is happening here?...
string: 这世上到底在发生什么？……

original: Skyrim's Capitol. Solitude. I have wanted to visit here ever since I read about it at a young age.
string: 天际的首都，独孤城。我小时候读到它的介绍，就一直想来看看。

original: I have found what happened to Orminlur and Yargul, and have located the Storm volume of Elemental Magic. I should find out what happened to the rest of the students.
string: 我查明了奥敏卢尔和亚古尔的遭遇，还找到了《元素魔法・风暴卷》。我该去弄清楚其他学生的下落。

original: Please don't tell me we're here to kill a woman on her wedding day... We are, aren't we?... Fine, no happy ever after for her, I suppose.
string: 别告诉我我们是来在一个女人的婚礼上杀她的…… 我们真的是来干这个的，对吧？…… 好吧，看来她没什么好结局了。

original: She was your predecessor, the last Listener of the Dark Brotherhood. That was... more than a decade ago.
string: 她是你的前任，黑暗兄弟会的上一任聆听者。那已是…… 十多年前的事了。

original: If I had to settle down somewhere, it'd probably be Markarth. The population would most likely be harmless since they are used to unusual technology.
string: 如果我必须找个地方定居，大概会选马卡斯。这里的居民应该没什么威胁，毕竟他们已经习惯了各种奇特的技术。

original: Yes, let him out. Why not.
string: 行，放他出来吧，有何不可。

original: I know I'm not always filled with honeyed words and sometimes my tongue is a little looser than it should be, but I really appreciate you.
string: 我知道我说话不总是甜言蜜语，有时候还口无遮拦，但我真的很感激你。

original: Who knows how many hapless villagers have lost another heirloom, or gotten themselves kidnapped since last we were here.
string: 自从我们上次来这儿，不知道又有多少倒霉村民丢了传家宝，或者被人绑架了。

original: This shouldn't take more than a light shove!
string: 轻轻一推应该就搞定了！

original: If apostle Renos had remained in the city, he would probably have lived around here, in the Brass Forest, with the Tarnished.
string: 倘若使徒雷诺斯仍留在这座城市，他多半会定居在黄铜森林这一带，与那些 “黯痕者” 相伴度日。

original: Watch my back! Or my neck!
string: 掩护我！或者说，护住我的脖子！

original: Well now, this will certainly be a challenge!
While in combat, opponents in melee range take 15 points frost damage and Stamina damage per second.
string: 战斗中，近战范围内的敌人每秒会受到 15 点寒霜伤害和耐力伤害。

original: Instead of aggression, she ordered "defensive consolidation." Hiding, I called it.
string: 她没有采取攻势，反而下令 “防御性整合”。我管这叫缩头乌龟。

original: I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original: The threat is gone. Are you alright?
What chunk of Skyrim's population is made up of unsavory types like these? It must be larger than ideal, I would expect.
string: 天际有多少人是这种败类？我估计比想象中多。

original: The leader of the Deephowl Hollow vampire clan has discovered a sinister new form of necromancy. I'm unsure what sort of monsters this clan has managed to conjure up, but they have to be stopped. According to his journal, their leader has locked himself in his inner sanctuary, and two vampires carry the keys required to open the way. I have to get those keys.
string: 深嚎山谷吸血鬼氏族的首领发现了一种邪恶的新型亡灵魔法。我不清楚这个氏族召唤出了怎样的怪物，但必须阻止他们。从他的日记中得知，其首领将自己锁在了内殿里，有两名吸血鬼持有开启通路的钥匙。我必须拿到那些钥匙。

original: Summons an Orcish Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把兽人誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: You could pick up some scraps from these ruins. You could smith something great out of them.
string: 你可以从这些遗迹里捡些碎片，用它们打造出很棒的东西。

original: You better not leave without saying goodbye.
Now we have come to take our rightful place at your side, just as the Night Mother intended. But we have not returned empty handed.
string: 如今，我们遵照夜母的旨意，来到你身边辅佐你。而我们并非空手而来。

original: This place is remarkable... A pity it's filled with vile creatures, but you can't have it all.
string: 这地方太壮观了…… 可惜满是邪恶的生物，不过也不能奢求十全十美。
你有时候真的油盐不进。

original: This buffs summons if the player has the Elemental Potency perk.
string: 若玩家拥有元素潜能专长，此效果会强化召唤物。

original: You're going to feel really stupid when you're dead!
string: 等你死了，你就知道自己有多蠢了！

original: Fortune and prestige await, my friend! It is so! It is so!
string: 财富和荣耀就在前方，我的朋友！一定会的！肯定会的！

original: I should search my dead target.
string: 我应当搜查这个已被我解决的目标。

original: I got rid of the evil in the woods & now have vanquished a Dremora Blood Lord that seemed to of been summoned. The people of Falkreath should be safer for now. I can continue exploring the Crypt. Should head back when I can to collect a reward.
string: 我清除了树林中的邪恶，还击败了那只似乎是被召唤而来的魔人鲜血领主。佛克瑞斯的民众眼下应该能过上安稳日子了。我可以继续探索这座墓穴，之后找机会回去领赏。

original: I know little of the Forsworn, but their cause sounds relatively justifiable. Though I'm not sure I like the way they go about it...
string: 我对弃誓者了解不多，但他们的诉求听起来还算合理，不过我不太喜欢他们的做法……

original: Kodlak was the voice of reason in Jorrvaskr, and now the werewolf hunters have taken it in their frenzied zeal. Vengeance is in order.
string: 克拉科曾是勇士之家的理性之声，如今狼人猎人却在狂热中占据了这里。是时候复仇了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
There are voices in the stone. Sometimes they speak in the familiar tongues of my clan. Sometimes I answer...

I forget that it cannot be them. It has been too long.

Whether Nordic or Velothi, I have traded one ruin for another. But here, in this dwelling, I am king. I sleep in the deepest chamber, and have extinguished all the draugr. Their bones will make fine servants.
[pagebreak]
I wonder if Ashmelech still stands. Or if it was burnt to cinders during the Red Year. If she yet lives, would she forgive me for running? She must. I had no choice.

The hunters never stopped. I know this. They are still searching, patient as the grave. Sometimes I wonder which is more enduring; a vampire's lifespan, or mortal hatred.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
石缝里传来低语。有时是部族熟悉的语言，有时我竟会应声……

我总忘了那不可能是他们。太久了，一切都太久了。

无论是诺德遗迹还是维洛斯遗迹，我不过是从一处废墟逃到另一处。但在这居所里，我便是王。我睡在最深处的墓室，早已肃清所有尸鬼 —— 他们的骸骨会是绝佳的仆人。
[pagebreak]
我好奇阿什梅莱克是否依然矗立，或是在红年化作了灰烬。若她还活着，会原谅我的逃离吗？她必须原谅。我别无选择。
猎人从未停歇。我清楚这点。他们仍在搜寻，如坟墓般耐心。有时我会想，究竟哪一样更持久：吸血鬼的寿命，还是凡人的恨意。
</font>

original: I'm really enjoying travelling with you too.
string: 我也很喜欢和你一起旅行。

original: Honestly, I'm just going with the flow and seeing what happens.
string: 说实话，我只是随波逐流，看看会发生什么。

original: You're lucky you can't see yourselves!
string: 你们真该庆幸自己看不见自己的样子！

original: That sanctuary is already far too compromised.
string: 那座圣所已经暴露得太严重了。

original: Find the Master Dungeon Dweller's Backpack
Whiterun has the makings of a capitol. It's central, peaceful, warm, wealthy. I'm sure it has plenty of history too, though I haven't read much.
string: 白漫有成为首都的潜质，地处中心，宁静、温暖又富庶。我相信这儿也有很多历史，虽然我没读过多少相关记载。
秘闻 - 威瑟斯的日记 3

original: They had each other, so they didn't need trinkets. Perhaps some Nord has claimed it now. Ach, the thought of that turns my stomach...
string: 他们拥有彼此，所以不需要什么饰品了。或许现在某个诺德人把它占为己有了。唉，一想到这个我就反胃……

original: That's spectacular! Are you seeing this? How is that tree even possible? All the caves and trees in the Reach, and none of them compare to this!
string: 太壮观了！你看到了吗？这棵树怎么可能长成这样？边塞的所有洞穴和树木，都比不上它！

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>Dearest Gawayne,

I'm most pleased to hear of the successes you have achieved in your work. The power that I have given to you is one that few can master, but I knew you were special.
Perhaps we must meet soon. An audience with me is sought by many, and granted to but few. But I must lay my eyes upon you and see you for who you are.

Sacred Is Our Blood, For Our Blood Is Hers,
Mother Laradyth Hledas
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>最亲爱的加韦恩,

听闻你在研究中斩获佳绩，我深感欣慰。我传授于你的力量，鲜有人能掌控，而我早已察觉你天赋异禀。

或许我们应当尽快会面。渴求觐见我的人络绎不绝，能得我应允者却寥寥无几。但我必须亲眼见见你，看清你的真正模样。

圣哉我族之血，因我族之血，皆属于她。
拉拉迪斯・赫莱达斯
</font>

original: Ugh... I can't imagine the diseases that are circling around down here.
string: 呃…… 我都不敢想这下面有多少传染病。

original: Is that so? And what if I tell you that I'm perfectly content under the cold skies of Skyrim?
string: 是吗？那如果我告诉你，我在天际寒冷的天空下过得非常惬意呢？

original: Here, take this amplifier. It will allow you to shoot explosive lightning bolts.
string: 拿着，这是增幅器。它能让你射出爆炸闪电箭。
找到死灵法师大师的背包

original: What do you think of Falkreath?
A mysterious group has been watching my progress in the Dark Brotherhood, and now they say they want to meet with me. I should look for them in a well behind the Winking Skeever in Solitude.
string: 一个神秘组织一直在关注我在黑暗兄弟会的进展，如今他们表示想见我一面。我该去独孤城眨眼的恶鼠酒馆后方的一口井边找他们。

original: I legitimized Aunt Gormli's forgery with a credible seal but chose not to deliver it to her nephew. She rewarded me with gold.
string: 我用可靠的印章让戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书变得合法，却选择不把文书交给她的侄子。她给了我金币作为报酬。

original: Summons an Amber Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把琥珀誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: What a lovely home these witches keep. Just the right amount of spiders and vermin.
string: 这些女巫的家可真 “温馨”，蜘蛛和害虫的数量刚刚好呢。

original: Well, as you can see, I'm a keen magic user. Destruction, restoration and alteration are my speciality. I can spar with the best of them.
string: 嗯，你也看到了，我是个热衷魔法的人，毁灭系、恢复系和变化系是我的专长，就算和顶尖高手过招也不在话下。

original: You again... You changed your mind? You'll kill the beast?
string: 又是你…… 改主意了？你愿意去杀那只野兽？

original: However, you have my loyalty. I will fight along side you. I do this to support you, not to propel the Stormcloaks and their endeavours.
string: 不过，我对你忠心耿耿。我会和你并肩作战。我这么做是为了支持你，不是为了推动风暴斗篷的事业。

original: It makes you consider what could have been done differently and how you would approach things were you in their situation.
string: 这会让你思考，当初他们有没有别的选择，换成是你，又会怎么做。

original: You know I struggle to express my feelings sometimes. I'm just trying to compile a response that doesn't make me sound like a flailing cave bear.
string: 你知道的，我有时候不太会表达感情。我只是想好好回应，别让自己听起来像只手忙脚乱的洞穴熊。

original: My primary function is to gather Dwemer objects and offer them to my Apostle.
string: 我的主要功能是收集锻莫物品，并将其呈献给我的使徒。

original: I... I don't know what to think yet. I hope the end is very far away. But if it is not, then I hope you are Dragonborn for a reason.
string: 我…… 我还不知道该怎么想。真希望末日离我们还远得很。但如果并非如此，那我希望你成为龙裔是有原因的。

original: I left most of my possessions at home. Sorry about that.
string: 我把大部分东西都留在家里了，抱歉啦。

original: We've faced so much danger, and I just can't shake the feeling that we're... changing in ways I wasn't ready for.
string: 我们经历了太多危险，我总摆脱不了一种感觉：我们…… 正在以我未曾准备好的方式改变着。

original:
[pagebreak]<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
Today finally marked a change!

I have received a message from a secretive vampire, known as Mother Laradyth. Little is known of her, but many speak about he in reverent fear, even among vampires. 
If even half of the stories about her are true, she is a matron of unbelievable power.
I would have contacted her, but alas, her location is a mystery. Somehow, she must have heard of my plea to the other lords and reached out to me first!
[pagebreak]
She has shared much with me in her letters..
She also dreams of a free world for vampires, and has seen fit to teach me ancient secrets that have been whispered to her directly by Lamae Bal! These are secrets to master life and death that go beyond simple necromancy! 
If these spells she has shared with me truly work, I will not need the help of the other clans! 

With the power of her magic at my disposal, I could build an army. Not an army of rotting corpses! No, one of the vengeful and powerful spirits, unlike anything this world has ever seen!
[pagebreak]
Jesper seems repulsed by the magics laid out in the Mother's teaching. Even Zossa, not shy of necromancy herself, has encouraged me to be cautious. But their warnings mean nothing to me anymore. Recently, they have both doubted the reality of the dream we shared.

My own children, cowards as well.
I know they plan something; they've been acting strange. Does Zossa want this magic for herself after all? Does Jesper have his eyes on my clan?

For now, I still let them keep the keys to my chambers, so they don't start to mistrust me further. But I will have to act on them, sooner or later.

I must try these rituals, as described by Mother Laradyth, without disturbance. I'll lock myself away in my Sanctum to experiment. There is much work to do. 

I'll need fresh bodies. 

I'll need blood, so much blood! 
</Font>
string:
[pagebreak]<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
今日终于迎来了转机！
我收到了一封来自神秘吸血鬼的消息，她便是拉拉迪斯母亲。关于她的记载寥寥无几，但即便是在吸血鬼族群中，也有许多人怀着敬畏与恐惧谈论她。

倘若有关她的传闻有一半属实，那她便是拥有着难以置信力量的女王。

我本想主动联络她，可遗憾的是，她的踪迹一直是个谜。不知怎的，她定然是听闻了我向其他领主的求助，竟先一步向我伸出了援手！
[pagebreak]
她在信中与我分享了诸多秘辛。

她同样梦想着为吸血鬼打造一个自由的世界，还决意将拉梅・巴尔亲口低语传授给她的古老秘术教给我！这些秘术是掌控生死的法门，远非普通的亡灵法术可比！

倘若她分享的这些咒语真的奏效，我便再也无需其他部族的帮助！

凭借她的魔法力量，我足以打造一支军队。这绝非由腐尸组成的军队！不，这是一支由充满复仇之心、力量强大的灵体构成的大军，是这片世界前所未见的存在！
[pagebreak]
杰斯珀似乎对这位母亲传授的魔法感到厌恶。就连本身不惧亡灵法术的佐萨，也劝我行事谨慎。但他们的警告如今对我而言毫无意义。近来，他们二人都开始质疑我们共同的梦想能否实现。

我亲生的孩子，也一样是懦夫。

我知道他们在密谋些什么，他们的举动太反常了。佐萨难道终究是想将这魔法据为己有？杰斯珀是不是觊觎我的部族？

眼下，我仍让他们保管着我房间的钥匙，以免他们对我愈发猜忌。但我迟早要对他们采取行动。

我必须依照拉拉迪斯母亲的描述，不受打扰地进行这些仪式。我会把自己关在圣所里做实验，还有大量的工作等着我。

我需要新鲜的尸体。

我需要鲜血，大量的鲜血！
</Font>

original: Yes, I must say, you're not looking your best. No offence intended, of course.
string: 是啊，我得说，你现在状态可不太好。当然，无意冒犯。

original: I can be. What do you need?
string: 我可以帮忙，你需要什么？

original: Enough! Guards! Rid me of this nuisance at once!
string: 够了！卫兵！立刻把这个烦人的家伙赶走！

original: All spells are <mag>% stronger for <5> minutes.
string: 所有法术强度提升<mag>%，持续 5 分钟。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
Dear Eva,

This seems to be it. To get stuck here, on the brink of my escape! At least I'll won't die in the dark but with rain and salty air on my skin.

Eva, where are you now? I'm not sure why we decided to split up down there, but I hope you've made it out. 
I also wonder why I took the pack with the waterbreathing potion, and you took the one with the strength enhancing drought. One sip of that, and I would have had the power to move these rocks! Alas, now I can only laugh at the irony.

I hope you found a way, Eva. For me, it is too late. I can feel the life leaving me.

Part of me hopes you never come back for me. I don't want you to see what remains of me....
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
致伊娃，

看来一切都结束了。眼看就要逃出去，却偏偏困在了这里！至少我不会死在黑暗里，雨水和咸涩的海风还能拂过我的肌肤。
伊娃，你现在在哪里？我实在想不通，我们当初为什么要在那下面分开，只希望你已经逃出去了。

我也在想，当初我为什么偏偏拿了装着水下呼吸药剂的背包，而你拿走了装着力量增幅药剂的那个。只要喝上一口力量药剂，我就能有足够的力气搬开这些石头了！唉，现在也只能对着这讽刺的现实苦笑。

希望你找到了出路，伊娃。对我来说，一切都太晚了，我能感觉到生命正在一点点流逝。

我甚至有点希望你永远不要回来找我，我不想让你看见我如今这副模样……
</font>

original: Hircine seems pleased with you, so I suppose I'll forgive you for sparing Sinding... Just know that your mercy has set a feral werewolf loose.
string: 海尔辛似乎对你很满意，所以我就原谅你放过辛丁的事吧…… 但你要知道，你的仁慈放跑了一头狂暴的狼人。

original: The blade looks even sharper when fragmented... but that's not all. I can hear the whispers of death from the spirits around them.
string: 这把刀碎裂后看起来更锋利了…… 但不止如此，我能听到周围灵体发出的死亡低语。

original: These rogue mages possess knowledge of the arcane, and instead of using it to better the world, they kill with it.
string: 这些叛法法师掌握着奥术知识，却不用它改善世界，反而用它来杀人。

original: You know, I'm getting used to it down here. You've really turned this place around.
string: 你知道吗，我越来越习惯这儿了，你真的把这地方改头换面了。

original: Did you know briarhearts sometimes have to clean the beetles out of the chest cavity? Gross, right? Not sure why I thought of that, just now.
string: 你知道吗，荆棘之心有时候得清理胸腔里的甲虫，恶不恶心？我也不知道我怎么突然想到这个的。

original: Alright then, here it is. It's no good now.
string: 那好吧，你看，就是这个。现在还没什么用。

original: Perhaps it's time to let go of those feelings. We've grown up, and our hearts are such fickle things...
string: 或许是时候放下这些感情了。我们都长大了，心总是如此善变……

original:
Sometimes, you have to look back on what was made to get inspired on what could be. At least, I like to think that way.
The resources in Nchardak are not lacking, but it is complicated to find pieces that fit with the technology of the Clockwork City. It is time to look at the past, to build the future: new refabricants.
Refabricants were some of the first creations in the Clockwork City: modified Dwemer automatons made to fight and protect the city. Well, this time, I have modified factotums with Dwemer technology, creating an all-new brand of Dwemer factotums!
Although refabricants were known to malfuntion and get hostile after a while, I will make sure that it will not happen with mine.
string:
有时，唯有回望往昔的造物，方能从中汲取灵感，窥见未来的可能。至少，我向来这般认为。

钠查达克的资源并不匮乏，可想要找到能与发条城技术相适配的部件，却是难事一桩。是时候回望过去、铸就未来了 —— 全新的重构体即将问世。

重构体本是发条城最早的一批造物：那是经改造的锻莫自动化构装体，专为战斗与守护城池而生。而这一次，我反其道而行，用锻莫技术改造构装体，打造出了全新的锻莫构装体！

尽管旧版重构体向来有运转日久便会故障失控、转而产生敌意的问题，但我定会确保我的造物不会重蹈覆辙。

original: Before we set out on this journey, I vowed to help the needy and protect the weak. You bore witness of it.
string: 我们出发前，我发誓要帮助穷人，保护弱者。你是见证者。

original: Travel to Jolgeirr Barrow on the Isle of Solstheim
string: 前往索瑟海姆岛的约基尔古坟

original: Another ancient tomb for us to delve into. Aren't we just the luckiest pair of adventures ever to grace Skyrim.
string: 又要去探索一座古老的坟墓了，我们可真是天际最幸运的冒险搭档啊。

original: I sometimes wonder how my life would have differed had I been born in a place like this.
string: 有时候我会想，要是我生在这种地方，人生会有什么不同。

original: It's nice to meet you, Vateshran Kaitryn - let's get you out of here.
string: 很高兴见到你，瓦特什兰凯特琳，我这就带你出去。

original: Targets get extra health and stamina for <5> minutes.
string: 目标在 5 分钟内获得额外的生命值和耐力值。

original: I wasn't trying to imply otherwise, I just... Never mind.
string: 我不是那个意思，只是…… 当我没说。

original: I can. The spirits of the land and the beyond are always singing, telling their stories. You just have to know how to listen.
string: 我能听到。大地与彼岸的灵体永远在歌唱，诉说着它们的故事。你只需要知道如何去聆听。

original: Gods smile on you, friend. They favor a charitable soul.
string: 神明眷顾你，朋友。他们偏爱仁慈的灵魂。
去帮助那些有需要的人吧。

original: Find a way to board the pirate ship and locate the key
string: 想办法登上海盗船并找到钥匙

original: I don't care about what you have to say.
string: 我才不在乎你要说什么。

original: I heard that you have joined the College of Winterhold. Please, avoid sending fireballs my way. Overheating could cause an explosion, and devastating
string: 我听说你加入了冬堡学院。拜托，别朝我扔火球。过热可能会导致爆炸，造成毁灭性的（此处原文未完整，按语境保留）后果。

original: This hunt for the Elder Scroll won't be an easy journey. The spirits of death are looming behind us right now, you know.
string: 寻找古老卷轴的这场狩猎绝不会是轻松的旅程，你知道吗，死亡的灵体此刻就在我们身后徘徊。

original: Restore <mag> Magicka every second for <dur> seconds.
string: 每秒钟恢复<mag>点法力，持续<dur>秒

original: I hope you give him a good thrashing. I'm not sure I like his attitude.
string: 希望你好好揍他一顿，我实在不喜欢他那态度。

original: I'm sure I can find a decent mage somewhere. I'll return later, my Listener.
string: 我肯定能在某处找到个像样的法师。我稍后回来，我的聆听者。

original: Stealth and range go together like the twin moons, they are a perfect match.
string: 潜行与远程配合，就像双月相伴，堪称绝配。

original: You're reading the scroll, aren't you? Whatever it shows you... Promise me, as soon as your eyes feel a burn, you'll close that damn thing.
string: 你在看那卷轴，对吧？不管它向你展现了什么…… 答应我，只要眼睛一感到刺痛，就把这该死的东西合上。

original: Um... I'm just going to pretend I didn't see that.
string: 嗯…… 我就假装没看见好了。

original: Wouldn't they prefer to drain us whilst we're alive? Why are they so determined to kill us?
string: 他们难道不更喜欢趁我们活着的时候吸血吗？为什么非要杀了我们？

original: It's probably best we keep things professional.
string: 我们还是保持工作关系比较好。

original: Is there any other way we could solve this, maybe peacefully?
string: 我们就没有别的解决办法了吗？或许可以和平解决？

original: I try not to think about them.
If they did not care for Skyrim, one would assume they would not spend the resources to keep it under their banner.
string: 如果他们不在乎天际，大概就不会花费资源把天际纳入自己的版图了。

original: Why do the Nords limit themselves to horses as mounts? My father used to ride a bear. His name was Grimfang. He hated cheese.
string: 诺德人为什么只骑马来当坐骑？我父亲以前骑熊，它叫灰牙，讨厌奶酪。

original: (Khajiit) <Alias=Player> is curious. Wishes to help find lost kittens.
string: （虎人）<Alias=Player>很好奇，希望帮忙找到走失的小猫。
沉默者居所（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original:
The Markarth Sanctuary is now active.

You can now hire recruits, assign contracts, and purchase improvements for this location.
string:
马卡斯城圣所现已启用。
你如今可在此招募人手、分配契约，并为该地点购置各类升级设施。

original: Well, you let me know if you need anything else.
string: 要是还需要别的，尽管跟我说。
拷问室（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: A blacksmith named Talsric asked me to hunt and kill a great beast. Talsric says that this beast killed his wife and child. If I bring back the beast's pelt, Talsric has said he will make me some unique armor. Now that the beast is dead, I have obtained the pelt and should return it to Talsric.
string: 一个名叫塔斯里克的铁匠让我去猎杀一头巨兽。他说这头巨兽害死了他的妻子和孩子。如果我能带回巨兽的皮毛，塔斯里克就会为我打造一套独特的盔甲。现在巨兽已经死了，我拿到了皮毛，该把它交给塔斯里克。

original: They maintain the rule of law of Tamriel, no?
string: 他们维护着泰姆瑞尔的法治，不是吗？

original: I'm not allowed to tell anyone.

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade stands in awe of your courage and resolve. You walked into Jorrvaskr as a stranger, faced their brutal trials, and uncovered the beast-blood that coursed through the Companions' veins, a curse that could have unleashed Hircine's fury across Skyrim's plains, leaving innocents ripped apart in the night. By purging that feral taint from their leadership, you didn't just save a guild; you severed a chain that threatened to drag Whiterun into primal chaos. Their warriors now stand stronger, free of the Daedric pull, and your place of honor among them opens doors we could only dream of: eyes, ears and blades in the heart of Skyrim.

This victory fortifies our vigil like few others. A generous reward has arrived with this message. Carry on protecting Tamriel with the strength and honor you've reclaimed for them. The meek owe you their lives.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑为你的勇气与决心深感敬佩。你初入勇士之家时不过是个陌生人，却直面了他们严苛的试炼，还揭露了流淌在战友团血脉中的兽人之血 —— 这一诅咒本可能让海尔辛的怒火席卷天际的平原，令无辜者在黑夜中惨遭残杀。你将这份狂野的污秽从其领导层中肃清，此举不仅拯救了一个公会，更斩断了那股险些将白漫拖入原始混乱的锁链。如今他们的战士重获新生，摆脱了魔族的蛊惑，而你在他们之中赢得的荣耀席位，也为我们打开了梦寐以求的通路：天际核心地带的眼线、密探与利刃，尽在掌握。
这场胜利对我们的警戒者事业而言，是罕有的助力。随信附上一份丰厚的奖赏，望你秉持着为战友团重拾的力量与荣耀，继续守护泰姆瑞尔。那些弱者的性命，皆因你而得以保全。
我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Harvesting
If you miss me, I'll be at home. Stay safe.
string: 要是想我了，就回家找我。小心点。

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Breton King (Very High-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位布莱顿国王（极高风险）

original: Bring me 5 heart stones and I can use them to improve the durability of these robes, making them as strong as a warrior's armor.
string: 给我五颗心石，我能用它们提升长袍的耐用度，让它和战士的盔甲一样坚固。

original: A bounty was placed on <Alias=Wizard>'s apprentice, who fled with a ring of dangerous power. His journal revealed he meant to use the artifact for revenge against a bandit chief. I found the apprentice slain, but the stolen ring is now in my possession. I must decide whether to return the ring to <Alias=Wizard>, or keep its power for myself.
string: 有人悬赏捉拿 <Alias=Wizard> 的学徒，此人盗取一枚蕴含凶险力量的戒指后潜逃。他的日记显示，他本想靠这件神器向一名强盗首领复仇。我发现学徒已遭杀害，而失窃的戒指如今落到了我手里。我必须决定，是把戒指还给 < Alias=Wizard>，还是将这股力量据为己有。

original: Hircine will not take kindly to you discarding his gift. I hope you find your way back to the hunt someday.
string: 你抛弃海尔辛的礼物，他肯定不会高兴的。希望你有一天能重回狩猎之路。

original: Hearing voices, are you? Don't worry, it happens to the best of us.
string: 你听到声音了？别担心，最厉害的人也会遇到这种事。

original: So, is it time to make me an honorary member? I can just about wield a dagger, but I'm sure I'll fit in perfectly.
string: 那么，是不是该封我为荣誉成员了？我勉强能耍耍匕首，肯定能完美融入的。

original: You know I love to tell stories. Which one do you want to hear today?
string: 你知道我最爱讲故事了。今天想听哪一个？

original: Right... Well, just don't run off like that again. I don't enjoy being abandoned.
string: 好吧…… 总之别再那样突然跑掉了。我可不喜欢被丢下的感觉。

original: Find the Shock volume of Elemental Magic
string: 找到元素魔法的闪电卷册

original: And what would be your first directive?
string: 那你的第一个指令会是什么？

original: Long ago, during the days of the Oblivion Crisis, the Cheydinhal Sanctuary underwent a "purification."
string: 很久以前，在湮灭危机时期，香丁赫尔圣所经历了一场 “净化”。

original: Too many stragglers in this city. Keep clear. Keep clear.
string: 这城里的闲杂人等太多了。离远点，都离远点。

original: I have been blessed with a key, I wonder what it unlocks?
string: 我得到了一把钥匙作为祝福，不知它能开启什么？

original: Congratulations, loser. If all I wanted was to scare him, I'd have given him a list of chores to do.
string: 恭喜你，失败者。我要是只想吓唬他，还不如给他列一堆家务事让他做呢。
斯坦达尔之剑 - 设置

original: Oh, of course. She seemed such a pleasant lady. Why would you not be?
string: 哦，当然了。她看起来是个很和善的女士，你怎么会不喜欢她？

original: Every day, I see you growing stronger, faster, better... while I'm still just the same old me, maybe just a bit more experienced.
string: 每一天，我都看着你变得更强、更快、更优秀…… 而我却还是原来的我，或许只是多了点经验而已。

original: Are you sure? Fine. I'll wait, for now.
It's time. Let's put an end the Stormcloaks' cause - revenge, glory, and stories forever told!
string: 时候到了。该让风暴斗篷的野心彻底终结了 —— 让复仇、荣耀与传说永世流传！

original: I don't know why I bother sometimes.
string: 我都不知道为什么有的时候我会那么烦恼。

original: Increases Frost Resistance by <50>% and Frost spell damage by <25>%.
string: 寒霜抗性提高<50>%，寒霜魔法伤害提高<25>%。

original: You should know that I support the Empire. I'm glad you do too. They have done a great deal for my family, and my family for them in turn.
string: 你该知道我支持帝国。我很高兴你也一样。他们为我的家族做了很多，我们家族也为他们效力。

original: I will stay by your side. Someone's got to make sure you don't do more things you'll regret a few years down the line.
string: 我会留在你身边。总得有人看着你，免得你做出几年后会后悔的事。

original: Even the Dark Brotherhood can run out of gold, and it wouldn't be the first time.
string: 即便是黑暗兄弟会，也有可能坐吃山空，这也不是第一次了。

original: It's beautiful. All the pomp of my home without the confusing layout and overzealous guards. It feels so familiar to me.
string: 太美了。有我家乡的繁华，却没有复杂的布局和过分热情的守卫。感觉好亲切。

original: Task complete. Let's get out of this plague warren... I am not so eager to be touched by these spirits.
string: 任务完成了，我们赶紧离开这瘟疫窝…… 我可不想被这些灵体碰到。

original: I won't deny it. That is impressive.
string: 我不否认，这确实很厉害。

original: You left behind any non-summoned allies
string: 你将所有非召唤类盟友都留在了身后。

original: This is a serene town. Not at all a bad place to make home at.
string: 这是个宁静的小镇。用来安家倒也不错。

original: Thank you for taking me here.
Yamarz didn't really think this through, huh? Winning or dying, Malacath will still flay him for an eternity. Is it bad I kinda want to watch?
string: 亚玛兹显然没把事情想清楚，对吧？无论输赢，马拉卡斯都会让他永世不得超生。我有点想看热闹，这想法是不是不太好？

original: I could use some help in battle.
It's time for us to part ways.
If it weren't for the crime, Riften would be agreeable enough. However, I fear I'm going to have to start barricading the doors at night.
string: 要是没有那么多犯罪活动，裂谷城还挺不错的。不过，我恐怕晚上得开始把门锁死了。

original: Huh. Guess I'll have to make do with freezing all our foes before you get killed, then.
string: 哈。那看来我只能在你被弄死之前，把所有敌人都冻成冰块了。

original:
Contract Kill a Grand Champion Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] This arena Grand Champion has reigned for too long, but no one has been able to defeat them in a fair fight. One ambitious champion eager to take their place has stooped to fighting dirty by performing the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Grand Champion. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名总冠军 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 这位竞技场冠军称霸的时间实在太久了，可没人能在公平对决中击败他们。一名野心勃勃的挑战者为了取而代之，竟卑劣地选择用旁门左道 —— 举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除元老议员. [pagebreak]

original: Don't ever say I don't do anything for you.
string: 可别说我从没为你做过什么。

original: Sometimes I wonder if I should return to the Clockwork City, but I have no Apostle to serve. I would have no purpose there.
string: 有时候我会想，是不是该回发条城了，但我没有使徒可以侍奉，回去也没有意义。

original: So, there's another adventure planned? I thought there might be.
string: 这么说，你又计划好下一场冒险了？我就知道。

original: Vampiric Steel War Axe of Devouring
You are no longer commanding the Whiterun family.
string: 你已不再执掌白漫城家族。

original: No price is too great if it means saving the world.
string: 只要能拯救世界，任何代价都值得。

original: Aw, not fair Listener. I was just getting excited.
string: 哎呀，这不公平，聆听者。我刚兴奋起来呢。

original: My, what big tusks you have!
You want me to deliver the letter, don't you?
string: 你是想让我去送信，对吧？

original: What can you do for me?
We'll soon be sung about in Skyrim, maybe down in Cyrodiil too.
string: 很快天际会传唱我们的故事，说不定赛瑞迪尔也会。

original: How many errands do we need to do for these people?
string: 我们还要为这些人跑多少腿？

original: Can we not go one single day without a fight!?
string: 就不能有一天不打架吗？！

original: I suppose I set you up for that one. Thank you, that's very sweet.
string: 看来是我自找的话柄了。谢谢，你嘴还挺甜的。

original: Way to one-up the Woodland Man by freeing Miraak from him... Anyway, from now on, let's avoid going anywhere I can't follow, okay?
string: 你把林地人的计划搅黄了，还把米拉克放了出来…… 不管怎样，从现在起，别去那些我没法跟去的地方，好吗？

original: We got just what we deserve. Victory!
Peer through the veil and gain sight in shadow and glimpse of life.
string: 穿透迷雾之纱，于暗影中视物，窥见生命微光。

original: It's cold and unfriendly. Hateful, even. If it were friendly, I could forgive a bit of cold. But alas, it is not.
string: 这儿又冷又不友好，甚至可以说充满敌意。如果只是冷，或许我还能原谅，但可惜并非如此。

original: I guess we will honor the old Companion... If it is the Glenmoril's time, then Hircine will aid us in this hunt.
string: 看来我们要向这位老战友致敬了…… 如果格伦摩利女巫会的死期到了，海尔辛会助我们完成这场狩猎的。

original: Cyrodiil Contract: Kill a Sweetroll Thief (Low-Risk)
string: 赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位甜卷小偷（低风险）
离我远点，风暴斗篷的杂碎。

original: Reduces Health by <mag> points and reduces armor skills by <mag>%.
string: 生命值降低<mag>点，护甲类技能效果降低<mag>%

original: Wait, I know that look... You saw those apparitions too, didn't you? Ha! Now you know what I have to deal with, every day!
string: 等等，我认得这表情…… 你也看到那些幻影了，对吧？哈！现在你知道我每天都要面对什么了吧！
科洛维亚毛皮头盔（黄色）

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
Dear Ayla,

My parents warned us, didn't they? They warned us not to go spelunking alone because it's too dangerous. But we just didn't listen. 
And now I'm stuck in this dark and damp abyss. I can see light overhead, but I can't reach it. I've tried to climb, but it's no use. I tried to swim, but it did me no good. I almost drowned in the tunnels.

I now realize that you took the waterbreathing potion that I so desperately could have used!. It would have allowed me to swim through the tunnels and maybe find my way out. Alas, it's not that way.

I can't get out. It's just me and my sword. All that's left for me is to keep it in death.
Oh, sweet Ayla, I hope you made it out. I hope you found a way. 
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
致艾拉，

父母早就警告过我们，不是吗？他们告诫我们别独自去洞穴探险，太危险了。可我们偏偏没听。
如今我困在这阴暗潮湿的深渊里，能看到头顶的光亮，却怎么也够不着。我试着攀爬，毫无用处；我试着游泳，也徒劳无功，甚至差点在地道里溺死。

我现在才反应过来，你拿走了那瓶水中呼吸药剂 —— 那瓶我此刻急需的药剂！有了它，我本可以游过地道，或许就能找到出路。可事到如今，一切都晚了。

我出不去了，身边只有一把剑。到死，我也只能守着它了。
哦，亲爱的艾拉，希望你逃出去了，希望你找到了生路。
</font>
偷回奥斯维尔达的戒指

original: Whatever happened in here, I don't think I want to know.
string: 不管这儿发生过什么，我都不想知道。

original: Conjure Restless Draugr
string: 召唤不安尸鬼

original: If you need some Dwemer pieces or armors, she may have something you could find interesting.
string: 如果你需要一些锻莫零件或盔甲，她那里或许有你感兴趣的东西。

original: Give the "Amplifier: Deadly Bows" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：致命弓箭” 交给构装体

original: I sense her breath here. The Mother of Crows. I think I'll like it in Riften... The smell aside.
string: 我能感受到她的气息，渡鸦之母。我想我会喜欢裂谷城的…… 除了这股味道。

original: Time for your end, bandit scum!
string: 土匪渣滓，你的末日到了！

original: They need all this space just for classes? Why can't they learn in the courtyard? Is it too cold for them? Thinbloods.
string: 他们上课需要这么大地方？为什么不能在院子里学？是嫌冷吗？这些娇气包。

original: I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">Speaker Ald�ric, consider these my final orders. 

The Night Mother herself has shown me my fate and I can tell you that I am not long for this world. As for you, she is not done with you yet. Bound with this letter are two books. These are the artifacts I was telling you about, guard them with your life.

You are to take them and go into hiding at once. Keep contact with no one, and allow our brothers and sisters to believe that you are dead. It will be your responsibility to reform the Black Hand after I am gone. Keep tabs on our surviving sanctuaries from a careful distance, but do not alert them to your existence. Instead, recruit from dark brothers and sisters who've been left alone or isolated. I reccomend beginning with brother J'Faar. He and I had our differences, but soon none of that will matter anymore.

Once you have assembled a new Black Hand you are to maintain strict secrecy until the Last Seed of the year 201. Then and only then are you to reveal yourself to an Imperial Councilor named Amaund Motierre. He has hidden ambitions of which only the Night Mother knows.
