Offer to assist him with these plans and teach him how to perform our Black Sacrament. Remain hidden when he meets with the assassin and behold the one who comes, for this will be your new Listener. Reveal yourself to them only when their contract is complete. Then take your place at their side and present to them my gifts from the Night Mother's crypt.

You have never failed me Ald�ric, I trust you will not start now. Carry out these instructions to the letter and be careful my old friend.

With trust,
Alisanne</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">奥德里克议长，这是我最后的命令。
夜母亲自给我指了路，我活不了多久了。但你不一样，夜母还没对你用完心思。这封信里夹着两本书，就是我之前跟你说的那些宝贝，你得拿命护着它们。

你赶紧带着书躲起来，别跟任何人联系，让教里的兄弟姊妹都以为你死了。我死之后，重组黑手的事儿就全靠你了。你得远远地盯着咱们剩下的圣殿，别让他们发现你还活着。另外，就招那些被孤立、没人管的黑暗兄弟会成员进来，我建议先从贾法尔兄弟开始。我跟他以前有过节，但这些事儿很快就都不算事儿了。

等你把新的黑手凑起来，必须守好秘密，一直到第四纪元 201 年的末种月。只有到那时候，你才能去找一个叫阿蒙·莫蒂耶的帝国议员，跟他亮明身份。这家伙心里的野心，也就夜母才清楚。你去帮他实现野心，再教他怎么做黑暗献祭。他跟刺客见面的时候，你躲在一边看着，来的那个刺客就是你的新聆听者。等刺客把契约办完，你再出来见他，然后跟在他身边，把我从夜母墓穴里拿的礼物给他。

你从来没让我失望过，奥德里克，我相信你这次也不会。把这些指令一条不差地办好，保重，我的老朋友。

寄予信任
艾莉珊
</font>

original: Picked up a contract on a Dragon near the West Coast of Solitude. Should make my way there whenever I get a chance. Fishermen near the coast have lost comrades and supplies because of it.
string: 我接到一份契约，要去猎杀独孤城西海岸附近的一条龙。一有机会，我就该动身前往那里。海岸边的渔民因为这条龙，失去了同伴和补给。

original: That's probably for the best. If not for your safety, then for your soul's integrity.
string: 这样或许最好。就算不是为了你的安全，也是为了你灵魂的完整。

original: Honestly, I don't remember what happened.
string: 说实话，我不记得发生了什么。

original: That doesn't sound like the intended outcome. You should probably check that with one of the Circle.
string: 这听起来可不是预期的结果，你或许该去问问圆环的人。

original: I have a contract for you.
string: 我有一份契约要交给你。

original: Skyrim Contract: Kill a Stormblade (Very High-Risk)
string: 天际契约：杀死一位风暴之刃（极高风险）

original: The Empire has turned it's back on Skyrim.
Find the dead-drop in Windhelm, behind Niranye's House
string: 在风舵城尼拉涅的房子后方找到秘密投放点

original: From there, it was the Speaker's job to assign the contracts to our brothers and sisters, and oversee their sanctuaries.
string: 接下来，发言人的职责便是将契约分配给兄弟会的弟兄姐妹，并监管各地的圣所。

original: Yes. Yes! Of course you silly adventurer! You know what? All this while, I've also been working on a ring... for you.
string: 愿意。当然愿意！你这个傻冒险者！告诉你吧，这段时间我也一直在准备一枚戒指…… 给你的。

original: What a hilarious prank. Truly, I'm so pleased we wasted so much time on this.
string: 这恶作剧可真搞笑，说真的，我真高兴我们为这破事浪费了这么多时间。

original: Our people are strong, but few. Heh- our earliest stories are those of being conquered, then overcoming our oppressors... Over and over.
string: 我们的族人很强大，却数量稀少。嘿 —— 我们最古老的故事，就是一次次被征服，又一次次推翻压迫者的故事…… 周而复始。

original: Conjure Dragon Priest
string: 召唤龙祭司

original: Come on, we have sights to see.
string: 来吧，还有好多风景等着我们去看呢。

original: Fine. Is not the the best choice, but J'Faar will do as you ask.
string: 行吧。这选择虽不算最佳，但杰法尔会照你说的做。

original: If I knew we were walking into a glacier, I'd have packed some furs.
string: 要是知道我们要走进冰川里，我肯定会带些毛皮来的。

original: What can I do for you, Listener?
string: 我能为你做些什么，聆听者？

original: However, you have been a great help in this endeavor, and I would like to express my gratitude to you.
string: 不过，你在这件事上帮了大忙，我想向你表达我的谢意。
跟我多说说这些 “当局者”。

original: I've written a small summons for my nephew dearest. Nothing real, of course. Just something to grab his attention and spur him out into the world.
string: 我给我那宝贝外甥写了封小小的征召令。当然不是真的，只是想吸引他的注意，催他出去闯闯世界。

original: He decided to study Dwemer automatons to figure out how they survived that long without needing constant revisions.
string: 他决定研究锻莫自动机械，弄明白它们为何能在无需频繁检修的情况下存在这么久。

original: The Culanda Stone illuminates the surrounding area with a bright golden light.
string: 库兰达之石会以明亮的金光照亮周边区域。
锻造区（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: How long for? Okay, fine. Just make sure you come back for me.
string: 要等多久？好吧，那你一定要回来找我。

original: The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Mass Hysteria
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：全民歇斯底里

original: This laboratory is huge! Maybe I could pick up some scraps for my future maintenance.
string: 这个实验室好大！说不定我能捡些碎片，以备日后维护之用。

original: Good to see you. Shall we travel together again?
string: 见到你真高兴。我们再一起旅行吧？

original: What do you think of Dragon Bridge?

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Your path crossed ours before we could reach out. We are a hidden alliance that seeks no praise, just protection for the innocent and peace in Tamriel. Your actions show a sharp mind and strong will that we respect.

Anise, the witch west of Riverwood, was a growing danger. Her hidden group could have spread trouble among Skyrim's vulnerable people. You already ended that risk. This proves your value. Now uncover what secrets she had and leave them in the barrel behind Whiterun's Bannered Mare. It's enchanted so only you can see it. Succeed, and we'll contact you again.

In Shadows, We Serve.

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：
我们尚未主动联络，你的轨迹便已与我们交汇。我们是一个隐于暗处的同盟，不求赞誉，只为守护无辜之人，为泰姆瑞尔带来和平。你的所作所为，彰显出的敏锐头脑与坚定意志，令我们心生敬佩。

河木镇以西的女巫安尼斯，曾是一股与日俱增的威胁。她那隐秘的团体，本可能在天际的弱势民众间散播祸乱。而你已然终结了这一风险，这足以证明你的价值。现在，去查清她暗藏的秘密，将其藏至白漫城战旗母马旅店后方的木桶中吧。那木桶被施了魔法，唯有你能看见。若你成功，我们会再次与你联络。

我们于暗影中效命。

</font>

original:
Contract Kill a Synod Mage Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] The rivalry between the mages of the Synod and the College of Whispers is well known throughout Cyrodiil. Secrecy, intrigue, and even murder are par the course in their competition for primacy over the Empire's magical affairs. This Synod mage wants us to kill their rival from the College of Whispers so they can advance their career. Meet with the client and eliminate the Synod Mage. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一位修会法师 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 希诺修会与低语学院的法师之间的宿怨在赛瑞迪尔全境尽人皆知。在争夺帝国魔法事务主导权的较量中，保密、阴谋乃至谋杀都已是家常便饭。这名希诺修会法师希望我们除掉其来自低语学院的对手，从而为自己的晋升铺平道路。 与委托人接头，铲除修会法师. [pagebreak]

original:
Contract Kill a Stormcloak Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] The widow of a fallen Legionnaire has performed the Black Sacrament to have us exact vengeance on her husband's killer, a Stormcloak rebel. Meet with the client and eliminate the Stormcloak. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名风暴斗篷 省份： 天际 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 这位帝国军团士兵的遗孀已举行黑暗祭礼，委托我们向杀害她丈夫的凶手 —— 一名风暴斗篷叛乱分子 —— 复仇。 与委托人接头，铲除风暴斗篷. [pagebreak]
治疗系法术的恢复效果降低<mag>%

original: I'm sorry about Kodlak... He seemed to have a real fondness for you. Let's do what we can to avenge him.
string: 关于克拉科，我很遗憾…… 他看起来真的很喜欢你。我们尽所能为他报仇吧。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
NEWS
Wuunferth has denied my supplication of study AGAIN. You'd think with all that wisdom he'd learn to give third chances. What a soggy piece of wool he is.
[pagebreak]


RUMINATION
As like to the Grummite,
my dreams were born, 
in a sack, abandoned -- 
Burgeoning only to grow,
more and more enamored,
of the mud. 
[pagebreak]
NEWS
I think I've found a conspirator of sufficient mettle to carry out my plan. Balgorn is his name. Delivers the eggs. Says he knows of a servant's staircase that just might serve my purposes. If his tunic measurements really are what he says they are, my plan could work.
[pagebreak]




Stood outside the Palace for EIGHT HOURS yesterday. No sighting of the egg boy, damn him. Was starving upon my return. Mother had cooked potatoes AGAIN.
[pagebreak]
NOTE
Remember to tell Mother the new sheets are too rough. Whoever convinced her they were flaxen-spun was a bard indeed. It takes a bard to barter, I guess, ha! (Oh how my talents are frozen in this ICE HOLE.)
[pagebreak]


It takes a bard to barter
in the marketplace of dreams NO

It takes a bard to offer
A bartering of drea

Of a barter there's a bard
always, it seems NO
[pagebreak]






Haven't seen the egg boy in a week. Typical Nord. 
[pagebreak]
NEWS
It's been announced that Wuunferth will be demonstrating at the Whiterun Symposium in three weeks time -- so my hour of action is set! After which, my lowly circumstances shall be shackles no more! Never more, I tell you!
[pagebreak]




curse that egg boy
[pagebreak]


The horizon is like to a smile
Whispering flickers 
wrought of guile
NO

Smiling coyly,
The horizon doth say,
Not for you, Fafi, 
Not ever, nor today 
for today NO
[pagebreak]















                             sog it
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
见闻
巫恩菲斯又一次驳回了我的求学申请。真搞不懂，他自诩满腹智慧，竟连第三次机会都不肯给。真是个软趴趴的窝囊废。
[pagebreak]


沉思
恰如那蛙人怪，
我的梦生于布袋，
遭人抛弃
——唯有在泥沼中扎根生长，
对这泥泞的眷恋，
也愈发浓烈。
[pagebreak]
见闻
我好像找到了一个有足够胆量帮我执行计划的同谋。他叫巴尔贡，是送蛋的杂役。他说他知道有一处仆役楼梯，说不定能派上用场。要是他报的外衣尺寸当真不假，我的计划就有戏了。
[pagebreak]




昨日在宫殿外苦等了整整八小时，那送蛋的小子连个人影都没见着，该死的。回去时我都快饿晕了，母亲又做了土豆，又是土豆！
[pagebreak]
备注
记得跟母亲说，新床单糙得很。不知是谁哄她说这是亚麻纺的，那人定是个伶牙俐齿的游吟诗人。想来也是，唯有诗人最懂讨价还价，哈！（唉，我一身本事，竟被困在这冰天雪地的鬼地方无处施展。）
[pagebreak]


要做交易，得靠诗人在梦的市集里周旋 不，不妥
要做交易，得靠诗人献上一场梦的交换
交易之处，总有诗人似乎向来如此 不，不对
[pagebreak]






一周没见着那送蛋的小子了，典型的诺德人，靠不住。
[pagebreak]
见闻
消息传来，巫恩菲斯三周后要去白漫研讨会进行演示 —— 我的行动时刻就此定了！事成之后，我这微贱的处境便再也不是枷锁！我再说一遍，永不再是！
[pagebreak]




该死的送蛋小子
[pagebreak]


天际线宛如一抹浅笑狡黠织就的微光在耳畔私语
不，不对
天际线娇怯地笑着，似在低语：这与你无缘，法菲，永远都不会，今日亦如此就今日而言，不，不对
去他的！
[pagebreak]















                             sog it
</font>

original: Allow me to move out of your way.
I think there's a library in Winterhold? How many books are there, do you think? Can we go see?
string: 我记得冬堡有个图书馆？你觉得里面有多少书？我们能去看看吗？

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
I've arrived in Dragon Bridge, following a peculiar lead. 
A local trader reached out to me after buying fish from some curious fishermen. As he tells it, these fishermen were vampires. He said their glowing eyes, and the fact that they would only do business after nightfall, were dead giveaways. 
I agree.

I was surprised to learn that the trader has still met with these nocturnal "fishermen" on multiple occasions since, despite the danger, they do provide an impressively good catch. He assured me these meetings happened under the protection of half a dozen hired guards.

Curious.
[pagebreak]

I've asked around some more and learned that these vampires have been using their hard-earned coin to buy supplies and alchemic ingredients. To what end, I can not say, but it sounds like they are preparing for something.

What I can say with some certainty though, is that I've discovered their hideout. It's in a place the locals call Deephowl Hollow, near Skyrim's border by the coast.

Tomorrow, after a good rest, I'll head off to investigate. 
I have a pretty good feeling that I'm on the right track here.
[pagebreak]

If the rumors are true, I'm in luck! A vampire's den is hard to find, so encountering a clan that is so inconspicuous about their identity is a blessing. This provides the perfect opportunity to test my new contraption. 

As a vampire hunter, a vampire's head is worth a good price. 
But the untainted blood of a vampire, now that is a true trophy! Pure, unspoiled blood is nigh impossible to obtain since the blood spoils immediately as it leaves the body. Simple exposure to light is enough to ruin a sample. 

Untainted blood is a powerful alchemic ingredient, and extremely rare. There are plenty of alchemists who have never even seen a proper sample!

My new device should help me harvest the blood securely. There's no guarantee every sample I collect will be good, but if there are enough vampires in that den, I'm sure to walk away with a big batch of unspoiled blood anyway!

If this works out, I'll be rich and I can leave this life behind me and retire somewhere nice and warm. I can only guess how much the wizards in Winterhold will be willing to pay for a big supply of blood! A way out, finally within reach. 
[pagebreak]

It's been a long night. The wine here is very good, I'll give them that. Time for a rest, and I'll leave for the coast at first light. My head is swimming, from the wine, but mostly from the excitement. Tomorrow will be a big day!
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
我循着一条诡异的线索，抵达了龙桥镇。
当地有个商人从一群行踪诡异的渔夫手里买过鱼，之后主动联系了我。据他所说，那群渔夫竟是吸血鬼 —— 发光的眼睛，再加上只在入夜后现身交易，这些都是再明显不过的破绽。
我深表认同。
让我意外的是，即便知晓其中危险，这商人之后仍和这些夜间渔夫交易了多次。只因对方提供的渔获品质高得惊人。他向我保证，每次交易都有六名雇来的护卫守在一旁，足以确保安全。
真是怪事。
[pagebreak]
我又多方打探了一番，得知这些吸血鬼正用辛苦赚来的钱采购物资与炼金材料。至于目的何在，我尚无法确定，但显然他们在筹备着什么。
不过有件事我已能大致确定 —— 我找到他们的藏身处了。就在当地人称作深嚎山谷的地方，靠近天际海岸边境。
好好休息一晚，明天我就动身前去探查。
我有种强烈的预感，这次找对方向了。
[pagebreak]
若传言属实，那我可真是走运！吸血鬼的巢穴本就极难寻觅，能遇上这么一个行事不张扬、没刻意隐藏身份的部族，简直是天赐良机。这正好能让我测试一下新发明的装置。
作为吸血鬼猎人，一颗吸血鬼的头颅固然能卖个好价钱。
但纯净无染的吸血鬼血液，才是真正的至宝！要知道，血液一旦离开躯体就会立刻变质，仅仅暴露在光线之下就足以毁掉样本，想得到纯净的血液几乎是天方夜谭。
纯净吸血鬼血液是种强效炼金材料，且极为稀有。不少炼金师终其一生都未曾见过一份真正纯净的样本！
我新发明的装置应该能稳妥地收集血液。虽说不能保证每一份样本都完美无瑕，但只要巢穴里的吸血鬼数量足够多，我肯定能满载而归，弄到一大批纯净血液！
要是这事成了，我就能发大财，彻底摆脱这种生活，找个温暖舒适的地方安享晚年。想想冬堡的那些法师，为了这么一大批血液会开出多高的价码？我终于要熬出头了。
[pagebreak]
这一夜过得真漫长。说句公道话，这儿的葡萄酒确实不错。该休息了，天一亮就出发去海岸。头有些发晕，一半是因为酒劲，更主要的是因为兴奋。明天，必将是意义重大的一天！
</font>

original: You've returned. Perhaps you're willing to hear me out?
string: 你回来了。或许你愿意听听我的想法？

original: While wearing the crown, summoned ice wraiths take the shape of powerful ice wyrms.
string: 佩戴这顶王冠时，你召唤出的冰灵会化作强大的冰龙形态。

original: Here, take this amplifier. It should make you more resistant to magic.
string: 拿着，这是增幅器。它能让你更抗魔法伤害。

original: (Optional) The pale orc has fallen. Without a leader, the orcs will soon scramble off premise.
string: （可选）苍白兽人已被击败。群龙无首，兽人很快就会四散逃离。

original: Cyrodiil Contract: Kill an East Empire Merchant (Medium-Risk)
string: 赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位东帝国商人（中等风险）

original: Life is awfully boring without being at your side.
string: 不在你身边的日子，实在太无聊了。

original: Records say that the main castle of this city is called Dragonsreach. I wonder if the apostles could create a mechanical dragon.
string: 记载称这座城市的主城堡名为龙霄宫。我好奇使徒们能不能造出一只机械龙。

original: The luscious forest surrounding Falkreath doesn't seem to put a damper on the gloom of the Hold.
string: 佛克瑞斯周围郁郁葱葱的森林，也没能冲淡这座领地上的阴郁。

original: I don't know who I'm talking to. Who are you?
string: 我都不知道在跟谁说话，你是谁？

original: Are you sure? I'll see you at home.
There you are! What happened to you? I woke up and you were gone. It's taken me ages to track you down.
string: 你可算出现了！你去哪了？我一觉醒来你就不见了，我花了好长时间才找到你。

original:
- Windhelm Family -

Windhelm Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWindhelm>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWindhelm>
Windhelm Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepWindhelm> Gold
string:
- 风舵城家族 -

风舵城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWindhelm>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWindhelm>

风舵城维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepWindhelm> 金币

original: I'd like to make a trade.
Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Reaping
Contract Started: A member of the Markarth Sanctuary has departed.
string: 契约启动：马卡斯城圣所的一名成员已出发执行任务。

original: The whole world is in your debt. Including me, of course. I'm ever so glad to have met you. Truly.
string: 整个世界都欠你一份情。当然，也包括我。能遇到你，我真的太开心了。说真的。

original: Why would I not be? All my childhood, I grew up with the stories of my father's valor in the Great War.
string: 我为什么不开心？我从小听着父亲在大战中英勇作战的故事长大。

original: The Dark Brotherhood will learn not to mess with someone like me.
string: 黑暗兄弟会会学到，别惹我这样的人。

original: One that was flawed, afraid, and in pain.
string: 一台有缺陷、充满恐惧且痛苦不堪的机器。
在啸风棱堡杀死沃尔克罗夫

original: Is it any wonder these people are going mad? Looks at this place.
string: 这些人会发疯也不奇怪，看看这地方就知道了。

original:
Contract Kill an Imperial Legion Forrester Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] This Imperial Legion Forrester imposed heavy fines on a colovian hunter for poaching an endangered species of birds. Unfortunately for him, this hunter was familiar with the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Imperial Legion Forrester. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名帝国军团护林员 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 这名帝国军团护林员因一名科洛维亚猎人偷猎濒危鸟类，对其处以了高额罚款。可他倒霉的是，这名猎人恰好知晓黑暗祭礼的举行方式。 与委托人接头，铲除帝国军团护林员. [pagebreak]

original:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="28">
KILL THE OCEAN DRAGON!!

<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="18">
Weve about had it with this damn Dragon devouring about and messing up our supplies near the West Coast.
 
Already buried 2 of our comrades. Most of us are fishermen supplying to Solitude and Morthal. A shortage of fish these past 2 weeks has been due to this thing!

REWARD: 1000 Gold

- Common Folk & Fishermen
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="28">
斩杀海洋之龙！

<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="18">
这该死的巨龙四处肆虐，把我们西海岸附近的补给线搅得一团糟，我们实在是忍无可忍了。

我们已经为两位同伴收了尸。我们大多是给独孤城和墨索尔供应渔获的渔民。过去两周渔获短缺，全是这东西搞的鬼！

悬赏：1000 金币

—— 平民与渔民
</font>

original: Well, let's look at the positives. If it's true what they say, having a goddess at your back can't be a bad thing.
string: 好吧，我们往好处想。要是他们说的是真的，有位女神做后盾可不是坏事。

original: You're lucky I can't cast flame spells otherwise you'd go up like tinder!
string: 算你走运，我不会火焰法术，不然你早就烧成灰烬了！

original: They are like my own kin. My own blood. Their stories are the reason I wanted to travel across Tamriel so desperately.
string: 他们就像我的亲人，我的家人。正是他们的故事，让我迫切地想要游历泰姆瑞尔。

original: Spell Tome: Conjure Dragon Priest Thrall
string: 法术书: 召唤龙祭司奴仆

original: I think you mean to say, "What do you think of the college?", because that's all I can really comment on.
string: 我想你是想问 “你觉得学院怎么样？”，因为我也就只能评价这个了。

original: Sounds awfully boring, doesn't it? Now you see why I want to travel with you.
string: 听着特别无聊，对吧？现在你该明白我为什么想和你一起旅行了。

original: If I ever become a vampire, you must find me a cure or put me out of my misery.
string: 如果我变成了吸血鬼，你要么帮我找到解药，要么给我个痛快。

original: There is an abundance of things to keep me busy when you and I are not together, which is good because I do not enjoy being idle.
string: 你我不在一起的时候，这儿有好多事能让我忙起来，这很好，因为我不喜欢闲着。

original: Hmm... All right... How about this?
If I could study such a garment, I believe I could replicate, even surpass it
string: 要是能研究这样的衣物，我相信我能复刻出来，甚至超越它。

original: Jorrvaskr, the legendary mead hall of great warriors! They even sang of Kodlak Whitemane's exploits back home, remember?
string: 勇士之家，伟大战士的传奇蜜酒厅！还记得吗？家乡那边还传唱着克拉科・白鬃的事迹呢。

original: The lightning I produce comes from soul gems hidden in my circuits. Do you also hide soul gems in your skin to produce magic?
string: 我释放的闪电来自我电路里的灵魂石。你也会在皮肤里藏灵魂石来施展魔法吗？

original: I was born in Windhelm, but my profession has made me a citizen of the sea.
string: 我出生在风舵城，但我的职业让我成了大海的子民。

original: Careful with that armor. Seems Boethiah likes to send thinbloods to kill each other over it. I'd rather not see you be next.
string: 小心那套盔甲，波耶西亚似乎就喜欢让那些娇气包为了它自相残杀，我可不想看到你变成下一个。

original: I have found a note laying Sybille's scheme bare. I should take it to a dead drop.
string: 我发现了一张纸条，上面彻底揭露了希比利的阴谋。我应将纸条送往情报交接点。

original: I do not have anything useful to say. Unless you were looking for weather commentaries, which I refuse to tell.
string: 我没什么有用的话要说。除非你想听天气评论，那我可拒绝奉告。

original: Given that I'm not a farmer, I'm not sure I can fairly comment. I'm sure it's a wonderful place to be if you're harvesting wheat and picking cabbages
string: 既然我不是农民，我想我没法做出公正的评价。我相信如果你是种小麦、摘卷心菜的，这儿肯定很棒。

original: In her final orders, Listener Dupre entrusted me with a set of special instructions from the Night Mother herself.
string: 在最后的指令中，杜普雷聆听者将夜母亲自下达的一系列特殊指示托付给了我。

original: Don't tell me you're wearing dragonscales... Careful, you might turn into a real dragon. Then you truly would be unstoppable.
string: 别告诉我你穿的是龙鳞甲…… 小心点，你可能会变成真的龙，到时候你就真的无敌了。

original: Those Stormcloaks fashion themselves as freedom fighters. Don't seem to care much for the freedom of those who aren't with them.
string: 那些风暴斗篷把自己打扮成自由斗士，却根本不在乎那些不站在他们那边的人的自由。

original: I'll support you in whatever you choose, of course. But I wouldn't make the decision lightly.
string: 当然，无论你选什么，我都会支持你。但这个决定可不能轻率做出来。

original: After slaying the beast that killed his wife and child, Talsric the blacksmith has made me a unique armor named Wolfbane.
string: 我斩杀了那头害死铁匠塔斯里克妻儿的巨兽后，他为我打造了一套名为 “狼之祸” 的独特盔甲。

original: Crafting skills are <mag>% more effective for <5> minutes.
string: <5> 分钟内，锻造技能效果提升<mag>%

original: You'll find your ledger in your personal quarters within each sanctuary. Use it to keep track of your treasury, and the sanctuaries you control.
string: 你可以在每座圣所的私人住处找到账簿，用它记录金库的收支，以及你掌控的圣所情况。

original:
Whoever is on guard duty - read this! No more dozing off or sneaking into the kitchen when you are guarding the entrance! And yes, the sabrecat is scary but do NOT tie her up. Two mages from the College sneaked in all the way to the main chamber before they got caught yesterday! Security is our collective responsibility.

-- Moroiel
string:
所有值岗的人听着 —— 把这个读清楚！ 守入口的时候，不许再打瞌睡，也不许偷偷溜进厨房！没错，剑齿虎是很吓人，但绝对不许把她绑起来。昨天学院的两个法师一路溜进主厅才被抓住！安保是我们所有人的责任。

——莫罗伊尔

original: A Bosmer? Welcome to the Reach, child of the Green. If only you found me under better circumstances...
string: 波兹莫人？欢迎来到边塞，绿之子女。要是你能在更好的情况下找到我就好了……

original: Apostle Renos would have loved this city. Maybe he should have settled down here instead of Solstheim.
string: 雷诺斯使徒一定会喜欢这座城市的。他当初要是定居在这里，而不是索瑟海姆就好了。

original: Conjure Giant Frostbite Spider
string: 召唤巨型霜噬蜘蛛

original: The sanctuary was in disarray after I made it back to Cheydinhal.
string: 我回到香丁赫尔后，圣所陷入了一片混乱。

original: Oh, why don't you go and hug a tree!
I hope this discussion was of help for you.
string: 希望这次交谈对你有帮助。

original: The laboratory of Nchardak is full of resources. Unfortunately, most sank with the laboratory itself. I have managed to gather some Dwemer scraps, some machines as well, but nothing really helpful for my research. Thankfully, I have been able to understand a bit more about the purpose of the soulgem and how the automatons use its energy. I have to try transfering a factotum's conscience into a new body, by using soulgems.
string: 钠查达克的实验室里本是资源遍地，可惜的是，绝大多数资源都随实验室一同沉没了。我虽设法收集到了一些锻莫碎片和若干机械部件，却没有一样能对我的研究起到实质帮助。所幸，我对灵魂石的用途，以及自动化构装体如何利用其能量，有了更深一层的理解。我必须尝试借助灵魂石，将构装体的意识转移到新的躯体之中。

original: <13> points of Fire damage. Absorb Health <6> points plus target Bleeds for <5> points.
string: 13 点火焰伤害，吸取 6 点生命值，同时使目标流血，造成 5 点持续伤害。

original: What are you without your magic, mage?
string: 没了魔法，你还剩什么，法师？

original: Everyone there died but me. Sister Andronica was cut to ribbons, and Listener Dupre was burned to ash in a storm of mage fire.
string: 在场的人都死了，除了我。安德罗妮卡姐妹被砍成了碎片，杜普雷聆听者则在法师的火焰风暴中化为灰烬。

original: The missing apostle has written about going to Kagrumez, but first, I should return to the laboratory and talk to the factotum. It will want to come with me.
string: 失踪的使徒留下文字说要去卡古梅兹，不过我得先返回实验室，和构装体谈一谈。它肯定想跟我一起去。

original: Spell Tome: Elegy of the Lost
By replacing real contracts with fake ones, he tricked one of our own people into eliminating Silencers, Speakers, and even the Listener himself.
string: 他用伪造的契约替换了真契约，诱骗我们自己人除掉了沉默者、发言人，甚至连聆听者都没能幸免。

original: Give me a day or so and I'll have your armor ready.
string: 给我一天左右的时间，你的盔甲就能做好了。

original: That bottle is whispering. Do you hear it? No, just me. Well, that's not unusual, just be careful alright?
string: 那个瓶子在低语，你听到了吗？没有？只有我听到？好吧，这也不稀奇，小心点就好。

original: This world is born of her magic and Lorkh's will, and she waits to guide us to the next.
string: 这个世界由她的魔法与洛库的意志所创，她正等待着指引我们前往来世。

original: It's my fault, Listener, I shouldn't have been standing there.
string: 是我的错，聆听者，我不该站在这儿的。

original: Precisely. The Empire may not be living its best years... but up until the Thalmor started the War, there were centuries of peace.
string: 没错。帝国或许正处低谷…… 但在梭默挑起战争之前，曾有过几个世纪的和平。

original: I'm inclined to agree with you. Though I must say the Empire has not done a great deal for the Imperial province as of late.
string: 我倾向于同意你的看法。不过我得说，帝国最近对帝国省份没什么作为。

探险物资清单：

original: Between you and me, Listener. I think she was just jealous of how much some of us revered the Night Mother, and she wanted that all for herself.
string: 就你我之间说说，聆听者。我觉得她就是嫉妒我们当中有些人对夜母的崇敬，想把这份尊崇都占为己有。

original: You are no longer commanding the Markarth family.
string: 你已不再执掌马卡斯城家族。

original: Follow me. I need your help.
string: 跟我来。我需要你的帮助。

original: Can you train me to use magic?
My sister is sad. Sadder than I've ever seen her. Oh well.
string: 我姐姐很伤心，比我见过的任何时候都伤心。唉，算了。

original: I'm sure Skyrim laughed when they heard people were settling down in a city made completely of stone. In come the dragons. Now who's laughing?
string: 我敢肯定，当天际的人听说有人要在一座全是石头的城市定居时，都笑掉大牙了。结果龙来了，现在谁笑？

original: I have another burning question to ask you.
string: 我还有个迫切的问题想问你。

original: This is as far from my estate as you can get.
string: 这儿跟我的家族领地简直是天差地别。

original: Our strike will end your blight, Falmer.
string: 我们的攻击将终结你的祸害，伐莫。

original: With the Blood Extractor in your inventory, vampires will have a chance to drop Vampire Blood on death.
string: 只要背包中有采血器，吸血鬼死亡时就有几率掉落吸血鬼之血。

original: It would be my pleasure. What school of magic would you like to train in?
string: 我的荣幸。你想学习哪个魔法学派？

original: I haven't found all the students yet, but I'm not giving up.
string: 我还没找到所有学生，但我不会放弃的。

original: Well, that wasn't the Schemer's plan. Think we'd best stay away from Markarth for a few years... We don't want to remind Molag Bal of this failure.
string: 好吧，这显然不是那个阴谋家的计划。我觉得我们最好几年内都别回马卡斯了…… 别让莫拉格・巴尔想起这次失败。

original: See! This is you! You have done this! Tricking your own nephew into war, sister. How could you!
string: 你看！这就是你的本性！是你干的好事！骗自己的外甥去打仗，姐姐，你怎么能这么做！

original: I found a note on the road not far from Kolskeggr Mine next to some dead Vigilants of Stendarr. What appear to be their orders mentions a hidden sanctuary of Daedra worshippers that are planning to attack Markarth. I should stop them before they begin their assault on the city.
string: 我在科斯凯格矿坑不远处的路上，发现了一张纸条，旁边躺着几个死去的斯坦达尔的警戒者。从看似是他们命令的内容来看，有一群魔族崇拜者藏在一处秘密圣所，正计划袭击马卡斯城。我得在他们发动进攻前阻止他们。

original: Can you tell me about the Vateshrans?
string: 你能跟我说说瓦特什兰吗？

original: I've been wounded worse by better!
This Talos business all seems so pointless. The Thalmor need to reconsider their priorities.
string: 塔洛斯这事看着太没意义了，梭默真该重新考虑一下轻重缓急。

original: What an honor it is to prove our strength and your birthright to the Greybeards.
string: 能向灰胡子证明我们的力量和你的血脉传承，真是荣幸。

original: Now this is more like it.
The Druadach lairs once housed our most talented alchemists. It pains me to see what wars and cleansings have reduced it to...
string: 德鲁达奇巢穴曾住着我们最顶尖的炼金师，看着它因战争和清洗变成这副模样，我心里好痛……

original: Clocky, to refer to my origins from the Clockwork City.
string: 时钟，指代我来自发条城。
公共区域（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: Ach, now you've got someone's attention. Not good. Not good.
string: 唉，现在你引起别人注意了，不妙，太不妙了。

original:
- <Alias=HelperUnitRank> <Alias=HelperUnitName> (<Alias=HelperUnitClass>) -

Contracts Completed: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitContractsCompleted>
-
Health: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealth>/<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealthCap>
Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitUpkeep> Gold
-
Bonus Damage: +<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitDamage>%%
Bonus Rewards: +<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitRewards>%%
-
Attribute Points: <Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitAttributePoints>
string:
- <Alias=HelperUnitRank> <Alias=HelperUnitName>（<Alias=HelperUnitClass>）

-已完成契约数：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitContractsCompleted>

-生命值：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealth>/<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitHealthCap>

维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitUpkeep> 

金币-伤害加成：+<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitDamage>%

奖励加成：+<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitRewards>%

-属性点数：<Global=MOD_Global_HelperUnitAttributePoints>

original: The Empire tried to kill me when I was innocent!
string: 我清白无辜的时候，帝国却想杀我！

original: There is nothing more that I can show you. You're better than me, now.
string: 我已经没什么能教你的了。现在你比我厉害。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
Orders from the Jarl of Solitude: Proclamation to All Citizens

Know ye,

Anyone found providing shelter or supplies to a Pirate will be arrested and hanged without question!

These outlaws threaten our shores, our trade, and our peace. Harboring them is no different than raising a blade against your own.

No excuses. No trials.
You side with pirates; you hang with them.


--Captain of the Solitude Guard
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
独孤城领主令：
告全体子民书

仰尔众知：

凡被发现向海盗提供庇护或补给者，一律逮捕，即刻绞刑，绝不宽贷！

这群亡命之徒威胁着我们的海岸、贸易与和平。窝藏他们，无异于对同胞拔刀相向。

莫找借口，无需审判。

若与海盗为伍，便与他们同罪受死。

—— 独孤城卫队长
</font>

original: You must realise you are doomed!
string: 你肯定知道自己死定了！

original: Each breath I take is a debt owed to those blasted Nords. Prisoners on our own homeland, that's what they made us.
string: 我每一次呼吸，都欠那些该死的诺德人一条命，他们把我们变成了自己家园里的囚徒。

original: I'd take the swamps over all these dusty, depressing reekers any day.
string: 我宁愿待在沼泽里，也不想面对这些满是灰尘、令人作呕的臭鼬。

original: Blasted memory loss! Come back to me when you remember me again. I'm not going to have our adventure robbed because of your memory loss!
string: 该死的失忆症！等你记起我了再来找我。我可不会让我们的冒险因为你的失忆泡汤！
法术书: 召唤死亡猎犬

original: A Nord? What business do you have here? Did the Silver-Bloods send you to do their dirty work?
string: 诺德人？你到这儿来干什么？是银血家族派你来干脏活的吗？

original: I hope I'm not the source of that fear.
string: 希望我不是你恐惧的根源。

original: Is that all? I'm quite capable, you know.
string: 就这些？你要知道，我本事可大着呢。

original: I am now the master of my own directives. If I felt emotions, I suppose I would feel fear right now.
string: 现在我可以自主决定指令了。如果我能产生情绪，此刻大概会感到恐惧吧。

original: Adopt the husky at Frostwind Cabin
string: 在霜风小屋领养哈士奇

original: Here is the ring you wanted. Irandir is dead, I'm sorry.
string: 这是你要的戒指。很抱歉，伊兰迪尔已经死了。

original: Ugh... Can we get out of here? The sea doesn't agree with me.
string: 呃…… 我们能出去吗？我晕船。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
A bloody altar of blackened stone, its surface stained dark. You feel a faint tremor, as if something beneath it beats with a rhythm far away, unseen.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
这座染血祭坛由焦黑石岩筑成，石面已被深暗血渍浸透。你能感觉到一丝微弱震颤，仿佛祭坛之下，正有一股无形的远古韵律在搏动，遥远而隐秘。
</font>

original: You're a Nightingale now. Quite a pompous ceremony, don't you think? I am wondering what you will receive in return for pledging yourself.
string: 你现在是夜莺了。仪式还挺浮夸的，你觉得呢？我很好奇你宣誓之后会得到什么回报。

original: Let's go find that priest and get this done with. We don't want to keep the Schemer waiting.
string: 我们去找那个祭司，把这事了结了。别让那个阴谋家等急了。

original: You are no longer commanding the Solitude family.
string: 你已不再执掌独孤城家族。

original: I would've thought you'd know all there is to know about me by now.
string: 我还以为你现在该把我了解得透透的了。

original: I should search my dead target.
string: 我应当搜查这个已被我解决的目标。

original: But that's a long story, Listener. I won't bore you with it... unless you ask me to.
string: 不过这说来话长，聆听者。我就不拿这个烦你了…… 除非你主动问起。

original: Thank you again for helping me find the apostle.
string: 再次感谢你帮我找到使徒。

original: I'll stand here and cheer you on if you'd like to scale right to the top. I fear I don't have the skills for that.
string: 如果你想爬到顶，我就在这儿为你加油。我可没那本事。

original: Not the ideal way to go down.
string: 这可不是什么体面的死法。

original: But an ambiguous ally is better than a murderer who bloodied my homeland. If the Empire can slay Ulfric and avenge my people... then I'll help them.
string: 但一个态度暧昧的盟友，也比那个让我家园血流成河的杀人犯强。如果帝国能杀了乌弗瑞克，为我的族人复仇…… 那我就帮他们。

original: Bring 2 Dragon Cultist Robes & 5 Heartstones to Nelosi Ulaaru
string: 将 2 件拜龙教长袍和 5 块心石交给内洛西・乌拉鲁

original: Crawling up to the very hearths of their pretty little camps. We took out as many Altmer elements as we could. With caution. And care.
string: 悄悄摸到他们那些漂亮营地的腹地，小心翼翼地尽可能清除高精灵的势力。

original:
The Whiterun Sanctuary is now active.

You can now hire recruits, assign contracts, and purchase improvements for this location.
string:
白漫城圣所现已启用。

你如今可在此招募人手、分配契约，并为该地点购置各类升级设施。

original: The trees are beautiful it's true, but Falkreath is depressing. Their obsession with death is somewhat... Overindulgent.
string: 树确实很美，但佛克瑞斯太压抑了。他们对死亡的执念有点…… 过分了。

original: I have found the cave where Withers went to search for the Fire tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to her.
string: 我找到了威瑟斯前去寻找元素魔法・火焰卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚她遭遇了什么。

original: Relics of the Dragon Cult (Post Quest)
You know, you're by far the greatest friend I've ever had.
string: 你知道吗，你是我这辈子最好的朋友。

original: If you wish for additional armor sets, return with another set of dragon cultist robes and 5 heart stones.
string: 如果你想要其他盔甲套装，再带一套拜龙教长袍和五颗心石来就行。

original: High Rock Contract: Kill an Abusive Spouse (Low-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位施暴配偶（低风险）

original: Ah, splendid! You've returned, with the prize! Let me examine them.
string: 啊，太棒了！你带着战利品回来了！让我看看。

original: Hmph. See? Told you she'd come.
string: 哼。看到了吧？我就说她会来的。

original: Ive received a note from a stranger leading me to an ancient cavern. I should investigate, and remain cautious, as reports have surfaced of a patrol of orcs prowling the mountain paths.
string: 我收到了一个陌生人的纸条，指引我前往一处古老的洞穴。我得去调查，同时保持警惕，因为有消息称，有一队兽人在山间小路上巡逻。

original: How noble. Of course, as long as you promise to use it on me when I need it.
string: 真高尚。当然，只要你保证在我需要的时候用在我身上就行。

original: I need you to do something.
Mages are like spices. Have too few of them and you will be stale, have too many of them and you will soon be on fire.
string: 法师就像调味品。少了则索然无味，多了则引火烧身。

original: Do you have a moment? There was something I wanted to share with you.
string: 你有空吗？我有件事想跟你说。

original: Summons a Mudcrab Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只泥蟹魔宠，持续<dur>秒

original: Accursed Silver-Bloods! Spirits damn them to the Deadlands for all eternity.
string: 该死的银血家族！愿灵体把他们永远打入湮灭的亡域。

original: I thought the Companions were a band of honorable warriors. Never did I realize they are led by Hircine's cultists - and now you're one of them!
string: 我原以为战友团是一群高尚的战士。从没料到他们竟由海尔辛的信徒领导 —— 而现在你也成了其中一员！

original: I know she frets over Fafi's ways, but that's just how he is. He isn't meant for the same fate as his father. We've discussed this countless times!
string: 我知道她总为法菲的性子操心，但他本就是这样的人。他不该和他父亲落得同样的下场，这事我们已经讨论过无数次了！

original: That's all I wanted to ask.

An apostle of the Clockwork City has disappeared on Solstheim. I am now in Nchardak Submerged Laboratory looking for him, but I am stuck in front of a big hole, with no way to go through. Maybe if I take control of the draining system, I could fill the hole with water and swim through?
string: 发条城的一位使徒在索瑟海姆失踪了。我如今身处钠查达克水下实验室，正在寻找他的踪迹，却被一个大坑挡住了去路，无路可通。或许我若能操控排水系统，就能往坑里注满水，然后游过去？

original: The other... I could tailor for a resourceful individual who assists me. You, perhaps? But his cultists won't part with them willingly.
string: 另一套…… 我可以为帮助我的能人量身打造。或许就是你？但他的信徒可不会轻易交出长袍。

original: Summons a Nordic Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把诺德誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: This seems like a great little town to start an adventure in - perfect for one of my stories! Shall I start writing?
string: 这小镇看着很适合开启一场冒险，简直是我故事里的完美场景！我要不要开始写了？

original: Time to warm up the forge. Did you want heavy or light?
string: 该把锻造炉烧热了。你想要重型盔甲还是轻型的？

original: Spray spores to reanimate up to <3> corpses to fight for you for <10> minutes. The spores weaken you; you take <twice as much> damage while at least <1> corpse is reanimated.
string: 喷射孢子，复活最多 3 具尸体为你作战，持续 10 分钟。孢子会对你造成虚弱效果：只要有至少 1 具尸体处于复活状态，你受到的伤害就会翻倍。

original: How we thought we could take on the world as kids... Those were the simpler times.
string: 小时候我们还以为自己能征服世界呢…… 那时候多简单啊。

original: Resist 10% of Magic and Regenerate Magicka 15% faster
string: 魔法抗性提升 10%，法力值恢复速度加快 15%。

original: I don't want to become a werewolf.
What do you want to know?
Summons a Dremora Kynreeve for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一名魔人士官，持续<dur>秒

original: Let me know if you need help with Septimus's Dwemer toys. Little dwarven trinkets like that are commonplace in the Reach...
string: 要是你需要帮忙摆弄塞普汀默斯的锻莫玩具，尽管说。这种小锻莫饰品在边塞随处可见……

original: So, you're not the strong silent type.
string: 看来你不是那种沉默寡言的硬汉嘛。

original: This is it. This is the place. Let's see what we can find.
string: 就是这里了。看看我们能找到什么。

original: The Mother of Crows is a protector of the Reach, the Queen of Shadows, and my family's favored spirit.
string: 渡鸦之母是边塞的守护者，是影之女王，也是我们家族最信奉的灵体。
高岩契约 | 中等风险

original: In those days, the Dark Brotherhood's enemies were closing in around us, slowly killing us off.
string: 那时候，黑暗兄弟会的敌人步步紧逼，慢慢将我们蚕食。

original: Take the Staff of Mental Disturbance
No matter what... I'm glad we're fighting the good fight.
string: 无论如何…… 我很高兴我们在为正义而战。

original: Can you train me in restoration?
Do you recall why we started this journey?
string: 你还记得我们为什么开始这段旅程吗？

original: You should turn around and run!
What happened? You disappeared, and everything was so quiet!
string: 发生什么了？你突然消失了，周围一下子好安静！

original:
Contract Kill a Pirate Captain Province: Hammerfell Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] Years of causing terror on the high seas have finally caught up with this legendary pirate captain. One of their many victims has performed the Black Sacrament to have them killed. Meet with the client and eliminate the Pirate Captain. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名海盗船长 省份： 落锤 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 这位传奇海盗船长在公海上肆虐多年，如今终于恶有恶报。其众多受害者中的一人举行了黑暗祭礼，决意取他性命。 与委托人接头，铲除海盗船长. [pagebreak]

original: My ability to protect myself is undeniable. I might deign to say that I could now thrash him in a duel with my extensive training.
string: 我自保的能力是毋庸置疑的。甚至可以说，经过多年训练，现在和他决斗，我定能把他打得落花流水。

original: Thank you for having me on your adventures.
string: 谢谢你让我参与你的冒险。

original: I hope the Arch-Mage can find peace in death. He must have been a troubled man.
string: 希望大法师死后能安息，他肯定是个心事重重的人。

original: Conjure Ice Wraith
string: 召唤冰怨灵

original: You'd send him to the Nords' paradise? This bloody monster? He deserves worse than death! But who am I to argue with you - do what you must.
string: 你要把他送去诺德人的天堂？这个该死的魔头？他罪有应得，死都便宜他了！但我又有什么资格跟你争辩呢 —— 你想做就做吧。

original: The armor. You want heavy or light?
string: 盔甲的事，你要重型的还是轻型的？

original: I suggest we start by reopening the old sanctuaries across Skyrim, and focus on contracts to grow our notoriety.
string: 我建议我们先重新开放天际各地的古老圣所，再专注于承接契约，让我们的威名远扬。

original: The rest, as they say, is history. Your history. Don't you see, Listener? Nothing that happened to you was by accident.
string: 剩下的事，正如人们所说，已成历史。是属于你的历史。你还不明白吗，聆听者？你身上发生的一切都绝非偶然。

original: Don't you dare even think of sacrificing me to that spire. Not even as a joke.
string: 你敢把我献祭给那尖塔试试，就算开玩笑也不行。

original: Was it this ring? (Show her the ring you found on Thonar)
string: 是这枚戒指吗？（给她看你在索纳尔身上找到的戒指）

original: Those were the times, weren't they?
string: 那些日子多美好啊，不是吗？
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 中等风险

original: I have the Tonal Wand, when I'm ready I should use it to enter the Forge.
string: 我拿到了调谐权杖，等准备就绪，就用它进入熔炉。

original: Their secrets could unlock new heights of craft for me.
string: 这些长袍里的秘密，能让我的工艺更上一层楼。

original: Your wards aren't strong enough to protect you from me!
string: 你的防护结界根本挡不住我！

original: Ive received notice of strange dark sightings near the woods northwest of Falkreath. Locals speak of a burning red figure and a massive walking tree. Falkreath hunters and guards have vanished without trace. Investigate and end whatever dark force lurks there.
string: 我接到消息，佛克瑞斯西北方向的树林附近出现了诡异的黑暗异象。当地人谈及一个燃烧的红色身影，还有一棵巨大的行走之树。佛克瑞斯的猎人与守卫已无故失踪。我得去调查一番，终结潜藏在那里的黑暗力量。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Mistress Maven,

A defector from Lirael's close group came to me, calling himself Acanthus, a nervous elf spilling from fear. He gave enough for this note before he vanished.
Lirael hides after a failed assassination that no one saw, and apparently she's furious about it, saying it ruined decades of planning. She's changed since Skyrim, now a cold Thalmor handler, not what she was when she arrived in this province. Acanthus talks of illusions hiding her, and a "deeper hunger" in her plans.

He's caught now, rotting in Fort Neugrad. Get him out; his story could break Lirael's net and protect Riften. Hurry, word spreads, and Lirael sends her own soon.

E

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

致玛雯女士，

来自莉瑞尔核心集团的一名叛逃者找到了我，自称阿坎萨斯 —— 这只精灵吓得魂不守舍，语无伦次。他留下足够写这封信的信息后，便销声匿迹了。
一场无人目击的刺杀行动失败后，莉瑞尔藏了起来，据说她对此暴怒不已，称行动毁了她数十年的谋划。她踏上天际省后变了太多，如今已是个冷酷的梭默主事者，全然不是初到这片土地时的模样。阿坎萨斯提到，她用幻术隐匿行踪，且其计划中藏着一种 更深的贪欲。

他现已被捕，囚在新邑堡垒里日渐衰颓。务必将他救出来：他的证词足以撕破莉瑞尔的罗网，保护裂谷城。快点 —— 消息已开始传开，莉瑞尔的人很快就会赶到。

E

</font>

original: I only continued following him, as no other options were offered. As my connection to the Clockwork City was severed.
string: 我只是继续跟着他，因为没有其他选择。而且我与发条城的连接也中断了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings,

Stendarr's Blade thanks you for your swift blade in the shadows. Sybille Stentor, Solitude's court wizard for centuries, hid a vampire's hunger behind her spells and counsel. She pulled strings in the Blue Palace, twisting Elisif's court with whispers of undeath, turning a seat of Imperial strength into a veiled crypt. Her schemes threatened to drain Solitude dry from within, leaving its people pale thralls to her eternal night. You've ended that peril before her fangs sank deeper into the heart of the north.

For this deed, take Ashfang, a Dwarven dagger forged by the dwarves long ago. Its edge burns with purifying fire on every strike, and when it claims a life, the body crumbles to ash piles, leaving no trace for prying eyes or guards to find. Wield it as a silent cleanser, honoring our creed of mercy tempered by flame.

Your vigilance keeps Tamriel's balance. More shadows stir, watch the dead drops.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

敬启者：

斯坦达尔之剑为你于暗影中挥出的迅捷一剑深表谢意。任职数百年的独孤城宫廷法师希比利·斯丹特，将吸血鬼的嗜血欲望掩藏在法术与谏言之下。她在蓝色宫殿中暗中操纵，以不死之力的谗言搅乱艾利西弗的宫廷，将这座帝国的要塞化作了一座隐秘的墓穴。其阴谋本欲从内部将独孤城榨干殆尽，让城中民众沦为她永恒长夜下面色苍白的奴仆。你在她的獠牙更深地刺入北方心脏前，终结了这场危机。

为嘉奖此番功绩，特将 “灰烬之牙” 赠予你。这是一把由锻莫一族在远古时期打造的匕首，锋刃每次挥砍都会燃起净化之火，夺人性命后，尸身会化为一捧飞灰，不会留下任何痕迹，让好事者与守卫无从追查。请将它作为无声的净化之刃使用，以此践行我们以烈焰淬炼仁慈的信条。
你的警觉守护着泰姆瑞尔的平衡。更多暗影仍在蠢蠢欲动，留意秘密投递点的消息。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: I am glad to be by your side, friend.
string: 很高兴能陪在你身边，朋友。

original: By the gods. So you dumped me on purpose! And you had me waiting around for so long like a fool.
string: 天啊，你竟然故意丢下我！还让我像个傻瓜一样等了你这么久。

original: I don't want to become a werewolf.

Contract Kill a Telvanni Wizard Province: Morrowind Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] The internal politics of House Telvanni are considered cutthroat and eccentric even by dunmer standards. Minor wizards can rise through the ranks by simply "disposing" of other members by any means, including the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Telvanni Wizard. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名泰尔瓦尼法师 省份： 晨风 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 即便以丹莫的标准衡量，泰尔瓦尼家族的内部政治也堪称残酷与怪诞。在这个以魔法为绝对权力的派系中，次级法师若想跻身更高阶，唯一的法则便是 “清除” 挡路者 —— 无论用何种手段，包括举行黑暗祭礼，都被视为合理的晋升途径。 与委托人接头，铲除泰尔瓦尼法师. [pagebreak]

original: And you carried it out... flawlessly.
string: 而你完美地执行了计划…… 天衣无缝。

original: It's exciting but dangerous. The best things in life are.
string: 既刺激又危险，人生中最美好的事物大抵都是如此。
威木省契约 | 中等风险

original: An Orc? What business brings you up to the Aerie, Bloodkin? Are you from one of the nearby strongholds?
string: 兽人？血亲，是什么风把你吹到鹰巢来的？你是附近要塞的吗？

original: Let's try to limit the damage this beast does!
string: 尽量减少这头野兽造成的破坏！

original: I am Facto, and I will be the one who takes you down.
string: 我是魔偶，我会成为打倒你的人。

original: Elsweyr Contract: Kill a Khajiit Monk (Medium-Risk)
string: 艾斯维尔契约：杀死一位虎人僧侣（中等风险）

original: I don't know. What do you think? Somewhere with a bard, or someone to fight! Oh, preferrably somewhere with booze!
string: 不知道。你觉得呢？找个有吟游诗人的地方，或者有架可打的地方！哦，最好还有酒喝！

original: Spell Tome: Eyes of the Veil

string: 法术书: 召唤巢蚁猎人

original: If you need weapons or armor, I'm sure that can be arranged.
string: 如果你需要武器或盔甲，我都能为你打造。

original: The console lies dormant. A round socket sits at its center, a key component appears to be missing.
string: 控制台处于休眠状态，正中央有一个圆形插槽，关键部件似乎缺失了。

original: Deposit some gold into the treasury.
Then I shall do the same. Though, for what it's worth, I trust her a lot more than I trust Mercer right now.
string: 那我也这么做。不过说真的，现在我比信任墨瑟要信任她得多。

original: A few factotums started malfunctioning, and the closest technology available in here is Dwemer technology.
string: 几个构装体开始出现故障，而这里能找到的最接近的技术就是锻莫技术。

string: 寒霜抗性提高<50>%，寒霜魔法伤害提高<25>%。

original:
Contract Kill a Redguard Pirate Province: Hammerfell Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] Redguards are among the best sailors and warriors in Tamriel. Some of them use these talents to make a living in less than honorable ways, such as boarding and looting our clients ship. Meet with the client and eliminate the Redguard Pirate. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名红卫海盗 省份： 落锤 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 巍峨的阿利克尔沙漠，那片浸染鲜血的沙地，是落锤省众多骁勇战士的故土。其中一位战士没能成功击杀对手，反而结下了一生之敌 —— 不过拜黑暗祭礼所赐，这个仇敌的日子也不会太久了。 与委托人接头，铲除红卫海盗. [pagebreak]
约瓦尔德・胡尔加的遗骸

original: Valthar was a Thalmor agent. I should take what I have learnt to the dead-drop in Whiterun, in a barrel behind the Bannered Mare.
string: 瓦塔尔是名梭默密探。我应将所获情报送往白漫城的情报交接点 —— 位于战旗母马旅店后方的木桶内。

original: Is your character a member of Stendarr's Blade? If so the questline will start early, otherwise you can be recruited later.
string: 你的角色是否为斯坦达尔之刃成员？若是，任务线将提前开启；否则后续仍可加入。

original: I wouldn't care if it was for the High King himself. I said off with you.
string: 就算是至高王本人来要，我也不会给。我说了，赶紧走。

original: A bolt of lightning, generated by Animo crystals, that does <mag> points of shock damage to Health and half that to Magicka.
string: 由灵魂水晶生成的闪电箭，对生命值造成<mag>点闪电伤害，对法力值造成其一半的伤害

original: Ward of the Dwemer & Fortify Carry Weight
string: 锻莫守护结界与负重强化

original: I'll behave myself here for you. But if one Nord looks at me funny, you'll be helping me hide a body in that frozen river.
string: 我会为你在这儿安分点的，但要是哪个诺德人敢用奇怪的眼神看我，你可得帮我把尸体藏进冰封的河里。

original: Do you think there are really 7000 steps? Maybe they just made that up to make it rhyme. I've done that before... Hey, every bard does that!
string: 你觉得真的有七千级台阶吗？说不定他们只是为了押韵才这么说的，我以前也这么干过…… 嘿，每个吟游诗人都这么做！

original: Alright. I'll wait here for you.
The dragons' parts sell well, and their hoards are legendary, even. I'm starting to like this dragonslaying business.
string: 龙的各个部位都很值钱，它们的宝藏更是传奇般的存在。我开始喜欢上屠龙这差事了。

original: Old magic is barbaric, clearly. There's a reason civilised folk don't practice this type of sorcery.
string: 很明显，古老的魔法很野蛮，文明人不练这种巫术是有原因的。

original:
Contract Kill an Alfiq Province: Elsweyr Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] This clever alfiq took advantage of their appearance to rob a wealthy noble blind by posing as a common house cat. Rather than trying to steal back the gold, they performed the Black Sacrament instead. Restitution is not enough for this client, they want revenge. Meet with the client and eliminate the Alfiq. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名阿尔菲克 省份： 艾斯维尔 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 这只狡黠的阿尔菲克虎人利用自身外形优势，伪装成普通家猫把一位富有的贵族洗劫一空。贵族没有设法追回金币，反而举行了黑暗祭礼 —— 对这位雇主而言，仅仅挽回损失远远不够，他们要的是复仇。 与委托人接头，铲除阿尔菲克. [pagebreak]

original: Under the sun and moon, Outlander. Be well.
string: 外乡人，愿日月护佑你，安好顺遂。

original:
Contract Kill a Thalmor Spy Province: Summerset Isles Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] After years of spying for the Thalmor, this agent has retired to the Summerset Isles where they think they're finally safe. Our client wants us to show them how wrong they are. Meet with the client and eliminate the Thalmor Spy. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名梭默间谍 省份： 夏暮岛 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 这名特工为梭默从事间谍活动多年后，退休回到了夏暮岛，自以为终于可以高枕无忧。而我们的雇主，就是要让他明白 —— 他错得有多离谱。 与委托人接头，铲除梭默间谍. [pagebreak]
训练区（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: Is it hard to get some of these things?
string: 有些东西是不是很难弄到？

original: Analyzing target's behavior. Please keep fighting, I'd like to find more ways to defeat you.
string: 分析目标行为中。请继续攻击，我想找到更多击败你的方法。

original: If your family is so wealthy, why do you need me as your protector?
string: 要是你家这么有钱，为什么还需要我当你的护卫？

original: I'm sure the local population will be grateful.
string: 当地的人肯定会感激的。

original: If you delivered it, he'd never suspect a thing. And you'd double your gold in the gamble, traveler. So what do you say?
string: 要是你去送，他肯定一点疑心都不会有。而且旅人，你还能在这赌局里双倍赚回金子。怎么样？

original: So many dead... All for what? A little more magic?
string: 这么多死人…… 就为了这点魔法？

original: Aside from how you've braved the Tomb of Ysgramor and become the Companions' leader, that is.
string: 当然，你勇闯伊思格拉莫之墓，成为战友团领袖这事也除外。
还有别的吩咐吗，我的聆听者？

original: I'm a Vateshran - one of the last. I thought I found a way to empower a Briarheart, like the stories of the Red Eagle... Clearly it didn't work.
string: 我是瓦特什兰 —— 最后的瓦特什兰之一。我本以为找到了强化荆棘之心的方法，就像红鹰的传说里那样…… 显然我失败了。

original: This is... very worrisome. But I am not sure that my return would change anything.
string: 这…… 太令人担忧了。但我不确定我的回归能否改变什么。

original: Would you mind keeping your thoughts to yourself for now?
string: 你能不能暂时把想法藏在心里？

original: You'd better! Just kidding. Let's go make some more stories, ok?
string: 那当然最好了！开玩笑的。我们去创造更多故事吧，好吗？

original: I'm disappointed, Listener. J'Faar thought that you would understand, but I accept your judgement.
string: 我很失望，聆听者。杰法尔本以为你会理解我，但我接受你的评判。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Battleaxe of Garnering
The chill almost makes me miss the confinement of my compound. At least it's warm there. Still, Dawnstar looks gorgeous.
string: 这寒意都快让我想念家族领地的束缚了，至少那儿暖和。不过，晨星城看着倒是很美。

original: Vampiric Steel Weapons look as cruel as the creatures that wield them. Enchantments placed by a vampire on a Vampiric weapon becomes more potent.
string: 吸血鬼钢武器的外观，与挥舞它们的魔物一样狰狞可怖。吸血鬼为吸血鬼武器施加的附魔，效果会变得更为强劲。

original: With the hordes of bandits who roam this land, it seems like the Jarls don't even care anymore.
string: 这地方山贼横行，看来领主们根本不管事了。

original: I've found Jolgeirr Barrow, tomb of the Snow Prince. Upon arriving, I've discovered the door to be locked. I should investigate the surrounding area and see what I can find.
string: 我找到了雪王子之墓 —— 约基尔古坟。抵达后却发现墓门紧锁，我得在周边探查一番，看看能否找到些线索。

original: I hear they're keen poisoners, watch out!
string: 我听说他们很擅长用毒，小心点！

original: All these tormented souls, still hurting even after dying. I am more than convinced that I do not want to become a living person anytime soon.
string: 这么多饱受折磨的灵魂，死后依然在痛苦中挣扎。我更确定了，我可不想变成活物。

original: Recruitment Started: The Speaker of the Windhelm Sanctuary has departed.
string: 招募启动：风舵城圣所的传声者已出发招募新人。

original: The Harbinger of the Companions... You did a great thing for Kodlak. I think he has chosen a worthy successor.
string: 战友团的先驱者…… 你为克拉科做了件大事，我想他选了个当之无愧的继承者。

original: Our team work knows no bounds.
The Valus, eh? Are you the whispered Metalsmith of Morrowind?
string: 瓦卢斯，是吧？你就是晨风那个被人私下谈论的铁匠？

original: The price on the Emperor's head ought to be worth entire cities.
string: 皇帝头上的赏金应该抵得上整座城市。

original: Hostile beings incoming. Do you want me to take care of them?
string: 敌对生物接近。需要我来处理他们吗？

original: I'll have to empty my boots soon. I think a small fish has managed to find their way in.
string: 我得赶紧倒倒靴子，好像有条小鱼钻进去了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade has received dire word from our sources in Riften's underbelly: the Thieves Guild, those shadows who prowl the night for gold, have stolen a powerful Daedric artifact from its ancient resting place. This isn't mere trinket, their greed has plucked a relic tied to one of the Daedric Princes, and its absence stirs wrath that could rain calamity on all of Skyrim. Picture the prince's anger manifesting: cursed shadows swallowing the Ratway, guild members twisted into abominations, or worse, the fury spilling into the streets above, claiming innocents in a storm of otherworldly vengeance. The Guild's web of crime already frays Riften's edges, but this could shatter Tamriel's balance entirely, drawing Daedric eyes to our fragile north.

I suggest you infiltrate their ranks in the Ratway beneath Riften. Prove your nimble fingers through their tests of stealth and cunning, and rise until you uncover the artifact's fate. Track its path through their shadowy dealings, safes cracked, nobles fleeced, black market trades, and return it to its rightful owner if the chance arises. Their world is one of lies and double-crosses; hold fast to your honor amid the temptations of easy coin and forgotten debts. Watch for the Nightingale's song, the pull of Nocturnal's veil, they'll test your soul as much as your skills. Succeed, and you'll avert a disaster that could eclipse the Guild's own downfall.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃从裂谷城地下势力的线人处收到了危急消息：盗贼公会 —— 这群在黑夜中觊觎黄金的暗影之徒，从一处古老的安息之地偷走了一件威力强大的魔族神器。这绝非普通的小饰品，他们的贪婪夺走了一件与某位魔神绑定的圣物，而圣物的失窃已激起了亲王的怒火，这怒火或将为整个天际带来灭顶之灾。试想这位魔神的怒火化为现实会是何等景象：被诅咒的阴影吞噬鼠道，公会成员扭曲成畸形的怪物，更糟的是，这股狂怒会蔓延至地面的街道，让无辜者在异界复仇的风暴中殒命。盗贼公会的犯罪网络本就已让裂谷城摇摇欲坠，而此次事件则可能彻底打破泰姆瑞尔的平衡，让魔族的目光聚焦于我们脆弱的北方之地。

我建议你潜入裂谷城下的鼠道，加入他们的阵营。通过他们关于潜行与智谋的试炼，证明你身手敏捷，然后一步步晋升，直至查明神器的下落。顺着他们暗中交易的轨迹追踪神器 —— 被撬开的保险箱、遭敲诈的贵族、黑市的交易，若有机会，便将其归还给合法的主人。他们的世界充斥着谎言与背信弃义，在唾手可得的金钱与被遗忘的债务这些诱惑面前，你要坚守自己的荣誉。留意夜莺的歌声，以及诺克图娜尔的面纱带来的影响，它们对你灵魂的考验，将不亚于对你技能的考验。若能成功，你将避免一场比盗贼公会自身覆灭更为可怕的灾难。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: You could also argue that the settlement is not as defended as well as it should be. I suppose they can always barricade themselves in the mine...
string: 你也可以说，这个定居点的防御远未达到应有的水准。我猜他们顶多只能躲进矿坑，用路障把自己封死罢了……

original: I know, right? I hope we spend every day together, until its time to meet again in the Hunting Grounds...
string: 可不是嘛。真希望我们能朝夕相伴，直到在狩猎场重逢的那一刻……

original: Well, I've spoken a little bit about my father... I was wondering about your parents. What are they like?
string: 我跟你提过一点我父亲的事…… 我想知道你的父母怎么样？他们是怎样的人？

original: This might be the first time I've ever wanted to enter a tomb. Say what you like about the Companions these days, their history is legendary.
string: 这大概是我第一次想进坟墓里看看。不管你怎么评价现在的战友团，他们的历史可是传奇级的。

original: I'm watching your back, don't worry.
string: 放心，我会替你守着后背。

original: Nearby living creatures, but not undead, machines or daedra, can be seen through walls.
string: 可以穿透墙壁看见附近所有的生物，但亡灵、机器和魔族除外。

original: Damage taken from animals is reduced by 10%.
string: 动物对你造成的伤害降低10%。

original: My magic is far too powerful for you!
string: 我的魔法对你来说太强大了！

original: The land will crush you, Stormcloak dog!
string: 这片土地会将你碾碎，风暴斗篷的狗！

original: So, the great Empire is defeated and Skyrim belongs to it's children again. Naturally, I'm not overjoyed with the Stormcloak victory.
string: 那么，伟大的帝国被打败了，天际又回到了它的子民手中。当然，我对风暴斗篷的胜利并不太高兴。

original: I'd love to Listener, but we don't have enough gold.
string: 我倒是想帮你，聆听者，可我们真的没足够的金子。

original: Vampiric Steel War Axe of Absorption
To answer your question, I think nothing of Dragon Bridge. Disregarding that impressive bridge, there is little reason to visit here.
string: 回答你的问题，我觉得龙桥没什么特别的。除了那座令人印象深刻的桥，没什么值得来的理由。

original: You were right to refuse, she sounds like a poor leader.
string: 你拒绝得对，她听起来不像个合格的领袖。
斯坦达尔之剑 - 设置

original: You're just another corpse for us to break!
string: 你不过是又一具等着我们打碎的尸体！

original: Back to the Schemer, I suppose. Hopefully his ire is pointed at Boethiah's priest and not us, this time.
string: 看来又要去见那个阴谋家了，希望这次他的怒火冲着波耶西亚的祭司去，而不是我们。

original: What do you have for sale?
You're a good friend. Thank you for taking me here.
string: 你是个好朋友，谢谢你带我来这儿。

original: I found these student notes on Elemental Magic.
string: 我找到了这些学生的元素魔法笔记。

original: I don't like an entire group of people being forced into conditions like this. They work just as hard as any Nord. Perhaps even more.
string: 我不喜欢看到一群人被逼着过这种日子，他们和诺德人一样努力，甚至更努力。

original: The Dark Brotherhood has gone bankrupt! I will not be able to recruit initiates, purchase sanctuary upgrades, assign contracts, or use my Listener powers while the treasury is empty. To get out of bankruptcy I will need to add more funds to the treasury.
string: 黑暗兄弟会破产了！在金库空空如也的情况下，我无法招募新人、升级圣所、分配契约，也无法使用聆听者的能力。要摆脱破产困境，我得往金库里注入更多资金。

original: I have no fear for your magic.
You're looking at one of the last few Reachman Dhuns - hill forts. When the Incident happened, Ulfric's shouts leveled many of our ancestral places.
string: 你眼前的是为数不多的边塞堡垒之一 —— 山丘要塞。当年事变时，乌弗瑞克的龙吼摧毁了我们许多祖地。

original: Some of these ruins were entire cities once upon a time. Not that you'd want to live here, of course. Well, not now, anyway.
string: 这些遗迹里，有些曾是繁华的城市，当然，你肯定不想住在这儿，至少现在不想。

original: Did you hear that or am I losing it?
string: 是我听错了还是我精神失常了？

original: Dwarven ruins are always so quiet. No nature spirits, no ghosts, not even the whispers of the daedra...
string: 矮人遗迹总是这么安静，没有自然灵体，没有鬼魂，甚至连魔族的低语都没有……

original:
[pagebreak]<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
The experiments have been going better than expected!

Bodies have been ample thanks to my scheme. 
I've ordered my men to start fishing the waters near the cave, and to then sell their catch at local marketplaces. It brings money for our mission, but it's also allowed us to snag unexpected peasants from the surrounding hamlets. 

There's been a small trade-off after we've dropped our secrecy, but so far, we have made swift work of any sellswords or go-lucky adventurers that came looking around our hideout. It's all for the greater good; more bodies, and more blood!
[pagebreak]
My first experiments failed. Mother Laradyth's magic is not a simple incantation. This is a horrible power that few could master, let alone remain sane while doing so!

But after my initial failings, I started to book small successes. I managed to bring corpses back to life with a vile malevolence that I've never seen before.

Unfortunately, these results were short-lived.
[pagebreak]
Yesterday I finally made a breakthrough, and I think that I have managed to go beyond what even the Mother had deemed possible!

I brought "life" into the first of my revenant! 

It has no physical body, but it is no ghost either. The creature goes beyond description, but if I had to use any word, I'd call it a nightmare. And this is just the first of many!

To get these results, I had to deviate from the Laradyth's teaching. Instead of using a normal corpse, I have begun to use vampire bodies instead. The transformation that happens is horrible! To see the body twist and stretch and contort! Cruel and horrible, yet... satisfying.

I wanted an army, and I have received the means to create one! What force in this scattered land will stand against the horde of malevolence that I am about to create? Who could stop me?
</Font>
string:
[pagebreak]<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
实验的进展比预想的还要顺利！

多亏了我的计划，尸体的供应十分充足。我下令让手下在洞穴附近的水域捕鱼，再把渔获卖到当地市集 —— 这不仅能为我们的计划筹措资金，还让我们趁机抓了不少周边村落里毫无防备的农夫。

虽然不再保密后付出了些许代价，但迄今为止，任何前来藏身地打探的佣兵或走运的冒险者，都被我们迅速解决了。这一切都是为了更伟大的目标：更多的尸体，更多的鲜血！
[pagebreak]
最初的实验失败了。拉拉迪斯母亲的魔法并非简单的咒语，这是一种恐怖的力量，鲜有人能掌握，更别说在运用时保持理智了！

但在经历了最初的失败后，我开始取得一些小小的成功。我成功让尸体复苏，它们身上带着一种我从未见过的邪恶戾气。

可惜，这些成果都转瞬即逝。
[pagebreak]
昨天，我终于取得了突破，我觉得自己甚至做到了连那位母亲都认为不可能的事！

我让第一个亡魂造物拥有了生命！

它没有实体，却也并非鬼魂。这造物难以用言语形容，若非非要找个词，我会称它为梦魇。而这，只是众多造物中的第一个！

为了达成这样的成果，我不得不偏离拉拉迪斯的教导。我没有使用普通尸体，而是改用了吸血鬼的躯体。那转化的过程无比恐怖！看着躯体扭曲、拉伸、变形，既残忍又可怕，却又…… 令人满足。

我想要一支军队，而如今我已掌握了创造它的方法！在这片四分五裂的土地上，有什么力量能抵挡我即将打造的邪恶大军？又有谁能阻止我？
</Font>

original: Don't let the old Skaal's sacrifice be in vain. End Miraak, and come back to me.
string: 别让老斯卡尔人的牺牲白费，解决掉米拉克，然后回到我身边。
威木省契约 | 极高风险

original: The spirits here seem upset. We should tread carefully.
string: 这里的灵体看起来很不安，我们得小心点走。
你的死会极具讽刺意味！

original: While <blocking>, a Sunlight Cloak forms around you. Undead in melee range take <5> points Sun damage per second.
string: 当<blocking>（格挡）时，日光护盾将环绕你身。近战范围内的不死生物每秒受到 <5> 点日光伤害

original: The spirits here mourn the hunt. It's a pity.
string: 这里的灵体在为狩猎哀悼，真可惜。
沉默者居所（从金库支出 2000 金币）
艾斯维尔契约 | 高风险

original: Ah, well... Didn't want to frighten you off.
string: 啊，嗯…… 我只是不想把你吓跑。

original: So you said. Did you just come back to torment me?
string: 你是这么说过。你回来就是为了折磨我吗？

original: An apostle of the Clockwork City has disappeared on Solstheim. I am now in Nchardak Submerged Laboratory looking for him, but I only found his staff. He also left some plaques on the desk, maybe reading them could help me find him.
string: 发条城的一位使徒在索瑟海姆失踪了。我如今身处钠查达克水下实验室，正在寻找他的踪迹，却只找到了他的法杖。他还在桌上留下了几块铭牌，或许读一读这些铭牌能帮我找到他。

original: Good day, my friend. I hope you're keeping well and making good use of that armor.
string: 日安，朋友。希望你一切安好，好好利用那套盔甲。
宴会厅（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: Essentially, I just want to say thank you. Sincerely. We've had the best time. The absolute best. And I hope it doesn't end any time soon.
string: 其实，我就是想谢谢你，真心的。我们在一起的时光太美好了，无与伦比的美好。希望这一切不会很快结束。

original: Summon Dark Oathblade
string: 召唤黑暗誓约之刃

original: Can't say I've ever heard of it. It's not exactly a tourist's paradise, is it? No inn, no shops, nothing.
string: 说实话，我从没听说过这儿。这儿显然不是旅游胜地，对吧？没酒馆，没商店，什么都没有。
啊！再也感觉不到疼痛了。

original: Killing an Emperor? Ha! That'll make the greatest legend since Faolan! To think, a Reachwoman will have a hand in that...
string: 刺杀皇帝？哈！这会成为自弗兰以来最伟大的传奇！想想看，一个边塞女人居然能参与其中……

original: And remember that I, Clocky, will always remain by your side.
string: 记住，我，时钟，会永远陪在你身边。

original: Once my daughter's apprenticeship is over, she'll run a smith better than I ever did.
string: 等我女儿的学徒期结束，她经营锻造铺肯定比我强多了。

original: I hear the Dunmer also worship the Spirits. Or their own interpretation of them. Perhaps we should stop by their temple, pay our respects?
string: 我听说暗精灵也崇拜灵体，只是有他们自己的解读方式，或许我们该去他们的神庙表示敬意？

original: Good choice. The armor of a true warrior.
Tell me, what is on your mind?
Strikes a dark melody, drawing <mag> life
string: 奏响黑暗旋律，汲取<mag>点生命，

original: I'm using them for my own purposes.
string: 我不过是把他们当作自己的棋子罢了。

original: The Vateshran keep the stories of many things. The Nords and the Empire say the Dragonborn are born of divine covenant with Akatosh.
string: 瓦特什兰记录着无数故事。诺德人和帝国都说，龙裔是与阿卡托什立下神圣契约而降生的。

original: A pity you refused the Lady of Shadows. But what's done is done, now we must live in a world without her...
string: 真可惜你拒绝了影之女王。但木已成舟，现在我们只能活在一个没有她庇护的世界里了……

original: Nchardak, you say? It would make sense, as it is also a research laboratory.
string: 你是说钠查达克？这说得通，那里也是个研究实验室。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="20">The crew is settling in nicely to the new ship, this Imperial Galleon was an excellent choice. With all this extra space, we can now carry twice as many men and tripple the loot.

Much has happened since we took this ship. Runold, a nord from Windhelm who we'd taken on as a deckswab went missing during our last raid. With him, he took a valuable map I've had in my quarters. This is no ordinary map however, it's possibly one of the most valuable treasure maps in all the land. Years ago, there was a group of tomb raiders who robbed Jolgeirr Barrow, resting place of the fabled Snow Prince. They removed his armor and spear, but some time later it's said someone had found the relics and returned them to the barrow. The tomb was sealed once more, and fitted with an intricate lock, never to be entered again.

This map holds the location of the key used to enter Jolgeirr Barrow. Whoever holds that map can gain access to the artifacts of the Snow Prince, which hold such power they would be revered as a god!

If I find Runold, I'll flay him alive for stealing from me.


We've spent the last several days scouring the Inner Sea around Vvardenfell for any stragglers left over from our last skirmish, to no avail. I'd hoped we would find another survivor who knew more about what happened to my map. We found one nord, adrift off the coast where we sank their sloop. After dragging him aboard, I had Dranas question him on the location of that traitor Runold, who we believe was in contact with the captain of their vessel.

The man we captured either refuses to talk or knows nothing else about the treasure map we're after.

</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="20">
船员们在新船上安顿得十分妥帖，这艘帝国大帆船的选择实在是绝妙。有了这些额外的空间，我们如今能搭载两倍的人手，劫掠到的赃物也能增至三倍之多。

自打拿下这艘船，变故可不少。鲁诺德，那个我们雇来做甲板清洁工的风舵城诺德人，在最近一次突袭中失踪了。他还卷走了我放在住处的一张珍贵地图。但这绝非普通的地图，它或许是整片大陆上最珍贵的藏宝图之一。多年前，一伙盗墓贼洗劫了约基尔古坟 —— 传说中雪王子的安息之地。他们盗走了雪王子的盔甲与长矛，可据说不久后，有人寻回了这些圣物，并将其归还古墓。古墓就此再度被封，还装上了复杂的锁具，从此再无人能踏入。

这张地图标注着开启约基尔古坟的钥匙所在地。无论谁手握此图，都能进入古墓获取雪王子的圣物，这些圣物蕴含的力量，足以让持有者被尊为神明！
要是让我找到鲁诺德，我定要将他活剥了皮，只因他竟敢偷我的东西。

过去数日，我们一直在瓦登费尔周边的内海搜寻上一场小规模战斗的残兵，却一无所获。我本指望能找到另一个幸存者，好从他口中得知更多关于我那地图的下落。我们在击沉他们单桅帆船的海岸附近，发现了一个漂流的诺德人。把他拖上船后，我让德拉纳斯去审问他，问他那个叛徒鲁诺德的下落 —— 我们认定鲁诺德和他们的船长有勾结。

我们抓到的这个人，要么是拒不招供，要么是真的对我们要找的这张藏宝图一无所知。

</font>

original: Fire, frost and shock damage spells are 5% more effective.

original: I can't wait to see where we will end up next.
string: 我已经迫不及待想知道我们下一站去哪儿了。

original: So... Looks like you're heading off. You... You will come back alive, won't you? I'd hate to wander Skyrim alone, you know.
string: 看来…… 你要出发了。你…… 你一定会活着回来的，对吧？你知道的，我可不想一个人在天际游荡。

string:
