original: Now that the Intake Levers have been adjusted, I need to lock in my progress with the Junction Switch nearby.
string: 进气操纵杆调整完毕后，我需要用附近的连接开关锁定当前的进度。

original: You'll have to make sure I'm sent with plenty of furs. Agreed. I'll be in Windhelm when you don't need me.
string: 你可得确保给我送足够多的毛皮来。就这么定了，你不需要我的时候，我就在风舵城。

original: Well, we Reachfolk don't often marry for love. But times are changing... and I just don't think I can lose you to anyone else.
string: 嗯，我们边塞人不常因爱成婚。但时代在变…… 而且我实在不想失去你，不想让你属于别人。
起来了，别浪费白天的时光！
聆听者居所（从金库支出 5000 金币）

original: Surely the Imperial Legion doesn't arrest people without a good reason.
string: 帝国军团肯定不会无缘无故抓人。

original: Resist 10% of Magic and Regenerate Magicka 15% faster for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，魔法抗性提升 10%，法力值恢复速度加快 15%。

original: Don't worry, I know I am. The Reach and its gods are with us.
string: 别担心，我心里有数。边塞和它的众神与我们同在。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Delphine, Steadfast Sister,

The trials we endured together still echo in my thoughts, reminders of the fire that tested us and left us standing. I now lead those who rose from the purge's ruins, the Blades reborn in Stendarr's name to watch Tamriel's fragile balance from the shadows. Your vigilance in the north honors that old oath we swore amid the chaos.

Thalmor agents prowl closer. A new agent moves through Skyrim, one whose quiet blade might tip the scales against the Dominion's grasp, trust their discretion as you would mine. I reveal no more; our veil demands it. Know that mercy's edge remains sharp, and we stand ready if the call comes.

Hold true, old friend. Your resolve keeps the light from fading.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

致忠贞的姐妹戴尔菲娜：

你我一同经受的试炼，至今仍在我脑海中回响，那团淬炼了你我、最终让我们屹立不倒的火焰，始终未曾消散。如今我引领着从清洗惨案的废墟中崛起的众人，刀锋战士以斯坦达尔之名重获新生，于暗影之中守护着泰姆瑞尔脆弱的平衡。你在北方的坚守，无愧于我们曾在乱世中许下的古老誓言。

梭默的密探已然步步逼近。一名新的特工正行走于天际大地，其暗藏的利刃，或将打破督统对这片土地的掌控。你当像信任我一般，相信此人的审慎。我不便多言，这是我们隐于暗处的准则。你要知晓，慈悲之刃依旧锋利，若使命召唤，我们随时整装待发。
坚守本心吧，老友。你的决心，让光明不至湮灭。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨卫 敬上
</font>

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Garnering
But on the back of those orders was the mandate to continue staying separate. To never meet or group.
string: 但命令的背面还写着，要我们继续保持分散，不许碰面，不许集结。
受到损伤。防御协议已启动。

original: Actually, who says I can't teach you a thing or two? If you ever want to train with me, let me know. I'd be happy to show you some of my moves.
string: 其实，谁说我不能教你几招？你要是想和我一起练习，尽管说，我很乐意教你一些我的技巧。

original: The Forsworn are just a savage band of murderers.
string: 弃誓者不过是一群野蛮的杀人犯。

original: What do you think of Ivarstead?
As for admirers - well, if a knight has no admirer, that means they hadn't really been doing their job by saving damsels and protecting towns, no?
string: 至于仰慕者嘛 —— 要是一个骑士连仰慕者都没有，那就说明他根本没做好拯救少女、保护小镇的本职工作，不是吗？

original: I know the Empire abandoned Solstheim, but an undead Imperial general attacking civilians? There are unseen forces at play.
string: 我知道帝国抛弃了索瑟海姆，但一个不死的帝国将军袭击平民？这背后肯定有看不见的势力在作祟。

original: This doesn't sound like it's our best idea yet... But let's stay optimistic, we've got this! That dragon is as good as dead!
string: 这主意听着可不怎么妙…… 不过还是保持乐观吧，我们能行的！那只龙死定了！

original: Sure. What do you want to know?
Maybe by becoming this hero I've dreamt to be, I can make my fantasy a reality.
string: 或许成为我梦想中的英雄，就能让幻想变成现实。
科洛维亚毛皮头盔（绿色）

original: Releases energy blast with power attacks that deals 30 damage.
string: 重击时释放能量冲击波，造成 30 点伤害。

original: Finally. Try not to get yourself killed... Not that I care.
string: 终于要走了。别把自己弄死了…… 我才不在乎呢。

original:
Excavation 01: Journey to Nchardak

I have decided to travel to Nchardak. While it has been described as a vast archive in the past, it also served as a research center for the Dwemer. I hope to find something interesting there. Some ways to improve my factotums, and maybe a way to transfer a factotum's conscience to a different body.
string:
发掘记录 01：前往钠查达克之旅

我已决意动身前往钠查达克。此地在过往记载中虽被称作宏大的文献库，却也曾是锻莫一族的研究中心。我期盼能在那里有所发现 —— 寻得改良构装体的方法，或许还能找到将构装体的意识转移至其他躯体的途径。

original: It seems I'm going to kill the Emperor for the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 看来我要为黑暗兄弟会去杀皇帝了。

original: He should be sowing his fate among the fields of war! Reaping the harvest of his heritage! For Sovengaard! Rise!
string: 他该在战场的疆土上谱写自己的命运！收获属于自己血脉的荣耀！为了松加德！冲啊！

original: You must hail from a distant land, wanderer. I'm a man whose name bears little questioning.
string: 流浪者，你一定来自遥远的地方。我这个人，名字向来不容置疑。

original: And I thought Orcs were formidable opponents!
string: 我还以为兽人是多厉害的对手呢！

original:
[pagebreak]

Ranger's Life by Ranger Armelian Y 635

[pagebreak]

y the god's power, you have entered a realm of power. Whether by accident, fate or choice, you now reside with the Rangers. By our founder Azala the Azure, we maintain the honor passed down to us. Over the years many have come and go, passed away in peace and violence, doint good or committed to unspeakable acts. Your fate and path in this world is defined by you, but fear not for She watches over us all. While there are no formal rules that bind us, signed in blood or some ancient rituals.. The Azure laid forth mere guidelines when she vanished for the first time but for the most part let us do as we pleased. As time passed she brought equipment and ideas into the Ranger's midst to help us grow, expand and learn. With a voracious appetite we explored, studied and watched. Consuming knowledge was her first and only request passed to us, to never again be ignorant to the ways of the people around us. We grow, we change, and we adapt. We are made of many races, creeds and religions. The primal-god worshipping Urkurz, saved from a tribal war at a young age. The daughter of a disavowed soldier, Misha, telling tales of how her long-passed family protected kings, threw down dragons and stormed castles. The ever fastidious Richard, who speaks not of where he comes from or what horrors he has already glimpsed.. There are many of us now. There will some day be less. By your power and strength, you will carry forth our messages and our ideas long after we are gone if you tread the path laid before you. 1 Maintain your equipment. Many rangers have fallen in battle, or to surprise ambushes. Ensure that your gear is in working order, and upgraded when you can. Never fear replacing your gear as needed. A Ranger makes due with what they have, not with what they need. 2 Use the Ranger's facilities. Over the years we have ensured we are ready for a variety of people. While we never stray too far from our origins, never be afraid to change your gear to suit your mission. 3 Pray to the Azure. Blessed by her powers, the skull of an ancient enemy has now become a source of our power. 4 Call upon Lily for help. Long ago the Azure left us a spell to use in times of need. No one has yet to try it, for the power could be far more than any of us have wielded, and many a ranger has lost their life to mishandling danger. 5 Search for the Azure's Relics. Long ago she left a message saying that when we needed her, we'd find relics of her power throughout the world. Who can say what she left behind?
string:
[pagebreak]

游侠的一生 作者 巡林者阿梅利恩 635 年

[pagebreak]

借诸神之力，你已踏入力量之境。 无论出于偶然、宿命还是抉择，你如今已归于巡林者之列。承蒙创始人苍蓝阿扎拉的遗志，我们谨守这份代代相传的荣耀。多年来，无数人来了又去，或安然离世，或殒命于纷争；或行善事，或犯下难以言说的恶行。你在这世间的命运与前路，皆由你自己定夺，但无需畏惧，因她始终守护着我们所有人。 我们并无以血立誓或经古老仪式定下的成文规矩…… 苍蓝初次消失时，只留下了几条简单的指引，其余大多任我们自行决断。时光流转，她为巡林者带来了装备与理念，助我们成长、扩张与求知。我们怀着求知的渴望去探索、研究、观察。她留给我们的第一个，也是唯一一个要求，便是汲取知识 —— 永不再对周遭族群的生存方式一无所知。 我们成长、蜕变、适应。我们之中汇聚了不同的种族、信仰与教派：有自幼从部落战争中获救、信奉原始神祇的乌尔库兹；有被家族除名的士兵之女米莎，她讲述着已逝的家人如何护卫国王、屠龙破城的故事；还有向来一丝不苟的理查德，从不提及自己的来历，也不愿诉说曾目睹的恐怖过往…… 如今我们人数众多，终有一日也会凋零。若你踏上眼前的道路，凭借你的力量与实力，即便我们消逝，你也将把我们的信念与理念传承下去。 1 保养你的装备。许多巡林者殒命于战场或突发的伏击，皆因装备失修。务必保证你的装备性能完好，并尽可能升级。无需顾虑按需更换装备 —— 巡林者当活用手中所有，而非执着于所需之物。 2 善用巡林者的设施。多年来，我们已为各类族人备好所需。虽永远莫忘本源，但也无需畏惧为适配任务更换装备。 3 向苍蓝祈祷。受她的神力庇佑，一头远古仇敌的颅骨现已成为我们的力量之源。 4 向莉莉求援。很久以前，苍蓝留给我们一道危难时可用的咒语。至今无人敢尝试，因其力量可能远超我们任何人的掌控，已有不少巡林者因贸然应对危险而丧命。 5 寻找苍蓝的圣物。很久以前，她留下口信：当我们需要她时，便会在世间寻得她的力量圣物。谁又能知晓她留下了何物？

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="20">
Sister, my arrival must be delayed another week or two, the nearby barbarians are growing bold. Fear not, the Mother still intends to grow our influence in Falkreath. I eagerly look forward to our reunion, and meeting this young girl you mentioned.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="20">
姐姐，我的行程恐怕还得再推迟一两周，附近的蛮族愈发猖獗了。不必担心，圣母仍打算扩大我们在佛克瑞斯的势力。我热切期盼着与你重逢，也期待见见你提及的那个年轻女孩。
</font>

original: Aw, not fair Listener. I was just getting excited.
string: 哎呀，这不公平，聆听者。我刚兴奋起来呢。

original: Hunt and kill the beast near Falkreath
string: 猎杀佛克瑞斯附近的野兽

original: I'm not sure my presence here is going to be very well received. They do despise the Nords after all.
string: 我觉得我在这儿不会受欢迎的，毕竟他们很鄙视诺德人。

original: Careful with these Black Books. The Woodland Man tempts us with a secret or two, then we become addicted to them... Until the books suck us dry.
string: 小心这些黑暗魔典，那个森林人会用一两个秘密引诱我们，然后我们就会对魔典上瘾…… 直到被它们榨干为止。

original: That's one cruel looking mace you have there. I hope it's worth whatever price you paid.
string: 你这钉锤看着可真够狠的，希望它值你花的那些钱。

original: That sounds highly peculiar. Growing up, I've only ever know the Legion as the keepers of peace and law.
string: 这听起来太奇怪了。从小到大，我只知道军团是和平与法律的守护者。

original: Summons a Steel Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把钢铁誓约之刃，持续 8 小时
我要把它带给内拉卡尔。

original: For most of my years, I belonged to the Wayrest Sanctuary, in the Stormhaven region.
string: 这些年来，我一直隶属于暴风港地区的韦雷斯圣所。

original: My parents will be proud of me.

A bounty was placed on <Alias=Wizard>'s apprentice, who fled with a ring of dangerous power. An innkeeper confirmed that a suspicious Breton wizard had rented a room here. I should investigate the room for any clues to his whereabouts.
string: 有人悬赏捉拿 <Alias=Wizard> 的学徒，此人盗取一枚蕴含凶险力量的戒指后潜逃。一位酒馆老板证实，有个形迹可疑的布莱顿巫师曾在这里租了房间。我得去查查这间房，看看能不能找到他下落的线索。

original: What a wonderful place you've taken me to. I've always wanted to spend some time with savages wielding pointy sticks.
string: 你带我来的地方可真 “好”，我一直想和拿着尖木棍的野蛮人待在一起呢。

original: We'll kill you for good this time!
string: 这次我们要把你彻底干掉！

original: It's around the docks somewhere. You just have to, uh, find it.
string: 就在码头附近某个地方。你只要，呃，找到它就行。

original: Thank you. I'd appreciate it. I don't mean to make things difficult between us.
string: 谢谢，我很感激。我不是想让我们之间变得尴尬。

original: I should've guessed that, really... Are you okay? What did they want with you?
string: 我其实早该猜到的…… 你没事吧？他们抓你想干嘛？

original: Aunt Gormli's forgery has been sealed by a credible authority. I've agreed to act as courier and deliver it to her nephew.
string: 戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书已经盖上了权威的印章。我答应担任信使，把文书送给她的侄子。

original: You're about to look a lot less superior!
string: 你很快就神气不起来了！

original: Namira has many faces. Only the lowest of Reach Cults would worship her as the Lady of Decay and nothing more.
string: 娜米拉有许多面孔，只有边塞最低等的教派才只把她当作腐朽之主来崇拜。

original: If only he put the same emphasis on experiencing different cultures and the exploration of our homeland.
string: 要是他也同样重视让我体验不同的文化、探索祖国就好了。

original: I feel the same. I love you.
Fine, I'll pack my things and go. Please don't come looking for me.
string: 好吧，我收拾东西走了，别来找我。

original: To this day, I have never encountered magical ability from another like theirs.
string: 直到今天，我都没见过其他人拥有像他们那样的魔法造诣。

original: Who knows. This could be the end.
string: 谁知道呢，这可能就是结局了。

original: Have seen a Dunmer whose name is Renos?
string: 你见过一个名叫雷诺斯的丹莫吗？

original: Summons a Stalhrim Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把魔冰誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: A letter from Sybille suggests she is hiding in Anise's Cabin. I should return there to finish the job.
string: 希比利的一封信件显示，她正藏匿在安尼斯的小屋中。我应当返回那里，了结此事。

original: That old dragon radiates calm. It makes me wonder - are the dragons' souls capable of love beyond their brutality?
string: 那头老龙身上散发着平静的气息。这让我不禁想：除了残暴，龙的灵魂是否也能拥有爱？
愿苍白之龙指引你的手。

original: We'll travel together, like your father and mine used to.
string: 我们会一起旅行，就像你父亲和我父亲过去那样。

original: As much as it pains we... I'll keep our names off the epic about the Emperor's death. Don't want to give them more reasons to hunt us.
string: 虽然我心里很难受…… 但我不会把我们的名字写进关于皇帝之死的史诗里。不想给他们更多追杀我们的理由。

original: I... I wanted to ask you something. I'm just going to be direct because I don't know how else to ask you.
string: 我…… 我想问你件事。我就直说了，因为我不知道该怎么开口。

original: It's suffocating. I have been kept under watch my whole life. Never allowed to stray further than the small woods surrounding the estate.
string: 那种日子太压抑了。我这辈子都被人监视着，连家族领地周边的小树林都不准走远。

original: I would've suggested destroying the Dark Brotherhood... But it seems you've missed your chance back there, when you were alone with their leader.
string: 我本想建议你摧毁黑暗兄弟会…… 但你在和他们的领袖独处时，似乎已经错过了机会。

original: Conjure Vampire Revenant
string: 召唤吸血鬼亡灵

original: Do we really have time for this!?
string: 我们真有时间在这耗着吗？！

original: I'm glad you're happy. But I've changed my mind... (End romance)
string: 很高兴你能开心，但我改变主意了……（结束浪漫关系）

original: I've yet to find any of the students.
string: 我还没找到任何一个学生。

original: I'll bring everything we have on them, but it's not much.
string: 我会告诉你所有我们知道关于它们的事情，但是信息不多。

original: A study from the Clockwork City has proven that giving a name to a factotum greatly improves teamwork and appreciation.
string: 发条城的一项研究证明，给构装体取名能极大地提升团队合作和彼此的认同感。

original: Ultimately, I wasn't very good at it and so I lost interest. I like to think my resilience has grown since I was a child.
string: 最后我实在学不会，就没兴趣了。我觉得自己比小时候坚韧多了。

original: So you didn't earn it yourself?
string: 这么说这戒指不是你自己挣来的？

original: I will admit, this is an impressive automaton!
string: 我得承认，这台自动人偶真不赖！

original: I'm glad to hear you say that. Skulking around in the sewers had become somewhat tedious, wouldn't you agree?
string: 听你这么说我很高兴。在下水道里鬼鬼祟祟的日子已经有点乏味了，你不觉得吗？

original: The leader of the Deephowl Hollow vampire clan has discovered a sinister new form of necromancy. I've encountered one of his revenant creations and managed to destroy it. If this clan manages to create an army of revenants, they could become a serious threat to the people of Skyrim. I must find their leader and put a stop to their work!
string: 深嚎山谷吸血鬼氏族的首领发现了一种邪恶的新型亡灵魔法。我遭遇了他创造的一具亡魂，并成功将其摧毁。倘若这个氏族造出一支亡魂大军，他们将成为天际民众的巨大威胁。我必须找到他们的首领，终结他们的恶行！

original: Being a conduit means I can use lightning magic. I wonder if the College of Winterhold would teach me ice magic.
string: 作为传导型魔偶，我能使用闪电魔法。我好奇冬堡学院会不会教我冰魔法。

original: There have been few instances where one's soul was transferred into a mechanical body.
string: 把灵魂转移到机械身体里的案例并不多。

original: But the Speaker who ordered the purge was mistaken, the traitor was not part of the sanctuary. They were actually part of the Black Hand.
string: 但下令清洗的发言人判断失误了，叛徒根本不在圣所里，而是藏在黑手内部。

original: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
string: 我想我们搬去别的地方住。

original: In all seriousness, let's bring this sad individual to justice. No woman should have to suffer this fate. I'll watch your back.
string: 说真的，我们把这个可悲的家伙绳之以法吧。没有女人该遭受这样的命运，我会掩护你。

original:
Contract Kill a Sweetroll Thief Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] Fimmion's sweetroll was stolen. Fimmion wants it back. Fimmion performed the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Sweetroll Thief. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名甜卷小偷 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 菲米恩的甜卷被偷了。菲米恩想要把它找回来。于是菲米恩举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除甜卷小偷. [pagebreak]

original: I've been sent by a friend to ask a favor.
string: 我受朋友所托，来求你帮个忙。

original: I want you to move to another sanctuary.
string: 我要你转移到另一座圣所去。

original: I have obtained the cipher. I should take it to a deap drop.
string: 我拿到了密码本，现在该把它送到情报交接点去。

original:
All this time, away from the Clockwork City, with no gold and almost no resources. It was too much. Too much for my body, too much for my health. I became sick and weak, unable to continue exploring new ruins, unable to return to what was once my home. I needed a new body, one that could withstand the wild, the cold and the hunger. I will be my last test subject.
This is the culmination of my research on reincarnation. This is where I become a new me. This is where I become a factotum.
string:
这些日子以来，我远离发条城，身无分文，资源也几近枯竭。这般境遇，实在让人难以承受。我的身体扛不住，健康更是被拖垮。我变得虚弱不堪，既无法继续探索新的遗迹，也回不去那片曾经的故土。我需要一副新的躯体，一副能抵御荒野、严寒与饥饿的躯体。而我，将成为自己最后一个实验对象。
这是我转生研究的巅峰时刻。在此刻，我将蜕变为全新的自我；在此刻，我将化身为构装体。

original: Why do the Nords hate mages? These fine gentlemen are the answer.
string: 诺德人为什么讨厌法师？这些优秀的先生们就是答案。

original: I need to speak with you. I can't hold this in any longer.
string: 我必须跟你谈谈，我再也憋不住了。

original: I know that's a bold pitch. Allow me the opportunity to address any concerns.
string: 我知道这个请求有些唐突。请给我个机会，解答你所有的顾虑。

original: Hearing stories of Ysgramor as a child was one thing; holding his weapon, even a fragment, is another.
string: 小时候听伊思格拉莫的故事是一回事，握着他的武器，哪怕只是碎片，又是另一回事。

original: You can just... Ask. I'm happy for you to take whatever you like.
string: 你直接说就行，你想拿什么都可以。

original: It saddens me sometimes to think she died so that I could live.
string: 有时候想到她是为了生我而死，我就很难过。

original: Now here we are. Rebuilding the Dark Brotherhood under your leadership, as promised.
string: 现在我们就在这里，如约在你的领导下重建黑暗兄弟会。

original: Laylana the pack horse at your service.
string: 搬运工莱拉娜为你效劳。

original: If you come for us, you had better not miss.
string: 要是敢来惹我们，最好别失手。

original: Sometimes, I feel like we're carrying the weight of the world on our shoulders.
string: 有时候，我感觉我们肩上扛着整个世界的重量。

original: Explore further into the newly uncovered Nordic Crypt.
string: 进一步探索新发现的诺德墓穴

original: I miss those carefree, simple days. The laughter, the innocence... But I know we will never go back to those days.
string: 我怀念那些无忧无虑的简单日子。那些欢笑，那些纯真…… 但我知道，我们再也回不去了。

original: A chant of lost souls strikes fear into those who hear it, causing them to flee in terror. Absorb health from trembling victims.
string: 失落灵魂的祷唱会让听到的人陷入恐惧，使其惊慌逃窜。并从瑟瑟发抖的受害者身上吸取生命值。

original: And remember that I, Sotha Tum, will always remain by your side.
string: 记住，我，索萨・图姆，会永远陪在你身边。

original: Oh, or that time a Thalmor Justiciar came by and demanded our hospitality, and we fed him the filthiest meat with all the unsavory ingredients.
string: 哦，还有一次，一个梭默审判官来要吃的，我们给他吃了最难吃的肉，加了各种怪东西。

original: My father is the patriarch of our family. A ruthless and cunning business man. If it weren't for him, I expect we would have nothing left.
string: 我父亲是家族的族长，是个冷酷又精明的商人。要是没有他，我想我们家族恐怕早就一无所有了。

original: This isn't what I had in mind when I said I wanted to see Tamriel.
string: 这可不是我说要游历泰姆瑞尔时想象的场景。

original: One by one they were shuttered as we fell into decline and our numbers dwindled, but they can be rebuilt.
string: 随着我们日渐衰落、人数锐减，这些圣所也一个个被关闭，但它们都可以重建。

original: It seems like you are a big and important part of the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 看来你在黑暗兄弟会里是个重要人物。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>Due to budget cuts and the recent trade and tariff war with neaby countries, we can not currently afford to restock the Armory after Melecray's Siege of 156.

Please do your dilligence in maintaining the equipment for the next recruits.

General Jyk
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont' size='18'>受预算削减，以及近期与邻国爆发的贸易关税战影响，我们目前无力为军械库补充物资 —— 自 156 年梅莱克雷围城战以来，军械库便一直处于亏空状态。

请务必用心维护现有装备，以备新招募的士兵使用。

杰克将军
</font>

original: What seal is this? Who sent you?
string: 这是谁的印章？谁派你来的？

original: Sailing. Selling. I don't spend my days doing just one thing.
string: 航海、做买卖。我可不会一天到晚只做一件事。

original: If I ask nicely... do you think Sapphire will teach me how to pick a lock?
string: 要是我好好求她…… 你觉得蓝宝石会教我开锁吗？

original: Even Riften's thieves would make better neighbors than Markarth's slavers. That's quite telling.
string: 就算是裂谷城的盗贼，也比马卡斯城的奴隶贩子强多了，这就很能说明问题。

original: Off to find some god's staff, huh? Seems like godly artifacts are littered everywhere these days.
string: 要去找某个神的法杖？这年头神级神器好像遍地都是。

original: This journey has been very instructive. I cannot wait to go over all the new information I have acquired when we take a break.
string: 这段旅程让我学到了很多。等我们休息时，我迫不及待想梳理一下学到的新信息。

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Spell Knight (Very High-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位咒术骑士（极高风险）
黑沼泽契约 | 极高风险

original: Karthwasten has stood for years, passed back and forth between Nords and Reachfolk with each story. I'm glad I get to see it in my kin's hands.
string: 西卡斯镇已经矗立了多年，在诺德人和边塞人之间几经易手，每个阶段都有不同的故事。很高兴能看到它掌握在族人手中。

original: At one point, we all become orphans. Just a matter of when. We have to move on, either way.
string: 终有一天，我们都会变成孤儿。只是时间早晚的问题。不管怎样，我们都得继续走下去。

original: I'll get back to work then.
They moved that thing here? Ugh! And I wondered why the spirits had turned silent. That was a bad idea. They should've left that where they found it.
string: 他们把那东西搬到这儿来了？呃！我就说为什么灵体都沉默了，这真是个馊主意，他们就该把它留在原地。

original: The world... It looks so much bigger than I could even fathom.
string: 这个世界…… 比我想象的要大得多。

original: You're a fool to think they are the enemies, and an even worse idiot to believe the Stormcloaks can take on the Thalmor alone.
string: 你觉得他们是敌人，真是太傻了；还认为风暴斗篷能独自对抗梭默，那就更蠢了。

original: How should I know why you've never heard of me? Perhaps that's a fault of your own making. Have you ever thought of that?
string: 我怎么知道你为什么从没听过我的名字？或许是你自己的问题。你就没想过吗？

original: You do not belong to the realm of the living.
A Dark Brotherhood assassin has invited me.
string: 黑暗兄弟会的刺客邀请我了。

original: The Dwarvern City. Markarth. It has a long and dangerous history. But putting that aside, I marvel at these structures.
string: 矮人之城，马卡斯。它有着漫长又凶险的历史，但抛开这些，我真的为这些建筑惊叹。

original: Hammerfell Contract: Kill an Alik'r Warrior (Medium-Risk)
string: 落锤契约：杀死一位阿利克尔战士（中等风险）

original: Hmm, not quite skilled enough, are you!?
string: 嗯，本事还差点火候，是吧？！

original:
Contract Kill a Khajiit Caravan Master Province: Elsweyr Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] This dishonest Khajiit caravan master has swindled hundreds of buyers from Elsweyr to Skyrim, but the Black Sacrament has been performed and their luck has finally run out. Meet with the client and eliminate the Khajiit Caravan Master. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名虎人商队主 省份： 艾斯维尔 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 这名不诚信的虎人商队队长，从艾斯维尔到天际省一路诈骗了数百名买家。如今黑暗祭礼已然举行，他的好运也终于走到了尽头。 与委托人接头，铲除虎人商队主. [pagebreak]
植物园（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: What do you think of this location?
I almost feel sorry for you! Almost!
string: 我都快同情你了！也就快了！

original:
By default, the reward for a completed mission scales from 300 septims for a pickpocketing mission to 5000 septims for completing a faction questline. These numbers can be scaled by the following values.

Multiplier: Multiplies all septims received as a reward. (%.0f%%)

Level: The percentage increase in all rewards for each player level. (%.0f%%)
string:
默认情况下，任务完成后的奖励数额随任务类型浮动：扒窃任务的奖励为 300 赛普汀，阵营任务线的完成奖励则为 5000 
赛普汀。你可通过以下数值对这些奖励数额进行调整。

奖励倍率：所有赛普汀奖励的乘数系数。(%.0f%%)

等级增幅：玩家每提升一级，所有奖励的增长百分比。(%.0f%%)
生命恢复速度降低<mag>%，效果持续<dur>秒

original: No errors detected. Factotum connected to the main system.
string: 未检测到错误。构装体已连接至主系统。

original: Gain access to the hidden sanctuary
Well, why don't you try to comment on my wonderful and personable personality instead?
string: 怎么不夸夸我美好又亲切的性格呢？

original: And folks call Reach magic strange. This man turned himself into a ball of light! That creeps me out more than any Hag ever did.
string: 人们还说边塞的魔法诡异，这个人居然把自己变成了光球！这比任何女巫都让我毛骨悚然。

original: I'm not criticising, but it was quite obvious they'd betray us. Sorry, maybe I should have said something earlier.
string: 我不是在指责你，但他们会背叛我们其实很明显。抱歉，或许我早该说的。

original: Use your swords! Set yourself as an adjudicator, please.
string: 用剑！请把自己设定为审判者。

original: Good. Yes, I'm okay. Thank you for asking. Between dodging stray arrows and blades to the chest, I'd say we're doing quite well.
string: 好。嗯，我没事，谢谢你关心。一边躲乱飞的箭，一边防着胸口挨刀，我觉得我们做得还不错。

original: Sybille is dead. Her silent reign over Solitude is over.
string: 希比利已死，她在独孤城的隐秘统治就此终结。

original: I just... I sometimes worry about what this adventure is doing to us.
string: 我只是…… 有时候会担心这段冒险对我们的改变。

original: You're more beasts than men, Forsworn.
string: 你们弃誓者与其说是人，不如说是野兽。

original: Let's loot this place while we're here. The East Empire Company can suck up all that loss - they deserve it as much as the Silver-Bloods.
string: 既然来了，就把这地方洗劫一空吧。东帝国公司有的是钱，损失得起 —— 他们跟银血家族一样，都活该遭这报应。

original: You there, hold fast. I'd like a word with you.
string: 你，站住。我想和你说句话。
我都有点过意不去了！也就一点点！

original: You're back. Well now, I'm glad to see you alive and well. Barely a scratch on you! That dragon met his match.
string: 你回来了。太好了，看到你安然无恙真开心。几乎一点伤都没有！那龙算是遇上对手了。
威木省契约 | 低风险

original: But are these flaws worth the trade for chaos and bloodshed?
string: 但这些缺点，值得用混乱和流血来换取吗？

original: Resist <mag>% of Magic damage for <5> minutes.
string: <5> 分钟内，抵抗<mag>% 的魔法伤害

original: This is my first chance at freedom and I'd like to experience it at it's fullest.
string: 这是我第一次拥有自由，我想尽情体验这份自由。

original: You may be right, or you may not be. There are conflicting reports regarding his challenge of the High King.
string: 你可能是对的，也可能是错的。关于他挑战至高王，有很多相互矛盾的说法。

original: Triggered by nearby enemies, the rune explodes for <mag> points of fire damage.
string: 敌人靠近时触发，符文将会爆发，并造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: But what is your reasoning? Why do you travel across this Province? It can't be solely for fun.
string: 但你呢？你为什么游历这个省份？总不会只是为了好玩吧。

original: We, the Lone Legion, sequestered as we'd been. We moved down from those mountains and entered the war as unseen as the New Moon's shadow.
string: 我们这支 “孤独军团”，一直被隔离着。我们从山里下来，像新月的影子一样悄然投入战争。

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Vampire (High-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位吸血鬼（高风险）

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">Hroth,

Captain wants us to find the rest of that brew you fished up. Swears it's the best damned mead he's ever tasted.

Says he plans to drop anchor near the spot you found it on our way back to Windhelm.

Figured you ought to know before he starts barking orders.</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">致赫罗思：

船长让我们去找你之前捞上来的那种酒的剩余部分，还发誓说这是他喝过的最绝的蜜酒。

他说在回风舵城的路上，打算在你发现这酒的地方附近抛锚。

想着在他开始发号施令前，应该先跟你说一声。</font>

original: I have adopted the husky named Ulf. He will make for great company.
string: 我领养了这只名叫乌尔夫的哈士奇。它会成为我的好伙伴。

original: Harkon is a cruel father, and an even more sadistic villain. Now that we have Auriel's Bow, it is time we destroy him once and for all.
string: 哈孔是个残忍的父亲，更是个暴虐的恶棍。现在我们拿到了奥瑞埃尔之弓，是时候彻底消灭他了。

original: The first one is the Listener's Will. This will allow you to summon an entire sanctuary family to your side at any time.
string: 第一件是聆听者的意志。有了它，你随时都能召唤整个圣所的弟兄姐妹来到你身边。

original: Can a Vateshran talk to the Spirits?
string: 瓦特什兰能和圣灵对话吗？

original: You're about to be killed by a Nord!
string: 你就要被一个诺德人杀了！

original: Indeed. I believe you'll find this... exceptional.
string: 很好。我相信你会觉得这件…… 非同凡响。

original: Opponents in melee range take <15> points frost damage and Stamina damage per second.
string: 近战范围内的敌人每秒受到 <15> 点寒霜伤害与耐力伤害
拷问室（从金库支出 2000 金币）
法术书: 召唤武装哈士奇

original: Good, I've been wanting to know a bit more about you too.
string: 太好了，我也一直想多了解了解你。

original: Have I mentioned that I hate being on the sea?
string: 我是不是提过我讨厌坐船？

original: <Standing> Power Attacks that strike an enemy cause a <Shock> explosion.
string: <站立>状态下的重击击中敌人时，会引发<闪电>爆炸。

original: The plot thickens. The elf seems afraid of Azura... Isn't she supposed to be that benevolent, posh spirit of the elves? Let's tread carefully.
string: 剧情越来越复杂了，那个精灵好像怕阿祖拉…… 她不是精灵们口中仁慈高贵的灵体吗？我们得小心点。

original: I cannot rejoice in the destruction of our kin, but I am grateful for the Empire's victory here. I hope they will make good use of it.
string: 我无法为同族的覆灭而欢欣，但我为帝国在此的胜利而感激。希望他们能好好利用这次胜利。

original: Can you tell me about the "Great Spirits" of the Reach?
string: 你能跟我说说边塞的 “伟大之灵” 吗？

original: It would be my pleasure, friend.
Windhelm holds my people's history and past glory. If only it had been ruled by a lord who upholds my people's honor though.
string: 风舵城承载着我族人的历史与往昔的荣光。要是这里的领主能捍卫我族人的荣誉就好了。
火焰冲击

original: I only pray something can stay your hands and brighten your mind. But if your friends can't turn you away from that path... I'm not sure what will.
string: 我只祈祷有什么能阻止你，让你清醒过来。但如果连你的朋友都无法让你回头…… 我不知道还有什么能做到。

original: You're all disgusting! Come on, we can take them.
string: 你们真恶心！来吧，我们能搞定他们。

original: I think he would've liked knowing you.
string: 我想他会很乐意认识你的。

original: I knew you'd be missing me by now.
string: 我就知道你现在肯定想我了。

original: So the war went for me.
string: 我的战争经历，就是这样。

original: A sting that does <mag> points of shock damage to Health and half that to Magicka.
string: 一记蛰刺，对生命值造成<mag>点闪电伤害，对法力值造成其一半的伤害

original: I have some questions for you.

string: 天际契约：杀死一位风暴斗篷士兵（中等风险）

original: So, this expedition didn't go too well, then. I hope you and I are a little luckier.
string: 看来这次探险不太顺利啊，希望你我能幸运点。

original: What's there to say? A soldier is the same no matter the station.
string: 还有什么好说的？士兵终究是士兵，无论军衔高低都一样。

original: Vittoria Vici once mistook my father for a servant at a soiree and had him thrown out. We still hold a grudge.
string: 维多利亚・维西曾在一场宴会上把我父亲当成仆人，还把他赶了出去。我们至今都记着这笔仇。

original: I'm glad you're here with me.
string: 我很高兴你和我在一起。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade uncovered a vampire threat: Morvath in Morthal's shadows feeds on the innocent and wants control of the town. If you go to Morthal, find his lair, and end him quietly.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑已查明一处吸血鬼威胁：墨索尔的暗影之中，莫瓦斯正残害无辜民众，还妄图掌控这座城镇。若你前往墨索尔，需找到他的巢穴，并不动声色地将其解决。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Guess you robbed that big lizard of his supper, huh? I mean the world, if that wasn't clear enough.
string: 看来你从那只大蜥蜴嘴里抢走了它的晚餐，对吧？我是说整个世界，要是还不够清楚的话。

original: Well, Yamarz is still a coward to me... But maybe that's a start to his heroic redemption. Hopefully a short one at that.
string: 好吧，在我眼里亚玛兹还是个懦夫…… 但或许这是他英雄式救赎的开始，希望这过程能短点。

original: I have encountered a factotum inside a laboratory on Solstheim. It worked for an apostle that mysteriously disappeared while on a trip to Nchardak. I should head there and find him.
string: 我在索瑟海姆的一座实验室里遇到了一名构装体。它的主人是位使徒，在前往钠查达克的途中离奇失踪了。我应当前往那里，找到这位使徒。

original: Take what you have learned to a dead drop
string: 将你所知的信息送到秘密投放点

original: Good thing you have me at your side, otherwise you might struggle to keep a grip on reality.
string: 幸好有我在你身边，不然你可能都没法认清现实了。

original: I hope you've got something for me. I mean, something nice or pretty, not another junk you're going to sell later.
string: 希望你给我准备了点东西。我是说，好看的或者精致的，不是你待会儿要卖掉的破烂。

original: Your skin is looking a little pale!
Ah yes, I forget you like to live like royalty. I'll make it my new place of residence.
string: 啊，是，我都忘了你喜欢过帝王般的生活。我要把这儿当成我的新住处。

original: I have found some of the students and they were dead.
string: 我找到了一些学生，他们都死了。

original: <Shock> spells are <20>% stronger. While charging or channeling a <Shock> spell, a <Shock Cloak> forms around you, damaging enemies in melee and blocking hostile <Shock> spells.
string: 闪电法术的效果增强 20%。引导或蓄力闪电法术时，你的周身会形成闪电斗篷，对近战范围内的敌人造成伤害，并能阻挡敌方的闪电法术。

original: I have delivered the infomation. I should now wait to be contacted again.
string: 我已递交情报，现在只需静待下一步指示。

original: J'Faar is here to serve, Listener.
string: 杰法尔在此听候差遣，聆听者。

original: Conjure Dremora Caitiff
string: 召唤魔人前锋

original: Once the Legate warned against an unknown seer, we broke rank even further. But coordinated now. Moving in sweeps.
string: 军团长警告我们要提防某个神秘的预言者后，我们进一步分散了队伍，但这次是有组织的，轮番展开扫荡。
他在战场上立下了赫赫战功。

original: I don't like this woman's attitude. Let's get that horn back to the Greybeards.
string: 我不喜欢这女人的态度，赶紧把号角带回灰胡子那里吧。

original: This would've been a strategic site for a dhun. Tall stone walls, a terrace to observe the bridge - had the Forsworn the balls for that, that is.
string: 这里本可以成为一座边塞堡垒的战略要地，高大的石墙，能观察桥梁的露台 —— 可惜弃誓者没这个胆量。

original: You have no idea how much I enjoy your company, love.
string: 你不知道我有多喜欢和你在一起，亲爱的。
召唤巨型霜噬蜘蛛奴仆

original: It's simple, we had a deal.
They're awfully hard to hit sometimes!
<Standing> Power Attacks that strike an enemy cause a <Frost> explosion.
string: <站立>状态下的重击击中敌人时，会引发<寒霜>爆炸。

original: I am glad to have you by my side.
Well, you can't hope for much more than that. Especially where dragon slaying is concerned.
string: 嗯，能这样就不错了，尤其是屠龙这种事。

original: Well, this is lovely, isn't it. Not entirely sure I should be in here, but I'll just follow your lead...
string: 嗯，这地方可真不错，是吧。我都不太确定自己该不该进来，不过我跟着你走就好……

original: Does... Does this mean what I think it means?... Are you?... By the Gods.
string: 这…… 这不会是我想的那个意思吧？…… 你是？…… 我的天。

original: It seems my travels with you are bearing fruit. Thank you.
string: 看来和你一起旅行是有收获的，谢谢。

original: Return to where you met Laylana
string: 回到与蕾拉娜相遇的地方

original: A wall that big, yet they can't keep the Forsworn out? Seems a little odd to me.
string: 城墙这么高，却挡不住弃誓者？我觉得有点奇怪。

original: You've already killed the Emperor, restored the old ways, and rebuilt the Dawnstar Sanctuary. Not bad, but why stop there?
string: 你已经手刃了皇帝，恢复了古老的传统，还重建了晨星圣所。做得不错，但为何要止步于此？

original: We've come to Solstheim. Best be extra careful now, this is Miraak's domain... and there's no telling what lurks beneath the ashes.
string: 我们到索瑟海姆了。现在要格外小心，这里是米拉拉克的地盘…… 谁也不知道灰烬之下藏着什么。
攻击性反制措施已关闭。

original: Are you a werewolf? I would love to study your physiology. Maybe we could create an automated werebeast one day?
string: 你是狼人吗？我很想研究你的生理结构。或许有一天我们能造出自动化的兽人？

original: I've inscribed the Lexicon at two of the three Dwemer ruins, all that's left is Nchuand-Zel. I should head there as soon as I am able to inscribe the final set of runes on the Lexicon. Perhaps then I can see what it unlocks.
string: 我已经在三座锻莫废墟中的两处为方典刻好了符文，只剩恩川泽尔了。我应尽快前往那里，为方典刻上最后一组符文。或许到那时，我就能知道它会解锁什么秘密。

original: One-Handed, good for getting up close and personal.
string: 单手武器，适合近距离贴身厮杀。

original: I suppose what I'm saying is... Don't change too much. I like you just the way you are.
string: 我想说的是…… 别改变太多，我就喜欢现在的你。

original: Let's take this in for a moment and then move on to the next.
string: 我们先在这儿欣赏一会儿，再去下一个地方吧。

original: I'm going to ignore you said that because I don't want our last conversation before you save the world to be an argumentative one.
string: 我就当没听见你这话，因为我可不想在你去拯救世界前，最后一次对话还吵吵嚷嚷的。

original: Well, traveler. A true metalsmith, I never was. And of Morrowind, I never speak. Good day to you.
string: 好吧，旅人。我从来都不是个真正的铁匠，至于晨风省的事，我更是绝口不提。告辞了。
爱丽珊妮・杜普雷是谁？

original: It is said that vampires create Vampiric Steel by combining steel with a portion of their own blood. Anybody who wants to craft one of these weapons, and who is not a vampire, would have to obtain a portion of their blood first...
string: 传说吸血鬼会将普通钢材与自身的一部分血液相融合，以此打造出 “血钢”。若想锻造这类武器却并非吸血鬼，首先得获取吸血鬼的血液才行。

original: Don't worry, I have a plan.
Careful not to let them bite you!

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Your dark work came to our attention before we could invite you. We are a secret order that craves no attention, only revenge for the weak and order in Tamriel's struggles. We believe your skills could be turned to better uses, and will pay you well for them.

Anise, the hermit west of Riverwood, was building a dark group that might have challenged your own shadowy world. Your blade stopped that threat early. This lucky turn shows your worth. We think she had information on the rest of her followers. Uncover her secrets and leave them in the barrel behind Whiterun's Bannered Mare. It's enchanted so only you can see it. Succeed, and we'll contact you again.

In Shadows, We Serve.

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

在我们发出邀请之前，你的卑劣行径就已落入我们的视线。我们是一个隐于幕后的教团，不求世人瞩目，只为替弱者复仇，在泰姆瑞尔的纷争之中维系秩序。我们相信，你的本领本可用于更有意义的事，而我们也会为你的付出奉上丰厚的报酬。

河木镇以西的隐士安尼斯，此前正组建一个黑暗团体，其势力甚至可能对你所处的暗影世界构成挑战。而你的利刃早早终结了这一威胁。此番转机足以彰显你的价值。我们推测她手中掌握着其余追随者的相关情报。去查清她的秘密，再将其藏至白漫城战旗母马旅店后方的木桶中。那木桶被施了魔法，唯有你能看见。若能成功，我们会再次与你联络。
我们于暗影中效命。

</font>

original: Skyrim Contract: Kill a Bandit Leader (High-Risk)
string: 天际契约：杀死一位强盗首领（高风险）

original: Recruitment Complete: The Speaker of the Markarth Sanctuary has returned with a new Initiate.
string: 招募完成：马卡斯城圣所的传声者带回了一名新学徒。

original: I will require more time in the lab to figure out what to do with all the scraps I have gathered.
string: 我需要更多时间待在实验室里，研究如何处理这些收集来的碎片。

original: You may have noticed I'm wearing an Amulet of Mara.
string: 你应该注意到我戴着玛拉的护身符了。

original: I have found the cave where Reykja and Sherivah went to search for the Frost tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to them.
string: 我找到了雷娅和谢里瓦前去寻找元素魔法・寒霜卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚她们遭遇了什么。

original: The leader of the Deephowl Hollow vampire clan has discovered a sinister new form of necromancy. I've encountered one of his revenant creations and managed to destroy it. If this clan manages to create an army of revenants, they could become a serious threat to the people of Skyrim. With the two keys, I can now open the passage into the deepest part of Deephowl Hollow, where I must confront the clan leader.
string: 深嚎山谷吸血鬼氏族的首领发现了一种邪恶的新型亡灵魔法。我遭遇了他创造的一具亡魂，并成功将其摧毁。倘若这个氏族造出一支亡魂大军，他们将成为天际民众的巨大威胁。有了这两把钥匙，我如今能打开通往深嚎山谷最深处的通道，去直面氏族首领了。

original: He doubted the Night Mother even existed, so he needed a little... encouragement.
string: 他甚至怀疑夜母是否真的存在，所以他需要一点…… 小小的鼓励。

original: Well, thank the Spirits that's done with. Let's find some dead Nord to stick that sword with, see if it's worth the potions for my ears...
string: 好吧，谢天谢地终于结束了。找个死诺德人试试这把剑，看看值不值得我为了治耳朵疼喝那些药水……

original: (Orc) They're overdue. I'm going to go look for the whelps.
string: （兽人）他们迟到太久了，我要去找找这些小家伙。

original: Deliver the documents to a dead-drop
string: 将文件送到秘密投放点

original: And now we're hunting a werewolf... Splendid. I didn't want to see my 22nd winter anyway.
string: 现在我们又要去猎狼人了…… 太棒了，反正我也不想过我的 22 岁命名日了。

original: J'Faar is honored to serve, my Listener.
string: 杰法尔很荣幸能为你效劳，我的聆听者。

original: Target is slowed, and takes <mag> points of shock damage, and half as much Magicka damage.
string: 目标速度减缓，同时受到<mag>点闪电伤害，以及一半数值的法力伤害

original: I had an inkling. The whispers - I didn't recognize the voice, but he's always had an eye on this city.
string: 我早有预感。那些低语 —— 我听不出是谁的声音，但他一直盯着这座城市。

original: Wait a moment, you chose to become this? We all make mistakes, I suppose!
string: 等一下，你是自愿变成这样的？我想，谁都有犯错的时候！

original: The beast is in the forest somewhere. Do us all a favor and get rid of it.
string: 那野兽就在森林里的某个地方。帮大家个忙，把它除掉。

original: There's nothing quite like a dragon fight - the rush you feel is something else, don't you think?
string: 没什么比屠龙更刺激的了 —— 那种热血沸腾的感觉，你不觉得很特别吗？

original: Finding a particular Elf in Winterhold will be easy, I'm sure. There's only a college full of them.
string: 我肯定在冬堡找某个精灵很容易，毕竟那儿有一整个学院的精灵呢。

original: Okay, let's take in all the sights that Winterhold has to offer. And... Done. That was fast.
string: 好吧，让我们好好欣赏冬堡的所有景色。搞定，真快。

original: Ignoring them would probably be for the best. If not for your safety, then for your soul's integrity.
string: 无视他们或许是最好的选择。就算不是为了你的安全，也是为了你灵魂的完整。

original: Do you have a moment? I had something I wanted to say to you.
string: 你有空吗？我有话想跟你说。

original: Fires a Frost Spectral Arrow dealing <35> points of Frost Dmg. Slows target. Chance to stagger foes.
string: 射出一支寒霜灵箭，造成 35 点寒霜伤害，减缓目标速度，并有几率让敌人踉跄。

original: This is it for Ancano. We need to push on!
string: 安卡诺的末日到了，我们得继续推进！
秘闻 - 谢里瓦的日记 3

original: If not for his fellow soldiers risking the Thalmor's wrath... I don't know if I'd ever have a chance to see him again.
string: 要不是他的战友们冒着得罪梭默的风险…… 我都不知道还能不能再见到他。

original: Don't get me wrong, I love that you want my opinion. But I'm not sure I can really give one. There's not a great deal here, I'm afraid.
string: 别误会，我很开心你想听我的看法。但恐怕我真的没什么可说的，这儿实在没什么特别的。
召唤熊人

original: Only one as noble as befits the thing itself.
string: 只有像你这样高贵的人才配得上这东西。

original: Ive discovered an Oblivion Portal inside this Nordic Crypt! Maybe theres a way to close it for good before Hell breaks loose.
string: 我在这座诺德墓穴里发现了一个湮灭之门！或许我能找到办法将它永久关闭，以免地狱的魔物倾巢而出。

original: Now I'm not going to inquire into who you are or from whence you hail. I'm simply going to let you walk away.
string: 我也懒得追问你是谁，从哪来。你只管赶紧走就是。

original: I have to admit, that was quite funny. I hope it doesn't have any long term impacts on the captain though. That would be unfortunate. For him.
string: 我得承认，这事儿还挺搞笑的。不过希望这对船长没什么长期影响，不然就太不幸了 —— 对他来说。

original: "False Dragonborn"? Either they're delusional, or we are. Where's Solstheim? Maybe we should pay this Miraak a visit.
string: “伪龙裔”？要么是他们疯了，要么就是我们疯了。索瑟海姆在哪？或许我们该去会会这个米拉克。

original: Now it makes wonder if I was created in a place like... this!
string: 现在我开始好奇，我是不是在这样的地方被制造出来的！

original: Sure, there will always be vampires and Forsworn alike, striking from the shadows like those assassins...
string: 当然，世上总会有吸血鬼和弃誓者之流，像那些刺客一样在暗处作祟……

original: I'm Millicent, your friend from back home. We sort of grew up together.
string: 我是米莉森特，你家乡的朋友。我们可以说是一起长大的。

original: Always good to stock up on some supplies. May I recommend a potion to cure any diseases you might come across?
string: 补充点物资总是好的，我建议你带瓶治疗疾病的药水，以防万一。

original: Ah, alright. I'll seek refuge at Old Hroldan - the innkeeper there is a friend of mine. Swing by if you ever want to hear a story or two, eh?
string: 啊，好吧，我会去老赫洛丹找庇护，那里的酒馆老板是我的朋友。要是想听故事，就过来坐坐，好吗？

original: Unarmed attacks do <mag> more damage per strike.
string: 徒手攻击每一击额外造成<mag>点伤害

original: Ahh, thank you Listener. It pleases J'Faar that we see eye to eye.
string: 啊，谢谢你，聆听者。杰法尔很高兴我们能看法一致。

original: I'd rather you didn't do that!
Check back on the Notice Board, there may be a reward flier for your efforts.
string: 回到布告栏查看，可能有对你功劳的奖励传单

original: I shall now continue as Facto the Factotum.
string: 从现在起，我就是魔偶型构装体了。

original: You're all monsters in men's hides.
string: 你们不过是披着人皮的怪物。

original: What a whirlwind this has been. You're a Nightingale, Mercer is dead, and now we need to return the Skeleton Key by ourselves. With no help.
string: 这一切可真是跌宕起伏。你成了夜莺，墨瑟死了，现在我们还得自己去归还骷髅钥匙，没人帮忙。

original: So, off to reforge a weapon that's brought untold chaos and strife upon Tamriel since time immemorial? Can we bring it to Windhelm when we're done?
string: 所以，我们要去重铸一把自古以来给泰姆瑞尔带来无尽混乱与纷争的武器？事成之后我们能把它带到风舵城去吗？

original: Make sure you loot what you can. Give them a taste of what they put others through.
string: 尽量搜刮，让他们也尝尝自己带给别人的滋味。

original: Aunt Gormli has forged a summons to trick her nephew into enlistment. I've agreed to find someone to seal this forgery, thus lending it credibility.
string: 戈姆莉姑妈伪造了一份征兵令，想骗她的侄子去参军。我答应帮她找个人给这份伪造文书盖章，让它看起来更可信。

original: Nice doing business with you, friend.
Glad you're out of that elf-nest in one piece. Reeking Thalmor...
string: 真庆幸你完好无损地从那精灵窝里出来了，臭烘烘的梭默……

original: A chilling chorus echoes and weakens the spellcraft of all within its reach.
string: 一阵刺骨的合唱回荡开来，削弱范围内所有目标的法术能力。

original: The Bloodmoon sings our victory! A hunt for the legends, and a gift from Hircine to remember it by. Let's find someplace to celebrate, hunt-champion!
string: 血月为我们的胜利歌唱！一场足以载入传奇的狩猎，还有海尔辛赐予的信物作为纪念。狩猎冠军，我们找个地方庆祝一下吧！
今天你就要饿肚子了，吸血鬼。

original: The treasury does not have enough gold.
string: 金库已无足够的金币可用。

original: The spirits' songs are mighty in this storm! Can you hear them too?
string: 这场风暴里，灵体的歌声好响亮！你也听到了吗？

original:
[pagebreak]

Azala Astramentum The History of Azala the Azure

[pagebreak]

Historian Note: These are the stories passed down to me by my Grandmother, Eldest of the current Rangers in this the year of 649. [pagebreak] appiness is a fleeting thing. Azala learned it young, and she learned it many times. Many stories have been lost and forgotten to time, but none have been so cruel as to forget her and the sacrifices she made for her people. No one is quite sure the exact details of her birthplace, or her exact origins. Some claim she was a Bosmer intrinsically linked with nature and life and came to Skyrim as part of a pilgrimage to venerate ancient and elder powers. Others maintain she was an outcast from a noble family of Altmer, exiled for some grave sin or familial mistake, wandering the lands. Maybe the truth was hidden among the tales.. Maybe it was something else all together. However she arrived, so she did, around the year 490. It was not an arrival of pomp and circumstance, announced by fanfare. It was quiet, unknown and unassuming. [pagebreak] By the time anyone knew the name of Azala, its likely she had already been in the territory of Skyrim for some time. Helping a village here, preventing a robbery there, murdering someone who ruled with pain. However long she was here, she had begun to carve out a niche for herself as a savior of people. Those seeking to find her for ill reason or not, didnt have to look too far to end up with an arrow announcing her arrival. As her fame grew, the details and reports that were compiled never made sense. Multiple events could be attributed to her while many times more were left unclaimed, so to speak. Far too many times Azala seemed to strike in one city, and be in another the very next day. Traveling distances no one could manage, even the sturdiest warhorse would drop dead under such pressure. The tales bolstered by these seemingly magical acts only grew taller. There was a string of assassinations of high ranking soldiers that had long been rumored of atrocities against the populace. Aides would check their liege, discovering a corpse riddled with arrows, or with their blood draining through a series of cuts. Others were less certain, and possibly not her. There was rumors of a large man, seen with a particularly small Yak, often in conjunction with reports of Azala's interference. Arrows of varying sizes were often found embedded in corpses, merely attributed to different distances or weapons acquired and the needs of the task she was simply attempting to overcome. Turning weapons on their previous owners, she frequently used arbalests on battlements or sabotaged war machines mid siege. [pagebreak] The fact of the matter is somehow easier and more simple than people might have considered. What people assumed was the work of one, was just the work of two. Azala and her human husband, Malar, working together, were the reason for discrepancies in reports, and the ability to be in two places at once. Since a shadowy figure working as a vigilante would be hard pressed to get accurate reports even in the best of situations, information is rather scant on Malar. The tale of these two is shrouded in mystery and trickery, leaving many to wonder who Malar really was. Unfortunately it wouldn't matter much.. My grandmother had the rare honor of meeting Azala once, she said. She stared off into space, smiling at the memory before saying the woman was simply beyond words. For someone to capture the heart of someone as radiant as Azala, Malar himself must have been truly something. No one alive knew of her husband, and save for their followers, no one else ever would. [pagebreak] By the year 500, the two had made quite a name for themselves. As local politicians and corrupted officials started hiring warlords to hunt down the duo, Azala and Malar were simultaneously bolstering their ability to carry out vigilante justice. Having built a small village in the forest in the shade of a mountain, they were hidden from watchful eyes. Attempting to train and inspire others, this was the start of the Rangers. Or so they hoped. While things continued in realtive secrecy for a few years, a recruit was captured, by a local warlord. Relatively untrained, young, and surrounded by enemies, he was swiftly captured, tortured for information and put to death. While it is no fault of his for there was no fault but bad luck, this single defining moment would spell the end. Moving swiftly, and in full force they attacked the village. Bringing the full force of all their military might, they fielded what they could. Officials brought their retinues of soldiers and mages. Squadron after squadron against what was essentially a ramshackle village of no more than a few dozen. The defenders fought bravely, and made each step a painful advance filled with arrows and blades. However brave, it was not meant to be. In the heat of the battle, one of the warlords sorcerors summoned a draconic creature, powerful, angry, and hungry. [pagebreak] It was here doom was spelled for all. As Malar happened to be the closest, the creature started with him. Swiftly it began to rend his flesh, tearing and gouging his form apart. It's said at the sight of her love being killed, Azalas screams made the earth tremble. Exuding fury and rage beyond measure, she descended on the creature in a fit of madness and sorrow. Seizing the Greatsword in a single hand, swinging it with power and fury as if it were a a mere twig. While not a prodigious sorceror or trained mage, she was an elf above all else. Gifted in magic and privy to power through bloodlines that humans are often shunned from, with knowledge passed down through long standing families. Or maybe in the heat of the moment the loss and grief strained to be contained, surging forth with her magick, giving her tremendous power. Either way, her anger was great, and it was terrible. Smiting left and right with the Greatsword, the sounds of blows rending flesh, flames leaping forth, wind scything by, Azala mourned. Attacking the creature, it proved to be a worth adversary against the blade. Seizing all her magick, she released it in a way few thought possible, or would be willing to even attempt. In such an overwhelming force of magic, her anger and hate bound with the sword, empowering it. [pagebreak] In her anger, Azala seized the mountain in her sight and mind, and pulled it down. Fueled by hatred, loss and pride, she collapsed the mountain upon everyone and everything. Crushing darkness, a roar and surge of dirt and stone. Friend, foe, demon. All were buried, save those closest to her. Those she could touch, she saved. Stone hands covered the survivors, protecting them from the worst of the mountains weight. By the time the world stopped crumbling apart, the mountain had been reduced in size by easily half. Spilling out into the water, trees, stones and corpses mixed together. In the ensuing aftermath, Azala herself personally found the draconic creature, and personally embedded two arrows from her late husbands bow into its head before plunging his blade through its skull, silencing the screeching draconic demon forever. My grandmothers father, my great grandfather was there. Saved by Azala himself, he rarely if ever spoke of the things he saw to his family while he lived. For whether they were great, terrible, or something else entirely, only the story of her wrath remains. Everyone who has come after has given their life to the Rangers for the pursuit of something greater. [pagebreak] I sit here in what remains of the battlefield by present day standards. Long has the time been since the mountain was pulled down. Azala reshaped the area, carving it out as a place for the Rangers to hide, since any enemies who knew of it perished in the battle, or swiftly after by her hand. Ironic as her hands provide death for her foes, and life for us. Weaving mystical spells over the area, she no longer took any chances about being discovered. Blessing her remaining followers with a spell to help them in times of need, she set off in pursuit of her enemies. Many years have faded since then, leaving all else but us scoured away by time. Many Rangers have come and gone, of various nations and origins. Some leading glorious past lives, dedicated to the Empire, others having to live scrounging for life in the gutters before finding the Rangers. Even now there are few of us left, dwindling with time, age and death. [pagebreak] We welcome your return Azala. - Ranger Raina
string:
[pagebreak]

阿扎拉星辰 阿扎拉之星的历史

[pagebreak]

史学家手记：这些是祖母讲给我的故事，她是当前巡林者中的长者，故事流传的这一年为 649 年。 [pagebreak] 幸福如指间沙，转瞬即逝。 阿扎拉年少时便懂了这个道理，而后又一次次亲历其中。诸多故事已随时间流逝被尘封遗忘，却没有任何一段遗忘，比抹去她与她为族人所做的牺牲更为残酷。 没人能确切知晓她的出生地，亦或是她真正的身世。有人称她是与自然和生命血脉相连的波兹莫（木精灵），为朝拜古老的高阶神力而来天际朝圣；也有人坚称她是傲特莫（高精灵）贵族家族的弃儿，因重罪或家族过错被流放，从此浪迹天涯。或许真相就藏在这些传说里…… 又或许，事实全然是另一番模样。但无论如何，约 490 年时，她终究踏上了天际的土地。她的到来没有盛大的排场，没有嘹亮的号角宣告，只是悄然无声，不为人知，也毫不起眼。 [pagebreak] 当人们开始听闻阿扎拉这个名字时，她恐怕已在天际的疆域里停留了许久。她在这个村庄伸出援手，在那个地方阻止抢劫，手刃以暴虐统治他人的恶徒。无论在此地待了多久，她已然为自己挣下了 “人民救星” 的名号。那些怀着恶意（或其他目的）想要找她的人，往往没走多远，就会被一支利箭宣告她的到来。随着她的声名渐起，坊间汇总的关于她的细节与传闻却始终自相矛盾。可以说，多起事件都被归到她名下，而更多的事迹却无人认领。阿扎拉屡屡被传在一座城市现身行动，次日却出现在另一座城市，这样的距离，即便是最健壮的战马也会不堪重负倒地而亡。这些看似带有魔法色彩的举动，让关于她的传说愈发神乎其神。 曾有一连串高阶士兵遇刺，这些人早有传言对平民犯下滔天暴行。侍从前去查看领主时，要么发现其尸体被箭矢射成了筛子，要么见其血液从数道伤口中不断流失。还有些案件则疑点重重，恐怕并非她所为。有传闻称，有人看到一个高大的男人身边跟着一头格外矮小的牦牛，而这一幕往往与阿扎拉出手干预的事件相伴出现。尸体上总能找到不同尺寸的箭矢，人们只当是射击距离不同、所用武器各异，或是她为完成任务按需选择罢了。她常将武器反戈相向，在城垛上使用弩炮，或是在围城战中破坏战争器械。 [pagebreak] 而事实，反倒比人们想象的更简单纯粹。众人以为是一人所为的事，实则是两个人的合力。阿扎拉与她的人类丈夫马拉尔并肩作战，这才造成了传闻中的种种矛盾，以及 “同时出现在两地” 的假象。即便在最好的情况下，一个以义警身份行动的神秘人物也难以留下准确的记载，因此关于马拉尔的资料更是寥寥无几。这两人的故事被神秘与诡计笼罩，让无数人好奇马拉尔的真实身份。 只可惜，这一切都不再重要了…… 祖母曾有幸与阿扎拉见过一面，她如是说道。祖母会怔怔地望向远方，回忆起那段往事时嘴角带着笑意，而后说，那个女人的美好，实在难以用言语形容。能俘获如阿扎拉这般光彩夺目的女子的芳心，马拉尔本人定然也非寻常之辈。如今活着的人里，没人知晓她丈夫的底细，除了他们的追随者，旁人永远也不会知道。 [pagebreak] 到 500 年时，这对夫妻已声名远扬。当地政客与腐败官员开始雇佣军阀追捕二人，而阿扎拉和马拉尔也在同时壮大自身力量，以践行义警的正义。他们在山林间的一座山脚下建起了一座小村庄，就此避开了外界的监视。他们试图训练并激励他人，这便是巡林者的开端 —— 至少他们是如此期望的。尽管最初的几年里，一切都在相对隐秘的状态下进行，可一名新招募的成员还是被当地军阀抓获了。这个年轻人未经多少训练，又被敌人团团围住，很快便遭逮捕、严刑逼供，最终被处死。这并非他的过错，纯粹是厄运降临，可这一决定性的瞬间，却注定了悲剧的结局。 军阀迅速集结全部兵力，对村庄发起了猛攻。他们倾巢而出，动用了所有的军事力量，官员们也带来了麾下的士兵与法师。一支又一支军队，朝着这座不过几十人的简陋村庄压来。守卫们英勇奋战，让敌人的每一步推进都伴随着箭雨与刀锋，变得无比艰难。但纵然英勇，败局也已注定。激战正酣时，一名军阀麾下的巫师召唤出了一头巨龙形态的魔物，它强大、狂怒且嗜血。 [pagebreak] 毁灭就此降临在所有人头上。马拉尔恰是离它最近的人，魔物便率先向他发难，迅速撕扯他的血肉，将他的身躯撕咬得支离破碎。据说，看到挚爱惨死的瞬间，阿扎拉的尖叫震得大地都为之颤抖。她心中翻涌着难以估量的暴怒与悲愤，陷入疯狂与哀伤的她朝着魔物猛冲过去。她单手抓起巨剑，挥舞的力道与狂怒仿佛那只是一根小树枝。 尽管她并非天赋异禀的巫师或受过专业训练的法师，但她终究是精灵。精灵天生便拥有魔法天赋，还能通过人类往往无法触及的血脉获得力量，这些力量的知识由古老家族代代相传。亦或是，在那一瞬间，失去挚爱的悲痛再也无法抑制，魔法之力随之一涌而出，赋予了她惊天动地的力量。 无论缘由如何，她的怒火炽烈又可怖。她挥舞着巨剑左右劈砍，血肉被撕裂的声响、腾起的烈焰、呼啸的狂风交织在一起，阿扎拉在悲恸中战斗。魔物面对利刃，竟也成了势均力敌的对手。她凝聚起全部魔力，以一种几乎无人敢想、甚至无人敢尝试的方式释放出来。这股磅礴的魔法之力中，她的愤怒与恨意与剑相融，让剑身威力大增。 [pagebreak] 盛怒之下，阿扎拉以意念锁定了眼前的山峰，将其硬生生拔起而后砸下。仇恨、失去与骄傲化作动力，她让整座山峰朝着所有人、所有物轰然坍塌。黑暗压顶，土石崩裂的轰鸣与涌动声震天动地。友军、敌人、魔物，皆被掩埋其中，唯有她身边最亲近的人幸免于难。她触手可及的人，都被她救下。石质的屏障护住了幸存者，抵挡了山峰崩塌的大部分重压。当大地停止震颤时，那座山峰的体积已然缩减了至少一半，碎石坠入水中，树木、岩石与尸体混杂在一起。余波过后，阿扎拉亲自找到了那头巨龙魔物，用亡夫的弓射出两支箭钉入它的头颅，再将他的剑狠狠刺入其头骨，让这头嘶吼的魔龙魔物永远沉寂。 我的曾外祖父，也就是祖母的父亲，当时就在现场。他被阿扎拉亲自救下，生前却极少向家人提及自己所见的一切。无论那些画面是壮丽、可怖，还是其他模样，如今只余下她盛怒的传说。后世的每一位巡林者，都为了追求更崇高的目标而奉献一生。 [pagebreak] 如今，我正坐在这片残存的古战场之上。山峰崩塌的往事早已远去。阿扎拉重塑了这片区域，将其打造成巡林者的藏身之所 —— 因为知晓此地的敌人，要么殒命于那场战役，要么很快便死于她的手中。颇具讽刺的是，她的双手既为敌人带来死亡，也为我们赋予生机。她在这片土地上布下神秘的咒语，再也不愿冒任何被发现的风险。她为残存的追随者赐下能在危难中相助的法术，随后便动身去追杀仇敌。岁月流转，沧海桑田，唯有我们留存至今。巡林者来了又走，他们来自不同的国度，有着各异的身世：有人曾为帝国效命，拥有辉煌的过往；有人曾在贫民窟挣扎求生，而后才找到巡林者。即便到了如今，我们的人数也所剩无几，随着时间、衰老与死亡不断减少。 [pagebreak] 我们期盼着你的归来，阿扎拉。—— 巡林者蕾娜

Contract Kill a Chef Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] This so called "Chef" has been making guests ill at their village inn by serving moldy undercooked meals. The inn's poor reputation is driving away visitors that the other businesses rely on, and they want something done about it. Meet with the client and eliminate the Chef. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名厨师 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 这名所谓的厨师在村里的酒馆里供应发霉且未煮熟的食物，害得顾客纷纷生病。酒馆的糟糕名声正让其他商户赖以生存的客源不断流失，于是他们希望有人来解决这个问题。 与委托人接头，铲除厨师. [pagebreak]

The temple of a banned god? Hardly the subtlest place to hold a secret meeting.

original: Well... I am the last one here.
string: 好吧…… 我是这里最后一个了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade has uncovered a troubling secret about the Companions of Whiterun, those revered warriors who claim to stand as Skyrim's shield. At their core, they carry the curse of lycanthropy, a savage gift from Hircine that turns men into beasts, hungry for blood under the full moon. What started as a pact for strength has bound their leaders to the Daedric Prince of the Hunt, pulling them deeper into a wild frenzy that risks spilling over into the holds they protect. Imagine the chaos if their inner circle loses control: villages torn apart, travelers hunted like prey, and Whiterun itself becoming a den of uncontrolled rage. This isn't just their burden, it's a threat to Tamriel's fragile balance, where one loose pack could ignite panic and draw darker forces to exploit the fear.

I would like you to join their ranks at Jorrvaskr. Earn their trust through trials of combat and loyalty, then delve into the heart of their secret. Uncover how far the curse has spread, who holds the reins, and if there's a path to break Hircine's hold without shattering the guild. Guide them back to true honor if you can, subtlety is your greatest weapon here. Their pride runs deep, and any hint of betrayal could turn their axes against you. Watch for signs in their dreams, their scars, the way they avoid silver. Prove yourself in their mead hall, and the truth will come in time. Your blade, tempered by mercy, can save them from themselves.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃已发现白漫城战友团的一桩惊人秘密 —— 这群号称是天际之盾的受敬仰战士，其核心成员身负狼人诅咒。这是赫尔辛赐予的野蛮馈赠，会让人类化身为野兽，在满月之下渴求鲜血。这份始于力量契约的诅咒，已将他们的领袖与狩猎魔神牢牢绑定，使他们愈发陷入疯狂的野性之中，其失控的风险正蔓延向他们所守护的领地。试想一下，若其核心圈层失去控制，将会引发何等混乱：村庄被屠戮，旅人如猎物般遭追捕，白漫城甚至会沦为狂怒的巢穴。这绝非仅是他们的重负，更是对泰姆瑞尔脆弱平衡的威胁 —— 仅仅是一群失控的狼人，便足以引发恐慌，招来更黑暗的势力趁机牟利。

我希望你成为勇者之家的一员。通过战斗与忠诚的试炼赢取他们的信任，继而深入探寻其秘密核心。查清诅咒的蔓延程度，找出幕后掌控者，并探明是否存在既能打破赫尔辛的掌控、又不致使公会分崩离析的方法。若有可能，便引导他们重拾真正的荣耀，而你的最大武器便是谋略。他们自尊心极强，任何背叛的蛛丝马迹，都可能让他们的战斧转而对准你。留意他们的梦境、伤疤，以及对银器的回避之举。在他们的蜜酒大厅中证明自身价值，真相终将水落石出。你那被慈悲淬炼的利刃，足以将他们从自我毁灭的边缘拉回。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Hunting vampires with those Dawnguard? Not the usual prey of Hircine's faithful... but you could convince me.
string: 和黎明守卫一起猎杀吸血鬼？这可不是海尔辛信徒常猎的目标…… 不过你可以试着说服我。

original: I've feared it would come to this. That in hope of gaining a lover... I'd lose a friend. I hid it for so long, until I've mustered the courage.
string: 我一直担心会走到这一步。为了得到爱人，却失去了朋友。我把这份感情藏了很久，直到终于鼓起勇气。

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

I assisted where I could and in the end came across a Ghost Ship commandered by fearsome undead ghosts of the sea, then uncovered a Long Lost Cavern. Inside, found a Shipwreck inhabited by an Ancient Undead Captain and crew!
string: 我循着海盗的踪迹来到了独孤城海岸。晨星城的人在城镇遭洗劫后，已经和这些匪徒交上了手。我尽我所能提供了协助，最终遇上了一艘由可怕的海洋不死幽灵操控的幽灵船，还发现了一处遗失已久的洞穴。洞穴里有一艘沉船，里面盘踞着一位远古不死船长和他的船员！

Looks like something those alchemist types pay good coin for. Always someone buyin.
string: 收获: 一头公麋鹿 两头母鹿 几只狐狸 从商队顺来的几张皮 鱼 那些高傲法师念叨着要的草药 一箱不明杂物 这次收成倒还不错。准备回老地方把货出手。 昨天索林一瘸一拐地回来了，手里拿着根破木棍，还有些黏糊糊的树汁和球茎类的植物。看着像是炼金师会出高价收的玩意儿。总归有人愿意买这些东西。

荣耀德文尼 - 海盗弯刀

original: This is impressive for certain. Yet, it doesn't feel as... Magical as I would expect. Does that make sense?
string: 这儿确实令人印象深刻，却没有我想象中那么…… 有魔法气息。你能明白这种感觉吗？

original: Of course, I'll try again later.
Filthy reekers. We're on to something messy. Let's finish this.
string: 肮脏的精灵，我们好像发现了什么肮脏的勾当，赶紧了结这事。

original: Cyrodiil Contract: Kill a Grand Champion (Very High-Risk)
string: 赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位总冠军（极高风险）

original: Ugh... Why are there so many of you!?
Allows the wearer to manifest one item of their choosing.
string: 穿戴者可显化一件自己选定的物品。

original: This sounds like it could be difficult. Stealth is not my greatest strength, but I'll try my best. I'll just follow your lead.
string: 这事儿听着就难，潜行可不是我的强项，但我会尽力的，我跟着你走就行。
召唤巨熊

original: An advancing blast of fire that does <mag> points of damage. Targets on fire take extra damage.
string: 一道推进的火焰冲击波，造成<mag>点伤害。着火的目标会受到额外伤害

original: Ha. I had noticed that but I didn't want to say just in case you took offence. There's plenty of time before you die, anyway. So no need to worry.
string: 哈。我早就注意到了，只是怕你生气没说。反正你离死还早着呢，不用担心。

original: I'd say we're doing rather well together, wouldn't you?
string: 我觉得我们搭档得挺不错的，你不觉得吗？

original: I regret having to fight you, soldier.
string: 很遗憾要与你为敌，士兵。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

The ledger at <Alias=Location> has purchase records that could expose our enemies. Sneak in, read it, copy what matters, and deliver to the nearest dead drop. Your reward waits there.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

<Alias=Location>的账簿中记载着采购记录，这些记录足以揭露我们敌人的踪迹。悄悄潜入，翻阅账簿，抄录关键内容后送至最近的秘密交接点。你的报酬已在那里等候。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: The weather seems to be holding up today.
Welcome back into the fold, my Speakers.
string: 欢迎归队，我的演说者们。

original: I'm afraid there's nothing left to improve, Listener. You already have it all.
string: 恐怕已经没什么可修缮的了，聆听者。你已经拥有了一切。

original: I think he would've liked knowing you.
string: 我想他会很乐意认识你的。

original: A weapon maker for the Dawnguard, huh? I hope she comes up with something fun. I can't wait to roast a few vampires - Reachfolk style.
string: 黎明守卫的武器匠？希望她能搞出些好玩的东西。我已经迫不及待要用法边塞的方式烤几个吸血鬼了。

original: Find out where the apostle could be
The spy was killed by vampire's that attacked the Fort, presumably sent by Lirael. I recovered a book from his corpse, but it is encoded. I should deliver it so Sentinel.
string: 那名密探在要塞遭吸血鬼袭击时遇害，这些吸血鬼想必是莉瑞尔派来的。我从他的尸体上找到了一本书，不过书页内容经过了加密。我应当将书交给守望者。

original: The design of this foundry is very unconventional. This is too dangerous!
string: 这座铸造厂的设计太不合常规了。这里太危险了！

original:
Contract Kill a Thalmor Leader Province: Summerset Isles Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 72 Hours

[pagebreak] While the Imperial Legion officially denounces the murder of Titus Mede II there are some, shall we say, less principled generals who view the Dark Brotherhood's return as an opportunity to deal a strategic blow to their most important enemies. Meet with the client and eliminate the Thalmor Leader. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名梭默领袖 省份： 夏暮岛 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:72 小时

[pagebreak] 尽管帝国军团公开谴责对提图斯·迈德二世的谋杀行径，但某些 —— 姑且说原则性没那么强的将军，将黑暗兄弟会的卷土重来视作良机，欲借此对他们最主要的敌人实施一次战略性打击。 与委托人接头，铲除梭默领袖. [pagebreak]

original: Recruitment Complete: The Speaker of the Windhelm Sanctuary has returned with a new Initiate.
string: 招募完成：风舵城圣所的传声者带回了一名新学徒。

original: Negatives, nobody likes werewolves. So, I suppose you just have to balance those and make a decision.
string: 坏处就是，没人喜欢狼人。所以，我想你得权衡一下再做决定。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
Zossa, you must realise that your plan is foolish. The members of our clan owe their lives to our father. Some might share your worries, but who among them is willing to take a stand? 
But.. I agree that we must act! I have seen the madness in his eyes.
May I suggest a more quiet approach? Tonight, we sabotage his rituals. Change some ingredients. Hex some of his equipment. The delicate magic he weaves only works if perfection is achieved. Let's ruin that perfection and see what happens next. If we lock the doors to his Inner Sanctum, I think we'll find that the problem might solve itself. What say you?
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
佐萨，你得清楚你的计划有多荒唐。部族里的人都欠父亲一条命，有些人或许和你一样忧心，但他们之中谁真的敢站出来反抗？
不过…… 我也认同我们必须采取行动！我亲眼见过他眼中的疯狂。
我能否提议一个更隐秘的办法？今晚，我们去破坏他的仪式。换掉一些材料，给他的器具下点咒。他所施展的精妙魔法，唯有在完美无缺的情况下才能生效。我们就去毁掉这份完美，看看接下来会如何。要是再把他内圣所的门锁上，我想问题或许会自行解决。你意下如何？
</font>

original: The Rift's trees are breathtaking, offering your soul serenity. I wish I could say the same for its people.
string: 裂谷的树林美得令人窒息，能让灵魂得到安宁。真希望这里的人也能如此。

original: I... I should probably get out of here...
string: 我…… 我或许该离开这儿……

original: Oh, finally! At least I don't have to tell you ten years' worth of events... Tell me, what do you remember?
string: 哦，终于！至少我不用跟你细说这十年发生的事了…… 告诉我，你还记得些什么？

original: Laylana now considers you to be her romantic partner.
string: 蕾拉娜如今将你视作她的恋人。
任务汇报：希比利·斯丹特

original: This isn't the most pleasant space that the college has to offer. Let's find this Augur and get out of here.
string: 这可不是学院里多舒适的地方，找到那预言者我们就赶紧走。

original: Summons a Snow Bear Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一头雪熊魔宠，持续<dur>秒

original: So, you're with the College of Winterhold. If I knew you wanted to learn more about magic, I would have taught you myself.
string: 这么说，你加入冬堡学院了。要是我知道你想学更多魔法，我自己就教你了。

original: 15% less damage taken from Dwemer Constructs.
string: 受到锻莫构装体的伤害降低 15%

original: Don't get all emotional on me.
Conjure Werewolf Thrall
string: 召唤狼人奴仆

original: Yes, sister. It's better you return to your cottage. I'll be fine here on  my own. Now go. Just leave.
string: 没错，姐姐。你还是回你的小屋去吧。我一个人在这儿挺好的。现在就走，赶紧离开。

original: Back for another favor? It'll take another in return, I can tell you that.
string: 又回来求帮忙了？我可告诉你，想让我帮忙，就得拿别的来换。

original: Give me a day. Such artistry cannot be rushed. Return tomorrow for your custom robe.
string: 给我一天时间。这般工艺可急不得，明天再来取你的定制长袍。

original: Walk on the surface of water for <dur> seconds.
You look like you need a companion. I'd be happy to oblige.
string: 你看起来需要个同伴，我很乐意效劳。

original: Target bleeds for <mag> damage to Health,
string: 目标流血，造成<mag>点生命伤害

original: Thank you. This... this will mean a lot to me.
string: 谢谢你。这份礼物…… 对我意义重大。

original: I expected better of you, friend... The Stormcloaks? Why?
string: 我对你太失望了，朋友…… 风暴斗篷？为什么？

original: How could you do this to me? To make me fall for you when you're married to another.
string: 你怎么能这么对我？让我爱上你，你却另有配偶。

original: So, Whiterun it is then. I'm sure the Jarl will be delighted to hear about his little dragon problem.
string: 那么，我们要去白漫城了。领主听说他的小龙问题，肯定会 “很高兴” 的。

original: Perhaps we can just stomp on it!?
string: 或许我们直接踩扁它就行？！

original: You had me scared there for a second. Don't play that trick on me again, okay?
string: 刚才可把我吓坏了，别再跟我开这种玩笑了，好吗？

original: I believe you'll find this robe as exceptional as the last.
string: 我相信这件长袍会和上一件一样出色。

original: By the Spirits, everything's wrong here! Can't you hear that? Something is tearing a wound into the spirit world below us!
string: 天啊，这里的一切都不对劲！你没听见吗？有什么东西正在撕裂我们脚下的灵界！

original: With the crown's power, bring your dreams to life.
string: 借助王冠的力量，让你的梦想化为现实。

original: Bandits ravage the land, bringing suffering. Let's make them feel the weight of their cruelty.
string: 强盗肆虐大地，带来苦难。让他们尝尝自己残忍行径的滋味吧。

original: If I said I wanted to be... Romantically involved... With you. Is that something you would want?
string: 如果我说，我想和你…… 发展成恋人关系，你愿意吗？

original: Maybe you've heard of it. It was one of the Dark Brotherhood's most storied sanctuaries.
string: 或许你听说过它。那是黑暗兄弟会最负盛名的圣所之一。

original: Just don't go changing on me, okay? I fear I'll miss you far too much.
string: 别为我改变，好吗？我怕我会太想念原来的你。

original: My, what big teeth you have!
You'd hope the undead would be on the brittle side, yet they seem to be the opposite. How does that happen? Are they not decaying?
string: 你肯定以为不死生物都很脆弱，结果恰恰相反，这是怎么回事？他们不会腐烂吗？

original: Vampiric Steel War Axe of Winnowing
The Clockwork City is also populated by Dunmers. However, this town feels... completely different.
string: 发条城也居住着丹莫。但这座小镇给人的感觉…… 完全不同。

original: Dragon god? Bah! Just a lizard that fled at the first sign of defeat.
string: 龙神？呸！不过是只一见败绩就逃跑的蜥蜴罢了。

original: My connection to the Clockwork City has been severed and I cannot ask for help from there.
string: 我与发条城的连接已经中断，无法从那里寻求帮助。

original: Oh, this spirit is a performative reeker. Pale Dragon, spare me this nonsense.
string: 哦，这灵体真是个爱装腔作势的臭家伙。苍白之龙啊，别让我听这些废话了。

original: Who do you take me for?
I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original: My Altmer tutors spoke of them a great deal. Great mystery surrounds the Psijic Order. For them to make contact with you...
string: 我的高精灵导师经常提起他们，赛伊克教团一直充满神秘。他们主动联系你……

original: I can make lighter armors with the best of them.
string: 我打造轻型盔甲的手艺也是一流的。

original: Summons a Chaurus Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只巢蚁魔宠，持续<dur>秒

original: The Reach may not see liberation within our lifetime... But as long as I have you in this life, it's good enough for me.
string: 边塞或许在我们有生之年都无法解放…… 但只要这辈子有你，对我来说就足够了。

original: Triggered by nearby enemies, the rune explodes for <mag> points of fire damage.
string: 敌人靠近时触发，符文将会爆发，并造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: He stood strong even when the Forsworn slaughtered us. The last thing he'd lay down was his dignity... and his love. I miss him so much.
string: 即便弃誓者屠戮我们族人时，他也始终坚强不屈。他到最后都没放下的，是他的尊严…… 还有他的爱。我好想他。

original: But one thing at a time! It's all talk until I have proven myself. To you, to my father, and to Skyrim.
string: 不过一步一步来！在向你、向我父亲、向天际证明自己之前，一切都只是空谈。

original: I don't mind doing it at Mara's Temple like anyone else in Skyrim. But it's customary for the Reachfolk young to exchange gifts when we marry.
string: 我不介意像天际的其他人一样，在玛拉神庙举行婚礼。但边塞的年轻人成婚时，有交换礼物的习俗。

original: What a beautiful view... Solitude looks remarkable, yet from here... It appears to be tiny. Perspective is an interesting thing.
string: 景色真美…… 独孤城本就很壮观，但从这儿看…… 却显得很小。视角这东西真有意思。

original: Those bloodsuckers seemed more like lazeabouts than real hunters. Hircine would be pleased to see us remove those failures from the hunting field.
string: 那些吸血鬼看起来更像懒汉，根本不是真正的猎手。海尔辛看到我们把这些失败者清理出猎场，一定会很高兴的。

original: I've legitamized Aunt Gormli's forgery with a credible seal. I need to return it to her so she can continue with her plan.
string: 我用可靠的印章让戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书变得合法了。现在我得把文书还给她，让她继续推进计划。

original: Our people have lived in the lands we call the Karth since the world was young, as far back as Lorkh's sacrifice.
string: 自世界初生，甚至洛库献祭之时起，我们的族人就生活在这片被称为卡尔特的土地上。

original: A teleport spell to The Veiled Abyss.
string: 传送到幽影深渊的传送法术

original: You expect to make an assassin out of a clumsy Two-Handed brute?
string: 你难不成想把一个笨手笨脚的双手武器莽汉培养成刺客？

original: I hope you're taking in this lovely scenery.
string: 希望你能好好欣赏这美丽的景色。

original: It's awfully loud in here, isn't it? Does it not hurt your ears?
string: 这儿也太吵了，不是吗？你的耳朵不疼吗？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade has pieced together alarming reports from the frozen north: the mages of the College of Winterhold, isolated in their spire of stone and spells, are delving too deep into Saarthal's ancient ruins. What they seek isn't knowledge, it's a forbidden power buried by the ancients for good reason, a force that could warp reality itself if unleashed. Their reckless excavations risk awakening something catastrophic: a cataclysm echoing the Great Collapse that nearly erased Winterhold from the map. This folly doesn't stand alone; unseen manipulators may whisper in their ears, using the College as a key to destabilize Skyrim and tip Tamriel into arcane chaos.

If you join their ranks, climb through lessons of fire and frost, and infiltrate the depths to gauge the true extent of their digging. Steer them back to wisdom before the ruins claim them all. Subtlety is crucial, their egos are as brittle as ice, and mistrust could summon lightning to your back. Your insight might be the light that pulls them from the abyss.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑整合了来自冰封北地的警示情报：冬堡学院的法师们偏安于石塔与法术构筑的壁垒中，却对萨瑟尔城古老遗迹的探索过深。他们追寻的并非知识，而是一种因充分理由被古者封存的禁忌力量 —— 这股力量一旦释放，甚至能扭曲现实本身。其鲁莽的挖掘行为，恐将唤醒灾难性的存在，引发的浩劫或堪比险些让冬堡从地图上消失的大崩塌。而这一蠢行并非孤立事件，或有幕后黑手在暗中蛊惑，欲借学院之手动摇天际，令泰姆瑞尔陷入奥术动乱。
若你加入学院，历经冰火法术的研习晋升，便借机潜入遗迹深处，探明其挖掘的真实规模。务必在遗迹吞噬他们之前，引导这些法师回归理智。行事需极为谨慎，他们的自负如寒冰般脆弱，一旦心生猜忌，你便可能招来致命的魔法反击。你的洞察，或许正是将他们从深渊中拉回的曙光。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: We should see if we can help. I have a soft spot for the elderly.
string: 我们该去帮帮忙，我对老人总是心软。

original: You have heard of the Oblivion Crisis, yes? When portals to Oblivion sprung up across the world and poured out evil?
string: 你听说过湮灭危机吧？就是当年湮灭领域的传送门在世界各地打开，邪恶生物倾巢而出的那场灾难？

original: The console hums back to life as the Dynamo Core locks into place. Gears whir and ancient glyphs flicker across the surface. It's operational once more.
string: 当发电机核心嵌入插槽后，控制台重新发出嗡鸣。齿轮转动，古老的符文在表面闪烁，它再次运转起来了。

original: Ohp. Said that out loud, did I? Well, there's no harm in telling you, I suppose.
string: 哎呀。我是不是说漏嘴了？好吧，跟你说说也无妨。

original: You were always there with me. When I was hurt, when I felt sick, or just when I wanted a sparring partner.
string: 你一直都在我身边。我受伤时，生病时，或者只是想找个对练的伙伴时。

original: The spirits down here are almost feral. Maybe it has something to do with the orb. I'll be careful with any spell I cast down here...
string: 这下面的灵体几乎都变得狂暴了，可能跟那个宝珠有关。我在这儿施法会格外小心……

original: This one hails from Elsweyr, my Listener. From the ancient city of Corinthe, in the wealthy southern Kingdom of Pellitine.
string: 我来自艾斯维尔，我的聆听者。来自富庶的南部佩利汀王国的古老城市科林瑟。

original: The Dark Brotherhood was collapsing before our very eyes, and this one let his temper get the better of him.
string: 当时黑暗兄弟会就在我们眼前分崩离析，我一时控制不住自己的脾气。
晨风契约 | 中等风险

original:
Contract Kill a Farmer Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 12 Hours

[pagebreak] This poor farmer's neighbor has performed the Black Sacrament to have them killed. Meet with the client and eliminate the Farmer. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名农夫 省份： 天际 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:12 小时

[pagebreak] 这位贫苦的农夫，其邻居竟为了取他性命而举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除农夫. [pagebreak]

original: Improves armor rating by <mag> points for <dur> seconds.
Summon a family of Dark Brotherhood assassins to follow you.
string: 召唤一队黑暗兄弟会刺客追随你作战

original: Ash blankets the ground all over - definitely not the home a girl dreams of.
string: 地面上到处都是灰烬 —— 这绝不是一个女孩梦想中的家园。

original: Is that a labyrinth? Is a labyrinth a good way to protect a laboratory? Intriguing.
string: 那是个迷宫吗？用迷宫保护实验室，这方法有意思。真令人好奇。
加韦恩的日记 - 第二部分

original: I, for one, was never anxious about that. No sane Altmer would tell the entire Alinor how he got himself himiliated by two urchins.
string: 反正我从来没担心过。理智的高精灵不会把自己被两个小屁孩羞辱的事告诉整个阿林诺尔的。

original: I sure am glad I prefer wine over mead. After the meadery job, I am swearing off that swill forever.
string: 真庆幸我更喜欢葡萄酒而非蜜酒。干完蜜酒厂这单活，我这辈子都不会再碰那玩意儿了。

original: I'm not impressed by this lot so far.
string: 到目前为止，这群家伙没什么能耐。

original: I hope we come out on top!
The only piece missing was our Listener, until now.
string: 我们唯一缺少的便是聆听者，直到你的出现。

original: I'm not sure what to do yet.
Let us face the world together.
string: 让我们一起面对这个世界。

original: We have a gift for you, my Listener.
string: 我们为你准备了一份礼物，我的聆听者。

original:
Cawling Only The Best!

Think you'f got whut it takes to be the Next magik Mastr in awl Tamriel? Well pruv it! Com to the Cowlaje of Wintrhold on the next ship! Book pasaje with Captain Galund at the Windhelm Dawcks. 

And hurry! dont tell yor Mother! Just run! 

Ofishily

Arch Mayj</font>
string:
招贤纳士，唯选菁英！

你自认有能耐成为全泰姆瑞尔的下一位魔法大师？那就拿出本事来证明！搭乘下一班船前往冬堡学院吧！去风舵城码头找加伦德船长预订船票。

赶紧行动！别告诉你母亲！只管动身前来！

官方发布

首席法师</font>

original: Isn't it odd their Sybil doesn't get a choice in the matter? I decided to become a Vateshran. Then I had to earn it. This seems awfully arbitrary.
string: 她们的女先知连选择的余地都没有，这难道不奇怪吗？我当初决定成为瓦特什兰，是靠自己努力争取来的，这也太随意了。

original: Alright, I'll lend you my seal. Except I don't currently have it.
string: 行，我可以把印章借你。不过我现在手上没有。

original: I found a note on a Thalmor agent claiming that the cipher needed to decode the book I took off Acanthus can be found in Deepwood Redoubt, having been stolen by the Matriarch. I should obtain it as soon as possible.
string: 我在一名梭默密探身上发现了一张纸条，上面称破解我从阿坎瑟斯那里缴获的那本书所需的密码本，被族长偷走后藏在了深木堡垒。我必须尽快将其取回。

original: That's my weakest school, but I'll show you what I can.
string: 这是我最不擅长的学派，但我会尽力教你。

original: I love vermin, don't you? This is such a joy.
string: 我可喜欢害虫了，你呢？这可太有意思了。

original: Records say that the inhabitants of Solitude can be quite superstitious. Hopefully, no one will be scared by my appearance.
string: 记载称独孤城的居民相当迷信。希望没人会被我的样子吓到。

original: I am required to have a protector accompany me. You seem... Worldly enough. Perhaps you need a companion in your travels?
string: 我必须有一位保护者随行。你看起来…… 见多识广。或许你旅途之中也需要一个同伴？

original: I know that he loves me, yet I can't help but to feel that he puts the onus on me for the death of my mother.
string: 我知道他爱我，但我总觉得，他把母亲的死怪在了我头上。

original: Now, I may be a wild-eyed killer, but I am nothing if not loyal to the Dark Brotherhood. I would never reject a Speaker's request.
string: 我或许是个满眼凶光的杀手，但我对黑暗兄弟会的忠诚毋庸置疑。我绝不会拒绝发言人的请求。

original:
Contract Kill a Sword Singer Province: Hammerfell Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] Although the true Ansei have long faded into legend, there are still warriors within the ancient Halls of the Virtue of War who continue follow the old ways in pursuit of Shehai mastery. Some of Hammerfell's nobility, like our client, view these aspiring sword-singers as an imminent danger to themselves and the rest of the continent. They would prefer the ancient ways of the Ansei to remain lost, and are willing to pay handsomely for our help with this endeavor. Meet with the client and eliminate the Sword Singer. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名剑歌者 省份： 落锤 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 尽管真正的安塞武士早已湮没于传说之中，但在古老的战争之德大厅里，仍有战士坚守古法，追寻 “舍海”（剑歌）的至高境界。而像我们雇主这样的部分落锤省贵族，却将这些有志于成为剑歌者的人视作对自身乃至整片大陆的迫切威胁。他们宁愿安塞武士的古老传承永远失传 —— 为此，他们不惜重金。 与委托人接头，铲除剑歌者. [pagebreak]

original: You were lucky to escape Commander Maro's trap. Now the entire Empire will be hunting us both down!
string: 你能从马罗指挥官的陷阱里逃出来真是万幸。现在整个帝国都会追杀我们俩！

original: You should really mind your own business.

string: 在新邑堡垒找到阿坎萨斯

original: The Nords and Dunmer share this land in harmony. I wish it could be that way everywhere.
string: 诺德人和丹莫和谐共处这片土地。真希望各地都能如此。

original: Black Marsh Contract: Kill an An-Xileel Warrior (Medium-Risk)
string: 黑沼泽契约：杀死一位安-兹利尔战士（中等风险）

original: I'm not going to pretend that I have any idea what an Elder Scroll is or what it does. I'll just follow your lead.
string: 我就不装了，我完全不知道古老卷轴是什么，也不知道它有什么用，我跟着你走就行。

original: Cyrodiil Contract: Kill an Elder Councilor (Very High-Risk)
string: 赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位元老议员（极高风险）

original: If you weren't a hero before, you're certainly one now. I have to say, when I met you in Riverwood, I never thought this is where we'd end up.
string: 就算你以前不是英雄，现在也绝对是了。说实话，当初在河木镇遇到你的时候，我万万没想到我们会走到这一步。

original: Wow. So you're the new Harbinger. I guess that's another title to add to your song.
string: 哇，你现在是新的先驱者了，看来你的歌谣里又要添上一个头衔了。

original: You don't need to worry about me.
I believe that's a little thing called "victory".
The Huntmaster leads us this moon! Fight on!
string: 狩猎大师今月引领我们！战斗吧！
召唤莉莉

original: Thank the spirits Brynjolf had his head about him. Had it just been Vex? She would've tried to throw us to the slaughterfish...
string: 幸好布林乔夫还算清醒，要是只有薇珂丝在，她怕是会把我们往食人鱼堆里推……

original: How about we just enjoy your new role for now.
string: 不如我们先好好享受你的新职位吧。

original: So many spirits here, and none of them are fond of this place's inhabitants. Let's do them a favor.
string: 这里有好多灵体，没有一个喜欢这里的住户，我们就帮它们一个忙吧。

original: I was kidnapped. Thanks for not having my back.
string: 我被绑架了，多谢你没撑腰。

original: Is this... "town" made entirely of mushrooms? None of my mother's stories spoke of them! I'll have to go ask the fungi if the spirits were involved.
string: 这座 “小镇” 居然全是用蘑菇建的？我母亲的故事里可从没提过这个！我得去问问这些真菌，灵体有没有参与建造。

original: The spirits here are so peaceful... But make sure to check for more Spriggans, just in case.
string: 这里的灵体好平静…… 不过还是要小心，看看有没有更多树精。

original: Let's focus. We don't want to be taken by surprise.
Talsric is dead and I will not be able to claim the unique armor that he promised.
string: 塔斯里克死了，我再也拿不到他承诺的那套独特盔甲了。
