original: Forst spells are <20>% stronger. While charging or channeling a <Frost> spell, a <Frost Cloak> forms around you, damaging enemies in melee and blocking hostile <Frost> spells.
string: 寒霜法术的效果增强 20%。引导或蓄力寒霜法术时，你的周身会形成寒霜斗篷，对近战范围内的敌人造成伤害，并能阻挡敌方的寒霜法术。

original:
[pagebreak]

Covenant of the Oathblades Volume I: Tiber Septim's Order authored by Iskandar the Chronicler

[pagebreak]

ong ago, in ages past, as darkness gathered on the horizon, one of Tiber's most trusted clairvoyants foresaw a deadly threat approaching. The Emperor, in his wisdom, sent for one-hundred of his most loyal soldiers. Ordered by Tiber to each take a vow, they bravely severed all ties to the mortal realm. Through rites both forbidden and beyond life and death, their souls were bound to blades of great power. Their mortal flesh was forsaken, and their souls were made eternal. The Oathblades were born, Champions of the Empire, and each became bound to the Empire's fate until the end.
string:
[pagebreak]

誓约之刃盟约 第一卷： 泰伯・赛普汀的谕令 作者 史官伊斯坎达尔

[pagebreak]

远古之时，蒙昧之世，当黑暗在天际线集结，泰伯麾下最受信赖的一位预言者预见了致命威胁的临近。 贤明的帝王召集了百名最忠诚的士兵。奉泰伯之命，士兵们各自立誓，勇敢斩断了与凡界的一切联系。 通过种种禁忌且超越生死的仪式，他们的灵魂被束缚于威力强大的刀刃之上。 他们舍弃了凡俗肉身，灵魂化为永恒。誓约之刃就此诞生，成为帝国的勇士，每位都与帝国的命运紧密相连，直至终结。

original: Then I'm glad we managed to find each other at Riverwood.
string: 那我真庆幸我们在河木镇重逢了。
贝里特的火焰元素精魂
我同意，我们杀了辛丁吧。

original: I am no combatant. Please seek confrontation elsewhere.
string: 我并非战斗单位。请去别处寻找冲突。

original: Don't breath a word of this to my sister. Not a word.
string: 跟我姐姐提都别提这事，一个字都不许说。

original: Of course, everyone enjoys using magic for the purposes of violence.
string: 当然了，每个人都喜欢用魔法来施暴。

original: Summons a Armored Frost Troll for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只装甲寒霜巨魔，持续<dur>秒
好吧…… 我已经原谅你了。

original: I've never seen anything like this. I've heard stories of the glory of the Imperial City, but nobody ever said anything about Solitude.
string: 我从没见过这样的地方，听过帝都的辉煌传说，可没人提过独孤城。

original: Alright, I'll give it to the Nords. That bridge does seem nice... Good for them. Yay.
string: 行吧，我承认诺德人这桥建得还不错…… 算他们厉害。真棒啊。

original: Blood harvesting and lost secrets - if I knew this frozen waste had so much fun to offer, I would've come sooner!
string: 采血仪式和失传的秘密 —— 早知道这片冰封荒原有这么多好玩的，我早就来了！

original: I'll never mind an adventure when the prize is a book. You'll let me read it before we give it back to Urag, right?
string: 只要奖励是本书，我永远不会拒绝冒险。你会让我在还给乌拉格之前先读一遍的，对吧？

original: What do you think of Whiterun?
Head back to Falkreath to collect reward.
string: 返回佛克瑞斯领取奖励

original: Trust me, Listener. She will be better protected here under my watch.
string: 相信我，聆听者。在我的看护下，她在这里会得到更好的保护。

original: An indecisive bunch, aren't they. I'm glad they have come to their senses.
string: 真是一群优柔寡断的家伙。还好他们总算想通了。

original: Well, I've just recently learned that it's good to express your feelings and not keep them bottled up.
string: 嗯，我最近才明白，把感受说出来总比憋在心里好。

original:
Min: The minimum number of radiant quests that will be available. (%.0f)

Max: The maximum number of radiant quests that will be available. (%.0f)

Storyline: The number of radiant quests needed to advance each stage of the storyline. The default of 3 means 54 radiant quests are needed to finish the storyline. (%.0f)
string:
最小值：可接取的随机任务最低数量。(%.0f)

最大值：可接取的随机任务最高数量。(%.0f)

剧情进度：推进剧情各阶段所需完成的随机任务数量。默认值 3 意味着完成整个剧情需完成 54 个随机任务。(%.0f)

original: Find the dead-drop in Markarth, on the path to the Temple of Dibella
string: 在马卡斯城前往迪贝拉神庙的路上找到秘密投放点

original: Kait, is this your mother's ring?
string: 凯特，这是你母亲的戒指吗？

original: I'm sorry, that was a mistake. I will never join them.
string: 抱歉，我错了，我绝不会加入他们。

original: Exploring old ruins, clearing bandit forts and saving the weak - like the knights of the old tales.
string: 探索古老的遗迹，清剿强盗堡垒，拯救弱者 —— 就像古老传说里的骑士一样。
是你自己选择了死亡，强盗。

original: He had no intention of stopping his research. He believed that studying the Dwemer could help the apostles create more "intricate" automatons.
string: 他从未打算停止研究。他相信研究锻莫技术能帮助使徒们创造出更 “复杂” 的自动机械。

original: Now, you owe me this - was Hircine with you? Did you rally the spirits to your side? I want to write a verse for every arrow and shout!
string: 现在，你得跟我说说 —— 海尔辛和你在一起吗？你有没有召集灵体站在你这边？我要为每一支箭、每一次龙吼都写一段诗！

original: What a slimeball this Gulum-Ei is. He's lucky the guild isn't fond of murder otherwise he would be at risk.
string: 这个古鲁姆 - 埃可真够卑鄙的，还好公会不喜欢杀人，不然他可就危险了。

original: The Veiled Abyss Teleport
string: 暗影深渊传送

original: When you have the Blood Extractor in your inventory, there's a chance vampires will drop Vampire Blood on death.
string: “获取未变质的吸血鬼血液极为困难，且只有借助特殊装置才能尝试提取。矮人是最早造出此类采血装置的种族，自那以后，许多人都试图仿制他们的设计。”

original: Someday, I'll see this city the way it was when I was born.
string: 总有一天，我会看到这座城回到我出生时的样子。

original: Summons a Horse wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一匹马

original: Mercer would have benefitted from spending a little less time stealing and a little more time decorating.
string: 墨瑟要是少花点时间偷东西，多花点时间装修，这地方也不至于这样。

original: I am Sotha Tum, and I will be the one who takes you down.
string: 我是索萨・图姆，我会成为打倒你的人。

original: Even I have more honor than that.
string: 就算是我，也没这么没骨气。

original:
Contract Kill an Unfaithful Spouser Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 12 Hours

[pagebreak] This client has performed the Black Sacrament with special instructions that their unfaithful spouse is to be strangled with the very Amulet of Mara they originally proposed with. Meet with the client and eliminate the Unfaithful Spouser. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名不忠配偶 省份： 天际 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:12 小时

[pagebreak] 这位雇主举行了黑暗祭礼，还特地要求，必须用当初求婚时赠予的那枚玛拉护符，将不忠的配偶勒毙。 与委托人接头，铲除不忠配偶. [pagebreak]

original:
To Grim and Fargo, We talked about sending you out to catch some unfortunate fisherman or vagabond for the sacrifice - but now I am thinking that the spying mages from the College might not be the disaster we first thought, we can use them for the ritual instead. It would make me feel a whole lot better about the entire thing too.

-- Moroiel
string:
致格里姆与法戈： 我们原本说好了，派你们去抓些倒霉的渔夫或流浪汉来献祭 —— 但现在我觉得，学院那些前来刺探的法师，或许并非我们最初以为的灾星，我们反倒可以用他们来完成仪式。这样一来，我心里也能好受不少。

——莫罗伊尔

original: Lots. But I'll spare you a long babbling and tell you simply.
string: 原因很多。但我就不跟你啰嗦了，简单说吧。

original: There are plenty of spirits around the edge of town. I wonder what really lies out in those marshes...
string: 城镇边缘有很多灵体，我好奇那片沼泽里到底藏着什么……

original: Other than horrifically destroying us, of course.
string: 当然，除了被惨无人道地毁灭之外。

original: For that, we Reachfolk hold his gifts sacred.
string: 正因如此，我们边塞人才将他的馈赠视若珍宝。

original: I found a note on the road not far from Kolskeggr Mine next to some dead Vigilants of Stendarr. What appear to be their orders mentions a hidden sanctuary of Daedra worshippers that are planning to attack Markarth. I should stop them before they begin their assault on the city.
string: 我在科斯凯格矿坑不远处的路上，发现了一张纸条，旁边躺着几个死去的斯坦达尔的警戒者。从看似是他们命令的内容来看，有一群魔族崇拜者藏在一处秘密圣所，正计划袭击马卡斯城。我得在他们发动进攻前阻止他们。

original: There are worse places you can live, but even so, I don't think I'd settle here.
string: 世上还有更糟的住处，但即便如此，我也不会在这儿定居。

original: Do you think if I asked, Urag would help me write up a history of the Reach?
string: 你觉得我要是开口，乌拉格会帮我写一部边塞的历史吗？
拷问室（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: The sealed Dwarven chamber was no mere ruin, but a vault meant to contain something powerful. With the Centurion destroyed and the strange staff now in my possession, the mystery remains: was this just one forgotten relic, or part of something greater? Dwarven constructs may fall, but their purpose often endures. Either way, I shouldnt stick around to find out.
string: 这处被封死的矮人房间并非普通的废墟，而是一个用来封存强大之物的宝库。百夫长已被摧毁，那根奇特的法杖也落入我手，但谜团仍未解开：这只是一件被遗忘的遗物，还是某个更大计划的一部分？矮人的造物或许会陨落，但它们的使命往往会延续下去。不管怎样，我都不该在此久留探寻答案。
使用第二个杠杆执行器

original: It's a school I neglect, but the Altmer taught me well. Let me know you.
string: 这是我忽略的一个学派，但高精灵教了我不少，尽管说。

original: Summons a Skeever Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只恶鼠魔宠，持续<dur>秒
召唤石像鬼

original: I am just... scared that this adventure will change you into someone I don't recognize. Someone who doesn't need me anymore.
string: 我只是…… 害怕这段冒险会把你变成我不认识的人。一个不再需要我的人。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade found a pirate threat: Haldyn at Japhet's Folly raids Skyrim's coasts, endangering innocents and maybe serving hidden masters. The East Empire Company in Windhelm are struggling to end the threat. You could intervene, and stop the raids.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑已发现一股海盗威胁：贾菲特堡垒的哈丁正劫掠天际的海岸，不仅危及无辜民众，其背后或许还效命于神秘的主使。风舵城的东帝国公司正竭力铲除这一威胁却进展不顺。你可出手介入，终止这些劫掠行径。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: I have found a unique looking backpack with a note from its previous owner. It talks about a master enchanter named Drelas. I should try and find this Drelas and learn more about the backpack's properties.
string: 我发现了一个样式独特的背包，里面还有前任主人留下的一张纸条。纸条上提到了一位名叫德雷拉斯的附魔大师。我得设法找到这位德雷拉斯，弄清这背包的特殊属性。

original: A rite of passage of sorts to become a gallant knight like our fathers.
string: 这算是一种成人礼，让我们成为像父辈一样英勇的骑士。

original: Once the city was retaken, some soldiers from the legion made their lives there. Others returned to Skyrim.
string: 帝都收复后，军团里的一些士兵在那里定居，另一些回到了天际。

original: I think we belong here, you know?
string: 我觉得我们属于这儿，你知道吗？

original: My time with you is flying by but I am enjoying it. I hope it continues.
string: 和你在一起的时光过得飞快，我很享受，希望能一直这样。

original: Thank you. I hope so, too.
string: 谢谢你。我也希望我做到了。

original: Withers Goldenspoon's journal Day 2 I have found the remains of one of the previous expeditions. It seems they came to grief trying to climb the glacier wall in the west chasm. Judging by the way some of the bodies were arranged at least one of them survived the fall only to freeze to death instead. The ice has cloven the very rocks of this place, impossibly reaching fingers of frozen dread. Surely some Daedric malevolence is at work here.
string: 威瑟斯・金匙的日记 第二日 我找到了先前某支探险队的遗骸。看来他们是在尝试攀爬西边裂隙的冰川壁时遭遇了不幸。从部分尸体的姿态来看，至少有一人坠落之后并未当场丧命，最终却还是冻毙于此。 这里的冰层竟将岩石都劈开了，那一道道冰棱如冰封恐惧凝成的魔爪，匪夷所思地探向四周。此地定然有某种魔族的恶意在作祟。

original: We have little choice, so I'm going to stay quiet and keep an eye out. I suggest you do the same.
string: 我们没什么选择，所以我会保持沉默，多加留意。我建议你也一样。

original: Thank you. We should continue on.
string: 谢谢。我们该继续赶路了。

original: What a bloody mess you are, vampire.
Good. There is work to be done.
Give the "Amplifier: Light Feet" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：轻盈步伐” 交给构装体

original: A note in Anise's Cabin pointed me to Brittleshin Pass nearby, where someone named Valthar is trying to recruit the inhabitants into a scheme.
string: 安尼斯小屋中的一张纸条指引我前往附近的断胫山隘，一个名叫瓦塔尔的人正在那里拉拢当地居民参与某个阴谋。

original: I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original: This was here the whole time? By the Earthbones, it's... it's beautiful.
string: 这地方一直都在？大地之骨在上，这里…… 太美了。
看来你是个精明的主顾。

original: We've all had an incident or two like that. Well, what matters is you got out alright.
string: 这种事我们都遇到过一两次。不过没关系，你平安出来就好。

original: I'd rather my sister be on her own farm, living her own way, than disrupting how Fafi and I run things here.
string: 我宁愿姐姐回她自己的农场，过她自己的日子，也不想她来搅和我和法菲在这儿的生活。

original: The Ratway? Does that name really appeal to you?
string: 鼠道？这名字听着就让人喜欢不起来吧？

original: Oh, there you are. I was wondering where you got off to.
string: 哦，你在这儿啊，我还纳闷你跑哪儿去了。

original: I'll let them turn me. It sounds fun.
string: 我让他们把我变了吧，听起来挺有意思的。

original: The safest city in the Reach. Wonderful. I'll pack up my things and head there when we're not busy taking the world by storm.
string: 边塞最安全的城市，太棒了。我们不忙着闯荡世界的时候，我就收拾东西去那儿。
天际契约 | 中等风险

original: The missing apostle was not in Nchardak. He has headed for Kagrumez to continue his research on mixing technologies from the Dwemer and the Clockwork City.
string: 失踪的使徒并不在钠查达克。他已前往卡古梅兹，继续研究融合锻莫与发条城的技术。

original: Not because they didn't want to, but because my father would never sanction it. Were it up to him, I'd sit in my tower braiding hair all day long.
string: 倒不是他们不想教，而是我父亲绝不会同意。要是由着他，我恐怕得整天待在塔楼里梳辫子。

original: The walls here tell stories long forgotten.
string: 这里的城墙诉说着被遗忘已久的故事。

original: Thank you, that's nice to hear.
string: 谢谢，你这么说我很开心。

original: The Companions are werewolves in case you missed that. I feel they should have advertised that when you joined.
string: 战友团都是狼人，你该不会没发现吧。我觉得他们招人的时候就该说明这一点。

original: The ruins of Kagrumez were empty enough that I managed to accomodate them to my liking. I have been able to run some tests, and they have been successful. I will do a final test tonight, and everything will change. Proctor Sovor Saryoni would be proud.
string: 卡谷梅兹遗迹空旷得很，我得以按自己的心意改造出了实验空间。此前开展的几项测试均获成功 —— 今晚，我将进行最终试验，一切都将迎来改变。索沃尔・萨尤尼监事定会为我感到骄傲。

original: Have you seen your sister's summons?
string: 你看到你姐姐的传唤信了吗？

original: Well, I think we could have worked out that first bit for ourselves given how Ancano is sniffing around.
string: 嗯，我觉得就算安卡诺在四处打探，我们自己也能弄明白第一件事。

original: We're out late and the weather is poor. What do you say we head off to bed and try again tomorrow?
string: 又晚又遇上这鬼天气，不如我们先去歇着，明天再试？

original: I may be a fighting model, but I am not strong enough to defeat multiple Dwemer automatons at once.
string: 我虽然是战斗型魔偶，但还不足以同时击败多个锻莫自动机械。

original: Summons a Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者所指之处召唤一头幽灵魔狼，持续<dur>秒。

original: Summons an Ancient Nord Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把古诺德誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: Do that again, and we're done. I mean it!
string: 再敢来一次，我们就完了。我是认真的！

original: I think I... quite enjoy the sight of you doing that.
string: 我觉得…… 我还挺喜欢看你做这个的样子。

original: I am Speaker Ald�ric Viscart, loyal servant of the old Listener, Alisanne Dupre, and we are... the Black Hand.
string: 我是发言人奥德里克・维斯卡特，效忠于上一任聆听者爱丽珊妮・杜普雷，而我们是…… 黑手。
召唤诺德英雄誓约之刃

original: I love you, Kait. Will you be my wife?
string: 我爱你，凯特，你愿意嫁给我吗？

original: I'm sorry. Kodlak White-Mane was a good man... His death will be avenged.
string: 节哀，“白鬃”克拉科是个好人…… 他的死一定会被复仇的。

original: A little help with this one!
As promised, a sturdy set of light armor made from that evil beast's hide. I hope it doesn't corrupt you, my friend.
string: 说话算话，这是用那只凶兽的皮毛做的结实轻型盔甲。希望它不会侵蚀你，朋友。

original: Resist 15 points of Fire, Frost, and Shock damage for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，就获得 15 点火焰、寒霜和闪电伤害抗性。

original: The Dwemer were many things - architects, inventors, engineers - but gods, they must have no artists of their own.
string: 锻莫身兼数职 —— 建筑师、发明家、工程师，但说真的，他们肯定没有自己的艺术家。

original: Follow me. I need your help.
string: 跟我来。我需要你的帮助。

original: Though security being the family business and all, I know my way around a lock. I would be happy to demonstrate for you.
string: 不过安保是家族主业，我也懂怎么开锁，很乐意为你露一手。

original: Irandir is heading towards <Alias=BanditLoc>, hopefully I'm not too late.
string: 伊兰迪尔正往 <Alias=BanditLoc> 去，希望我还不算太晚。

original: Good job sparing Barbas. Now we have two thankful spirits favoring us, instead of one that's as likely to reward us as he would turn us to toads...
string: 还好你放过了巴尔巴斯，现在有两个心怀感激的灵体庇佑我们，而不是一个可能赐福我们，也可能把我们变成癞蛤蟆的灵体……

original: For this, J'Faar was exiled. My own brothers threw me out, and my home sanctuary was sealed shut.
string: 正因如此，杰法尔遭到了流放。我亲手并肩的兄弟把我赶了出去，我家乡的圣所也被彻底封死了。

original: He brings hardship, and strife, but also growth and endurance, and so he is respected.
string: 他带来苦难与纷争，却也带来成长与坚韧，因此他备受敬重。

original: What do you think of Rorikstead?
string: 你觉得洛里克镇怎么样？

original: I found Irandir's journal. You should have it.
string: 我找到了伊兰迪尔的日记，你应该拿着它。

original: I volunteered to seek the missing students and have discovered that some of them met with a dire fate. I have told Urag and should now look for the rest of the students.
string: 我自愿去寻找失踪的学生，还发现其中一些人遭遇了悲惨的命运。我已经把情况告诉了乌拉格，现在该去寻找剩下的学生了。

original: I care about you. A great deal. But I don't want to ruin what we have. It's not that I couldn't think of you in that way... It's just...
string: 我在乎你，非常在乎。但我不想毁掉我们现在的关系。不是我对你没那种感觉…… 只是……

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Devouring
I appreciate your consideration of my opinion.
I've restored power to the Tonal Forge and can now craft Dwarven Fateplate, and black dwarven weaponry. I'll need to keep an eye out for the materials needed during my travels.
string: 我已为调谐熔炉恢复供能，如今可以打造矮人命运板甲和黑色矮人武器了。我得在旅途中留意收集所需的材料。

original: Summons a Giant Frostbite Spider permanently.
string: 永久召唤一只巨型寒霜蜘蛛

original: Fine. But I'll miss you terribly, so hurry back.
string: 好吧。但我会好想你的，所以快点回来。

original: Where I won a most glorious victory, in case you had not forgotten.
string: 提醒你一下，我在那儿赢得了一场超光荣的胜利。

original: I want to help people however I can.
string: 我想尽我所能帮助别人。

original: I need two sets of those robes. One for my study, to unravel their secrets.
string: 我需要两套这样的长袍。一套用来研究，解开其中的秘密。

original: Don't let the bees scare you while near the beehives, they only sting when threatened. I should know...
string: 在蜂箱附近别被蜜蜂吓到，它们只有在感受到威胁时才会蜇人。我可是深有体会……

original: With Madanach freed, the Reach finally has its rightful king back.
string: 迈德纳奇重获自由，边塞终于迎回了真正的王。

original: So, you've returned the key to it's rightful place and all is right in the land of thieves. It was quite an ordeal, don't you think?
string: 好了，你把钥匙放回了它该在的地方，盗贼的世界又恢复了秩序。这一路可真不容易，你觉得呢？

original: Excuse me, I'm focusing on not being violently ill.
string: 失陪一下，我正努力不让自己吐出来。

original: Skjor was a good hunter, but he bit off more than he could swallow. He's with Hircine now, no doubt revelling in his past glories.
string: 斯科尔是个好猎人，但他太不自量力了。他现在应该在海尔辛身边，回味着过去的荣耀吧。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
Friend,

  I helped you clear out some of them pirates.

I led the Dawnstar men at that island near that massive Ghost Ship that rushed them other Pirates clean off their ship. I am no Imperial or Stormcloak nor do I work for them; more of a Sellsword. I took lead after the damn Pirates arrowed our ship Captain.
As you probably already knew, we were all sent from Dawnstar to eliminate these Pirates and take back what they stole.

We all gathered some gold from these Pirates to reward you for your efforts! Go inside the Inn, its yours.

Thank you for your help and if you ever need a hand, come find me in Dawnstar. Ill likely be at the Inn!

- Marcus
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
朋友：

我帮你清剿了那帮海盗中的一部分。

晨星城的人跟着我，在那艘巨型幽灵船附近的小岛上发起进攻，把另一伙海盗打得丢盔弃甲，直接从船上逃了。我既不是帝国军，也不是风暴斗篷的人，更不为他们效力，说白了就是个佣兵。之前咱们的船长被该死的海盗用箭射伤了，之后就由我带队。

你大概也知道，我们都是从晨星城被派来的，任务就是铲除这些海盗，夺回他们抢走的东西。

我们从海盗那儿搜了些金子，凑起来作为报酬谢你出手相助！你进酒馆里去拿吧，那笔钱归你了。

多谢你的帮忙，要是以后你需要搭把手，就来晨星镇找我，我多半都在酒馆里！

—— 马库斯
</font>

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Breton Heir (Medium-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位布莱顿继承人（中等风险）

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
(A damp, book torn note. Creased and stained with seawater.)

If youre reading this, Im likely dead.

We were hauling this chest from a wreck just off the coast when a Dragon came out of the water! No warning; took my partner and the whole damn boat with it.

I swam to these rocks and watched the thing. Didnt roar, didnt burn anything. Just stared at me for a moment, then vanished like a ghost into thin air!

Ive been stuck here since. A Giant Slaughterfish keeps circling the burial site! Bastard wont leave and im too weak now to continue casting magic at it.

LEAVE NOW WHILE YOU CAN!

   Gluglo
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
（一张受潮破损的纸条，褶皱不堪，还沾着海水的渍迹）

如果你看到这张纸条，我恐怕已经不在人世了。

我们当时正从海岸边的一艘沉船里搬一个箱子，一条龙突然从水里钻了出来！毫无征兆，它卷走了我的同伴，连带着那该死的船一起毁了。

我游到这些礁石上，眼睁睁看着那东西。它没有咆哮，也没有焚烧任何东西，只是盯着我看了片刻，随后就像幽灵一样凭空消失了！

从那以后我就被困在了这里。一条巨型食人鱼一直在龙冢附近盘旋！这混蛋迟迟不肯离开，而我现在已经虚弱得没法继续对它施展魔法了。

趁你还能走，赶紧离开！

—— 格鲁格洛
</font>

original: The Eagleseers and Six-Fords Clans long fought over the Karthspire. They would feud, then make up, then feud again - for generations on end.
string: 鹰视氏族和六渡氏族为了卡尔特尖顶争了几代人，打打和和，反复不休。

original: I have found the cave where Orminlur and Yargul went to search for the Storm tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to them.
string: 我找到了奥敏卢尔和亚古尔前去寻找元素魔法・风暴卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚他们遭遇了什么。

original: Deliver the documents to a dead-drop
string: 将文件送到秘密投放点

original: I'll meet you in Markarth, my Listener.
string: 我会在马卡斯等你，我的聆听者。

original: Explodes for <15> points of shock damage to Health and half that to Magicka.
string: 爆炸时对生命造成<15>点闪电伤害，并减损伤害值一半的法力。

original: Is there anything you want to ask me?
Ah, the smell of the arcane and the confusion of the spirits. No doubt, the work of some mage who doesn't know what he's doing.
string: 啊，魔法的气息，还有灵体的困惑。毫无疑问，是哪个半吊子法师搞出来的名堂。

original: What do you think of Windhelm?
What is it, my friend? Don't tell me you need me to lug your stuff around for you. Fine, I will.
string: 怎么了，我的朋友？别告诉我你想让我帮你扛东西。好吧，我扛就是了。

original: These used to be the hunting grounds of the River-Elk clan. The Forsworn drove them into the mountains when they refused to murder their kin.
string: 这里曾是河鹿氏族的狩猎场，当年弃誓者崛起时，河鹿氏族拒绝残杀族人，就被赶到了山里。

original: Now why are they skulking around in a place like this?
string: 他们为什么在这种地方鬼鬼祟祟的？

original: Spell Tome: Conjure Giant Frostbite Spider
string: 法术书: 召唤巨型霜噬蜘蛛

original: and Blocking absorbs <mag>% more damage for <5> minutes.
string: <5> 分钟内，格挡吸收的伤害提升<mag>%

original: Poor Aren. Let's ruin Ancano's plans and destroy him for good. Labyrinthian it is.
string: 可怜的阿伦，我们去破坏安卡诺的计划，把他彻底解决掉。那就去拉布林西安吧。

original: Keep conjuring your little sparks and breeze - it�s very intimidating.
string: 继续摆弄你的小火花和风吧 —— 可真吓人呢。

original: It's snowing! Help me make some snowballs to throw at our enemies!
string: 下雪啦！帮我做些雪球砸敌人吧！

original: Contract Started: A member of the Windhelm Sanctuary has departed.
string: 契约启动：风舵城圣所的一名成员已出发执行任务。

original: A blast of fire that does <mag> points of damage, forcing the target away.
string: 释放火焰冲击，造成<mag>点伤害并将目标击退

original:
Contract Kill a Redguard Noble Province: Hammerfell Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] Don't be fooled by their stoic desert demeanor, the nobility of Hammerfell are just as self-seeking and underhanded as any other aristocracy in Tamriel, and more than willing to use the Dark Brotherhood's services against their political rivals. Meet with the client and eliminate the Redguard Noble. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名红卫贵族 省份： 落锤 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 别被落锤省贵族们那副沙漠子民的冷峻外表所蒙蔽 —— 他们和泰姆瑞尔大陆上其他任何贵族阶层一样自私自利、阴险狡诈，而且为了对付政治对手，他们也十分乐意雇佣黑暗兄弟会。 与委托人接头，铲除红卫贵族. [pagebreak]

original: Fine, if we must. I'll be home if you need me, love.
string: 行吧，要是非这样不可的话。亲爱的，你需要我的时候，我就在家。

original: Aside from how you saved Winterhold from the Thalmor, that is.
string: 当然，你从梭默手里拯救冬堡这事也除外。
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 极高风险

original: Well, maybe your new friend does. Let's see if we can find him. With the way you both were last night, I'm sure you've left a trail...
string: 好吧，说不定你的新朋友知道。我们找找他看。看你们俩昨晚那疯样子，肯定留下了不少线索……

original: A bounty was placed on <Alias=Wizard>'s apprentice, who fled with a ring of dangerous power. His journal revealed he intended to use the artifact for revenge against a bandit chief. I found the apprentice slain, and the stolen ring is now back in my possession. I returned the ring to <Alias=Wizard> as requested, and in gratitude I was rewarded with gold and a spell tome that grants the Bound Armor spell.
string: 有人悬赏捉拿 <Alias=Wizard> 的学徒，此人盗取一枚蕴含凶险力量的戒指后潜逃。他的日记显示，他本想靠这件神器向一名强盗首领复仇。我发现学徒已遭杀害，失窃的戒指也回到了我手中。我按要求将戒指归还给 < Alias=Wizard>，为表感谢，他赠予我金币和一本法术书，里面记载着 “束缚盔甲” 法术。

original: Watch out for it's... Legs, I suppose?
string: 小心它的…… 腿吧，大概？

original:
[pagebreak]

Letters of a Netter Book I

[pagebreak]

The following letters were purchased from a trader with unusually unfettered access to the fortified regions beyond the Southern Wall. Although the veracity of their account cannot, at the moment, be confirmed, its near perfect coincidence with the rise of the rumored 'Tenmar Rebellion' is interesting to the point of salivation. I therefore transcribe these letters with the hope that someone of a more daring nature might seek to know their source, and in so doing, provide the Empire with a much needed foothold in the ever-expanding Dominion lands. Lepidius Jutte Commerce Master, SW Skingrad [pagebreak]

9 Frost Fall, 4E 199 Fisher Docks, Senchal magine, brother, a sea stacked upon another sea - two oceans - one lying on top of the other. Waves on top of waves. Current gliding on top of current. Imagine it, for this is what Yatza saw when she rounded into Topal Bay. Surely such a vision could not be true, and surely no it went. For when Yatza shielded her eyes against the sun, she understood this was not another sea of water, but of sails. Whitecapped and rolling like another set of waves. Sails of schooners. Sliders. Cutters and batacarans. A blockade, she was seeing, brother - blockade of the great Dominion fleet! Yatza's boat is small, this you know. Without problem, she changed course for shore and found safe harbor among the Fisher Docks of Senchal's southern side, and here she waits. For there is no going North by the Niben now, nor East towards those lizardly wilds. The only course that remains is westward, brother, back to you, and the beginning of a searching Yatza has no mind to end so soon. She encloses a thorax. Beautiful, no? The Dock Cats say such color is common here. For fact, much is common here that makes a river-rider stare. All but the stars seem new. Aye, baliter, the stars - May they sweeten your skies. Alongside moons double-high, And rising. [pagebreak]

15 Frost Fall, 4E 199 Fisher Docks, Senchal Let Yatza paint another picture for her brother: imagine a cliff, proud and tall, jutting its chin over the crystal blue of a sighing sea. Imagine Yatza here, underneath this cliff, in her bitty baiter boat, picking her way through pieces of the fallen crag. And then see with Yatza a hole in the side of this cliff, a passage, and go with her into this hole. Wind your way through tight and turning tunnels to come upon, suddenly, a cavern. Look up and see an opening of light, like a star so small and far away. Then see a staircase cut into the rock of this cavern. Understand you are in a well, a staired well, and then alight from your bitty-boat and pit-a-pat up the stairs to the top, slash back the ancient vines that have hidden this well for uncounted Moons, break free into the whispering wildness of the jungle, and see, to your left, the very cliff you had just floated beneath. Run out along that cliff and watch the wild world drop off all around you. Be flying, brother! Feel the wind in your fur! Taste the sea! Rejoice and proclaim! For such is the splendor of Quin'rawl! Truly! Your sister has arrived in the land of the Cats! So you see, Yatza has not moved herself along from these Southern shores - she cannot: the blockade along the Bay still holds. More ships arrive ever' day. The Dock Cats whisper of a relic. Stolen. But who can say? Such matters are not the business of a netter like Yatza, no. Yatza finds her business among the sands and the shore. And so she bides her time... Tonight the sun falls across the Bay like a golden net thrown wide, catching all of the sky within its splendor. She wishes her brother to see it. She bids him, also, to go, as ever, teeth to tail, smiling. [pagebreak]

19 Frost Fall, 4E 199 Fisher Docks, Senchal Brother, news: This morning, Yatza was netting in a wider cove when a smuggler's skiff rounded into view. She knew what it was at once - for a smuggler's trawl moves with a smuggler's crawl. Belly to the branch, it goes. Low like a Tojay. It came upon her broadside - fa'voom! And the next thing she knows, a Cathay has leapt astride her boat! "Suthay dra?" this Cathay said, bracing himself atop her prow, his haunches low and wide. "Get off her boat!" Yatza yelled. "Suthay dra?" the Cathay repeated, "Bo Suthay clever?" "Ak'norr!" Yatza swung her oar wide. "Daroh," he said, dodging it, "Not so clever." Then another Cat, a massive Pahmar-raht, appeared over the side of the skiff and threw a crate into Yatza's boat! "Oi!" Yatza yelled. "Yet pray Suthay be clever," the first Cat repeated from the front, "Pray Suthay be smart. Pray she be wise." He drew himself up, looking like a statue standing there, "Pray she save this crate and so too her life." Yatza grabbed her pole and swung. The Cathay dodged again, leaping back onto his skiff, which was already pushing off, racing toward the far side of the cove. It had almost disappeared when Yatza saw another ship rounding into view - this one most surely of the Dominion fleet. (And brother, how can she say it? The Dominion. Their vessels. Truly, can we Cats lay claim to the glories of Khenarthi when the High Elves make use of her might so well?) Seventy clicks high, this schooner was. Forty wide. An eruption of sails at ever' level. It rounded into view and bounded the breadth of the cove in one, seamless pounce. And then it was gone. Both ships gone. The whole thing over and done as Yatza's boat yet rocked! Ai'va! Yatza remained still for many moments, waiting for her breath to settle. When finally she opened her eyes...there was the crate. "Balo!" Yatza cursed, for it was nearly breaching her hull. "K'aack balo!" She leapt to it, making to tip it overboard, and that's when she saw it, brother. The thing she will never forget... For as her shadow fell upon the surface of the crate, the lines of its wood-grain came alive - like small fish, they scattered from beneath her shadow, spinning into swirls. Yatza gasped and stumbled back to her prow; the grain resettled into stillness. Yatza grabbed her pole, and with only the slightest hesitation, waved it above the crate - and again the wood-grain swirled! How you should have seen it, brother! Like wind moving over water! The beauty of the open sea! Yatza crawled right up to it then, not yet letting herself believe the truth that was dawning upon her; she waved a paw overtop of it - and again the wood grain spun! Spiraling into swirls! Brother! Do you understand what this was? What such a thing as this could be? Have you not already guessed that here, before your Yatza, was not just a crate - but a Dagi woodweave! Yatza has heard, as she knows you have, of the ancient Dagi woodweavers. Those masters of the Tenmar Forest. Who enchant the trees out of their natural bindings and woo the graining of their wood into a different dance. The Bark Benders. Grain Grafters. The songs of whom were outlawed by the Bosmer when the Third Dominion rose. Aye, brother! Cat Magicka! Mo'jaii'Kay of the ja'Kha'jay! Here! Upon Yatza's very own boat! She stumbled back to her prow once more, her heart leaping like a Senche. This wooden crate, then, was locked by its very graining. It could only be opened by the woodweaver who had fashioned it - by the Dagi Master who knew the original design of that wood's way. (Or whoever had the carving copy.) Yatza knew it must contain something of great worth, for the mere creation of a woodweave was an act of the highest treachery. And if the Bosmer learned of this...no, no, no, brother. Natta. Yatza decided she would hide it. Aye, she would hide the crate. She had to. To keep such a thing at sea was to risk the Dominion finding it. And to return it to the docks...for what? Report it to who? The Thalmor? They would be at her throat. The smugglers? They would be at her back. Ever'one else? They would call her a fool. No, brother. The only thing to do was hide it, and hide it well. Fortune for fate, your Yatza is a netter. None know the secrets of the shore better than she. Indeed, in this very cove there were two spots that could safely hide such a crate. She had already discovered them not three days after her arrival. (For there is ripe crawl in this cove, brother. With many Frack Frogs and Ji'Peeters abounding.) Yatza was decided then. She gathered her nets and rowed toward shore. Hiding among its greenery was an inlet, which threaded past a succession of dry ridges, the last of which filled with the excess of a back-ridge lagoon. (Here is where the Frack Frogs sing.) Into this narrow swamp Yatza turned. It required her pole, for no oar could fit these dimensions. She poled as far as her craft would go and tipped the Dagi crate into a floating sop of green. Jone was northeast of Jode and quartered at a third of her light - the water level, then, would cover the crate until the two Sisters switched sides. As for the water's effect, there was no need for worry, for the woodweave proofed its contents against ever'thing under the Moons - against water, magicka, avarice. This crate was safe. Yatza returned to her tent and wrote this letter and even still her whiskers tingle - how shall she describe it, brother? This feeling that possesses her? A sense of sprightliness mingles with her fear. A sort of sugared seasoning atop the rough flank. For any Cat would proclaim the joy of doing something well, no? To be pounced upon and caught up in a tumble and yet come out on top - that's a fresh feeling, no? Strange new steps, brother. But for now Yatza yawns. The sea calls her to dreaming. Seek the stars, baliter. Their light is yours to follow. Be wise and stay lithe, in their sight.
string:
[pagebreak]

织网者书简 卷一

[pagebreak]

下述书信购自一名商人之手 —— 此人竟能自由出入南境长城以外的设防区域，实属异乎寻常。虽目前尚无法证实信中所述真伪，但其内容与传闻中 “丹玛尔叛乱” 的兴起近乎完美吻合，其间关联足以令人迫切探究。 故而我将这些书信抄录于此，盼有胆识过人者愿追查其来源；此举若成，或能为帝国在疆域持续扩张的先祖神州境内，争取到亟需的立足之地。 莱皮迪乌斯・朱特 斯金格勒南境贸易总长 [pagebreak]

第四纪元 199 年，霜落月九日 森查尔，渔人码头 兄弟，你且试想：一片海叠在另一片海之上 —— 两片大洋，彼此相覆。浪涛之上又起浪涛，洋流之下还藏洋流。你且好好想想这番光景，因为雅扎驶入托帕尔湾时，亲眼见到的便是这般景象。 这般奇景定然不会是真的，事实也的确如此。当雅扎抬手遮着阳光望去，才发现那并非另一汪海水，而是一片由船帆汇成的海洋。白帆簇簇，翻涌起伏，宛如另一重浪涛。纵帆船的帆、滑行艇的帆、快速帆船与巴塔卡兰船的帆，尽收眼底。兄弟，她所见的，是一场封锁 —— 先祖神州庞大舰队布下的天罗地网！ 你也知道，雅扎的船身小巧。她毫不费力地调转航向朝岸边驶去，在森查尔南侧的渔人码头寻得一处安全港湾，就此暂作停留。如今既无法沿尼本河北上，也不能往东驶向那些蜥蜴人盘踞的蛮荒之地，余下的路便只有西行，兄弟，回到你身边。而雅扎这场探寻之旅，才刚启程，她可不愿这么快便画上句点。 她随信附上一枚虫胸甲。瞧，是不是很美？码头的猫说这般色彩在此地随处可见。说实话，这里有太多事物都让咱这河上旅人看得瞠目结舌，除了星辰，周遭一切仿佛都是全新的。 是啊，我的兄弟，唯有星辰 ——愿它们为你的天际洒下温柔清辉，伴那两轮高悬的明月，缓缓升起。 [pagebreak]

第四纪元 199 年，霜落月十五日 森查尔，渔人码头 兄弟，且再随雅扎的描述想象一番：有一座峭壁傲然矗立，昂首探入碧波如晶的呜咽海面。你且试想，雅扎正驾着她那艘小小的诱饵船，在峭壁下方的海域穿行，小心翼翼避开坠落的岩块。接着，与雅扎一同望见峭壁侧壁上的洞口 —— 那是一条通道，随她一同潜入其中吧。在狭窄曲折的隧道里迂回前行，眼前豁然开朗，竟是一处洞穴。抬头望去，洞顶有一道透光的裂隙，像极了遥远天际那颗渺小的星辰。再看，洞穴岩壁上凿着一道石阶 —— 原来此处竟是一口竖井，一口带阶梯的竖井！你从那小船上跃下，嗒嗒嗒奔上台阶，劈开遮蔽竖井无数个月圆之夜的古老藤蔓，终于闯入丛林静谧的野趣之中。此时向左望去，正是方才你乘船经过的那座峭壁。沿着崖边奔跑，看苍茫天地在脚下铺展，仿佛展翅翱翔一般！兄弟，感受皮毛间穿梭的风吧！品味空气中的海腥味吧！尽情欢呼，放声呐喊！这便是昆劳半岛的壮丽风光！千真万确！你的妹妹，已然抵达猫人之境！ 想必你已明白，雅扎为何仍逗留在这南境海岸 —— 我实在无法动身：托帕尔湾的封锁依旧森严，每日都有更多舰船抵达。码头的猫人们私下议论，说有一件圣物失窃了。可谁又说得准呢？这种事本就与雅扎这样的网捕者无关，对吧？我的营生向来在沙滩与海岸之间，姑且在此静待时机…… 今夜，夕阳如一张铺开的金网斜洒海湾，将整片天空的绚烂都网罗其中。雅扎多希望你也能看见这般景致。 愿你一如既往， 从齿到尾，笑意盎然。 你的雅扎 [pagebreak]

第四纪元 199 年，霜落月十九日 森查尔，渔人码头 兄弟，有消息要告诉你： 今早雅扎正在一片更宽阔的小海湾里撒网，一艘走私者的小艇突然出现在视野中。我一眼就认出了它 —— 走私船的拖网行进起来，就像走私者蹑手蹑脚的模样，贴水而行，低得像只托杰虎猫。它径直朝我的船舷撞来 —— 嘭的一声！紧接着，一个卡泰虎人纵身跳上了我的船！ “苏泰虎人？” 这只卡泰虎人稳稳站在船首，后腿分开压低身子，开口问道。 “滚下我的船！” 雅扎大喊。 “苏泰虎人？” 他又问了一遍，“难道苏泰虎人都这么机灵？” “该死的！” 雅扎抡起船桨就打。 “啧，” 他躲开船桨，“看来也不怎么机灵嘛。” 话音刚落，小艇船舷边又出现了另一只虎人 —— 一头壮硕的帕玛-虎人，他抬手就把一个木箱扔进了我的船里！ “喂！” 雅扎惊喝。 “还是希望这苏赛虎人能机灵点，” 先前那只虎人在船头又说道，“希望她够聪明，够睿智。” 他挺直身子，像尊雕像般伫立着，“但愿她能护好这箱子，也保住自己的性命。” 雅扎抄起撑杆就挥了过去。 那卡泰虎人再次躲开，跳回自己的小艇。小艇早已撑离水面，朝着海湾对岸疾驰而去。眼看它就要消失在视野中，另一艘船却拐了出来 —— 那绝对是先祖神州的舰队舰船。（兄弟，我该怎么说呢？先祖神州啊，他们的船舰…… 凯娜瑞斯女神的力量，被高等精灵运用得如此炉火纯青，我们虎人又怎能宣称独占女神的荣光？）这艘纵帆船足有七十尺高，四十尺宽，每一层船舷都张满了帆，密得像爆发的浪潮。它驶入海湾，一气呵成地横穿过整片水域，随即便消失了。两艘船都没了踪影，一切发生得快极了，我的船还在水面摇晃呢！我的天！ 雅扎僵在原地许久，等呼吸平复下来，终于睁开眼时…… 那木箱还在船上。 “该死！” 雅扎咒骂着，木箱都快把船身撞出裂缝了，“真是倒霉透顶！” 我冲过去想把它推下海，可就在这时，兄弟，我看到了永生难忘的一幕…… 当我的影子落在木箱表面，木头的纹理竟活了过来 —— 像一群小鱼，从我的影子下四散开来，旋成一个个漩涡。雅扎倒吸一口凉气，踉跄着退到船首，木纹这才恢复平静。我又拿起撑杆，犹豫了一瞬，把杆在木箱上方挥了挥 —— 木纹再次旋动起来！兄弟，你真该亲眼看看！就像风吹过水面的模样，像无垠大海的壮美波澜！ 我随即爬近木箱，心中仍不敢相信那个逐渐清晰的事实；我伸出爪子在箱顶拂过 —— 木纹又一次旋转起来，卷成螺旋的漩涡！兄弟！你明白这是什么吗？这东西意味着什么？你难道没猜到，摆在你妹妹雅扎面前的，绝不仅仅是个普通木箱 —— 而是达吉木织箱啊！ 雅扎曾听过达吉古木编织匠的传说，想必你也一样。那些滕玛森林的大师，能解开树木的自然束缚，引着木纹跳出别样的舞步。他们是揉皮匠，是纹接师，可当第三先祖神州崛起时，波兹莫精灵就取缔了他们的秘术歌谣。是啊，兄弟！这是虎人魔法！是双月之下的灵木奇术！此刻，它就在雅扎的船上！ 我又一次踉跄着退回船首，心跳得像头战虎般剧烈。 这木箱子，是被自身的木纹锁住的。只有打造它的木织匠 —— 知晓这木头原始纹路设计的达吉大师（或是持有雕刻复刻版的人），才能将其打开。雅扎知道里面定然装着极珍贵的东西，毕竟制作木织箱本身就是弥天大罪。要是波兹莫精灵发现了…… 不，不，不，兄弟，万万不可。 雅扎决定把它藏起来。 没错，必须藏好。把这东西留在海上，迟早会被先祖神州发现；带回码头又能怎样？向谁报告？梭默？他们会立刻掐住我的脖子；那些走私者？他们会从背后暗算我；其他人？只会骂我是蠢货。不，兄弟，唯一的办法就是藏起来，藏得严严实实。 万幸的是，你的妹妹是个网捕者，没人比我更了解海岸的秘密。其实就在这片小海湾里，有两个地方能安全藏下这箱子，我来这儿才三天就发现了。（兄弟，这海湾里的水洼可是块宝地，到处都是弗拉克蛙和吉皮虫。） 主意已定，我收起渔网，朝岸边划去。岸边的绿植掩映间有个小水湾，水湾穿过几道干涸的山脊，最后一道山脊下积着后山泻湖的溢水。（弗拉克蛙就在这儿鸣叫。）雅扎把船拐进这片狭窄的沼泽，这里根本用不了船桨，只能靠撑杆撑行。我把船撑到尽头，将达吉木织箱推入一汪浮着绿藻的水潭里。 此时吉恩月在乔德月东北方，只亮了三分之一 —— 这样的水位会把箱子淹没，直到双月换边。至于水的影响，根本无需担心，木织术早已将箱内之物保护得万无一失，防水、防魔法、防贪婪之念，这箱子安全得很。 雅扎回到帐篷写下这封信，此刻胡须还在发麻 —— 兄弟，我该怎么形容这种感觉？心中又怕又雀跃，就像粗糙的兽肉上撒了甜滋滋的调料。换做任何一只虎人，都会为办成一件险事而欣喜，不是吗？突然遭袭，卷入一场乱局，最后却占了上风 —— 这种感觉真是新鲜极了，不是吗？ 兄弟，前路似乎要踏上陌生的新台阶了。但此刻雅扎已哈欠连天，大海在唤我入梦。 去追寻星辰吧，我的兄弟。星光为你引路。愿你始终聪慧而矫健，行走在星辰的注视之下。

original: I don't claim to be the eminent scholar on the Dragonborn, but I have read a significant amount about them.
string: 我不敢自称是研究龙裔的顶尖学者，但我读过不少相关的资料。

original: Greetings, Outlander. You must be feeling a bit out of your element here.
string: 你好，外乡人。你在这里肯定有点格格不入吧。

original: What have you got for sale?
Valenwood Contract: Kill a Non-Pact Bosmer (Low-Risk)
string: 威木省契约：杀死一位非协约木精灵（低风险）

original: I wanted to become a knight like him. You know, with my own horse and manor, doing good for my liege lords and the people.
string: 我想成为像他一样的骑士，有自己的马和庄园，为领主和百姓做好事。

original: So much so that the King of Wayrest himself left the gates open, and paid a fleet of corsairs to sack his own city, just to root us out.
string: 厉害到韦雷斯国王亲自敞开城门，雇了一群海盗洗劫自己的城市，只为把我们连根拔除。

original: The missing apostle has written about going to Kagrumez, in which there is a labyrinth. His staff seems to react to some crystals, which open doors; I should keep this information in mind.
string: 失踪的使徒留下文字说要去卡古梅兹，那里有一座迷宫。他的法杖似乎能对某些水晶产生反应，这些水晶还能开启大门，我得把这个线索记在心里。

original: He developed an interest for Dwemer automatons, to study another way to bring automatons to life.
string: 于是他对锻莫自动机械产生了兴趣，想要研究另一种让机械获得生命的方式。

original: Look, I don't mean to tell you your business, but I don't like some of the things you've said and done recently.
string: 听着，我不是想管你的事，但我不喜欢你最近说的一些话、做的一些事。

original: A real soldier trained by the Legion should tell the difference with ease. I guess the rebellion really had the Empire scrap the barrel.
string: 受过军团正规训练的士兵，本该一眼就能分辨出来。看来叛乱真的让帝国捉襟见肘了。

original: I miss our young, simple days too, Millie.
string: 我也怀念我们那年轻又单纯的时光，米莉。
雷诺斯使徒…… 竟然在一个构装体里？
那枚戒指…… 透着一股邪气。

original: The pieces I picked up in Nchardak have proved useful.
string: 我在钠查达克捡到的零件派上用场了。
恶魔石像鬼 - 瓦尔罗格
电能汲取

original: But if my cousin keeps telling lies about our shared name, Osvilda Cruel-Sea is going to have to do something about it.
string: 但如果我那表亲再敢拿我们共同的姓氏胡言乱语，奥斯维尔达・酷海可不会善罢甘休。

original: Summon Elven Oathblade
string: 召唤精灵誓约之刃
演说者居所（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: I love the rain. If you see any big puddles, tell me!
string: 我喜欢下雨，要是看到大水坑，一定要告诉我！

original: A little grim for my taste. When I go, just burn me and be done with it.
string: 对我来说有点阴森，我死了以后，直接烧了就行。

original: Surprised this place isn't collapsing in on itself. It's quite a large cavern.
string: 真没想到这地方没塌，这洞穴可真大。

original: Oh, this is all coming back to me now. I definitely slapped the Hag at one point that night.
string: 哦，我现在全想起来了，我昨晚肯定扇了某个女巫一巴掌。

original: I want to give you an Accolade.
string: 我想为你授予一项荣誉称号。

original: The Pale Dragon is the Master of Tasks, and of balance and destiny.
string: 苍白之龙是执掌任务、平衡与命运的主宰。

original: These sanctuaries have been abandoned for years so they're a little bare bones at the moment.
string: 这些圣所被废弃多年，所以目前还略显简陋。

original: Overwhelming joy flows through me as we make our way to Riften. It's the friendliest city in Skyrim, you know.
string: 往裂谷城走的路上，我心里满是狂喜呢。要知道，这可是天际最友好的城市。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
I've been feeling itchy all day. I think Drelas added some kind of tracking spell to the backpack, along with the enchantments that I payed for. This is beginning to feel uncomfortable. What does he want with me?
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
我一整天都觉得浑身发痒。我想德雷拉斯肯定在我花钱订制附魔的背包里，额外加了某种追踪法术。这种感觉越来越难受了。他到底想从我这儿得到什么？
</font>

original: Eh? What? What's that? I've never seen that before in my life.
string: 呃？什么？那是什么？我这辈子从没见过这东西。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="20">Master Viltrulf, if these words ever reach you, know that I write them with a trembling hand and a heart heavy with shame.

I have betrayed your trust. The ring I stole from you was not taken out of greed or desire for power, but out of a wound I have carried for years. The wound of memory.

You know of my family, though I have spoken little. Long ago, when I was still but a boy, they were slaughtered by a bandit and his men. I still see their faces in the firelight, hear their cries as steel struck flesh. I hid. I lived. And I have carried that guilt every day since.

That same bandit lives still, thriving in his den at <Alias=BanditLoc> while the dead rest uneasy. I could not bear it any longer. The chance to set things right - to face him, not as a cowering child, but with strength - consumed me. When I saw the ring, I thought only of vengeance.

I know what I have done cannot be excused. I have dishonored you, and I have endangered myself by wielding a power I scarcely understand. Yet I beg you believe this: I never wished you harm, nor do I seek to shame your name. I go only to confront my family's murderer.

Should I fall - and I fear I may - let this journal be proof that my crime was born of sorrow, not malice. Perhaps, in my death, I will find peace with those I lost.

Forgive me, master, if you can.

Irandir
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="20">维楚尔夫大师，若你有幸读到这些文字，便会知晓我是在双手颤抖、满心愧怍中写下的它们。

我辜负了你的信任。从你处偷走那枚戒指，并非出于贪婪或对力量的渴求，而是为了抚平我多年来心头的创痛 —— 那道名为记忆的伤口。

你对我的家人虽知之甚少，我却也曾略提过一二。很久以前，我尚且还是个孩童时，他们便惨死于一名匪徒及其党羽的刀下。时至今日，我仍能在火光中看见他们的面容，听见利刃刺入血肉时他们的惨叫。我躲了起来，活了下来，而这份愧疚自此日夜噬心。

那名匪徒至今仍在世，在 <Alias=BanditLoc> 的巢穴里作威作福，逝者却不得安息。我再也无法忍受下去了。那股想要拨乱反正的念头 —— 想要直面他，不再是那个畏缩的孩子，而是带着力量站到他面前 —— 彻底吞噬了我。当我看到那枚戒指时，心中唯有复仇二字。

我知道自己的所作所为无可辩解。我辱没了你的声名，也因动用这份我几乎无法掌控的力量将自身置于险境。但我恳求你相信：我从未想过要伤害你，亦无意玷污你的名号。我此行，只为与杀害我家人的凶手对峙。

若我殒命 —— 我恐怕自己真的会殒命 —— 就让这本日记作为证据，证明我的罪行源于悲痛，而非恶意。或许，在我死后，能与我失去的亲人重聚，求得安宁。

大师，若你能原谅我，便请宽恕我吧。

伊兰迪尔
维亚特丽克斯・佩蒂莉亚

original: That's a shame. I'll be in or around Riverwood if you need me.
string: 真可惜。你要是需要我，我就在河木镇或附近待着。

original:
From the Elemental Tomes you have gained

== Elemental Knowledge ==

You resist fire, frost and shock damage 5 percent better.
string:
你从元素秘典中习得

== 元素知识 ==

火焰、寒霜与闪电伤害抗性提升 5%。

original: Search Valin's belongings for the Dwemer Schematics
string: 在瓦林的物品中寻找锻莫图纸

original: I have found a lone room in the cellar, there appears to be some sort of crown. This must be what the cultists were using to prepare their attack.
string: 我在地窖里发现了一间单独的房间，里面似乎有一顶王冠。这肯定就是那些邪教徒用来筹备进攻的东西。

original: I've been doing nothing but training these days. Wherever you're going to, I'm skilled enough to go with you.
string: 这些日子我除了训练什么都没做，无论你要去哪里，我的身手都足够跟你一起去。

original: What is happening here? The East Empire Company just has this connected to their warehouse? Strange.
string: 这是怎么回事？东帝国公司居然把这地方和仓库连在一起？太奇怪了。

original: You shall be Silencer to Speaker J'Faar.
string: 你将担任演说者杰法尔的沉默者。

original: Return to the barrel hidden behind the Bannered Mare
string: 返回战旗母马旅店后方隐藏的木桶处

original: I have been waiting for my apostle for a long time now, with no way to know where they went.
string: 我等我的使徒已经等了很久了，却无从知晓他的去向。

original: Summon Ancient Nord Oathblade
string: 召唤古代诺德誓约之刃

original: I'm fairly certain I've been doing that already lugging your belongings around. Typical.
string: 我敢肯定我早就一直在帮你扛东西了，典型的你啊。

original: Withers Goldenspoon's journal Day 1 That annoying harlot Reykja and her smug assertion about me being unprepared! Ha! Here I am at the entrance a mere three days since we got the task from Urag. Meanwhile I bet she is still fiddling with yet another extra bedroll "just in case", her fat buttocks still back at the College. My mastery of fire leaves me with few needs.
string: 威瑟斯・金匙的日记 第一日 那个讨厌的贱人蕾克娅，还大言不惭说我没准备好！哈！乌拉格给我们布置任务才三天，我就已经到入口了。我敢打赌，她现在肯定还在摆弄又一条多余的铺盖卷，美其名曰 “以防万一”，肥屁股压根没离开学院。我对火焰魔法的掌控早已让我无所匮乏。

original: So you now lead the Thieves Guild. At least you can't ruin it more than Mercer Frey did.
string: 现在你成了盗贼公会的领袖。至少你不会比墨瑟・弗雷把它搞得更糟。

original: Search the ruins of Mzulft for a way to inscribe the Blank Lexicon
string: 探索树皮遗址，寻找铭刻空白方典的方法

original: I believe the apostle's negative emotions, at the moment of the transfer, could have been amplified and made sustainable in time.
string: 我认为使徒在转移灵魂的那一刻，负面情绪可能被放大，并且一直持续了下来。

original: The situation became so dire that the Night Mother herself had to intervene and choose a new Listener.
string: 情况危急到夜母不得不亲自干预，选出了一位新的聆听者。

original: Return to Nelosi tomorrow for your new <Alias=NameHolderForRobe04>
string: 次日返回内洛西处领取新的 <Alias=NameHolderForRobe04>

original: I wonder why we don't revere Lamae Bal in the Reach. She survived strife, betrayal - but she's still only a name in our histories.
string: 我好奇为什么我们边塞人不崇拜拉梅・巴尔，她历经磨难和背叛活了下来，但在我们的历史里却只是个名字。

original: But this is too far, Gormli.
string: 但这也太过分了，戈尔米。

original: Maybe everyone is so miserable because they're so cold.
string: 也许大家这么痛苦，就是因为这儿太冷了。

original: Mercer Frey seems like the kind who turn trust into a weapon. Never let you guard down while you're with him.
string: 墨瑟・弗雷看起来就是那种会把信任变成武器的人。和他在一起时，永远别放松警惕。

original: You could've told me it was a werewolf. Here's the pelt.
string: 你早该告诉我那是只狼人。这是它的皮毛。

original: I feel quite good about that.
Would you like me to change my fighting style?
string: 你想让我改变战斗风格吗？

original: I have found the Master Dwemer Explorer's backpack.
string: 我找到了锻莫探索大师的背包。

original: So, you are a thief. I may not know why stealing is so important for you, but as long as it makes you happy, I shall follow you.
string: 这么说，你是个小偷。我或许不明白偷窃对你来说为何如此重要，但只要能让你开心，我就会跟着你。

original: The nature provides the food we consume. Stupid Gourmet just had to mix in some weird sauce and whatnot... I say he earned what's coming.
string: 大自然赐予我们食物，那个蠢厨子偏要加些怪里怪气的酱料之类的…… 我说他是自找的。

original: Oh, how much I miss those carefree times. The laughter and the innocence.
string: 哦，我多么怀念那些无忧无虑的时光。那些欢笑和纯真。

original: Our dark lady puts us through them intentionally to make us stronger each time. We're better for it.
string: 我们的黑暗女士有意让我们经历这些，只为让我们一次次变得更强大。我们也因此变得更好了。

original: What do you think of Winterhold?
Woo-wee! Aunt Gormli's mill just keeps on rolling!
string: 哇哦！戈尔米大妈的好运还在继续呢！

original: All the Stormcloaks do is to weaken both the Empire and Skyrim. This war of theirs only gives the Thalmor two easy foes instead of one strong Legion.
string: 风暴斗篷所做的，只是削弱帝国和天际。他们的这场战争，不过是让梭默面对两个弱小的敌人，而非一支强大的军团。

original: At the very least, these bandits will make good target practice for me.
string: 至少这些土匪能当我的活靶子。

original: Give the "Amplifier: Deadly Swords" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：致命剑术” 交给构装体

original: For so long, those assassins haunted the nights of Skyrim, striking fear into the defenseless...
string: 长久以来，这些刺客让天际的夜晚不得安宁，让手无寸铁的人们心生恐惧……

original: Valenwood Contract: Kill a Bosmer Warden (Very High-Risk)
string: 威木省契约：杀死一位木精灵守望者（极高风险）

original: Blood and Silver? Blah. The Nords never bled for this city, and the Silver only ever corrupted it. Stone and Spirit, that's how it should be...
string: 鲜血与白银？呸。诺德人从没为这座城市流过血，白银只会腐蚀它。唯有石头与灵体，才是这座城的根基……

original: Talk to Urag the Librarian about the student notes
string: 向图书管理员乌拉格询问学生笔记的相关情况

original: I will not carry out that contract, don't worry.
string: 别担心，我不会执行那份契约的。

original: Soft beds, warm hearths... This is a home for thinbloods. Oh, wait. It's your place. No wonder.
string: 柔软的床，温暖的壁炉…… 这就是给娇气包准备的家。哦，等等，这是你的地方，难怪。

original: You will not go any further.
The glowing walls... The giant mushrooms... It's like a story book.
string: 发光的墙壁…… 巨型蘑菇…… 就像童话书里的场景。

original: Hammerfell Contract: Kill a Redguard Pirate (Medium-Risk)
string: 落锤契约：杀死一位红卫海盗（中等风险）

original: Go to Solitude - find out more about these Pirates!
string: 前往独孤城 - 查明更多关于这些海盗的信息！

original: Find Orminlur and Yargul in Bleakcoast Cave
string: 在荒岸洞穴找到奥明卢尔和亚古尔
秘闻 - 威瑟斯的日记 4

original: Change is a part of every adventure, Millie.
string: 变化是每段冒险的一部分，米莉。

original: Oh and let's keep out of the marsh, shall we? I don't want muddy water sloshing around in my boots.
string: 哦，我们别去沼泽里，好吗？我可不想靴子里灌满泥水。
火焰重拳

original: It shouldn't be this quiet here. The dead spirits are never so still in the Reach...
string: 这里不该这么安静，在边塞，亡者的灵体从来不会这么沉寂……

original: Dragon Bridge? I always thought it was Dragons Bridge. How strange... Perhaps my mind is failing me on this one.
string: 龙桥？我一直以为是 “龙之桥” 呢。真奇怪…… 可能是我记错了。

original: Contract Started: A member of the Solitude Sanctuary has departed.
string: 契约启动：独孤城圣所的一名成员已出发执行任务。

original: My target was contacted by Maven Black-Briar. She is trying to find out infomation about Lirael. I should search her Manor to see if she has learned anything I can use.
string: 我的目标曾与玛雯·黑棘有过接触。她正设法打探莉瑞尔的消息。我应去搜查她的庄园，看看她是否掌握了我能用得上的情报。

original: As the Listener, you are no longer expected to carry out the Night Mother's contracts on your own.
string: 身为聆听者，你不必再独自执行夜母的契约了。

original: It's a good thing Winterhold has a population of next to no one.
string: 还好冬堡几乎没什么人，不然麻烦大了。

original: We grew up. Things happen, but that does not we have to lose what we had.
string: 我们都长大了，世事变迁，但这不代表我们要失去曾经拥有的一切。

original: Hammerfell Contract: Kill a Sword Singer (Very High-Risk)
string: 落锤契约：杀死一位剑歌者（极高风险）

original: Resist 15 points of Fire, Frost, and Shock damage for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 每装备一件雪王子盔甲，就获得 15 点火焰、寒霜和闪电伤害抗性。

original: I'll meet you in Windhelm, my Listener.
string: 我会在风舵城等你，我的聆听者。

original: The Reach will be better off without you.
string: 没有你，边塞会变得更好。

original: Conjure Dragon Priest Thrall
string: 召唤龙祭司奴仆
我要收回你的荣誉称号。

original: It's quaint. I'm not sure I could spend eternity here, being that there isn't anything to do except drink at the inn. But it's nice enough.
string: 挺雅致的。我不确定我能在这儿待一辈子，毕竟除了在酒馆喝酒也没别的事可做。不过还不错。

original: Forgive me, Listener, but the sanctuary is empty. We need to recruit some Initiates first.
string: 请原谅我，聆听者，圣所里空无一人。我们得先招募些新手才行。

original: That old man is a lunatic by the way. Funnily enough, the lunatics are usually the ones you can trust.
string: 对了，那个老头是个疯子。有意思的是，疯子往往是最值得信任的人。

original: Well, I'm not much of a talker, but... if you insist.
string: 嗯，我本不是个多话的人，不过…… 如果你执意要听，那我就说说。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
Dear Iskandar,

I'm taking the damn books.

Maxima
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
致伊斯坎达尔：

这破书我拿定了。

马克西芒
</font>

original: There isn't anything left to improve, Listener. You already bought everything.
string: 再也没有可修缮的地方了，聆听者。你已经把所有东西都买齐了。

original: Crazy Khajiit nearly got you killed. Maybe Tolfdir was right about safety...
string: 疯癫的虎人差点害死你，或许托尔夫迪尔说的安全问题是对的……
高岩契约 | 中等风险

original: There isn't much to tell, Listener. Before all of this, I was part of the Cheydinhal Sanctuary.
string: 没什么好说的，聆听者。在这一切发生之前，我是香丁赫尔圣所的一员。

original: Do! Ha! My nephew doesn't do anything. Sits around all day sighing about spell tomes and mages. That's all he does!
string: 做事？哈！我那外甥什么都不干。整天坐着，对着法术书和法师唉声叹气。他就只会这个！

original: Morrowind Contract: Kill a Tribunal Heretic (Low-Risk)
string: 晨风契约：杀死一位审判庭异端者（低风险）

original: It's peculiar. The atmosphere here is... Melancholy. Yet it has a quiet beauty.
string: 真奇怪，这儿的氛围…… 很伤感，却又有一种静谧的美。

original: Hmm, always a pity when someone has to die.
string: 嗯，有人丧命总是件憾事。

original: My blood boils in Ulfric's presence. I kept it together for you, but if not... Hircine alone knows the tragedy I'll repay him.
string: 看到乌弗瑞克，我就怒火中烧。要不是为了你，我早就忍不住了…… 海尔辛才知道我会怎么报复他。

original: After that little incident, I'm sure glad we're back on the road.
string: 经历了那场小风波，真庆幸我们又能继续上路了。

original: Congratulations, my friend. I'm so pleased for you.
string: 恭喜你，我的朋友，真为你高兴。

original:
Contract Kill an Alik'r Warrior Province: Hammerfell Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] The blood stained sands of the mighty Alik'r are home to many of Hammerfell's hardiest warriors. One of these warriors failed to kill his enemy and created a nemesis for life, which, thanks to the Black Sacrament, won't last much longer. Meet with the client and eliminate the Alik'r Warrior. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名阿利克尔战士 省份： 落锤 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 巍峨的阿利克尔沙漠，那片浸染鲜血的沙地，是落锤省众多骁勇战士的故土。其中一位战士没能成功击杀对手，反而结下了一生之敌 —— 不过拜黑暗祭礼所赐，这个仇敌的日子也不会太久了。 与委托人接头，铲除阿利克尔战士. [pagebreak]

original: First you joined a murder cult that bathes in blood and kills for pleasure, and now you're killing the leader of the Empire?
string: 你先是加入了一个嗜杀成性的邪教，现在又要杀帝国的领袖？

original: I'm glad the Dwarves are of interest to someone, but they certainly don't interest me.
string: 还好有人对矮人感兴趣，反正我是没兴趣。

original: It will allow you to mark targets for assassination once per day, and your Silencers will carry them out in a coordinated strike from the shadows.
string: 它能让你每日标记一次暗杀目标，你的沉默者们会从阴影中协同出击，完成刺杀。
法术书: 召唤冰怨灵

original: Now if we can just get out of this dungeon.
string: 现在只要能走出这个地牢就行。

original: Before you, my only friends were two wizards significantly older than me. It's difficult to find common ground with those so different from yourself.
string: 在你之前，我唯一的朋友就是两个比我大很多的巫师。和与自己截然不同的人相处，真的很难找到共同话题。

original: I just can't do that. I won't.
string: 我就是做不到，我绝不做。

original: What kind of factotum are you?
I think we need to talk.
Bring 2 Dragon Cultist Robes & 5 Heartstones to Nelosi Ulaaru
string: 将 2 件拜龙教长袍和 5 块心石交给内洛西・乌拉鲁

original: I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original: Then I look at you, and I'd remember why...
string: 可当我看向你，我就会想起原因……
任务汇报：希比利·斯丹特

original: Riften seems like the go-to place for fishing. Not that I find it interesting, but some Apostles in the Clockwork City did have interest in creating
string: 裂谷城似乎是钓鱼的好去处。倒不是我觉得这事儿有趣，只是发条城的一些使徒确实对创造（此处原文未完整，按语境保留）很感兴趣。

original: I'm glad you helped the Gildergreen. The spirits in this city are so calm now, like a gentle breeze.
string: 很高兴你帮忙拯救了吉尔德格林树，这座城市的灵体现在平静多了，就像温柔的微风。
回到内洛西・乌拉鲁身边

original: I can't believe we just did that... One could say we're unstoppable. Not that I wish to inflate our own egos.
string: 真不敢相信我们居然做到了…… 可以说我们势不可挡了。不过我可不想助长咱们的自负。

original: This should be interesting. What does this place have in store, I wonder. Something awful probably.
string: 这应该会很有意思，不知道这地方藏着什么，大概是些糟糕的东西吧。
你将被净化，肮脏的怪物。
看着他们的骨头碎裂吧！
晨风契约 | 极高风险

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Battleaxe of Reaping
Not until it's done! And I don't want to have to finish it for a long, long time, got it?
string: 写完之前可别想走！而且我希望要过很久很久才用得着写完它，明白吗？

original: At least now we know what happened to them.
string: 至少现在我们知道他们出什么事了。

original: But... you got arrested by the Legionnaire? What have you done wrong?
string: 可是…… 你被军团士兵逮捕了？你做错什么了？

original: A Vateshran is a storyteller. We keep the history of the Reach alive. After the Incident, my mother was the last one left. Now, it's only me.
string: 瓦特什兰是故事的讲述者，我们让边塞的历史得以延续。事变之后，我母亲成了最后一个瓦特什兰，现在，就只剩我了。

original: Now that is behaviour I am very accustomed to. The importance of overflowing coffers has been instilled in me from a young age.
string: 这种行为我可太熟悉了，我从小就被灌输财富积累的重要性。

original: The Nords should've just burned their dead. Save us the trouble.
string: 诺德人当初就该把死者火化，省得我们麻烦。

original: Factotums were not built to take trips all over Tamriel, but my body seems to have adapted to its varying weather conditions.
string: 构装体并非为游历整个泰姆瑞尔而造，但我的身体似乎已经适应了这里多变的天气。

original: Hello. You are a different type of clientele in this bar, I suppose.
string: 你好。我猜你在这酒馆里，算是与众不同的客人。

original: The Penitus Oculatus know where to find it now. They would likely attack again if we tried to reoccupy it.
string: 帝国之眼现在知道它的位置了。要是我们试图重新占据，他们很可能会再次发动攻击。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Battleaxe of Devouring
It's you and me against the world.
string: 就你和我，一起对抗这个世界。
我们需要更多新入教者。

original: 3rd of Evening Star, 4E 201 Why hasn't Syladia made her move yet? Is she trying to play a trick on me? Is she planning to attack my fort? It does not matter. If she makes a move, I will not hesitate to fight back. Thoron sent me here because there was something here, but Syladia must have followed me! I will not let her get in my way. She has a fort like mine on the other side of the cavern and everything has been quiet so far. It is too quiet.
string: 第四纪元201 年，夜星月三日 西拉迪亚怎么还没动手？她是想耍什么花招吗？还是打算攻打我的堡垒？无所谓了。只要她敢轻举妄动，我必会毫不犹豫地反击。索伦派我来此地，是因为这里藏着某样东西，可西拉迪亚肯定跟踪我来了！我绝不会让她碍我的事。她在洞穴另一端也建了座和我这儿一样的堡垒，至今为止一切都风平浪静。可这安静，也太反常了。
在施法者所指之处召唤一个魔人，持续<dur>秒。

original: Now, the mead hall of the Companions, that's a different story. I've read plenty about that particular building.
string: 不过战友团的蜜酒厅就另当别论了，关于这座建筑的记载我可读过不少。

original: Thank you for saying that. I wish my father could bring himself to say something similar.
string: 谢谢你这么说，真希望我父亲也能说出类似的话。

original: The Deepwood has long been a refuge for the Reachfolk. It was a gift from Lorkh, a shelter made of his bones. I hate seeing it as a mustering ground.
string: 深林一直是边塞人的避难所，是洛库赐予的礼物，用他的骨头筑成的庇护所。看到它变成集结地，我心里真不是滋味。

original: I think it's fair to say she got what she deserved.
string: 说她罪有应得，应该没人有意见吧。
你最好还是别知道为妙。

original: Oh, so we get to be noisy now?
string: 哦，所以我们现在可以大吵大闹了？

original: Delvin certainly seems like he earned his seat at that table. Maybe he could give us a few pointers.
string: 德尔文坐在那张桌子旁，看来确实是凭本事挣来的。说不定他能给我们一些指点。

original: Come on, you flirtatious mess. We need to find our next adventure.
string: 行了，你这个爱调情的家伙。我们得找下一个冒险了。
斯坦达尔之剑 - 设置

original: I foolishly mispoke when delivering Aunt Gormli's forgery and was unable to deliver it to her nephew.
string: 我在送戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书时，笨嘴拙舌说错了话，没能把文书交到她侄子手里。

original: They didn't stand a chance against us.
string: 他们根本不是我们的对手。

original: Now I got to think of a whole new plan to get that boy off my hands!
string: 现在我又得重新想办法，把那小子从我眼前打发走！

original: No one will sing songs for them.
string: 没人会为他们谱写赞歌。

original: Increases Frost Resistance and lowers the cost of Destruction spells by <mag>%. Allows you to cast Freeze Bolt.
string: 寒霜抗性提升，毁灭系法术消耗降低<mag>%，并可施展寒冰箭

original: Summon Mephala's Oathblade
string: 召唤梅法拉的誓约之刃

original: Ah, quite right. You have a keen business sense, my Listener.
string: 啊，说得太对了。你有着敏锐的商业头脑，我的聆听者。

original: I was the last survivor of the old Black Hand. The rest of my dark brothers and sisters perished in Bravil.
string: 我是旧黑手的最后幸存者。其余的黑暗弟兄姐妹都在布拉维尔殒命了。
艾斯维尔契约 | 低风险

original:
Contract Kill a College of Whispers Mage Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] The rivalry between the mages of the Synod and the College of Whispers is well known throughout Cyrodiil. Secrecy, intrigue, and even murder are par the course in their competition for primacy over the Empire's magical affairs. This College of Whispers mage wants us to kill their rival from the Synod so they can advance their career. Meet with the client and eliminate the College of Whispers Mage. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一位低语学院法师 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 希诺修会与低语学院的法师之间的宿怨在赛瑞迪尔全境尽人皆知。在争夺帝国魔法事务主导权的较量中，保密、阴谋乃至谋杀都已是家常便饭。这名低语学院的法师希望我们除掉其来自希诺修会的对手，从而为自己的晋升铺平道路。 与委托人接头，铲除低语学院法师. [pagebreak]

original: I'm sorry for putting this on you. Let's... let's just go see the Jarl, huh?
string: 抱歉把这些压在你身上。我们…… 我们还是去见领主吧，好吗？

original: You've become much different since we left our town, and so have I.
string: 离开小镇后，你变了很多，我也是。

original: A gallant hero like that exists only in fairy tales. Reality is often uglier.
string: 那样英勇的英雄只存在于童话故事里，现实往往更残酷。
夏暮岛契约 | 中等风险

original: Please, listen to me. Nothing good will come of this.
string: 求你了，听我说。这事不会有任何好结果的。

original: Great, thank you for your input.
Conjure Death Hound
string: 召唤死亡猎犬

original: Go to the spot marked on Sildar's map
string: 前往西达尔地图上标记的地点

original: You fell as you lived: unremarkable.
string: 你的死和你的一生一样：平淡无奇。

original: My ma used to tell stories about the other spirits that could not thrive in the Reach. The ones you call Daedric Princes. I wonder what they're like.
string: 我妈妈以前总讲那些没能在边塞扎根的其他灵体的故事，就是你们说的魔族亲王，我真想知道他们到底是什么样子。

original: I love shopping. Even for things I have no interest in. We should leave soon or I fear this shop will be out of stock.
string: 我超爱逛街，就算是买些我根本不感兴趣的东西也行。我们得赶紧走了，不然我怕这家店要被我买空了。

original: You're going to have to make it up to me.
Skyrim has so many farms. Seems kind of like cheating to me. How can you say you've earned your food if it's just waiting where you planted it?
string: 天际有这么多农场，在我看来简直是作弊。要是食物就长在你种下的地方，那怎么能算你挣来的？

original: The Vateshran told stories of deals with the Woodland Man, like that of Fynboar's son's. This power deserves our respect, and more so, fear.
string: 瓦特什兰讲述过许多与林地人交易的故事，比如芬博尔之子的传说。这份力量值得我们敬畏，更值得我们忌惮。

original: You shouldn't have started with us!
What do you think of Dawnstar?
He went outside to continue his research, but it has been a while since he's been gone.
string: 他外出继续研究，但已经离开很久了。
召唤梅法拉的誓约之刃

original: Rogue mages toy with life and death, scorn at the notion of ethics or restraint, willing to doom lives for scraps of power.
string: 叛法法师玩弄生死，蔑视道德与克制，为了一点点力量不惜葬送无数生命。

original: But if you can find an authority willing to stamp their seal on it...why, it'd be worth its weight in gold, if you catch my meaning.
string: 但如果你能找个有权威的人在上面盖章…… 懂我的意思吧，那这东西可就价值连城了。

original: I hope... I'll find someone who made me happy as you did.
string: 我希望…… 我能找到一个像你一样让我开心的人。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Esbern, Old Comrade,

Our past trials echo, reminding how fire shaped us strong. I guide those who rose from the purge ashes, keeping our hidden watch on Tamriel's balance. Your archives hold secrets that could spark old wars; guard them well as we guard shadows.

Thalmor close on Riften's dark corners. Hide deeper, but know you're not alone, a new agent moves in Skyrim, their quiet ways might shift the fight. I say no more; secrecy holds us. Trust mercy's blade cuts true. Keep on, lore-keeper; your knowledge keeps us.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

致老战友伊思本，

往昔的试炼犹在耳畔回响，那团烈火将你我淬炼得更为坚韧。如今我引领着从清洗的灰烬中崛起的众人，于暗中守望泰姆瑞尔的平衡。你手中的档案藏有足以重燃旧日战火的秘密，务必要妥善守护，一如我们守护着暗影的秘密。

梭默的爪牙已逼近裂谷城的阴暗角落。请继续深藏行迹，但你要知晓，你并非孤身一人 —— 一名新的特工已踏入天际，其低调的行事方式，或将为战局带来转机。我不便多言，保密是我们的立身之本。请相信，慈悲之刃永远精准。坚守住，典籍守护者，你的学识是我们的依仗。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵
</font>

original: But following you... I've done the opposite far more often.
string: 但跟着你…… 我却常常做着相反的事。

original: I have found what happened to Reykja and Sherivah, and have located the Frost volume of Elemental Magic. I should find out what happened to the rest of the students.
string: 我查明了雷娅和谢里瓦的遭遇，还找到了《元素魔法・寒霜卷》。我该去弄清楚其他学生的下落。

original: A blast of force that throws targets in the direction the caster is aiming. Targets may be prone to fall damage.
string: 释放一道推力冲击波，将目标向施法者瞄准的方向击飞，目标可能因坠落受到伤害

original: Conjure Dremora Kynval
string: 召唤魔人战士

original: Let's send their master a message!
Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original:
Captain Nivan,

Some of our boys down in Raven Rock saw your map in the hands of a merchant. I asked around town about Runold, someone fitting his description was seen boarding a ship back to Skyrim not long ago.

The merchant knows the map holds great value. We can't shake them down without attracting the guards, and we don't have the gold to buy the map either. Our best bet is to wait for someone else to pick it up, then tail them.


- Rendaryl
string:
尼文船长：

我们在鸦石镇的几个弟兄，看到有个商人手里拿着你的地图。我在镇上打听了鲁诺德的消息，不久前有人看到与他样貌相符的人登上了一艘返回天际的船。

那商人心里清楚这张地图价值连城。我们既不能强行勒索他，免得招来守卫，也拿不出足够的金币买下地图。眼下最好的办法，就是等其他人买下地图后，再尾随其后。

—— 伦达瑞尔

original: Now to find the nearest inn...
The Orcs of this Stronghold have been in the Reach for generations. They make better neighbors than the Nords, that's for sure.
string: 这座要塞的兽人已经在边塞生活了好几代，他们比诺德人强多了，起码是好邻居。

original: Peer through the veil and gain sight in shadow and glimpse of life.
string: 穿透迷雾之纱，于暗影中视物，窥见生命微光。

original: Suffice to say, I've had my happiest time with you in our childhood. Maybe someday... I'll have my best friend back.
string: 简单说吧，童年和你在一起的时光是我最快乐的。也许有一天…… 我能找回我最好的朋友。

original: Somewhere quiet, like a cave - or a crypt. I'm getting tired of being looked at funny by pig-nosed Nords and their ugly wives.
string: 找个安静的地方，比如山洞 —— 或者地穴。我受够了那些猪鼻子诺德人和他们丑兮兮的老婆用奇怪的眼神看我了。

original: When wearing all four pieces of the Snow Prince's Armor, gain a Frost Cloak during combat which deals damage to those around you.
string: 穿戴全套雪王子盔甲四件时，战斗中会获得寒霜斗篷效果，对周围目标造成伤害。

original: The beast should be roaming around the wilds of Falkreath... Along the road to Rorikstead. Gods be with you.
string: 那只野兽应该在佛克瑞斯的荒野里游荡…… 就在去洛里克镇的路上。愿神明与你同在。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Reaping
Losing the Crown should stick a thorn in Ulfric's loincloth. Let's hope it gets infected.
string: 丢了王冠，乌弗瑞克肯定气坏了，希望他气出病来才好。

original: I can hear the spirits of nature from that big tree here. I think they're dying...
string: 我能从这棵大树里听到自然的灵体，它们好像快要死了……

original: So much water in here. Maybe, the apostle is stuck in the laboratory!
string: 这里好多水。说不定使徒被困在实验室里了！

original: Bows do <mag>% less damage for <dur> seconds.
string: 弓箭伤害降低<mag>%，效果持续<dur>秒

original: You haven't heard of us? Good.
Even if we are not in the Clockwork City, people still spend hours watching animals and fabricants. Maybe we are more alike than we think!
string: 即便不在发条城，人们还是会花好几个小时观赏动物和构装体。或许我们比想象中更相似！

original: I don't know about you, but I'd much prefer my ancestors were in the Hall of the Dead...
string: 我不知道你怎么想，但我更希望我的祖先待在亡者之厅里……

original: I will return tomorrow with someone suitable, my Listener.
string: 我明天会带个合适的人回来，我的聆听者。

original: So you're considering it. Interesting. Well, let's discuss the positives and the negatives.
string: 这么说你在考虑？有意思。我们来聊聊利弊吧。

original: Skyrim Contract: Kill an Unfaithful Spouse (Low-Risk)
string: 天际契约：杀死一位不忠配偶（低风险）

original: Oh... Sure. I might know a place.
string: 哦…… 当然，我或许知道个地方。

original: After killing the great beast as requested by Talsric, he has said that he will make me some unique armor. Talsric has asked me to return to him in a day, after which I will be able to claim my new armor.
string: 我按照塔斯里克的要求杀死了那头巨兽，他说会为我打造一套独特的盔甲。塔斯里克让我一天后再去找他，到时候就能拿到新盔甲了。

original: My nephew won't be hard to find. All he does is sit.
string: 找我外甥不难，他整天就知道坐着。

original: I'm not too sure about you yet.
Correct me if I'm wrong, but this sounds a little elementary. Still though, the backing of Olfrid will be beneficial here.
string: 要是我说错了请纠正我，但这事儿听着有点太简单了。不过有奥尔弗瑞德支持，肯定是件好事。

original: Oh... I'm sorry to hear that. My mother died during childbirth, so I know somewhat how that feels. It's the reason I'm an only child.
string: 哦…… 听到这个我很抱歉。我母亲生我的时候去世了，所以我多少能体会这种感受，这也是我独生女的原因。

original: <Bashing> with the <Shield> causes a shockwave that pushes enemies back.
string: 用<盾牌>进行<重击>时，会产生闪电波将敌人击退

original: Launches ice that does <mag> points of frost damage to Health and Stamina. Freezes,
string: 发射寒冰，对生命值和耐力造成<mag>点寒霜伤害，同时产生冻结效果

original: Killed by a mortal? How embarrassing for you!
string: 被凡人杀死？你可真够丢人的！

original: A moth priest? The ones who can read Elder Scrolls? They must have such stories to tell... Oh, how he'll add to my epic! I can't wait.
string: 蛾祭司？就是那些能阅读古老卷轴的人？他们一定有很多故事可以讲…… 哦，他的经历能给我的史诗添多少内容啊，我都等不及了。

original: I'm <Alias=Player>, why are you in a cage?
string: 我是<Alias=Player>，你为什么被关在笼子里？

original:
- Solitude Family -

Solitude Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsSolitude>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapSolitude>
Solitude Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepSolitude> Gold
string:
- 独孤城家族 -

独孤城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsSolitude>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapSolitude>

独孤城维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepSolitude> 金币
召唤马驹

original: Never mind, I'm good for now.
string: 当我没问，我现在没什么问题了。

original: Six husky dogs are ready for adoption! Well trained and very loyal companions to keep you company, just south of Dawnstar in the house on the hill. Maybe you can give one of these fine hounds a home?
string: 有六只健壮的猎犬正等待领养！它们训练有素，是能伴你左右的忠实伙伴，就在晨星城南边的山间小屋处。或许你愿意给这些优秀的猎犬中的一只一个家吗？

original: Sorry, I'll try to do better.
string: 抱歉，我会努力做得更好的。
我们的第一堂课，真让人兴奋。

original: We know for certain that Mercer is a traitor. Whether Karliah is doing this for the good of the Guild or just for herself, it makes no difference.
string: 我们已经确定墨瑟是叛徒了。不管卡利亚这么做是为了公会还是为了她自己，都无所谓。

original: No, I don't think you need one.
I don't expect it for free.
string: 我不指望白拿，会给你报酬的。

original: While blocking, an Ice Cloak forms around you. Opponents in melee range take <mag> points Frost damage and Stamina damage per second.
string: 格挡时，寒冰护盾将环绕你身。近战范围内的敌人每秒受到<mag>点寒霜伤害与耐力伤害

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Bard (Low-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位游吟诗人（低风险）

original: That's good to hear. I don't often find it easy to talk about the way that I feel but there's something just... Open about you.
string: 听到你这么说真好。我平时不轻易表露自己的感受，但你身上有种…… 坦诚的特质。

original: For what it's worth to you, I still consider you my friend. If you won't pay any mind to how the gods would judge you, then I've got to.
string: 不管你怎么想，我依然把你当朋友。如果你不在乎众神会如何评判你，那我就得替你在乎。

original: Ah yes, of course. Far too many under appreciate the benefits of this school.
string: 啊，没错，当然了。太多人低估了这个学派的好处。

original: Now that I've saved Tamriel, how about we settle down together?
string: 既然我拯救了泰姆瑞尔，不如我们一起安定下来吧？

original: My story is a lot like yours, Listener. Like you, I was once part of Astrid's family.
string: 我的经历和你很像，聆听者。和你一样，我也曾是艾斯特丽德家族的一员。

original: So... That was odd, don't you think? How was the view from up there?
string: 所以…… 刚才那事挺奇怪的，你觉得呢？在上面看风景怎么样？

original: If you think it is necessary.
string: 如果你觉得有必要的话。
加韦恩的日记 - 第三部分

original: The Reach is a place of old magic and angry gods. We know how to live with our land, but the Nords will get what's coming.
string: 边塞是一片充满古老魔法与愤怒众神的土地。我们懂得与这片土地共处，而诺德人终将自食恶果。

original: Summons a Restless Draugr for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一名不安的尸鬼，持续<dur>秒

original: It's a pleasant city. Good choice. I'll make my way there when we're not traveling together.
string: 这是座宜人的城市，选得好。我们不一起旅行的时候，我就去那儿。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">Things are unraveling fast! Tolben, the sadistic idiot, started teasing the college mages while we were preparing to take the high elf to the sacrificial altar and flat-out told them we were going to kill her during the ritual! 

The orc went berserk, I have never seen rage like that before. She killed both Janka and Tolben before we could subdue her. We are all pretty shaken up about it.  
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
局势崩得太快了！托尔本那个暴虐的蠢货，我们正准备把高精灵带去献祭祭坛，他却去招惹学院的法师，还直接跟他们说我们要在仪式上杀了她！

那个兽人彻底疯了，我从没见过那样的怒火。我们还没来得及制服她，她就杀了扬卡和托尔本。这事把我们都吓得够呛。
</font>

original: Ulfric is an honorable man and he needs our support.
string: 乌弗瑞克是个可敬的人，他需要我们的支持。

original: I've been doing nothing but training these days while you were gone. Wherever you're going, I'm ready to go with you!
string: 你走之后，我这些日子除了训练什么都没做。无论你去哪，我都准备好跟你一起了！

original: When we were little, I'd never have imagined my friend to be a dragon slayer - savior of the world, even.
string: 小时候，我从没想过我的朋友会成为屠龙者 —— 甚至是世界的救世主。

original: Not that I can't handle myself, of course.
string: 当然，这可不是说我保护不了自己。

original: Dark, ancient stories spoke of this staff. We should be careful with the prize of nightmare - the magic it creates is more aware than it lets on.
string: 古老的黑暗传说里提到过这根法杖，我们得小心这噩梦的奖品 —— 它释放的魔法远比表面看起来的要诡异。

original: And then? Then we'll keep on writing more stories, together.
string: 之后呢？之后我们就继续一起，写下更多的故事。
我可真喜欢站着不动呢。（反讽）

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
Spotted something strange out on the water yesterday.

Three rough looking sailors in a skiff, just off the coast. Thought they were fishing at first until they hauled up a heavy chest and dropped it overboard, real careful like. Not lost, not thrown; placed. Like they meant to come back for it.

Didnt stick around to ask questions. Figured someone ought to know.

- Fisherman, Lower Docks
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
昨天在海上瞅见件怪事。

三个模样粗野的水手驾着小划艇，就在近岸。起初以为他们在捕鱼，可后来他们捞起个沉甸甸的箱子，小心翼翼地扔进了海里。那可不是失手掉落，也不是故意丢弃，而是稳稳放下的，看样子是打算回头再来取。

我没敢多做停留去打听。觉得这事总得有人知道才好。

—— 下城区码头渔夫
</font>

original: It's a pity Balgruuf is the Jarl of Whiterun, not the Reach. With a man of his foresight in Markarth, maybe peace would be possible.
string: 真可惜巴尔古夫是白漫城的领主，不是边塞的。要是马卡斯有他这样有远见的人，或许和平还有希望。

original: I heard that a gigantic creature called the Gehenoth used to roam around this settlement.
string: 我听说有一种叫盖诺索斯的巨型生物曾在这片定居点附近出没。

original: Doesn't look much like a place of worship to me.
string: 在我看来，这地方一点都不像祭祀的场所。

original: First Key to the Inner Sanctum
From childhood friends to grown-up lovers - it feels like a fairy tale.
string: 从儿时玩伴到成年爱人，这感觉就像童话故事一样。

original: The best by far, if you ask me. Though I do somewhat like Aela.
string: 要我说，你绝对是最好的。不过我还挺喜欢艾拉的。

original: Deliver the sealed forgery to Aunt Gormli
string: 将密封的伪造文件交给戈姆莉姨妈

original: However, I do hope that the Stormcloaks make good use of it. They will need to if they are to face what is coming next. The Thalmor are many.
string: 不过，我希望风暴斗篷能好好利用这次胜利。如果他们想面对接下来的挑战，就必须这样做。梭默人多势众。

original: The Nords weren't the first to settle in Skyrim, yet they're so adverse to others settling here. Way to pull the ladder up behind you, Windhelm.
string: 诺德人并不是第一个在天际定居的种族，却如此排斥其他种族来这儿定居。风舵城，真是典型的过河拆桥。

original: At least that's what my pa told me.
string: 至少我父亲是这么说的。

original: (Arch-Mage) All their lives were lost. We must revisit our curriculum for the adept class.
string: （首席法师）他们都失去了生命，我们必须重新审视高阶班的课程设置。
黑沼泽契约 | 低风险

original: In the shade of her wings, we find clarity, protection, and power.
string: 在她的羽翼庇护下，我们寻得清明、保护与力量。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
F,

You are a fool, stop trying to outshine me, your bets are worthless.

I am the only winner here. My trained bear is worth more than you!

B.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
F：

你就是个蠢货，别再试图压过我风头了，你的赌注一文不值。

我才是这里唯一的赢家。我训练的熊都比你值钱！

B.
</font>

original: "Hail Nocturnal, Mistress of Night, Lady of Luck and Skill. All those who cheat, lie, dance, and steal, must return to you and pay their bill."
string: “向夜之母诺克图娜尔致敬，幸运与技巧之主。所有行骗、说谎、起舞、偷窃之徒，终将向你归来，偿还一切。”

original: Looting the dead of their valuables... That's awful. Except when we do it. Then it's perfectly acceptable.
string: 搜刮死者的财物…… 这太恶劣了。不过换成我们做，那就完全没问题了。

original: One-handed and Two-handed attacks do <20>% more damage. While <blocking>, you absorb <5> Health per second from opponents in melee range.
string: 单手和双手攻击造成的伤害提升 20%。格挡时，你会从近战范围内的对手身上每秒吸取 5 点生命值。
召唤梅法拉的誓约之刃

original: The Ocean Dragon is now dead. Should make my way back to Solitude when I can, to pick up my reward.
string: 海洋之龙已被斩杀。我该找机会返回独孤城，领取赏金。

original: Good for your coin purse, I suppose. Though if the rumors are to be believed, they're really on their back foot.
string: 我想这对你的钱袋来说是好事。不过要是传言属实，他们现在可是处境艰难。

original: Now... are you ready to seal the vow with me, my love? In Mara's Temple, joined by the spirits of the Reach?
string: 现在…… 你准备好和我立下誓言了吗，亲爱的？在玛拉神庙，在边塞的灵体见证下？

original: Use magic! Set yourself as a conduit, please.
string: 用魔法！请把自己设定为能量导管。

original: I have found all the unique backpacks that Drelas enchanted.
string: 我集齐了德雷拉斯附魔的所有独特背包。

original: The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Paranoid Nobles
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：贵族多疑

original: Find the Fire volume of Elemental Magic
string: 找到元素魔法的火焰卷册

original: The same place as you, Listener. I was a member of the Falkreath Sanctuary.
string: 和你一样，聆听者。我曾是佛克瑞斯圣所的一员。

original: We can always come back to them, I suppose.
string: 我想，我们总能回头再找他们算账的。

original: The missing apostle was not in Nchardak. He has headed for Kagrumez to continue his research on mixing technologies from the Dwemer and the Clockwork City. I should tell the Factotum about what I have found.
string: 失踪的使徒并不在钠查达克。他已前往卡古梅兹，继续研究融合锻莫与发条城的技术。我应当把发现的这些情况告诉构装体。

original: I would still be stuck in the laboratory, wondering about the apostle, if it wasn't for you.
string: 要是没有你，我可能还困在实验室里，苦苦猜测使徒的下落。

original: Had my father provided his own protector, I'd likely have my every move reported back to him.
string: 要是父亲给我派护卫，我的一举一动恐怕都会被汇报给他。

original: I'll use him for now. Then I'll kill him.
string: 我先利用他一阵子，然后就杀了他。
掠夺 2 件米拉克长袍和 5 块心石

original: It watched the legions to the North, seeing everything they did, predicting every maneuver. But it never saw us.
string: 它监视着北方的军团，洞悉他们的一举一动，预判他们的每一次部署。但它从未发现我们。

original: The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Fearful Guards
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：守卫恐慌

original: I'm sure we'll be fast friends before we know it.
string: 我敢肯定，我们很快就会成为挚友。

original: No, and I wouldn't want to. I'm sure you'll be back before I know it.
string: 当然不会，我也不想那样。我肯定你很快就会回来的。

original: I may not be a towering Dwemer centurion, but I will still crush you.
string: 虽然我不是高大的锻莫百夫长，但依然能把你碾碎。
亚古尔・格拉 - 拉格纳斯特

original: But there's no way you'd know. Just... be careful. Promise me.
string: 但你自己肯定不会察觉。只是…… 小心点。答应我。

original: Ah, your father. The man saw me as nothing but an urchin.
string: 啊，你父亲。那个人把我当成街头小混混。

original: Did you know that one of the jarls of Falkreath was killed by a minotaur?
string: 你知道吗，佛克瑞斯的一位领主曾被牛头怪杀死。

original: Increases your Magicka by <10>, then double the bonus for each piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped
string: 你的法力值增加 10 点，每多装备一件雪王子盔甲，该加成便会翻倍。

original: Venture into the Oblivion Realm & find a way to close the Portal.
string: 进入湮灭领域并找到关闭传送门的方法

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Volkrov

My anger burns cold as Skyrim's frost. Those fools held a funeral for my double, weeping in Solitude like I, Sybille Stentor, could die so easy! That illusion shell I made to hide my face now traps me in shadows. I can't return to the Blue Palace without even Elisif asking questions. My rule, built over centuries of spells and hidden power, shakes because of that killer.

Now I hide like vermin. You alone stay true, my last friend in this failing court. Meet me at Anise's cabin, the same one from all those years ago, where my scheme began. Its dark protects my last mirror, where I craft new disguises to take Solitude back. Bring news of our allies, hags, necromancers, all who serve our night. Don't fail; enemies close in.

Sybille Stendor

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

沃尔克罗夫：

我的怒火如天际的寒霜般冰冷燃烧。那些蠢货竟为我的替身举办了葬礼，在独孤城哭天抢地，仿佛我希比利·斯丹特会这般轻易死去！我用来遮掩真容的幻形躯壳，如今反倒将我困在了暗影之中。即便面对艾利西弗，我也无从解释，再也无法回到蓝色宫殿。我凭借数世纪的咒语与隐秘权势建立的统治，正因那名杀手而摇摇欲坠。

如今我如鼠辈般东躲西藏。在这个分崩离析的宫廷里，唯有你依旧忠心，是我最后的挚友。到安尼斯的木屋与我会面吧，就是多年前我的阴谋开端之地。那里的黑暗能庇护我最后一面幻化之镜，我要借着它打造新的伪装，夺回独孤城的控制权。带上我们盟友的消息，那些女巫、死灵法师，所有效忠于我暗夜大业的人，都一一告知。切莫失手，敌人已四面围来。

希比利·斯丹特

</font>
紧急通知：希比利·斯丹特

original: Absorb <mag> points of health per second from the target. Only equipped in the left hand.
string: 每秒吸取目标<mag>点生命。只能装备左手。

original: You need me watching that back of yours. Are you taking me with you?
string: 你需要我替你盯着后背，要不要带上我？

original: Maybe Aela or Farkas can point us in the direction of a good hunt.
string: 或许艾拉或法卡斯能给我们指个好猎场。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
Stop wandering into the trap tunnels, idiot! Boss's sick of resetting the mammoth head.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
别再瞎闯陷阱通道了，蠢货！老大都烦死重置猛犸象头颅陷阱这事儿了。
</font>
