original: Aw, I wish Neloth would use more mushroom magic to fight these machines. Block their pipes with fungi, you know?
string: 唉，真希望内洛思能用更多蘑菇魔法来对付这些机械，比如用真菌堵住它们的管道，你说呢？

original: These Forsworn are just as eager to kill a Reachman as they'd brutalize a Nord. Bloody murderers.
string: 这些弃誓者杀起边塞人来，和残害诺德人一样狠，一群该死的杀人犯。

original: All spells cost <15>% less to cast, and magicka regenerates <100>% faster.
string: 所有法术消耗减少<15>%，法力恢复速度加快<100>%。

original: Let us hope this one is brittle!
Is my custom armor ready, Nelosi?
string: 内洛西，我定制的盔甲做好了吗？

original: That is awfully unsettling. Whatever that bundle of tentacles wants, let's do the opposite.
string: 这也太让人不安了。不管那团触手怪想要什么，我们都反着来就对了。

original: I never pictured an Orc as a cook. They seem like the type to eat meat raw, without seasoning.
string: 我从没想过兽人会当厨师。他们看起来像是那种生吃带血的肉、不加任何调料的人。

original: Summons a Ice Wraith for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只冰灵，持续<dur>秒

original: The next step to getting the Tonal Forge operational will be to get the cooling systems operational. There are some levers nearby which should control the cooling system. I should pull the levers to activate it.
string: 要让调谐熔炉恢复运作，下一步是启动冷却系统。附近有一些操纵杆应该能控制冷却系统，我得拉动这些操纵杆来激活它。
召唤莉莉

original: Wait for all contracts to be completed.
We should've known it wouldn't be so simple. The crown it is, then.
string: 我们早该知道这事不会这么简单，那就去拿王冠吧。

original: Who taught you magic, a Welwa? Oh - a drunk Welwa, got it.
string: 谁教你的魔法啊，是维尔瓦野人吗？哦 —— 还是个醉醺醺的维尔瓦野人，懂了。

original: I was wondering when you would say that.
string: 我早就等着你说这话了。

original: Ah, splendid! You've returned, with the prize! Let me examine them.
string: 啊，太棒了！你带着战利品回来了！让我看看。
召唤冰霜巨龙尸鬼盟友

original: I have found what happened to Withers and have located the Fire volume of Elemental Magic. I should find out what happened to the rest of the students.
string: 我查明了威瑟斯的遭遇，还找到了《元素魔法・火焰卷》。我该去弄清楚其他学生的下落。

original: They've got us doing the odd jobs and boring tasks for now. But give it time and you'll be running this place before you know it.
string: 他们现在让我们做些杂活和无聊的任务，不过假以时日，你很快就能掌管这个地方了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
<font size='18'>
Galkas, you and Kilina are being sent to root out a cult of Daedra worshippers in The Reach. You must make haste, for they might be planning an attack on the city of Markarth, according to Vigilant Eriaan's reports. Do not underestimate them, they are dangerous. Failure is not an option.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
<font size='18'>
加尔卡斯，你和基莉娜即刻动身，前往边塞地区肃清一伙魔族崇拜者。根据警戒者埃里安的报告，这些人可能正计划袭击马卡斯城，务必火速行动。切勿轻敌 —— 他们极其危险。此行只许成功，不许失败。
</font>
艾斯维尔契约：杀死一位阿尔菲克（低风险）

original: While blocking, a Fire Cloak forms around you. Opponents in melee range take <mag> points Fire damage per second.
string: 格挡时，火焰护盾将环绕你身。近战范围内的敌人每秒受到<mag>点火焰伤害

original: What do you think of Karthwasten?
string: 你觉得西卡斯镇怎么样？

original: Elsweyr Contract: Kill a Khajiit Caravan Master (Medium-Risk)
string: 艾斯维尔契约：杀死一位虎人商队主（中等风险）

original:
Contract Kill a Thief Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 12 Hours

[pagebreak] Yet another child has prayed to the Night Mother, this client asks us to hunt down the thief who robbed them and make them pay with their life. Meet with the client and eliminate the Thief. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名小偷 省份： 天际 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:12 小时

[pagebreak] 又一个孩子向夜母祈祷了。这位雇主 —— 也就是这个孩子，要我们追杀那个抢劫了他的小偷，并让对方以命抵偿。 与委托人接头，铲除小偷. [pagebreak]

original: Triggered by nearby enemies, the rune explodes for <mag> points of fire damage.
string: 敌人靠近时触发，符文将会爆发，并造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: Take the note you found to a dead-drop
string: 将你找到的纸条送到秘密投放点

original: But they were always watching me. The only time I was ever alone was when I was sleeping. It's what they were employed to do after all.
string: 但他们总是看着我，我唯一能独处的时候就是睡觉。毕竟这是他们的工作。

original: Summons a Nord Hero Oathkeeper for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把诺德英雄誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: I almost feel my blood turning to ice here! Even the highest peaks of the Reach don't get this cold.
string: 我感觉血液都快冻成冰了！就算是边塞最高的山峰，也没这么冷。

original: Like the others, J'Faar was member of the old Brotherhood.
string: 和其他人一样，杰法尔也曾是旧兄弟会的一员。
面纱束缚的高等精灵亡魂
弗基哈尔氏族的拒绝信

original: and takes <mag> Poison damage to Health every second for <dur> seconds. Bashing flings an explosive Poison Bloom pod.
string: 且每秒钟受到<mag>点毒性生命伤害，持续<dur>秒。重击会掷出一枚爆炸性的毒华荚囊

original: In the Four Shield Tavern, I found an abandoned journal belonging to a vampire hunter. In it, the hunter wrote that he tracked a mysterious group of vampires to their hideout. Apparently, he never returned. In the journal, he also mentions a device he fabricated to extract Vampire Blood; a rare alchemical ingredient.  I should travel to Deephowl Hollow to locate the hunter and this device.
string: 我在 “四盾” 酒馆发现了一本吸血鬼猎人留下的废弃日记。日记里写道，猎人追踪一群神秘的吸血鬼到了他们的藏身处，显然他再也没能回来。日记中还提到，他制作了一个提取吸血鬼血液的装置 —— 那可是种稀有的炼金材料。我该前往深嚎山谷，找到这位猎人以及他的装置。

original: I knew Ancano couldn't be trusted! But he is Thalmor, so that was quite evident.
string: 我就知道安卡诺信不过！不过他是梭默，这本来就很明显了。

original: It seems the apostle has left for the ruins of Nchardak.
string: 看来这位使徒去了钠查达克的遗迹。

original: I can handle that. What part of the sanctuary do you want to improve?
string: 这事儿我能处理。你想修缮圣所的哪个部分？

original: Oh. Oh no. Something is very very off here. The spirits, they're whispering a... joke? Where everyone stuffed themselves to death with... cheese?
string: 哦，不，这里太不对劲了。灵体们在低语一个…… 笑话？说所有人都撑死在…… 奶酪堆里？

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Harvesting
Other than that, there's not a great deal here to keep my interest, if I'm honest.
string: 说实话，除此之外，这儿没什么能让我感兴趣的了。

original: Prudence is a virtue, even if it's a boring one. Very well. The offer stands, should you find your courage.
string: 谨慎是种美德，尽管有点无趣。好吧，如果你鼓起勇气了，这个提议一直有效。

original: In the event of her death, I was to rebuild the Black Hand, and await the coming of the next Listener.
string: 倘若她遭遇不测，我需重建黑手，静待下一任聆听者的到来。

original: It is an honor to finally meet the Night Mother's chosen Listener.
string: 终于见到夜母选中的聆听者，实属荣幸。

original: Thank you, it is our great honor to serve the Night Mother's chosen Listener again.
string: 多谢你，能再次为夜母选中的聆听者效劳，是我们莫大的荣幸。

original:
Contract Kill a Sadras Noble Province: Morrowindl Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] House Sadras is the latest rising star in the complex house politics of Morrowind, but not everyone is enthusiastic about their ascendancy. This client wishes to see them humbled. Meet with the client and eliminate the Sadras Noble. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名萨德拉斯贵族 省份： 晨风 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 萨德拉斯家族是晨风错综复杂的家族政治中最新崛起的新星，然而并非所有人都乐见其上位。一位廷臣已亲自出手，举行了黑暗祭礼，决意要挫一挫他们的锐气。 与委托人接头，铲除萨德拉斯贵族. [pagebreak]

original: Bows do <mag>% more damage for <5> minutes.
It just doesn't seem very befitting of you. Well, the version of you that I have gotten to know and like anyway.
string: 这似乎不太适合你，至少不是我认识并喜欢的那个你。

original: How did the giants even get into this cave? Wow, those Largashbur Orcs must've done something really stupid to lure those creatures here.
string: 巨人是怎么进到这个洞穴里的？哇，拉加什布尔的兽人肯定干了什么蠢事，才把这些怪物引到这儿来的。

original: You shall be Silencer to Speaker Ald�ric.
string: 你将担任演说者奥德里克的沉默者。

original: Alright, but don't take all the fun for yourself.
string: 好吧，但别把好玩的事都自己占了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Valthar,

Why the holdup? Skyrim's underworld is full of opportunities we can use for our scheme. Get the necromancers near Lake Ilinalta and turn them into our tools, and do it fast before you waste this opening. Be careful, Stendarr's Blade is watching our moves. They will try to recruit someone against us soon.

Lirael

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

瓦塔尔，

为何迟迟没有行动？天际的地下世界满是可被我们利用的契机，助我们推进计划。去拉拢伊琳娜塔湖附近的死灵法师，将他们收为己用，务必抓紧时机，别浪费了这次机会。小心为上，斯坦达尔之刃正密切监视着我们的一举一动，他们很快就会招揽人手来对付我们。

莉瑞尔
</font>
单手武器新入教者（从金库支出 500 金币）
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 低风险

original:
Contract Kill an Anequina Warlord Province: Elsweyr Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 72 Hours

[pagebreak] When the Aldmeri Dominon regained control of Elsweyr they reestablished the historical khajiit kingdoms of Anequina and Pellitine, along with their ancient rivalry. This Pellitine aristocrat wants us to weaken Anequina by killing one of their strongest warlords. Meet with the client and eliminate the Anequina Warlord. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名阿纳奎那军阀 省份： 艾斯维尔 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:72 小时

[pagebreak] 当先祖神州重新掌控艾斯维尔后，他们恢复了虎人历史上的两大王国 —— 阿纳奎那与佩利廷，随之复苏的还有两国由来已久的世仇。这位佩利廷贵族希望我们除掉阿纳奎那最骁勇的军阀之一，以此削弱对手的实力。 与委托人接头，铲除阿纳奎那军阀. [pagebreak]
蕾拉娜会记住这段对话。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Consuming
Gods... This must be the coldest place in all of Skyrim. Maybe all of Tamriel.
string: 天啊…… 这肯定是天际最冷的地方，说不定是整个泰姆瑞尔最冷的。

original: You're essentially a master of restoration at this point. I can't teach you anything new.
string: 你现在基本上已经是恢复系大师了，我没什么新东西能教你了。

original: "N"? Who is N? Nefarious schemer? Nasty villain? Not-so-subtle mastermind? Weylin's note says everything and nothing!
string: “N”？N 是谁？邪恶的阴谋家？卑鄙的恶棍？藏得一点都不深的幕后黑手？韦林的纸条说了等于没说！

original: Another chance to prove my worth.
string: 又一个证明自己价值的机会。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">4th day of Excursion
Reykja's cautious nature has saved us repeatedly during our spelunking, my ancestors were determined to waylay any grave robber with deadly traps. 

The draugr can be heard scraping and moaning in their sarcophagi, some force has awakened them. We have not found the second dagger anywhere and we need it to unlock the final resting place. Now I fear that it is kept by one of those undead guardians.

</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">探险第四日
蕾克娅谨慎的性子，在我们的洞穴探索中屡次救了我们。我的先祖们当年布下了致命的陷阱，决意阻拦任何盗墓者。

能听到尸鬼在石棺中发出刮擦与呜咽的声响，某种力量唤醒了它们。我们始终没能找到第二把匕首，而要打开最终的安息之地，这把匕首是关键。如今我担心，它正握在某个不死守护者手中。
</font>

original: If only they knew that half of that verse was completely made up.
string: 要是他们知道那首诗有一半都是瞎编的就好了。

original: I'm sorry, I have not processed all the information we have gathered from Nchardak.
string: 抱歉，我还没处理完我们从钠查达克收集到的所有信息。

original:
Contract Kill a Bosmer Warden Province: Valenwood Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 72 Hours

[pagebreak] Bosmer Wardens are masters of nature magic and militant defenders of the Green. Their zealous defense of Tamriel's wildlands often brings them into conflict with anyone seeking to exploit woodland resources, such as our client. Meet with the client and eliminate the Bosmerl Warden. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名木精灵守望者 省份： 威木 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:72 小时

[pagebreak] 木精灵守望者是自然魔法的大师，也是森林的武装守护者。他们对泰姆瑞尔荒野的狂热捍卫，常使其与任何企图开发林地资源的人产生冲突，我们的雇主便是其中之一。 与委托人接头，铲除木精灵守望者. [pagebreak]

original: I'm not sure I like that Mercer fellow. Presiding over the darkest time in the Guild's history must have him highly strung.
string: 我不太喜欢那个墨瑟家伙，经历公会最黑暗的时期，他肯定绷得很紧。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Harrowing
Who do you think it was that taught that regicidal little schemer how to perform the Black Sacrament?
string: 你觉得是谁教那个弑君的小阴谋家举行黑暗祭礼的？

original: If I stand on the tips of my toes, will you go away!?
string: 我踮起脚尖，你会走开吗？！

original: Bloody Falmer. You reek of Chaurus feces!
string: 该死的伐莫，你身上全是巢蚁的粪便味！

original: So, the 7000 steps it is. Although it sounds incredibly daunting and extremely tiring, I'm sure it will be worth it once we get to the top.
string: 那么，要走七千级台阶了。虽然听着就让人发怵，还特别累，但我相信到了顶上肯定值得。

original: Damage taken from animals is reduced by 5%.
Apostle Renos has a curious mind. He always looked for ways to improve the factotums.
string: 雷诺斯使徒有着强烈的好奇心。他总在寻找改进构装体的方法。

original:
Contract Kill a Pellitine Aristocrat Province: Elsweyr Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] When the Aldmeri Dominon regained control of Elsweyr they reestablished the historical khajiit kingdoms of Anequina and Pellitine, along with their ancient rivalry. This Anequina warlord wants us to weaken Pellitine by killing one of their wealthiest aristocrats. Meet with the client and eliminate the Pellitine Aristocrat. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名佩利廷贵族 省份： 艾斯维尔 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 当先祖神州重新掌控艾斯维尔后，他们恢复了虎人历史上的两大王国 —— 阿纳奎那与佩利廷，随之复苏的还有两国绵延已久的世仇。这位阿纳奎那军阀希望我们除掉佩利廷最富有的贵族之一，以此削弱对手的实力。 与委托人接头，铲除佩利廷贵族. [pagebreak]

original: I've successfully delivered Aunt Gormli's forgery to her nephew and can now collect my reward.
string: 我成功把戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书交给了她的侄子，现在可以去领赏了。

original: I'm not sure I even want to be Arch-Mage.
string: 我甚至不确定自己想不想当首席法师。

original: By the spirits, that Nord boy can't make good with his family, and can't even stand up to some elf apprentice! He should just go home, I say.
string: 天啊，那个诺德小子跟家人处不好，连个精灵学徒都不敢反抗！我说他还不如回家去。

original: Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original: Despite everything, you still chase the Emperor. I've always admired your determination... but I never expected it to lead you here.
string: 尽管历经种种，你仍在追杀皇帝。我一直很钦佩你的决心…… 但从没想过它会把你引到这里。

original: When I started working on the forge again, it sparked something in me that I've been missing for a long time.
string: 重新拿起锻造锤后，我找回了久违的感觉。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Harrowing
Tell the factotum that the apostle might be in Nchardak
string: 告诉构装体使徒可能在钠查达克

original: My apostle was... Well... Is a Tarnished.
string: 我的使徒…… 嗯…… 曾是一名 “黯痕者”。

original: You're not planning to use me as bait, are you?
string: 你不会打算拿我当诱饵吧？

original: Some of my ancestors may rest in these crypts. I should be more respectful here... But I'll be sure to put their relics to good use.
string: 我的一些祖先或许就长眠在这些墓穴里。我本该在这里更恭敬些…… 但我一定会好好利用他们的遗物。

original: When you say... Pleasant things to me. Flirtatious things. Do you mean them?
string: 你跟我说那些…… 好听的话，调情的话，是认真的吗？

original: Aside from how you killed an ancient vampire king of Skyrim, that is.
string: 当然，你杀死天际古老吸血鬼王这事也除外。

original: So it's a simple choice when it comes to that. For me, at least.
string: 所以选择很简单，至少对我来说是这样。

original:
- Whiterun Family -

Whiterun Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWhiterun>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWhiterun>
Whiterun Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepWhiterun> Gold
string:
- 白漫城家族 -

白漫城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWhiterun>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWhiterun>

白漫城维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepWhiterun> 金币

original: It appears that Apostle Renos wanted us to remain disconnected from the main system of the Clockwork City.
string: 看来雷诺斯使徒希望我们与发条城的主系统断开连接。

original: Before we got separated, we said we'd travel together when I've come of age. You know, explore the world and help those in need.
string: 我们分开前说过，等我成年就一起去旅行，去探索世界，帮助那些有需要的人。

original: Show me and I'll see what I can do.
string: 做给我看看，我就知道我能帮上什么忙了。

original: Extortion. I know it well. Plenty of people tried to convince my father to part with his money. He burned them alive, of course.
string: 敲诈勒索，我可太了解了。不少人想说服我父亲掏钱，当然，他把那些人都活活烧死了。

original: I won't let the end happen.
Ask the right one, and they just might lend you theirs. Ask the wrong one, and...ohp. Nevermind! Good luck!
string: 找对人了，他们或许会把戒指借你。找错人了，那…… 哎呀，当我没说！祝你好运！

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Another dead drop in Riften, a cheap satchel behind Haelga's Bunkhouse. Make sure no one sees you. It's enchanted for your eyes only, but Riften's full of watchful types, stay sharp.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

裂谷城又设了一处新的秘密交接点，就在哈尔嘉工棚后方的一个劣质背包里。切记不要被任何人发现。这个背包被施了魔法，仅有你能看见其中物品，但裂谷城到处都是耳目众多之徒，你务必保持警惕。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: You can do better than that!
For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range take <mag> points of damage per second.
string: 近身的敌人每秒受到<mag>点伤害，持续<dur>秒。

original: You denied the monster his last wish. Good riddance. May he also be denied in his afterlife... Let's go. I need some air.
string: 你拒绝了那个怪物的最后请求，干得好。愿他死后也不得安宁…… 我们走吧，我需要透透气。

original: Sometimes it worked just fine, like Proctor Sovor Saryoni, who continued living like a factotum.
string: 有时候效果很好，比如索沃尔・萨里奥尼监事，他以构装体的形态继续活着。

original: Don�t worry. I will be respectful here.
string: 别担心，我会在这里保持敬意的。

original: Return to Nelosi tomorrow for your new <Alias=NameHolderForRobe02>
string: 次日返回内洛西处领取新的 <Alias=NameHolderForRobe02>

original: You mean to tell me that there were once dwarves running around this place? Not to disrespect their home, but... Would you want to live here?
string: 你是说，以前有矮人在这儿生活？我不是想冒犯他们的家园，但是…… 你愿意住在这儿吗？

original: I can't believe you were once elves.
string: 真不敢相信你们曾经是精灵。

original: I never tire of hearing that.
I'm not sure this is necessarily the kindest thing we could be doing.
string: 我不确定我们做的这事有多仁慈。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

My patience is wearing thin. I've offered good gold to buy your silence and your spells for life. But you horde your secrets like a dragon. I want to know why Lirael runs your ragged group. What trouble is she planning in Skyrim's heart, and how does it threaten my hold on Riften?

The Dark Brotherhood owes me, and the Thieves Guild fears my name. They'll cut the truth from you if I say. Deliver what I want to my manor by the new moon, or face what comes.

Maven Black-Briar

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

我的耐心已经耗尽了。我曾开出重金，想换你一辈子守口如瓶，还能为你提供永续的法术支持。可你却像巨龙护宝一般，死守着自己的秘密。我要知道，莉瑞尔凭什么掌控你这伙乌合之众。她打算在天际的腹地掀起什么风浪，又会如何威胁我对裂谷城的掌控？

黑暗兄弟会欠我人情，盗贼公会也对我的名号闻风丧胆。只要我一句话，他们就会逼你吐出真相。在下个新月之前，把我要的东西送到我的庄园，否则就等着自食恶果吧。

玛雯・黑棘

</font>

original: You would never expect to find a place so green buried within one of Skyrim's snowy mountains.
string: 谁能想到天际的雪山里，藏着这么一片绿意盎然的地方。
艾斯维尔契约 | 中等风险

original: You call this combat? I call this sport!
string: 你管这叫战斗？我看这顶多算消遣！
我明白了。我…… 我理解。

original: It's wards that are the problem, particularly strong ones. They make it awfully difficult for me to break through.
string: 结界才是麻烦，尤其是强力结界，我很难突破。
斯普里乌斯・塞克斯图斯船长

original: I never knew much about the Akaviri, except the Cloudruler Temple down in Cyrodiil. They seem to be a much different people than us.
string: 我对阿卡维里人了解不多，只知道赛瑞迪尔的云顶神殿。他们看起来和我们截然不同。
天际契约：杀死一位乞丐（低风险）

original: This place is so cursed, it's almost charming.
string: 这地方邪气得都有点可爱了。

original: Not sure I'll follow you to the Thalmor Embassy. Might stand out a bit from all those fancy royal-types.
string: 我可不确定要不要跟你去梭默大使馆，在那群光鲜的贵族中间，我肯定特别扎眼。

original: Death to the Empire, I suppose!
Positives, I'm certain your strength and speed will increase. You'll likely also grow fur in some unique places.
string: 好处嘛，我肯定你的力量和速度都会提升，说不定还会在一些特别的地方长毛。

original: Hmph. With respect, Listener, you weren't there. Alisanne gave her life willingly to defend the Night Mother.
string: 哼。恕我直言，聆听者，你当时不在场。爱丽珊妮是心甘情愿为保卫夜母献出生命的。

original: I'd be delighted if you could do that slightly closer to my ear.
string: 如果你能凑到我耳边说，我会更开心的。

original: Maybe it started as a fantasy, but I realized not all fantasies are out of reach. I could become the hero.
string: 也许一开始这只是幻想，但我意识到并非所有幻想都遥不可及。我也能成为英雄。

original: I've read about Whiterun. A central trading hub allegedly. Though I will say, it doesn't look... Large enough. Don't tell the Jarl I said that.
string: 我读过关于白漫城的记载，据说是什么中央贸易中心。不过说实话，它看起来…… 没那么大。别告诉领主是我说的。

original: It was rash and immature of us.
string: 我们当时太鲁莽幼稚了。

original: Now I understand why my father insisted I have a protector.
string: 现在我总算明白父亲为什么坚持要我找个保护者了。

original: Saarthal. Can't say I've ever heard of it, but Nordic history doesn't interest me a great deal.
string: 萨瑟尔城？我可说不上听过这地方，不过诺德的历史我本来也没多大兴趣。

original: How long do I have to be with you before your business becomes mine?
string: 我得跟你多久，你的事才会变成我的事？

original: Why, he's standing right before me... The prince in distress.
string: 哎呀，受难的王子就站在我面前呢……

original: Stupid Imperial, wandering alone on the roads of Skyrim... If not us, then it would've been bandits or sabre cats either way.
string: 愚蠢的帝国人，竟敢独自在天际的路上游荡…… 就算不是我们，山贼或剑齿虎也会找上他。

original: Glad to hear it. Good bye.
string: 很高兴听到这个消息，再见。

original: The Windhelm Sanctuary is not available right now.
string: 风舵城圣所目前暂未开放。

original: Well, you saved me, so I think you're pretty great. Other than that... I'm still deciding.
string: 不过你救了我，所以我觉得你挺厉害的。除此之外…… 我还在观望。

original: Join Ulfric's merry band of idiots and butchers if you must. I will be going home. Return to the Reach under his banner, and I'll kill you myself!
string: 你要是非要加入乌弗瑞克那群白痴屠夫的队伍，那就去吧。我要回家了。要是你打着他的旗号回到边塞，我会亲手杀了你！

original: Bleeds target <6> points. Chance to disarm.
string: 使目标流血，造成 6 点持续伤害，有几率缴械目标。

original: Well, there are the spirits of nature, then there are the ones you call the Daedra. Which one do you want to hear about?
string: 嗯，有自然之灵，也有你们所说的魔族。你想了解哪一种？

original: Have you ever tasted soup made with fabricant fish? I do not eat, but I was told that it tastes quite exquisite!
string: 你尝过构装鱼做的汤吗？我不用吃东西，但有人说那味道相当鲜美！

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade salutes your cunning and unyielding guile. You slipped into Riften's festering heart, navigated the Thieves Guild's labyrinth of deceit, and exposed the Daedric artifact they'd snatched, a prize whose theft courted the Prince's apocalyptic rage, ready to drown the city in curses and turn thieves into monsters before the eyes of the innocent. By restoring it to its domain, you quelled that brewing storm, sparing Tamriel from a Daedric backlash that would have rippled far beyond the Ratway's walls. Now, with your foothold among those rogues, we gain priceless access: pilfered secrets from Jarl's vaults, ears in black market dealings, and leverage over the shadows that bind Riften.

Your triumph echoes through our network. A well-earned reward accompanies this note. Press on, guarding Tamriel with the sharp wits you've honed in the dark.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之剑为你的机智与过人城府致敬。你潜入裂谷城那腐坏的核心地带，在盗贼公会层层叠叠的骗局迷阵中周旋，还揭露了他们盗取的魔族神器 —— 这件宝物的失窃本会引来魔神毁天灭地的怒火，让整座城市被诅咒吞噬，更会在无辜者眼前将盗贼们扭曲成怪物。你将神器归还原主，平息了这场一触即发的风暴，让泰姆瑞尔免遭魔族的反噬 —— 那股力量本会冲破鼠道的围墙，造成更深远的浩劫。如今你在这群亡命之徒中站稳脚跟，为我们赢得了无可估量的助力：能获取领主宝库中被盗的机密，能监听黑市交易的风吹草动，更能牵制住束缚裂谷城的暗影势力。

你的这场胜利在我们的情报网中传开了。随信附上这份当之无愧的奖赏。继续前行吧，用你在黑暗中磨砺出的敏锐头脑守护泰姆瑞尔。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

[pagebreak]

Elemental Magic Frost The Legacy of Jarl Haifroda by Braga the Old

[pagebreak]

arl Haifroda bound her fate to the ice wraiths of Serpentstone Isle, and so it is just and proper that she and all her thanes lie buried there. I have walked her cold halls and read of her history in the tomes stored with her bones. In other records of old, it is only mentioned that she was a mighty warrior who fought the Akaviri with her loyal captains, Hrimnir and Iskald, by her side, never yielding to their onslaught. But that account seeks to make her a hero to be worshipped, a potent symbol to unite the Northmen against the foreign threat. The true Haifroda was, in the end, a curse upon her people. She was a great leader, both splendid and wise in her decrees. And like all who grasp much power, she was corrupted and misled by it. A mage of some renown, Haifroda learned to summon ice wraiths as her ilk could summon the Daedra from Oblivion. But her link to a hidden world of frost and forever-winter slowly drove her mad. She began to see any warmth around her as a threat, and started slaying those she once fought to protect. A bitter war followed - more costly by far than the Akaviri invasion ever was. I will not touch her tokens for the summoning rites, nor her Crown of Winter's Woe. For her tale is a cautionary one, and the wise must learn from the mistakes of fools.
string:
[pagebreak]

元素魔法 寒霜 海弗罗达领主的遗祸 作者 老布拉加

[pagebreak]

海弗罗达领主将自身命运与蛇石岛的冰灵绑定，故而她与麾下所有领主最终长眠于此，也算恰如其分。 我曾踏入她那冰冷的殿堂，在与她骸骨相伴的典籍中，翻阅着她的过往。在其他古老记载里，只提及她是一位勇猛的战士，与忠心的队长赫里姆尼尔和伊斯卡尔德并肩对抗阿卡维尔入侵者，从未向其猛攻屈服。但这样的记述，不过是将她塑造成受万人敬仰的英雄，化作凝聚北方人民抵御外侮的有力象征。 而真实的海弗罗达，终究成了她子民的祸根。她曾是卓越的领袖，颁布的政令英明而辉煌。可正如所有手握重权之人，她也被权力腐蚀、蒙蔽了心智。作为小有名气的法师，海弗罗达学会了召唤冰灵，就像她的同类能从湮灭领域召唤迪德拉一般。 但她与那个隐匿的寒霜永冬之界的联结，渐渐令她陷入疯狂。她开始将周遭一切温暖视作威胁，转而向那些她曾誓死守护的人挥起屠刀。 一场惨烈的战争随之爆发 —— 其代价远比阿卡维尔的入侵更为沉重。 我绝不会触碰她用于召唤仪式的信物，亦不会染指她那顶冬怨王冠。只因她的故事是一记警钟，明智之人必须从愚者的过错中汲取教训。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>

                             To the Watch Commanders Along the Coast,

   Weve tolerated enough.
These pirates hit Riften, struck Dawnstar, and now theyre circling our western waters. Theyre not here to trade; theyre here to bleed us dry.

Theyve made landfall near our Solitude boarders and some have been caught hiding here in the city, hiding behind coin and false titles.

Im assembling a strike force. Well be moving out soon to sweep the coastline and drive them out; or put them in the ground. No more delays. No more burned docks and dead fishermen.

Tell your men to stay alert. If you see sails out at sea, that ship is to be stopped for questioning. Crews that wont meet your eyes � send word fast, or cut them down.

 This ends soon.

- Captain of the Guard
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>

                             致沿海各守卫指挥官：
我们已经忍无可忍。

这群海盗洗劫了裂谷城，袭击了晨星城，如今又在我们的西部海域盘旋。他们并非为贸易而来，而是要将我们榨干殆尽。

他们已在独孤城边境附近登陆，甚至有人用金钱和虚假身份为掩护，潜藏在城内。

我正集结一支突击部队，不日便将出兵扫荡海岸线 —— 要么将他们驱逐，要么让他们埋骨于此。绝不再拖延，绝不容许码头再遭焚毁、渔民再遭残害。

令你部士兵保持高度警惕。若发现海上有船只帆影，务必拦下盘查；对那些眼神躲闪、不敢直视的船员，要么火速传信，要么当场格杀。

这场祸乱，很快便会终结。

—— 卫队长

original:
[pagebreak]

Musings on the Dragonborn by Garrick Kalin Teller of Tales Humble Seeker Knowledge

[pagebreak]

ragonborn. A title that has become a whisper, hollow and weightless, rattling across the generations like dry bones in a forgotten crypt. I have spent sleepless nights poring over The Book of the Dragonborn, a tome written with reverence, yes, but also with the desperation of one who wishes to believe that divinity can be charted like bloodlines. That Akatosh, in his infinity, might be understood. The scholar seeks not only understanding, but the comfort that understanding brings. Alessia, Reman, Tiber Septim; names gilded in the tapestry of prophecy and myth. Yet the scholar even admits the threads of that tapestry begin to fray under scrutiny. No lineage unbroken. No certainty of descent. The Dragonborn is not born or forged by will, but by the whim of a god whose reasons remain his own. Therefore Divinity is not inherited. It is not crowned, or kept. It is chosen. What haunts me is not the mystery, but the implication. If being Dragonborn is a divine choice, then what are the rest of us? Vessels waiting to be filled? Are we no more than clay, shaped and reshaped by hands we cannot feel? There is something cruel in the way history wraps its chosen ones in light, while the rest are left in the shadows they leave behind. And now, in this age of crumbling thrones and dead gods, they speak of a Last Dragonborn. If the Wheel turns upon the back of one soul alone, may the gods have mercy on it. The rest of us are already forgotten.
string:
[pagebreak]

龙裔随想 作者 加里克・卡林 故事讲述者 求知的谦卑探索者

[pagebreak]

龙裔。 这一头衔已成低语，空洞而无重，如被遗忘墓穴中的枯骨，在岁月里簌簌作响。 我曾彻夜不眠研读《龙裔之书》，这部著作虽满含崇敬，却也透着书写者的执念 —— 他渴望相信神性如血脉般可被梳理，渴望参透无限的阿卡托什。学者追寻的不只是真相，更是真相带来的慰藉。 阿莱西亚、雷曼、泰伯・赛普汀，这些名字在预言与神话的织锦中熠熠生辉。可即便是学者也不得不承认，这织锦的纹路，在细究之下已开始磨损。 没有不曾中断的血脉，没有确凿无疑的传承。龙裔并非因出身而生，亦非由意志铸就，而是源于一位神祇的心血来潮，其缘由始终不为人知。 由此观之，神性无法继承，无法被加冕，亦无法被占有。它只关乎选择。 令我心神不宁的并非这谜团本身，而是其背后的隐喻。倘若成为龙裔是神的抉择，那我们其余人又算什么？是待填的容器吗？我们莫非只是泥土，被无形的手反复揉捏塑造？ 历史总以光芒包裹其选中者，却将其余人弃于他们身后的阴影里，这实在太过残酷。 而如今，在这王座倾颓、众神陨落的时代，人们开始谈论 “末代龙裔”。 若世界的转轮仅靠独一的灵魂推动，愿众神对其施以怜悯。至于我们其余人，早已被遗忘。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
The wind here is different. Thin, somehow... and sharp, I feel brittle. I miss the salt of Sheogorad and I still dream of Ashmelech. Sometimes I smell the Sea of Ghosts, or hear Dhaunayne's voice, echoing in my ear.

I tell myself the Aundae prevailed, I saw no piles of dust as I fled, only the glint of silver bolts as they stung my flesh. Yet I cannot turn homeward. I walk a strange land now, cold and evergreen. The journey has changed me. I feel hollow, draped in the rags that were once extravagant finery.
[pagebreak]
Tonight I found a broken tower, and beneath it a cave that smells of dry earth. It will serve until I decide what to do.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
这里的风很不一样。不知怎的，它稀薄又凛冽，让我感觉自己脆弱得不堪一击。我想念希奥戈拉德的咸腥气息，也总梦见阿什梅莱克。有时，我仿佛能闻到幽灵之海的味道，或是听见道娜因的声音在耳边回响。

我告诉自己，恩戴尔氏族赢了 —— 逃亡途中，我并未见到成堆的灰烬，只有银质弩箭的寒光刺进我的身体。可我终究不敢回头。如今我行走在一片陌生的土地上，这里寒冷且常青。这场旅途改变了我，我觉得自己内心空洞，身上披着的破布，曾是华丽无比的锦衣。
[pagebreak]
今夜，我发现了一座残破的塔楼，塔楼之下有个洞穴，满是干土的气息。在我想好下一步该怎么走前，这里姑且能当作容身之所。
</font>

string: 我接到消息，佛克瑞斯西北方向的树林附近出现了诡异的黑暗异象。当地人谈及一个燃烧的红色身影，还有一棵巨大的行走之树。佛克瑞斯的猎人与守卫已无故失踪。我得去调查一番，终结潜藏在那里的黑暗力量。如今我发现了隐秘隧道，这隧道应该能带我找到魔人领主为召唤鲜血领主所举行的仪式！

original: Oh, and I'll do it flawlessly, I'm sure! I can't wait to advise on things like sword technique and... Hitting people with shields.
string: 哦，而且我肯定会做得天衣无缝！我已经等不及要给人提些剑术技巧、用盾牌打人之类的建议了。

original: If target dies within <mag> seconds, fills a soul gem.
string: 若目标在<mag>秒内死亡，即填充一颗灵魂石

original: Off to write another story, I hope?
string: 希望是去写下另一段故事？

original: Vampiric Steel War Axe of Gleaning
All the sadness, it's still here!
If you wish to die, then so be it!
I should return tomorrow for my reward
string: 我该明天再来领取报酬

original: I shall continue as the Factotum.
string: 我还是继续做构装体吧。

original: When one of us saw something, we'd coil back and wait for dusk. Then two would rush the center, drawing backs outward.
string: 只要有人发现目标，我们就先退回来，等到黄昏再行动。两人直冲中路吸引火力，其他人从两翼包抄。

original:
Contract Kill an Errant Greybeard Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] Not everyone who studies with the Greybeards embraces their quiet and solemn lifestyle. This errant brother has chosen to leave High Hrothgar and abuse his knowledge of the voice for personal gain, and our client wishes to see him put down. Meet with the client and eliminate the Errant Greybeard. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名流浪灰胡子 省份： 天际 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 并非所有跟随灰胡子修行的人都能接受他们宁静而肃穆的生活方式。这位叛离的同门选择离开高吼峰，滥用自己掌握的龙吼之力为己谋利，而我们的雇主决意要将其铲除。 与委托人接头，铲除流浪灰胡子. [pagebreak]

original: Wherever we go, however far we've separated... We shall always come back to each other.
string: 无论我们去往何方，相隔多远…… 我们总会回到彼此身边。

original: By the Schemer's chains, souls are bound to serve you.
string: 以阴谋家的锁链之名，灵魂都受你束缚，听你差遣。

original: The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Bedtime Story
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：床边故事

original: A whole tribe, cursed. Can you feel it? A spirit is very, very angry at this patch of dirt. It almost feels like home.
string: 一整个部落都被诅咒了，你能感觉到吗？有个灵体对这片土地怒不可遏，这感觉倒有点像家了。

original: This is why we never trust the Thalmor! Oblivion above, we should've just killed him on sight!
string: 这就是我们从不相信梭默的原因！天哪，我们当初就该一见面就杀了他！

original:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="17">

You kept our bellies warm
when the sky froze over.
When the wind howled,
your mead howled louder.




We'll raise a tankard for you
in every hold we dock,
and pour the first draught 
to the waves.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwritingFont" size="17">

当苍穹冰封万里，
是你让我们腹中有暖。
当狂风怒号之时，
你的蜜酒，比风更烈。


我们会在每一处停靠的领地，
为你高举酒樽，
将第一口佳酿，
倾入波涛之中。
</font>

original: Is my custom armor ready, Nelosi?
string: 内洛西，我定制的盔甲做好了吗？
赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一匹马（低风险）

original:
Contract Kill an An-Xileel Warden Province: Black Marsh Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 72 Hours

[pagebreak] Not all argonians support the An-Xileel, some of the lesser clans have begun conspiring against them by targeting the An-Xileel Wardens that enforce the Archwarden's control over Black Marsh. Meet with the client and eliminate the An-Xileel Warden. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一位安-兹利尔守望者 省份： 黑沼泽 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:72 小时

[pagebreak] 并非所有亚龙人都支持安-兹利尔组织，一些势力较弱的部族已开始策划反抗行动，将目标对准了那些为守望者执行职权、掌控黑沼泽的安-兹利尔守望者。 与委托人接头，铲除安-兹利尔守望者. [pagebreak]

original: You said your family has difficulty dying.
string: 你说过你的家族很难死去。

original: You should know that I support the Empire. It is my belief that Skyrim needs the Empire as much as the Empire need Skyrim.
string: 你该知道我支持帝国。我相信天际需要帝国，就像帝国需要天际一样。

original: If there's one thing to learn from my story, it's to never doubt the Night Mother.
string: 我的经历告诉我们一件事：永远不要怀疑夜母。

original: Ugh! Why can't it ever be easy!?
string: 呃！为什么就不能简单点呢？！
斯坦达尔之剑 - 设置

original: Funny. When I was a girl, I've always wanted to be a chivalrous knight that saves the world. Throw me a bandit raid, and I would crush it.
string: 说来可笑。小时候，我一直想成为一名拯救世界的侠义骑士。要是遇上强盗劫掠，我肯定能把他们打垮。

original: Find the Master Dwemer Explorer's Backpack
string: 找到锻莫探索大师的背包

original: Smithing is <mag>% more effective for <5> minutes.
string: 锻造提升<mag>%，持续 <5> 分钟。

original: Dragon souls are always very loud. Give me a heads up before you go about killing a dragon, alright?
string: 龙魂总是吵得很，你屠龙之前先跟我说一声，好吗？

original:
- Sanctuaries -
Solitude Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepSolitude> Gold
Solitude Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsSolitude>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapSolitude>

Markarth Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepMarkarth> Gold
Markarth Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsMarkarth>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapMarkarth>

Whiterun Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepWhiterun> Gold
Whiterun Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWhiterun>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWhiterun>

Windhelm Upkeep: <Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepWindhelm> Gold
Windhelm Members: <Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWindhelm>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWindhelm>
string:
- 圣所 -
独孤城维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepSolitude>金币

独孤城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsSolitude>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapSolitude>

马卡斯城维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepMarkarth>金币

马卡斯城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsMarkarth>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapMarkarth>

白漫城维护费用：<Global=MOD_Global_UpkeepWhiterun>金币

白漫城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWhiterun>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWhiterun>

风舵城成员数：<Global=MOD_Global_UnitsWindhelm>/<Global=MOD_Global_UnitCapWindhelm>

original: The bandits only exist to make the world a worse place. I say we make it better.
string: 强盗的存在只会让世界变得更糟。我说，我们该让世界变得更好。

original: I have found my dead-drop, and now can continue my mission.
string: 我找到了情报交接点，如今可以继续执行任务了。

original: The crown grants you the power to manifest one of four items using the magic powder you have obtained. After your selection has been made, you will no longer be able to use the crown's abilities. You must choose wisely, for you will not be able to change your mind
string: 这顶王冠能让你借助已获得的魔法粉末，显化出四件物品中的一件。一旦做出选择，你便无法再使用王冠的能力。你必须慎重抉择，因为决定后无法更改。

original:
Contract Kill a Bard Province: High Rock Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] This cantankerous bard has been slandering the lords and ladies of his realm with libelous melodies at their local tavern. One of them has finally had enough and decided to perform the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Bard. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名吟游诗人 省份： 落锤 难度： 高风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 这位乖戾的游吟诗人，总在当地酒馆里用满是诽谤的旋律诋毁王国的贵族男女。终于有位贵族忍无可忍，决意举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除吟游诗人. [pagebreak]

original: Did that make you feel good!?
One mistake doesn't undo all the good it does!
string: 一次失误抹杀不了它做的所有好事！

original: Find anyone to seal my summons?
string: 找到能给我的征召令盖章的人了吗？

original: Then we pointed him to the nearby river to finish his... business, when it was almost time the village wives would go wash their laundry.
string: 然后我们指给他附近的河，让他去解决……“私事”，那会儿正好是村里的妇女要去洗衣服的时间。

original: We need to keep Skyrim for the Nords.
string: 我们要把天际留给诺德人。

original: "Be careful little mortal, of what you do not know. You asked for something to make your knowledge grow."
string: “小心点吧渺小的凡人，对你未知的事物要谨慎。你渴求增长见识，便会得到相应的馈赠。”

original: Tell me of the Altmer soldiers.
string: 跟我说说高等精灵士兵的事。

original: My pa was a warrior, but not one bit like those Forsworn. He was a protector, a healer, and the best hunter of the Reach.
string: 我父亲是名战士，却和那些弃誓者截然不同。他是守护者，是医者，也是边塞最厉害的猎人。

original: Read the plaque left by the apostle
My travels can be quite dangerous.
string: 我的旅途可能充满危险。

original: Considering the wilderness surrounding it, you'd think Falkreath would build a more secure wall.
string: 想想周围的荒野，佛克瑞斯真该把城墙建得更牢固点。

original: The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Terror of Tamriel
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：泰姆瑞尔之惧

original: Why don't you come over here and try to take my coin!?
string: 有本事过来抢我的钱啊？！

original: You shouldn't expect it all. You obviously don't know who you're speaking to.
string: 你别太得寸进尺了。你显然不知道自己在跟谁说话。

original: You're the Queen of Crows's champion... If my clan were still alive, you'd have a claim to the chief's throne! Well, you're my chief either way...
string: 你是渡鸦女王的勇士…… 要是我的氏族还在，你都有资格争夺酋长之位了！不过不管怎样，你都是我的酋长……

original: I wonder if Whiterun's dragon trap would hold Odahviing. It hasn't been used in ages, and I doubt they kept it oiled.
string: 我不知道白漫的龙陷阱能不能困住奥达维因。它多年未用，我怀疑根本没人保养。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade thanks your work. It's telling even Maven Black-Briar doesn't know Lirael's plans, and if her agent's note is right, no one does. I can't crack that book without the cipher. Keep hunting; something will turn up.

For your deft work, take Keyshadow, a silver amulet once worn by a Blade who served during the Great War. Its enchantment bypasses novice and apprentice locks, easing their tumblers open without a pick's snap, perfect for stealing secrets from under watchful eyes. Wear it, and no simple lock will bar your path.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃为你的工作表示感谢。这一点很能说明问题 —— 即便是玛雯・黑棘，也对莉瑞尔的计划一无所知；而倘若她手下特工的密信属实，那么此事便无人知晓。没有密码本，我根本无法破解那本书的内容。继续追查吧，总会有线索浮现的。

为酬谢你精湛的行动，现将影钥护符赠予你。这枚银质护符曾由一位在大战期间效力的刀锋战士佩戴，其附魔能直接解开新手与学徒级别的锁具，无需撬锁器便能让锁芯轻松转动，最适合在旁人的严密监视下窃取秘密。戴上它，任何简易的锁都无法阻挡你的脚步。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨卫 敬上

</font>

original: You there... Are you a hunter?
Emits a golden light that lasts indefinitely.

[pagebreak]

Covenant of the Oathblades Volume II: The Battle of Stros M'kai authored by Iskandar the Chronicler

[pagebreak]

lthough they were eager to bring glory to the Empire, none of them could forsee the bloodshed they would bring to Stros M'kai. The Oathblades were sent in to assassinate key figures of the ruling class, known as the Crowns, who stoked the fires of rebellion from inside their gilded mansions. As the battle raged on, the Oathblades waged war in the shadows, silencing dissent with ruthless efficiency. It was then that the great Nafaalilargus descended from the sky, engulfing the city and its people in smoke and fire. As flames rained down from above, Stros M'Kai was now conquered, and at the mercy of Imperial rule.
string:
[pagebreak]

誓约之刃盟约 第二卷： 斯图尔斯·迈凯之战 作者 史官伊斯坎达尔

[pagebreak]

尽管他们一心要为帝国挣得荣光，却无人能预见自己将为斯图尔斯·迈凯带来何等血光之灾。 誓约之刃被派往此地，刺杀统治阶级皇冠派的核心人物 —— 这群人正躲在镀金宅邸中煽风点火，挑起叛乱。 战火愈演愈烈之际，誓约之刃于暗影中展开攻势，以冷酷高效的手段让异见者噤声。 就在此时，伟大的纳法利尔古斯自天而降，将整座城市与民众笼罩在烟火之中。 当烈焰如雨点般从天倾泻，斯图尔斯·迈凯终被征服，任由帝国铁蹄宰制。

original: Are you a vampire? I would love to study your physiology. Maybe we could create a new way for automatons to recharge power, with mechanical fangs!
string: 你是吸血鬼吗？我很想研究你的生理结构。或许我们能找到新的方式，让自动机械用机械尖牙来充电！
锻造区（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: It's mostly my uncles and their sons. Every few months, one of them makes an attempt to take leadership of the family business from my father.
string: 主要是我的叔叔们和他们的儿子，每隔几个月，就有人想从我父亲手里夺走家族生意的掌控权。
赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位厨师（低风险）

original: Really? Good... Very good. You've avenged my family.
string: 真的？太好了…… 非常好。你为我的家人报仇了。

original: If the Forsworn would only stop their infighting for a moment, they could form an alliance and reclaim our lands.
string: 要是弃誓者能停止内斗，他们就能结盟夺回我们的土地了。

original: It would be easy for me to criticise the crime, the people, the stinking sewer, or the corruption, but...
string: 我本可以轻易批评这儿的犯罪、居民、臭烘烘的下水道或者腐败，但……
奥瓦尔・萨夫斯特伦的遗骸

original: I will remain here for the time being.
Investigate the area for a way to enter the Barrow
string: 调查该区域，寻找进入古墓的方法

original: It's time, isn't it? You'll face the World-Eater in the realm of Nord dead... without me.
string: 时候到了，对吧？你要去诺德的亡者领域面对世界吞噬者了…… 却不带我一起。

original:
Excavation 02: Kagrumez

Unfortunately, the water has infiltrated the boilers inside the laboratory. It is impossible to run any experiment without ruining my equipment, and possibly the factotums. I will head to Kagrumez, I heard some stories about machines and gems. I am more than intrigued, but time is running out.
string:
发掘记录 02：卡谷梅兹

不幸的是，渗水侵入了实验室内部的锅炉。如今若要开展实验，定会损毁我的设备，甚至可能殃及构装侍从，实在行不通。我打算前往卡谷梅兹，此前听闻此地流传着关于机械与宝石的传说。这让我满怀好奇，只是时间已然所剩无几。

original: I could fill a library with all the things I've witnessed. What would you like to know?
string: 我所见所闻的事，足以填满一座图书馆。你想知道些什么？

original: I'm keeping my eye on her.
I haven't been here in years. They used to tell us Reach-kids this place was haunted. Probably just didn't want us getting killed.
string: 我好几年没来过这儿了，小时候大人们总说这地方闹鬼，或许只是不想让我们跑来送命罢了。

original: I was captured... They killed my family, because of me... It's my fault. All of this is because of me.
string: 我被抓了…… 他们因为我杀了我的家人，都是我的错，这一切都是因为我。

original: I can't hear the spirits here. Let's not linger for too long, alright?
string: 我在这里听不到灵体的声音，我们别久留，好吗？

original: Aw. And you'd do that without a drink in hand? Fine. To our story, both the past and the untold!
string: 哇。你打算空着手就祝酒吗？好吧。为我们的故事干杯，无论是过往的，还是尚未书写的！
行吧，聆听者，如果你坚持的话。

original: Return to Jolgeirr Barrow and discover what lies within
string: 返回约基尔古坟，发现里面的秘密

original: It wasn't likely to be any of the others. I fear they lack the leadership skills required, unlike yourself.
string: 其他人本来也没什么希望，恐怕他们都缺乏必要的领导才能，不像你。
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 低风险

original: I just saw someone's pocket being picked. Think the guard saw it too... Just watch yourself.
string: 我刚看到有人被偷了钱包，不知道守卫看到没…… 你自己小心点。

original: Enough talk, I'm ready to begin.
string: 别多说了，我准备好开始了。

original: Deliver the documents to a dead-drop
string: 将文件送到秘密投放点

original: A favor, eh? That's a word as wide as the sea. Out with it then. I'm listening.
string: “帮忙？呵，这词的门道可多了。有话直说，我听着呢。”
法术书: 召唤魔人士官

original: Thank you for the amplifier. It will be very useful.
string: 谢谢你的增幅器，它会非常有用。

original: AUGH! My head. The spirits here. They're screaming, crying, begging - all at once! By Hircine, why are there even so many! Just stay calm...
string: 啊！我的头好疼。这里的灵体，他们在尖叫、哭泣、哀求，全都混在一起！以海尔辛之名，怎么会有这么多灵体！冷静点……

original: Okay, maybe this won't be as easy as I expected it to be. Of course it won't be.
string: 好吧，也许这事没我想的那么容易。当然了，肯定不会容易。
珀尔塞斯・格拉迪乌斯

original: Just be mindful that every initiate you recruit will increase our upkeep expenses.
string: 只是要注意，你招募的每个新手都会增加我们的日常开销。

original: Harbinger, shall we spar one day? I am sure I would have plenty to learn from your fighting skills.
string: 先驱者，我们改天比试一下如何？我相信能从你的战斗技巧中学到很多。

original: First by the vampires of the Nighthollow Clan. Then by the Dwemer. Then by the Empire, then by the Nords. Every time, we still come out on top.
string: 先是夜谷氏族的吸血鬼，然后是锻莫，接着是帝国，再是诺德人。每一次，我们都能重新站起来。

original: I've been told that, when my mother died, my father changed into something darker. Tight fisted, cruel and cold.
string: 有人告诉我，母亲去世后，父亲变得阴郁了很多，变得吝啬、残忍又冷漠。

original: He approached me in the street, and told me that I had a place in the Night Mother's plan to rebuild.
string: 他在街上找到我，告诉我夜母的重建计划中有我的一席之地。

original: Spell Tome: Conjure Snowy Sabre Cat Thrall
string: 法术书: 召唤雪地剑齿虎奴仆

original: You're pretty good at listening, Listener. Heh, that makes sense.
string: 你还真挺会倾听的，聆听者。嘿，也对，毕竟你是聆听者嘛。

original: How can you stand the smell? Let's get out of here.
string: 你怎么受得了这味道？我们赶紧出去吧。

original: Hmm... Okay. Well, whatever happens, don't abandon me again, please.
string: 嗯…… 好吧。不管发生什么，求你别再丢下我了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
Every day, we thank the Dark Lady for her blessings in return for our servitude. Our mistress, if we displease her, may punish our misdeeds by sending us into an eternal sleep. May we continue to serve the Queen of Nightmares, lest we forget our purpose.
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
我们每日向黑暗女士献上感恩，以回报她的赐福，也为换取我们侍奉她的资格。吾等女主人若因我们的行为不悦，便会让我们陷入永恒的沉睡，以此惩罚过错。愿我们能始终效忠于梦魇女王，切莫忘记自身的使命。

original: Slows vampire enemies down and burns them for <mag> points for <dur> seconds.
string: 减缓吸血鬼敌人的速度，并对其造成灼烧伤害，每秒<mag>点，持续<dur>秒

original: Argonians have a bad reputation in this city, and that has proven very good for business.
string: 亚龙人在这座城市名声不好，这反倒让我的生意做得风生水起。

original: What are the Companions sending us to hunt this time? Hopefully something fun.
string: 这次战友团要派我们去猎什么？希望是有趣的东西。

original: As for the rest of the story, well... you already know it, Listener.
string: 至于后续的故事嘛，嗯…… 你都已经知道了，聆听者。

original: I have defeated the armored factotum in Kagrumez, but still nothing about the apostle. I should look around his new laboratory to see if I can find any interesting information about his whereabouts.
string: 我在卡古梅兹击败了那台身披盔甲的构装体，可还是没找到关于使徒的线索。我应当去他的新实验室里找找，看看能否发现有关他下落的有用信息。

original: What do you think of Shor's Stone?
string: 你觉得朔尔之石怎么样？

original: Millicent's bond with you is weakened
string: 你与米莉森特的羁绊已弱化。

original: No, no - augh! I'm not upset I'm alive. I'm just upset I wasn't the one to kill the bastards who did this to me.
string: 不，不是的 —— 啊！我不是为活着而难过，我是气自己没能亲手杀了那些对我做这些事的混蛋。

original: I'll enjoy breaking you apart, machine.
string: 我会很乐意把你拆成碎片，机器。

original: Hmm... Wealthy, erudite, elite and incredibly boring. If you spent a day in my estate, you would realise quite quickly why I left.
string: 嗯…… 有钱、博学、出身高贵，却无聊透顶。要是你在我家的领地里待上一天，很快就会明白我为什么要离开。

original: I just want you to know... It's been an honor to witness your story - to be a part of it, even.
string: 我只想让你知道…… 能见证你的故事，甚至成为其中的一部分，是我的荣幸。

original: Was that all he left behind? Traces of his research about transferring souls inside factotums?
string: 他就只留下了这些？关于把灵魂转移到构装体里的研究痕迹？

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="16">From the quill of Einar Mead-Heart,

I've brewed my life along this sea, chasing the perfect mead. This journal holds the heart of my craft. Every recipe learned though mishap and secret passed down from frostbitten kin. Alchemists aren't the only brewers that can raise a man's strength.

If you've found this and can read it, may your hands be steady and your cookpot hot, for I leave this knowledge to you. 

Raise a tankard for me, and never water down a Nord's mead.

string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="16">出自艾纳尔・蜜心之笔

我在这片海上酿了一辈子酒，只为追寻极致的蜜酒。这本日记承载着我的酿酒心血 —— 每一份配方，皆来自我一次次的失误摸索，或是来自霜寒中族人传下的秘方。能提升人力量的，可不止炼金师，酿酒师也一样。

若你寻得这本日记并能读懂，愿你手稳锅热，我将这些技艺尽数留给你。
为我举杯吧，永远别给诺德人的蜜酒兑水。
[pagebreak]

original: I remember we went to the town tourney and competed.
string: 我记得我们去镇上的比武大会参赛的事。

original: You seem awfully sure for someone who just came so close to death. But... I think you're right and I'll trust your judgement.
string: 你刚差点死掉，倒还挺确定的。不过…… 我想你是对的，我相信你的判断。

original: The Elder Scroll may guide us to defeat Alduin, perhaps even show us how to mend this world.
string: 古老卷轴或许能指引我们击败奥杜因，甚至告诉我们如何修复这个世界。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
Brother, it is time that we face reality. Our father is not in his right mind anymore!
That secret magic has led him to the edge of reason, and I can no longer stand by after what I have seen! Our dream was to unite the clans, but now he is killing our own kind to create an army of mindless slaves to his will! 
You know what must be done. Gather the band of your loyals and meet me at my quarters tonight. We must end this now, while we still can. We both know our father would do worse to us if we don't step in now.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
兄弟，是时候面对现实了。父亲已经神志不清了！

那门邪术把他逼到了理智的边缘，亲眼目睹这一切后，我再也无法袖手旁观！我们的梦想本是联合各个部族，可如今他却残杀同族，只为打造一支对他唯命是从的无脑奴隶大军！

你知道该做什么。召集你麾下的忠诚者，今晚到我的住处见我。我们必须趁还来得及，现在就了结这一切。我们都清楚，若再不采取行动，父亲会对我们做出更可怕的事。
</font>

original: Hate to say I told her so but... wait, no I don't. She got what was coming to her.
string: 虽然不想说我早有预言，但…… 等等，我就是想说。她是罪有应得。

original: I hope it's not a full moon!
Fight me like a... A fighter!
Congratulations, Guild-Master. After all the errand you've run, all the deeds you've done to bring the shadows back... You've more than earned it.
string: 恭喜你，公会大师。你跑了那么多腿，做了那么多事让阴影重归此地…… 这头衔你当之无愧。

original: Your immortality is about to look a lot more mortal!
string: 你的永生之躯，马上就要变得和凡人一样脆弱！

original: Well, I'm happy to be your friend.
string: 嗯，我很乐意做你的朋友。

original: An electric drain that voids the target's magicka for <dur> seconds.
string: 汲取电能，使目标的法力值在<dur>秒内失效

original: Fine, get yourself killed for all I care.
string: 行吧，你爱怎么死怎么死，跟我没关系。

original: May knock down a target. Fire damage <13>. Bleed and Abosrb Health <6>.
string: 可能击倒目标，造成 13 点火焰伤害，使目标流血并吸取其 6 点生命值。

original: One-Handed, not a bad choice. Better than some mage, that's for sure.
string: 单手武器，选得还不赖。肯定比当个法师强多了。

original: Bleed target <8> points. Stamina damage <18> points. Soul Trap enemies. Send some enemies running in fear!
string: 使目标流血，造成 8 点持续伤害，18 点耐力伤害，对敌人施展灵魂陷阱，还能让部分敌人因恐惧而逃窜！

original: I love what they've done with the place.
string: 我喜欢他们把这地方布置的样子。

original: The Thalmor control this fortress. How can the Jarl allow them to seize Nord land so openly?
string: 梭默控制着这座堡垒。领主怎么能允许他们如此明目张胆地侵占诺德的土地？

original: The spirits say we should go north. No, they didn't give a reason why. Maybe they're trying to drown us.
string: 灵体说我们该往北走，没说为什么，说不定是想把我们淹死呢。

original: I'm not overjoyed with this weather. Shall we get inside somewhere?
string: 这天气可让我高兴不起来。我们找个地方进去避一避？

original: We were lucky the Thalmor didn't seek retribution.
string: 幸好梭默没有报复我们。
召唤2个狂暴亡灵 + 寒霜符文
现在做这个风险太大了。
夏暮岛契约 | 极高风险

original: Consider it a little... homecoming gift, for the Dark Brotherhood's serendipitous savior.
string: 就把这当作一份小小的…… 归乡之礼吧，送给我们黑暗兄弟会这位机缘巧合下的救世主。

original: Sure, I'm happy to have you as my companion.
string: 当然，我很乐意让你做我的同伴。

original: You're brittle! This won't take long!
string: 你太脆弱了！这场战斗不会很久！

original: No wonder their stronghold is in disarray.
string: 难怪他们的要塞这么乱。

original: The size of that statue... I almost can't believe it. If that weren't enough, the view is magnificent.
string: 那雕像的尺寸…… 我都不敢相信。光是这个就够震撼了，视野还这么好。
赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位僧侣（低风险）

original: Arch-Mage?... Now, you know I'm your biggest supporter but... That happened awfully fast, don't you think?
string: 大法师？…… 你知道我是你最大的支持者，但是…… 这也太快了吧？

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">Julienne, how often must I tell you to check all the tables properly before you retire for the night?

I found this satchel under one of the tables. I still remember that shady Dark Elf sitting and drinking there all night, writing in his journal or something.

The content of this bag looks important, so I'm sure he'll be back for it sooner or later. When he shows up, be sure to charge him for it. A lot! Call it a storage fee. 

We're a business, not a charity.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">朱利安尼，我得跟你说多少遍，晚上打烊前要把所有桌子都仔细检查一遍？

我在一张桌子底下找到了这个背包。我还记得有个形迹可疑的暗精灵在那儿坐了一整晚，一直在写日记之类的东西。

这包里的东西看着挺重要，他迟早会回来拿的。等他来了，务必跟他要笔钱 —— 要多要点！就说是保管费。

咱们是做生意的，不是搞慈善的。
</font>

original:
6th day of Excursion Sherivah is dead, a draugr lunged from the dark and throttled her to death. I am not ready for this, I am writing to suppress my panic but I have no idea how I am supposed to sneak back out. They are around every corner, in every alcove! There is a cold draft from further in, I will look for another way out, maybe there is a shaft I can climb out through. Anything but the nightmare that resides in the room Sherivah died in! I feel horrible leaving her like this, but there is nothing I can do about it.

-- Reykja
string:
探险第六日 谢里瓦死了，一只尸鬼从黑暗中猛扑出来，扼住了她的喉咙，她就这么没了。我还没做好面对这一切的准备，我写下这些是为了压下心中的恐慌，可我完全不知道该怎么偷偷逃出去。 它们藏在每一个拐角、每一处壁龛里！深处传来一股冷风，我要去找另一条出路，或许有竖井能让我爬出去。不管怎样，都好过待在谢里瓦丧命的那个房间里，直面那场噩梦！就这样丢下她，我心里难受极了，可我对此却无能为力。

——蕾克娅

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Battleaxe of Harvesting
Please state your business or depart.
string: 请说明来意，否则请离开。

original: I'm more than willing to accept gifts.
Any success finding those robes? I'm eager to begin.
string: 找到那些长袍了吗？我已经迫不及待要开始了。

original: I have found the Master Survivalist's backpack.
string: 我找到了生存大师的背包。

original: He's not a saint, for sure, but he's what kept the peace within and stopped the threats without.
string: 他当然不是圣人，但正是他维系着内部的和平，抵御着外部的威胁。

original: Yes. Justice might mean death to the Empire, but that won't pay his debt to the Reach.
string: 没错。对帝国来说，正义或许意味着死亡，但这无法偿还他对边塞犯下的罪孽。

original: My father was right. Skyrim is dangerous.
string: 父亲说得对，天际确实凶险。

original: That shield looks good on you. It's a warlock's worst nightmare.
string: 这盾牌跟你很配，是术士的噩梦。

original: You know I love to tell stories. Which one do you want to hear today, love?
string: 你知道我最爱讲故事了。今天想听哪一个，亲爱的？

original: It's what I've imagined traveling with you would be like.
string: 这正是我想象中与你一同旅行的样子。

original: Causes <mag> points of concentrated poison damage.
I'm afraid I'm too old to be granting favors anymore. Better to lay that request in younger hands.
string: 恐怕我年纪大了，再也帮不了别人什么忙了。这请求还是找年轻人吧。

original: Go even deeper into the cavern
That's some mighty scary armor you have there. How many Daedra did you have to appease for that?
string: 你这盔甲可真够吓人的，你得讨好多少魔族才弄到的？

original: It seems an attack on Whiterun is imminent. The spirits are restless, and readied. I will make offerings to Hircine for a good hunt.
string: 看来白漫城很快就要被进攻了，灵体们都躁动不安，做好了准备。我要向海尔辛献祭，祈求一场精彩的狩猎。

original: This place's beauty doesn't compare to yours.
string: 这地方的美根本比不上你。

original: Ha... You're welcome. Sorry, I was thinking out loud. I really must avoid doing that.
string: 哈…… 不客气。抱歉，我只是在自言自语，我真得改改这毛病。

original: Right now, I need to go back to the laboratory and process everything that happened.
string: 现在，我需要回实验室整理一下发生的这一切。

original: Honestly, it's just for the armor.
string: 说实话，我只是为了那身盔甲。

original: There's so much for us to see and do. Take me with you and let's get started.
string: 我们还有好多地方要去，好多事要做。带上我，我们这就出发吧。

original: This is your last mistake, Thalmor lackey!
string: 这是你最后一个错误，梭默的走狗！

original: I'm going to take the star to Azura.
string: 我要把星辰带给阿祖拉。

original: Good... I'm glad. I'm not an expert on all things Daedra, but you don't have to be an expert to see that this wouldn't end well.
string: 那就好…… 我很欣慰。我虽然不是研究魔族的专家，但就算不是专家，也能看出来这事不会有好下场。

original: I'm sorry about what happened with your sister.
string: 对你姐姐的遭遇我很抱歉。

original: For though the threat of a third front had faded, a new shadow had risen in its place: that of the One Eye.
string: 因为尽管第三条战线的威胁消失了，一个新的阴影却取而代之：那只 “独眼”。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
        Alright, listen up as I won't remind you again!

The stash is moved. It's in Coldcinder Cave now.

Head southeast out of Raven Rock, like you're going towards the old mine.
Keep going past the mine entrance, look for the big, busted-up stone wall - the Bulwark. Can't miss it, it's where they used to lock folks up.

Get to the south side of that Bulwark. You'll see a mess of rocks and rubble.
The trapdoor down into Coldcinder is right there, tucked amongst the highest pile of those rocks on the south edge. Looks like just another bit of ruin.

Chest is just inside. Make it quick, don't attract attention. Watch for ash hoppers or worse.
- Korg</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
都给我听好了，我可不会再提醒第二遍！

赃物已经转移了，现在藏在冷渣洞穴里。

从鸦石镇往东南方向走，朝着旧矿井的方向去。一直走过矿井入口，找那面巨大残破的石墙 —— 壁垒。你肯定不会错过的，那地方以前是用来关人的。

到壁垒南侧去，你会看到一堆乱石碎渣。通往冷渣洞穴的活板门就在那儿，藏在南侧最高的那堆石头中间，看着就跟普通的废墟没两样。

箱子就在洞口里面。动作快点，别引人注意。小心灰烬跳虫，还有更可怕的东西。

—— 科尔格</font>

original: I have found the cave where Reykja and Sherivah went to search for the Frost tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to them.
string: 我找到了雷娅和谢里瓦前去寻找元素魔法・寒霜卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚她们遭遇了什么。

original: I'll be keeping my blood, thank you!
string: 我的血可不会给你，谢谢！

original: With every strike of the hammer, new life is breathed into metal.
string: 每一次锤击，都为金属赋予了新的生命。

original: Take Ulfric's Dossier to a dead-drop
string: 将乌弗瑞克的档案送到秘密投放点

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
I dont care what port you crawled in from, but if one more of you stumbles into my shop stinking of dead herring, trailing saltwater and bloody seaweed, I will personally shove a mop where the sun dont shine.

Youve turned the Winking Skeever into a brawling pit, stole two loaves from my window, and someone, 

someone PISSED in my rain barrel!! 

If I catch the one with the tattoo of a squid juggling knives, Im boiling your boots and selling the stew.

You want to play pirate? Go do it out at sea, not in my damn street.

            Keeper of Clean Floors and Fewer Idiots
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
我不管你们是从哪个港口钻进来的，但要是再有人浑身带着死青鱼的臭味，沾着海水和腥血海草闯进我的铺子，我就把拖把直接塞到你们见不着光的地方。

你们把眨眼恶鼠搅和成了打架场，还从我橱窗里偷了两条面包，而且有个人，
有个人居然往我的雨水桶里撒尿！！

要是让我抓到那个纹着鱿鱼、还玩杂耍刀的家伙，我就把你们的靴子煮了，再把这锅汤卖出去。

想装海盗？滚去海上装，别在我这该死的街上撒野。

—— 净地管事，兼管少养蠢货
</font>
召唤装甲雪地巨魔奴仆

original: Other blessings and prayers have been removed. Check your Active Effects!
string: 其他祝福与祷言已被移除。请查看你的主动效果！

original: Are you bloody jesting? Civil wars, court infighting and burned villages will make for a better future?
string: 你他妈在开玩笑吗？内战、宫廷内斗、被烧毁的村庄，这些能造就更好的未来？

original: Bahahaha, you look like you were thrown up by a Spriggan! Silly elf!
string: 哈哈哈，你这模样就像被树精吐出来的！傻精灵！

original: I worry that our team work is a little too powerful.
string: 我都担心我们的配合是不是有点太默契了。

original: She was. She really was. I'm trying to live up to that... Do you think I've managed to?
string: 她确实是。真的是。我一直在努力成为她那样的人…… 你觉得我做到了吗？

original: Let's go tell that thinblood Muiri that her man is dead. Maybe she'll smile again - if she even deserves that.
string: 我们去告诉那个娇气的穆里，她的男人死了。说不定她会重新笑起来 —— 前提是她配得上这份笑容。

original: Archmage, could I attend one of your classes? I am eager to watch how you teach your apprentices.
string: 大法师，我能去听一堂你的课吗？我很想看看你是怎么教导学徒的。

original: So I'm your pack mule, now?
string: 所以我现在成你的搬运工了？

original: We have waited years for this moment, so let's not waste another minute.
string: 我们为这一刻等待了数年，别再浪费一分一秒了。

original: Summons Mephala's Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把梅法拉的誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: Excellent. Let's do the Huntsman Prince proud.
string: 好极了。让我们让狩猎王子为我们骄傲。

original: This is lunacy, of course. I think the Jarl may take some convincing.
string: 这当然是疯了，我觉得得好好说服一下领主。

original: If not for your father, risking the Thalmor's wrath to rescue him from that fort... I don't know if I'd ever have a chance to see him again.
string: 要不是你父亲冒着得罪梭默的风险，把他从那个堡垒里救出来…… 我都不知道还能不能再见到他。

original: Are you sure? But I wanted to come with you!
string: 你确定？可我想跟你一起去！

original: Summon Dwarven Oathblade
string: 召唤矮人誓约之刃

original: The Archmage gets all this space just for himself? What's the point - he sleeps in a bed all the same!
string: 首席法师居然独占这么大地方？有什么用啊，还不是照样睡一张床！

original: I've found one of the students, she was dead.
string: 我找到了其中一个学生，她已经死了。

original: On second thought, I'll hold on to the tomes.
string: 转念一想，我还是自己留着这些书卷吧。

original:
Contract Kill an Argonian Chieftain Province: Black Marsh Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] Rumors of the Dark Brotherhood's resurgence have spread to Black Marsh where the ruling An-Xileel have no qualms about employing hired assassins. This lesser clan Chieftain has been stirring up unrest and the An-Xileel want them gone. Meet with the client and eliminate the Argonian Chieftain. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一位亚龙人酋长 行省: 黑沼泽 难度: 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限: 60 小时

[pagebreak] 黑暗兄弟会复兴的流言已传到黑沼泽 —— 统治此地的安-兹利尔组织向来不介意雇佣杀手。这位小氏族的酋长一直在煽动动乱，安-兹利尔希望将其铲除。 与委托人接头，铲除亚龙人酋长. [pagebreak]

original: Just one request. When we reach a notable landmark or view, would you speak with me? Like I said, I don't want to experience these things alone.
string: 就一个请求，当我们到了著名的地标或观景处，能和我聊聊吗？就像我说的，我不想独自体验这些。

original: Neither can I. You absorbed that dragon's soul. That's something only the Dragonborn could do.
string: 我也不敢相信。你吸收了那条龙的灵魂，这可是只有龙裔才能做到的事。

original: I feel sick... I can't believe you just did that...
string: 我觉得恶心…… 真不敢相信你居然这么做了……

original: Okay. But don't forget about me.
Sorry kinsman, your time has come!
string: 抱歉了，族人，你的死期到了！

original: That wasn't quite what I was expecting. You mean to tell me that, all this time, this dragon has been at the top of this mountain? Nobody knew?
string: 这可完全出乎我的意料。你是说，这么久以来，这条龙一直就在这座山顶上？没人知道？

original: Listener or not, Alisanne's actions were unwise.
string: 不管是不是聆听者，爱丽珊妮的做法都太不明智了。

original: Allows the player to manage their units.
string: 允许玩家管理自己的下属单位。

original: I have recived a mysterious note, asking me to investigate Anise's Cabin in order to uncover her secrets.
string: 我收到一封神秘纸条，让我去调查安尼斯的小屋，以揭开她的秘密。

original:
Contract Kill an An-Xileel Warrior Province: Black Marsh Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 48 Hours

[pagebreak] This An-Xileel Warrior took part in a raid just beyond the Black Marsh border killing dozens of non-argonians. One of the victim's family members has performed the Black Sacrament to have us hunt down their killer. Meet with the client and eliminate the An-Xileel Warrior. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一位安-兹利尔战士 省份： 黑沼泽 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:48 小时

[pagebreak] 这名安-兹利尔战士参与了黑沼泽边境之外的一场突袭，杀害了数十名非亚龙人。受害者的一名家属举行了黑暗祭礼，委托我们追杀灭害他们亲人的凶手。 与委托人接头，铲除安-兹利尔战士. [pagebreak]

original: Fire spells are <20>% stronger. While charging or channeling a <Fire> spell, a <Flame Cloak> forms around you, damaging enemies in melee and blocking hostile <Fire> spells.
string: 火焰法术的效果增强 20%。引导或蓄力火焰法术时，你的周身会形成火焰斗篷，对近战范围内的敌人造成伤害，并能阻挡敌方的火焰法术。

original: Are you okay? Mercer seemed like a competent fighter. Also, I'm glad you didn't drown and die.
string: 你还好吗？墨瑟看着是个厉害的战士。还有，幸好你没淹死。

original: I'm sure there's more of them around here somewhere.
string: 我敢肯定这附近还有不少他们的人。

original: Who can this Miraak be, and why does he hunt you? You haven't messed with anyone dangerous while we were separated, I hope.
string: 这个米拉拉克究竟是谁，他为什么要追杀你？希望我们分开的这段时间，你没招惹什么危险人物。

original: Raven Rock's lifeblood depended on this mine. When it closed, the town's economy suffered. Nothing of that spells irregularity to me.
string: 鸦石镇的命脉全靠这座矿井。矿井关闭后，城镇的经济一落千丈。在我看来，这没什么不寻常的。

original: I thought this body was gonna save me!
string: 我本以为这具身体能拯救我！

original: The Thieves Guild used to pay my Clan to traffick goods into the Reach. They stopped doing so about a decade ago... I wonder why.
string: 盗贼公会以前还雇我们氏族往边塞走私货物，大概十年前他们就不干了…… 我倒想知道为什么。

original: This isn't how I saw today going!
string: 我可没想到今天会变成这样！

original: That was quite a ceremony. To be part of their inner circle so quickly... You must exude charisma and charm with everyone you meet.
string: 仪式还挺隆重的。这么快就成为他们的核心成员…… 你肯定对每个遇到的人都充满了魅力。

original: They would tell me stories of their adventures from their youth in the Summerset Isles. Protecting nobles and the like.
string: 他们会给我讲他们年轻时在夏暮岛的冒险故事，比如保护贵族之类的。

original: Ah, a prudent decision, my Listener. The Dark Brotherhood has a reputation to think about.
string: 啊，真是个明智的决定，我的聆听者。黑暗兄弟会得顾全自己的名声。

original: What in Mundus are you carrying there? It looks... Manic.
string: 你手里拿的到底是什么玩意儿？看起来…… 疯疯癫癫的。

original: So, what's next for us? Something a little less stressful, I hope. Though knowing us, it'll be the opposite.
string: 那么，我们接下来干什么？希望是点不那么有压力的事。不过就我们俩的情况，估计恰恰相反。

original: Never mind, I suppose that's what I have you for.
string: 算了，我想这就是我有你的原因。

original:
Contract Kill a Breton King Province: High Rock Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] Stars hide your fires, the Black Sacrament has been performed. An ambitious courtier in High Rock seeks the regicide of their King so that they may usurp the throne for themselves. Meet with the client and eliminate the Breton King. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名布莱顿国王 省份： 落锤 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 这位高阶宫廷法师一直在涉足亡灵术这门黑暗技艺，但其效忠的领主却对此置之不理。于是，一名廷臣决定亲自出手 —— 举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除布莱顿国王. [pagebreak]

original: Just another set of cultist robes, right?
string: 只是又一套教团长袍罢了，对吧？

original: I didn't love you that way at first. But our journey has... changed everything.
string: 一开始我并不是那样爱你的，但我们的旅程…… 改变了一切。

original: I'd like to ask you something.
You mean you don't know? By Sithis, surely someone would have mentioned it.
string: 你是说你对此一无所知？西斯蒂斯在上，总该有人跟你提过才对。

original: I have come to fulfill the task that was given to me by your predecessor, many years ago.
string: 我是来完成多年前你的前任托付给我的任务的。

original: Perhaps you'd like to hear the tale?
string: 或许你想听听它的故事？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
Tell Bjorn to hold back before sending more of our men into that cursed Cavern. We made it past the icefall, lit a few torches, and crept in maybe fifty paces before the air turned sharp and the ground rumbled.

It wasnt just echo. Something was down there.

We found it, or it found us. A Giant Frost Troll! Bigger than any weve seen. Took Raggards arm clean off,  hurled Vynn into the wall like he was driftwood and bashed Gloin hard face into the ground with a giant club!

We couldnt press further. The thing vanished into the dark like it owned the place. I wont lose more men to this cursed beast! We need a plan of action.

P.S. Captains Reserve Rum is so darn good.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
给比约恩的留言

让比约恩先别再派弟兄进那该死的洞穴了！我们闯过冰崩，点了几根火把，小心翼翼往里走了大概五十步，空气突然变得刺骨，地面还开始震动。

这绝不是回声 —— 下面有东西。

我们撞见了它，或者说它找上了我们。是一只巨型冰霜巨魔！比我们见过的任何一只都大。它一下就把拉加德的胳膊扯了下来，把文恩像浮木似的甩到墙上，还用巨棒把格洛因的脸狠狠砸向地面！

我们实在没法再往前走了。那怪物钻进黑暗里，跟回自己家似的。我不能再让弟兄们栽在这孽畜手里！得先想个对策。

附：船长特供朗姆酒真他娘的带劲。
</font>

original: Skyrim Contract: Kill an Imperial Captain (High-Risk)
string: 天际契约：杀死一位帝国队长（高风险）

original: And I thought the fun was just getting started.
string: 我还以为好戏才刚开始呢。

original: But sooner or later, a side will emerge victorious; through a quick, thunderous war... or after a long, bloody conflict.
string: 但迟早会有一方胜出，要么是速战速决的雷霆之战…… 要么是漫长血腥的消耗。

original: Conjure Armored Frost Troll Thrall
string: 召唤装甲雪地巨魔奴仆

original: Okay, I will admit that this stone is fascinating. Now at least we know that the wizard couldn't just simply give us his research.
string: 好吧，我得承认这石头挺迷人的。现在至少我们知道，那巫师不是不想把研究给我们，而是做不到。

original: Carrying capacity increases by <mag> for <5> minutes.
string: <5> 分钟内，负重上限提升<mag>点

original: I've arrived at the ruins of Kagrumez. I should try and find any traces of Valin and this Lexicon he mentioned in his notes.
string: 我抵达了卡古梅兹废墟。我得设法找到瓦林的踪迹，以及他笔记里提到的那本方典。

original: Kill Sybille Stendor in Anise's Cabin
string: 在安尼斯的小屋杀死希比利·斯丹特

original:
These numbers will change how far along the questline that the player will be asked to infiltrate each faction. The questline is 18 stages long, with the factions suggested throughout, but you can change when it happens if a different time fits your character better. Setting a stage to 0 will disable that factions suggestion if you don't want to do that one.

Companions: (%.0f)
Thieves Guild: (%.0f)
College: (%.0f)
string:
这些数值将决定玩家在任务线中接到渗透各阵营任务的进度节点。该任务线共含 18 个阶段，游戏会在过程中陆续建议玩家加入各阵营；若你认为其他节点更贴合角色发展，可自行调整触发时机。若不想接取某阵营的加入建议，将对应阶段设为 0 即可关闭该提示。

战友团：(%.0f)

盗贼公会：(%.0f)

冬堡学院：(%.0f)

original: Summons a Madness Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把疯狂誓约之刃，持续 8 小时
梦境中…… 熟悉的拥抱。月光。
戈姆莉姨妈的伪造文件

original: That doesn't detract from the impressiveness of this hall, of course. I just don't really... Mesh with the beings inside of it.
string: 当然，这并不影响这座大厅的宏伟，只是我和里面的人实在…… 合不来。

original: However, if I never find him or replace my own parts, I too will end up like my friend back there.
string: 但如果我再也找不到他，或者不更换自己的零件，我最终也会变得和那边的同伴一样。

original: Mephala. We know her in the Reach as the Webspinner. The stories claim her lies started the first feud between clans. We should be cautious.
string: 梅法拉，在边塞我们称她为织网者。传说正是她的谎言引发了氏族间的第一场争斗，我们得小心点。

original: Keep showing me more affection. I enjoy receiving it.
string: 再多对我表露点心意吧。我很喜欢被你这样对待。

original: You were hostile, hence why you will die.
string: 你表现出敌意，所以你必将死亡。

original: I was wondering... Would you like to give me a name?
string: 我在想…… 你愿意给我取个名字吗？

original: Didn't realise you had such a fascination for cooking. You certainly look the part.
string: 没想到你对烹饪这么着迷，你这打扮倒还挺像那么回事的。

original: I have found the switch and it may have opened something nearby. I should see what the switch did.
string: 我找到了那个开关，它应该打开了附近的某个东西。我得去看看这开关起了什么作用。

original: Corinthe was our last foothold in Elsweyr, and my home. I would not abandon it.
string: 科林瑟是我们在艾斯维尔最后的据点，也是我的家。我绝不会抛弃它。

original: Withers Goldenspoon's final entry Day 3 I will die here. She opened a gate to Oblivion itself and the thing that stepped through was fire and ash. The one thing I could not kill. I ended up flailing uselessly at it with my walking stick. I am so badly hurt that my magic power will not return to me, I am spent and going cold. I wish Reykja were here. I wish she could save me from this horrible place.
string: 威瑟斯・金匙的绝笔 第三日 我要死在这里了。她打开了一道通往湮灭领域的裂隙，从中走出的怪物，是由烈焰与灰烬凝成的存在 —— 那是我唯一无法战胜的东西。到最后，我只能徒劳地挥舞手杖抽打它。我伤得太重，魔力再也无法恢复，已然油尽灯枯，身体正渐渐变冷。真希望蕾克娅能在这里。真希望她能把我从这恐怖之地救出去。

original: I'm starting to remember more about our childhood... Millie.
string: 我开始想起更多关于我们童年的事了…… 米莉。

original:
Contract Kill a Beggar Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Low-Risk Reward: 100-500 Gold Time: 12 Hours

[pagebreak] Normally people feel pity for beggars, but this one has been driving away a shop's customers with their constant harassment. Now the shopkeeper wants them dead. Meet with the client and eliminate the Beggar. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名乞丐 省份： 天际 难度： 低风险 报酬: 100-500金币 时限:12 小时

[pagebreak] 旁人对乞丐向来心怀怜悯，可这名乞丐却因频频滋扰，搅得一家店铺的顾客纷纷避之不及。店主忍无可忍，决意举行黑暗祭礼取其性命。 与委托人接头，铲除乞丐. [pagebreak]

original: Summon Madness Oathblade
string: 召唤疯狂誓约之刃
落锤契约 | 极高风险

original: Oh... Right. Apologies if I've been overfamiliar. We should move on.
string: 哦…… 好吧。如果我表现得太亲昵，抱歉了。我们还是走吧。

original: Oh, go back to bed, bone man!
string: 哦，回你的坟墓里躺着去吧，骨头人！

original: Use my mother's blade instead. This will make sure he never sees Sovngarde.
string: 用我母亲的刀吧。这样就能确保他永远进不了松加德。

original: You absorbed that dragon's soul. Couldn't you hear it screaming? Okay, I guess that's not something most folk can hear. There's no other explanation.
string: 你吸收了那条龙的灵魂。你没听见它的嘶吼吗？好吧，我想大多数人都听不见。除此之外，再无别的解释了。

original: No need to apologise at all. I thought that would likely be the case. Thank you for clarifying.
string: 完全不用道歉，我早该想到会是这样，谢谢你说明白。

original: As much as I love a good rainstorm, the thunder has me worried with all your shiny metals... Should we find shelter?
string: 虽然我很喜欢暴雨，但打雷的时候你身上这些亮闪闪的金属怪吓人的…… 我们找个地方躲躲吧？

original: Thank the spirits you're out of that trap. Well, not thanking "this" one, obviously.
string: 谢天谢地你从那陷阱里出来了。当然，肯定不是谢这个灵体。

original: I'm sorry about what happened to your kin.
string: 对你亲人的遭遇我很抱歉。

original: Not long ago, my biggest excitement was guessing which vegetable I was having in my afternoon soup. Now I'm fighting dragons! Quite a change of pace.
string: 就在不久前，我最大的乐子还只是猜午后汤里会有什么蔬菜。现在倒好，我居然在和龙搏斗！这变化也太大了。

original: I delived the cipher to the dead drop. Hopfully Sentinel should be able to read the book now.
string: 我已将密码本送至情报交接点，但愿守望者现在能读懂那本书了。

original: I'm Kaitryn, of the Fair-Shadows Clan. I guess you can call me Kait.
string: 我是凯特琳，来自影之美氏族，你可以叫我凯特。

original: Well, look... I don't mean to get sentimental, but...
string: 你看…… 我不是想多愁善感，只是……

original: It's days like today I'm glad I came along on this adventure!
string: 能遇上这样的日子，我真庆幸跟着你一起冒险！

original: They're the best of two bad options.
string: 他们不过是两害相权取其轻罢了。
血缚虫群

original: You're not the person I fell in love with. You're spiteful and your behaviour is deplorable.
string: 你不是我爱上的那个人了，你变得恶毒，行为卑劣。
召唤巨魔

original: Such is the way with the Pale Dragon. The results of your actions may never be known. The task is all that mattered.
string: 苍白之龙的行事方式就是如此，你行为的结果或许永远无人知晓，重要的是完成任务的过程。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>Bee home afor the frost, me firelite. Dont let the chickns git ya to grumblin.
             Yor Bronin
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>吾爱火萤，趁寒霜未至，快回蜂舍。别让那些鸡惹得你满心牢骚。
你的布罗宁
</font>

original: I'll try to fit in as much as I can, but don't expect a miracle.
string: 我会尽量融入的，但别指望有奇迹发生。

original: Our fathers fought in the Great War together. And now their children are doing the same again, side by side, defending the Dragon's peace.
string: 我们的父辈曾一起为帝国参加大战。现在他们的孩子也并肩作战，守护着龙之和平。

original: You can see why the High King lived here. No where else in Skyrim compares.
string: 难怪至高王住在这儿，天际其他地方都比不上。

original: The Skaal stones connect the spirits and the lands. With them freed, I can hear the spirits' songs again. Well done!
string: 斯卡尔的圣石连接着灵体与大地，圣石重获自由后，我又能听到灵体的歌声了，干得漂亮！

original: Nocturnal seems a little ungrateful if you ask me. Not that I mean to speak badly of your new mistress.
string: 要我说，诺克图娜尔有点忘恩负义啊。当然，我不是想说你新主人的坏话。

original: J'Faar was only a cub when the Dark Brotherhood took him in. They gave me purpose... and a blade.
string: 黑暗兄弟会收留杰法尔时，我还只是只小幼崽。他们给了我人生的目标…… 还有一把刀。

original: Is my custom armor ready, Nelosi?
string: 内洛西，我定制的盔甲做好了吗？

original: Ah, well... As I said, I'm a member of the Valtara clan. We're quite a wealthy family. Somewhat notorious, you might say.
string: 唉，好吧…… 我说过，我是瓦尔塔拉氏族的人。我们家族十分富有，也可以说，有点声名狼藉。

original: Ha, you're wearing dragon bones. Even I can't deny that you look remarkable.
string: 哈，你居然穿着龙骨做的装备，就算是我也得承认你看起来太帅了。

original: An amplifier? Great, I will install it during my next maintenance.
string: 增幅器？太好了，我会在下次维护时装上它。

original:
Contract Kill a Corrupt Guard Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] A misbehaving city guard has been abusing his power to extort local residents. One of these citizens finally had enough and performed the Black Sacrament to have them killed. Meet with the client and eliminate the Corrupt Guard. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名腐败守卫 省份： 天际 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 一名行为不端的城市守卫滥用职权，向当地居民敲诈勒索。终于有一位市民忍无可忍，举行了黑暗祭礼，决意取其性命。 与委托人接头，铲除腐败守卫. [pagebreak]

original: This is my homeland, Stormcloak. No "king" of yours will take it away!
string: 这是我的家乡，风暴斗篷的人。你们的任何 “国王” 都别想夺走它！

original: I have the materials you wanted.
I'm not sure this is my fight, but why not!
string: 我不确定这事儿该不该管，不过管就管了！
宴会厅（从金库支出 2500 金币）

original: I am still very unfamiliar with this part of the world, but I shall try my best to adapt.
string: 我对这个世界的这部分还很陌生，但我会尽力适应。

original: Alright Listener, I'll see who I can find.
string: 好吧，聆听者，我去看看能找到谁。

original: Hail, wolf-dancer. Keeping up with you is no small feat, I see! You made Hircine proud tonight. Now let's hunt these buggers down.
string: 向你致敬，狼之舞者。跟上你的脚步可真不容易，看来你今晚让海尔辛感到骄傲了。现在，我们去把这些家伙一网打尽。

original: Pretty women are being murdered? Oh dear. I'd better watch my back, huh? That was a joke, by the way. I'm not so conceited.
string: 漂亮女人接连被杀？哎呀，那我可得小心点了，哈？开个玩笑而已，我可没那么自负。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade honors your wisdom and steady hand. You crossed the howling bridge into the College of Winterhold, mastered their arcane trials, and delved into Saarthal's cursed depths to confront the folly that threatened to bury Skyrim under waves of necrotic horror, a power the ancients sealed away, now stirring under mages blinded by ambition. By guiding them from that precipice, you contained a disaster that could have shattered Tamriel's balance, spawning undead legions or rifts to Oblivion from Winterhold's ruins. Your prominence among those scholars grants us invaluable boons: forbidden tomes smuggled our way, divinations of Thalmor movements, and allies who peer through time's veil.

This deed bolsters our stand against the hidden puppeteers. Your reward rests here. Continue safeguarding Tamriel with the knowledge you've wielded so masterfully.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑为你的智慧与沉稳深感敬佩。你踏上寒风呼啸的桥梁进入冬堡学院，精通了他们的奥术试炼，更深入萨瑟尔城被诅咒的深渊，直面那险些让天际被死灵恐怖浪潮吞噬的蠢行 —— 这股被古者封存的力量，正被野心蒙蔽双眼的法师们唤醒。你将他们从悬崖边缘拉回，遏制了一场足以打破泰姆瑞尔平衡的灾难，否则冬堡的废墟中恐将涌现不死军团，或是开启通往湮灭的裂隙。你在这些学者中赢得的崇高地位，为我们带来了无价的助力：违禁的秘典被偷偷送至我们手中，梭默的动向能被占卜预知，更有能窥见时间面纱的盟友为我们效力。
此番功绩，让我们对抗幕后操纵者的立场愈发稳固。你的奖赏已随信奉上。愿你继续以炉火纯青的学识守护泰姆瑞尔。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: This is all quite ridiculous, don't you think?
string: 你不觉得这一切都太荒唐了吗？

original: Citizens. Of Windhelm. Rich and noble for some reason or another.
string: 就是风舵城的那些市民。不知怎么就成了有钱有势的人物。

original: Covenant of the Oathblades Vol. I
You're dismissed. Return to your sanctuary.
string: 你可以退下了，回到你的圣所去吧。

original: Pretty women are being murdered? You should be safe then. Joking! Completely joking. I'm sure we'll both be at terrible risk. Heh...
string: 漂亮女人接连被杀？那你应该很安全。开玩笑的！纯属玩笑。我肯定我们俩都身处极大的危险之中。嘿……

original: That sorry fate would be what my cousin elected.
string: 我那表亲选的，就是那种可悲的生活。

original: All the wealth in the world and she gives you that? She could have coughed up a little more, if you ask me.
string: 她坐拥那么多财富，就给你这点东西？要我说，她本可以再多掏点的。

original: Ugh, you've really earned the name "troll"!
string: 呃，你可真对得起 “巨魔” 这名字！

original: Being a Tarnished means not being accepted into the city, and living in its outskirts.
string: 成为 “黯痕者”，意味着不被城市接纳，只能住在城外。

original: You can always tell when a Hag's nearby. The spirits are scared, the air stinks of deathbell and nightshade, and there's always a distant squawking.
string: 女巫附近时总能轻易察觉：灵体感到恐惧，空气中弥漫着死亡钟和颠茄的臭味，还总能听到远处的尖叫。

original: There's no telling what might happen tomorrow.
string: 谁也说不准明天会发生什么。

original: The Solitude Sanctuary is not available right now.
string: 独孤城圣所目前暂未开放。

original: Resist fire, frost and shock damage spells 5% better.
string: 对火焰、寒霜和闪电伤害类法术的抗性提升 5%。

original: This is all very peculiar. Though I am interested to see where this leads.
string: 这一切都太奇怪了，不过我倒想看看后续会发展成什么样。

original: Nearby living creatures, but not undead, machines or daedra, can be seen through walls.
string: 可以穿墙看见附近活着的生物，不死生物、机器和魔族除外。

original: Alright Listener, I'll see what I can do.
string: 好吧，聆听者，我会尽力而为。

original: You wouldn't expect to find a group of Altmer here, would you? It's a little on the chilly side.
string: 你肯定想不到这儿会有一群高精灵吧？这儿可够冷的。

original: Pinewatch? It doesn't exactly sound fearsome. This should be easy.
string: 松枝守望？听着一点都不可怕，这事儿应该很容易。

original: In the old days, vampires lived in big castles underground. Now they're stuck with crypts and ruins, feeding off rats... What disgusting creatures.
string: 以前吸血鬼都住在地下的大城堡里，现在却只能躲在地穴和遗迹里，靠吸老鼠血为生…… 真是恶心的生物。

original: I've been told you craft in Ebony.
string: 我听说你擅长打造黑檀装备。

original: The Silver-Blood Clan would break this whole city if it meant adding a few more piles of gold to their treasury.
string: 只要能给金库多添几堆金子，银血家族能把整座城市都拆了。

original: But that means you can't die now, otherwise I'll have nobody, got it?
string: 但这意味着你现在不能死，不然我就孤孤单单一个人了，明白吗？

original: Listen... This may seem strange to you, but do you... do you think I could travel with you?
string: 听着…… 这对你来说可能有点奇怪，但你…… 你觉得我能跟你一起旅行吗？

original: Let's put them out of their misery!

string: 训练区（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: Likewise. Thank you for having me with you.
string: 彼此彼此。谢谢你让我陪在你身边。

original: And the stone work! Built and crafted a long time ago by those with skills that far surpass those alive today.
string: 还有这石工技艺！是很久以前的能工巧匠打造的，他们的手艺远比现在的人高超。

original: Trust me, this is no ordinary Daedra. Boethia is truly evil. Do not do as it tells you or it may corrupt you.
string: 相信我，这可不是普通的魔族。波耶西亚是真的邪恶。别按它说的做，不然你会被它腐蚀的。

original: You are banished. Leave the sanctuary once!
string: 你被放逐了，立刻离开圣所！

original: I'm afraid Dawnstar is already full, Listener. For us to continue growing, you will need ample quarters for new initiates.
string: 恐怕晨星圣所已经满员了，聆听者。要继续发展壮大，你得为新招募的新手准备足够的住处。
