original: I've always enjoyed reading about the knights in those Breton fairy tales, you know.
string: 你知道吗，我一直很喜欢读布莱顿童话里关于骑士的故事。

original: My archives state that this town was once invaded by Ice Tribes.
string: 我的档案显示，这座小镇曾遭到冰部落的入侵。

original: Why do you like the Empire?
Do you need something from me?
Condemns a soul to eternal torment, denying them Sovngarde. Fills a soul gem when the target dies. Absorbs health, magicka, and stamina.
string: 将灵魂打入永恒的折磨之中，使其无法进入松加德。目标死亡时会填满一个灵魂石，并吸取其生命值、法力值和耐力值。

original: Spell Tome: The Veiled Abyss Teleport
Triggered by nearby enemies, the rune explodes for <mag> points of fire damage.
string: 敌人靠近时触发，符文将会爆发，并造成<mag>点火焰伤害。

original: Black Marsh Contract: Kill an Argonian Chieftain (High-Risk)
string: 黑沼泽契约：杀死一位亚龙人酋长（高风险）

original: I see... No new directives, no need to return to the Clockwork City as of now.
string: 我明白了…… 没有新的指令，目前也无需返回发条城。

original: You saved the Night Mother, well done Speaker Garnag.
string: 你救了夜母，干得好，演说者加尔纳格。

original: Any idea where we should go next?
string: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪？

original: If you keep complimenting me, my ego will inflate past the point of no return. We don't want that. But thank you anyway.
string: 你再这么夸我，我的自负就要膨胀到无可救药了。那可不是什么好事，不过还是谢谢你。

original: Shall I leave this one to you!?
A totem of Hircine! An honorable hunt, let's make haste!
string: 海尔辛的图腾！一场光荣的狩猎，我们快出发！

original: Just... reconsider. Please. I cannot bear watching you live in darkness forever.
string: 只是…… 再考虑考虑吧。求你了。我实在不忍心看着你永远活在黑暗里。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
Those hags are the ones that nabbed Tharsten. Kill them all. Every. Last. One.


-- Rigel Strong-Arm
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
就是那些鬼婆抓走了沙尔斯坦。把她们全宰了，一个不留。

—— “壮臂”利赫尔
</font>
秘闻 - 致格里姆与法戈

original: Valenwood Contract: Kill a Bosmer Ranger (Medium-Risk)
string: 威木省契约：杀死一位木精灵游侠（中等风险）

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
The fight pits are now open, bring your wealth, place stakes and come enjoy your time.

Try to keep the pits a secret, we don't want the guard to find out...

B.

</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
角斗场现已开放，带上你的钱财，下注搏彩，前来尽情享乐吧。

切记守好角斗场的秘密，可别让守卫发现了……

B.

</font>

original: Can you tell me about your family?
string: 你能跟我说说你的家人吗？

original: I told you you'd be alright. Being right all the time really pays off. I wasn't worried at all. Well, maybe a brief moment. But it was fleeting.
string: 我就说你会没事的吧。一直都对的感觉可真好。我一点都没担心过。好吧，也许就一小会儿。不过那感觉转瞬即逝。

original: It's dumb enough that they built a city in the middle of a plain, even dumber that no bandits have overrun it yet. Stupid Nords.
string: 他们把城市建在平原中央就够蠢的了，更蠢的是居然还没被山贼攻占，这些诺德人真是没救了。

original: I'll let them. It looks like fun.
string: 我让他们来吧，看起来挺好玩儿的。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade welcomes you back, old friend. I hope you were able to enter Skyrim went without issue. The land is full of hidden dangers: a civil war rips at its core, and unseen forces stir up chaos that endangers Skyrim's shaky peace. We thank you for taking this job to protect the innocent in all this mess.

Your first task is to go to a cabin outside Riverwood. Rumors say the witch Anise was contacted by an enemy agent for unknown reasons. Find out why, then deliver the information to our drop point, the enchanted barrel behind the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. I will have the dead drop filled with other tasks by then, as well as some tools you may need and your reward.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

斯坦达尔之剑在此迎你归来，老友。但愿你踏入天际的旅途一路顺遂。这片土地如今暗藏重重危机：内战正撕裂它的核心，还有无形的势力在搅动混乱，危及天际本就摇摇欲坠的和平。感谢你接下这份差事，在这乱局中守护无辜之人。
你的首个任务，是前往河木镇郊外的一间小屋。有传言称，女巫安尼斯与一名敌方特使有过接触，缘由不明。你需查明其中内情，再将情报送至我们的投递点 —— 白漫城战旗母马旅店后方那只被施了魔法的木桶。届时，我会在这个秘密投递点留下其他任务，还有你可能需要的一些工具，以及应得的奖赏。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Are we truly at the highest point in all of Tamriel? Gods, I never thought I'd end up here. It's slightly terrifying, but oh so beautiful.
string: 我们真的到了泰姆瑞尔的最高点吗？天啊，我从没想过自己会来这儿。有点吓人，但也太美了。

original: Is that an amplifier? Thank you.
I intend to ignore their invitation.
string: 我打算无视他们的邀请。

original: Of course! You can be my second in command.
string: 当然！你可以做我的副手。

original: This is so, so wrong. We should just leave.
string: 这太不对劲了，我们还是走吧。
法术书: 召唤石像鬼

original: The aurora may dance across Tamriel, but it feels most genuine here in Skyrim.
string: 极光或许会在泰姆瑞尔的天空舞动，但在天际这里，才显得最真切。

original: Show me what you've got, then!
string: 那就拿出你的真本事来！

original: The original design, refined with Dunmeri precision. Wear it well.
string: 原始设计经过丹莫式的精雕细琢，好好穿着吧。

original: Huh. You must really like hearing me speak then.
string: 哈，那你肯定很喜欢听我说话。

original: The stonework is magnificent, but there is an odd atmosphere here... Can you feel it?
string: 石工技艺很宏伟，但这儿的气氛很奇怪…… 你能感觉到吗？

original: A blacksmith now, are you? Why not forge yourself some armor...
string: 现在成铁匠了？怎么不给自己打造点盔甲……

original: The Black Hand has returned to the Dark Brotherhood and revealed the locations of four abandoned sanctuaries. I need to claim at least one of them before the Night Mother will speak to me again.
string: 黑檀之手重回黑暗兄弟会，还透露了四座废弃圣所的位置。我必须先占据至少一座圣所，夜母才会再次与我对话。

original: All spells are <mag>% stronger for <5> minutes.
string: 所有法术强度提升<mag>%，持续 5 分钟。

original: Find the cipher in Deepwood Redoubt
string: 在深木据点找到密码本

original: Honor Storn's sacrifice. Destroy Miraak and return to my side. I believe in your strength.
string: 为斯托恩的牺牲复仇。消灭米拉拉克，回到我身边。我相信你的力量。

original: Stendarr break that boy into a million pieces and feed him to the fish Elves!
string: 愿斯坦达尔把那小子劈成碎片，喂给那些鱼精灵！

original:
[pagebreak]

Elemental Magic Storm The tale of Gorm Even-Handed

[pagebreak]

orm Even-Handed was my Jarl and mentor. Herein is the tale of his doom. He lies now in his tomb beneath the ice, turned into a monolith so that his people could live free from dragon tyranny. For many long and grim years a particularly cruel dragon named Maarmulthur lorded over Gorm's hold. Neither Gorm nor any of his thanes could hope to match the dragon in force of arms and were resigned to endure the dragon's cruel and deadly games with their children. When Gorm had his favorite daughter eaten by Maarmulthur he bitterly decided to use his own life as bait to end the dragon once and for all. He made a deal with the hagravens and witches of the wild that they could have his soul if they made him a potion that would turn him into stone a brief moment after he drank it. Then he spoke to the dragon, saying he would like to see his daughter one final time and begged to be eaten so they could be united in Sovngarde. In his arrogance Maarmulthur swallowed him whole only to die in agony as Gorm turned to stone in his bowels. But the treacherous witches had lied and Gorm was forever trapped in his stone form. We, his people, dug him out of the vile beast and burrowed him deep. Arrayed around his still form we placed the witches and hags, for we hunted them down and made them drink their own potion, thus they will not be able to torment our beloved hero in his death. The tome was written by me, Ygrol the Black-Hearted.
string:
[pagebreak]

元素魔法 风暴 公正者戈姆的传说

[pagebreak]

公正者戈姆曾是我的领主与导师。此书记载的是他走向毁灭的经过。如今，他长眠于冰层之下的墓穴中，化为一尊石冢，只为让他的子民能挣脱巨龙的暴政，重获自由。 多年来，一条名为玛尔穆瑟的恶龙以残暴手段统治着戈姆的领地，其统治黑暗而漫长。无论是戈姆本人，还是他麾下的领主们，在武力上都难以与恶龙抗衡，只能无奈忍受恶龙以他们的孩子为乐、残酷致命的折磨。 当戈姆最疼爱的女儿被玛尔穆瑟吞食后，他悲痛欲绝，决心以自身为诱饵，彻底终结这条恶龙的性命。他与荒野中的乌鸦鬼婆们达成协议 —— 只要她们能调配出一种药剂，让他喝下后片刻便化为顽石，他就将自己的灵魂交给她们。随后，戈姆向恶龙传话，称想最后再见女儿一面，并恳求恶龙将自己吞下，好让他们能在松加德团聚。傲慢的玛尔穆瑟将他一口吞下，然而，就在戈姆在其腹中化为顽石的瞬间，恶龙痛苦地死去。可那些背信弃义的乌鸦鬼婆们却出尔反尔，致使戈姆永远被困在了石身之中。 我们，他的子民，从恶龙腹中取出了他，将他深埋于地下。在他静止的石身周围，我们摆放着那些乌鸦鬼婆的石像 —— 我们将她们尽数追捕归案，强迫她们喝下了自己调制的药剂。这样一来，她们便再也无法在我们敬爱的英雄死后，继续折磨他了。 此书由我，黑心伊格罗尔，亲笔所著。

original: There will be those still loyal to Ulfric, of course. But I am optimistic that very little blood will continue to be spilled in the aftermath.
string: 当然，还是会有人忠于乌弗瑞克。但我乐观地认为，接下来不会再流太多血了。

original: So, off to reforge a weapon that's brought untold misery and strife since time immemorial? I'd stab Ulfric's corpse with the thing just for the sake of it.
string: 所以，我们要去重铸一把自古以来给世界带来无尽苦难与纷争的武器？我真想用它去捅乌弗瑞克的尸体，就为了出口气。

original: Got word of Pirates masquerading as mercenaries who raided Dawnstar and vanished into the mist. Head to Solitude; find our more, and prepare to hunt them down.
string: 有消息称，一群海盗伪装成佣兵洗劫了晨星城，随后便消失在迷雾中。前往独孤城一探究竟，做好准备去追捕他们。

original: The more I see of this world, the stranger it gets...
string: 我对这个世界看得越多，就觉得它越奇怪……

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">The joke's on me I guess? I didn't take this job very seriously, even after they caught me. It's not the first time I got captured by some of these bloodsuckers! And I always manage to break free.
 
But this... this is different. What I've seen here has broken me!
Their leader (I believe his name is Gawayne) has shown me things. 
He turns people into indescribable... things. No! Walking Horrors! 
This clan could be trouble for Skyrim if they aren't stopped. I must kill their leader, but I must escape first. I must find a way!

 


There's no way out this time.
Please, I don't want to be turned into a monster!</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">想来这玩笑终究开到我自己头上了？即便被他们抓住，我也没把这差事太当回事。又不是第一次被这些吸血怪抓住了！而且我每次都能逃出去。

但这次…… 这次不一样。我在这里看到的一切，把我彻底击垮了！
他们的首领（我想他叫加韦恩），让我见识了些难以想象的东西。
他把人变成了些无法形容的…… 怪物！不，是行走的恐怖造物！
要是不阻止这个部族，天际迟早要遭殃。我必须杀了他们的首领，但首先得逃出去。我一定要想办法！

这次怕是真的插翅难飞了。
求求了，我不想变成怪物啊！</font>

original: So... You're a werewolf now. That's... interesting... I'm not entirely sure how to feel about that. I suppose the question is... How do you feel?
string: 这么说…… 你现在是狼人了。这…… 挺有意思的…… 我都不知道该怎么想了。我想知道的是…… 你自己感觉怎么样？

original: I think your master is a fraud. You might look into that.
string: 我觉得你的主人是个骗子，你或许该去查查。

original: Ugh, the ash here is getting everywhere. I need a bath.
string: 呃，这里的火山灰到处都是，我得洗个澡了。
卡莱夫・断趾者的遗骸

original: The Dwarven architecture of the city is very intriguing. The local population has adapted very nicely to the unusual structure of the town.
string: 这座城市的矮人建筑风格非常有意思。当地居民也很好地适应了这座小镇与众不同的结构。

original: Second Key to the Inner Sanctum

Contract Kill a Hlaalu Merchant Province: Morrowind Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] House Hlaalu may have fallen from prominence in dunmer politics, but their merchants still dominate much of the trade across Morrowind. This client wishes to "remove" them from the competition. Meet with the client and eliminate the Hlaalu Merchant. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名哈拉鲁商人 省份： 晨风 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 哈拉鲁家族虽已在丹莫的政治舞台上失势，但其商队依旧把持着晨风境内的大半贸易。为将这些劲敌彻底踢出竞争场，这位雇主决意对他们痛下杀手。 与委托人接头，铲除哈拉鲁商人. [pagebreak]

original: You can stay with his merry band of idiots and butchers. I will be going home. Return to the Reach under his banner, and I'll kill you myself!
string: 你愿意留在他那群白痴屠夫的队伍里，就留着吧。我要回家了。要是你打着他的旗号回到边塞，我会亲手杀了你！

original: This is ridiculous and you know it.
string: 这太荒唐了，你心里清楚。

original: Smithing is <mag>% more effective for <5> minutes.
string: 锻造提升<mag>%，持续 <5> 分钟。

original: I like watching the way you fight.
string: 我喜欢看你战斗的样子。

original: I'm hoping Delphine will grow on me.
string: 希望德尔菲娜能让我慢慢产生好感。

original: What do you expect me to do now? Just pretend that you're not married and we carry on as we are?
string: 你现在想让我怎么做？假装你没结婚，我们还像以前一样？

original: Well now... The leader of the Thieves Guild. Guild Master, no less. Congratulations. No one can say you didn't work for this.
string: 现在…… 盗贼公会的领袖，还是公会大师呢。恭喜你。没人能说你这位置来得不光彩。

original:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
The pure, untainted blood of a vampiric creature is an incredibly rare (but potent) alchemical ingredient because samples of blood spoil easily when exposed to light and air.
The answer is to extract the blood immediately, directly from the body upon death, without exposing it to contamination of any kind (note that I have not tried taking the blood from a living vampire; they never react kindly to the attempt!).

The Dwemer were the first to invent such a device, as there is some proof they were successful at harvesting vampiric blood on a larger scale. 
Based on detailed schematics I found on my travels, I have managed to create my own extractor!

So far, the results are promising. Immediately after death, the blood can be extracted by pushing the needle into one of the major arteries. By using the handle, the blood is sucked through the needle into a cannister in the center, where it is stored airtight and dark.
I have noted that for various reasons, the extraction is not always successful. 
Major open wounds might cause the remaining blood in the body to spoil, and at times, the device has failed to create an airtight seal on the canister.

As I continue my research and improve upon the device, I'm confident that results will improve in the future.
</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont" size="18">
吸血鬼生物的纯净未受污染之血，是一种极为稀有却又强效的炼金材料，因为血液样本暴露在光线和空气中极易变质。
解决办法是在其死亡的瞬间直接从体内抽取血液，使其不受到任何形式的污染（注：我尚未尝试从活吸血鬼身上取血，他们对这种尝试向来反应激烈！）。

锻莫是最早发明此类装置的种族，有证据表明他们曾成功大规模采集吸血鬼之血。
根据我在旅途中找到的详细图纸，我成功造出了属于自己的采血器！
截至目前，试验结果颇具希望。在目标死亡后，只需将针头刺入其某条主要动脉，便能抽取血液。转动把手，血液会通过针头被吸入中央的密封罐中，在无光、真空的环境下保存。

我发现，出于多种原因，采血并非总能成功。
大面积的开放性伤口可能导致体内残留的血液变质，有时装置也无法在密封罐上形成气密密封。
随着我持续研究并改进这款装置，我有信心未来的采血效果会越来越好。
</font>

original: An apostle of the Clockwork City has disappeared on Solstheim. I am now in Nchardak Submerged Laboratory looking for him. Where could he be?
string: 发条城的一位使徒在索瑟海姆失踪了。我如今身处钠查达克水下实验室，正在寻找他的踪迹。他会在哪里呢？

original: How do you feel about me joining the Empire?
It's hard to miss. Look, you know how I feel about you. But I don't need the bond of matrimony to keep me at your side. I'll be with you forever.
string: 想忽略都难。你知道我对你的感情，但我不需要婚姻的束缚来留在你身边，我会永远陪着你。

original: I hope Azura will look after you when you're dead!
string: 希望你死后，阿祖拉能庇佑你！

original: And who will be your damsel, dame knight?
string: 那谁会是你的少女呢，女骑士？

original: I have recived an offer to join Stendarr's Blade, a mysterious group dedicated to protecting Tamriel from the shadows. An agent named Sentinel has filled the dead-drop barrel in Whiterun with more missions and my payment for the last job.
string: 我收到了加入圣神之锋的邀请，这是个致力于在暗影中守护泰姆瑞尔的神秘组织。一位名叫守望者的密探已在白漫城的情报交接点木桶内，为我留下了后续任务与上一次任务的报酬。

original: We'd race to the peaks and get bruised all over, then we got better eventually.
string: 我们曾跑到山顶上，摔得浑身是伤，后来慢慢就不怕了。

original: Cloudy today - let's hope it holds off on the rain.
string: 今天阴天 —— 希望别下雨。

original: Do you need me to hold on to something?
string: 你需要我帮你拿着什么东西吗？
黑暗潮汐：血之束缚 - 佛克瑞斯

original: This city has been through a lot. With enough factotums, we could probably rebuild it in a few days.
string: 这座城市经历了太多磨难。只要有足够的构装体，我们或许几天就能把它重建起来。

original: While wearing the crown, summoned ice wraiths take the form of powerful ice wyrms.
string: 佩戴这顶王冠时，你召唤出的冰灵会化作强大的冰龙形态。
斯坦达尔之剑 - 设置

original: Is that what you truly believe? Do you not look upon the work of the other races and wonder how it could be done without their presence?
string: 你真的这么认为吗？你看到其他种族的成就，难道不会想，如果没有他们，这些事怎么可能做到？

original: Absorb <mag> points of health from trembling victims.
string: 从瑟瑟发抖的受害者身上汲取<mag>点生命值

original: Do you want to make your own fabricant fish? With enough inspiration and materials, you could!
string: 你想自己做一只构装鱼吗？只要有足够的灵感和材料，你就能做到！

original: I remember hearing the stories about how our fathers fought in the Great War.
string: 我记得听过我们的父亲在大战中作战的故事。

original: What, you are? Can I hear it?
Listener, is it? I wonder how you were chosen. Was it part of your programming? Or did your exploits make you worthy of this title?
string: 聆听者，是吗？我好奇你是如何被选中的。这是你程序的一部分吗？还是你的功绩让你配得上这个头衔？

original: Non-duration food restores <three times> as much Health.
string: 非持续类食物恢复的生命值变为原来的<三倍>。

original: The curse of undeath will not plague Skyrim further.
string: 不死的诅咒不会再侵扰天际了。

original: Uh... It's a bit... Dark. There's something mystical about this place. It feels... Out of place.
string: 呃…… 这儿有点…… 阴暗。这地方有种神秘的气息，感觉…… 格格不入。

original: Of course, Listener. I can go out and search for a suitable candidate.
string: 当然，聆听者。我可以出去找个合适的人选。

original: You're back... You're ready to listen to me? You're a hunter?
string: 你回来了…… 愿意听我说了？你是猎人？

original: A volley of frozen shards that do <mag> points of Frost damage to Health, and twice as much Stamina damage.
string: 射出一阵冰冻碎片，对生命造成<mag>点寒霜伤害，对耐力造成两倍于此的伤害

original: I'm afraid you have to serve me for the rest of your life.
string: 恐怕你这辈子都得侍奉我了。

original: I should search my dead target.
string: 我应当搜查这个已被我解决的目标。

original: One-handed weapons do <mag>% less damage for <dur> seconds.
string: 单手武器伤害降低<mag>%，效果持续<dur>秒
找到雷娅和谢里瓦的日记。

original: I'll see what I can find, Listener.
string: 我会尽力找找看的，聆听者。

original: After inscribing the final runes on the Lexicon, I was granted a vision. In it, I saw the Tonal Forge, untouched for millennia. To get there, I will need a special wand which is being held in the ruins of Nchardak on Solstheim. I should take the Lexicon to Ncardak and retrieve this wand.
string: 为方典刻上最后一组符文后，我看到了一段幻象。幻象中，我见到了数千年未曾有人涉足的调谐熔炉。要抵达那里，我需要一根特殊的权杖，它被藏在索瑟海姆的钠查达克废墟中。我该带着方典前往钠查达克，取回这根权杖。

original: Mysticism must be rife here. I can feel powerful magics at work...
string: 这儿肯定充满了神秘学力量，我能感觉到强大的魔法在涌动……

original: I'm sure we can handle this overgrown lizard!
string: 我相信我们能搞定这只大蜥蜴！

original: I'm looking for a job. Heard anything recently?
string: 我在找份工作。最近有什么消息吗？

original: Yes! This is exciting. How many books do you think they have? A hundred? Two hundred?
string: 太棒了！这可太让人激动了。你觉得他们有多少本书？一百本？两百本？

original: Give the "Amplifier: Lightning Arrows" to the Factotum
string: 将 “增幅器：闪电箭” 交给构装体

original: Oh, I'm sure. There's a reason I chose you to be my protector, you know. It wasn't just for that narcissistic personality of yours.
string: 哦，那是当然。你知道我为什么选你当我的保护者，可不只是因为你那自恋的性格。

original: This is not quite the luxury that I'm accustomed to, but it will suffice.
string: 这虽然和我习惯的奢华差远了，但也凑活。

original: I have found Nelosi Ulaaru, a skilled Dunmer clothier capable of creating & enhancing robes. She has asked me to bring her 10 Heartstones. I've been told to check Broken Tusk Mine for Heartstones
string: 我找到了内洛西・乌拉鲁，她是一位技艺精湛的丹莫裁缝，能制作并强化法袍。她让我给她带 10 块心石来，有人告诉我可以去断牙矿场找找心石。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

The cipher Acanthus hid his secrets with is at the Matriarch in Deepwood Redoubt. Get it by blade or trick, leave no trace. Lirael's plan for this frozen land needs those secrets; one slip unravels our grip.

Lirael has acted strangely since arriving in Skyrim. She fixates on hags, necromancers, and vampires. Why unite them? Chaos for Nords, or a shadow army beyond Altmer rules? Her orders feel desperate or too ambitious. We need truth. I haven't seen her since that "attempt" no one else noticed. Acanthus might know. Be careful; shadows here bite. Report secure. The Dominion lasts.

Voryn

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

阿坎萨斯用来藏匿秘密的密码本，如今在深木据点的女族长手中。无论用武力还是计谋，务必将其取回，且不留一丝痕迹。莉瑞尔针对这片冰封之地的谋划，全依仗这些秘密；稍有差池，我们对此地的掌控便会土崩瓦解。

莉瑞尔自踏上天际省起，行事便诡异至极。她对乌鸦鬼婆、亡灵法师与吸血鬼格外关注，为何要将这些势力联合起来？是为了让诺德人陷入混乱，还是想组建一支不受高精灵律法约束的暗影大军？她的指令要么透着孤注一掷的疯狂，要么就是野心过大，不切实际。我们必须查明真相。自那场无人察觉的 “刺杀企图” 后，我便再未见过她。阿坎萨斯或许知晓内情。务必小心，此地的暗影中藏着致命危险。确保汇报渠道安全。先祖神州永垂不朽。

沃林

</font>

original: I should've been with them. But no, I was at the forge like always. Couldn't bring myself away from my work. Now I've lost them.
string: 我本该陪着他们的。可我没有，我像往常一样待在锻造坊，舍不得放下手里的活。现在我失去了他们。

original: How do you feel about our travel so far?
string: 到目前为止，你觉得我们的旅行怎么样？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>My dearest,

It was wonderful having you in Solitude again. May the wind carry you across the sea and back into my arms again soon. I hope this tart reminds you of our sweet time together.

The little one also wishes you to take her doll with you to keep you safe.

Sincerely,
Your two loves</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>致我最亲爱的人：

能再在独孤城与你相伴，真是美好至极。愿清风载你渡海，早日重回我的怀抱。希望这块果挞，能让你想起我们共度的甜蜜时光。

小家伙还盼着你带上她的玩偶，愿它护你平安。

爱你的
我们</font>
公共区域（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: So you joined the Imperial Legion after all. Finally, something worth writing home about!
string: 你终究还是加入了帝国军团。总算有件值得写信回家说的事了！

original: Vampiric Steel War Axe of Consuming

string: 沉默者居所（从金库支出 2000 金币）

original: Summons a Hulking Draugr for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一名巨型尸鬼，持续<dur>秒

original: After this journey, I'll have proven myself that I can defend those I hold dear. Like my town, like my countrymen... like you.
string: 这趟旅程结束后，我就能证明自己有能力保护我在乎的人。比如我的小镇，我的同胞…… 还有你。

original: The Dark Brotherhood's Notoriety has changed to: Old Wives Tale
string: 黑暗兄弟会的恶名值已变更为：老妇人的传说

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

It is finished. The Emperor's will has been carried out. By your hand, the contract was fulfilled. The Thalmor's leash slackens; a broken Empire cannot be led to Alinor in chains. He chose to make a martyr of himself, and you carried out his will without hesitation. 

A great gift accompanies this note. You have upheld the oldest oath of Stendarr's Blade.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

一切尘埃落定。皇帝的旨意已得以执行，这份契约由你亲手完成。梭默的控制就此松动 —— 一个分崩离析的帝国，再也无法被枷锁拖往艾利诺。他选择以殉道者之身成就大业，而你毫不犹豫地践行了他的意志。

随这封手札而来的，是一份厚礼。你已然坚守了斯坦达尔之刃最古老的誓言。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: J'Faar admits he was wrong. Listener is not too cautious for following strange letters. Good to know.
string: 杰法尔承认自己错了。聆听者追查陌生信件并非过于谨慎，真好。

original: It's time for us to part ways.
Ah, I see. Yes, I see indeed.
string: 啊，我明白了。我确实明白了。

original: When we're done killing things, do you want a belly-scratch, love?
string: 等我们杀够了，要不要我给你挠挠肚子，亲爱的？

original: Oh... In truth, I was hoping you did.
string: 哦…… 说实话，我希望你是认真的。

original: Be wise and acknowledge the mercy in that.
string: 识相点，就该明白这是我的仁慈。

original: Morrowind Contract: Kill a Hlaalu Merchant (Medium-Risk)
string: 晨风契约：杀死一位哈拉鲁商人（中等风险）

original: We have been watching you, Listener. Ever since you met with Amaund Motierre and accepted his contract.
string: 我们一直在关注你，聆听者。从你见到阿蒙·莫蒂耶并接下他的契约那一刻起。

original: Summons a Dark Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把黑暗誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: This place feels... Awful. There is a great evil at work here, I can sense it.
string: 这地方感觉…… 很糟糕，我能感觉到有一股巨大的邪恶力量在作祟。

original: I like the snow... but there comes a point where it's just too much. Let's find somewhere with a hearth.
string: 我喜欢雪…… 但也有个限度，我们找个有壁炉的地方吧。

original: (Khajiit) Khajiit's paws has threaded many dangerous paths to gather this knowledge ... (Persuade)
string: （虎人）虎人的爪子踏过了无数危险的路途才收集到这些知识……（说服）

original: What do I get in return?
string: 那我能得到什么回报呢？

original: Sometimes, it feels like I lose sight of why I'm even here - just fighting and pressing on, as if that's all this adventure amounts to.
string: 有时候，我甚至不知道自己为什么在这里 —— 只是不停战斗、前进，仿佛这就是冒险的全部意义。

original: And what do the Vateshran say?
string: 那瓦特什兰是怎么说的？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

I found who posed as Lirael all these years: Sybille Stentor. Acanthus confirmed it and hid the proof before she got him. The one you killed was a double, covering while she played Lirael. Acanthus thought Lord Volkrov, a vampire in Shriekwind Bastion, knows how to find her. Don't wait; end her before she hides again.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

我已查明这些年来冒充莉瑞尔的人究竟是谁 —— 正是希比利·斯丹特。阿坎萨斯在遭她毒手前，不仅证实了这一点，还藏好了相关证据。你此前击杀的不过是个替身，趁她假扮莉瑞尔时为其打掩护。阿坎萨斯认为，啸风棱堡的吸血鬼沃尔克罗夫勋爵知晓找到她的办法。切莫迟疑，务必在她再次隐匿前将其解决。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: I've found a merchant willing to lend her seal to Aunt Gormli's forgery, but I need to track it down first.
string: 我找到了一位商人，她愿意为戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书盖章，但我得先把她的印章找回来。

original: Ugh, of course it was one of the spirits. I don't know this one, but I'm not sure any Reachman has ever partied this hard, either. I need some water.
string: 呃，果然是某个灵体搞的鬼。我不认识这个灵体，但我肯定没有哪个边塞人这么疯玩过，我要喝点水。
在断胫山隘找到瓦塔尔

original: I did, what do you know about them?
string: 我问过了，你对他们了解多少？
我不知道我的父母是谁。

original: Oh but it wouldn't be so hard. Just run up and shove it in his hand like a plow handle.
string: 不过这也不难。直接跑过去，把信塞他手里就行，跟塞个犁柄似的。

original: By the gods... I don't even know what to say...
string: 神啊……我都不知道该说什么好……

original: You're going to get that back in shovel loads!
I have gone further in and it seems there are two forts down here. I will have to investigate both of them.
string: 我往深处走了一段，发现这里竟然有两座堡垒。我必须把两座堡垒都调查一遍。
我惹你不快了吗，聆听者？

original: Morrowind Contract: Kill an Indoril Priest (High-Risk)
string: 晨风契约：杀死一位因多瑞尔祭司（高风险）

original: I've heard tales of the Companions of Whiterun, but I never imagined I'd join them alongside you!
string: 我听过白漫战友团的传说，却从没想过会和你一起加入他们！

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Evoking
I'd like training in Restoration magic.
Such a menial task. I think he's embarrassed by how hard you hit him.
string: 真是琐碎的任务，我看他是被你打怕了，觉得丢人。

original: It's time for us to part ways.
J'Faar is, as they say, an open book. What would you like to know, my Listener?
string: 正如人们所说，杰法尔的事没什么好隐瞒的。你想知道什么，我的聆听者？

original: I've read a copy of the book Fall of the Snow Prince, which told the tale of an Ancient Snow Elf warrior buried on the isle of Solstheim. The prince's body was interred in a nordic burial crypt on the slopes of Moesring Pass. I should journey there and see this tomb for myself.
string: 我读了《雪王子的陨落》，书中讲述了一位长眠于索瑟海姆岛的远古雪精灵战士的故事。这位王子的遗体安葬在莫斯灵山口山坡上的一座诺德墓穴之中。我应当前往那里，亲眼看一看这座陵墓。

original: There are warmer parts of Skyrim we can visit, right?
string: 我们能去天际暖和点的地方逛逛吧？

original: I wonder if our people will ever reach the Dwemer's level of advancement.
string: 我好奇我们的族人是否能达到锻莫的科技水平。

original: Oh, ok. Well if you want a story, you know where to find me.
string: 哦，好吧。要是你想听故事了，知道去哪儿找我。

original: I do find it interesting to discover what is afterlife, even when I never lived in the first place.
string: 探索来世的奥秘确实很有趣，即便我从未真正活过。

original: You left the Cidhna Mine and took gold from Thonar Silver-Blood. Did you... did you help him murder Madanach?
string: 你离开了希讷矿坑，还拿了索纳尔・银血的金子。你…… 你是不是帮他杀了迈德纳奇？
演说者居所（从金库支出 3000 金币）

original: I'm just joking. Both are pretty good. Come on, let's get moving.
string: 我开玩笑的，都挺不错的。走吧，我们继续赶路。

original: Woah, I'm quite fond of you - but that seems a little fast, don't you think? Is that how it works here in Skyrim? I'd much prefer we court first.
string: 哇，我很喜欢你 —— 但这是不是太快了？天际的人都这么谈恋爱吗？我更希望我们先正式追求彼此。

original: "Drunk" and "Huntsman" probably shouldn't be said in the same sentence.
string: “醉鬼” 和 “猎户” 这两个词放在一起，怎么想都不对劲。

original: My ring? What would you have with my ring?
string: 我的戒指？你想要我的戒指做什么？

original: Find out where the apostle could be

I found the corpse of a vampire hunter in Deephowl Hollow, captured and killed by a vicious vampire clan. Their leader seems to have discovered a vile new form of corpse magic. I should look around and learn more about the horrible things that are happening here.
string: 我在深嚎山谷发现了一名吸血鬼猎人的尸体，他遭一个凶残的吸血鬼氏族捕获杀害。这个氏族的首领似乎掌握了一种邪恶的新型尸体魔法。我该四处探查，更多地了解这里发生的恐怖事件。

original: I hate to get my hands dirty!

string: 力量书：古代诺德誓约之刃
秘闻 - 威瑟斯的日记 1

original: Maybe that failed assassination is a sign. Killing the Emperor isn't your fate... Please, my friend - reconsider.
string: 或许那次暗杀失败是个征兆。刺杀皇帝并非你的宿命…… 求你了，我的朋友，再考虑考虑。

original: Good. Your talents should serve a greater purpose, if you ask me.
string: 那就好。依我看，你的才能应该用来做更有意义的事。

original: You should've stayed in your grave.
Teleports the caster to the Inquisitor's Hideout.
string: 将施法者传送至审判官的藏身处

original: Well, one could say that if you do not feel particularly inspired by either side, you could abstain and not partake in the war.
string: 好吧，有人会说，如果你对两边都没什么好感，你可以弃权，不参与这场战争。

original: If I were them, I'd be embarrassed.
string: 要是我是他们，我都觉得丢人。

original: I've been waiting for someone of your... Distinction to come along for a while now. I'm in need of a protector.
string: 我已经等了好一阵子，就盼着像你这样…… 与众不同的人出现。我需要一个保护者。

original: Things fell apart after that. There were only three of us left. Cicero went mad, and Pontius got himself torn apart by bandits.
string: 从那以后，一切都垮了。我们只剩下三个人。西塞罗疯了，庞提乌斯则被土匪撕成了碎片。

original: I'm guessing they call it the "Blade of Woe" for a reason?
string: 我猜他们叫它 “哀伤之刃” 是有原因的吧？

original: What a gorgeous lady you are!
Another task from Peryite. How fitting. I hope there's a shiny reward at the end of this, though...
string: 又是佩里廷的任务，真合适。希望最后能有个闪亮的奖励……
法师新入教者（从金库支出 1000 金币）

original: A Breton? Or kinsman, perhaps? Maybe the spirits led you up the climb to Faolan's Rest.
string: 布莱顿人？或许是同族？说不定是灵体指引你爬上费奥兰之息的。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Sword of Harrowing
I have assigned all of the Night Mother's current contracts, now it is up to my brothers and sisters to carry them out. I should wait until they are finished before trying to get more.
string: 我已分配完夜母当前的所有契约，接下来就看兄弟会的同伴们去执行了。我该等他们完成任务后，再去获取新的契约。

original: No matter where we go, everything is set on killing us. These automatons will be no different, I expect.
string: 无论我们去哪儿，所有东西都想杀了我们，这些自动人偶估计也不例外。

original: Hard to believe, I know, but that's what happened. And only myself and a few others were able to escape from the attack.
string: 我知道这听起来难以置信，但事实就是如此。那场袭击中，只有我和少数几个人逃了出来。

original: The missing apostle has written about going to Kagrumez. I should explore the area and see if I can find anything about his whereabouts. His staff seems to react to some crystals, which open doors; I should keep this information in mind.
string: 失踪的使徒留下文字说要去卡古梅兹。我应当去那片区域探查一番，看看能否找到关于他下落的线索。他的法杖似乎能对某些水晶产生反应，这些水晶还能开启大门，我得把这个线索记在心里。

original: Has a small chance to stagger the target.
Are we settling down? Maybe farming could be the life for us. Only joking.
string: 我们要在这儿定居吗？说不定务农适合我们呢。开个玩笑而已。

original: By the Great Spirits... I've never seen something like this view until now. It's quite something else to witness it without the bars.
string: 以伟大的灵体之名…… 我这辈子从没见过这样的景色。不用隔着牢笼看，感觉完全不一样。

original: Summons a Daedric Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把魔族誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: I hope this won't take much longer!
Why would you kill Barbas? There are plenty of axes in the world, but there's only one pup like him!
string: 你为什么要杀巴尔巴斯？世上有那么多斧头，可只有一只像它这样的小狗！

original: Conjure Storm Atronach + Wrathman + Frost Rune
string: 召唤风暴元素 + 狂暴亡灵 + 寒霜符文

original: Arnbjorn tried to hunt me down and kill me, but Ald�ric found me first. Hehehe. Lucky me!
string: 安布约恩还想追杀我，结果奥德里克先找到了我。嘿嘿嘿。我可真幸运！

original: A Khajiit? You're a long way from warm sands, friend. What brings you to the Reach?
string: 虎人？朋友，你离温暖的沙漠可太远了，你来边塞干什么？

original: No, I have nothing to do with them. I'm <Alias=Player>, why are you in a cage?
string: 不，我和他们没关系。我是<Alias=Player>，你为什么被关在笼子里？

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Reaping
What Orcish blabber do I hear? Are you attempting to frighten me, stranger?
string: 我听到的是哪门子兽人胡言？陌生人，你想吓唬我吗？

original: Here's one Nord you won't kill!
string: 你们杀不了我这个诺德人！

original: May Sotha Sil bless your many labors.
string: 愿索萨・希尔保佑你的诸多劳作。

original: No. I just killed Alduin like that. He's only a big lizard in the end.
string: 没有，我就那么杀了奥杜因，说到底他不过是只大蜥蜴。

original: Are you... are you sure? I can make myself useful. I cook, I tell stories, I know a few healing spells, and I'll fight when I get the chance!
string: 你…… 你确定吗？我能帮上忙的，我会做饭、讲故事，还会几个治疗法术，有机会的话我也会战斗的！

original: Let's go find some bandits for you to snack on, shall we?
string: 我们去找些山贼给你当点心，怎么样？

original: Ahh. Now that's what I like to hear. Who needs stealth when you can just bash your way to the target?
string: 啊哈。这话说到我心坎里了。既然能一路猛冲打到目标面前，还要潜行干嘛？

original: Aye. When darkness floods all of Nirn. Our stories say the end will begin as brother turns on brother, and the land is soaked in the blood of kin.
string: 是啊。当黑暗席卷整个奈恩星。我们的故事里说，终结将始于兄弟相残，大地被亲人的鲜血浸染。

original: Use [Shout] to mark targets for assassination.
string: 使用[龙吼]标记暗杀目标。

original: Focus fire on the dragon's wings!
string: 集中火力攻击龙的翅膀！

original: I appreciate you bringing me to this place.
string: 谢谢你带我来这个地方。

original: I'm sorry, but as a Factotum, I cannot be sorry for your loss.
string: 抱歉，但作为构装体，我无法为你的损失感到抱歉。

original: I don't want to say those ingredients sound arbitrary, but... Peryite is the Spirit of Tasks. You know? Task for task's sake...
string: 我不想说这些材料选得太随意，但…… 佩里廷是执掌任务的灵体，你懂的？就是为了任务而任务……

original: We'll wipe the floor with you, bandit scum!
string: 土匪渣滓，我们要把你打得落花流水！

original: I'm glad this place is secluded. No doubt Skyrim's citizens would find a way to ruin it were it a popular destination.
string: 真庆幸这地方人迹罕至，要是成了热门景点，天际的人准能把它糟蹋了。

original: I have taken the crown and now it is mine to keep. It feels kind of strange.
string: 我拿走了王冠，现在它归我所有了。只是这王冠摸起来感觉有些奇怪。

original: Still, you have to appreciate the knowledge within these walls. I'm sure the library would keep us busy for a few years.
string: 但你不得不佩服这墙内藏着的知识，我敢肯定图书馆够我们泡上好几年。

original: Oh... I'm sorry. That must be difficult. My mother died during childbirth, so I never knew her, but I still had my father.
string: 哦…… 我很抱歉，那肯定很难熬。我母亲生我的时候去世了，所以我从没见过她，但我还有父亲。

original: Summons a Bloodskal Oathblade for <8> hours within close proximity to the caster's location.
string: 在施法者附近召唤一把血吟誓约之刃，持续 8 小时

original: I'm trying to stay optimistic about our odds against a dragon!
string: 面对一条龙，我还在努力保持乐观！

original: I'm not too sure I belong here. Shall I wait outside?
string: 我不太确定我该不该待在这儿，要不我在外面等？

original: Don't waste my time, outlander. Bring me the required materials. Goodbye.
string: 别浪费我的时间，外乡人。把需要的材料拿来再说。再见。

original: Reach witches have long sought power in the Rift, at least since the Second Era. I wonder what brought this coven here...
string: 至少从第二纪元起，边塞女巫就一直在裂谷寻求力量，我好奇是什么把这个女巫会引到这里来的……

original: We should definitely be sleeping right now. Never mind, onwards we go.
string: 我们现在真该去睡觉了。不过没关系，继续前进吧。

original:
Few words are still discernible among these faded notes The 4th of Rain's hand
... An aspect of Hircine perhaps, or one of his lesser disciples? A promise of boons in exchange for some base desires no doubt. The Draugr keep a vigilant watch over the library, I cannot gain but brief access.
string:
褪色字条中仍可辨认的零星字句 雨手月四日
…… 或许是赫尔辛的某一面相，又或是他的某个低阶信徒？无疑，是以些许卑劣欲求换取恩赐的承诺。尸鬼在图书馆外守得严密，我只能短暂潜入其中。

original: So, that was the infamous Gallus. Is that what's going to happen to you when you die?
string: 原来那就是大名鼎鼎的加卢斯。你死后也会变成这样吗？

original: The door has been corrupting him for a long, long time.
string: 那扇门腐蚀他已经很久很久了。

original: Time to try out that new spell!

string: 只是…… 运气好打中了。

original: I try not to think too much about you, honestly. You still need to prove yourself.
string: 说实话，我尽量不去多想你。你还得证明自己的价值。

original: I'm afraid this armored factotum was Apostle Renos.
string: 恐怕这个装甲构装体就是使徒雷诺斯。

original: His thirst for knowledge over automatons lead him to delve into the mechanical heaven left behind by the Dwemer.
string: 他对自动机械的求知欲，促使他深入研究锻莫留下的机械天堂。
现已执掌马卡斯城家族。

original: High Rock Contract: Kill a Mercenary (Medium-Risk)
string: 高岩契约：杀死一位佣兵（中等风险）

original: Any thoughts about Skyrim's civil war?
string: 你对天际的内战有什么看法？

original: I wonder what mother has cooked for supper. Soup, I hope.
string: 不知道妈妈晚饭做了什么，希望是汤吧。

original: No living can be allowed in the Soul Cairn. I suppose it is a good thing that I am not a living person.
string: 灵魂石冢不允许活物进入。幸好我不是活物，这倒是件好事。

original: The door is closed. But Renos' staff could be the key? Try hitting the crystal with a lightning bolt.
string: 门关上了。但雷诺斯的法杖会不会是钥匙？试试用闪电术击中那块水晶。

original: I'm afraid I have some bad news.
string: 恐怕我要带来一些坏消息。

original: Either way, thank you traveler. This is where we part.
string: 不管怎样，谢谢你，旅人。我们就在此分别吧。

original: Alright, I'll retrieve two sets of dragon cultist robes for you.
string: 好吧，我去给你取回两套拜龙教长袍。

original: I see. You know killing clients is bad for business, right Listener? So why *did* you kill him?
string: 我明白了。你知道杀客户对生意不利吧，聆听者？那你为何要杀他？

original: But it concerns your beautiful and distinguished ring.
string: 不过这事和你那枚精美非凡的戒指有关。

original: That should be more than enough to make that priestess happy, right? Why don't we rest here before we head out.
string: 这些应该足够让那个女祭司满意了吧？我们出发前在这儿休息一下吧。

original:
I am <font color='#125E00'>Green</font>!
I am <font color='#FFE066'>Yellow</font>!
I am <font color='#CF4800'>Orange</font>!
I am <font color='#AB0000'>Red</font>!
string:
我是<font color='#125E00'>绿色</font>！
我是<font color='#FFE066'>黄色</font>！
我是<font color='#CF4800'>橙色</font>！
我是<font color='#AB0000'>红色</font>！

original: Though I'm sure the professors here will do an excellent job.
string: 不过我相信这儿的教授们会做得很好。
海盗船长 - 冰狼比约恩

original: Looks like I'll be keeping my blood.
(Arch-Mage) I am responsible for all our students, and I will find these straylings.
string: （首席法师）我要对学院所有学生负责，我会找到这些迷路的孩子。
落锤契约 | 中等风险

original: Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original: They cause upheaval in Skyrim, broke families apart all because of a warlord's ambition. That's against everything I was taught!
string: 他们在天际制造动荡，让无数家庭支离破碎，只因为一个军阀的野心。这和我所受的教育背道而驰！

original:
Contract Kill an Elder Councilor Province: Cyrodiil Difficulty: Very High-Risk Reward: 1500-2000 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] Yet another member of the Empire's esteemed Elder Council has performed the Black Sacrament. They seek to tip the scales in an important upcoming vote by eliminating a member of their rival political faction. Meet with the client and eliminate the Elder Councilor. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名元老议员 省份： 赛瑞迪尔 难度： 极高风险 报酬: 1500-2000金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 又一位帝国尊贵的上古议会成员举行了黑暗祭礼。为了在即将到来的一场重要投票中占据上风，此人打算铲除敌对政治派系的一名成员。 与委托人接头，铲除元老议员. [pagebreak]

original: Woah... I wasn't expecting this. I hope that didn't hurt you too much.
string: 哇…… 我可没料到会这样，希望你没受太重的伤。

original: Being captured by this lot would truly be a nightmare.
string: 要是被这帮家伙抓住，那才真叫噩梦。

original: Recruitment Started: The Speaker of the Whiterun Sanctuary has departed.
string: 招募启动：白漫城圣所的传声者已出发招募新人。

original: I can't believe people live like this... I wonder if my father knows.
string: 真不敢相信有人过着这样的日子…… 不知道我父亲知不知道这些。

original: Don't you see? You'll risk turning blind!
string: 你还不明白吗？你会有失明的风险！

original: Through what - bloody conquest? Turning Nords against Nords?
string: 靠什么 —— 血腥的征服？让诺德人自相残杀？

original: Should we grab a job or two from Vex and Delvin? Or maybe sell some of that contraband you've been making me haul around...
string: 我们要不要从薇珂丝和德尔文那儿接几个活儿？或者把你一直让我扛着的那些走私货卖了点？

original: Summon Bloodskal Oathblade
string: 召唤血吟誓约之刃

original: We were sent back to the foothills on the eve of the city's recapture, separated once again. But this time, there was no more pining.
string: 在帝都收复的前夜，我们被派回山麓，再次分散行动。但这一次，我们心中再无遗憾。
法术书: 召唤毒牙恶鼠

original: The Wayward Guardians were a group of Reachfolk who utilized Dwemer relics in war. Maybe I should pick up some things while we're here...
string: 迷途守卫是一群在战争中使用锻莫遗物的边塞人，或许我们该在这儿找点东西……

original: I've been sent by a friend to ask a favor.
string: 我受朋友所托，来求你帮个忙。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

A new dead drop is ready in Markarth, inside a Dwemer chest on the path to the Temple of Dibella. It links to the Whiterun barrel, so anything you put in one goes to the other.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

马卡斯城已备好新的秘密交接点，就在前往迪贝拉神庙的路上，一个锻莫宝箱内。该交接点与白漫城的木桶互通，你放入其中一处的物品，会传送至另一处。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Can you change your fighting style?
Nord ruins are impressive, but why don't their dead ever stay dead? Our dead only wake when called, never wander their crypts aimlessly...
string: 诺德遗迹确实壮观，但他们的死者为什么总不安宁？我们的死者只有被召唤时才会醒来，绝不会在地穴里漫无目的地游荡……

original: What in Peryite's name is a jester doing with a coffin? He playing pranks with a dead body or something? Gods, I don't even want to find out...
string: 佩里廷在上，一个弄臣拿着棺材干什么？他在拿尸体恶作剧还是怎么着？老天，我连想都不想知道……

original: Your magic won't save you here.
Conjure Armored Frost Troll
string: 召唤装甲雪地巨魔

original: Do you know the Longhouse Emperors? Some say they ended at Hroldan with the rise of Hjalti. I say Hjalti himself was the last of them.
string: 你知道长屋皇帝吗？有人说他们随着希亚尔提的崛起，在赫洛丹走向终结，而我认为希亚尔提本人就是最后一位长屋皇帝。

original: I still wonder how you manage to find all these gorgeous places.
string: 我还是好奇，你怎么总能找到这么多美景。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel War Axe of Evoking
I think we have unearthed something terrible in Saarthal. We should proceed with extreme caution.
string: 我觉得我们在萨瑟尔城发现了很可怕的东西，我们必须极其谨慎地行事。

original: Factotums are mechanical beings created by Sotha Sil to maintain the Clockwork City.
string: 构装体是索萨・西尔为维护发条城而创造的机械生命。

original: Summerset Isles Contract: Kill an Exiled Royal (High-Risk)
string: 夏暮岛契约：杀死一位流亡王室成员（高风险）

original: You shouldn't listen to my conversations.
Among my clan, the gift was normally a ring. My mother's was gold, carved with the markings of the Reach spirits.
string: 在我的氏族里，通常会送一枚戒指。我母亲的那枚是金的，刻着边塞灵体的印记。

original: Retrieve the pelt from the beast's corpse
string: 从野兽尸体上取回皮毛

original: By the spirits, look at that view!
Don't worry, I think I can take them.
I have no further concerns to raise.
Everything just feels so... Cold. I know the place is made of stone, but no amount of skins and furs seems to liven this place up.
string: 这儿的一切都感觉好…… 冷。我知道这地方是石头建的，但再多的兽皮也没法让这儿热闹起来。

original: Factotums have a built-in processor for small talk, but it is currently in maintenance.
string: 构装体内置了闲聊处理器，但目前它正在维护中。

original: It's a disgrace! He should be off fighting like his father! Like his uncle! Like a true Nord!
string: 真是丢人现眼！他本该像他父亲那样去战斗！像我这个舅舅一样！像个真正的诺德人一样！
召唤幽灵之母

original: I really wish you had come to that resolution sooner.
string: 我真希望你早点做出这个决定。

original: I was instructed by my protectors back home. Since my birth, I have been watched over by a pair of Altmer brothers, Ormar and Sindan.
string: 我家乡的护卫们教了我不少本事。从我出生起，就有一对高精灵兄弟 —— 奥玛尔和辛丹一直在照看我。
力量书：梅法拉的誓约之刃

original: We're the keepers of lore and history in the Reach. We can see and commune with the spirits - both the ones you call Daedra and those of nature.
string: 我们是边塞传说与历史的守护者。我们能看见并与灵体交流 —— 包括你们口中的魔族，还有自然之灵。

original: The Mistress of Shadows guides you.
I'm not saying that this woman doesn't deserve this, but is murder really the right answer?... He's just a little boy. He doesn't know what he wants.
string: 我不是说这女人罪不至此，但杀人真的是正确的选择吗？…… 他只是个小男孩，根本不知道自己想要什么。
其实，或许现在还不是时候。

original: How come I've never heard of you?
A freezing whirlwind that does <mag> points of frost damage per second to Health and Stamina.
string: 放出一股极寒旋风，对生命和耐力造成每秒<mag>点寒霜伤害。

original: This city is as imposing as it is vile. The farther we stay from it, the better.
string: 这座城市既威严又邪恶。我们离它越远越好。

original: I discovered a forgotten journal in The Retching Netch. It belonged to an individual by the name of Valin Selvani, who had discovered the secret to making a new type of Dwemer equipment. His notes mention a set of schematics, I should search his belongings and see about finding them.
string: 我在呕吐气母发现了一本被遗忘的日记。日记的主人名叫瓦林・塞尔瓦尼，他发现了制造新型锻莫装备的秘密。他的笔记里提到了一套设计图纸，我该去搜查他的遗物，看看能不能找到图纸。

original: Now her soul rests in the void, under the eternal presence of our terrible Dread Father.
string: 如今她的灵魂安息在虚空中，永远伴在我们威严可怖的恐惧之父身旁。

original: I need more time to make your armor. Come and see me again later.
string: 我还需要点时间打造盔甲，晚点再来找我吧。
赛瑞迪尔契约 | 高风险
斯尼尔迪尔私人保险箱钥匙

original: I'll be with you for this hunt. The Silver Hand are our prey.
string: 这场狩猎我陪你一起，银手就是我们的猎物。

original: Greetings. How can I help you today?
string: 你好。今天我能为你做些什么？

original: Summons a Chaurus Hunter Familiar for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只巢蚁猎手魔宠，持续<dur>秒

original: I just wanted to say... When I first saw you outside Riverwood, I didn't expect we would get along so well together.
string: 我只是想告诉你…… 当初在河木镇外第一次见到你时，我从没想过我们会这么合得来。

original: Aw, you're sweet. My pa would've skinned you alive for saying that though, just be glad he isn't here now.
string: 哎呀，你真贴心。不过我爸要是听到你这么说，非活剥了你不可，幸好他现在不在。

original: When she ordered the Corinthe Sanctuary to be closed down, this one refused to comply.
string: 当她下令关闭科林瑟圣所时，我拒绝服从。

original: Drains the life force of those it strikes.
string: 击中目标时汲取其生命力。

original: The leader of the Deephowl Hollow vampire clan has discovered a sinister new form of necromancy. I've encountered one of his revenant creations and managed to destroy it. If this clan manages to create an army of revenants, they could become a serious threat to the people of Skyrim. According to his journal, their leader has locked himself in his inner sanctuary, and two vampires carry the keys required to open the way. I have to get those keys.
string: 深嚎山谷吸血鬼氏族的首领发现了一种邪恶的新型亡灵魔法。我遭遇了他创造的一具亡魂，并成功将其摧毁。倘若这个氏族造出一支亡魂大军，他们将成为天际民众的巨大威胁。从他的日记中得知，其首领将自己锁在了内殿里，有两名吸血鬼持有开启通路的钥匙。我必须拿到那些钥匙。

original:
These numbers will change how far along the questline that the player will be asked to infiltrate each faction. The questline is 18 stages long, with the factions suggested throughout, but you can change when it happens if a different time fits your character better. Setting a stage to 0 will disable that factions suggestion if you don't want to do that one.

Brotherhood: (%.0f)
Dawnguard: (%.0f)
string:
这些数值将决定玩家在任务线中接到渗透各阵营任务的进度节点。该任务线共含 18 个阶段，游戏会在过程中陆续建议玩家加入各阵营；若你认为其他节点更贴合角色发展，可自行调整触发时机。若不想接取某阵营的加入建议，将对应阶段设为 0 即可关闭该提示。

黑暗兄弟会：(%.0f)

黎明守卫：(%.0f)

original: I'd better check I'm not carrying any heretical artefacts. You didn't sneak one on me, did you?
string: 我得检查一下，我可没带什么异端文物。你没偷偷塞给我一个吧？

original: You must be missing me by now.
"Hail Namira, Spirit Queen, Skein-Weaver, Silent Midwife. Each beginning must have its end, Dark Mother of Death and Life..."
string: “向娜米拉致敬，灵体女王，命运编织者，沉默的产婆。万物有始必有终，死亡与生命的黑暗之母……”

original: That's not fair to him. He simply didn't have enough time to know you.
string: 这对他不公平，他只是没足够的时间了解你。

original: Summons a Snowy Sabre Cat for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的位置召唤一只雪地剑齿虎，持续<dur>秒

original: All spells are <mag>% stronger for <5> minutes.
string: 所有法术强度提升<mag>%，持续 5 分钟。

original: A test under a Companion's watch, eh? Think he's rating both our performances? I bet I'll do better than you.
string: 在战友团成员的注视下接受考验，哈？你觉得他在给我们俩的表现打分？我打赌我肯定比你做得好。

original: I, uh, lost it a few nights ago in the Argonian assemblage. I can't quite remember the details except the next morning it was gone.
string: 呃，我几天前在亚龙人聚居地把它弄丢了。具体细节我记不清了，只知道第二天早上就没了。

original: After my exile, I developed a uhh... minor gambling habit.
string: 被流放后，我养成了一个呃…… 小小的赌博习惯。

original: What do you think of Old Hroldan?
string: 你觉得古赫洛登怎么样？
法术书: 召唤魔人战士

original: Look at all these fetishes and hex marks. A Hag has made her lair here.
string: 看看这些护身符和诅咒标记，有女巫在这里筑巢了。

original: I should pick up the note as well.
string: 我也得把这张纸条一并收好。
宴会厅（从金库支出 2500 金币）

original: Gormli! You old clod! What's this nonsense?
string: 戈尔米！你这个老糊涂！这荒唐事是怎么回事？

original: You've stopped Alduin and brought hope to Skyrim. I like to think I played a part in that.
string: 你击败了奥杜因，为天际带来了希望。我愿意相信，我也在其中出了一份力。

original: Tell me more about your clan.
string: 跟我多说说你的氏族吧。

original: I would like someone to take me to see Skyrim's glories. I am capable, but I'd hate to witness the wonders of this Province by myself.
string: 我想有人带我去看看天际的壮丽景色。我并非无能之辈，可我不想独自欣赏这片省份的奇观。

original: Withers Goldenspoon's journal Day 2 I have found my way out of the ice and into Nordic ruins, just as Urag's book suggested. I have come across the remains of Imperial soldiers, they must be from the older expedition. They fought the undead here.
string: 威瑟斯・金匙的日记 第二日 我终于走出了冰隧道，踏入了诺德遗迹之中，和乌拉格的书中记载的分毫不差。我撞见了帝国士兵的遗骸，他们肯定是早先那支探险队的人。这些人曾在此地与不死者交战。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Stendarr's Blade found a dark figure: a <Alias=Bounty> at <Alias=Dungeon> working with the locals. If they learn those arts, their danger to Tamriel will grow fast. Sneak in and remove the threat quietly. Or just kill them all. Your reward will be at the nearest dead drop.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>，

斯坦达尔之刃发现了一个邪恶之徒：<Alias=Bounty>正藏身于<Alias=Dungeon>，与当地势力勾结。若他们习得那些邪术，其对泰姆瑞尔的威胁将迅速加剧。悄悄潜入，暗中清除这一威胁，或是将他们尽数诛杀。你的报酬会放在最近的秘密交接点。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Apostle Renos was a Tarnished from the Clockwork City, who had transferred his soul into a factotum body and went mad. We defeated him in Kagrumez, and my friend the factotum decided to be free from all directives and live its life on its own accord.
string: 雷诺斯使徒是来自发条城的 “黯痕者”，他将自己的灵魂转移到构装体的躯体后变得疯癫。我们在卡古梅兹击败了他，我的机器人朋友决定摆脱所有指令，按自己的意愿活下去。

original: No, me either. That transformation looked painful.
string: 不，我也不愿意，那变身的样子看起来太疼了。
召唤诺德英雄誓约之刃

original: Hang on a moment. The Emperor's personal security force can't a detachment to help us? Is this a joke?
string: 等一下，皇帝的私人护卫队就不能派一队人来帮我们吗？这是在开玩笑吗？

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

I found out who sent the note to Anise about joining the Thalmor, and we need to act fast. Sybille Stentor is Solitude's court wizard, and she's been there for centuries. She's a vampire, and has been pulling strings from the dark. End her now. Reward in the dead drop.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

我已查明是谁给安尼斯发信，怂恿她加入梭默 —— 事不宜迟，我们必须立刻行动。希比利·斯丹特是独孤城的宫廷法师，已在任数百年之久。她实为一名吸血鬼，一直在暗中操纵局势。即刻将其铲除。奖赏已置于秘密投递点。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Turns targets it kills to ash.
string: 被其击杀的目标将化为灰烬

original:
Contract Kill a Legionnaire Province: Skyrim Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 24 Hours

[pagebreak] The widow of a fallen Stormcloak rebel has performed the Black Sacrament to have us exact vengeance on her husband's killer, an Imperial Legionnaire. Meet with the client and eliminate the Legionnaire. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名军团士兵 省份： 天际 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:24 小时

[pagebreak] 这位风暴斗篷叛军的遗孀已举行黑暗祭礼，委托我们向她丈夫的仇人 —— 一名帝国军团士兵 —— 复仇。 与委托人接头，铲除军团士兵. [pagebreak]

original: Wait for Talsric to make the armor
string: 等待塔斯里克打造盔甲

original: As long as we keep the fire stoked we should be fine. My only hope is that this house doesn't have to suffer another killer sweeping through.
string: 只要我们把火生得旺旺的就没事。我只希望这房子别再遭遇杀手肆虐了。

original: This is comfy. Maybe too comfy. But if you like it, I'm happy.
string: 这地方挺舒服的，可能太舒服了。不过你喜欢的话，我就开心。

original: At our height, the Dark Brotherhood had active sanctuaries in four of Skyrim's major cities.
string: 在鼎盛时期，黑暗兄弟会在天际的四座主要城市都有活跃的圣所。

original: Dragon cultist robes? What are you planning?
string: 拜龙教长袍？你在计划什么？

original: Apostle Renos was not fond of fishing, despite all the fabricant fish that exist in the City. Do you like fishing?
string: 尽管城里有各种构装鱼，雷诺斯使徒却不喜欢钓鱼。你喜欢钓鱼吗？

original: Right... I'm not sure I care for that approach. Is that how you treat those who seek to help you?
string: 好吧…… 我可不太喜欢这种方式。你就是这么对待想帮你的人的？

original: Fortify Magicka 10, then double the amount for each additional piece of the Snow Prince's Armor equipped.
string: 法力值增加 10 点，每多装备一件雪王子盔甲，该加成便会翻倍。

original: Do you wish to buy some goods? Proceed when ready.
string: 你想要购买一些货物吗？准备好后请继续。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Winnowing
Let's keep what we have between us, okay? I value you too much to let lovers bickering get in the way.
string: 我们就保持现在这样，好吗？我太珍惜你了，不想让情侣间的争吵破坏一切。

original: Life is valuable, you know. There are some awful people in Skyrim, it's true. But why should it be up to us to decide who lives and who dies?
string: 生命是很宝贵的，你知道的。天际的确有不少坏人，但凭什么由我们来决定谁生谁死？

original: Where's that boy, I ask? Where's that boy sitting while Gormli tends farm?
string: 我问你，那小子在哪？戈尔米在打理农场的时候，那小子躲在哪偷懒？

original:
Contract Kill an Exiled Royal Province: Summerset Isles Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 60 Hours

[pagebreak] When the Thalmor came to power they overthrew the traditional altmer monarchs of the Summerset Isles and drove their families into exile. One of these deposed royals has returned to Alinor with a small band of loyalists to stir up resistance in the countryside, and even the justicars have not been able to root them out. Certain members of the Thalmor government have turned to the Black Sacrament to solve their "royalist" problem. Meet with the client and eliminate the Exiled Royal. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名流亡王室成员 省份： 夏暮岛 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:60 小时

[pagebreak] 梭默掌权后，推翻了夏暮岛传统的高精灵君主，还将其家族尽数驱逐流放。一位遭废黜的王室成员携一小队效忠者重返艾利诺，在乡间煽动反抗活动，就连审判官们也未能将其根除。梭默政府的部分成员遂借助黑暗祭礼，欲解决这一保皇派难题。 与委托人接头，铲除流亡王室成员. [pagebreak]

original: Staff of the Snowy Sabre Cat

<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
The Daedra Heart burns with power, its pulse feeding the seal. The sacrifices now suffice. Their blood sealing the pact. Beneath this place lies the hidden tunnel. Through its depths, the Blood Lord stirs.. Soon, the veil will break, and he will walk this realm once more!
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
魔族之心在力量中灼烧，其脉动滋养着封印。献祭已然足够，他们的鲜血缔结了契约。此地之下，藏着一条秘道。在那深渊之中，鲜血领主正缓缓苏醒…… 很快，位面之幕便会破碎，他将再度行走于这片领域！
</font>

original: We need to get that bastard.
string: 我们得去收拾那个混蛋。

original: Ach, that axe seems awfully... wrong. I wouldn't hold that for too long.
string: 唉，这把斧头感觉很…… 不对劲，别拿太久。

original: You don't look too much worse for wear. There was a moment or two where I thought I was going to melt, but I'm all fine other than that.
string: 你看起来倒没怎么受伤。有那么一两刻，我还以为自己要被烤化了，不过除此之外，我都好好的。

original: I'll be here if you change your mind.
string: 如果你改变主意来这里找我。

original: All spells are <mag>% stronger for <5> minutes.
string: 所有法术强度提升<mag>%，持续 5 分钟。

original: That's... different. The spirits are rejoicing around that sapling. How'd he do that with just a prayer? There has to be some old magic at work...
string: 这…… 太不寻常了，那棵树苗周围的灵体都在欢呼。他怎么光靠祈祷就做到了？肯定有古老的魔法在起作用……

original: What foreigners? The Dunmer who live in slum? Or the Khajiit who barely scrape by outside the city walls?
string: 什么外乡人？是住在贫民窟里的丹莫？还是在城墙外勉强糊口的虎人？
瓦尔纳克・朗加特 - 海盗（追随者）

original: You're back... Did you do it? Is the beast dead?
string: 你回来了…… 成了吗？那野兽死了？

original: Well, so have you, but I wouldn't tell you that. I wouldn't want to damage your fragile ego.
string: 你也一样厉害啊，不过我才不会跟你说这个呢。我可不想伤了你那脆弱的自尊心。

original:
Contract Kill a Breton Heir Province: High Rock Difficulty: Medium-Risk Reward: 500-1000 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] This noble client wishes to move themselves up on the ladder of succession and inheritance. Rather than doing their own dirty work they have performed the Black Sacrament. Meet with the client and eliminate the Breton Heir. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名布莱顿继承人 省份： 落锤 难度： 中等风险 报酬: 500-1000金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 这位贵族雇主一心想在继承权与遗产的阶梯上往上爬，却不愿亲自下手干这肮脏勾当，于是便举行了黑暗祭礼。 与委托人接头，铲除布莱顿继承人. [pagebreak]

original: Maybe I can find this ring back as a wedding gift for you.
string: 或许我能把这枚戒指找回来，当作给你的结婚礼物。

original: I would like to thank you again for giving me a name, I will treasure it for as long as I keep working.
string: 再次感谢你给我取了名字，我会一直珍惜它，只要我还能运作。

original: I see... Being expelled from the City with no means to survive probably took a toll on his health.
string: 我明白了…… 被逐出城市，无法生存，可能严重损害了他的健康。

original: You are as cold blooded as I am, Listener. I can see why the Night Mother chose you.
string: 你和我一样冷血无情，聆听者。我总算明白夜母为何选你了。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

Your actions have caught our attention. We are a hidden group that doesn't seek fame or wealth, just justice for the weak and a balance across Tamriel. You have the skill that could make you one of us in our watchful work.

In the woods west of Riverwood lives Anise, an old woman who hides her real nature. Rumors say she practices dark rituals that put Skyrim's people at risk. Find out her secrets and leave them in the barrel behind Whiterun's Bannered Mare. It's enchanted so only you can see it. If you succeed, we'll contact you again.

In Shadows, We Serve.

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

你的所作所为已然引起我们的注意。我们是一个隐于暗处的组织，不求名利，只为向弱者伸张正义，守护泰姆瑞尔的平衡。你身怀的本领，足以让你加入我们，与我们一同守望这片土地。

河木镇以西的林地中，住着一位名为安尼斯的老妪，她一直掩藏着自己的真实面目。有传言称，她行黑暗仪式，已将天际的民众置于险境。去查清她的秘密，再将其藏至白漫城 战旗母马旅店后方的木桶中。那木桶被施了魔法，唯有你能窥见其中奥秘。若你能成功，我们会再次与你联络。

我们于暗影中效命。

</font>

original:
[pagebreak]

History of the Inquisition Part 2 By Inquisitor Ahmad

[pagebreak]

he first of the Inquisitors were not a formal order, nor were they bound by kings or temples. They were simply those who had lived through the fracture and understood the fragility of existence. They gathered at the Throat of the World, where the greatest scar of the First Dragon Break remained the Time Wound. Here, in the shadow of the mountain, they made their first and greatest oath.. No force shall unmake the world again. They named themselves the Inquisition, for they had come to understand that only a from a desire to perceive the truth of the world, the veil that weighs heavy over reality will be lifted. From their first gathering, the Inquisition set forth laws that would define their actions and hold each other accountable. The Gods Will Not Walk. Neither Aedra nor Daedra may impose their will upon mortals. We should all be free to pursue the truth. Question everything, deny nothing. Dragons Are Pretenders. They are remnants of an age when the world was ruled by their will. Their return is an existential threat to all. Fire burns all who touch it. One Light Holds One Dark. One Inquisitor may act from the shadows, while another may be thrust into the light by their actions. Support the order no matter your role. From this meeting, a holy artifact of the Order was born. The original four Inqusitors thrust their swords through magical texts, into a stone, forever binding themselves, their metal and their spirits, to this world. Thus began their hidden war, not for conquest, but for the preservation of reality itself.
string:
[pagebreak]

审判庭史 第二卷 作者 审判官艾哈迈德

[pagebreak]

最初的审判官们并非正式的组织，也不受国王或神殿的辖制。他们只是一群亲历过现实破碎、深知存在之脆弱的人。 他们聚于世界之喉，这里留存着第一次龙破最触目惊心的伤痕 —— 时间之伤。 在这座巨山的阴影下，他们立下了首个也是最为庄严的誓言：愿无任何力量再令世界崩毁。 他们为自己取名 “审判庭”，因他们已然领悟，唯有怀着探求世界真相的渴望，那层笼罩现实的厚重帷幕才会被揭开。 自首次集会起，审判庭便制定了一系列准则，以此规范自身行动，让彼此相互问责。 神意不临凡世： 创世神与魔族皆不得将其意志强加于凡人。众生皆应享有追寻真相的自由。质疑一切，不否定任何可能。 巨龙乃僭妄之徒： 它们是那个凭己意主宰世界的时代之残遗。其回归对万物而言，皆是关乎存在的致命威胁。烈火灼人，凡触碰者皆将化为灰烬。 一光映一暗： 一名审判官或许潜行于暗影之中行动，另一名却可能因自身所为被迫站在光下。无论身居何位，皆需捍卫组织。 此次集会还催生了教团的一件圣物。最初的四位审判官将佩剑穿透魔法文献，深深刺入一块巨石，将自身、佩剑之金属与灵魂永远束缚于这片世界。他们的隐秘战争自此拉开序幕，这场战争不为征服，只为守护现实本身。

original:
[pagebreak]

Elemental Magic Fire The Account of Berit the Burned by Ilmater Kavious the scribe

[pagebreak]

ere follows the account of Berit the Oak and her curse to be Berit the Burned, until Alduin raises her at the end of all time to hear her renounce the heresy of flame at the gate of Sovngarde. Born the third daughter to Erik of Kart, she trained as an apprentice for the dragon priests from an early age. Her tutelage was unhappy for she sought the forbidden knowledge of flame and heat against the rules of her mentors. The dragon priests caned and rent Berit to curb her insolence but now she was proud and unbending. She rebelled against the dragon priest Volhang and slew him in her wrath. Thus she fled and was for a time in the Jerall Mountains. When she returned to Skyrim she brought with her heretic knowledge of flame that she had bought with her youth and many followers hearkened to her might and horns. The dragon Rahmahyol sought her then to bend her stiff knee, he burned into her redoubt and put Berit and her flock aflame and cursed her to sit in hot shame at the doorstep of Sovngarde for all time. Thus was she named in death Berit the Burned.
string:
[pagebreak]

元素魔法 火焰 焚身的贝里特传 作者 文书伊尔马特・卡维奥斯

[pagebreak]

此处记载的是“橡树”贝里特的遭遇，以及她被咒为“焚身的贝里特”的始末 —— 直到世界终结之际，奥杜因将其唤醒，命她在松加德之门摒弃火焰异端之说。 贝里特是卡特的艾瑞克的第三个女儿，年少时便被培养为龙祭司的学徒。这段修行生涯于她而言满是煎熬，因她违背导师的戒律，执意追寻火焰与高温的禁忌知识。龙祭司们曾以鞭笞与割伤惩戒贝里特的桀骜，可她性情孤傲、从不低头。 她公然反抗龙祭司沃尔亢，盛怒之下将其斩杀。此后贝里特仓惶出逃，在杰拉尔山脉藏匿了一段时日。当她重返天际时，已然掌握了以青春换来的火焰异端知识，众多追随者为她的力量所折服，纷纷响应其号召。 巨龙拉玛希尔随即找上门来，欲令她屈膝臣服。巨龙闯入她的藏身处，将贝里特与她的信徒尽数焚烧，并诅咒她永远在松加德的门阶上承受灼痛的羞辱。 也正因如此，她在死后被冠以 “焚身的贝里特” 之名。
