original:
[pagebreak]

Property of Maxima, Vigilant of Stendarr, Cyrodiilic Chapter

[pagebreak]

1st day of Last Seed, 4E201, By Stendarr's grace, who does he think he is? He, who swore an oath to destroy daedra, now seeks to hinder the very tools we've been given to fight them. He keeps the Oathblades hidden, fearing their power, as if they were some dark force. Well, they are not. Summoning these Oathblades is hardly an act of daedric magic. The creation of these powerful entities was carried out by none other than the great Tiber Septim! If they were truly heretical texts, we would have burned every last one long ago. If he will not see the truth, I will be forced to intervene. [pagebreak] 7th day of Last Seed, 4E201, I can hardly believe it. Iskandar actually approved my request to leave for Skyrim! He still does not know I've taken the books, but I'm certain he will soon. In the meantime, Iskandar has charged me with a new quest: track down and rid the land of a rogue exile, who has dared to practice daedric magic. As a Vigilant, I believe it to be my solemn duty to carry out this command. When it comes to putting down these heretics, I must remember to cast aside my empathy. Walk always in the light, or we will drag you to it.
string:
[pagebreak]

马克西芒的财物, 斯坦达尔警戒者, 赛瑞迪尔分会

[pagebreak]

第四纪元 201 年，末种月1日 承蒙斯坦达尔的恩典，他真以为自己是谁？这个立誓消灭魔族的人，如今竟要阻挠我们用以对抗魔族的武器。 他将誓约之刃藏了起来，忌惮其力量，仿佛那是什么黑暗邪物。可它们根本不是。召唤这些誓约之刃，算不上什么迪德拉魔法 —— 这些强大器物的缔造者，正是伟大的泰伯・赛普汀！ 倘若这些典籍真的离经叛道，我们早就将其尽数焚毁了。要是他执意不肯认清真相，我便只能出手干预。 [pagebreak] 第四纪元 201 年，末种月7日 我简直不敢相信。伊斯坎达尔竟然批准了我前往天际的请求！他还不知道我带走了那些书，但我肯定他很快就会发现。 与此同时，伊斯坎达尔给我指派了一项新任务：追踪并清除一名流亡的叛教者，那人竟敢研习魔族魔法。身为斯坦达尔警戒者，我坚信执行这道命令是我庄严的职责。在铲除这些异端时，我必须谨记收起恻隐之心。 要么循光而行，要么我们便将你拖入光明。

original: Do you think they will mind if I borrow a book or twenty?
string: 你觉得我借个一两本书，他们会介意吗？

original: Sounds like a reasonable approach. He seems to be of good intentions and I'd prefer to put my trust in him over a... Well, whatever the Daedra are.
string: 这办法听起来挺合理的。他看起来心怀善意，我宁愿相信他，也不愿相信那些…… 呃，不管魔族到底是什么东西。

original: Ha! So! You've heard of more than just my name, have you?
string: 哈！原来如此！看来你不光听过我的名字，还知道不少事，是吧？

original: You are a member of the hand
Well, this seems like quite the place to rest. Lets see what kind of parties they throw all the way out here.
string: 嗯，这里看着挺适合休息的，看看这么偏远的地方会有什么热闹的聚会。

original: My pa fought for the Empire with his friends once. And now his daughter is doing the same again, defending the Dragon's peace with those she trusts.
string: 我父亲曾和他的朋友为帝国而战。现在他的女儿也和自己信任的人一起，守护着龙之和平。

original: A silver tongue is also inherited but I'll leave any talking up to you since you're taking the lead and all.
string: 巧舌如簧也是家族遗传，但既然你是领头的，那交涉的事就都交给你啦。

original: Peace talks. In Skyrim. I'll try not to laugh.
string: 和谈？在天际谈和谈？我尽量不笑出声。

original: Honed Vampiric Steel Greatsword of Garnering
Conjure Sabre Cat
string: 召唤剑齿虎

original: Shall I accompany you on your travels?
Well that was fun! Who should we kill next?
string: 刚才玩得挺开心！接下来该杀谁了？

original: You're joking. The Dark Brotherhood has become some kind of charity while I was away?
string: 你在开玩笑吧。我离开的这段时间，黑暗兄弟会难不成变成慈善机构了？

original: "Remember, remember, child of the Reach, Faolan's bloody story. Remember, remember, child of the Reach, Red Eagle's final glory."
string: “铭记，铭记，边塞的孩子，费奥兰的血腥故事。铭记，铭记，边塞的孩子，红鹰的最终荣光。”

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
29th of Sun's Dusk

The Falmer keep pushing us deeper into the ruins. We tried retreating the way we came, but they've sealed off every passage behind us. With no other path, we pressed forward - until the cavern opened up into something vast.

A city, or what's left of one. Towers of bronze and stone shimmer in the glow of bioluminescent fungi. This place is terrifying... yet strangely beautiful.

While taking cover behind a crumbled overpass, we witnessed a skirmish - a band of Falmer assaulting a gate guarded by Dwemer automatons. The fight didn't last long. The Falmer lost several of their own before retreating into the shadows. The machines returned through the gates and vanished. Whatever they're protecting, it's important.

We've begun surveying the area carefully. So far, we haven't triggered any defense mechanisms. My guess is the guardians only react when they detect hostility. For our own sake, we should avoid trying to force our way in.
</font>
[pagebreak]
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
2nd of Evening Star

We've spent the better part of the day examining the strange console in front of the building. It looks like a control station of sorts, built right into the stone. At first we thought it was just decorative - Dwemer craftsmanship is often hard to read - but there's a hollow socket at the center, perfectly round, like something was meant to fit inside.

I removed the burnt-out piece that was lodged in there. It's unlike anything I've handled before, but Mieke said she saw something similar a while back on a broken centurion. Maybe some sort of energy core?

We've been careful not to tamper too much. The scorched remains of those Falmer we saw earlier are a clear warning. This place is still active in some form, even if dormant. From what little I can decipher of the engravings and the surrounding parts,
this device could serve as an automated vendor - a kind of ancient trading machine. It seems to demand something of value in exchange for... something else. We haven't figured out what yet, we would have to turn it back on first.
</font>
[pagebreak]
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
12th of Evening Star

We've been holed up here for over a week now. The Falmer won't stop. Every night they come crawling out of the dark, screeching and clawing at anything that moves. We've managed to hold them off so far, but our supplies are dwindling, and sleep is a luxury none of us can afford anymore.

Still no progress on the entrance. The mechanism refuses to respond without that missing component - if that was the key. I thought about putting the burnt core back in just to see what might happen, but it's completely inert. Not worth the risk.

We're tired. Cold. Mieke keeps saying we should leave, but even if we wanted to, we don't know which tunnels are still safe. Every path back is either collapsed or crawling with Falmer. I hate to admit it, but we may have to abandon the research. This place isn't just dangerous - it's sealed for a reason.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
日暮月二十九日

伐莫步步紧逼，将我们逼向遗迹更深处。我们试图沿来路撤退，可身后的每条通道都已被他们封死。别无他路，我们只得继续向前 —— 直到洞穴豁然开朗，展露出一片广袤之地。

那是一座城市，或是城市的残墟。青铜与石头筑成的塔楼，在生物发光真菌的光晕中泛着微光。这地方令人不寒而栗…… 却又透着诡异的美感。

我们躲在坍塌的天桥后暂避时，目睹了一场小规模冲突 —— 一伙伐莫袭击了由锻莫自动机械守卫的大门。战斗并未持续太久，伐莫折损数人后，便退入了阴影之中。那些机械造物退回门内，随即消失不见。无论它们守护的是什么，必定极为重要。

我们已开始谨慎勘察这片区域。截至目前，尚未触发任何防御机制。我猜测这些守卫只有检测到敌意时才会做出反应。为了自保，我们不该试图强行闯入。
</font>
[pagebreak]
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
夜星月二日

我们花了大半天时间研究建筑前那台奇特的控制台。它看着像是某种控制站，直接嵌在石体之中。起初我们以为它只是装饰性的 —— 锻莫的工艺向来晦涩难懂 —— 但控制台正中央有个中空的插槽，形状浑圆规整，显然是用来嵌入某物的。

我取出了卡在插槽里的那块烧坏的部件。这东西是我从未经手过的样式，可米克说她早前在一台破损的百夫长身上见过类似的物件。或许这是某种能量核心？
我们一直小心操作，不敢过度摆弄。先前看到的那些伐莫焦黑遗骸，便是再明确不过的警示。这地方即便处于沉寂状态，也仍以某种形式运转着。从我能勉强解读的铭文和周边部件来看，这台装置或许是一台自动化交易器 —— 一种古老的贸易机械。它似乎要求以有价值的物品作为交换，来换取…… 

另一样东西。我们目前还未弄清具体是什么，得先把它重新启动才行。
</font>
[pagebreak]
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>
夜星月十二日

我们已经在这儿困了一个多星期。伐莫的攻势从未停歇。每到夜里，他们就从黑暗中钻出来，尖啸着扑向任何移动的事物。尽管我们目前还能抵挡，但补给正日渐枯竭，睡眠也成了我们谁都消受不起的奢侈品。

入口的研究依旧毫无进展。少了那个缺失的部件，机械装置就毫无反应 —— 倘若那部件确实是关键的话。我曾想过把烧坏的核心重新装回去，看看会发生什么，可它早已彻底失效。实在不值得冒这个险。

我们疲惫不堪，浑身冰冷。米克总说我们该离开了，可即便我们想走，也不知道哪些隧道还安全。每条返程的路，不是坍塌了，就是爬满了伐莫。我不愿承认，但我们或许不得不放弃这项研究了。这地方绝非仅仅是危险 —— 它被封死，本就事出有因。
</font>

original: If we keep this up, maybe this place won't smell so bad.
string: 要是继续这样清理，这地方的味道或许会好点。

original: The Reach never had a magical school like yours. It worked for me - my mother taught me all I needed to survive, no stuffy classroom required.
string: 边塞从来没有过你们这样的魔法学院，不过我也学得好好的 —— 我母亲教了我所有生存所需的知识，根本不需要沉闷的教室。

original: I'll be happy to have you all to myself...
string: 能独占你的时光，我可太开心了……

original: You're no better than common bandits!
The Thalmor needed a lesson of humility. Who better to teach him that than two brats and a dozen... "watchful" ladies?
string: 梭默需要学点谦卑。还有谁比两个小孩，再加十几个 “警惕” 的妇女更合适教他呢？

original: Can you train me in conjuration?
string: 你能教我召唤系魔法吗？

original: An amplifier? Great, I will install it during my next maintenance.
string: 增幅器？太好了，我会在下次维护时装上它。

original: Festus, Veezara, and all the others, they were my family too.
string: 费斯图斯、维扎拉还有其他人，他们也曾是我的家人。

original: My Clan Elders used to warn us away from the Sea of Ghosts with haunting stories. I hope those stories weren't about what we're going to meet...
string: 我们氏族的长老们以前总用恐怖的故事警告我们远离幽灵之海，希望那些故事里的东西不是我们即将遇到的……

original: I'll take care of the beast for you.
string: 我会帮你解决那只野兽。

original: Oh, I like this city. Trees, graves, the howl of the pack on the wind? Can we stay here a while?
string: 哦，我喜欢这座城市，有树、有坟墓，还有风中狼群的嚎叫？我们能在这儿待一阵子吗？

original: You speak with a lyrical wisdom, my friend. Not many wield weapon and word with equal skill. I see there may be promise to your plea.
string: 朋友，你说话言辞睿智，富有诗意。没几个人能做到文武双全。看来你的请求或许值得考虑。

original: Question is... how do we free Madanach? The Silver-Bloods have him in captivity. Ach, one thing at a time. I should just rejoice for now!
string: 问题是…… 我们该怎么救出迈德纳奇？银血家族把他囚禁起来了。唉，一步一步来吧。我现在先好好高兴一下！

original: The songs call this Old Rorikstead? It doesn't look that old to me. You should see the ruins around Old Hroldan. Now those are old.
string: 歌谣里称这里为老洛里克镇？我看也没那么古老啊，你该去看看老赫洛丹周围的遗迹，那才叫古老。

original: Go with grace, Sera. May the ancestors watch over your path.
string: 愿你一路顺遂，大人。愿先祖守护你的前路。

original: I need your ring to seal a forgery.
string: 我需要你的戒指来封印一份伪造文件。

original: I can hear the spirits howling in the earth, crying for war. It's time... Ready your blades and arrows, and make peace with the Huntmaster!
string: 我能听到大地之下灵体的嚎叫，它们渴望战争。是时候了…… 磨利你的刀剑和弓箭，向狩猎大师致意吧！

original: Damn you! If you turn blind, I promise you - you'll die on the snow alone!
string: 该死的！如果你瞎了，我保证 —— 你会孤零零地死在雪地里！

original: I can put this humidity to the back of my mind with surroundings like this.
string: 有这样的环境，这点湿气我完全可以忽略。

original: The use of this ring to seal a forgery amounts to little less than subversion of the High King himself. Ulfric Stormcloak gave me this ring.
string: 用这枚戒指给伪造文件盖章，无异于公然反抗至高王。这枚戒指是乌弗瑞克・风暴斗篷赐给我的。

original: I have found the cave where Orminlur and Yargul went to search for the Storm tome of Elemental Magic. I should find out what has happened to them.
string: 我找到了奥敏卢尔和亚古尔前去寻找元素魔法・风暴卷的洞穴。我得弄清楚他们遭遇了什么。

original: It's time. I'll defeat Alduin and come back to tell you the tale.
string: 时候到了，我会打败奥杜因，回来给你讲这段经历。

original: Looks like the rebellion is about to be crushed!
Speaker, I have contracts for you to assign.
string: 演说者大人，我有契约需要您分配。

original: As we free the stones from Miraak's grasp, this island becomes safer. He will be weakened when we confront him.
string: 我们把魔石从米拉拉克手中解放出来，这座岛就会更安全。等我们对抗他时，他的力量也会被削弱。

original: Maybe it won't be that bad.
I feel bad watching you try! Should I stand still?
string: 看你这费劲的样子，我都替你难受了！要不我站着不动让你打？

original: The Markarth Sanctuary is not available right now.
string: 马卡斯城圣所目前暂未开放。

original: Huh. I guess I shouldn't have gotten my hopes up... It's the realm of Nord dead, not Reachfolk dead after all.
string: 哈。看来是我期望太高了…… 毕竟这里是诺德的亡者领域，不是边塞的。

original: Well, good in the sense that I'll have the opportunity to make an impression on you without any preconceived notions.
string: 说它好，是因为这样我就能抛开你的固有印象，亲自给你留个印象了。
召唤恶鼠

original: Great, thank you for your input.
One set for my workshop, then. And as for your payment...
string: 一套放进我的工坊，至于给你的报酬……

original: Nearby living creatures, but not undead, machines or daedra, can be seen through walls.
string: 可以穿透墙壁看见附近所有的生物，但亡灵、机器和魔族除外。
艾斯维尔契约 | 极高风险

original: Here's what I'm going to do. I'm going to leave you to handle your spouse. My relationship is with you, not with them.
string: 我打算这么做：我先离开，让你去处理和配偶的事。我和你在一起，又不是和他们。

original: Find my ring and I'll use it to seal your letter.
string: 找到我的戒指，我就用它给你的信盖章。
秘闻 - 谢里瓦的日记 2

original: Should the talking not wait until after?
string: 能不能等事情结束了再聊？

original: Give us all of your gold or we'll gut you! Ha. Just a little joke. No need to call the guards.
string: 把金子都交出来，不然就开膛破肚！哈，开个小玩笑，不用叫守卫。

original: Too bad if you're a student of history, I suppose. Still, they won't know any difference.
string: 要是你是学历史的，那可就太糟了。不过，他们也听不出来差别。

original: Hostile forces incoming. Offensive countermeasures activated.
string: 检测到敌对势力接近。启动攻击性反制措施。

original: Of course, ask away, my friend.

Do you want to claim this sanctuary for (1000) Gold?

Funds will be deposited into your Treasury.
string:
你是否愿以（1000）金币的代价宣占这座圣所？

资金将存入你的金库。
寒霜法术造成的伤害提升10%。

original: A bounty was placed on <Alias=Wizard>'s apprentice, who fled with a ring of dangerous power. His journal revealed he intended to use the artifact for revenge against a bandit chief. I found the apprentice slain, and the stolen ring is now in my possession. <Alias=Wizard> is dead, so the ring cannot be returned - I must decide what to do with its dangerous power.
string: 有人悬赏捉拿 <Alias=Wizard> 的学徒，此人盗取一枚蕴含凶险力量的戒指后潜逃。他的日记显示，他本想靠这件神器向一名强盗首领复仇。我发现学徒已遭杀害，失窃的戒指如今落到了我手里。可 < Alias=Wizard > 已经死了，戒指无从归还 —— 我必须决定，该如何处置这枚蕴含凶险力量的戒指。

original: I want to be able to support you in whatever decisions you make. You are my protector after all. But the Thieves Guild?
string: 无论你做什么决定，我都想支持你。毕竟你是我的保护者。但盗贼公会？

original: Keep an eye out for runes. They're easy to miss, but painful if you do.
string: 小心符文，很容易漏掉，但踩上去就惨了。

original: I am a pacific Factotum model, please refrain from hitting me.
string: 我是和平型构装体，请不要攻击我。

original: Shoots Magic Stone Infused Dwarven Spider dealing <20> points Shock Dmg for 2s. Drain <5> points Stamina for 1s. Chance to stagger foes.
string: 发射注入魔法石的矮人蜘蛛，在 2 秒内造成 20 点闪电伤害，1 秒内抽取 5 点耐力值，并有几率让敌人踉跄。

original: I'm just going to... Digest this information. Congratulations. The Gods have decided that you're special.
string: 我得…… 消化一下这个消息。恭喜你。众神都认定你是特别的。

original: Ah, right. I'll be sure to wait outside next time you pay them a visit.
string: 啊，对。下次你去拜访他们，我肯定会在外面等着的。

original: Reflecting... Query rejected. Thank you for listening.
string: 思考中…… 拒绝该请求。感谢你的倾听。

original: Grrr. Fine, let's get this over with.
string: 呃。行吧，赶紧把这事了结了。
一切就要这样结束了吗？……

original: I know I asked you to take me with you and perhaps I didn't sufficiently clarify what type of person you are but...
string: 我知道是我求你带我一起的，或许我当初没弄清楚你是怎样的人，但是……

original: I overdid my delivery of Aunt Gormli's forgery and was unable to deliver it to her nephew.
string: 我在送戈姆莉姑妈的伪造文书时做得太过火，没能把文书交到她侄子手里。

original: Please welcome the Factotum Commerce Delegate. She needed new pieces to function correctly.
string: 欢迎商务特使构装体。她需要新的零件才能正常运作。

original: Contract Failed: A member of the Windhelm Sanctuary has been killed.
string: 契约失败：风舵城圣所的一名成员已殒命。

original: After finding his journal, I followed a vampire hunter to Deephowl Hollow, where I discovered him captured and killed by a vicious vampire clan. Something strange is going on here; I should look around for clues.
string: 找到猎人的日记后，我跟着一名吸血鬼猎人来到了深嚎山谷，结果发现他被一个凶残的吸血鬼氏族抓住并杀害了。这里肯定有蹊跷，我该四处找找线索。

original: The vampires are already strong, fighting in their unholy frenzy. What sort of weapon can they possibly seek in Dimhollow Crypt?
string: 吸血鬼已经势大，还在疯狂作战。他们到底想在暗空墓穴里找什么武器？
弓箭手新入教者（从金库支出 500 金币）

original: Red Eagle? I'm sure I have a book referencing this place back home.
string: 红鹰？我记得家里有本书提到过这个地方。

original: It was customary for each member of the Black Hand to have a personal assassin called a Silencer, representing the nail of each finger.
string: 按照惯例，黑手的每位成员都有一名专属刺客，名为沉默者，象征着每根手指的指甲。

original: Why are we rescuing this... vampire woman, escorting her home, even? Aren't we vampire hunters? I hope you aren't having any... improper intentions.
string: 我们为什么要救这个…… 吸血鬼女人，甚至护送她回家？我们不是吸血鬼猎人吗？希望你别抱有什么…… 不轨的念头。

original: The very few locals may dislike it, but the college is a sight to behold and it keeps this place on the map.
string: 当地仅存的少数居民或许不喜欢这儿，但学院的景象令人惊叹，也让冬堡没有被人遗忘。

original: Akatosh might rule the sands of time, but Peryite decides where the grains hit the ground.
string: 阿卡托什或许掌控着时间之沙，但佩里廷决定着沙粒落向何方。

original: Talk to your Speakers when you're ready to start making improvements. We'll take care of it for you as long as you have the funds.
string: 等你准备好开始修缮时，就去和你的发言人谈谈。只要资金充足，我们会为你办妥一切。

original: Search the ruins of Nchuand-Zel beneath Markarth for the final Lexicon stand
string: 探索马卡斯城下的楚安德-泽尔遗迹，寻找最后一个方典基座

original: I was warned about ruins just like this one countless times. I'm starting to wish I had listened...
string: 有人无数次警告过我这种遗迹的危险，我现在真希望当初听了……

original:
Contract Kill a Thalmor Justicar Province: Skyrim Difficulty: High-Risk Reward: 1000-1500 Gold Time: 36 Hours

[pagebreak] The Thalmor are hated in Skyrim for their brutality towards Talos worshippers and many have joined the Stormcloak rebellion to seek justice, but this client took another approach. They have performed the Black Sacrament and want us to hunt down the Justicar that killed their family member. Meet with the client and eliminate the Thalmor Justicarr. [pagebreak]
string:
契约 杀死一名梭默审判官 省份： 天际 难度： 高风险 报酬: 1000-1500金币 时限:36 小时

[pagebreak] 梭默因对塔洛斯信徒的残暴行径在天际省遭人痛恨，许多人加入风暴斗篷叛乱以求伸张正义，而这位雇主却选择了另一条路 —— 他们举行了黑暗祭礼，要我们猎杀那位杀害其家人的审判官。 与委托人接头，铲除梭默审判官. [pagebreak]
去死吧，你这个该死的杀人犯！

original: You don't need to worry about me.
I think Mallus needs to get out in the sun a little more frequently.
string: 我觉得马鲁斯该多出去晒晒太阳。

original: Mercer may have been a competent fighter, but he was no match for me.
string: 墨瑟或许是个能干的战士，但他根本不是我的对手。

original: Apostle Renos wants to find ways to improve his factotums.
string: 雷诺斯使徒想要找到改进构装体的方法。

original: They needed to gather resources to maintain our fellow factotums. We are the last ones here.
string: 他需要收集资源来维护我们这些构装体。我们是这里仅存的几个了。

original: Walk with the three, Outlander. Goodbye.
string: 外乡人，愿三神与你同行。再见。

original: Reminds me of what happened with you, Listener. These are once again historic times for the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 这让我想起了你的经历，聆听者。如今又是黑暗兄弟会改写历史的时刻了。

original: Excellent. A wise decision. Be cautious; those cultists can be... fanatical. Return to me when you have both sets. And don't forget the heart stones.
string: 太好了，明智的决定。小心点，那些信徒会非常狂热。集齐两套后回来找我，别忘了心石。

original: Return to Nelosi tomorrow for your new <Alias=NameHolderForRobe05>
string: 次日返回内洛西处领取新的 <Alias=NameHolderForRobe05>

original: Filthy group of harlots. Just kidding! Please don't throw me out.
string: 一群肮脏的妓女。开玩笑的！别把我赶出去啊。

original: The Forsworn's existence is a blight. They murder civilians, burn down villages, but never would they clash with an army. Cowards!
string: 弃誓者的存在就是一场灾难。他们杀害平民，烧毁村庄，却从不敢与军队正面交锋。懦夫！

original: Looks like it won't be our blood being spilled today.
string: 看来今天流血的不会是我们。

original: I can set myself to conduit, adjudicator or arbalest.
string: 我可以切换为传导型、审判型或弩炮型。
召唤蜘蛛

original: What's so good about being a knight?
Congratulations on not turning yourself inside out.
string: 恭喜你，没把自己搞得一团糟。

original: I remember our time training together.
string: 我记得我们一起训练的时光。

original: (Optional) Steal the war plans against Pirates from the Captain of the Guard
string: （可选）从守卫队长那里偷走对抗海盗的战争计划

original: I think it's time for you to take your things and go.
string: 我看你该收拾东西走人了。

original: OK. Go look for him, then. He won't have gone far, that's for sure.
string: 好。那你去找他吧。他肯定没走远，这是肯定的。

original: He was expelled from the Clockwork City, but he refused to stay in the outskirts of the city.
string: 他被逐出了发条城，却不愿待在城市的边缘地带。

original: I like this one's style. Paranoid, squirrely. Hunted and still alive. Hircine would be proud of him.
string: 我喜欢这家伙的风格，偏执又警觉，被追杀还能活下来，海尔辛定会为他骄傲。

original: A blacksmith named Talsric has asked me to hunt and kill a great beast. Talsric says that this beast killed his wife and child. If I bring back the beast's pelt, Talsric has said he will make me some unique armor.
string: 一个名叫塔斯里克的铁匠让我去猎杀一头巨兽。他说这头巨兽害死了他的妻子和孩子。如果我能带回巨兽的皮毛，塔斯里克就会为我打造一套独特的盔甲。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

Greetings <Alias=Player>,

I found who sent Anise the note to join the Thalmor: Sybille Stentor, Solitude's court wizard. No surprise to you apparently, as she's already dead.We thank you for ending her quickly.

For this deed, take Ashfang, a Dwarven dagger forged by the dwarves long ago. Its edge burns with purifying fire on every strike, and when it claims a life, the body crumbles to ash piles, leaving no trace for prying eyes or guards to find. Wield it as a silent cleanser, honoring our creed of mercy tempered by flame.

Your vigilance keeps Tamriel's balance. More shadows stir, watch the dead drops.

In Shadows, We Serve.
Sentinel

</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'><font size='18'>

向你致意，<Alias=Player>：

我已查明是谁给安尼斯寄去那封怂恿她加入梭默的信件 —— 正是独孤城的宫廷法师希比利·斯丹特。看来你对此事早有行动，她已然殒命，这倒也不出意料。感谢你迅速将其铲除。
为嘉奖此番功绩，特将 “灰烬之牙” 赠予你。这是一把由锻莫一族在远古时期打造的匕首，锋刃每次挥砍都会燃起净化之火，夺人性命后，尸身会化为一捧飞灰，不会留下任何痕迹，让好事者与守卫无从追查。请将它作为无声的净化之刃使用，以此践行我们以烈焰淬炼仁慈的信条。
你的警觉守护着泰姆瑞尔的平衡。更多暗影仍在蠢蠢欲动，留意秘密投递点的消息。

我们于暗影中效命。
哨兵

</font>

original: Oh, I've been imagining this scene for so many times. Rehearsed and rehearsed... And I finally get to say it!
string: 哦，这个场景我在脑海里想象了无数次，反复练习…… 终于有机会说出来了！

original: Listen... We all know that beasts lurk within the forest surrounding Falkreath, but wolves and bears are nothing to be frightened of.
string: 听着…… 我们都知道佛克瑞斯周围的森林里有野兽出没，但狼和熊根本不值得害怕。

original: Killing clients is bad for business.
Uncover further information on what the Pirates are seeking.
string: 揭露海盗正在寻找的东西的更多信息

original: Cyrodiil Contract: Kill a Synod Mage (High-Risk)
string: 赛瑞迪尔契约：杀死一位学会法师（高风险）

original: But first, I need to head back to Renos' Laboratory. I've picked up some metal pieces that could be useful.
string: 但首先，我得回雷诺斯的实验室。我捡到了一些可能有用的金属碎片。

original: I'll be back. You can't get rid of me that easily.
string: 我会回来的。你没那么容易甩掉我。
